head: ।। śrī ।।
।। mīmāṃsāślokavārtikam ।।
kumārilabhaṭṭaviracitam
।। tātparyaṭīkā ।।
mīmāṃsāślokavārtikavyākhyā
bhaṭṭombekaviracitā

lg.l: ye nāma kecidiha naḥ prathayantyavajñāṃ jānanti te kimapi tānprati naiṣa yatnaḥ ।
utpatsyate mama tu ko'pi samānadharmā kālo hyayaṃ niravadhirvipulā ca pṛthvī ।।

p: granthārambhe'bhimatadevatāṃ prastauti vārtikakāraḥ—viśuddheti । tasya ca kartavyatāyāṃ śiṣṭācāraḥ pramāṇam । prayojanaṃ na vighnopaśamaḥ, tasyaiva granthārambhe'- pekṣitatvāt; na tu svargaḥ, anapekṣitatvāt ārambhasaṃyogavirodhācca ।।
ātmanyagauravaparihārārthamupāsitagurutāmanenāha—abhivandyeti । anena mātrādigurusaṃpratyaye sati vidyāgurusaṃpratyayārthamāha—śiṣyadhītyādi । śloka- vārtikamiti prāripsitagranthasaṃjñā ।।

LG.l: kuto vā gṛhṇate doṣaṃ sūrayo madvidhoktiṣu ।
neṣyate yaḥ pararatho'pi sa svayaṃ gṛhyate katham ।। 5 ।।

p: idānīṃ vārtikapratiṣṭhāsidhyarthamanunayāvarjanīyahṛdayān viduṣo'bhyarthayitu- māha—taditi । sā ceyaṃ prārthanā, na tvājñā; ityarthāntaranyāsena darśayannāha— santa iti ।
idānīmekāntato roṣaparihāreṇa prājñānāmanugrahaprārthanāmāśaṃsa ityāha— na ceti । etaduktaṃ bhavati—madhyasthatā mayā prārthyate, madhyasthā bhūtvā parīkṣadhva- mityarthaḥ ।।
adhunā ye tvanunīyamānakarkaśamanaso'nunayādevānuneturaśaktiṃ manyante, na ca pāṇḍityotkarṣam; tānprati sāviṣkāramāha—kuto veti ।।

nanu yadyapyuktena prakāreṇa sūrayo na gṛhṇate doṣam, tathāpi ye vidyāla- valiptajihvāgrāḥ paṇḍitaṃmanyāste grahīṣyanti; tathā ca vārtikanirdoṣatvaṃ savigānameveti kathamatra buddhipūrvakāriṇaḥ pravarteran ? ata āha—nirdoṣatveti । tathā hi— yāvapi niratiśayasukharūpatvādatyantaduḥkhoparamarūpatvācca paramapuruṣārthau svargāpavargau tatrāpi nāstikāḥ sadbhāvādārabhya vivadante, kaiva kathātra ?
evaṃ tāvanmadvidhoktiṣu doṣasambhāvanaiva nāstītyuktam; idānīmabhyupagamyā- pyāha—āgameti ।।
yadyapi madvāci bahu phalguprāyamalpasāraṃ syāt, tathāpi viṣayasaundaryānmanasaḥ śraddhāpradhānatvādvāgvṛttiḥ śrotṛjanacittārādhanasamarthaiveti darśayannāha—yathākatha- ñciditi ।।

evaṃ tāvadvārtikaṃ parārthamabhipretya parapravṛttyarthametaduktam; idānīṃ svārthameva vārtikārambhe prayatnaḥ, kiṃ parapravṛttyarthena bahunoktenetyāha—mīmāṃsāśāstreti । nanu ca prāpte vedārthajñāne vārtike'śakyakartrabhiprāye vā tṛṣṇānupapattiḥ । api ca granthārambhaḥ svapratipattyartha iti nātīva śobhate । naiṣa doṣaḥ, prāpte'pi vedārthajñānaratne lobhātirekādavismaraṇārthaṃ grahaṇakavākyavatsvārthe yatno ghaṭata eva granthārambha iti sarvamupapannam ।।

nanu vedārthagrahaṇāvismaraṇārthamapi tattadbharttṛmitrādiviracitatattvaśuddhyādi- lakṣaṇaprakaraṇamastyeveti gatārthamidaṃ vākyamityata āha—prāyeṇaiveti । mīmāṃsā hi sarvāstikaśāstrāṇāmagraṇīḥ, sarvapuruṣārthasādhanaparijñānasyaitannibandhanatvāt । saivamātmikā alokāyatameva satī bāhulyena lokāyatīkṛtā, satsmṛtisadācārāṇāṃ vinā kāraṇena dharmapramāṇatvanirākaraṇāt vidhiniṣedhayoriṣṭāniṣṭaphalānabhyupagamācca । prāyeṇeti । codanāpramāṇako dharma ityetāvanmātreṇa nāstikaśāstrādapasāritā, anyatsāmānyameva kṛtamityarthaḥ । tāmimāmasadvyākhyātṛvaśādasanmārganimnagāmuddhṛ- tyāstikapathe kartuṃ sthāpayituṃ vārtikārambhaprayatnaḥ kṛto mayeti ।
tadidānīṃ vārtikamārabhate—athāto dharmajijñāseti । pramāṇalakṣaṇe sūtramasambaddhamivāśaṅkyate—na hyanena kāryārthe codanāyāḥ prāmāṇya pratijñāyate,

‘codanālakṣaṇo'rthoṃ dharmaḥ’ itivat; nāpi sadautpattikasūtrābhyāmiva nirṇīyate; nāpyadhyāpanavidhiprayuktatvenādhyayanasya taccheṣatvenārthāvivakṣāyāmaprāmāṇyamāśaṅkya prayuktikṛtaśeṣatvanirākaraṇamukhena vivakṣitārthatayā prāmāṇyapratipādanamasyārthaḥ, svādhikāraprayuktādhyayanalābhenādhyāpanavirdheguṇādhikāravadaprayoktṛtvāt । tatrai- tatsyādadhyayanavidhau niyojyānavagamādaprayojakatvam, tadatrāpi samānam । atha tatra “aṣṭavarṣaṃ brāhmaṇamupanayīta” ityātmanepadaparyālocanayā “upanīya tu yaḥ śiṣyam” ityādismaraṇādācāryakaraṇakāmaḥ pratīyate, tadvadatrāpi brahmacāriprakaraṇe “upā- kṛtyādhīyīta chandāṃsi” iti smaraṇāt “ācāryādhīno vedamadhīṣva” iti praiṣācca brahmacārī pratīyata eva । atha śiśutvādasāvadhikāraṃ pratipattumasamarthaḥ, tadasat; anuśiṣṭa putraṃ lobhabhayādinā adhikārapratipādanena vā pitā hi pravartayati । avaśyañcādhikārāntaraprayuktasambhave'dhikārāntaramaprayojanamāśrayitavyam । itarathā- dhyāpanavidherapyadhyāpanaṃ vināsiddheḥ prayuñjītādhyāpanam । yeṣāṃ tu ‘ācārya ācāraṃ grāhayati’ iti nirvacanāt “ācāryādhīno vedamadhīṣva” iti prāksiddhācārya- vedādhyayanapreṣaṇāt vṛddhavyavahārācca gāyatryadhyāpanādācāragrahaṇamātrādeva vācārya- niyogasiddhiḥ, teṣāṃ kathamiva tatprayuktamadhyayanaṃ syāt ? atha—manvādyācārya- vacanāt sakalavedādhyāpanādācāryaniyogasiddhiryadyapi tathāpi vikalpaprasakteḥ phalabhūyastvādvā na sarveṣāṃ nityamadhyayanaṃ tatprayuktamiti, bālabhāṣitamiva naḥ pratibhāti । api ca, na vidheḥ preraṇādanyo vyāpāraḥ; prayuktirapi hi preraṇaiva; adhyāpanavidhiśca nādhyayane prerayati; adhikāribhedāt, anubandhānyatvācca; prerayan vā nādhyāpananiyogaḥ syāt; ācāryasya tu nādhyayanaṃ svavyāpāraḥ, yena tatra niyujyeta tatrādhyāpanamātraparyavasite vidhāvācāryaḥ puruṣārthasidhyarthaṃ kṛṣikaraṇavallobhabhayādhikārapratipādanena vā māṇavakaṃ ca pravartayati; so'pi svārtha- siddhyarthameva pravartate, na tadarthamiti prāsaṅgikastu tasyopakāra iti । kiñca adhyāpanavidheḥ prayojakatayā prayuktikṛtaśeṣatvanirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtramārabhyamāṇam “śeṣaḥ parārthatvāt” ityanena gatārthatvādanarthakameva syāt । na ca tasya nyāyasya punarākṣepaḥ saṃbhavati । sambhave vā śeṣalakṣaṇa eva vaktavyaṃ syāt । prayuktikṛtaśeṣa- tvanirākaraṇamukhena prāmāṇyapratipādanapare ca sūtre sati “kintvadhīte vede”

ityupakramya “gurukulānmā samāvartiṣṭa, kathaṃ nu vedavākyāni vicārayet” iti sūtratātparyakathanaparaṃ bhāṣyadvayamasambaddhameva syāt । pratijñāsūtratāñcāsya darśayiṣyati ‘sarvāsāṃ pratijñānāmapi sūcanācca sūtramiti’, tadapi nopapadyeta । yadi tadetatpratijñāsūtraṃ syāt, codanāsūtrottarakālaṃ ca sūtraṃ kartavyaṃ syāt, pratijñātasya prakārāntareṇākṣipya samarthanāt । tadevamasambaddhatāmāśaṅkya prayojanaparatvena sakalaśāstraśeṣatāmasya sūtrasya darśayannāha—athāto dharmajijñāseti । nanu nātra prayojanaṃ padenopāttam; na cāpadārthasya vākyārthatvam; na cāvākyārthe tātparyam । prayojanaparatve ca kartavya- tānupadeśāt athātaḥśabdayorananvayaprasaṅgaḥ; na hi vedādhyayanānantaraṃ taddhetukaṃ dharmajñānaṃ prayojanamiti । gurukulanivṛttipratiṣedhaparaṃca bhāṣyamasambaddhameva syāt । ayamabhiprāya—“athāto dharmajijñāsā” iti śāstrādau sūtramadhyayanavidheradṛṣṭārtha- tāmāśaṅkya dṛṣṭārthatāpratipādanaparaṃ vyākhyātaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa “dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanaṃ nāma; na ca tatrādhyayanamātrāttatrabhavanto yājñikāḥ phalaṃ samāmananti; yadapi ca samāmanantīva tatrāpi dravyasaṃskārakarmasu parārthatvātphalaśrutirarthavādaḥ syāt ityarthavādatā” iti । kathaṃ punaradṛṣṭārthatā śaṅkyate ? iha hi “svādhyāyo'dhye- tavyaḥ” ityadhyayanakaraṇikāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ niyogaḥ pratīyamāno niyojyaviśeṣaṇaṃ vinā aparyavasyan “sa svargaḥ syāt” ityasmiṃśca “phalamātreyo nirdeśāt” itya- podite ghṛtakulyādikāmamavalambate pratiṣṭhākāmamiva rātrisatraniyogaḥ । na cāsyā- nyārthatā, yena parārthatvādarthavādo'rthamātraparyavasāyyeva syāt । na hi karmāvavodhana- kāmasyātrādhikāraḥ saṃbhavati, jyotiṣṭomādikarmaṇāṃ pramāṇāntarādapratīteḥ kāmanā- yogāt । athāpi pramāṇāntarātpratīyeran, tathāpi na tadavabodhakāmasyādhikāraḥ saṃbhavati; bodhyatayā hi tat kāmyate; na cāvabuddhe bodhyatayā kāmanā saṃbhavati । atra brūmahe—“svādhyāyo'dhyetavyaḥ” ityadhyayanakaraṇikāyāṃ nirvartyamānāyāmarthāvabodho jāyate । jyotiṣṭomādayaśca svaiḥsvairvākyaiḥ puruṣārthatayāvagatāḥ “jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta” ityevamādibhiḥ; ghṛtakulyādivākyāni cārthavādatayopayuktāni na punaḥ khedamarhanti; tadidamādhānavad draṣṭavyam, āhavanīyādīnāṃ karmārthatvādā- dhānasya tadarthatvāditi । taduktam—“na ca sahasaivādarśanāt svargādyeva phalaṃ kalpyate” iti ।

tadidamasamyagiva manyante; siddhe hi codanāyāḥ prāmāṇye tasyārtho nirūpa- yituṃ yuktam “svadhyāyo'dhyetavyaḥ” iti; tannādyāpi pramāṇam । vakṣyati hyetat “autpattikastu” iti । evamukte vicārasya prayojanamucyate vedavākyārtha- nirṇayaprayojanapratipādanamukhena । “svādhyāyo'dhyetavyaḥ” iti yadā adhyayanasya vaidhaṃ śeṣatvaṃ svargabhāvaka iva vyāpāre jyotiṣṭomādeḥ, tadādhyayanaśabdavācyānāma- gnihotrādividhīnāmuccāraṇasyādṛṣṭārthatvādanyaparatve sati kāryarūpārthapratipatteravi- vakṣāyāmadhyayanānantaraṃ tadarthanirṇayārthaṃ śāstraṃ nārabdhavyaṃ syāt । athādṛṣṭārthatve'- pyuccāraṇasya vivakṣito'rthaḥ, pratīteravādhācca yathoktaṃ sādhviti ।
“tato vidhāsyati hyeṣa niyogāt smārayiṣyati”
ityanena nyāyenocyate, tathāpi adhyayanavidheratatparatvena vākyārthanirṇayānā kṣepādanārambhaḥ । yadā tu śabdaikasamadhigamyo'pi

ityanena nyāyenānekopāyaprasaktau satyām adhyayanenaiva karmāvabodhaṃ bhāvayet’ iti pratipuruṣaṃ niyamyate'vaghātādineva taṇḍulabhāvo vrīhyādeḥ । na ca tadvicāra- nirapekṣaḥ karmāvagamayituṃ śaknoti; vākyārthanirṇayaprayojanapratipādanamukhenānantaraṃ taddhetukamitikartavyatābhūtavicāramapyākṣipati tadā । ataśca svādhyāye cet pravṛttaḥ, ā arthavicārāt pravṛtta eva; ekā hi pravṛttiraṅgapradhānayoryataḥ । vakṣyati ca—“aṅgapradhānavatyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ yugapat puruṣaniyogaḥ” iti । taduktam—
“dharme pramīyamāṇe hi vedena karaṇātmanā” iti ।

vedānāṃ vivakṣitārthatayā sādhite śāstrasyārthavattvenānantarārambhe “loke” ityādinā “tasmin hi sati sāvakalpate” ityevamantena, punaḥ “naitadevam, anyasyāpi” ityādinā dṛṣṭārthatāmanadhigamyaivānadhītavedaniṣedhaparatvabhrāntyā- dhyayanānantaramākṣepakapramāṇābhāvenāthaśabdasyālaukikārthatvamāśaṅkitam । tasyāpi

LG.l: evamādi vinā yuvatyā kalpyaṃ mīmāṃsakaiḥ punaḥ ।। 98 ।।

p: apauruṣeyābhyupagame tu tasya siddhatvānna kācit kalpanetyāha—mīmāṃsa- kairitītīṣyata ityantena ।

ata evaṃbhūtasyāpauruṣeyatvena nirastadoṣāśaṅkasya/?/ buddhyutpādakatvenānavaga tānutpattilakṣaṇāprāmāṇyasya yadi paraṃ saṃśayaviparyayarūpamaprāmāṇyamāśaṅkyeta, tadapi “na cāgnihotraṃ juhuyāt svarga kā/?/maḥ” ityādibhāṣyadvayena nivāritamityāha— evaṃbhūtasyeti ।

tatraitat syāt—yadyapīdānīṃ saṃśayaviparyayau na staḥ, tathāpi kadācit syātāmityāśaṅkyāha—nirākariṣyata iti । duṣṭakāraṇārabdhe hyāśaṅkāpi syāt; anāptānupraveśaśca śabde doṣaḥ; sa ca sambandhagranthe nirākariṣyate; atastaddvāre- ṇāpyāśaṅkā na yuktetyarthaḥ ।

evaṃ sati yat pūrvaṃ pratyakṣavādinābhihitam—“nanvatathābhūtamapi” iti, tasya buddhyanutpattireva viṣayaḥ pariśiṣyate; tasya ca “vipratiṣiddhamidam” iti bhāṣyeṇānubhavavirodhodbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam, na jātyuttaraṃ dūṣaṇamityāha—tathā satīti ।
evaṃ pratijñādūṣaṇaparaṃ bhāṣyam—“yattu laukikaṃ vacanam” iti, tadvyācaṣṭe—yathādṛṣṭārtheti । pratyayitasyendriyajanyajñānamūlaṃ yadvākyaṃ tadavita- thameveti sādhyavikalatā dṛṣṭāntasya ।

tatra “dharmākhyaṃ viṣayaṃ vaktum” adhyayanavidheḥ iti sūtravākyārtha- kathanam । “mīmāṃsāyāḥ prayojanam” iti vākyārthasyaivātraiva tātparyakathanam । vakṣyati ca “vedavākyāni vicārayedityevamartho'yamupadeśaḥ” iti ।।
idānīṃ prayojanasamarthanasya pravṛttyaṅgatāṃ darśayadi—sarvasyaiveti ।।
viśeṣato mīmāṃsāyā bahuprayāsasādhyatvāditi darśayati—mīmāṃsākhyeti ।

yacca sūtrakṛtādhyayanavidhiparyālocanena svayameva prayojanaṃ samarthitam, tanna vidyāntara iva vyākhyātṛbhirabhidhānamapekṣitam “atha śabdānuśāsanam” itivat atra vārttikakāraḥ ślokatrayeṇa kāraṇamāha—vidyāntareṣvityādinā ।।
nanu prayojanavat pravṛttyaṅgatvāt sambandho'pi vaktavya iti codayati— siddhārthamiti ।।

LG.l: sambandhaṃ kriyayorhyeṣa brūte śāstrācca te pṛthak ।। 22 ।।
śroturvidhau niṣedhe vā jñāne vā śāstragocare ।। 24 ।।

p: satyamevam, prayojanamukhena tu dharmādharmajñānavicārayoḥ sādhyasādhanalakṣaṇa- sambandho'pyākṣipta eva sūtrakṛtetyāha—śāstramiti ।।
nanu sa evārthoktaḥ kasmādvyākhyātṛbhirna kathita iti codayati— siddhiriti ।।
syādetat—arthoktasya kimabhidhānenetyāśaṅkyāha—yāvaditi । aya- marthaḥ—prayojanavat sambandhe'nabhihite'sambaddhapralāpitāpi kasyacidābhātītyabhi- dhātavya eva sambandha iti ।।
atra parihāramāha—iha tviti । ‘prasiddhamaprasiddhaṃ vā’ ityādinā bhāṣyakāreṇaiva cākṣepapūrvakaṃ svayamevābhidhānānna pṛthagabhidhānamityarthaḥ ।।
nanvatrāthaśabdenaiva sambandhaḥ pṛthagukta eveti kimucyate “bhinno noktaḥ” itītyāśaṅkyāha—na cāpīti । vidhyākṣiptaṃ hi karaṇetikartavyatayoḥ sambandha- māha, na śāstrasya prayojanena sahetyarthaḥ ।।

LG.l: sādhāraṇī viśiṣṭā ca sūtravyākhyā dvidhā kṛtā ।

p: na cāyamathaśabdaḥ śiṣyapraśnānantaryalakṣaṇaguruparvakramalakṣaṇasambandhapratipādako vā vyākhyāyate, apravṛttyaṅgatvena tayoravācyatvādityāha—yo'pyayamityādinā ślokatrayeṇa । pūrveṇa nirākāryasvarūpopanyāsaḥ “yo'pyayaṃ śāstrasambandhaḥ” iti; madhyamena nirākaraṇaheturuktaḥ “tadatadbhāvayostasya” iti; tṛtīyenopasaṃhāraḥ “tasmādvyākhyāṅgamicchadbhiḥ” iti ।।

evaṃ sūtratātparyaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā loka ityādibhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe—loka ityādīti । tatra śāstrādau prayuktatvāt sakalaśāstraśeṣatvena sarvavyākhyādayaḥ pañca pakṣāḥ pratibhānti, ānantaryaviśeṣādvā prathamasūtraśeṣatvena vā athaśabdākṣepapakṣa- pratibhānam ।।
tatra pakṣānuddiśati—sarvavyākhyāmiti । kecidgrahaṇaṃ ca loka ityādi- bhāṣyasya siddhāntagranthatāmapi darśayiṣyati—“yadvākṣepo yathoktasya” ityādinā, tadabhiprāyam ।।
nanu pratisūtraṃ vyākhyā vartiṣyata eva, kathamidaṃ bhāṣyaṃ sakalasūtravyākhyāparaṃ vyākhyāyata iti sarvavyākhyāyāṃ paunaruktyamāśaṅkya pariharati—sādhāraṇīti ।।
atraiva bhāṣyaṃ yojayati—pravṛttistu padeṣveveti ।।

nanu “nādhyāhārādibhireṣām” iti na sūtrāṇāṃ sarvanāmārthatā, “sūtreṣu” iti padaviśeṣaṇatvenopāttatvāt; ataḥ kathaṃ nivṛttiḥ sūtrasaṃśrayetyāśaṅkyāha— adhyāhārasyeti । niṣedhyānāmadhyāhārādīnāṃ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā vākya eva sambhavādityarthaḥ ।।

bhāṣyagatastvevaśabdo'lpābhiprāyeṇaitasmin pakṣa ityāha—evaśabda ityardhena । prasiddha evāyamarthaḥ, kimaneneti codyam—prasiddhatvādavācyaṃ cediti; pramāṇāntaravatāmevāyamarthaḥ pauruṣeyavākyānāmiti parihāraḥ—na doṣaḥ/?/ puṅgi- rāmayamiti ।।
yo vyākhyāṅgatvābhimānādadhyāhārādi kalpayitumārabhate, tasya vānena niṣedha ityāha—vyākhyāṅgatvābhimāneneti ।।
upālambhapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti—vṛttyantareṣviti ।। upālambhaṃ darśayati—athāta iti ।।
upālambhapakṣe bhāṣyaṃ yojayati—prasiddhahānirityādinā ślokadvayena ।।
pratyākhyānapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti—na vyākhyāsyatīti ।।
atraiva kāraṇamāha—prayāsa iti tripādyā । lokaprasiddhapadārthairebhirveda- vākyāni vyākhyeyānītyāha—ebhirityādinā yatnagauravādityantena ।।
nanu vedavākyavat sūtrāṇyapi vyākhyeyāni, anyathā anavagatārthairveda- vākyāni na vyākhyāyanta ityāśaṅkyāha—padārthānāmityardhena ।।
evaṃ yatnagauravaśabdau tasmin pakṣe samañjasau, vedavākyavyākhyānamātra- karaṇādityāha—evaṃśabdādika ityardhena ।।
pratyākhyānapakṣaṃ tāvaddūṣayati bhāvisūtravyākhyānavirodhena kārikādvayena— padacchedādyabhāveneti ।। upāyatvādityasya pratyākhyānahetorviruddhatāmāha—na copāyānabhijñenetyardhena ।।

ye tu vinaiva sūtraṃ vedārthaṃ vijānanti, tān prati sūtrameva nārabdhavyamityāha— nānyata ityardhena ।। idānīṃ prasiddhapadārthakatvādityasya pratyākhyānahetoriṣṭavighāta- kṛllakṣaṇaviruddhatāmāha—pratyākhyānasyeti ।

LG.l: vaidikaṃ jaiminīyaṃ ca yatra vākyaṃ virudhyate ।। 47 ।।

p: vedavākyārthasandehaprayuktaṃ vyākhyānaṃ sūtreṣvapi samānamityāha—vākyārtha iti । api ca duṣṭavyākhyānaniṣedhena tadapetāśritaiva bhāṣyakāreṇa vyākhyā, yenaivamāha — “nādhyāhārādibhireṣāṃ parikalpanīyo'rthaḥ” iti । itarathā hyevamavakṣyat—laukikārthatvena sūtrāṇi vyākhyātavyānītyāha—na vyākhyā- tavyamiti ।।
dūṣitaṃ pakṣamupasaṃharan pūrvayoḥ phalgutvaṃ madhyame cātidaurbalyaṃ vadan pari- saṃkhyāpakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti—asya dṛṣṭaviruddhatvāditi ।

prāpta eva avirodhe laukikārthagrahaṇe, ‘vedavākyāvirodhasya sati sambhave laukikārthagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam’ iti punarucyamānam ‘vedavākyavirodhe na’ ityanyanivṛttiphalaṃ bhavatīti kārikādvayena parisaṃkhyāphalasya viṣayamāha— vaidikamityādinā neyamityantena । yatra tu vedavākyagata evopakramopasaṃhārayo- rvirodhaḥ tatra pratigrāhayediti vikalpitamevetyāha—virodhe'nyonyasyeti ।।

nanu ca tatra cānyatra ca prāptau parisaṃkhyā bhavati, na ca virodhe laukikārthagrahaṇaṃ sūtreṣu prāptamityāśaṅkya avirodhavat virodhe'pi parisaṃkhyāsamarthanārthaṃ prāptiṃ kārikādvayenāha—yathā dharmāvabodhasyeti ।।
tatra virodhe sati dvayoryathāśrutagrahaṇāsambhavāt pakṣe prāptirityāha— asambhavāditi ।।

vedavākyārthapratipattāvupāyatvena prathamaṃ pratīyamānatvādvirodha eva nāstīti tattāvadyathāśrutameva nityaṃ gṛhyate, tasmiṃstu yathāśrute gṛhīte vedavākyamupalabhyamānaṃ pūrvasūtragṛhītārthaviruddhatvādayathārthatāṃ pratipadyata iti siddhā tatra cānyatra ca prāpti- rityāha—prāthamyeneti ।।
ato bhavati parisaṃkhyetyāha—tena vedāvirodhasyeti । “loke” ityādibhāṣyasaṃkīrtanaṃ sarvaṃ pramāṇāntarasiddhamevānūdya ‘vedāvirodhasya sati sambhave’ ityetāvanmātraṃ vidhīyata ityarthaḥ

LG.l: na ca so'styathaśabdasya vinā te pūrvakarmaṇā ।। 61 ।।
prasiddhārthaṃ padaṃ yuktaṃ tacca nāstīti dūṣaṇam ।

p: idānīṃ virodhe'dhyāhāravipariṇāmavyavahitakalpanāvākyabhedaguṇakalpanānā- mudāharaṇāni kārikācatuṣṭayenāha—śeṣabhājāmityādinā sārdhena ।।
praśaṃsāpakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti—sūtrakārapraśaṃseti ।।

evamanupāsitaguruvyākhyāvikalpanābhidhānena pāramārthikamathaśabdadūṣaṇapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti; tatreyatā bhāṣyagranthenāthaśabdo dūṣyata iti vikalpenāvadhidvayamāha— bhavitavyamiti । pūrva evātrāvadhirabhipretaḥ, “bhavitavyaṃ tu tena”—ityasya siddhāntagranthatayāpi vyākhyānāt ।।

athāyamabhiprāyaḥ–ānantarye hyayamathaśabdo loke prayuktaḥ tacca pratiyogi- sāpekṣam; vedādhyayanaṃ cātra pratiyogitvenābhipretam; na ca tat sūtra upāttam; nāpi vidhyākṣepalabhyam; atrādhyayanavidheradṛṣṭārthatvenānantaraṃ vicārānākṣepakatvā- dityāha sārdhena ślokena—prasiddhārthapadairiti । “tatra loke'yam” ityādi bhāṣyamathaśabdasya dūṣaṇapakṣe yujyate, anenaivāthaśabdadūṣaṇāt “na kiñcidiha vṛttamupalabhyate” ityevamantena sarvavyākhyādiṣu kimathaśabdopavarṇaneneti codayati— prasiddha ityardhena ।।

LG.l: na cātra codanāvyākhyā gauravaṃ tatra coditam ।। 64 ।।

p: tatra sarvavyākhyāyāṃ pūrvasyaivodāharaṇametaditi yojayati—pradarśanārthamityeka iti । upālambhapakṣe yojayati—kecidityādinā aṣṭamādivadityantena । loke hyathaśabdasyaiva kevalasyānantaryarūpo'rthaḥ prasiddhaḥ, “atha viśeṣalakṣaṇam” iti vacanāt; nāthātaḥśabdasyetyarthaḥ ।। pratyākhyāne yojayati—na cātretyardhena । gauravabhayāt pratyākhyānam, codanāvyākhyāyāṃ tu tadityarthaḥ ।।

sāṃpratamathaśabdākṣepapakṣaṃ prakārāntareṇa yojayitumāha—yadveti sārdhena ślokena । pūrvavyākhyāyāṃ hi “bhavitavyaṃ tu tena” iti prāgasmāt sakalamidaṃ pūrvapakṣabhāṣyam; idānīṃ tu “loka” ityādi “gaurava” paryantaṃ siddhāntabhāṣyam, adhyayanavidhyākṣiptatayā vicārasyādhyayanaṃ pratyānantaryasambhavenāthaśabdasya laukikārtha- grahaṇopapatteḥ । “tatra loke'yam” ityādi, “na hi kiñcidiha vṛttamupalabhyate” ityevamantamadhyayanavidheradṛṣṭārthatayā vidhyanākṣepābhiprāyeṇa pūrvapakṣabhāṣyamiti siddhāntopakramamidamadhikaraṇam ।।
idānīmākṣepapūrvakamathaśabdopavarṇane prayojanamāha—vedādhyayaneti । smṛti- mātraprāptasnānabādhenādhyayanānantaraṃ taddhetukaśāstrārambhakartavyatāyāṃ prayojanamasya darśayati ।।
“bhavitavyaṃ tu tena” ityādi siddhāntabhāṣyam, tasyābhiprāyamāha— anarthaka iti । śrutānantaryānyathānupapattyā kimapi vṛttaṃ gamyata ityartaḥ ।।

idamaparaṃ siddhāntabhāṣyaṃ vṛttaviśeṣapratipādakam “tattu vedādhyayanam” ityādi; tadatispaṣṭatvānna vyākhyātam । atra codyabhāṣyam “naitadevam, anyasyāpi” iti; tasyānupapannatāmaśaṅkyopapannatāṃ darśayati—viśiṣṭaliṅgeti ।।

yadyapi vidhyākṣiptavicāraviśeṣitānantaryarūpaliṅgādviśiṣṭa eva liṅgī vedādhyayanākhyaḥ pratīyate, tathāpi sūtreṇāyamaṃśo nopātta iti codayatīti kecit । tadanupapannam; vidhyākṣiptasya hi vicārasyānantaryopadeśāt tasya dṛṣṭārthatvādvedādhyayanamākṣiptamevetyāha—ānantaryopadeśeneti ।
etadeva yuktidvayaṃ kārikādvayena vivṛṇoti—yena vṛttenetyādinā ।।
yadyapi saṅkalpaṃ vinā nopapadyate, tathāpi sarvakriyāsādhāraṇatvena taṃ pratyānantaryamanupadeśyameva, prāptatvādityāha saṅkalpādibhiriti ।। upasaṃharati— tasmāditi ।।

LG.l: pūrveṇaiva ca labdhe'rthe tādṛśīṃ tvityanena kim ।। 75 ।।
iha vā kāni vākyāni vivariṣyati jaiminiḥ ।
yadvā bhavatu nāmedṛk sūtraṃ vedamadhītya ca ।। 78 ।।

p: pūrvacodya evāntargatatvādidamapi codyabhāṣyam—“prāgapi ca vedādhyayanāt” ityanupapannamevetyāha—anyasyāpīti ।।
idamaparaṃ siddhāntabhāṣyam—“tādṛśīṃ tu” iti, “tattu vedādhyayanam” ityanena punaruktatvādanupapannamevetyāha—pūrveṇaivetyardhena ।।

evamākṣipte sati “naitadevam, anyasyāpi” iti paricodanāṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭe vakṣyamāṇeti sārdhena kārikādvayena । athaśabdo hi dharmajijñāsāmātrasya tāva- dānantaryaṃ pratipādayati; na ca codanaikapramāṇatvaṃ dharmasyādyāpi siddham । ato buddhavākyādhyayanānantaraṃ dharmajijñāsetyapi sūtrārthaḥ saṃbhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ ।।

idānīṃ paricodanādvayamapyanyathā vyākhyāsyannāha—yadvā bhavatu nāmedṛk sūtramityādinā ślokacatuṣṭayena । ayamabhiprāyaḥ—bhavatu nāmādhyayanavidherdṛṣṭārthatva- paryālocanayā vedamadhītyānantaraṃ dharmajijñāsetyeṣa sūtrārthaḥ, tathāpi codyadvayam; yato'dhītyaiva, anantarameveti dvayamatra vivakṣitam; na ca tacchakyam, “na caitadekaṃ vākyam” ityādibhāṣyaniṣiddhavacanavyaktidvayaparigrahe vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt; tatra

LG.l: nānadhītya na cāpyanyat kṛtvetyevaṃ na labhyate ।। 79 ।।

p: adhītyaivetyetasmiṃstātparye'pyanyasyāpi snānāderanantaraṃ prāpnoti, ānantaryasyāvihi- tatvāt; athānantaramevetyeṣa sūtrārthaḥ, tatrāpyadhītyaivetyetasyāvihitatvāt “prāgapi vedādhyayanāt” iti codyam । evaṃ gate “tādṛśīṃ tu” iti siddhāntabhāṣyamākṣiptaṃ vyācaṣṭe—buddhavākyetyardhena । yadi tāvadvakṣyamāṇamanālocya “naitadevam, anyasyāpi” iti codyama, tadā vakṣyamāṇaparyālocanayā parihāraḥ । taduktam— “vedavākyānāmanekavidho vicāra iha vartiṣyate” iti । atha vacanavyaktidvayā- sambhavenānyataravacanavyaktiparigrahābhiprāyeṇa codyadvayam, tatrāpi “api ca, naiva vayamiha” ityādinā “evamartho'yamupadeśaḥ” ityevamantena athaśabdārthavidhāna- vacanavyaktipakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti bhāṣyakāraḥ ।।

yattvetasmin pakṣe'dhītyaivetyasyāvihitatvāt “prāgapi ca vedādhyayanāt” iti coditam, tatparihāre'pi “tādṛśīṃ tu” iti bhāṣyaṃ yojayati—prāgapīti ca codyasyeti । adhyayanavidhidṛṣṭārthatvena hi tadvidhiprayuktasya vicārasyādhyayanāt pūrvaṃ prayojakābhāvena kutaḥ prasaktirityāha—sāmarthyādvedalābhata iti ।।
idānīṃ tīrthāntaravyākhyānamupanyasyati smāsyaiva bhāṣyasya—naivaitayoriti tripādyā । nāthaśabdārthasya vidhānam, nānadhitavedasya pratiṣedhakameva tu sūtramiti

LG.l: ānantaryaṃ parastācca nāpi śiṃṣma itīha tu ।। 84 ।।

p: “api ca, naivamiha” ityādinā bhāṣyeṇoktam । kiṃ tarhi vidhīyata ityāha— kintvityetadvidhīyata iti । “kiṃtu adhīte vede dvayamāpatati” ityasyārthaḥ । smṛtiprāptagurukulanivṛttivyāvṛttirvidhīyata ityarthaḥ ।।

nanu cānadhītavedasya pratiṣedhanirāsaparamidaṃ bhāṣyam “api ca, naiva vayamiha” ityādi, nāthaśabdārthavidhinirāsaparam; ata āha—ānantarya- mityādyadhyāharantyantena । yadyapi ca ‘nāpi parastādānantaryaṃ śiṃṣmaḥ’ iti na śrūyate, tathāpyadhyāhriyate । adhyāhāre kāraṇamāha—asya sūtrasyānyaparatvata iti । gurukulanivṛttivyāvṛttiparatvena sūtrasyānyaparatvāditi ।।
idānīṃ tatpakṣokta eva pratijñādvaye yathāsaṃkhyena hetudvayamāha—na vāryata iti ।

adhyayanavidhiprayuktasya vicārasyādhyayanāt prāk prayojanābhāvenāprasakta- pratiṣedhānarthakyādavidhiḥ; gurukulanivṛttivyāvṛttivyatirekeṇa cānantaryavidhāne'- dṛṣṭārthatvaprasaṅgāllākṣaṇikārtho gurukulanivṛttirvidhīyata ityarthaḥ ।
taddūṣayati—ānantaryeti । tvayāpyathaśabdasyārthavidhānamaṅgīkṛtamevā- dṛṣṭāthatvabhayena; abhidheyāvinābhūto lākṣaṇiko'rtho gurukulānnivṛttivyāvṛttirvidhīyata ityabhyupagamāt ।।

kathaṃ punaraśabdo gurukulanivṛttivyāvṛttiṃ lakṣayatītyatrāha—pratīteti । adhyayanavidhinādhyayanāntaramākṣipto hi vicāro gurukulanivṛttivyāvṛttiṃ lakṣa- yatītyarthaḥ । “yadyevam” ityādi pūrvapakṣabhāṣyaṃ smṛtiprāptasnānabādhenānantaraṃ dharmajijñāsākṣepamākṣipati, tadapi spaṣṭatvānna vyākhyātam ।।

“taducyate” ityādi siddhāntabhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe—virodha iti । prayoga- vacanacoditāṅgapradhānayaugapadyenādhyayanavidhivirodhāt “vedamadhītya snāyāt” ityasya bādhaḥ । uktaṃ ca—“aṅgapradhānavatyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ yugapat puruṣaniyogaḥ” iti ।।

“na ca adhītavedasya” ityaparaṃ siddhāntabhāṣyaṃ virodhābhāvamāha, ktvāpratya- yenānantaryasyānabhihitatvāt, “samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle” iti smaraṇāt । tadanispaṣṭatvānna vyākhyātam । dṛṣṭārthatā cādhyayanasyānantarye vyāhanyeta, lakṣaṇayā tveṣo'rthaḥ syāt” iti ca bhāṣyadvayam । tatrādyam “vedamarthavantaṃ santamanarthakam” ityanena punaruktam; uparitanaṃ cāvijñāyamānārthatvena tyaktaṃ kaiścidityāha— dṛṣṭārthatvādīti ।।

tadetadbhāṣyadvayamapi samarthayitumāha—yadyapīti । yadyapi ktvāpratyayasyā- nantaryamarthaḥ, tathāpyadhyayanavidhivirodhaparihārāya pūrvakālamātraṃ pratipādayatītyarthaḥ । lakṣaṇā cātrobhayakriyāvinābhūtaktvetipratyāyārthaikadeśavṛttirabhipretā ।।
idānīmātmīyamavirodhaprakāraṃ darśayitumāha—granthagrahaṇamātra iti । “iṇ gatau” ityasyedaṃ rūpamiti yāvat ।
fn: tveṣo'rtho na syāditi na bhāṣyaṃ. mā.

LG.l: snātvā jijñāsamāno'pi nanu vedaṃ na bādhate ।। 96 ।।

p: kaḥ punarasyāḥ smṛterartha ityāha—ihāsnānādiniyama ityādinā ślokadvayena । ye hyasnānādigurukulavāsādayo brahmacāridharmatvena vratakrame niyamāḥ śrūyante, teṣāṃ niravadhikānāmavadhyapekṣāyāmavadhipratipādikeyaṃ smṛtiḥ—“vedamadhītya snāyāt” asnānādīnna kuryāt—iti hyavirodhādasnānaṃ tatsahacaritatvācca gurukulavāsādīn lakṣaṇayā nivartayati । evamapekṣitārthavidhānāddṛṣṭārthatvaṃ smṛtyarthasya āplavanavidhāne tvadṛṣṭatā ।।

idānīmādita evārabhya prakaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—tasmāditi । jijñāsākrama- vācino'thaśabdasya yadgurukulanivṛttivyāvṛttiparatvaṃ vyākhyātam, āplavanasnānavā- cinaśca snāyādityetasya yadbramhacāriniyamāvadhipratipādanaparatvaṃ vyākhyātam, “svādhyāyo'dhyetavyaḥ” ityasya ca dṛṣṭārthatvam, tadeteṣāṃ dṛṣṭārthatvāyetyarthaḥ ।।
bhavatu gurukulanivṛttireva smṛtyarthaḥ, tathāpi taduttarakālamadhyayanavidhyākṣiptasya vicārasya karaṇānnaiva virodha iti codayati—snātveti tripādyā ।

atra parihāramāha—evaṃ vadata ityādinā sapādena ślokadvayena । tatraivaṃ tāvaduktameva—gurukulanivṛtterbādhakāraṇaṃ “svādhyāyo'dhyetavyaḥ” iti । karaṇetikartavyatayoryaugapadyavidhānena virodhāt । idānīmidamucyate—smārtapadārtha- mabādhitvaitasyābhiniveśa eva nāsti; tadvaraṃ tatkālapratipakṣatvena virodhādgurukula- nivṛttimeva bādhata iti ślokadvayasyārthatātparyam ।।
yuktaṃ cautat, pāṭhakramasyārthena bādhyasyābhyupagamāt; kramapadārthavirodhe vā kramasya bādha ityāha—so'yamiti ।।
sa cāyaṃ virodhakāraṇako bādhaḥ smṛtyarthaikadeśasya gurukulanivṛtteḥ, na samastasyetyāha—snānopalakṣiteti ।।
svādhyāyādhyayanavidheḥ “vedamadhītya snāyāt” iti smṛteścārthaṃ vyākhyā- yādhunānuṣṭhānakramamāha—tasmāditi ।।
nanvevaṃ sati madhubhakṣaṇavat dārasaṅgraho'pi virodhābhāvāt prāpnotītyā- śaṅkyāha—gurugeheti । sakalabrahmacāridharmanivṛttau satyāṃ snātako bhavati;

LG.l: vyākhyāya kīrtitā cātra snāyāditi punaḥ smṛtiḥ ।। 104 ।।

p: snātakasya ca dārasaṅgrahaḥ smaryate—“snātvā bhāryāmadhigacchet” iti । etadeva vivṛṇoti—gurugehāditi ।।
idamaparaṃ bhāṣyadvayam—“vedamadhītya snāyāt, gurukulānmā samāvartiṣṭa” iti । tatrādyam “evaṃ hi samāmananti—adhītya snāyāt” ityanena punaruktamā- śaṅkyāha—vyākhyāyetyardhena ।।
uparitanaṃ tu smṛtiviparītārthapratipādakatvena viruddhatāmāśaṅkyāpakṛṣya vyākhyeyamityāha—samāvartiṣṭeti ।।
athāpakṛṣya kva pradeśe vyākhyeya ityāha—athaśabdeneti । yo'yamatha- śabdena smṛtyarthabādha uktaḥ, sa dṛṣṭārthatvena gurukulanivṛttyaṃśamātrasyetyarthaḥ ।।
aviruddhāni tu madhubhakṣaṇādīni bādhamāno niṣpramāṇakatvānna śobhata ityāha—smṛtiprāptamiti ।।
“vedamadhītya snāyāt” ityasmādgurukulānnivṛttaḥ “svādhyāyo'dhyetavyaḥ” ityasmācca punaḥ praviśya dharmaṃ jijñāsamāno virodhābhāvānnaivaṃ smṛtyarthaṃ bādhata
ityāśaṅkyāha—nivṛtyeti dvābhyām । adhyayanavidhivirodhāt smṛteradṛṣṭārthatvānnaiva nivartayatīti ślokadvayasyārthaḥ ।।

“ataḥśabdo vṛttasyāpadeśako hetvarthena” iti bhāṣyaṃ ataḥśabdena vedādhyayanasya dharmajijñāsāṃ prati hetutvamuktamityetat pratipādayati; tadākṣipannāha— athaśabdeti । ānantaryopadeśadṛṣṭārthatvābhyāmathaśabdenaivādhyayanasya jijñāsāṃ prati hetutvamuktam, kimataḥśabdeneti । taduktam—“tattu vedādhyayanam, tasmin hi sati sāvakalpate” iti । tadvyākhyātam—
“ānantaryopadeśena taddṛṣṭārthatayāpi ca” । iti ।।

evamākṣipte sati athātaḥśabdayorviviktaviṣayapradarśanapūrvakaṃ ślokadvayena parihāramāha—yogyatvamityādinā । ayamabhiprāyaḥ—“svādhyāyo'dhyetavyaḥ” ityadhyayanavidhirevetikartavyatābhūtasya dharmavicārasyotpādako'nuṣṭhāpakaśca; tatro- tpattāvathaśabdenādhyayanasya hetutvamuktam । pradarśitaṃ ca “tasmin hi sati sāvakalpate” ityadhyayanavidhirevetikartavyatābhūtasya dharmavicārasyotpādako'nuṣṭhāpakaśca; tatro- tpattāvathaśabdenādhyayanasya hetutvamuktam । pradarśitaṃ ca “tasmin hi sati sāvakalpate” iti । ataḥśabdo'pyadhyayanavidhereva dharmajijñāsāṃ pratyanuṣṭhāpakatvalakṣaṇaṃ prayojaka- hetutvamāha ।।

akathyamāne tu dharmajijñāsāṃ pratyadhyayanavidheranuṣṭhāpakatve ‘adhītavedasya dharmajijñāsāyāṃ yogyatā’ ityetāvanmātre kathyamāne'thaśabdena, phalārthitāpyanuṣṭhāpa- katvenāśaṅkyetetyāha—lakṣaṇaṃ puruṣasyaiveti ।।

LG.l: jñānopasarjanā saiva na tu vidhyādi gamyate ।। 115 ।।
iṣestu karma bāhyaṃ sāddharmaḥ sā vāthavā dvayam ।

p: vyākhyānāntaramāha—ataḥśabdagṛhītaṃ veti । ānantaryapratipādanenātha- śabdo vedagrahaṇasya hetutvamākṣipati; hetupratipādakātaḥśabdasahitaścāthaśabda ānantaryaṃ pratipādayati; vinā tu tena maṅgalārthatāpyāśaṅkyetetyarthaḥ ।।

vyākhyānāntaramāha—snānabādhasyeti । bhavatu nāmādhyayanāduttarakālamadhya yanavidhiprayukto yo vicāraḥ; anantarameva tu smṛtyarthabādhena sa kartavya ityatra kiṃ pramāṇamityāśaṅkya prayogavacanacoditayaugapadyaparyālocanayādhyayanasyaiva snānabādhaṃ pratyayamathaśabdo hetutvamāha ‘adhyayanavidhyanantaraṃ na snānaṃ kartavyam, tadākṣipta- vicārakaraṇavirodhāt’ iti ।

“dharmaṃ jijñāsitumicchet” iti bhāṣyam; tatra sanastumuna iṣerliṅaśca samānārthatāṃ nirasyannāha—sanvācyecchāntaraṃ karmetyādinā ślokadvayena sārddhena । yadyapi smaraṇāt sanā dhātunā tumunā liṅā cecchocyate, tathāpi viṣayānyatvāda- paunaruktyam, prakṛtyarthajñānakarmikā hīcchā sanocyate; iṣiṇā tu sanvācyecchā- karmikā dharmobhayakarmikā vā, tumunā samānakartṛkatvam, liṅā vidhiḥ; icchārtheṣu liṅpratyayasyopapadaviśeṣaṇatvādanupāttamapīcchāntaraṃ sūtrakṛtā sūtritecchābhinirvṛ- ttyarthaṃ bhāṣyakṛtoktam “icchet” iti; tadāha—sūtritetyardhena ।।

LG.l: dharmāyeti tu tādarthye ṣaṣṭhī vṛtteti kathyate ।। 119 ।।

p: evamathātaḥśabdau vyākhyāya adhunā dharmajijñāsāpadaṃ vyācaṣṭe—“dharmāya jijñāsā dharmajijñāsā” iti bhāṣyakāraḥ; tadākṣipannāha—prakṛtyeti । tādarthya- samāso hi prakṛtivikārabhāva iṣyate; “caturthī tadarthārtha” iti cenna, “prakṛti- vikṛtigrahaṇaṃ ca kartavyam” iti smaraṇāt । na cedaṃ sāmarthyapradarśanaparam “samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ” ityanenaiva siddhatvāt; balihitagrahaṇānarthakyaprasaṅgācca; randhanāya sthālītyādiṣu samāsaprasaṅgāt ।
tatra parihāramāha—sā hīti । idamatra vigrahavākyam “dharmasya jijñāsā” iti । tadidamuktam—“sā hi tasya jñātumicchā” iti । dharmāya jijñāsā—iti vigṛhītaṣaṣṭhyarthakathanaparaṃ bhāṣyam ।।
nanu tādarthyalakṣaṇasambandhaviśeṣavivakṣāyām “tādarthye caturthyupasaṃkhyānam” iti caturthyeva prāpnoti; sambandhamātravivakṣāyāṃ tu kathaṃ tādarthyalakṣaṇasambandha iti codayati—prāpnotīti ।।
tatra parihāramāha—sambandhamātra iti । atrāyamabhiprāyaḥ—śeṣalakṣaṇā ceyaṃ ṣaṣṭhī, sa tu tādarthyalakṣaṇasambandhādanyaḥ śeṣa iti darśitam ।।
“sa kathaṃ dharmo jijñāsitavyaḥ” ityupakramya “kānyasya sādhanāni, kāni sādhanābhāsāni” iti bhāṣyam; tatra sādhanābhāsapadaṃ vyācaṣṭe sādhanā- bhāsatetyādinā ślokena ।।

tatraiva codāharaṇamāha—kratvarthamityardhena । “kva puruṣaparatvaṃ dharmasya, kva puruṣo guṇabhūtaḥ” iti ṣāṣṭhaṃ vastu saṃkīrtya “śeṣalakṣaṇe vyākhyātam” ityuktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa; tadanupapannam, śeṣalakṣaṇaśabdasya tārtīyalakṣaṇaviṣayatvādityāśaṅkyāha —śeṣetyardhena । avaśiṣṭavacanatvena sarvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvādadoṣaḥ ।।

“dharmaḥ prasiddho'prasiddho vā” iti bhāṣyamabhyupagamyādhyayanavidherdṛṣṭārthatvaṃ vicāraprayuktimākṣipati; tatra “aprasiddho natarām” ityatra bhāṣye nañarthasyāti- śayābhāvāt tarappratyayasyāsādhutvamāśaṅkya vyācaṣṭe—prasiddha iti । prasiddhe hi niṣphalo vicāraḥ aprasiddhe tu kāmanābhāvāt preraṇaiva na saṃbhavatīti śaṅkārthaḥ ।।

“athavārthavat” ityādi “sa hi niḥśreyasena puruṣaṃ saṃyunakti” ityeva- mantaṃ siddhāntabhāṣyam; tadvyācaṣṭe—jijñāsya ityardhena ।। sandigdhatvaṃ saprayojanatvaṃ ca vicārākṣepakāraṇamuktam; ekaikaṃ tu nākṣipatītyāha—asandigdha ityardhena ।।

nanu dharme pratīyamāne vedena kathamityākāṅkṣāyāmarthagata eva vicāraḥ “āmnāyasya kriyārthatvāt” ityākṣipyeta ; na tu prathamapādagataḥ pramāṇāpramāṇa- vicāraḥ, vākyārthāvagatāvanupāyatvāt ityāśaṅkyāha—svarūpādiṣviti tripādyā ।

kāryārthe pramāyāmadhyayanavidhirvedasya kāraṇatvaṃ pratipādayati; pramāyāṃ ca karaṇatvaṃ pramāṇatvam; tat kathaṃ pratyakṣādyagocare'rthe śabdasyetyapekṣāyāṃ prathamapādagato vicāro viṣayotpādakatvena dravyadevatāvadākṣipta evetyāha pādena—pādenādyena nirṇaya iti ।।

tato'vagatapramāṇabhāvagataḥ pramāṇabhāvaḥ kāryapramāṇavicāranirapekṣo na śakyaḥ kartumiti paramapi vicāramārambhaviṣayasvarūpānutpādakamapi prayājavadākṣipatītyāha— sthite vedapramāṇatva iti ślokadvayena ।।
trailer: iti bhaṭṭombekaviracitāyāṃ tātparyaṭīkāyāṃ prathamaṃ sūtram samāptam
head: atha codanāsūtram

LG.p: “athāto dharmajijñāsā” ityanena śāstrārambhamuktvā idānīṃ śāstramārabhate- “codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharmaḥ” iti । tasya tātparyaṃ vyācaṣṭe—dharma ityardhena । eṣā hyatra vacanavyaktirdharmānuvādena codanākhyapramāṇavidhānametaditi darśayati । prasiddhatvācca dharmaścodanākhyapramāṇavidhau śakyate'nuvaktum । tadidamanupapannam; yadi tāvat pramāṇāntarānavagamyo dharmaḥ, kathamanūdyeta ? pramāṇāntarāvagamyaścet ‘codanaiva pramāṇam’ iti vidhānaṃ virudhyate । na ca dharmasya sāmānyataḥ siddhirasti, mūlābhāvāt । na tāvadāstrībālalokaprasiddhirmūlam; na ca lokaprasiddhirnāma pratyakṣādibhyaḥ pramāṇāntaramiti vakṣyati—“na caitāni parityajya” iti । viruddhānekaprakāratvācca lokaprasiddherna tayā dharmasya siddhiḥ । nāpyarthāpattiḥ, jagadvaicitryasya svābhāvikatvenāpi karmaśaktivaicitryavadupapatteḥ iti vakṣyati— “syādevaṃ yadi śakyeta” iti । pramāṇāntarasiddhe ca vastuni prabuddhiṃ prasuvānāpi codanā na pramāṇatayā śakyā vidhātum, anuvādakatvāt । tathā ca vakṣyati— “arthe'nupalabdhe tat pramāṇam” iti । api ca pramāṇāntarasiddhe'pi sāmānyato dharme na codanā pramāṇamiti śakyate vidhātum; na hi sā dharmasāmānyaṃ bodhayati; kiṃ tarhi, śabdāntarādipramāṇāvasitabhedānevāgnihotrādīn । dharmaviśeṣaviṣayatvaṃ ca sūtradvayasya svayameva darśayiṣyati—“pravṛttyaṅgaṃ ca yajjñānaṃ tasya mūlaṃ parīkṣyate ।” ityādinā । dharmānuvādena codanākhyapramāṇavidhāvarthapadasyānanvayaprasaṅgaḥ; na hi tadānarthasya dharmatvaṃ prāptam, yannivartyeta ।

tadetadanupāsitaguruprajñāvilasitamiti granthajñānamānino manyante; yasmādaya- marthaḥ sūtrasya—iha tāvajjyotiṣṭomādayaḥ kriyāviśeṣā dharmatvena smaryante'ṣṭakādaya iva kāryatayā । vakṣyati ca—“yo yāgamanutiṣṭhati, taṃ dhārmika iti samācakṣate” iti । tatra nirmūlaṃ smaraṇamiti cārvākāḥ, yogipratyakṣamūlamiti veśeṣikādayaḥ । tadevamanekadhā mūlavipratipattau satyāṃ pratyakṣādyanupraveśavyavacchedena aprāmāṇya-
svarūpādestataḥ siddhiḥ svarūpaṃ veha sūtryate ।। 1 ।।

p: vyavacchedena ca codanā pramāṇatvena pratijñāyate ‘codanaiva,’ ‘codanā pramāṇameva’ iti । evaṃ sati nātra pramāṇāntarasiddhatā saṃbhavati; atraiva pramāṇaṃ vidhīyate yataḥ । pratyuta pramāṇāntarasaddheriha ‘codanaiva,’ ‘pramāṇameva’ ityubhayathāpi vidhānaṃ vyāhanyate, ekatra virodhāt anyatra cānuvādakatvāt; yatra tvanūdya apramāṇarūpaṃ vidhīyate, tatra tvanūdyamānasya pramāṇāntarasiddhyā prayojanaṃ yathā “āhavanīye juhoti” iti । ato yathā manvādismaraṇapratibhāsinyaṣṭakādau codanā mūlamiti vakṣyate, tathehāpīti draṣṭavyam । mūlaviśeṣānavadhāraṇābhiprāyaṃ ca “dharme sāmānyataḥ” iti vacanam, na jātyabhiprāyeṇa । etameva cāsya ślokasyārthaṃ svayameva vārtika- kāraścodyapūrvakaṃ darśayiṣyati—“pratyakṣādau niṣiddhe'pi” ityupakramya
lg:
“nirmūlāsambhavādatra pramāṇaiḥ saiva mṛgyate ।
kutaḥ punaḥ pravṛtteti pratyakṣādi tu vāritam ।।” iti ।।
p: asyāṃ ca vacanavyaktāvarthapadasyānvayaṃ darśayiṣyati—
“dharme sāmānyataḥ siddhe pramāṇaṃ kathyate yadā ।” iti ।

nanvevaṃ satyagnihotrādāveva pratyākṣādinivṛtterniṣpramāṇakatvaṃ ca niṣiddhaṃ syāt, caitya- vandanādau tu dharmatvaniṣedho na kṛtaḥ syātḥ ata āha-svarūpādestataḥ siddhi- riti । avadhārite hi codanākhye pramāṇe dharmasya svarūpaṃ tata eva pramāṇādava- gamyate yaduta agnihotrādyeva, na caityavandanādi-iti, pramāṇāvaseyatvāt svarūpasya । ādigrahaṇaṃ cetikartavyatānubandhapradarśanārtham । matāntaramāha—svarūpaṃ veha sūtryata iti । tasyābhiprāyaḥ—adhyayanavidhyākṣiptatayādhītavedasya dharmajijñā- sāyāmadhikāraḥ ; tasya ca codanā pramāṇatvena siddhaiveti na codanāpramāṇa- pratijñāparametat sūtram; kintu tadanuvādena kriyākārakasaṃsargavyavacchedena yaśco- danālakṣaṇaḥ kāryarūpo'rthaḥ sa eva dharmaḥ ; na tvindriyādilakṣaṇaḥ kriyākārakasaṃsarga iti । tadanupapannam ; vicārāt pūrvamadhītavedāvasthasya codanā pramāṇatvena na siddheti kathamanūdyate ? siddhau vā prathamapādagatasya vicārasyādhyayanavidhyākṣiptatayā

kartavyatvaṃ na syāt; tatra pramāṇalakṣaṇocchedaprasaṅgaḥ । asati ca codanāpramāṇa- pratijñāparatve “codanā hi bhūtam” ityādibhāṣyapratijñāsamarthanaparam “uktam- smābhiḥ codanānimittaṃ dharmasya jñānamiti, tat pratijñāmātreṇoktam” ityādi, “prathame'dhyāye pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ vṛttam” ityādi ca bhāṣyaṃ sarvamasamañjasaṃ syāt । tasmānmatāntaradarśanamevaitat । pūrvaiva tu vyākhyābhipretā śobhanā cetyanavadyam ।।

yadi tarhi dharmasvarūpānuvādena codanāpramāṇapratijñāparametat sūtram, tathā satyarthadvayamasya yaduktam-“ko dharmaḥ, kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ ityekenaiva sūtreṇa vyākhyātam- codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharmaḥ iti” iti, tadvirudhyata evetyāśaṅkyāha—dvayami- tyardhena । śrutyapekṣayā pramāṇaikapratijñāparatvamatroktam; paunaruktyaṃ punararthadvayaparatve śrutyarthābhyām; taccaikasya śrautatvena parasyārthikatvena ca na virudhyata ityāha— svarūpe'pītyardhena ।।

“codaneti kriyāyāḥ pravartakaṃ vacanam” iti bhāṣyaṃ codanāśabdavyākhyā- naparam ; tadanupapannam ; atra hi vacanaśabdena vacanārhatvāt pravartakaṃ vākyamuktam ; liṅādipratyayamātrasyaiva vidhau smaraṇāt pravartakābhidhānadvāreṇa pravartakatvam ; na vākyasyetyāśaṅkyāha-kimādyapekṣitairiti । satyamevam, tathāpi niyojyaviśeṣa- samarpakaṃ padamapekṣate viṣayānubandhasamarpakaṃ ca । itarathā hi kaṃ kva pravartayet ? tacca vākyameveti pravartakaṃ vākyamuktam ।।

“codanā hi bhūtam” ityādibhāṣyamatīndriyārthe codanāsāmarthyavyākhyāna- param ; “nānyat kiñcanendriyam” ityapi pratyakṣāderasāmarthyajñāpanārtham; tadu- bhayamapi pratijñāsūtre'sambaddhaṃ punaruktaṃ ca, sadautpattikasūtrābhyāmasyārthasya vakṣya-

māṇatvādityāśaṅkya pariharati—codanaivati । vakṣyamāṇo'pyarthaḥ pratijñāsamartha- nārthamatrocyamāno na duṣyatīti manyate । tathā hi—dharme codanaiva pramāṇam, pramāṇameveti cāvadhāraṇadvayaṃ pratijñātam; tadayuktamivāśaṅkyate । katham ? sambhava- darthaviṣayaṃ hi vākyaṃ pratijñocyate; na cyā/?/sarthaḥ saṃbhavati yat pratyakṣādigrahaṇārhaṃ na bhavati, vākyaṃ ca tatpramāṇamiti । kutaḥ ? adarśanāt; yathā rūpe śrotrameva, pramāṇameveti । tadevaṃ pratijñābhāsatvena prakāśamānaṃ svasamarthanaṃ prati sākāṅkṣamiti manvāno bhāṣyakāraḥ—codanaiva, pramāṇameva, ityavadhāraṇadvaye vakṣyamāṇaṃ yuktidvaya- mavocat । ataḥ sambhavitvapradarśanamukhena pratijñāsamarthanārthaṃ vakṣyamāṇamiha parāmṛṣṭam । pratijñātārthasidhyarthastu vakṣyamāṇaḥ prapañca iti nāsambaddhatā punaruktatā vā । vakṣyati ca—“vṛttikāro'dhikaṃ vāpi bhūtādi dvāramabravīt” । iti ।
tamadhunā śabdasāmarthyoktileśaṃ vyācaṣṭe—saṃbhāvyata iti । bhūtādiṣvapi saṃbhavati śabdasya prāmāṇyaṃ tadviṣayajñānajanakatvena; dharmaśca bhūtādīnāmevānyatamaḥ syāditi sambhavī pratijñārthaḥ ।

sambhavitvameva draḍhayannāha—atyanteti । atrānupāsitaguravaścodayanti- yadi tāvadasadrūpamevāsati jñānaṃ śabdaḥ karotītyucyate, na prakṛtopayogaḥ; athāsati sadrūpaṃ jñānam, tataḥ prakramavirodhaḥ; pramāṇaṃ codanā, yato'tyantāsatyapi ‘sat’ iti jñānaṃ karoti—iti viruddhābhidhānāt । tadanupapannam; yasmādayamarthaḥ— yadyapyanuṣṭheyarūpatvādvākyārtho'tyantāsan pratyakṣādīnāmaviṣayaḥ, tathāpi tasya tatra prāmāṇyaṃ saṃbhavatyeva; yatastatrāpi jñānamutpādayati; tena bodhakatvādautsargikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ

LG.l: pramāṇaṃ tvapi śabdo vā tajjñānaṃ vā nirūpyate ।। 9 ।।
pūrveṣāṃ tu pramāṇatve phalatvaṃ tasya gamyate ।। 10 ।।

p: saṃbhavati yadi vispaṣṭaṃ kāraṇadoṣābhāvaṃ vaktuṃ śakṣyāmastataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ setsyati; sambandhastvasyāmapi daśāyāṃ na nivāryate ।।

nanvanuṣṭheyaviṣayatvāccodanāyā na kālaparāmṛṣṭavastubodhakatvam; ataḥ katham “codanā hi bhūtam” ityucyate ? atha vastusthityocyate. tathāpi ‘bhaviṣyantam’ ityevaṃ vācyam; tathā lakṣayati—“bhaviṣyaṃścaiṣo'rtha” iti; bhūtabhavadgrahaṇaṃ tvayuktamityāśaṅkyāha—codanetyardhena । nātra codanāśabdena vidhāyakaṃ vākya- mucyate; kiṃ tarhi, codanāśabdo viśeṣavacanaḥ san śabdamātraṃ lakṣayati । kasmāt lakṣaṇāśrīyata iti cedata āha na hītyardhena । viruddhapadasāmānādhi- karaṇyaṃ darśayati ।।

nanu vidhau sūtrite sati kasmācchabdamātrasya mahimā kathyate bhāṣyakṛtā ? ata āha—indriyādīti । yadā hi śabdamātrasyendriyādivyudāsena bhūtādau sāmarthyaṃ samarthitaṃ bhavati, tadā śabdaviśeṣasya vidhāyakasya dharme sāmarthyaṃ sūtroktaṃ bhavati samarthitam ।।

evaṃ sūtrabhāṣyagataṃ codanāśabdaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā lakṣaṇaśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe— nimittamātramiti ślokadvayena । sannikarṣaviprakarṣānapekṣaṃ yogyatayā hetuśabdābhidheyaṃ nimittamiha rūḍhyā lakṣaṇaśabdenocyate; yadvā pramāṇaṃ karaṇavyutpattyā lakṣaṇaśabde- nocyate । tatra pramāṇapakṣe lakṣaṇaṃ karaṇam; tacca sādhakatamam; tamabarthaścāti- śayaḥ; sa cāpekṣika iti tattadvivakṣādi bāhyamapekṣya śabdādirvākyārthajñānaparyantaḥ
pramāṇavikalpaḥ pañcadhā darśitaḥ । nimittamātraṃ tu nāpekṣikam, tadbhāvabhāvitvena sarveṣāṃ samuccayena nimittatvāditi na vikalpitam । śabdādīnāṃ ca pramāṇatvena vākyārthajñānaṃ phalamiti ।।

evaṃ vartipadārthau vyākhyāya adhunā samāsārthābhāvamāśaṅkate । yadā hi śabdavyatiriktatajjñānādi lakṣaṇaśabdena pramāṇamucyate, tadā śabdapadārthakena codanāśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvānna ‘codanā lakṣaṇamasya’ iti samāsārthopa- pattiḥ; bahuvrīhiḥ samānādhikaraṇānāmityāśaṅkyāha—jñāna iti । jñānagrahaṇaṃ śabdetaracatuṣṭayapradarśanārtham । jñānādipramāṇābhidhāyakenāpi lakṣaṇaśabdena saha codanāśabdaḥ svajñānākhyakāryalakṣaṇayā lakṣitalakṣaṇayā vā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhajate ।।

prayojanaṃ tu vinā lākṣaṇikārthaparigraho na yukta iti mukhyārthayoḥ sāmā- nādhikaraṇyamāha-nimittamātra iti । nimittamātre hi lakṣaṇaśabdārthe jñānādīnāṃ satyapi nimittatve codanāyā nimittatvānapāyāt śrutyā sāmānādhikaraṇyam; yadāpi lakṣaṇaṃ pramāṇam, tacca śabdaḥ, tadāpi śrutyaiva ।।

nanu yadeva phalasādhanaṃ dravyaṃ kriyā vā guṇo vā agnihotragodohanādi, tasyaiva dharmatvaṃ sthāpayiṣyati; sarve caite pratyakṣagrāhyāḥ tasmāt ‘codanaiva dharme pramāṇam nānyat kiñcanendriyam’ ityayuktam ata āha—dravyeti । satyaṃ dravyādīnāṃ dharmatvamindriyagrāhyatvaṃ ca; na tu pratyakṣadṛśyena rūpeṇa teṣāṃ dharmatvam ।।
kathaṃ tarhītyāśaṅkyāha—śreya iti ।।

LG.l: nānyat kiñceti vā cchedaḥ sāmānyārthaḥ prayujyate ।। 15 ।।
vinā sambandhabodhena na tu tasyādbhavaḥ kvacit ।। 17 ।।

p: nanu “nānyat kiñcanendriyam” ityanenānumānādīnāmapratiṣedhāt ‘coda- naiva’ ityavadhāraṇamanupapannam ata āha—pradarśanetyardhena । yathā ca sūtrakṛtā satsaṃprayogasūtreṇendriyādiniṣedhāccodanetarakṛtsnapramāṇaniṣedhaḥ pradarśanārthaṃ kṛtaḥ, tathā bhāṣyakṛteti । śrauta eva vā paramanumānādiniṣedha ityāha—nānyadityardhena ।।

evaṃ tarhi “nendriyam” ityanarthakam, gatārthatvāt; ata āha—tadi- tyardhena । “codanaiva, nānyat kiṃca” ityukte, kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam anyanna pravartate—iti apekṣite sthitihetupraśnāvasaraḥ; tannirākaraṇāyāha—“nendriyam” iti । indriyaṃ tāvanna pravartate, tatpūrvakatvādanumānādyapi ।। hetupraśno'pi śrauta eveti darśayitumadhunā tridhā chitvā granthaṃ vyācaṣṭe—kiñcetīti । “nānyat” iti indriyādiniṣedhārthaḥ prathamacchedaḥ; “kiñca ? ” iti praśnārtho madhyamaḥ; kiñca kāraṇamanyatra pravartate yāvatā dṛṣṭāntādāvanumānapravṛttiḥ-ityetatpraśnanirāsārthaḥ “nendriyam” ityasyoktasyāpi punarvacanam ।।
etadeva vyācaṣṭe—yadyapīti । yadyapi trikālaviṣayamanumānam; tathāpi dharme notsahate tat pravartitum, vinā sambandhagrahaṇaṃ tasyotpattyayogāt ।।

nanu sambandhadhīpuraḥsareṇaivānumānenānāgato'pi dharmaḥ pratyeṣyate kṛtakatveneva bhāvivināśa ityāśaṅkyāha—na sāmānyeti । na hi dharmasāmānyena dharmaviśeṣeṇa vā saha liṅgasya kasyacit sambandhagrahaṇamasti; taddhi sambandhagrahaṇaṃ na pratyakṣeṇānumānā-

LG.l: padaṃ tanna tu tadvācyo dharmo vākyārtha eva saḥ ।। 19 ।।

p: dibhirvā syāt, dharmasyātīndriyatvāt । na tāvat sambandhaḥ pratyakṣagrāhyaḥ, anumānagrahaṇe cānavasthā; arthāpattyādīnāṃ tu dharmasvarūpavat sambandhe'pi na vyāpāraḥ । sarvaṃ caitat pratyakṣadvāratvādityatra nipuṇataramupapādayiṣyāmaḥ ।।

yadyevaṃ dharmapramāṇābhimate śabde'pyeṣa eva prasaṅga iti codayati—nanu śabdo'pītyardhena । śabdo'pi sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣaḥ, prathamaśravaṇe pratyayānutpādāt; na coktena prakāreṇa dharme tadgrahaṇamasti ।। tatpariharati—padaṃ tanna tu tadvācyo dharma iti । śabdo hi padaṃ vākyaṃ vā; tatra padaṃ sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣam; na ca tatprameyo dharmaḥ ।। kasya tarhi prameya ityāha—vākyārtha eva sa iti ।।

nanu padavadvākyamapi sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣameva, anyathaikasmādvākyāt sarva- vākyārthāvagamaprasaṅgāt; ata āha-vākyasyetyardhena । syādetadevam, yadi vākyaṃ vācakaṃ syāt; tattu naiva vācakam ।। vākyārthāvagame tu padārthānāmeva hetutvamiti teṣāmapi sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣatvāt atīndriye ca dharme tadayogānna hetutvamiti cedata āha—sambandhekṣetyardhena । na padārthānāṃ vākyārthe sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣā, tadabhāve'pīndriyavadbodhakatvāt । na cātiprasaṅgaḥ, apekṣāsannidhiyogyatānāṃ niyāmakatvāt । sarvaṃ caitattad bhūtādhikaraṇe vistareṇa sthāpayiṣyate ।।

pratijñāsamarthanārthaṃ prāmāṇyasambhāvanā jñānajanakatvena yoktā tasyā lokāya- tādimatenākṣepaḥ “nanvatathābhūtamapi” iti । tatrākṣepturabhiprāyamāha—nityatvā- derasiddhatvāditi । nityo vedaḥ, padārthapūrvako vākyārthaḥ, pratyakṣānupalabdhiśca na bādhikā, kālāntarasthāyī ca bhoktāsti, ityetatsarvaṃ mamādyāpyasiddham—iti matvā codayati ।। eteṣāṃ tu pūrvapakṣāṇāṃ vakṣyamāṇanirākaraṇatvāt nityatvādiprati- pādanamukhena cottarānabhidhānāt abhiprāyāntaramāha—abhyupetye ti tripādyā । pauruṣeyatve hi vaktṛjñānaprāmāṇyāt prāmāṇyaṃ saṃbhavedapi, yadi tadavadhāryeta;

apauruṣeyatve tu vaktṛjñānaprāmāṇyavarjanāt prāmāṇyaśaṅkāpi na syāditi sutarāmi- yuktam । tadidaṃ nityatvaṃ vedasya pratyuta prāmāṇyaṃ vyāhanti । tathā cāhurbhartrī- śvarādayaḥ—“kiṃ hi nityaṃ pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam ? pratyakṣādi vā yadanityaṃ tasya prāmāṇye kasya vipratipatti ? ” iti ।

nanvasatyapi vaktṛprāmāṇye vedasya vaktṛprāmāṇyanirapekṣasyaiva prāmāṇyaṃ syāt pratyakṣādivat; ata āha—pramāṇāntaretyardhena । anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pramāṇā- ntarādhigatārthaviṣayatayā prāmāṇyaṃ śabdasya darśayati—smṛtivadityardhena । yathā smṛterna pūrvānubhavanirapekṣāyāḥ svata eva smṛtitvam, evaṃ na pūrvānubhavapramāṇanira- pekṣasya śabdasya svata eva prāmāṇyaṃ loke dṛṣṭam ।।

na kevalaṃ pramāṇāntaradṛṣṭārthaviṣayatvaṃ śabdasya prāmāṇye kāraṇam, kintu paramāptaprayuktatvamapīti darśayannāha—nūnamiti । yastāvadvākyārthaḥ śrotrāpi pramā- ṇāntareṇa sākṣātkṛtaḥ, tatra kimucyate ? yo'pi śrotrā na sākṣātkṛtaḥ, tatrāpi— sambhavatpramāṇāntaro'yamarthaḥ; gṛhītāśayabuddhiścāyaṃ vaktā nānanubhūtaṃ vakti; tasmā- nnūnaṃ vaktrānubhūto'sau—ityevaṃ vaktranubhavānumānamukhena arthe niścāyikā puruṣa- vacanāttu buddhiryujyate ।।

yastu na śrotuḥ pratyakṣādiviṣayo'rtho nāpi vaktāptaḥ, tatra na vākyaprāmāṇyaṃ loke dṛṣṭamiti vyatirekamāha—nātmīyāditi tripādyā । evaṃ nyāyamuktvā prakṛte yojayannāha—tathā syāccodanāsvapīti । codanārtho'pi na kasyacit pratyakṣagrāhyaḥ; na ca vaktāpto'sti; tasmāccodanaiva dharme pramāṇamiti prāmāṇyaprati- jñānamasamañjasamiti ।।
prakṛtamupasaṃharati—teneti । na vijñānaṃ jñānamityeva pramāṇam, bodharūpa- tāyāḥ pramāṇetarasādhāraṇatvāt ।।

pūrvoktamevārthaṃ prayogairupanibadhnāti; tatra “pramāṇāntaradṛṣṭaṃ hi” ityatrāha- svargeti। codaneti dharminirdeśaḥ, svargayāgādītyādi tadviśeṣaṇam, mṛṣeti sādhyo dharmaḥ, hetudṛṣṭāntau sujñānau । tatra codyate—codanāmātraṃ veha dharmitve- nocyate, vaidikyo vā ? yadi codanāmātram, tato vaidyācāryacodanānāmapi pakṣī- kṛtatvāt pratyakṣādivirodhinī pratijñā, hetuśca bhāgāsiddhaḥ, vipralambhakacodanāṃśe'pi siddhasādhyatā, codanānāṃ sarvāsāṃ pakṣīkṛtatvāt “īdṛgbuddhādivākyavat” iti dṛṣṭāntābhāvaḥ । atha vaidikya eva codanāścodanāśabdenocyante, tadā “svargayāgādi” ityādiviśeṣaṇānarthakyam, sarvāsāṃ tadviṣayatvena vyavacchedā- bhāvāt । aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaścāyaṃ pakṣaḥ; svargayāgādibhāvanāviṣayā hi codanāḥ; na sambandhaviṣayāḥ, tasya apuruṣavyāpārātmakatvāt । vākyāntarārthe ca ‘codanā mṛṣā’ iti siddhasādhyatā; svārtha iti ca noktam । heturatyantāgṛhītārthaviṣayaiḥ pratyakṣādibhiranekāntaḥ । dṛṣṭānto'pyayamapradarśitānvayaḥ; na hi ‘īdṛk’ iti vyāptirucyate; tatpratipattyarthaśca dṛṣṭānta iti । tathā ca svayameva vakṣyati— “tasmādvyāpyatvarūpeṇa vācyo hetutvasaṃmataḥ” iti vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntanyūnaścāyaṃ prayogaḥ ।

atra samādhiḥ—vaidikya eva codanāścodanāśabdenocyante, tāsāmevātra śāstre prakṛtatvāt, ādaica iva vyākaraṇe vṛddhiśabdena । tatra “vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā” ityāderapi pakṣatvāt pratyakṣādibhirvirodhaḥ; hetuśca bhāgāsiddhaḥ; “ādityo yūpaḥ” ityādau ca siddhasādhyatā; tanmā bhūditi svargayāgādītyādiviśeṣaṇa- syārthavattvam । svargakāmasya yāgāvacchinnabhāvanāviṣayā apyākṣepataḥ svargayāgādi- sambandhaviṣayā bhavantīti nāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatā pakṣadoṣaḥ । vākyāntarārthe ca vākyāntaraṃ naiva codanā, tasyāsambandhiśabdatvāt; ato na siddhasādhyatā । pratyakṣāvagamānarhārthaviṣayatvāditi ca hetvarthaḥ; śābdatve satīti vā viśeṣaṇaṃ

LG.p: kāryam; ato nānaikāntiko hetuḥ । īdṛggrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭānte vyāptipratipādanaparam । anyathobhayavikalatāpi syāt । cārvākaprayoge cāyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ । śākyaprayoge tvādiśabdoktamarhadādivākyaṃ draṣṭavyam । īdṛśāpi dṛṣṭāntena vyāptipratītiḥ । apradarśitānvayasya cānyo viṣayaḥ yathā ‘paṭe kṛtakanāśitve staḥ’ iti anyatara- samyakprayoge'pi ca vyāptipratītiḥ—iti sarvamanumāne vakṣyate, nātrocyate bahuvaktavyatvāditi ।।

atraiva pratijñārthe “nūnaṃ vaktrānubhūto'sau” ityanena sūcitaṃ hetudṛṣṭāntā- ntaramāha—yadvetyardhena । prativādino vedasyāpraṇītatvāt vādinaścānāptapraṇīta- tvāt siddho hetuḥ । evaṃ sati pratyakṣādibhiranaikāntikaḥ; tasmācchabdatve satīti viśeṣaṇaṃ kartavyam । nanu bālonmattādivākyamapi kiñcit satyamastīti sādhya- vikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt । naitadevam; yat satyaṃ na tadbālonmattādivākyāmucyate, ‘bālādīnāmeva vākyam’ ityasādhāraṇyena viśeṣaṇāt; yathā ‘rājayajñaḥ’ itya- śvamedhādirucyate, nāgnihotrādiriti ।। prayogāntaramāha—vyomādivaccetyardhena । tatra svargayāgādisaṅgatā na pramāṇaṃ codanā, nityatvāt vyomavaditi kecit । tadayuktam; codanākāśayorvādinā nityattvānabhyupagamādasiddho hetuḥ sādhana- vikalaśca dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt tasmānnetatsādhanam । kiṃ tarhi ? parapakṣadūṣaṇam । mīmāṃ- sakapratijñāte codanāprāmāṇye tatsiddhenaiva nityatvena vādī svayamanumānavirodhamāha, codanāprāmāṇyasiddhau tatprayuktasya vā nityatvasya viruddhatāmāha । dūṣaṇaṃ caitaditi darśitam “prāmāṇyasya nirākṛtiḥ” iti bruvatā; nirākaraṇaṃ hi dūṣaṇam, na sādhanam; dūṣaṇaṃ ca parasiddhamapi bhavati ।।

sādhyāntare prayogāntaramāha—yadi veti । sarvacodanā iti dharminirdeśaḥ, puruṣādhīnaprāmāṇyā iti sādhyo dharmaḥ, sarvaśabdaḥ sarvanāmatvāt prakṛtavaidikakṛtsna- codanāpratijñāpādanārthaḥ । tenānāptacodanāpekṣayā nābhyupagamavirodhaḥ ।।
LG.l: svato vā na pramāṇaṃ syurvākyatvāt puruṣoktivat ।। 28 ।।

LG.p: nanvaprāmāṇyavādinaḥ puruṣādhīnaprāmāṇyasādhane'bhyupagamavirodhaḥ । parataḥ prāmāṇya- vādinaśca aprāmāṇyaprastāve'navasaraḥ । ye'pi ca lakṣaṇayā svataḥprāmāṇyābhāva- pratijñeyamiti manvate, teṣām “svato vā pramāṇam” ityanena punaruktaṃ syāt । “vākyatvāt” iti cānāptavākyairanaikāntikaḥ । “puruṣoktivat” iti apramāṇa- puruṣoktyapekṣayā sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ । tatrocyate—na vedavākyānāṃ puruṣā- dhīnaprāmāṇyasādhane śākyānāmabhyupagamavirodhaḥ; dharme hi codanāyāḥ prāmāṇyaṃ tairneṣyate । vākyaviśeṣavivakṣāyāṃ tu codanā pramāṇatayā sidhyantī na teṣāṃ kiñci- dviruṇaddhi । taccaitaddharmaṃ prati prāmāṇyanirāsāya sādhyata iti prakṛtopayogaḥ । pramāṇatve satīti ca viśeṣaṇādanaikāntikatābhāvaḥ ।। sādhyāntaramāha—svato vetyardhena । nanu svataḥprāmāṇyapratiṣedhāt parataḥprāmāṇyāpatterabhyupagamavirodhaḥ, viśeṣapratiṣedhena viśeṣāntarābhyanujñānāt । naitadevam; pramāṇāntarāviṣayatvāccoda- nānāṃ saṃvādābhāvena vādiprativādibhyāṃ parataḥprāmāṇyānabhyupagame satyadhunā svato'pi prāmāṇyaṃ nāstīti niṣedhāt aprāmāṇyamevāvatiṣṭhate ।

prayogāntaramāha—prāmāṇyamiti । prāmāṇyaṃ dharmi, sarvaśabdeṣviti dharmi- viśeṣaṇaṃ mā bhūt pratyakṣādāvabhyupagamavirodha iti, narāpekṣamiti sādhyo dharmaḥ, ‘yat prāmāṇyam’ iti cānuvādānna vedavākyānāṃ prāmāṇyāpattyābhyupagamavirodhaḥ, śabdaiḥ sambadhyamānatvāditi hetuḥ । nanu cāyaṃ śabdatvādibhiranaikāntikaḥ । śabdatvādīnāmabhāvādavipakṣateti cenna, anyāpohātmakairapi tairanaikāntikatvāt । ye ca vācyavācakalakṣaṇasambandhasambandhinaḥ puruṣānapekṣajanmānaḥ parvatādayaḥ, tairapya- naikāntikatvam । tasmāt ‘svataḥ parato vā’ itīdṛśavicāragocarāpannatve satīti viśeṣaṇīyam । aprāmāṇyasāmānyaṃ ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ । tena mṛgatṛṣṇikādijñānagatā- prāmāṇyāpekṣayā na hetuvikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।
itaśca śabdaprāmāṇyaṃ narāpekṣamityāha—na syāditi । evaṃ manyeta—

LG.l: evaṃ sthite tu vedasya sati vāsati vā nare ।

p: puruṣaguṇe sati vākyaprāmāṇyadarśanāt asati cādarśanāt anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ puruṣaguṇakṛtaṃ vākyaprāmāṇyamavagamyate । tadyadi satoranvayavyatirekayorguṇakṛtaṃ neṣyate, aprāmāṇyamapi puruṣadoṣakṛtaṃ na syāt; viśeṣābhāvāt; na hi tasyāpi doṣakṛtatve'nyat pramāṇamiṣyate; iṣyate ca tatkṛtamaprāmāṇyaṃ bhavadbhiḥ; tadvat puruṣaguṇakṛtaṃ prāmāṇyamiti । tadayamanena prayoga upakṣiptaḥ—vākyaprāmāṇyaṃ narā- pekṣam, narānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvāt, aprāmāṇyavaditi ।।

upasaṃharati-evamiti । uktena prakāreṇa puruṣaguṇādhīne prāmāṇye sthite yadi tāvadastyeva vedasya kartā, tathāpi pramāṇāntarāgocare dharme tasyāptatvāyo- gādaprāmāṇyaṃ vedasya syāt; atha nāsti, tataḥ puruṣaguṇānāṃ prāmāṇyahetūnāmabhāvāt dūrādvedasya prāmāṇyam । tadevaṃ durlabhaṃ codanāprāmāṇyaṃ matvāha—“nanvatathā” iti ।।
asya yaduttaram—“vipratiṣiddham” iti, tadākṣipannāha—tatreti । sarvatragatatvādanuttaramityabhiprāyaḥ ।।

evaṃ siddhāntabhāṣyamākṣipya pratisamādhāsyannāha—sarveti । nanu codanā- prāmāṇyasadasadbhāvavicārādhikāre tatprāmāṇyākṣepaparihārapratisamādhāne vaktavye sarva- vijñānaprāmāṇyaparīkṣaṇamasambaddham, aprastutābhidhānāt । naiṣa doṣaḥ; codanā- prāmāṇyasiddhyarthameva niścitaprāmāṇyāprāmāṇyeṣu jñāneṣu kathamaprāmāṇyaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ veti parīkṣyate, yathā teṣu tathā codanāyām; na hi codanāyā viṣayavadalaukikaṃ prāmāṇyam, niṣpramāṇakatvāt । tasmādyukto vicāraḥ ।।

LG.l: svatastāvaddvayaṃ nāsti virodhāt parato na ca ।

p: atra tāvat “dyaṃ svataḥ” ityetaṃ pakṣaṃ parigṛhṇannāha—svata iti । svayamatadātmano devairapi tādātmyāpatteḥ kartumaśakyatvāt dvayaṃ svata iti kecit; na hagnau gandhādi sikatāsu vā tailādi śakyate sādhayitumiti । apare tu manyante—prāmāṇyaṃ nāma svālambananiścāyakatvam; na ca pramāṇānatrasaṃvādānapekṣa- mutpannamātraṃ vijñānaṃ niścāyakam, pramāṇetarayostadānīṃ viśeṣāpratibhāsanādviśeṣā- vasāyanibandhanatvācca niścayasya । ato vijñānakāraṇeṣu ye guṇadoṣāstadavadhāraṇāt prāmāṇyamapramāṇyaṃ veti dvayaṃ parataḥ ।।

etau pakṣau yathākramaṃ nirākartumāha-svatastāvaddvayaṃ nāstīti । dvayaṃ svata ityetattāvadayuktam । tarhyekasyāṃ vā vijñānavyaktau syāt vijñānavyaktibhedena vā ? ekasyāṃ tāvannāstītyāha—virodhāditi । pramāṇatvāpramāṇatve api paraspara- parihārasthitilakṣaṇena virodhena virudhyete; kathamekavyaktiniveśinī syātām ? yattūktam “svato'satāmasādhyatvāt” iti, tadayuktam; asaccenna sādhyam, satā- mapyātmādīnāṃ natarāṃ sādhyatvamiti kāryakāraṇavyavahārocchedaḥ । yattu ‘sikatāsu vā tailādi na jāyate’ iti, tanna; sarvaṃ sarvotpādakaśaktiyuktamityadoṣaḥ । tasmāt “dvayaṃ svataḥ” ityanupapannam । parato na dvayamityanuṣaṅgaḥ । kuta iti cedata āha—niḥsvabhāvatvamityardhena । yadi jñānasyotpannasya kāraṇadoṣādyavadhāra- ṇādanyato vā kutaścit pramāṇatvāpramāṇatve syātām, evaṃ sati vijñānasya svabhā- vāntarābhāvāt svato niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ syāt । tataśca tasyāpyabhāva eva prāpta iti parato'pi kasya te syātāmiti ।।

nanvekasyāmapi vyaktau kālabhedena viruddhadharmasamāveśo dṛṣṭaḥ yathā ekadravya- vyaktau raktāraktatve, tadvat prāmāṇyāprāmāṇye syātām; ataḥ “virodhāt” ityayuktam । yadapyuktam ‘parato'pi na dvayam, niḥsvabhāvatvameva hi’—tadapya- yuktam; asatorapi pramāṇatvāpramāṇatvayorvijñāne sattvaguṇatvajñeyatvādisvabhāvasadbhā-

vādityāśaṅkya hetudvaye'pi ślokena doṣaṃ pariharati—kathamiti । etaduktaṃ bhavati—yuktaṃ yadekatra dravye raktāraktatve kālabhedāt krameṇa saṃbhavata iti, tadbhāvasyānyāpekṣatvāt dravyasya ca sthāyitvāt; vijñānaṃ tu kṣaṇikam; na ca svatodvayavādinaḥ pramāṇatvāpramāṇatve prati parāpekṣeti kālabhedenāpyayukto viruddhadharmaṃ- samāveśaḥ । tasmāt sūktaṃ virodhāditi । dvitīyacodye parihāramāha-kimātmakaṃ bhavettacceti । sarvaṃ hi jagat svabhāvadvayāntarbhūtaṃ kiṃcit pramāṇasvabhāvam avaśiṣṭama- pramāṇasvabhāvam । na ca svabhāvāntaramasti; sattvaguṇatvādayo hyanyatarāṃśapātinaḥ; tathā sati kāraṇaguṇadoṣāvadhāraṇāt prāmāṇyāprāmaṇyābhyupagame tadavadhāraṇāt prāk svabhāvadvayavarjitaṃ kimātmakaṃ kiṃsvarūpaṃ syāditi na vidmaḥ । tasmādyuktam “niḥsva- bhāvatvamevaṃ hi” iti ।।

atha virodhaparijihīrṣayā bhinnavyaktyāśrayaṃ nīlapītavat svabhāvato dvaya- mucyeta, tatrāpyāha—vijñāneti । evamapi sarvavijñāneṣu bodhasvarūpatayā svato viśeṣāpratibhāsanādanyasya ca saṃvādasyāvisaṃvādasya ca svatodvayavādinānapekṣaṇāt kva jñānavyaktau prāmāṇyam kva vā netyaniścayāt vyavaharocchedaprasaṅgaḥ ।।

pakṣāntaramāha—tasmāditi tripādyā ।। yasmādevaṃ svataḥ parato vā dvayaṃ nāvakalpate, tasmādaprāmāṇyaṃ svataḥ, prāmāṇyaṃ parato yuktam । nanu na parapakṣadūṣaṇamātraṃ svapakṣasādhanamata āha—atra nyāyo'bhidhīyata iti ।।

tamadhunā pratijñādvaye'pi nyāyamāha—aprāmāṇyamiti । aprāmāṇyaṃ dharmi, na syātkāraṇadoṣata iti sādhyo dharmaḥ । atra ca kāraṇadoṣādaduṣṭādvā kāraṇānneti
siddhasādhyatā mā bhūditi “na syātkāraṇadoṣataḥ” ityubhayamuktam । kiṃ kāraṇam ? avastutvāt; aprāmāṇyaṃ hi nāma prāmāṇyābhāvaḥ; tasyāvastutvānna kutaścidutpāda- nam । nanu prāmāṇyābhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsādirūpaḥ; tatra caturvidhasyāpi vastutvena mīmāṃ- sakairiṣṭatvāt “avastutvāt” ityasiddho hetuḥ । siddhatve vā ghaṭādipradhvaṃsenā- naikāntikaḥ । tatrocyate—ayamabhiprāyaḥ, vādino bauddhasya tucchābhāvo na vastva- ntaraṃ syāt । yadi vastvantaraṃ syāt satyapi tasmin bhāvasya pūrvavaddarśanaṃ syāt, aviśeṣāt; na hi paṭe sati ghaṭānupalabdhiḥ । bhāvāntaravirodhitvādabhāvasyāya- madoṣa iti cet, na; yadi tāvadakiñcitkaro bhāvasyābhāvaḥ, kathaṃ virodhī syāt ? atiprasaṅgāt । atha kiñcitkaraḥ, tathāpi bhāvasvarūpaṃ tāvanna karoti, tasya svahetorutpādāt; arthāntarakaraṇe bhāvasyāpūrvadarśanaṃ syāt । tasmāddhaṭābhāva iti nāstītyarthaḥ; na punastasyābhāvo nāmāparo bhavati । yathoktam—
lg: “na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalam” । iti ।।
p: tasmānnāsiddho hetuḥ । na ca ghaṭādipradhvaṃsenānaikāntikaḥ, tasya vādinā nirhetu- katvābhyupagamāt; prativādinaṃ ca prati sādhayiṣyāmītyabhiprāyaḥ । tasmādavastu- tvānnāprāmāṇyaṃ parataḥ; kiṃ tu svata eva; prāmāṇyaṃ tu svālambanāvyabhicāritvam; na bodhakatvam, tasya pramāṇetarasādhāraṇatvāt; tasya vastutvādyuktā guṇairutpattiḥ । nanu vijñānakāramaguṇajanyaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ vastutvāditi vipakṣa eva ghaṭādau bhāvādviruddho hetuḥ । atha guṇavatkāraṇajanyaṃ prāmāṇyamiti pakṣaḥ, tathāpi duṣṭakāraṇajanyaiḥ kubjaghaṭādibhiranaikāntiko hetuḥ । atha janyaṃ prāmāṇyamiti pakṣaḥ, tathāpi siddhasādhyatā, mīmāṃsakenāpi prāmāṇyanityatvānabhyupagamāt; guṇagrahaṇānarthakyaṃ ca । sarveṣu ca pakṣeṣu nityairvyomādibhiranaikāntiko hetuḥ ।

atrocyate—prāmāṇyasya kāryatvameva sādhyam । na ca siddhasādhyatā, kāryatve satyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kāraṇaguṇakāryatvasiddheḥ । akāryatve tu kāraṇā- nvayavyatirekāvanyathāsiddhau syātām aprāmāṇya iva kāraṇaguṇadoṣānvayavyatirekau । guṇagrahaṇenāpi kāryatvasiddhau satyāmanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ guṇakāryatvaṃ prāmāṇyasya sidhyatīti darśayata । na ca nityairanaikāntiko hetuḥ; arthakriyākāritvalakṣaṇaṃ hi vastutvam; na ca tannityeṣvasti, kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhādityabhiprāyaḥ; ayamasau nyāyārthaḥ ।।

evaṃ svapakṣasādhanamuktvā svataḥprāmāṇyapakṣe pramāṇāpramāṇavibhāgābhāvaprasaṅga- māpādayannāha—prāmāṇyaṃ hīti । ayamabhiprāyaḥ—sarvajñānāni hi yāvatsadbhāvaṃ bodhātmakāni । tatra bodhātmakatā cet prāmāṇyam, tasyāṃ satyāmeva svapnādijñāne tadviruddhatvādaprāmāṇyaṃ bādhakāt pratyayādanyato vā kutaścit kathamāskandediti ।।

nanu tvatpakṣe'pi svapnādijñāneṣu prāmāṇyaṃ kasmānna bhavati ? kāraṇadoṣāttatrā- prāmāṇyotpādāditi cet, evaṃ tarhi prāptamavastuno'pi hetumattvam; ataśca pūrvokta- hetuvirodhaḥ । seyamubhayataspāśā rajjuḥ—sarvajñāneṣu vā prāmāṇyam, avastuno vā hetumattvamityāśaṅkyāha—matpakṣa iti । na tāvat svapnajñāneṣu matpakṣe prāmāṇyo- tpattiḥ, teṣu pūrvoktaprāmāṇyakāraṇābhāvāt; hetumattvaprasaṅgo'pyata evāvastuno na bhaviṣyati; prāmāṇyakāraṇābhāvādeva svābhāvikāprāmāṇyasiddhiḥ ।।

nanu pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇānāṃ prāmāṇyakāraṇamindriyādi, vidhimukhena vā guṇānāṃ kāryamukhena vā apratīteḥ; tadabhāvāt svapnādijñānānāṃ mā bhūnnāma prāmā- ṇyam; dvicandrādijñānānāṃ tu indriyādipramāṇakāraṇasadbhāvāt tvatpakṣe'pi prāmāṇyaṃ prasajyata eva; kimucyate “matpakṣe kāraṇābhāvāt” itītyāśaṅkyāha-indriyā- dīti । syādevam, yadi kevalamindriyādi prāmāṇyakāraṇaṃ syāt; kiṃ tarhi ? indriyādi, teṣāṃ ca guṇā asya prāmāṇyasya kāraṇam । kevalaṃ hīndriyādi jñāna- mātrasya kāraṇam, na prāmāṇyasya । tataśca tadasaddvidhā bhavati—duṣṭatvādindri- yādīnāṃ timirādidoṣaiḥ, anyatamābhāvena vā । tataścendriyādigatānāṃ guṇānāmapi prāmāṇyakāraṇatvāttadabhāvāt dvicandrādijñāneṣu prāmāṇyānupapattiḥ ।।

nanu satsu doṣeṣvaprāmāṇyadarśanādasatsu cādarśanādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ doṣa- kāraṇatvamavagamyata ityāśaṅkyāha-ata evetyardhena । anvayavyatirekadarśanādbhavatā- miyaṃ bhrāntiḥ—doṣairmithyātvamiti । etaduktaṃ bhavati—ananyathāsiddhābhyāmanvaya- vyatirekābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvagatiḥ; anyathāsiddhau caitāvanvayavyatirekau । kathamiti cedata āha—tadvyāptastu guṇābhāva iti । ayamabhiprāyaḥ—jñāneṣu hi nisargasyāprāmāṇyasya kāraṇaguṇajanyaṃ prāmāṇyamapavādaḥ; tatra yadā timirādi- doṣaduṣṭāni kāraṇāni bhavanti, tadā tadvirodhitvāt prāmāṇyakāraṇānāmabhāvaḥ; tadabhāvācca tatkāryaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na jātam । aprāmāṇyaṃ tvanapoditasiddhaṃ svābhā- vikamāsta eva; tatra doṣāṇāṃ na vyāpāraḥ । kva tarhi ? guṇotpattipratibandhane । tadāha—tatkṛtā hyapramāṇateti । guṇābhāvopalakṣitetyarthaḥ ।।
pūrvoktamupasaṃharati—tasmāditi ।

adhunā doṣaiḥ sahāprāmāṇyasyānvayavyatirekāveva na sta iti darśayannāha- anvayeti । anvayavyatirekābhyāmaprāmāṇyaṃ doṣata iti yaducyate, tanna । kutaḥ ? yasmānnājñāne jñānānutpādarūpe'prāmāṇye khalvidaṃ doṣakṛtatvaṃ dṛśyate; jñānānutpāda- rūpasyāprāmāṇyasya kāraṇābhāvādeva siddhatvāt ।।
svābhipretasiddhimadhunā parataḥ prāmāṇyavādī darśayannāha—tataśceti । śabdasya hyāptaprayuktatvaṃ guṇaḥ; tatrāpauruṣaye vede codanānāṃ tadabhāvādaprāmāṇyam;

LG.l: na hi svato'satī śaktiḥ kartumanyena śakyate ।। 47 ।।

p: pauruṣeye vā pramāṇāntarāgocare dharme puruṣasyāptatvalakṣaṇā śuddhirna saṃbhavatītyaprāmāṇya- meva । nanu guṇādhīne'pi prāmāṇye codanāyā nityatvamākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogya- padārthapūrvakatvaṃ vā anāptābhāvalakṣaṇo vā guṇo'stīti tajjñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ syāt । naitadevam; anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ hyāptaprayuktatvaṃ vākyasya prāmāṇyakāraṇaguṇo'va- gamyate; na ca nityatvaṃ nāmāparaṃ kāraṇaguṇa ityatra pramāṇamasti, tatkṛtasya prāmā- ṇyasya kvacidapyadarśanāt; pratyuta nityatvaṃ doṣāya । yathoktam—“abhyupetyo- cyate'thavā” iti । ākāṅkṣādipadārthakatvamapi jñānotpattau kāraṇam; na prāmāṇyaṃ prati guṇaḥ, vipralambhakavākye'pi darśanāt । anāptābhāvo'pi na guṇaḥ, apramāpakeṣvapi vyomādiṣu dvicandrādijñāneṣu ca darśanāt । evam ‘ubhayaṃ parataḥ’ ityatrāpi pakṣe puruṣaguṇānāmabhāvādaprāmāṇyaṃ codanānām । tathā ‘dvayaṃ svataḥ’ ityatrāpi pakṣe codanānāmaprāmāṇyam; na hi dvayoḥ svābhāvikatve codanāyāḥ prāmāṇyaṃ svābhāvikamityatra niścayo'sti ।।

atra pratividhatte—svataḥ sarvapramāṇānāmiti । ketidevamāhuḥ—sarva eva bhāvāḥ svataḥsanta eva kārakaiḥ kriyante, nāsantaḥ, kāryotpādaniyamāt; na hi svato'vidyamānā śaśaviṣāṇādayaḥ kvacidapi śakyante kartum, sikātāsu vā tailam । asadutpattau tu sarvatrāsattve niyamābhāvādutpattiḥ syāditi । tadayuktam, kāraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt । asaccenna janyate, sannatarām iti kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāva- prasaṅgaḥ । abhivyaktiḥ kriyata iti cet, sāpi satī asatī vā syāt; ubhaya- thāpi kriyābhāvaḥ; saccābhivyajyate, na ca sattve pramāṇamasti । nanu tatkāryo- tpādaniyama ityuktam । tadayuktam, śaktiniyamādapi kāryotpādaniyamasiddheḥ । sadarthaviṣaye ca kārakavyāpāra iṣyamāṇe kārakavyāpārānuparamaprasaṅgaḥ; kiṃ hi tadopalakṣya kārakāṇi nivarteran ? kāryasattāmiti cenna, tvanmate tasyāḥ prāgapi bhāvāt; abhivyaktistu nirastaiva । yadi cāsat prāmāṇyaṃ kartuṃ na śakyata iti svatastadityucyate, aprāmāṇyamapi tarhi tenaiva hetunā svata eva prāpnoti ।
athābhivyaktirasya parata iti parato'prāmāṇyamucyate, prāmāṇyamapi parato'bhivyajyata iti parataḥ syāt । tasmāt tulyametat pramāṇetarayorityalamatiprasaṅgena ।

apara āha—kāraṇaguṇaprakrameṇa kārye guṇārambhaḥ । na ca vijñānakāra- ṇānāmindriyādīnāmabodharūpāṇāṃ bodhākhyaśaktirasti; tenocyate na svato vijñāne bodharūpatā asatī kartumanyenendriyādinā śakyate, teṣu tasyā abhāvāditi । aprāmāṇyaṃ punarabodharūpam । taccānavabodharūpaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ śakyakriyamiti ।

etadapi na yuktam, indriyādīnāmaprāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt । tataśca “yadvendriyam” ityanenābhyupetena virudhyate । na cāyaṃ niyamaḥ—kāraṇaguṇaiḥ kāryaguṇāḥ kriyante iti, svātmanyasatāmapi mahattvadīrghatvādīnāṃ parimāṇaviśeṣāṇāṃ paramāṇubhiḥ kriyā- darśanāt ।

yo'pi manyate—prāmāṇyaṃ nāma paricchedotpādikā śaktiḥ । tannimitta eṣa jñāneṣu pramāṇaśabdaḥ । śaktiśca kṣaṇikavijñānāśritatayā na svato'satī śakyā kartum, kālatraye'pi kriyānupapatteḥ । na tāvat prāk, vijñānakriyotpatterāśritatvāt svāśrayābhāve tadayogāt; na hyasati kuḍye citrakarma । anena ca hetunā asaho- tvādaḥ; na khalu kuḍyacitrayoryugapadārambhaḥ । nanu citraṃ paṭasyeva jñānasyotpannasya sā kariṣyate । na, kṣaṇikatvāt tāvatkālaṃ sthiterabhāvāt । tasmāt kāryatāyā- masattvameva syāt, taccāyuktam, paricchedavirodhāt—iti akāryā śaktiḥ svata eva seti kāraṇaiḥ saha tadbhāvabhāvitvamanyathāsiddhamiti, tadāśrayasya taiḥ kriyamāṇatvāditi ।

tadapyayuktam, āśritānāmapi paṭe rūpādīnāṃ sahotpattidarśanāt । nanu utpanna eva paṭe rūpādyārambhaḥ । na, tadrahitānāmanupalabdheḥ । yogibhiḥ sāvastho- palabhyata iti cenna, pramāṇābhāvāt । api ca yathaivotpanne paṭe rūpādyārambhaḥ, evaṃ śaktyārambho'pi kiṃ neṣyate ? kṣayitvādvijñānānāṃ tāvatkālaṃ sthiterabhāvāditi cet, naitadevam; arthaparicchittyā hi jñānamanumīyate, na cāsāvaśaktādutpadyata iti śaktyutpādaṃ yāvat sthāsyati, itarathā vijñānasadbhāve pramāṇābhāvāt । yadi cāśrita- tvācchakteḥ kālatraye'pyakāryatvam, aprāmāṇyaśaktirapi tarhi tenaiva hetunā na kāryā

syāditi svata evāprāmāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ । athākāryāpyapramāṇaśaktiranyataḥ parijñānāt parata ityucyate, akāraṇaṃ tarhyakāryatvaṃ svataḥprāmāṇye, akāryāpi satī pramāṇa- śaktirapramāṇaśaktivat kārye parijñānamapekṣata iti । atha nāpekṣata iti manyase- etadeva tarhi vācyam—kasmādakāryatāpratipādane prayatyate ?

apare tu manyante—bodhakatvaṃ nāma prāmāṇyam, tacca vijñānānāṃ svābhā- vikameva, na guṇakṛtam; guṇābhāve'pi viparyayajñāne sadbhāvāditi svataḥ prāmāṇyam । guṇaistu saha tadbhāvabhāvitvamanyathāsiddhamiti vakṣyāmaḥ “tasmād guṇebhyo doṣāṇāma- bhāvaḥ” iti ।

etadapyanupapannam; yato na bodhakatvaṃ prāmāṇyam, apramāṇe'pi śuktikāyāṃ rajatajñāne sadbhāvāt । nanu na bodhātmakatvamātraṃ prāmāṇyam; tadvyabhicarati; nirvicikitsastu bodhaviśeṣaḥ pramāṇam—hasto'yam iti । sa cotpattāveva bodhāntarādvilakṣaṇa eva bhāsata iti tādṛśasya nāsti vyabhicāraḥ । tadanupapannam; yādṛśāmeva hi bodhaviśeṣāt pravṛttau satyāṃ viṣayaprāptiḥ saṃjātā, tādṛśasyaiva śataśo vyavahārapravartakasya bādhadarśanāt kathaṃ na vyabhicāraḥ ? kaścāyaṃ bodhaviśeṣaḥ, yo'tra parikalpitaḥ pramāṇaṃ nāma ? yadi tāvat spaṣṭaḥ, śuktikāyāmapi rajatābhāsaḥ spaṣṭa eva । atha nirvicikitsatā, śuktikāyāmapi rajatābhāso nirvicikitsa eva । atha niṣkampatā, śuktikāyāmapi rajatāvabhāso niṣkampa eva । atha yādṛśasya bādho na dṛṣṭaḥ, sa bodhaviśeṣaḥ pramāṇam; sarvāvasthasya, bādhādarśanāt । nanu tadeva paryanuyuktam—kīdṛśasya bādho na dṛṣṭaḥ iti । api ca kā punariyaṃ spaṣṭatā, niḥsandigdhatā nirvicikitsatā vā; yadi tāvadviṣayāvabhāsasya niḥsandi- gdhatā, śuktikāyāmapi rajatāvabhāso niḥsandigdha eva । atha viṣayavyabhicāritā- vyabhicārite, te hi viṣayavyabhicāritāvyabhicārite kimutpattau tasminneva viṣayavat pratibhāsete, uta bodhāntare ? na tāvattasmin, viṣayāvabhāsātirekeṇotpattāvaprati- bhāsanāt । pratibhāse caikasmin pravṛttirbādhakotpattiśca na prāpnoti । saṃvādaka- bodhābhyupagame'pi anavasthā parataḥ prāmāṇyaprasaṅgaśca । api ca, apratipannasada- sadbhāvaḥ ‘kanyakubje gaṅgāsti’ ‘romaśāyāṃ gaṅgāsti’ iti vākyadvayotpannayo- rbodhayorna kaścidviśeṣa upalabhyate । tathāpratipannasadbhāvaḥ ‘apavarake ghaṭastiṣṭhati’ ‘apavarake ghaṭo nāsti’ itivanna kaścidviśeṣa upalabhyate । kāryāvagame'pi ‘yajeta svargakāma’ ‘śvamāṃsaṃ bhakṣayet’ iti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ । ato bodhaviśeṣa-
syābhāvāt bodhamātrasya śuktikāyāṃ rajatajñāne sadbhāvāt na bodhakamātraṃ pramāṇam ।

nanu naiva śuktikāyāṃ rajatajñānaṃ pramāṇam; na hyekamevedaṃ vijñānamanyathā santamarthamanyathā bodhayati, tathāvidhajñānotpattau kāraṇābhāvāt; aduṣṭādikāraṇā- davisaṃvādakaṃ jñānamutpadyate, duṣṭācca kāryānutpattiḥ; na tu viparītakāryotpattiḥ; na hi yavādayo duṣṭāḥ śālyaṅkuraprasavasamarthatāmaśnuvīran । tasmādvijñānadvayametat- ‘idam’ iti puro'vasthitārthagrāhi pratyakṣajñānam ‘rajatam’ iti cānubhūta- smaraṇam । ataścaitatsmaraṇamananubhūtasyetyetannopapadyate ।

tadetadaparāmṛṣṭasaṃvidvilasitam । aparokṣatayā hyatra rajatamavabhāsate ‘rajata- midam’ iti, nānubhūtatayā । anubhavāvasthāyāṃ cānubhūtatayā smaraṇaṃ bhavati, na viṣayāvasthāyām । etaduktaṃ bhavati-anubhūtasya smaraṇaṃ bhavati, nānubhūyamānasya; dhārāvijñānānāmapi smaraṇatvaprasaṅgāt । apratipannarajatasyāpi śuktikāyāṃ rajata- śabdārthapratibhāsivijñānaṃ saṃjñānusandhānarahitamutpadyata eva tat kathaṃ smaraṇam yathā apratipannarajatasya rajate rajatajñānamādyam । tathā hyevaṃ vaktāro bhavanti—apūrvaṃ kimapi pratipannam, na jāne kimapi tadutpadyata iti । kvaciccottarakālam—idaṃ mayā jñātam, apūrvaṃ kimapīdam, yāvacchuktikeyam—iti pravādaḥ । kvacit kathayati—rajatamidamucyata iti । api ca rajate rajatānna viśeṣo dṛśye'va- bhāsate; bādhakapratyayotpattāvapi sāmagrīmātravailakṣaṇyāvagatiḥ, na pratibhāse kaści- dviśeṣaḥ । bhavatpakṣe ca ‘nedaṃ rajatam’ iti bādhakapratyayotpattirna prāpnoti; yadidamaparokṣaṃ tejasvitayā, naitat pratibhāsitaṃ rajatam; yattvanubhūtarajatarūpatayā pratibhāsitamiti mitam, tadrajatameva । aprasaktapratiṣedhaścāyam; itarathā ‘nāyamaśvaḥ’ ityapi syāt । śuktikārajatayorvivekagrāhakamidamiti cenna, aparokṣavastudharmatayā rajatābhāvamātrapratibhāsanāt । api ca, yadi tāvadanubhūta- tayaiva rajatamavabhāsitaṃ tadā kā viviktatā ? athāparokṣatayā tato viparītakhyātiḥ । bhavatu vā sadṛśadarśanādatra smaraṇamiti, tiktaśaṅkhādau madhurapītajñānaṃ kathaṃ smṛtiḥ ? athaivaṃjātīyake viparītakhyātiḥ, śuktikādau tu pramoṣaḥ; tadanupapannam; pratibhā- sāviśeṣāt । svataḥprāmāṇyaśūnyavādacodye cāparigṛhyate eva । yattu kāraṇābhāvānnaikaṃ

vijñānam; tadanupapannam; yadi kāryamavagamyate kiṃ kāraṇavikalpena ? kathaṃ vā tadabhāvaḥ ? atha nāvagamyate, anavagamādeva tarhyabhāvaḥ; na kāraṇābhāvāditi । api ca doṣasahakāri cakṣurindriyaṃ viparyayajñānotpādakam; samyagjñānābhiprāyeṇa duṣṭatvam; viparyayajñāne tu tatkāraṇameva; sarvaṃ caitat pramoṣapakṣe'pi samānamiti । tadetadanu- pāsitaguruprajñāvilasitatvādupekṣaṇīyam ।

saṃvitparāmarśakuśalastvāha—satyamekamevedaṃ vijñānam । aparokṣatayā cātra rajatamevāvabhāsate । tathāpi naivedaṃ vijñānamapramāṇam, pratibhāsāviśeṣāt itara- rajatavijñānavat atrāpyaparokṣarajatasadbhāvāt । laukikālaukikatve tu viśeṣaḥ । pratibhāsāviśeṣe'pi vyavahārapravartakaṃ hi loke saṃmataṃ rajatam । yattu rajatavyava- hāraṃ na pravartayati, atha ca rajatajñānasaṃvedyam, tadalaukikaṃ rajatamiti । tadanupa- pannam; iha hi kvacit ‘rajatamidam’ iti sarveṣāṃ sarvadā pratibhāsotpattiḥ । kvacicca-‘rajatamidam’ ‘nedaṃ rajatam’ iti vidhipratiṣedharūpapratibhāsadvayotpattiḥ । tatra pratibhāsāviśeṣāt kiṃcidrajatameva, aparaṃ tu sadasadātmakaṃ yugapat krameṇa vā bhavatu, bādhyabādhakaparyālocanena vā viparītakhyātiriti । keyamalaukikatā laukikatā vā saṃvitparāmarśasya ? na tāvadayaṃ laukikālaukitvavibhāgaḥ pratibhāsa- nimittakaḥ; na hi rajatapratibhāsotpattikāle taddharmatayā laukikālaukikatve prati- bhāsete—laukikamidaṃ rajatam, alaukikamidaṃ rajatam iti vā । nedaṃ rajatam’ ityatrāpi pūrvapratipannarajatābhāvamātrāvagatiḥ । na hi pūrvapratipannarajatānuvṛttau satyā- mevālaukikatvaṃ laukikatvābhāvo vā aparokṣarajatadharmatayāvabhāsate । ‘idaṃ rajatamalaukikam’ ‘idaṃ vā rajataṃ laukikaṃ na bhavati’ iti saṃvit syāt । nanu ‘nedaṃ rajatam’ iti nedaṃ lokikamiti guṇaparaṃ vyākhyāyate । tadidaṃ pratibhāsa- śūnyaṃ saṃvitparāmarśavādī kathaṃ brūyāt ? kathaṃ ‘nedaṃ rajatam’ ityatrāparokṣatayā pratibhāsamāne rajatābhāve ‘nedaṃ laukikam’ iti taddharmatayā laukikatvābhāvo- 'vasīyate ? na hyapratibhāsamāne dharmiṇi taddharmatayā rūparasādayo'vabhāsante । nanu ‘nedaṃ rajatam’ ityabhāvo'pi rajatadharmatayaivāvabhāsate, na bhāvamātradharma- tayā; kathaṃ cānavabhāsamāne tasmin taddharmāvagatiḥ ? ucyate—yatpūrvaṃ pratipanna- maparokṣadharmatayaiva rajatam, idānīṃ ca smaryate tadavacchinno'bhāvo'parokṣavastudharmatayā pratīyate ‘nedaṃ rajatam’ iti । taccāparokṣam ‘idam’ iti bādhakapratyaye'vabhāsata
eva; na tu pratiṣedhyapratiṣedhayordharmadharmibhāvo'sti śuklapaṭayoriva, virodhāt । aprasaktasyānupratiṣedho nāstīti smṛtau tat prasaktameva । na tvatrāparokṣarajatadharmatayā laukikatvaṃ pratipannamidānīṃ ca smaryate । na cāparokṣatayā rajatamavabhāsate yena taddharmatayā laukikatvābhāvo'vasīyeta । atha pūrvamaparokṣarajatadharmatayāvabhāsita- syaiva laukikatvasyedānīmaparokṣatayāvabhāsamāne rajate laukikatvābhāvastaddharmatayā- vasīyate ‘nedaṃ rajataṃ laukikam’ iti vā; tarhyalaukika laukikatvenābhāsitamiti sudūramapi gatvā viparyayajñānānna mucyāmaha iti viparītakhyātau ca satyāṃ bodhakatvā- tiprasaktiḥ vijñānākāratā ca na nirastā syāt । tadvaraṃ pratibhāsānuguṇaiva viparyayāva- gatirabhyupagantavyā । tasmānnāyaṃ vibhāgaḥ pratibhāsanimittakaḥ, nāpi rajatavyavahāra- sadasadbhāvanimittakaḥ; kutaḥ ? alaukike'pi rajate svapnāvasthāyāmapyasakṛdarthakriyā- darśanāt, jāgradavasthāyāmapi kūṭajayatuṅgādiṣu; laukike'pi cotpannavinaṣṭe ghaṭe ghaṭavyavahārābhāvāt । api ca ye tāvadrajatavyavahāraṃ na pratyāyayanti, te rajatā- bhāvaṃ pratipadyante, na punaralaukikatvam । alaukikatvāvagamādrajatavyavahāranivṛttau satyāmitaretarāśrayatvam—alaukikatvādrajatavyavahāranivṛttiḥ rajatavyavahāranivṛttau ca satyāmalaukikatvamiti । lokasaṃmatācca rajatād vilakṣaṇamidamalaukikasaṃjñakaṃ rajatam, tadyadi svapratibhāsotpattikāle vailakṣaṇyenāvabhāsate tadā ‘nedaṃ rajatam, na laukikam’ iti bādhakapratyayotpattiḥ prāpnoti, tathātvenaivāvabhāsitatvāt । athāvailakṣaṇyenaivāvabhāsitam, tadā vilakṣaṇamavilakṣaṇatvenāvabhāsitamiti viparīta- khyātiḥ । athobhayadharmarahitaṃ dharmimātramavabhāsitam, tathāpi ‘nedaṃ laukikam’ iti bādhakapratyayānutpattistadavasthaiva । pramāṇāpramāṇavyavahāraśca laukikānāṃ nirnibandhana eva syāt । tasmādalamanayā saṃvitparāmarśavādinaḥ pratibhāsaśūnyopapattyūhanikayā । tasmādayamarthaḥ—pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇānāmanvayavyatirekābhyāmarthāvisaṃvāditvaṃ prāmā- ṇyamavagamyate, na bodhakatvamātram । tathāhi—satyapi bodhakatve yatrāvisaṃvā- ditvaṃ nāsti, tatrāprāmāṇyam yathā śuktikāyāṃ rajatajñānasya; vināpi bodhakatvaṃ yatrārthāvisaṃvāditvamasti, tatra prāmāṇyam yathāgnau dhūmasya; tasya jñānahetava evo- tpādakāḥ । nanu jñānahetavaḥ pramāṇāpramāṇasādhāraṇāḥ; sāmagryantarajanyo'yamaṃśaḥ; sāmagryantaraṃ ca guṇasahitamindriyam; taduktam “indriyādiguṇāḥ” iti; śabde cāptapraṇītatvaṃ kāraṇaguṇatvena vyavahārādavagatam; vede tadabhāvādaprāmāṇyam,

taduktam-“tataśca puruṣābhāvāt” iti । tadasat, sāmagryantarābhāvāt, vidhi- mukhena kāryamukhena vā guṇānāmapratīteḥ; indriyādisvarūpameva hyanyanirapekṣamarthāvi- saṃvādijñānotpādakam, añjanādīnāṃ ca doṣāpagame vyāpāraḥ, na guṇādhāne । nanu indriyādisvarūpamaprāmāṇye'pyastyeva । satyam; doṣasamavadhāne tu sāmagryantarād vilakṣaṇakāryotpattiḥ । uktaṃ ca bhāṣye “tadantargato doṣo mithyābhāvasya hetuḥ” iti । athaivaṃ kasmānna bhavati—indriyādisvarūpamevānyanirapekṣaṃ vyabhicārijñāno- tpādakam ? guṇasamavadhāne tu sāmagryantaramarthāvisaṃvādijñānotpādakam ? kāryaṃ hi guṇadoṣayoḥ sadbhāve pramāṇam; tadevamapyupapadyata eva । satyamevam, anvaya- vyatirekābhyāṃ tu vijñānotpādakameva trairūpyānumānādau prāmāṇyotpādakaṃ dṛṣṭam । pratyakṣe'pi tatsambhavāt tadevotpādakam, arthāntaraparikalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt; viparyayajñānarūpaṃ tu kāryamindriyādisvarūpādanutpadyamānaṃ sāmagryantaraṃ kalpayatītyanava- dyam । sāmagryantaraniṣedhaparatāṃ cāsya ślokasya darśayiṣyati tatra tatra pradeśe svayameva “prāmāṇyaṃ tatra guṇato naiva syāt” ityādau । jñānotpādakasyaiva prāmā- ṇyotpādakatvaṃ darśayiṣyatī—

bhāṣyakāro'pi doṣāpagame saṃpratipattiṃ vadan vijñānahetava eva prāmā- ṇyasyotpādakā iti kathayati । itarathā hyevamavakṣyat—guṇasamavadhāne saṃpratipatti- darśanāt—iti “tadantargato doṣo mithyābhāvasya hetuḥ” itivat । tatsiddhau ca jñānahetūnāṃ prāmāṇyotpādakatvasambhavāt siddhaṃ vede'pi prāmāṇyam । tatra “svataḥ sarvapramāṇānām” iti pūrvārddhena vijñānahetūnāṃ prāmāṇye'pi vyāpāra iti pratijñātam; uparitanena sāmagryantarābhāvastatra heturuktaḥ; “na hi svato'satī śaktiḥ kartumanyena” vijñānasāmagryatiriktena “śakyate” iti । śloke cātmīya- vācakaḥ svaśabda iti । athavā indriyādisāmagrīmātrajanyo bodhaviśeṣa eva pramāṇam । yadāha—“doṣāpagame saṃpratipattidarśanāt” iti । saṃpratipatti-

śabdena bodhaviśeṣamāha । sa eva hi bodhye pramāṇam; tadapekṣameva cātmano boddhṛtvam । sa eva hi viṣayaṃ samarthayati, anvayavyatirekābhyāmavyabhicāritāpi tamevotpādayantī pramāṇam । tasyaiva cānena sāmagryantaraniṣedhenotpattau guṇāpekṣitvaṃ nirastam । taduktam “na hi svato'satastasya kutaścidapi sambhavaḥ” iti । yattu utpattau pratibhāsāviśeṣādapavādāśaṅkāyāmaprāmāṇyāśaṅkā, tāṃ pratyakṣādiṣu nirāka- riṣyāmaḥ “doṣajñāne tvanutpanne” ityatra । apauruṣeye tu vede sa nāstyeveti vakṣyāmaḥ—

lg.l: jalpatāṃ nāsti maryādā dik tu tāvat pradarśitā ।।

p: nanu gṛhītamavyabhicārākhyaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ svakāryaṃ karoti । arthakriyāsaṃvādi- tayā ca tad gṛhyeta । tasyāśca vede'sattvāt prāptaṃ punarapyaprāmāṇyamityaprāmāṇya- māśaṅkyāha—ātmalābha iti । naiva hi pramāṇaṃ svakārye svagrahaṇamarekṣate, agṛhītaprāmāṇyādapi vijñānād viṣayaparicchedasiddheḥ । nanu na paricchedamātraṃ pramāṇakāryam, apramāṇādapyupapatteḥ; paricchittiviśeṣaṃ tu nāgṛhītaprāmāṇyaṃ vijñānaṃ janayati, prāgarthakriyāsaṃvādāt pramāṇetarakṛtaparicchedaviśeṣānupalabdheḥ । ucyate- na grahaṇottarakālamutpattyavasthātaḥ paricchitterviśeṣo'vabhāsata iti paricchittimātra- meva pramāṇakāryam । tasmāt pramāṇamutpattāveva vijñānahetūnapekṣate, notpannaṃ svakāryeṣu svagrahaṇam । tadanena ślokadvayena svotpattau svakārye ca sāmagryantaraṃ svagrahaṇāpekṣatā ca nirastā । apekṣādvayarahitaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ svata ityucyate । tadidamuktam—

LG.l: yadā svataḥ pramāṇatvaṃ tadānyo naiva mṛgyate ।

p: “tat pramāṇaṃ bādarāyaṇasyānapekṣatvāt” iti ।।

evaṃ svataḥ prāmāṇyamabhidhāyedānī parataḥ prāmāṇye dūṣaṇamāha-jāte'pīti ślokatrayeṇa । yadyavyabhicārākhyaṃ prāmāṇyamagṛhītaṃ svakāryaṃ na karotītyucyate, tadā kāryānutpattiprasaṅgaḥ, avyabhicārasyaiva grahītumaśakyatvāt; na hyaparicchinne samba- ndhini tatrāvyabhicārilakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ śakyo grahītum, sambandhigrahaṇapuraḥsaratvāt sambandhapratīteḥ । na cāyamapratītasambandho bodhamātrādarthaṃ pratyāyayatītyāndhyamaśeṣasya jagataḥ । atha gṛhītvārthaṃ sambandhagrahaṇam, evaṃ satyarthagrahaṇamapi gṛhītāvyabhi- cārājjñānāditi prāpto'nyonyasaṃśrayaḥ । athārthakriyāto ghaṭaṃ pratipadya ghaṭajñānasya tatrāvyabhicāro gṛhyata iti cet, nārthakriyā ghaṭamavagamayati, ghaṭābhāve'pi bhāvāt । tatsādhyā taṃ gamayatīti cenna, anavagate ghaṭe tatsādhyatvasyaivāgrahaṇāt । avagate tu pūrvaṃ prāmāṇyagrahaṇād ghaṭe kimuttarakālaṃ prāmāṇyagrahaṇena ? na caivaṃ sati samyag- jñānapūrvikā pravṛttiḥ syāt । athaikasmin vijñāne'rthagrahaṇottarakālaṃ prāmāṇyamava- gamya jñānāntare tathāvidhakāraṇadarśanāt prāmāṇyamanumāya tataḥ pravartata iti cenna, ālambanasyāpi kāraṇatvena tathāvidhagrahaṇe pūrvavat prasaṅgāt । na ca katipaya- kāraṇatathāvidhatvena kāryatathāvidhatvam, bhasmadhūmābhyāmanaikāntikatvāt । nāpi kāraṇaguṇāvadhāraṇapūrvakamavyabhicāritvagrahaṇam, anavasthāprasaṅgāditi ślokatraya- syārthaḥ ।।

LG.l: avijñāne tu doṣāṇāṃ vyāpāro naiva vidyate ।
