p: nanu svataḥprāmāṇyavādino'pyapavādakadoṣagrahaṇe samānaivānavasthetyāśaṅkyāha —yadeti । na tāvat prāmāṇyaṃ svotpattau svakārye vā kiñcidapekṣata ityuktam । nāpi mithyātvanivṛttau doṣābhāvagrahaṇāpekṣā, doṣajñānānutpatterayatna- siddhatvāddoṣābhāvasya । nanu nānupalabdhimātrādabhāvaḥ siddhyati, tasya doṣasadbhā- ve'pi mithyājñāneṣu bhāvādanaikāntikatvāt । tasmāddoṣābhāvāvadhāraṇajñānamapekṣa- ṇīyam; tadapi jñānāntarāvadhāritadoṣābhāvaṃ pramāṇam; tadapyevamityanavasthā । ucyate-yatra tāvadrajatavijñāna utpanne satyanantaraṃ doṣajñānamutpadyate, tatra tāvannā- styevānavasthā, doṣāṇāṃ kāryadvāreṇāvagamāt । yatra tu notpadyate bādhaḥ, tatra doṣāśaṅkā na kāryeti parihāraṃ vakṣyati—“doṣajñāne tvanutpanne” ityādinā । bhavatu pratyakṣādiṣu doṣāśaṅkā, apauruṣeyatvādvede sā nāstyeva ।।
nanu yadi paricchittiḥ pramāṇakāryam, tadeva ca bodhātmakatvaṃ prāmāṇyam, tadā śuktikāyāmapi rajatajñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ prāptamityāha—tasmāditi ।।

yat punaridamuktam “aprāmāṇyamavastutvānna syāt kāraṇadoṣataḥ” iti, tatrāha—aprāmāṇyamiti ślokadvayena । sandehaviparyayayorvastutvena “avastu- tvāt” ityayamasiddho hetuḥ । anutpattau tatsiddhasādhyateti ślokadvayasyārthaḥ । tasmādaprāmāṇyamutpattau vijñānānāṃ sāmagrītaḥ sāmagryantaramapekṣate । uktaṃ caitat —“tadantargato doṣo mithyābhāvasya hetuḥ” iti ।।
svakārye ca doṣāvadhāraṇapūrvakaṃ svagrahaṇamapekṣate; na cānavasthā, pramāṇena doṣāṇāṃ grahaṇāt; tacca svata iti sthitam; tadāha—doṣata iti ।।

“arthānyathātvahetūtthadoṣajñānādapodyate” ityuktam; kathaṃ punarayamarthā- nyathātvajñānena pūrvasya bādhaḥ ? na tāvannāśaḥ, sarvajñānānāṃ vināśādaprāmāṇya- prasaṅgāt । nāpi kāryapratibandhaḥ, arthaparicchedasya balādutpadyamānatvāt । na ca saṃskārocchedaḥ, bādhakapratyayotpattāvapi tatkāryasmaraṇadarśanāt । nāpi sahānava- sthānam, sarvajñānasādhāraṇatvāt । nāpi phalāpahāraḥ, pramāṇasyābādhitatvāt; itaśca, nottareṇa pūrvasya bādhaḥ; na hi tat pūrvasya mithyātvamavagamayati, arthāntara- viṣayatvāt । syādetat ‘naitadevam’ iti pūrvapratyayagṛhītārthābhāvagrāhakatayoparita- nasya bādhakatvamiti । tadanupapannam; yadi tāvat kālāntare'bhāvaṃ gṛhṇāti, tato virodhābhāvānna bādhaḥ । atha pratibhāsamānasyaiva, tathāpi sadasadbhāvayorekasmin kāle pratibhāsamānatvena virodhābhāvādubhayākārataivāstu, na bādhaḥ । na cottaraṃ pratyakṣaṃ pūrvagṛhītasyaivārthasyābhāvagrāhakam, tasya bhāvaviṣayatvāt । na cottarama- bhāvākhyameva pramāṇam, pūrvasya sadbhāvagrāhiṇo vidyamānatvāt । sadupalambhakapramāṇa- pratyastamaye sati tasyodayaḥ, na tu pūrvasmin pramāṇajyeṣṭhe pratyakṣe sati । pūrvasya pratyakṣābhāsatvenāyamadoṣa iti cenna, itaretarāśrayatvāt । na hi prāktanasyānyada- prāmāṇye kāraṇamityāśaṅkyāha—sākṣāditi । tatra sākṣāditi viṣayaikatvamāha । viparyayajñānāditi virodham । ladhvyevetyavicāritasiddhatāmasya darśayati ।।

sarvathā ‘naitadevam’ iti jñāna utpanne sati pūrvajñānanibandhano vyavahāro nivartate । pravṛttiśca phalaṃ pramāṇānām । pravṛttyākhyaphalāpahāraśca bādhaḥ । kiṃ punaranena kurvatā tat kṛtamiti cet, ucyate—taccet kṛtam, kiṃ kāryāntareṇa ? itarathā hi tadapi kiṃ kurvatānena kṛtaṃ syāt ? kāṣṭhādīnāṃ tu tathā darśanāt paramakārye'vāntarakāryāntarāśrayaṇam; yatra ca tathā darśanaṃ nāsti, tatra naiva tadā- śrayaṇam । athāvāntarakāryāśrayaṇe'vāntarakāryāśrayaṇaṃ pūrvavijñānagṛhītārthābhāva- grāhakatayā ceti prakriyā, tatraitat syād dvayoḥ parasparaviparītārthagrāhakatve sati kathamuttarasyaiva bādhakatvamityāśaṅkyāha—duṣṭeti । yadyapi doṣajñānaṃ doṣaviṣayatvena

LG.l: tatra doṣāntarajñānaṃ bādhadhīrvā parā na cet ।

p: pūrvasmādbhinnaviṣayam, tathāpi doṣāṇāmayathārthajñānahetutvāttajjñānādanyathātvamarthasya, pūrvajñānāttathātvamiti ekārthatvamastīti virodhaḥ, yathā kratvarthapuruṣārthatvena bhinna- viṣayayorapi camasagodohanayoravāntaravyāpāraikyena bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ ।।
idānīm “arthānyathātvahetūtthadoṣajñānādapodyate” ityasyotsṛṣṭasyāpavāda- māha—tatra doṣāntarajñānamiti ।।

nanvevaṃ sati tṛtīyavijñānādasya prāmāṇyamiti parataḥ prāmāṇyamityāśaṅkyāha —svata eva hityardhena । nanvevaṃ tarhi niścitasyāpi vijñānasya bādhyamānatayā vyabhicārasyāpi dṛṣṭatvādityāśaṅkāyāmāśvāso na yuktaḥ; yatrāpyadhunā doṣajñānaṃ notpadyate, tatrāpi kālāntarādiṣu kadācidutpadyata ityāśaṅkyāha—doṣajñāna ityardhena । ayamabhiprāyaḥ—yattāvadubhayakoṭisaṃsparśitayā anavadhāritaikāntikaṃ vijñānamutpadyate, tasya yuktamaprāmāṇyam । yat punaḥ ‘idamittham’ iti vastutathā- tvaniścāyakamutpadyate, na ca bādhakapratyayaḥ, kāraṇadoṣajñānaṃ vā; tatreyamāśaṅkā kvacidvyabhicāradarśanāt ‘anyathābhāvaḥ syāt’ iti na yuktā vivekinā kartum । kathaṃ hi ‘tathā’ iti saṃpratyayādavagamyamāno'rthaḥ anyathaiva, anyathāpi vā syāt- ityāśaṅkāṃ vivekī kuryāt, pratītivirodhāt ? nanvevaṃ sati kāraṇadoṣajñānādapi mithyātvāśaṅkā na prāpnoti, pratītivirodhādeva । ucyate—nāsmābhiḥ kāraṇadoṣa- jñānāt saṃśaya utpādyate; kiṃ tarhi ? kāraṇadoṣajñānāt sarveṣāmeva pramāṇabhūtāt
saṃśayaḥ pratyātmasiddha eva । yattvanutpanna eva saṃśayaḥ kvacidvyabhicāradarśanāt balā- dutpādyate, atra pratītivirodhaḥ ।।
nanvevaṃ sati bādhakasyāpi bādhakāntaradarśanāt kā pariniṣṭhetyāśaṅkyāha— evaṃ tricatureti ।।

saiṣā prakriyā—nanu bhavatu doṣādaprāmāṇyam, tathāpi śabda eva codanā jñāne duṣṭaṃ kāraṇam; te hi svasāmarthyamanurudhyamānāstiraskṛtānyārthānayathārthān pratyayān janayanti ‘aṅgulyagre hastiyūthaśatamāste’ iti । ato'napekṣitārtha- jñānajananasvabhāvatvādarthāsaṃsparśinaḥ śabdā iti । nanu cakṣurādayo'pi hi viparyaya- jñānaṃ janayantyeva, na cārthāsaṃsparśinaḥ । naitadevam; indriyadoṣā viparyayajñānahetavaḥ, nendriyam; śabde'pi vaktṛdoṣāḥ saṅkrāntā viparyayasya kāraṇamiti cenna, āpta- prayuktādapyaṅgulyagrādivākyāt pratyayotpattyaviśeṣāt । nanvāptā nedṛśāni vākyāni prayuñjate, prayuñjānā vānāptāḥ syuḥ । naitat sāram । evamapi vaktṛdoṣāṇā- mayathārthajñānakāraṇatvāsiddhiḥ, vyatirekāsiddheḥ । yadi hi vaktṛdoṣābhāve satya- pyarthaśūnyānyapi vākyāni prayuñjīran, na cāyathārthapratyayān vuryuḥ, tato'nvaya- vyatirekābhyāṃ vaktṛdoṣājatvāt śābdasya syāt । yadā tu punaranāptatvābhāve'- mīṣāmaprayogaḥ, tat kiṃ śabdābhāvādayathārthajñānānutpattiḥ, āhosvid doṣā- bhāvāditi sandigdho vyatirekaḥ । śabde tu niścitaḥ, satyapi doṣe śabdānuccāraṇe mithyājñānānutpatteḥ । na cāptatvamīdṛgvākyaprayoktṛtvena virudhyate, tathāvidhaśabdo- ccāraṇe satyapyāśayadoṣābhāvādanāptatvāyogāt । tathā hi—āpto'pi kasmai cidupadiśati—na tvayā ananubhūtārthaṃ vākyaṃ prayoktavyam yathā aṅgulyagrādi- vākyam; yāni vañcakamatikalpitāni tathāvākyāni vinodasukhārthāni gandhamāda- nādivarṇakavadāptaireva prayujyante, tatrāpyāśayadoṣābhāvādanāptatvaṃ nāsti; jāyate ca tebhyo'napekṣitārthatattvabuddhiḥ; śabdasyaivaiṣa mahimā, na vaktṛdoṣāṇāmityatra niścayaḥ ।
api ca, bādhakapratyayotpattāvapi śabdo mithyājñānaṃ janayatyeva । ato'rthāsaṃsparśī śabdaḥ । taduktam—

ityāśaṅkyāha—śabde doṣodbhava iti ślokadvayena । ayamabhiprāyaḥ—ayathārtha- jñānajanakatvaṃ duṣṭatvam; tacca bādhakapratyayādavaseyam; vede ca tasyābhāvāt kuto- 'rthāsaṃsparśitā ? nanu loka evāṅgulyagrādivākyadarśanena—ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāsta eva vaidikāḥ iti sā vede'pi syāt । tadanupapannam; dvividha eva laukikaḥ śabdaḥ—āptapraṇīto'nāptapraṇītaśca । tatrāptavākyaṃ naiva viparyayajñāna- mutpādayati; anāptavākye'pi vaktṛdoṣāḥ saṅkrāntā viparyayajñānahetavaḥ, na śabda- rūpam । nanu cāptaprayuktādapyaṅgulyagrādivākyādviparyayajñānotpattidarśanācchabdasyaivaiṣa mahimā, na vaktṛdoṣāṇām । tadanupapannam, āptarevaṃvidhavākyāprayogāt । yattvāto'pi kasmaicidupadiśatītyuktam, tatra niṣedhaparatvena yathārthataiva । na tvevaṃ- vidhasya vākyaikadeśasyāpyuccāraṇaṃ kāryamityudāharaṇavivakṣāyāmitikaraṇāvacchinnasya śabdaparatvenopādānam; arthavattve tu niṣedhavākyataiva na syāditi । api ca anvitābhidhānavādina eṣa doṣaḥ । abhihitayorapekṣādiṣvanvaye aṅgulyagrādiṣu kuto'nvayaḥ ? avagatibhramastu sāmānyatodṛṣṭanibandhanaḥ । naṭādikupuruṣadoṣakṛtaṃ vitathatvam । śabdanibandhane tu sarvadā vitathatvaprasaṅgāt । taduktam “tattathyameva bhavati” iti । na cedamapi puruṣaguṇakṛtam, vakṣyati “guṇebhyo doṣāṇāmabhāvaḥ” iti ।।

nanu śabdoccāraṇamātra eva puruṣāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ; tacca āptānāptayostulyam; arthapratipattistu śabdanibandhanaiveti tadviparyaye śabdasyaiva vyāpāraḥ, na vaktṛdoṣā- ṇām । ucyate—viparyayajñānotpatteryāvatā tadbhāvabhāvitvamavagamyate tāvatā tatra vyāpāraḥ; sā ca śabdoccāraṇasannidhāne'pyanāptaprayoktṛkatāṃ vinā na dṛṣṭeti śabda- vattadavagamasyāpi vyāpāraḥ; tadabhāvaśca pauruṣeyeṣu guṇavadvaktṛkatvena; codanāyāṃ tu puruṣābhāvādeveti ślokadvayasyārthaḥ ।।

bhavatu pratyakṣādiṣu vijñānotpādakasāmagrīvyatirekeṇa guṇānāmabhāvāt svataḥ prāmāṇyam; śabde tu vijñānotpādakasāmarthyātirekeṇa doṣavadāptapraṇītatvaguṇasadbhā- vāt tasya ca prāmāṇyena saha tadbhāvabhāvitvadarśanāt parataḥ prāmāṇyam, tadabhāvācca codanāyāmaprāmāṇyam; pratyakṣādiṣu svataḥ prāmāṇyapratipādanamanupayogītyāśaṅkyāha- pauruṣeye dvayamiti । ayamabhiprāyaḥ—pratyakṣādiṣu vijñānotpādakasyaiva prāmāṇyo- tpādakatve pratipādite vede'pi tatsadbhāvāt tata eva prāmāṇyaṃ yuktamiti pratyakṣādiṣu svataḥ prāmāṇyapratipādanamupayogi ।।
guṇānāṃ tu prāmāṇyena saha tadbhāvabhāvitvamanyathāsiddhamiti darśayannāha— tasmāditi tripādyā । autsargikaṃ yadvijñānotpādakatvaṃ tadapi kuto'napodita- mityāśaṅkyāha—tenotsargo'napoditaḥ iti ।।
yataḥ pratyayotpattiḥ, taddhetukaṃ prāmāṇyamityāha—pratyayotpattītyarddhena । evaṃ tarhi prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇa iva guṇānāṃ doṣābhāve vyāpāre satyanavastheti codayati—doṣābhāva ityardhena ।।

LG.l: tadā na vyāpriyante hi jñānamānatayā guṇāḥ ।

p: etatpariharati—tadeti ।।

pramāṇāntareṇa vijñāyamānā guṇāḥ prāmāṇyamavatārayantīti yuktānavasthā । doṣābhāve tu sattāmātreṇaivopakurvantīti nāstyevānavasthā । bhavatu vā pratyakṣādi- doṣāśaṅkāyāṃ kālāntarādiṣu bādhakādipratyayāśaṅkā; apauruṣeyatvādvede nāstye- vetyāha—tatreti ।
nanu vaktrabhāvena āptapraṇītatvaguṇasadbhāvo'pi nāstīti katham “guṇebhyo doṣāṇāmabhāvaḥ” ityāśaṅkyāha—ata iti ।।

na tāvad guṇābhāvena prāmāṇyābhāvaḥ; vijñānakaraṇādhīnatvāt; tasya ca vijñānakāraṇasya śabdasya sannidhānāt । nāpi doṣabhāvenāprāmāṇyam, vakturabhāvena doṣāṇāmapyabhāvāt; taduktam—“yadvā vakturabhāvena” iti । ataśca śabde vijñānotpādakameva prāmāṇyotpādakam, nāptapraṇītatvam । tataśca tadabhāvo na doṣāya । prāmāṇyaprayojakābhāvo hi aprāmāṇyamākṣipati, nāptapraṇītatvābhāvaḥ । ata eva pratisādhanānyatra vakṣyāmaḥ—“doṣavarjitaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ janyamānatvāt” iti; prayojake tu pratyukte kutasteṣāmavasara iti । vakṣyati ca—“teṣvāgama- viruddhatvāt” iti; tadāha—tataścāptapraṇītatvamiti ।।

yattu “pratyakṣādyagatārthatvāt” ityuktam, tatrāha—pauruṣeya ityarddhena । nanu pauruṣeyasyāpi svata eva prāmāṇyamuktam “pauruṣeye dvayaṃ dṛṣṭam” ityatra । vakṣyati ca “taccetpratyayitāt” ityatra “aprāmāṇyanivṛttyarthaṃ doṣābhāve- pavarṇanam” iti । kimidamucyate “pramāṇāntaramūlatā” iti ? ucyate— pramāṇānatramūlatvaṃ doṣanirāsāyāha, na prāmāṇyasiddhyai; tadāha—tadabhāve hītyardhena ।।
apauruṣeyatvena codanāyāḥ pramāṇāntarābhāve'pyanāptapraṇītatvadoṣābhāvena pratyakṣādyagatārthatve naivāprāmāṇyam, pratyuta pramāṇāntaramūlatvamanuvādakatvādatra doṣāyetyāha—tenetarapramāṇairiti ।

yatrāpi pratyakṣādau pramāṇāntaraṃ saṃbhavati, tatrāpi na pūrvasyetarasaṃvādāt prāmāṇyam; ubhayorapi tulyarūpatvādekaikameva tatra bodhātmakatvādvikalpenārthinaṃ pravartayati naikamitarasaṃvādāpekṣamityāha—anyasyāpīti ।।
pūrvasya savicikitsatvena saṃvādāpekṣā, evaṃ tarhi tatpramāṇameva na bhavatī- tyāha—yatrāpīti ।।
yastu saṃvādādasya prāmāṇyaṃ manyate, tasya saṃvādakasyāpi saṃvādakāpekṣitve sati anavasthetyāha—saṅgatyeti ।।

LG.p: nanu naiva ghaṭajñānāntarasaṃvādāt prāmāṇyam; api tu udakāharaṇarūpa- kriyāsaṃvādāt; na ca tatra saṃvādāpekṣā; arthakriyārthī pūrvasmāt pravartamāno vyabhi- cāradarśanena saṃvādamapekṣate, arthakriyājñānasya tu puruṣārthatvādutpanne tasminna kācidapekṣetyāśaṅkyāha—kasyacittviti । arthakriyājñānasyāpi svapnāvasthāyāṃ vyabhicāradarśanānna kaścid ghaṭavijñānād viśeṣaḥ । arthakriyāsaṃvādācca pūrvaprāmāṇye maṇiprabhāyāmapi maṇibuddhiḥ pramāṇaṃ syāt । anudakārthinaścodakajñānamapramāṇama- saṃvādāt । kūṭe vijayatuṅgajñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt, katipayārthakriyādarśanāt । kasyāṃ- cideva ghaṭavyaktāvutpanne'pi ghaṭajñāne kathaṃcid daivādarthakriyā na kṛteti jñānamapramāṇaṃ syāt । na ca tadapramāṇameva, ghaṭotpannatvenāvisaṃvādāt । uktaṃ ca bhavadbhiḥ— “pratyakṣamarthāvisaṃvādādeva pramāṇam; avisaṃvādaśca tasmādātmalābhāt” iti । aghaṭe'pi ghaṭajñānadarśanādarthakriyāmantareṇa tadutpannatā kathamavagamyata iti cet anudakāharaṇe darśanādapi tadutpannatā kathamavagamyate ? api ca, arthakriyājñāna- mapyarthakriyāyāṃ ghaṭajñānavadavisaṃvādādeva pramāṇam; avisaṃvādaścārthakriyājanyatvena; tatra yathaivārthakriyāmantareṇa ghaṭajñānasyāghaṭe'pi darśanāt tadutpannatā na śakyāvagantum, arthakriyādarśanena tu ghaṭamavagamya tadutpannatāvagamyata iti pūrvamarthakriyāsaṃvādasavya- pekṣam; tathaiva svapnāvasthāyāmanarthakriyāyāmapyarthakriyādarśanājjñānāntareṇāvagamyaivārtha- kriyāmarthakriyāvijñānasya tadutpannatāvagamyata ityarthakriyājñānasyāpi jñānāntarasaṃvādā- pekṣāyāṃ kaḥ pūrvāparayorviśeṣaḥ ? api ca, arthakriyāto ghaṭamavagamya ghaṭajñānaprati- bandhāvadhāraṇaṃ śakyam; apratipannāyāṃ tvarthakriyāyāṃ kathamarthakriyājñānasya prati- bandhāvadhāraṇamarthakriyāyām ? na tāvad ghaṭajñānamarthakriyāmavagamayati; nāpi ghaṭo'va- gamayati, vyabhicārāt; nāpyarthakriyājñānam, pūrvasmādaviśeṣāt; tadapi hi prati- bandhāvadhāraṇasavyapekṣamevārthakriyāmavagamayati । tadevaṃ pūrvāparayoḥ sāmye sati prathamasya tathābhāvaparityāge siddhāntaviṣayāgrahanibandhanaḥ pradveṣa iti ślokasyārthaḥ ।।
api ca yadi tāvad vijātīyakāraṇajanitavijñānasaṃvādāt prāmāṇyamityabhyupa- gamaḥ, tadā śabdarasarūpādibuddhīnāṃ bhinnaviṣayatvena saṃvādābhāvādaprāmāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ;

LG.l: saṅgatiḥ kāraṇaṃ klṛptā tathā vede'pi kalpyatām ।। 79 ।।

LG.p: tadāha—śrotradhīrityardhena । samānajātīyakāraṇajanitavijñānasaṃvādāt prāmāṇyā- bhyupagame tu vede'pi tatsadbhāvāt prāmāṇyamiti darśayannāha—syāccediti ।
etaduktaṃ bhavati, vijātīyakāraṇajanitavijñānasaṃvādo na pratyakṣādau nāpi vede; samānajātīyakāraṇajanitavijñānasaṃvādastu pratyakṣādivad vede'pyastītyāha— sādhanāntareti sārdhena ।।
prakaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—tasmāditi । dṛḍhamityanena saṃśayasya vyudāsaḥ, yadutpannamityanutpatteḥ, na visaṃvādamṛcchatīti viparyayasya ।।

pramāṇāntarasaṃvādena ca prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇamānumānikam, pramāṇe pramāṇāntara- saṃvādadarśanāt; anumānena ca śabdādīnāṃ prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇe tasyāpyanumānāntara- savyapekṣatve satyanavasthetyāha—na cānumānata iti ।।

nanu na nīlajñānaṃ nīlāvabhāsavat prāmāṇyāvabhāsamutpadyate, nīlāvabhāsaśca pramāṇatayāvabhāsamāno nīlarthinaṃ pravartayati । taduktamanyairapi—“samyagjñāna- pūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ” iti । arthakriyāsaṃvāditayā cāvadhāritaprāmāṇyaṃ vijñānaṃ puruṣaṃ pravartayatīti parataḥ prāmāṇyamiti codayati—nanviti ।।

tatra parihāramāha—pramāṇamiti tripādyā । na tāvadutpattau svagrahaṇama- pekṣate, nāpi viṣayaparicchittilakṣaṇe svakārye, agṛhītaprāmāṇyādapi vijñānād viṣayaparicchedasiddheḥ । taduktam—“ātmalābhe hi bhāvānām” iti । puruṣa- pravṛttilakṣaṇastu vyāpāraḥ paricchinne vastuni smaraṇābhilāṣapūrvako na pramāṇam । taduktamanyairapi—“smaraṇādabhilāṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ pravartate” iti । yadi tarhi na gṛhyate, tatastasya sadbhāva eva nāsti; asataśca kathaṃ kāraṇatvamityāśaṅkya pari- harati—gṛhyate pratyayāntarairiti ।।

nanu ca pratyayāntaraiḥ prāmāṇyagrahaṇe'navasthetyuktam-“saṅgatyā yadi ceṣyeta” iti । ataḥ kathamucyate “gṛhyate pratyayāntaraiḥ” iti ? ayamāśayaḥ— bādhakādinivṛttau satyāṃ, arthaparicchittyanyathānupapattyā jñānamanumīyamānaṃ pramāṇabhūta- manumīyata iti । avadhāraṇaṃ tu satyam, kāryānupayogītyāha—tenāsyeti “ātmalābhe hi bhāvānām” ityarthaviṣayaparicchittau svagrahasāpekṣatvaṃ nirastam । adhunā puruṣapravṛttilakṣaṇe vyāpāra ityapaunaruktyam ।।

bādhakādipratyayagṛhītamithyārthaṃ tu ghaṭajñānaṃ pravartamāna nivartayatīti parato- 'prāmāṇyam; mithyātvāvadhāraṇāttu pūrvaṃ tadapi grāhakamevotpannam, utpattau pramāṇa- tadabhāvayorviśeṣābhāvādityāha—apramāṇamiti sārdhena ।
yadi pramāṇāntaragṛhītaṃ mithyātvaṃ svakāryaṃ karotīti parato'prāmāṇyamucyate, parasyāpi tarhi mithyātvagrāhakānumānasambhavāt parato'prāmāṇyaṃ prasajyeta । taduktam-

LG.l: tatrāpyetad dvayaṃ vācyaṃ na tu sādharmyamātrakam ।। 88 ।।
tajjñānenaiva yo bādhaḥ sa kathaṃ vinivāryate ।। 89 ।।

LG.p: “svargayāgādi” ityāśaṅkyāha—tatreti sārdhena । bādhakapratyayakāraṇadoṣajñāne mithyātve pramāṇam, ato nāprayojakamanumānamityabhiprāyaḥ । vakṣyati ca “hetudvayaprayukte ca mithyātve” iti ।।
yathā cātmanā pratipannaṃ tathā parasyāpi pratipādanīyam, na tu sādharmyamātraṃ prayoktavyamityāha—ato yatrāpīti ।।
āgamaviruddhaṃ cedamanumānamityāha—codaneti ।।
na cāgamasya mithyātvenāgamavirodhaḥ parihartuṃ śakyate; anumānenaiva tasya mithyātvam, tanmithyātve cānumānasyāgamavirodhābhāvāt prāmāṇyamityāha— tanmithyātvāditi ।।

api ta “pratyakṣādyagatārthatvāt” iti ca pratyakṣādibhiścodanārthasyā- pratīyamānatvāditi hetvarthaḥ; na ca codanaikapramāṇasya pratyakṣādibhiragṛhyamāṇatvenā- bhāvaḥ śakyo vaktum, rasasyāpi cakṣurindriyajanitavijñānenāpratīyamānasyābhāva- prasaṅgādityāha—na cānyairiti ।।
atha tatra samānajātīyakāramajanitavijñānasaṃvādāt tasya sadbhāvaḥ, tadvede'pi samānamityāha—taddhiyaivetyardhena ।

atha yasya vādino ya evāgamaḥ pramāṇatvenābhimataḥ tasya tadāgamavirodha evodbhavanīyaḥ, na ca codanā bauddhasya pramāṇatvenābhimatetyāśaṅkyāha—mamāsiddha miti । na hi pratyaya utpanne sati vinaiva bādhakapratyayena ‘mamāyaṃ pramāṇatvena nābhimataḥ’ iti śakyaṃ vaktumityarthaḥ ।
na hyabhyupagamānabhyupagamau prāmāṇyāprāmāṇye lakṣaṇamityāha—dveṣāditi ।
atraivodāharaṇamāha—agnidāhādīti ।
tadevaṃ prāmāṇye sati vinā kāraṇena vipratipattirayuktetyāha—tasmāditi tripādyā ।
caityavandanādivākye tu pauruṣeyatvādanāptapraṇītatve sati kāraṇadoṣasadbhā- vādaprāmāṇyamityāha—bauddhāderiti tripādyā ।।

apauruṣeyatvād vedasya nāsti kāraṇadoṣajñānamityāha—vedasyetyardhena । ye tu puruṣaṃ prakalpya ‘tadvacanādāmnāyasya prāmāṇyam, anāptapraṇītatvena cāprāmāṇyam’ iti vadanti, teṣāṃ bahvī kalpanetyāha—kartṛmattva iti kalpyamantena ।

LG.l: evamādi vinā yuktyā kalpyaṃ mīmāṃsakaiḥ punaḥ ।। 98 ।।

LG.p: apauruṣeyābhyupagame tu tasya siddhatvānna kācit kalpanetyāha—mīmāṃsa- kairitītīṣyata ityantena ।

ata evaṃnūtasyāpauruṣeyatvena nirastadoṣāśaṅkasya buddhyutpādakatvenānavaga tānutpattilakṣaṇatprāmāṇyasya yadi paraṃ saṃśayaviparyayarūpamaprāmāṇyamāśaṅkyeta, tadapi “na cāgnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ” ityādibhāṣyadvayena nivāritamityāha— evaṃbhūtasyeti ।

tatraitat syāt—yadyapīdānīṃ saṃśayaviparyayau na staḥ, tathāpi kadācit syātāmityāśaṅkyāha—nirākariṣyata iti । duṣṭakāraṇārabdhe hyāśaṅkāpi syāt; anāptānupraveśaśca śabde doṣaḥ; sa ca sambandhagranthe nirākariṣyate; atastaddvāre- ṇāpyāśaṅkā na yuktetyarthaḥ ।

evaṃ sati yat pūrvaṃ pratyakṣavādinābhihitam—“nanvatathābhūtamapi” iti, tasya buddhyanutvāttetva viṣayaḥ pariśiṣyate; tasya ca “vipratiṣiddhamidam” iti bhāṣyeṇānubhavavirodhodbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam, na jātyuttaraṃ dūṣaṇamityāha—tathā satīti ।
evaṃ pratijñāduṣaṇaparaṃ bhāṣyam—“yattu laukikaṃ vacanam” iti, tadvyācaṣṭe—yathādṛṣṭārtheti । pratyayitasyendriyananyajñānamūlaṃ yadvākyaṃ tadavita- thameveti sādhyavikalatā dṛṣṭāntasya ।

evaṃ tāvat svamatena bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā paramatena bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyāsyannāha- draṣṭṭatvetyardhena । yathārthaṃ ca pratipādanam, sa eva pratyayita- śabdenocyate; tasya yadvākyaṃ tadavitathameveti sādhyavikalatā dṛṣṭāntasya ।।

evaṃ tarhi “indriyaviṣayaṃ vā” ityanarthakam, pratyayitaśabdenaiva tatsiddhe- rityāśaṅkyāha—dṛśyamānetyardhena । apratyayitasyāpi yadvākyaṃ śroturindriyaviṣayaṃ tasyāpi tathātvena sādhyavikalatetyavayavadvayena vākyadvayopalakṣaṇam । na tvavaya- vadvayopalakṣitamekaṃ vākyamityarthaḥ ।

tadetadanantaroktaṃ dūṣayitumāha—evaṃ tviti । asmatpakṣa ubhayaviśeṣaṇa- sambhave ekamudāharaṇam, tasyaikāṅgavikalatvena pratyudāharaṇadvayam—“athāpratyayi- tādanindriyaviṣayaṃ vā” iti । bhavatpakṣe tvekaikopalakṣitamudāharaṇadvayam । tatrai- kaikopalakṣaṇābhāvamātre ekaikameva pratyudāharaṇamiti sthitiḥ—“athāpratyayitāda- nindriyaviṣayaṃ vā” iti ।
tatra ko doṣa ityāha—apratyayiteti sapādaślokena ।
tathā ca parasparavyāhatagranthateti । tasmāt pūrvameva śobhanamityāha—tasmāditi tripādyā । tasmādavayavadvayopalakṣitamevedamudāharaṇaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ ।

nanu ca pratyayitatvamarthāvitathatve kāraṇamuktaṃ bhāṣye “taccetpratyayitāt” iti, tathā sati parataḥ prāmāṇyamityāśaṅkyāha—aprāmāṇyeti sārdhena । pratyayitatvena doṣābhāvādaprāmāṇyanivṛttiṃ darśayatītyarthaḥ ।
yadyavayavadvayopalakṣitamekamudāharaṇam, kathaṃ tarhi “taccetpratyayitādindriya- viṣayaṃ vā” iti vikalpārtho vāśabda ityāśaṅkyāha—samuccayārtho vāśabdaḥ pūrvasminniti ।
pratyudāharaṇe tu yo vāśabdaḥ sa vikalpenobhayoravayavayoḥ pratyudāharaṇaṃ pratipādayatīti vikalpārthamupetyāha—itaratra tu iti saśeṣārdhena ।।

pratyayitāditi kiṃ pratyakṣādiviṣayamapi vākyamasatyavādino mithyetyāha- śakye'pyasatye mithyātvamiti । indriyaviṣayaṃ vetyasya pratyudāharaṇam—“dṛṣṭaṃ satye'pyaśaktitaḥ” iti । pratyayitavacanamityayogyārthaṃ viṣaye'pramāṇamityarthaḥ ।

LG.l: yadi ṣaḍbhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ syāt sarvajñaḥ kena vāryate ।। 111 ।।
ekena tu pramāṇena sarvajño yena kalpyate ।
nūnaṃ sa cakṣuṣā sarvān rasādīn pratipadyate ।। 112 ।।

LG.p: “aśakyaṃ hi tat puruṣeṇa jñātumṛte vacanāt” iti । kecidetad bhāṣyaṃ sarvajñanirākaraṇaparatvena vyācakṣate, tān pratyāha—nāneneti । sarvajñanirākaraṇa- dvāreṇa ‘codanaiva’ ityayamaṃśaḥ sādhayitumabhipretaḥ; pratijñāsūtre ca tatsādhanama- sambaddhamityabhiprāyaḥ ।।

api ca na tāvat pratyakṣādibhirabhāvaparyantaiḥ yaḥ sarvānarthān jānāti so'nena niṣidhyate, “ṛte vacanāt” ityapavādāśrayaṇāt; na ca tannirākaraṇe kiñcit prayojanam, tatsadbhāve ‘codanaiva’ ityasyāvirodhādityāha—yadītyadhena ।

nāpi rūparasādīnatītānāgatavartamānāṃścakṣurindriyajanitavijñānena yo gṛhṇāti so'nena niṣidhyate, atitucchatvenānirākāryatvāt । tasya kathamatitucchatā ? kāraṇābhāvena tathāvidhajñānābhāvāt; na hi cakṣurindriyamevaṃvidhajñānotpādakatvena loke dṛṣṭamiti vakroktyā darśayannāha—ekena tviti ।।

atha buddhasambandhi cakṣurindriyamevaṃvidhajñānotpādakamityucyeta, tatrāpyāha— yajjātīyairiti । tadanevaṃpramāṇarūpamadhyapatitaṃ buddhasambandhi cakṣurindriyamevaṃ- vidhajñānotpādakaṃ na bhavati, cakṣuṣṭvāt, asmadādicakṣurvaṃt ।।
yatrāpyatiśayadarśanena niratiśayātiśayakalpanā, tatrāpi svaviṣayāparityāge- naiva atiśayadarśanamityāha—yatrāpyatiśaya iti ।।

LG.l: bhaviṣyati na dṛṣṭaṃ ca pratyakṣasya manāgapi ।

LG.p: nanu heyopādeyagrāhakasya vijñānasyāstyekaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhāvanā; kimucyate kāraṇānupalabdhyā kāryābhāva iti ? bhāvanājanyapratyakṣaṃ dharmādharmagrāhakatvena tairiṣṭam । yathoktam—“bhāvanāphalataḥ spaṣṭam” iti । heyopādeyavijñānaṃ caityavandanādi- vākyaprāmāṇyasiddhyarthaṃ tasyeṣṭam, na tvanyaviṣayasya । taduktam—
“heyopādeyatattavasya sābhyupāyasya vedakaḥ” iti ।

uktaṃ ca saddharme—“paśyāmyahaṃ bhikṣavo divyena cakṣuṣā sugatiṃ durgatiṃ ca” iti । divyagrahaṇaṃ carmamayacakṣurnivṛttidvāreṇa bhāvanāpratipattyarthameva tasyeṣṭa- mityāśaṅkāṃ ślokena nirākartumāha—bhaviṣyatīti । ayamabhiprāyaḥ-pramāṇāntara- pratipanne vastuni bhāvanā bhavati; na cāyamarthaḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate, bhaviṣyattvāt; nāpyanumānena tatpūrvakatvāt; na ca pratyakṣānumānābhyāmanyat pramāṇamasti ।।
evaṃ sarvajñābhāve pramāṇamabhidhāyedānīṃ tatsadbhāve pramāṇaṃ nāstītyāha— sarvajñakalpaneti ।।
ye tu sarvajñakalpanāvadapauruṣeyakalpanāpi na prāmāṇikītyāhuḥ cārvākādayaḥ tān prati tatra vailakṣaṇyamāha—sarvajño dṛśyata iti ।
nanu sarvapuruṣadarśanapratyakṣanivṛttyā nābhāvaḥ pratīyate, sarvapuruṣapratyakṣanivṛttera- gṛhyamāṇatvāt, grahaṇe vā tasyaiva grahīturasādhāraṇyaprasaṅgāt; nāpyetat pratyakṣa-

LG.l: āgamasya ca nityatve siddhe tatkalpanā vṛthā ।

LG.p: nivṛttyā, tasyāsadbhāve'pi bhāvāt mātāpitṛvyapadeśanibandhanavat । taduktam “hanta ! hato'si mātāpitṛvyapadeśanibandhanasyāpratyakṣatvāt”—itīyamanālo- citapaurvāparyasyānupāsitaguroḥ paricodanā; yato nānena pratyakṣanivṛttirabhāve pramāṇa- mucyate, api tu sarvajñasadbhāve pramāṇaṃ nāstīti sakalasya tātparyam । āsīt sarvajña ityatrāpi nāsti pramāṇam; nāsīt sarvajña ityatra tvanumānameva pramāṇam-atīto'pi kālaḥ sarvajñaśūnyaḥ, kālatvādidānīntanakālavat ।।
āgamo'pi puruṣapraṇītaḥ sarvajñasadbhāvagrāhako nāstītyāha—na ceti ।।
nāpi nityāgamagamyatvam, tatpare satyanityatvāt; atatpare ca tatrā- prāmāṇyādityāha—na cāpyevamiti ।।
siddhe cāgamasya nityatve tata eva dharmādharmau pramāsyete, kimantargaḍunā sarvajñenetyāha—āgamasyeti ।।

idānīṃ tadīyamevānumāna sadbhāve pramāṇaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati sma— yo'pīti । pramāṇāntaragocarārthapratipādake hi kṣaṇikādivākye buddhoktatvaṃ pramāṇatvena vyāptamupalabdham, idānīṃ caityavandanādivākye'pi tadupalabhyamānaṃ sādhayatītyarthaḥ ।।

LG.l: yathā ca teṣāṃ satyatvaṃ sidhyatyetena hetunā ।

LG.p: tatra hetorbuddhoktatvasyāprajojakatvaṃ nāma dūṣaṇamāha—tenāpīti । pramā- ṇāntarasaṃvādaprayuktaṃ hi kṣaṇikādivākye prāmāṇyam, na buddhoktatvādityarthaḥ ।।
kiṃ tata ityāha-yathaiveti । yadeva hi kṣaṇikādivākyeṣu pramāṇāntara- saṃvādarūpaṃ prāmāṇyasya prayojakam, tadeva caityavandanādivākyeṣūpalabhyamānaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ sādhayati; na buddhoktatvamityarthaḥ ।।

idānīmupagamya prayojakatvaṃ viruddhatāmāha—yathā ca teṣāmiti । tadevaṃ viruddhatvamudbhāvanīyam—caityavandanādivākyaṃ dharmi, pramāṇāntarānavabuddhe'rthe na pramā- ṇamiti sādhyo dharmaḥ, buddhoktitvāt, kṣaṇikādivākyavat ।।
etadeva viruddhatvaṃ pramāṇāntareṇodbhāvayati sma-aśraddheyārthasatyatvamiti ।।
satpratisādhanaścāyaṃ heturityāha—api ceti । caityavandanādivākyaṃ mithyārthamiti sādhyo dharmaḥ, atīndriyārthapratipādakatve sati puṃvākyatvāditi hetuḥ, keśolluñchanādivākyavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।

LG.l: vadedevaṃ ca yo nāma vādī prathamasaṅgataḥ ।
pratyakṣaṃ ca maduktatvaṃ tvayā sādhyā taduktatā ।
sadbhāvavāraṇe śaktaṃ ko nu taṃ kalpayiṣyati ।। 132 ।।

LG.p: idamaparaṃ viruddhatvodbhāvanam—dharmādharmātirikte'rthe prāmāṇyaṃ ca prasajyata iti । tattu “aśraddheyārthasatyatvam” ityanenaiva gatatvāt punaruktamityupekṣaṇīyam । sādhyavikalaścāyaṃ dṛṣṭānta ityāha—sāṃkhyādiṣvityardhena ।
pūrvoktasyaiva pratisādhanasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvānyatvena punarupanyāsa ityāha —alaukikārthavāditvāditi ।।
yadi vā prayojakamapi buddhoktatvaṃ caityavandanādivākyasatyatādvāreṇa sarvajñatāṃ sādhayatīti, hanta ! tarhi maduktatāpi sarvajñabhāvaṃ sādhayedityāha-vadedevamiti ।।
taddarśayati—buddhādīnāmasārvajñyamiti । buddhaḥ sarvajño na bhavatīti madīyaṃ vākyaṃ dharmi, satyamiti sādhyo dharmaḥ, maduktatvāditi hetuḥ, uṣṇo'gni- rityādivākyavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।
caityavandanādivākyeṣu ca buddhoktatvaṃ sandigdhatvādasiddham; buddhaḥ sarvajño na bhavati ityatra tu maduktatā pratyakṣeti viśeṣa iti darśayati—pratyakṣaṃ ceti ।।
yasya ca sadbhāvavāraṇaṃ prameyatvādayo'pi kartuṃ samarthāḥ, tasya sadbhāvaṃ kaḥ sādhayatītyāha—pratyakṣādyavisaṃvādīti ।।

LG.l: ya eva syādasarvajñaḥ sa sarvajñaṃ na budhyate ।। 135 ।।

LG.p: na cāṣṭakādivat sarvajñasadbhāve smaraṇaṃ pramāṇam, vicchinnamūlatvādityāha- na cāpīti । avicchinnamūlā hi smṛtiḥ pramāṇopasthāpanena pramāṇībhavati; iyaṃ tu sarvajñasmṛtirvigītā kaiścideva śākyabhikṣubhiḥ parigṛhītatvānna mūlakalpanāyālam । aṣṭakādīnāṃ tu viśeṣaṃ samastabhavadīyasmaraṇaviparyayeṇa vakṣyāmaḥ ।

idānīṃ sarvajñābhāve yuktitaḥ pramāṇamāha—sarvajña iti । bhavadbhirhi buddhaḥ sarvajño'bhīṣṭo nānyaḥ; tataśca tajjñānajñeyavijñānarahitaiḥ buddhajñānavijñeyakṣaṇika- śūnyadukhātmakatvādiviṣayajñānavarjitairatītānāgatavartamānaiḥ puruṣaiḥ sarvajñagrahaṇāsambha- vāt sarvapramāṇābhāvenābhāvaḥ pratīyata ityarthaḥ । tadayaṃ prayogārthaḥ—trikālavartinaḥ puruṣāḥ kālatraye'pi sarvajñaṃ na gṛhṇanti, tajjñānajñeyavijñānarahitatvāt, asmadā- divat, yaśca na kadācit gṛhyate, sa nāsti śaśaviṣāṇavaditi ।।
athaitadgrahaṇasiddhyarthaṃ sarvajñāntaramiṣyate, tatastasya kalpanāyāmanavasthā syāt; na caitad dṛṣṭamityāha—kalpanīyāśceti ।।
na cānavagata eva sarvajñaḥ sattāmātreṇa kvacidupayujyate; yāvat sa na vijñātastāvat tadvākyānāṃ mūlābhāvānna prāmāṇyam, itarapuruṣavākyavadityāha— sarvajña iti ।।

idānīṃ bhavatu nāma sarvajñaḥ, tathāpi tasya vītarāgasya nirvyāpāratvenānupadeśa- katvād vipraṇītā evaitāścaityavandanādideśanāḥ, vinā pratyakṣādibhiḥ pratyavekṣaṇādi- tyāha—rāgādirahita iti । tadanena buddhoktatvādityasya hetorasiddhatvamuktam ।।

LG.l: kiṃ nu buddhapraṇītāḥ syu kimu kaiścid durātmabhiḥ ।
narte tadāgamāt sidhyenna ca tenāgamo vinā ।
dṛṣṭānto'pi na tasyānyo nṛṣu kaścit pravartate ।। 142 ।।
na hi tatrāpi viśrambho daṣṭo'nena kṛto'tha vā ।। 143 ।।

LG.p: sānnidhyamātrata ityādi । ślokatraye na tirohitamivāsti ।।
evaṃ śākyasarvajñaṃ nirākṛtya saṃpratyarhatsarvaṃjña nirākartumāha—evaṃ yairiti ।।

evaṃ hyāhuḥ kṣapaṇakāḥ—svabhāvata evātītānāgatavartamānārthagrahaṇaśakta ātmā; tasya dharmādharmopāttaṃ śarīramāvaraṇam; indriyāṇyapi tasyāvṛtapradeśāḥ; na punararthagrahaṇe sa tānyapekṣate; sa yadā dharmādharmakṣayādapagataśarīrasambandhaḥ kevalo bhavatiṃ, tadāsyāvaraṇāpāye samaṃ tāvat svābhāvikamatītānāgatasūkṣmaviprakṛṣṭārthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati; ato'rhantaḥ sarvajñā iti; tadanena nirasyati sma—narta iti । atra vastunyāgamo'numānaṃ vā pramāṇaṃ syāt; na tāvadāgamaḥ, nityasya bhavadbhirevā- niṣṭatvāt; tatkṛtiśceditaretarāśrayaprasaṅgāt—na vinā āgamena tasya siddhiḥ, na ca tena vinā āgamasya prāmāṇyaṃ yataḥ । nāpyanumānam, dṛṣṭāntābhāvāt; na hyevamatiśayavān kaścit pumānupalabhyate ।

ye'pyāhurvedāntavādinaḥ—sṛṣṭyādau nitya evāgamaḥ suptapratibuddhanyāyena hiraṇyagarbhasya pratibhātaḥ; tataḥ prabhṛtyeṣā svādhyāyaparampareti, tadetadapi nirākartu- māha-nityāgamāvabodho'pīti । anayā diśetyanena kṣapaṇakanyāyo'tidiśyate ।।

LG.l: yo hyanuccaritaṃ śabdaṃ gṛhṇātyarthe'sya kā kathā ।। 147 ।।

LG.p: na tāvadanabhivyaktaśabdagrahaṇasamarthapuruṣasadbhāve'numānaṃ pramāṇam, dṛṣṭāntā- bhāvāt; nāpi hiraṇyagarbhavākyameva pramāṇam, vipralambhabhūyiṣṭhatvāt puruṣāṇām; adyatvavaccātīte'pi kāle vipralambhabhūyiṣṭhā eva puruṣā iti darśayati—sarvadā cāpīti ।।
bhavatu vā tasyāgamaviṣayaṃ jñānam; tattu svapnajñānatulyamapyāśaṅkyetetyāha— svapnādīti ।।
arhatsarvajñapakṣācca kalpanāgurutvena pāpīyānayaṃ pakṣa ityāha—puruṣātiśaya iti ।।

yadi tāvannityāgamagrahaṇarūpaṃ pratibhānamabhipretam, taccānabhivyaktaṃ śabdaṃ gṛhṇātītyāśayakalpanā, āgamasya cāpauruṣeyatvakalpanā sthitaiva; athāpi janmānta- rānubhūtasmaṇarūpaṃ pratibhānam, tathāpyaśeṣasaṃskārocchedalakṣaṇatvānmaraṇasya janmānta- rānubhūtaṃ ca smaryata ityadṛṣṭapūrvam; ‘evaṃ saḥ’ iti yadi paradveṣo'tra sarvajñapari- tyāge kāraṇamityāha—grāhyatve ceti । ubhayatrāpyadṛṣṭasāmarthyaṃ kalpanīyam । iyaṃ kalpanā mama rocate, neyam—iti pradveṣaḥ ।।
bauddhapakṣādapi pāpīyānaya pakṣa ityāha-pumāṃstāvaditi । buddhasya tāvat svātantryaṃ dharmādharmau prati, āgamasya tu caityavandanāderasvatantratā । hiraṇyagarbhastāva-

LG.l: ataśca saṃpradāye ca naikaḥ puruṣa iṣyate ।

LG.p: dāgamāddharmaṃ pratipadyate, āgamasya tu tatpratibhātatvena prāmāṇyamityanayoḥ pāratantryam ।।

idānīṃ hiraṇyagarbheṇa saha suptapratibhānasya vailakṣaṇyamāha—anekapuruṣastha- tvāditi । anekapuruṣasthatvādityanenaikasya svātantryaṃ nāstītyuktam । ekatraiva ca janmani grahaṇasmaraṇādityanenāpyetat pratipādayati-smaraṇamidam, na pratibhānam; taccopapannamekajanmanyāhitasaṃskārasyeti ।।
mīmāṃsakapakṣe'pi kathamanādau saṃsāre nāyaṃ vedo'pabhraṣṭa iti cedityā- śaṅkyāha—anyathākaraṇa ityardhena । ekapuruṣapratibhānapakṣe tu sarvameva tu saṃbhava- tītyāha—ekasyetyardhena ।।

ataścādhyayanamapi naikasmāt kartavyaṃ sambhavatpramādanidānamityāha-ataśce- tyardhena । yudhiṣṭhirakālāpabhraṃśasyaiva vedasyedānīmanekādhyetṛdhāraṇamiti cedityā- śaṅkyāha—bahava ityardhena । tadayaṃ pramāṇārthaḥ-atīto'pi kālaḥ pāratantryādhye- tṛyuktaḥ, kālatvād, idātīntanakālavat ।।
evaṃ ceti । yaduktaṃ kaiścit-yathā sarvajñakalpanā niṣpramāṇikā tathā veda- syāpauruṣeyateti, tadevamuktena nyāyena yathā sarvajñakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇaṃ nāsti, tatho-

LG.l: na hi dṛṣṭādhikaṃ kiṃcit prāmāṇye tena kalpyate ।

LG.p: ktam; vedasya tu pauruṣeyatve pramāṇaṃ vaktavyamḥ nāpauruṣeyatve, tasya dṛśyamānatvā- deva siddheḥ । evaṃ siddhe vaiṣamye yat sāmyamucyate tadetāvatā-yāvaccaityavandanādi vākyaprāmāṇyasiddhyartham “agnihotraṃ juhoti” ityevamādivākyāprāmāṇyasiddhyarthaṃ ca kalpayanti tāvadayaṃ jaiminiḥ vedaprāmāṇyasiddhyarthaṃ na kalpayatītyetāvadevātra samatvaṃ jaimineḥ paraiḥ ।।
tadetadāha-na hītyardhena ।

bodhakatvādeva prāmāṇyaṃ na cet bādhakāraṇadoṣajñānābhyāmapodyate; bhavati ca codanāto jñānam, na ca bādhaka utpadyate, puruṣābhāvena ca kāraṇadoṣā api na santi; pratyuta yo nāstītyaprāmāṇyaṃ codanāyā vadati, tasya dṛṣṭavyāghāto'dṛṣṭa- kalpanāgauravaṃ ca । bodhakatvānnirapavādaṃ prāmāṇyamuktam, tasya kartā na dṛśyate, so'dṛṣṭaḥ kalpita ityāha—aprāmāṇyanimitta iti ।
pūrvoktameva dṛṣṭahānamadṛṣṭakalpanaṃ ca spaṣṭayati-utpanna ityardhena ।।

vaktavyaśca nāstikenābhimataprāmāṇyena pratyakṣeṇa saha codanāyā viśeṣa ityāha—sādhita iti । nāstikāstāvat pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyamicchanti; yāvat tatra prāmāṇyasāmagrī doṣavirahabodhakatvalakṣaṇā, sā sakalā codanājanite vijñāne'styeva; yato na śabdasya svato doṣatvam, puruṣadvārakāśca ye doṣāstān sambandhagranthe nirākariṣyāmaḥ ।।
LG.fn: ca prāmāṇyā. mā ṣu para. cau, ananta. mu

LG.l: tasya kartā na ced dṛṣṭaḥ so'rtha ityarthakalpanā ।। 156 ।।

LG.p: “nanvaviduṣāmupadeśo nāvakalpateḥ upadiṣṭavantaśca manvādayaḥ” iti pūrvapakṣabhāṣyam । tadanena sarvajñasadbhāve'rthāpattiranumānaṃ vā pramāṇamupanyastam । arthāpattiṃ tāvadāha-upadeśo'nyatheti । yo'yamatīndriyārthapratipādaka upadeśaḥ- “caityavandanāt svargo bhavati” “aṣṭakā kartavyā” ityevamādi, tatpramāṇaṃ vacanānyathānupapattyaiva tatpraṇeturbuddhādestadarthadarśanamastītyeva pratīyate ।

anunānamāha-yadveti tripādyā । aṣṭakācaityavandanādiviṣaya upadeśo dharmī, dṛṣṭārthapūrva iti sādhyo dharmaḥ, pūrvaśabdaḥ kāraṇavācī, upadeśatvāditi hetuḥ, ubhayaprasiddhāptapraṇītopadeśavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ । dṛṣṭārthapūrvatābhāve hetupyupadeśalakṣaṇo nāstītyāha-vyatireko'sya nanvitīti । “nanvaviduṣāmupadeśo nāvakalpate” ityasya pratīkena grahaṇamupanyastam-nanviti । tadayamākṣiptānvayo na vyatirekaḥ; pakṣadharmatvaṃ ca “upadiṣṭavantaśca manvādayaḥ” ityuktam ।।

“upadeśo hi vyāmohādapi bhavati” iti siddhāntabhāṣyam, tad vyācaṣṭe anyathetyardhena । arthāpattiprayogapakṣe vyāmohādapyupadeśo ghaṭata ityanyathāpyupapatti- rdarśitā । athānumānaṃ pūrvapakṣavādinā prayuktam, tatrāpyāha-liṅgasya vyabhicāro veti । yadi tāvat pratyakṣadṛṣṭapūrvatvaṃ sādhyate, tadopadeśalakṣaṇasya vyabhicaraṇāda- naikāntikatvamāha-bālavākye'pi darśanāditi ।।
LG.fn: kye ni. ananta. kyani. cau. mu.
LG.p: athopadeśatvena vedapūrvakatvaṃ sādhyate tatrāpyāha-vedājjñātveti । pakṣaika- deśe'ṣṭakāvākye siddhasādhyatvaṃ darśitam; vedādapīti “asati vyāmohe vedādapi bhavati” ityasya pratīkena grahaṇam ।।

idānīṃ codanālaukikavākyayoḥ vailakṣaṇyapratipādanaparam “api ca pauruṣe- yād vacanādevamayaṃ puruṣo vedeti bhavati pratyayaḥ, naivamarthaḥ” iti tasyāyamarthaḥ— na laukikavākyasya bāhye'rthe prāmāṇyam; kva tarhi ? vaktṛjñāna iti । tad vikalpya dūṣayitumāha-anyatheti । vaktṛjñānapratipādanaparaṃ vā laukikaṃ vākyaṃ syāt-yaṃ yamarthaṃ pratipādayati, so'nena pratipannaḥ vivakṣāpratipādanaparaṃ vā ? na tāvad vijñānaṃ pratipādayati, vyabhicārāt; yato'nyathāpi pratipannamanyathā pratipādayanto dṛśyante laukikāḥ ।।
vivakṣāmapi vyabhicaratītyāha-bhrāntasyeti । athānyārthapratipādanavivakṣāyā- mapi pramādādanyad vākyamuccārayati ।।

evaṃ dūṣite samarthayitumāha-vaktṛdhīriti । “api ca pauruṣeyād vacanāt” ityāptavākyaviṣayamidaṃ draṣṭavyama; yenoparitanaṃ bhāṣyamanāptavākyasya vaktṛjñāne'pi viplavamāha-“viplavate khalvapi kaścit puruṣakṛtād vacanāt” iti । tenedṛśaṃ sāmarthya- mutsargāpavādarūpeṇa bhāṣyeṇa vākyadvayasyoktam । āptavākyasya vaktṛjñāne prāmāṇyam;
yato yathārthadarśanapratipādanamāptatvam, na tvayathārthadarśanam, yathādarśanaṃ ca pratipāda- nāditi । anāptavākyasya tu bāhyārthavad vaktṛjñāne'pi na prāmāṇyamastītyarthaḥ ।।

idānīṃ yathā vaktṛjñāne prāmāṇyam, tathā pratipādayitumāha—padārtheti । pratyakṣādinā tāvadarthaṃ viṣayīkaroti, tatastaṃ pratipādayituṃ vivakṣati, tatastatprati- pādanasamarthāṃ padaracanāṃ karoti, tatastasmāt padaracanātmakād vākyāt pratyeti śrotā; tadanena vivakṣādvāreṇa vaktṛjñānakāryatvaṃ padaracanātmakasya vākyasya pradarśita- mavyabhicārasiddhyartham ।।
idānīṃ tadevānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pradarśayitumāha-vivakṣāntarayuktā hīti ।।
kāryaṃ ca padaracanātmakaṃ vākyaṃ kāraṇe vaktṛjñāne pramāṇamityāha-teneti ।।
loke'pi ca vaktṛjñānaparataiva vākyasya pratīyata ityāha-āptoktikāraṇa- miti ।।

bhavatu vivakṣā yāvatparyantamarthe pratīyamāne prāmāṇyam, kimiti parityajyata ityāśaṅkyāha—tajjñānetyardhena । vaktṛjñānenāntaritatvānna bāhyārthe vākyasya prāmāṇyamityarthaḥ । kathaṃ tarhi vākyārthe prāmāṇyam, kathaṃ ca tannibandhano vyavahāraḥ

LG.l: na tu syāt tatsvabhāvatvaṃ vede vakturabhāvataḥ ।। 169 ।।

LG.p: ityāśaṅkyāha—prāmāṇyasthāpanamityardhena । yena pramāṇena viṣayīkṛtyārthaṃ pratyeti yadi tadaduṣṭakāraṇārabdhaṃ bhavati tadā tathātvamarthasya pratipadyata iti ।।

nanu vākyāt prathamamarthapratipattiḥ, tatastadarthaviṣayaṃ vaktṛjñānam; ataḥ kathaṃ vaktṛjñāne'ntarāya ityāśaṅkyāha—atha pūrvamiti । yadyapyarthaḥ prathamaṃ pratīyate tathāpi tasya tathārthatvaṃ vaktṛjñānaprāmāṇyapratipattipūrvakameva । pratipattikramamaṅgīkṛtya codyam, tadviparyayeṇa prāmāṇyakramamaṅgīkṛtya parihāraḥ ।।

idānīṃ codanālaukikavākyayoḥ vailakṣaṇyapratipādakaṃ bhāṣyam—“na veda- vākyasya mithyātve kiṃcana pramāṇamasti” iti, tad vyācaṣṭe—ato'treti । vivakṣāparatvāt pauruṣeyasya yuktaṃ yad bāhye'rthe'prāmāṇyam; vedasya tvapauruṣeyatvānna tatsādharmyaṃ yuktamiti ।।

ato vasturabhāvena ca vaktṛjñānaparatvābhāvāt padārthapratipādanadvāreṇa bhāva- nāyāmeva tātparyamityāha—tadbuddhyantaraya iti । yadi pauruṣeyatvaṃ vedasya syāt tato'sya vaktṛjñānaparaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ syāt vaktṛjñānaprāmāṇyapūrvaka eva kārye'rthe niścayaḥ syāt; na ca kārye puruṣasya prāmāṇyamastītyaprāmāṇyaṃ vedasya syāt; na tu tadasti; ato na jñānapūrvakatvamapekṣaṇīyam । ata eva kāraṇānnāyathārthateti ।

idaṃ tviha vaktavyam—kimiti bāhye'rthe vākyasya prāmāṇyaṃ nābhimatam ? pratyayastāvadutpadyate; na ca bādhakapratyayo'sti; na cāptavākyaṃ bāhyamarthaṃ vyabhi- carati । yasya tu vyabhicāraḥ, tasya vaktṛjñāne'pi prāmāṇyaṃ naiveṣṭam । atha
LG.fn: na tu syādva. cau ananta. mu.
LG.p: mata pratibandhe satyanyasyānyatra prāmāṇyam; sa kāryalakṣaṇaḥ svabhāvalakṣaṇo vā; na ca bāhye'rthe śabdasya tau; vivakṣāyāṃ tu kāryatvāt prāmāṇyamupapadyata iti । tadanu- papannam; padaṃ tāvat svabhāvakāryavarjitamapi padārthabuddhimutpādayati yogyatāvaśena cakṣurindriyamiva rūpe; vākyārthe'pi padārthebhyo'pekṣāsannidhiyogyatvena sambandharahi- tebhyaḥ pratīyata iti tadbhūtādhikaraṇe vakṣyāmaḥ । kathaṃ ca vedasya bāhyārthaprāmāṇyavā dyevaṃ brūyāt ? api ca vaktṛjñānamapyanumeyaṃ vā syāt, vākyārtho vā ? tatrānumeyatvaṃ svayameva nirākariṣyate—“na śabdārthasya sā liṅgaṃ na śabdo'syāḥ kathaṃcana” iti । nāpi vākyārthaḥ, ananvitapadārthakatvaprasaṅgāt na ca jānātipadādhyāhāraḥ, nirākāṅkṣatvaprasaṅgāt । nāpi padaracanāyārthāt pratipāditasya vākyārthatvam, pūrvo dhāvati’ ityatrāparasyāpi vākyārthatvaprasaṅgāt । bāhye cārthe vailakṣaṇyatyāgāt pramā- ṇāntaratāṃ vakṣyati—“vākyeṣvadṛṣṭeṣu” iti । vaktṛjñāne tvanumānamarthāpattirvā syāt laukikānām । api ca tadbhūtādhikaraṇe svayameva bhāvanāparatvaṃ vakṣyati । tasmādālūnaviśīrṇo'yaṃ saha vivaraṇena bhāṣyagranthaḥ ।
atra kecidāhuḥ—iṣṭamevāsya bāhye'rthe prāmāṇyam, bādhakapratyayanivṛttipara- stvayaṃ granthaḥ । taduktam—
LG.lg:
“prāmāṇyasthāpanaṃ tu syād vaktṛdhīhetusaṃbhavāt ।
arthe pūrvapratīte'pi niścayo hi tadāśrayaḥ ।।” iti
LG.p: evaṃ tu vyākhyāyamāne “taccet pratyayitāt” ityasmāt bhedopanyāso vyarthaḥ । viruddhaścāyamuparitano granthaḥ-“arthe tu vyāpāro naiva vidyate ।” tathā “abhyupetyārthaviṣayaṃ vākyavyāpāramucyate ।” iti ।।

tasmādayamarthaḥ-“nanvatathābhūtamapyarthaṃ brūyāccodanā yathā yat kiṃcana” ityatra bauddhaścārvāko vā pūrvapakṣavādī । tatra bauddhe pūrvapakṣavādini siddhāntavādinā svamatena bāhya evārthe prāmāṇyāṅgīkaraṇena laukikasya vākyasya sādhyavikalatva- muktam-“taccet pratyayitāt” iti idānīṃ tu tanmatenaiva sādhyavikalatāmāha- “api ca pauruṣeyāt” iti । tasmāt saha vivaraṇena paramatenāyaṃ bhāṣyagrantho draṣṭavyaḥ, caityavandanavākyadṛṣṭāntena ।।

LG.l: teṣāmapi hi yat kāryaṃ pūrvatra pratipāditam ।
tatra samyaktvamarthe tu vyāpāro naiva vidyate ।। 172 ।।
etasmādeva dṛṣṭānto na hi pakṣe samakṣatā ।। 175 ।।

LG.p: cārvāke tu pūrvapakṣavādinyasyaiva bhāṣyagranthasyārthāntaramāha-apramāṇatva- siddhau vetiślokadvayena । yadi svaviṣayameva caityavandanādivākyamaṅgīkṛtya dṛṣṭānta- tvenopādānam, tadā sādhyavikalatvaṃ dṛṣṭāntasyeti ślokadvayasyārthaḥ ।।

athānyaviṣayatvam, tadā siddhasādhyatetyāha—svavyāpāreti । “na tu vedavacanasya mithyātve kiṃcana pramāṇamasti” ityevamupasaṃhṛte siddhāntavādinā pūrvapakṣavādyāha-“nanu sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ laukikaṃ vacanaṃ vitathamupalabhya vacanasāmā- nyād vaidikamapi tathā syāt” iti; kasya punarlaukikasya mithyātvamabhipretam ? yadi tāvadanāptavākyasya, yuktaṃ tatra doṣasadbhāvāt; na tu vede doṣāṇāṃ sadbhāvaḥ; vākyatvaṃ tvaprayojakameva; nāpyāptavākyasya, vivakṣāviṣayatvena tasya satyatvāt ।।

api cāyameva prayogaḥ pūrvamupanyasya dūṣitaḥ kathamidānīmapūrvavadupanyasyata ityāśaṅkyāha—ajñātveti sapādena । sarvametadajānan pūrvapakṣavādī kṛtakasya mithyāhetumupasṛtya “viplavate khalvapi” iti, akṛtakasya samyaktve “na tu vedavacanasya” iti dṛṣṭāntabalena punarupanyastavān । asya dūṣaṇaparaṃ bhāṣyam— “na, anyatvāt; na hyanyasya vitathabhāve'nyasya vaitathyaṃ bhavati, anyatvādeva; na hi devadattasya śyāmatve yajñadattasya śyāmatvaṃ bhavitumarhati” iti । tasyāyamarthaḥ-na laukikavākyasādharmyeṇa vaidikasya mithyātvaṃ bhavati, vaidikādanyatvāllaukikasyeti;
taddūṣayitumāha—nānyatvāditi tripādyā । yata eva hi vaidikādanyo'yam, ata eva sādhyasamāsāmānyena sapakṣatvāt dṛṣṭāntatvam; ananyatve tu pakṣa evāyaṃ syāditi ।।

evamākṣipte satyuttarabhāṣyaṃ tāvat samarthayitumāha—tasmāditi śloka- trayeṇa । tatra prathamaṃ tāvadidameva dūṣaṇam yaduta sādhyavikalatā dṛṣṭāntasya, vivakṣāviṣayatvena sarveṣāṃ satyatvābhyupagamāt । atha bāhyārthaviṣayābhyupagamena dṛṣṭāntopādānam, tatrāpyāptavākyasya satyatvena vākyatvalakṣaṇasya hetoranaikāntika- tvam । athātīndriyārthapratipādakatve sati vākyatvādityayaṃ hetuḥ, tatra laukikamapi kiṃcid vākyamatīndriyārthapratipādakaṃ satyaṃ dṛṣṭamityanaikāntikatetyetāvat śloka- trayasyārthaḥ ।।

idānīmasminnevārthe “na, anyatvāt” ityetāvanmātraṃ bhāṣyaṃ yojayitumāha- nānyatvāditi tripādyā । yattu pūrvapakṣavādinā prayuktam—“nanu sāmānyato dṛṣṭam” iti, tasmādanyatvamudāhṛtasyocyate-tadābhāso'yamanaikāntikatvāddhetoriti । yojanāntaramāha—vipakṣaṃ vānyamabravīditi । sāmānyatodṛṣṭavipakṣādanyo'tra vipakṣaḥ hetuśūnyastasya vipakṣaḥ asya tu satye'pi vākyatvadarśanāddheturyuktaḥ— ityanaikāntikatvapradarśanametat ।।

LG.l: vivakṣāyā mṛṣārthatve na ca vākye mṛṣārthatā ।। 181 ।।

LG.p: vyākhyānāntaramāha—yadvetyardhena । visaṃvādāllokikasya mithyātvam, na tu vākyatvena; tadanena hetoraprayojakatvaṃ darśitam । vyākhyānāntaramāha—viṣaya- syāpītyardhena । vivakṣāviṣayaṃ laukikam, tatra ca satyameveti sādhyavikalatā ।।

idānīm “na hyanyasya vitathabhāve'nyasya vaitathyaṃ bhavati, anyatvādeva” itīdaṃ bhāṣyamuparitane “na, anyatvāt” ityasya vyākhyānadvaye yojayitumāha— na hyanyasyeti । naikasmin laukikavākye mṛṣārthe'nyasyāpi vaidikasya mṛṣārthatvaṃ bhavati, aprayojakatvāddhetoriti । nanu vaktṛjñānaviṣayatve tanmithyātvapakṣe'styeva vākyasya mithyātvamiti, tatrāpyāha—na hyanyasyeti । na hyanyasya vaktṛjñānasya mithyātve'nyasyāpi tatpratipādakasya vākyasya mithyātvamityarthaḥ । vivakṣāgrahaṇaṃ ca śloke vaktṛjñānopalakṣaṇārtham ।।

idānīm “na hi devadattasya śyāmatve” ityādibhāṣyam, tadvācaṣṭe— śyāmatva ityardhena । yādṛśaṃ śyāmatve sādhye puṃstvaṃ sādhāraṇānaikāntikam, gaure'pi darśanāt, tādṛśaṃ mithyātve vākyatvamityarthaḥ । “na, anyatvāt” ityasyaiva vyākhyānāntaramāha—parokterityardhena । jātyuttaradvāreṇa paraprayuktasya sādhanasya duṣṭatvamāpādayati—yadi hi sādharmyamātrādaprayojakāt mithyātvam, vaidharmyamātrā- daṣyanyatvalakṣaṇāt tathātvaṃ kimiti na bhavati ? vikalpasamasaṃjñākaścāyaṃ jātiprayogaḥ—“na, anyatvāt” iti ।।
LG.fn: sādhyānāṃ saṅgataiva. mā. sādhanātaṅga. taiva. cau. mu.
LG.p: asyaivārthāntaramāha—yadvā pramāṇamiti । naitadevam, anyasyāpi samyaktvasādhanasyānumānāntarasya bhāvāt; tatredaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ viruddhāvyabhicāritvam, anumānena vā bādhaḥ ।।

kīdṛśaṃ punastadanumānāntaram ? atrāha—codanājaniteti । buddhirdharmiṇī pramāṇamiti sādhyo dharmaḥ codānajaniteti siddhasādhyatāparihārārthaṃ viśeṣaṇam, doṣavarjitaiḥ kāraṇairjanyamānatvāditi hetuḥ, liṅgāptoktyakṣabuddhivaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ । ayaṃ buddhiśabdaḥ pratyekaṃ sambandhayitavyaḥ । nanu cānumānena prāmāṇye sādhye śabdasyānavasthā, sādhakasyāpi sādhakāntarasādhyatvāt prāmāṇyasya । taduktam
“na cānumānataḥ sādhyā śabdādīnāṃ pramāṇatā” iti ।
tasminneva sādhye hetudvayaṃ dṛṣṭāntāntaraṃ cāha—tatheti ।।
deśakālādibhedena bādhavarjanādityaheturiti cet ityāśaṅkyāha—akartṛ- katvasiddhyā cetyardhena । urasaṃharati—evamityardhena ।।
LG.LG:
pratyakṣastviti dārḍhyaṃ vā prāthamyaṃ vāpi lakṣayet ।
svarūpataḥ pramāṇatvaṃ mithyātvaṃ pararūpataḥ ।। 187 ।।187

LG.l: yathā ca tava mithyātvaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhayedidam ।

LG.p: ‘api ca laukikavacanasādharmyād vaidikamapramāṇamityanumānam pratyakṣastu vedavacane pratyayaḥ; na cānumānaṃ pratyakṣaviruddhaṃ pramāṇībhavitumarhati, ityatra bhāṣye codanājanite vijñāne pratyakṣaśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ, tadasambaddhamiva dṛśyate, yato'parokṣārtha- viṣayatvena vā vijñānasya pratyakṣatvam, arthajanyatvena vā nāparokṣatayā “jñāte tu anumānādavagacchati” iti parokṣatvābhyupagamāt, na ca tadasti prakāradvayam— śabdajanyatvāt parokṣārthaviṣayatvācceti । satyamevam; kintu gauṇavṛttyā pratyakṣa- śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ । kiṃ punaḥ pravṛtternimittamityata āha—pratyakṣastviti । nimittacatuṣṭayamanumānabādhopayogīti darśitam ।।

idānī paramatena mukhyameva pratyakṣavirodhaṃ darśayitumāha—jñānabhāvaśceti viparyayasandehayorabhāvena jñānānutpattilakṣaṇaṃ mithyātvam; sādhanavādinaḥ svayaṃprakā- śatvena prativādinaścānumeyatvena pratyakṣānumānavirodhaḥ ।।

“codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharmaḥ” ityupakrāntam; tena “tasmāccodanā/?/- kṣaṇo'rthaḥ śreyaskaraḥ” ityupasaṃhārabhāṣyamasambaddham; evaṃ tūpasaṃhartavyam— ‘tasmāccodanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharmaḥ’ iti; aśaṅkyāha—dharma itīti । tīrthāntara- parikalpitadharmatvaniṣedhena dravyakriyāguṇādīnāṃ dharmatvaṃ sādhayituṃ śreyaskaraśabdaparyāya/?/tāṃ dharmaśabdasya darśayati ।।

LG.l: tasmāt teṣveva dharmatvaṃ dharmāṇīti ca darśanāt ।

LG.p: etadeva vivṛṇoti—śreyo hīti । tatra bhāṣyam—“yo yāgamanutiṣṭhiti, ta dhārmika iti hi samācakṣate” iti । tasyāyamarthaḥ—yāgādīnanutiṣṭhan loke dhārmikaśabdenocyate, tasmādyāgādīnāmeva dharmatvamiti ।।

atra codayanti—nanvapūrvamapi tatrānumīyate; tatra yāgayogenaivāyaṃ dhārmikaśabdaḥ, na punarapūrvayogenetyatra kiṃ mānamiti; āśaṅgyāha—anyatsā- dhyamiti । laukikā hi pratyakṣasamadhigamyamevārthaṃ pratipadyante, na śāstrīyāma- pūrvanirvṛttim; laukikaścāya prayoga iti ।।

itaśca nāpūrvasya dharmatvamityāha—paśvādīnīti sapādaślokena । paśvādayo hi loke dharmaphalatvena prasiddhāḥ; citrādīnāṃ ca tāni phalāni darśayanti codanāḥ “citrayā yajeta paśukāmaḥ” ityevamādyāḥ; tasmāt teṣveva dravyakriyāguṇādiṣu dharmatvam, nāpūrvasyeti । liṅgadarśanādapyevamevārthaḥ pratīyata ityāha—dharmāṇīti ca darśanāditi । “yajñena yajñamayajanta devāḥ । tāni dharmāṇi” ityatra mantre yāgasāmānādhikaraṇyena prayogo dharmaśabdasya liṅgam । kathaṃ punarbahuvacanāntasya napuṃsakaliṅgasya dharmaśabdasya puliṅgenaikavacanāntena yajñenetyanena saha sambandha ityā- śaṅgyāha—liṅgetyardhena ।।

LG.l: prayogo dharmaśabdasya na dṛṣṭo na ca sādhanam ।
jñātuṃ sādhanabhūtaṃ vā sādhyaṃ vā nāpyato'nyathā ।। 197 ।।
utpattau vāpi paśvāderapūrvaṃ na tataḥ pṛthak ।। 199 ।।

LG.p: evaṃ dravyakriyāguṇādīnāṃ dharmatvamabhidhāyedānī tīrthāntaraparikalpitānā dharmatvaniṣedhamāda-antaḥkaraṇeti ślokadvayena । antaḥkaraṇavṛttivāsanāviśeṣa- pudgalanṛguṇāpūrveṣu sāṅkhyabauddhārhatavaiśeṣikamīmāṃsakakalpiteṣu dharmaśabdaprayogābhāvāt vidhinā ca teṣāṃ śreyassādhanatvānavagamānnāsti teṣāṃ dharmatvamiti ślokadvayasyārthaḥ ।।

itaścāpūrvasya dharmatva nāstītyāha—na ceti ślokacatuṣṭayena । taddhi kalpya- mānamapūrvaṃ phalayāgayorarthāntaraṃ vā kalpyeta tayorvā śaktiḥ । na tāvadarthāntaraṃ phale sādhanabhūtaṃ kalpyate, śrutayāgasādhanatvatyāgena aśrutāpūrvasādhanatvaprasaṅgāt; nāpi sādhyabhūtam, śrutayāgādisādhyatvatyāgenāśrutāpūrvasadhyatvasaṅgāt; nāpyubhayarūpara- hitam, asattvaprasaṅgāt । tasmādavadaśyaṃ yāgasya vā phalotpādikā śaktiḥ, ātmano vā phalopabhogyatā, phalasya vāṅkurāvasthādyapūrvaśabdenābhidhīyate; na cāyaṃ yāgavācako dharmaśabdastacchaktiṃ pratipādayati; na hi bhāvaśabdo bhāva-

LG.l: na ca tallakṣaṇā hiṃsā pratyudāharaṇaṃ katham ।। 201 ।।
yadyapi syād vidhispṛṣṭe niṣedho naiva tādṛśaḥ ।

LG.p: śaktiṃ niṣkṛṣṭāṃ pratipādayati; na hyudakāharaṇotpādakaśaktirghaṭaśabdenābhidhīyate— ityetāvān ślokacatuṣṭayasyārthaḥ ।।
evaṃ codanālakṣaṇadharmiśabdeṣu vyākhyāteṣvadhunārthaśabdavyākhyānaparaṃ bhāṣyam “ubhayamiha codanayā lakṣate” ityādi; tadvikalpa dūṣayitumāha-purastācceti ।।

yadi tāvacchyenādisādhyaḥ prāṇaviyogasādhako vyāpāro hiṃsāśabdavācyaḥ pratyudāharaṇam, na tadaikāṅgavikalatvam; tasya yadyapi niṣedhādanarthatvam, tathāpi “codaneti kriyāyāḥ pravartakaṃ vacanam” iti bhāṣye codanāśabdena pravartakaṃ vākya- muktam, na ca tallakṣaṇā hiṃsā । śyenādīnāṃ tu satyapi codanālakṣaṇatve pratiṣe- dhābhāvādanarthatvaṃ nāstītyāha—codanālakṣaṇo yaśceti ।।

idānīmabhyupagamyāpi śyenādīnāṃ niṣedham, arthatvaṃ nāstītyāha—yadyapi syāditi । loke tāvatprāṇaviyojakavyāpāre hiṃsāśabdaḥ prayujyate; sa ca yadyapi śyena eva, tadvyatirekeṇa vyāpārāntarānulabdheḥ; yadyapi ca viśeṣaśāstraviṣayamapi sāmānyaśāstraṃ pravartate, tathāpi naiva niṣedho'narthātāṃ bodhayati śyenādīnām rāgādi- lakṣaṇāyāḥ pravṛtterniṣedho'narthatāṃ bodhayati, na vidhilakṣaṇāyāḥ—iti daśame vakṣyāmaḥ ।।
LG.l: śvenādāvupadiṣṭe ca hiṃsā hīti na yujyate ।। 204 ।।
hiṃsā hi phalameteṣāṃ bhinnā tebhyaḥ svarūpataḥ ।

LG.p: “ubhayamiha codanayā lakṣyate” ityatropakrame śyenādīnāṃ ca codanālakṣaṇatva- mabhidhāyopasaṃhāre “hiṃsā hi sā, sā ca pratiṣiddhā” iti niṣedhābhidhānāt । atha śyenādisādhyaḥ prāṇaviyogabhāvako vyāpāro hiṃsāśabdenābhidhīyate, tatrāpyāha— śyenādāviti sārdhena । śyenādīnāmanarthatvaṃ pratijñāyedānīṃ tatsādhyasya prāṇa- viyogabhāvakavyāpārasya niṣiddhatvenānarthatvakathanamasambaddham, sā hi prāṇaviyogā- tmetyuktam, tadanupapannam; māraṇaṃ hiṃsāśabdenocyate, na tu maraṇam; na hi mriya- māṇam ‘hinasti’ ityucyate ; na ca tatra vidhipratiṣedhau staḥ, prayojakavyāpāra- viṣayatvāt tayoḥ; sa eva svamaraṇaphalaḥ paramaraṇaphalo vā niṣidhyate; na tu prāṇa- viyogākhyaḥ prayojyavyāpāraḥ, tatrāpravṛttatvāt । tasmādayamarthaḥ—sādhyaviśeṣāva- cchedena prayojakavyapārasyaiva hiṃsātvaṃ kathayati—prāṇaviyogāvicchinnaḥ prayojaka- vyāpāro hiṃsā, na tu svargādyavacchinnaḥ ।।

idānīm “kathaṃ punaranarthaḥ kartavyatayopadiśyate ? ” ityasyottarabhāṣyam “naiva śyenādayaḥ kartavyā vijñāyante” iti tad vikalpa dūṣayitumāha-upadeśārbhidhāna- mityardhena । yadi tāvad vidhikarmatvaniṣedhaparamidaṃ bhāṣyam “naiva śyenādayaḥ kartavyā vijñāyante”—naiva śyenādayopāya iti hi teṣāmupadeśaḥ” iti; kathamavidhīya- mānasyopadiśyamānatvam ? nanu ca dvau vidhervyāpārau—ekastāvat kāmyamānabhāvā- rthayorupāyopeyabhāvajñāpanākhyaḥ, aparo'nuṣṭhāpakatvarūpaḥ; tatra yo'dhikāravidhipramito- pāyopeyabhāvottarakālīnastadanuṣṭhāpakatvarūpaḥ prayogarūpo vidhivyāpāraḥ, so'nena bhāṣyeṇa virudhyate “naiva śyenādayaḥ kartavyā vijñāyante”;-naiva śyenādayaḥ prayojyā iti yāvat, tatra puruṣasya lipsayaiva pravṛttatvāt । uktaṃ ca “tasya lipsārthalakṣaṇā”

iti । yastu tataḥ pūrvabhāvyupāyopeyabhāvapratipādanarūpo'dhikāravidhivyāpāraḥ, tada- bhiprāyam “yo hi hiṃsitumicchet, tasyāyamabhyupāya iti hi teṣāmupadeśaḥ” iti; etad bhāṣyamupāyamātratayaiva vidhānapratipādanaparamupapadyate । etadevoparitanena bhāṣya- dvayena spaṣṭayati । “śyenenābhicaran yajeta iti hi samāmananti” iti śyenasyo- pāyamātratāṃ darśayati; “na abhicaritavyamiti” iti ca prayojyatāṃ niṣedhati । evaṃ sati niṣiddheṣu codanālakṣaṇeṣu upāyeṣvanarthatvam, aniṣiddheṣu ca jyotiṣṭo- mādiṣvarthatvamiti । yastu na puruṣārtho nāpi puruṣārthasādhanam, tasyādhikāravidhi- sahitaiḥ śrutyādibhiravagatatādarthyasyāpi prayogavidhirevānuṣṭhānaṃ prayuṅkte yathā agnī- ṣomīyādiṣu । taduktam “kratvartho hi śāstrādavagamyate” iti । tadanupapannam; na hyatra prathamamupāyopeyabhāvaḥ pratīyate, api tvanavagatopāyatvasya bhāvārthasya vidhiranu- ṣṭhānaṃ bodhayati-‘idaṃ tvaṃ kuru’ iti; yāvadadhikārahetusadbhāvamanuṣṭhāpako vidhyarthaḥ, na śrutyādivadupāyamātrapratipādakaḥ; utpattiviniyogayorapi prayogavidhireva; phaladvāreṇa tvetau vyapadeśau—ayaṃ viniyogavidhirayamutpattividhiriti, yathā “dadhnā juhoti” ityutpattividhireva viniyogavidhirityucyate । tasmādagnihotre “dadhnā juhoti” iti “agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ” iti sarvatra prayogarūpa eva vidhiḥ । taduktam—
LG.lg:
“abhidhātrī śrutirhyekā viniyoktryaparā smṛtā ।
vidhātrī ca tṛtīyoktā prayogo yannibandhanaḥ” ।। iti ।
LG.p: tasmād vidheyo bhāvārthaḥ, na ca vidhiranuṣṭhāpayati—iti citram । anavagatopāya- tvameva bhāvārthaṃ vidhiranuṣṭhāpayatītyuttarakālaṃ vidhita evāvagatopāyatvaṃ lipsati, tadā ca vidhita eva pravṛttatvāllipsaiva nānuṣṭhāpayati ।

atha yasya preraṇātmako vidhyarthaḥ, tasyaivam; kāryasvabhāve tu vidhyarthe'rthā- pravartakatvam, lipsayaiva ca pravṛttatvāt pravṛttikṣaya iti; tadayuktam , anavagato- pāyabhāvameva viṣayaṃ vidhiḥ prayuṅkte; anavagatopāyatvasya ca na lipsā pravartike- tyuktam । api ca prerake'pi vidhau yatrānyata eva pravṛttaḥ; tatra kimasau karoti ? apravṛtto hi preryate yataḥ । tasmāt suṣṭhūktam—“upadeśābhidhāna ca nāvidheye'va- kalpate” । iti ।

LG.l: sa bādhyeteha ye cāmī jyotiṣṭomādayo matāḥ ।। 207 ।।

LG.p: lipsāyāśca pravartakatve viṣayavaditikartavyatāyāmapi saiva pravartayati, seti- kartavyatākasyaiva viṣayasya phalotpattau nimittatvāt; avāntaravibhāgastvayaṃ karaṇeti- kartavyatālakṣaṇaḥ; tataśca prayogavidheruccheda evetyāha—śyenāderityardhena ।।
idānīṃ tatra virodhaṃ darśayitumāha—sarvatreti bādhyetehetyantena ।

“codaneti kriyāyāḥ pravartakaṃ vacanam” “yo hi hiṃsitumicchet tasyā- yamabhyupāya iti hi teṣāmupadeśaḥ” “na hyatra yāgāya svargakāma upadiśyate, api tu svargakāmāya yāgaḥ” ityevamādibhirupāyaiḥ prerakatvaṃ darśayati ।

syādetat—karaṇānubandhavaditikartavyatānubandhe'pi pravṛttikṣayo bhavatu, ko doṣa iti cet tatrāpyāha-ya ityādi ta ityantena । jyotiṣṭāmāderapi niṣiddhāgnī- ṣomīyasambandhādanarthatvena “ko'rthaḥ ? yo niḥśreyasāya jyodiṣṭomādiḥ” ityanu- papannamityarthaḥ । nanu bhāvārthagato vidhiḥ svargakāmādipadopāttena puruṣeṇa kāmyamāna- svargādyupāyāpekṣiṇā sambadhyamānastadapekṣitameva tāvadupāyatvamanyotpādanasya bhāvārthasya bodhayati; tatastasya svargādilipsānibandhanadṛṣṭānuṣṭhāpakatvāt pracyutaḥ sannupatayo- peyamātramanuṣṭhāpayati । tadanupapannam, svargakāmāderyāgādyavācchinnāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ niyogāvagamāt । vakṣyati ca—
“svavyāpāre hi puruṣaḥ kartṛtvena niyujyate ।” iti ।

vidhipuruṣayorhi preryaprerakalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ; tatra yāgādayo viṣayatvena saṃbadhyante, na punariṣyamāṇopāyatayā tathāpekṣaṇam; anyathā ca prerakatvavighātāt; preryapreraka- viṣayapratipattyuttarakālaṃ tu viṣayasyeṣyamāṇaṃ pratyupāyatvakalpanāt । taduktam—“na ca tenāniyujyamānaḥ phalakalpanānimittaṃ labhate ।” iti । atha prayājādigato

LG.l: dharmatvena na te'pi syuḥ hiṃsāsādhanakā hi te ।
pravṛttau vā nivṛttau vā yā śabdaśravaṇena dhīḥ ।। 210 ।।
sā codaneti sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ hṛdaye sthitam ।

LG.p: vidhiḥ karaṇopakārakāmena sambadhyamāno niyogāvagamapūrvakaṃ prayājāderāgneyādīn pratyupāyatvaṃ bodhayati; anyathā prayājāderapi vidhirviṣayopakārakāmena sambadhya- mānastadapekṣitameva viṣayaṃ prati prayājāderupāyatvaṃ bodhayet; upādānaṃ tūpakāra- lipsayaiva, yato'dhikāravidhirviṣayavaditikartavyatāyā api viṣayaṃ pratyupāyatvaṃ bodhayati । tatra prayogavidherucchedaḥ, agnīṣomīyādiṣu vānarthatvam । tadāha— na cāvidhīyamānasyetyardhena । yathā prayājāderavidhīyamānasya phalatatsādhanāṅgatvaṃ nāsti; yathoktam “na cāvihitamaḍagaṃ bhavati” iti prayogavidhirabhyupagatastatra, tathā āgneyāderapyavidhīyamānasya phalabhāvanāṃ prati karaṇatvaṃ nāstīti karaṇetikarta- vyatānubandhayoraviśeṣaḥ ।।

api ca sādhanatvenāpi vidhisaṃsparśenārthatvaṃ nāstyevetyāha—sādhanatvene- tyardhena । prāṇaviyogakāmasya duṣṭopāyaparityāgenāduṣṭopāyāpekṣāyāmaduṣṭopāyaprati- pādako'yamadhikāravidhirityarthaḥ । bhāvanākarmatvanirākaraṇamapyayuktam, anabhyupagamā- devetyāha—sādhyatvenetyardhena ।।

evaṃ dūṣitaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātumāha—tenaivamiti sārdhena । pravartakaṃ nivartakaṃ ca vākyaṃ codanāśabdenocyata ityarthaḥ । kathaṃ tarhi tadbhāṣyam “codaneti kriyāyaḥ pravartakaṃ vacanam” iti ? tatrāha—pravartaketyardhena ।।

tasmādevaṃ vyākhyāyata ityāha—tātparye hītyardhena । nivartakavākyaniṣedhapare hi tasmin bhāṣye iyamarthaśabdasya vyākhyā nopapadyata ityarthaḥ । idānīṃ tasyaiva bhāṣyagranthasyāparaṃ vyākhyānadvayamāha—arthagrahaṇalabhyamiti । arthapadāvacchinnasya dharmapadāvacchinnasya vā codanāśabdasya yo'rthaḥ tasya vā lakṣaṇamuktavānityarthaḥ ।

nanvevamapi pravartakanivartakavākyapare'pi tasmin bhāṣye naiveyamarthaśabdasya vyākhyopapadyate; yadi hi bhāvārthaviṣayo vidhiḥ vidheyasya niḥśreyasaphalatāmavaga- mayati, niṣedhavidhirniṣidhyamānasya pratyavāyaphalatām; tata iyamanarthanivṛttidvāre- ṇārthaśabdasya vyākhyāvakalpeta, na tu tadubhayamapyasti; na hyatra jyotiṣṭomādeḥ kara- ṇatvaṃ svargādervā sādhyatvaṃ kenacidabhihitam; tasya kāmamātrasambandhopādānāt dhātvarthasya ca bhāvanāmātraviśeṣaṇatvaśruteḥ । na ca vidhiḥ phalaṃ vinā vidhātumasa- marthaḥ, tasya niyojyaviṣayamātrāpekṣaṇāt । ata eṣa vākyārthaḥ-yaḥ puruṣaḥ svargādi kāmayate, sa yāgādiviśiṣṭāṃ bhāvanāṃ kuryāditi । kimarthaṃ punarasau niṣphalānuṣṭhāne pravartate iti cet, vidhistāvadevamavagamyate; yadi tu tathā na pravartate, kimatra kurmaḥ ? api ca jīvanādhikāre bhavataḥ kā vārtā ? yatra puruṣaviśeṣaṇatvenāpi svargādi na śrūyate tatra yā vidhergatiḥ, sā kāmanādhikāreṣvapi bhaviṣyati । api ca vidhiḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvamanāpādya kiṃ na vidadhātyeva, uta vidadhadapi na paryavasyatīti ? yadi tāvadādyaḥ pakṣaḥ, tata itaretarāśrayatvam; vaidhaṃ hīdaṃ phalamucyate, na ca phalaṃ vinā vidhirvidadhātīti । athāparyavasānam, tanna jānīmaḥ kimetadaparyavasānaṃ nāmeti । vidhinā saphale niṣphale vā vyāpāre puruṣaḥ pravartate—ityetāvān liṅarthaḥ । na hi pravartakatvaṃ muktvānyo vidhervyāpāra ityuktaṃ purastāt; sa ca parya- vasita eveti । atha bhāvanāyā bhāvyaniṣṭhatvāt bhavanakriyākartṛbhūtena bhāvyena vinā na paryavasyati, sannihitātmasambandhinā bhavanakriyākartṛtayaiva kamipadopāttena svargā- dinā pūryamāṇā paryavasyati; vidhipuruṣāvapi ca puruṣārthasādhake nāñjasyena

pravartete iti tadanurodhādapyeṣaiva kalpanā jyāyasīti matam, tadayuktam; bhavedeta- devam ,yadyatra pramāṇamabhaviṣyat; apekṣāmātramevaitaduktam , na tvatra pramāṇamabhi- hitam । atha pramāṇamantareṇaiva sannidhānamātreṇa svargādeḥ sādhyatvaṃ kalpyate, tato varamekapadopāttasya sannihitatarasya tat kalpitam; tasya hi tāvat sāmānyato bhāvanāviśeṣaṇatvamabhyupagatameva; kevalaṃ viśeṣasambandhaḥ kalpanīyaḥ, karmarūpatvād dhātvarthasya; uttaratra tvādita ārabhya sāmānyaviśeṣasambandhādītyalamativistareṇa । pratiṣedhādhikāre tu “brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ” ityevamādiṣu kamipadopādānamapi dūrotsāritameva । tatra narakapātaḥ phalam; taddhi hananasya vā kalpyeta nañarthasya vā ? na tāvad dvijahananasya, tatra puruṣasyāpravartyamānatvāt ; na hyavidhīyamānānāṃ phala- sambandhaḥ kvacidabhimataḥ । nāpi nañarthasya, tatra puruṣasyāpravartyamānatvāt ; na hi narakaphale vyāpāre kaścit pravartate । atha matam—pratiṣedhavidhinā rāgato hanane pravartamānastato; nivartate ; sa yadi hananasyāniṣṭaphalatāṃ nāvagacchati, tataḥ kimiti nivartate iti । uktameva tadvidhestāvadiyamavagatiḥ ; yadi na nivartate, kimatra kurma iti । yadi ca puruṣeṣvanivartamāneṣu vidheraprāmāṇyaṃ bhavati, tataḥ kalpite'pi hananasya narakapāte phale'tivṛddharāgāndho na nivartate eveti vidheraprāmāpyamaparihāryameva । tasmānna bhāvārthādhikāreṣu niḥśreyasaphalaṃ nāpi pratiṣiddhādhikāreṣu narakapātaḥ—itya- rthānarthavivekā durbhaṇa evetyāśaṅkyāha—evamitiślokadvayena । ayamarthaḥ—vidhi- stāvad bhāvanāyāṃ puruṣaṃ pravartayati; bhāvyaniṣṭhaśca bhāvakavyāpāro bhāvanā; tasyāṃ bhāvanakriyākarturbhāvyatvamiti vakṣyati—

lg.l: “nityaṃ na bhavanaṃ yasya yasya vā nityabhūtatā ।

LG.lg:
tena bhūtiṣu kartṛtvaṃ pratipannasya vastunaḥ ।
prayojakakriyāmāhuḥ bhāvanāṃ bhāvanāvidaḥ ।। “iti ।।
LG.p: vidhirapi vā puruṣārthasādhake vyāpāre puruṣeṣvapravartamāneṣvātmanaḥ pravartakatva- vigatimāśaṅkamānaḥ puruṣārtharūpameva sādhyaptākṣipan sannihitataramapi dhātvarthaṃ bhavati- kriyākartṛtvānupādanādapuruṣārthatvācca na bhāvanāyāṃ bhāvyatvenāvagamayati; svargādiṣu yaddapi kāmasambandhenopakṣīṇam, tathāpi tasya ‘svargo me bhūyāt’ ityevaṃ kāmya- mānatvena bhavatikriyākartṛtvenopādānāt puruṣārthatvācca vidhirbhāvanābhāvyatvamavagama- yanna vihanyata ityeṣā tāvatprakriyā । vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ—“jyotiṣṭomena svargakomo yajeta,” “yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta” “brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ” ityeva- mādiṣu vākyeṣu preraṇāpratipattyuttarakālaṃ kāmyamānopāttaduritakṣayanarakapātadayaḥ sādhyatvena pratīyante; na ca tatra bādhaḥ kāraṇadoṣajñānaṃ vā kadācidudeti । kiṃnibandhanā punariyaṃ pratipattiriti cet; yadanantaramutpadyate, tadevāsya nibandhanam; evaṃvidhavākyānantaraṃ ceyamutpadyate; tasmādidameva kāraṇamiti । tasmād bhāvanārtha- vidhirvidheyārthatāmavagamayati, niṣedhavidhiśca niṣedhyasyānarthatāmiti ।

evamarthaśabdasyārthaṃ vyākhyāya bhāṣyaṃ yojayitumāha—tasmādubhayamiti । “ubhayamiha codanayā lakṣyate” vidheyaṃ niṣedhyaṃ ca; tatra vidheyasyeṣṭasādhanatvā- darthatvama, niṣedhyasya cāniṣṭaphalatvādanarthatvāmiti ।।

evaṃ tarhīdaṃ bhāṣyamasambaddham—“ko'narthaḥ ? yaḥ pratyavāyāya śyenādīḥ” ityādi । evaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ syāt ‘ko'narthaḥ ? yaḥ pratyavāyāya brahmahattyādi ityā- śaṅkyāha—śyenādīnāmiti । śyenādisādhye prāṇaviyogabhāvake vyāpāre hiṃsā- śabdavācye vidhisaṃsparśabhrāntyapanayanārthaṃ lakṣaṇayā śyenādiśabdaḥ prayukta iti—

LG.l: hiṃsā hīti ca yaccāpi brūte nābhicarediti ।

LG.p: “śyenādīnāṃ vidheyatvādiṣṭasyāpi ca sādhanāta” । ityetena śyenaśabdasya mukhyārthaparityāge kāraṇamuktam ।

imaṃ cārthamuparitanena bhāṣyagranthena svayameva bhāṣyakāraḥ spaṣṭayatītyāha— pratiṣiddheti ślokadvayena । śyenādīsvarūpe'narthatvena pratijñāte “hiṃsā hi sā, sā ca pratiṣiddhā” “nābhicaritavyam” iti ca sarvamidaṃ prāṇaviyogabhāvakasya vyāpārasya hiṃsāśabdavācyasya syāditi ।

idānīṃ vidhāyakavyāpārāṅkīkāreṇaivādita evārabhya bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe— yadātviti । bhavatu vidhāyakameva vākyaṃ codanā, tathāpīdaṃ bhāṣyamevaṃ vyākhyāyate— “ubhayamiha codanayā lakṣyate” । sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ cetyarthaḥ ।

sādhyāṃśasyāvidheyatvāt kathaṃ codanālakṣaṇatvam, vidheyatve vā kathamanarthatva- mityāśaṅkyāha—sādhyeti tripādyā । svargakāmasya dhātvarthāparicchinnabhāvanākarta- vyatāpratipattyutarakālaṃ kāmyamānadhātvarthayoryā sādhyasādhanabhāvāvagatiḥ tadabhiprāya- midaṃ codanālakṣaṇatvamubhayoriti ।
sādhyamapi dvividhamartho'narthaścetyāha—dvividhamiti sapādaślokena । pratiṣe- dhamanatikramya yadupabhujyate so'rthaḥ, pratiṣedhātikrameṇa tu yadupabhujyate so'narthaḥ iti ।

LG.l: tena sāmānyataḥ prāpto vidhinā ca nivāritaḥ ।। 223 ।।

LG.p:
śyenasādhyāyā hiṃsāyāḥ vihitatvena pratiṣedhābhāvāt kathaṃ tadavāptiḥ prati- ṣedhātikrameṇetyāśaṅkyāha—phalāṃśa iti । lipsayaiva pravṛttatvānna sādhyāṃśe vidhiḥ prerayati । vakṣyati ca bhāṣyākāraḥ—“jānātyevāsau mayaitat kartavyamiti; upāyaṃ tu na veda; yathā svargakāmamuddiśya” iti । jaiminirapyāha—“tasya lipsārthalakṣaṇā” iti ।
tataścāvihitatvādasti pratiṣedhaśāstrasyāvarasa ityāha—tena sāmānyata iti ।
śyenasya tu satyapyanarthahetutve niṣedhabhāvādanarthatvaṃ nāstītyāha—anartheti ।
“kathaṃ punarasāvanarthaḥ kartavyatayopadiśyate” iti codyabhāṣyam, tasyābhi- prāyamāha—paristviti । paraścodyavādyevaṃ manyate—“ubhayamiha codanayā lakṣyate” ityanena bhāṣyeṇa sādhanavat sādhyasyāpi codanalakṣaṇatvamabhidadhatā vidheyatvamevā- mihitam, bhāvanāntaḥpātitvād vā phalasyeti matvā anarthatvamākṣipati smetyarthaḥ ।
idānīṃ phalavidhidvāreṇa codye kṛte tasyāpi vidhiyatvādākṣipaditi para- codyāvasare śyenādīnāmavidheyatvapratipādanaparam—“naiva śyenādayaḥ kartavyā vijñā- yante” ityuttarabhāṣyamasambaddham, “teṣāmupadeśaḥ” iti cānena viruddham, uktena prakāreṇa vastuto'pyanupapadyamānam—āśaṅkya “naiva” ityetāvad vicchidya vyācaṣṭe—naivetyardhena । naiva phalaṃ vidhīyata ityarthaḥ ।। nāntaṃmata. mā. mākṣipet. mā. tasyāvidheyatvamākṣipaditi. mā. viruddhatvamuktena. mā.
kiṃ vidheyamidānīṃ syādāha śyenādayastviti ।
praśnāpākaraṇe cātra tavyo vidhavivakṣayā ।। 227 ।।
prayukto na tu sādhye'rthe dvaye'pyanupayogataḥ ।
anarthasyāpi sādhyatvamavidheyasya hīṣyate ।। 228 ।।
sādhyatvarahite ceṣṭā vidheye nityamarthatā ।
śatuśca lakṣaṇārthatvaṃ teṣāṃ cāpyupadeśanam ।। 229 ।।
uparitanaṃ tu bhāṣyaṃ śyenādīnāṃ vidheyatvapratipādanaparamityāha—kimitya- rdhena । idānī yadyapi ca tavyapratyayaḥ karmaṇi vidhau ca smaryate, tathāpi “śyenādyaḥ kartavyā vijñāyante” ityatra vidhivivakṣayā prayujyata ityāha-praśnāpākaraṇa iti । phalasya vidhiviṣayatve nirākṛte kiṃ vidheyamiti vidhiviṣayapraśnāpākaraṇārtha eva tavyapratyayo'tra vidhivivakṣayā prayukta iti gamyate; na punaḥ sādhye karmaṇi prayuktaḥ, praśnenāsambandhāt, arthānarthatvayoranupayogācca ।
idānīṃ yathā arthatvānarthatvayoranupayogastathā darśayati—anarthasyāpiti । arthatvapratipādanārthaṃ vā śyenādīnāṃ karmatvamabhidhīyeta, anarthatvaparihārārthaṃ vā ? na ca tadubhayamapyatropayujyate, tayorvidhipratiṣedhādhīnatvāt; satyapi sādhyatve vidhirahite pratiṣedhākrānte hiṃsādāvanarthatvadarśanāt; vināpi sādhyatvena vidheyeṣu jyotiṣṭo- mādiṣvarthatvasiddheḥ ।
bhāṣyakārasyāpi caitadevābhimatamityāha—śatuśceti । “abhicaran” iti śatuḥ “lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ” iti puruṣalakṣaṇārthatvam “yo hi hiṃsitu- miccheta”, iti vadana—“teṣāmupadeśaḥ” iti ca vadan bhāṣyakāraḥ sphuṭaṃ karoti karaṇāṃśasya vidheyatvam; anyathā hyapadeśavacanaṃ nāvakalpata iti ।
idaṃ vārtikakārīyaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ samarthanaṃ ca sarvamevālūnaviśīrṇam । tathā hyayaṃ dūṣaṇamārgo'tra kṛtaḥ—vidhāyakaṃ vākyaṃ codanāśabdenoktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa “codaneti samarpyate. mā. omitted kartavyāḥ. mā. śakṛt. mā. thāpyupa. mā.
kriyāyāḥ pravartakaṃ vacanam” ityatra, na niṣedhakavacanam; na ca vidhāyakavākyalakṣaṇā brahmahatyādayaḥ; tenārthapadasya vyāvartyaṃ nāstīti । tadanupapannam; satyaṃ vidhireva codanocyate; bhāvārthādhikāranniṣedhādhikāre'pi sa eva pramāṇam, viṣayamātraṃ tu bhidyate; “yajeta svargakāmaḥ” ityatra svargakāmo bhāvārthe niyujyate, “brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ” ityatra tu rāgato hananāvacchinnāyāṃ bhāvānāyāṃ pravartamāno nañarthāvacchi- nnāyāṃ bhāvānāyāṃ niyujyate; na tu niṣedhādhikāre nañaḥ prāmāṇyam, bhāvārthavadviṣaya- koṭinikṣepāt । nanvevamapi nānarthasya codanālakṣaṇatvam; hananādayaścānarthāḥ । ucyate—nañarthaviṣaya eva vidhiḥ pratīyamāno hananasyāpyaniṣṭaphalatāmavagamayati yathā bhāvārthaviṣayo'vagamyamāno niyojyaviśeṣaṇasya svargādeḥ sādhyatām । nanu “brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ” ityatra niyoganiyojyaviṣayaśravaṇānnairākāṅkṣye sati kalpyamāno narakapātaḥ puruṣabuddhiprabhava eva syāt । evaṃ tarhi “yajeta svargakāmaḥ” ityatrāpi niyoganiyojyaviṣayaśravaṇānnairākāṅkṣye sati niyojyaviśeṣaṇasya sādhya- tvakalpanā puruṣabuddhiprabhavaiva syāt; yato niyojyaviśeṣaṇasya svargādi bhāvārthasādhyatā- mapratipadyamānameva jīvanavanniyojyaṃ viśeṣayituṃ śaknotyeva । nāpi bhāvārthasya sādhyākāṅkṣāyāṃ sannihitatvānniyojyaviśeṣaṇasya sādhyatvam, jīvanasyāpi sādhya- tvaprasaṅgāt । athāsiddhasyeṣyamāṇatvenopāttasyaitalloke dṛṣṭam “harītakīṃ bhakṣayed virekakāmaḥ” ityādau; pratipādyamānameva jīvanavat; niyojyajīvanaṃ tu siddham । tadanupapannam, sarvatra nijyojyaviśeṣaṇasya siddhatvāt; jīvanādhikāre ca sannihita- syāyogyatvāt sādhyāntaraṃ kalpayatu bhavān । atha tatra niyogārtha eva sādhyaḥ; sakāmādhikāreṣvapyaviśiṣṭa evāyamartha iti cet; na tarhi svargādeḥ sādhyatvam, jīvanavat kevalādhikārahetutvāt । api ca na tāvat bhāvārtha eva dvayamutpādayati, vākyārthatvenānvitābhidhānena viṣayaviṣayibhāvena ca tasya vidhyarthaniṣpādakatvāt; ubhayaparatve ca bhāvārthasyaikasmin padagrāme vākyārthadvayaprasaṅgāt । nāpi bhāvārtha- vadavākyārthatvaprasaṅgāt; svargasyaiveṣyamāṇasyānanyaniṣṭhasya cotpadyamānasya vākyārtha- tvaprasaṅgāt । nāpi bhāvārtha eva svargādyutpattimavāntaravyāpārīkṛtya kāryaṃ niṣpāda- yati; kāryaniṣpattestarhi pūrva svargādyutpatyā bhavitavyam; bhāvārthānantaram’ kālāntare bhāvanārthavat. mā. māṇa utpannopātta. mā.
vā ? na tāvadanantaram, putrāderadarśanāt; nāpi kālāntare, bhāvārthasya kṣaṇika- tvena tadānīmabhāvāt, vidhyarthātiriktāpūrvānabhyupagamācca । api ca bhāvārthasādhye niyogaphale kiṃ yugapaduta krameṇeti । na tāvad yugapat, ubhayatra vyāpārāyogāt samapradhānatvaprasaṅgācca । atha kramapakṣaḥ, tatrāpi kiṃ niyogasiddhiḥ phalasyāvāntara- vyāpāraḥ, uta phalasiddhirniyogasyeti ? yadi prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ, tadā naiva lipsayā viṣaye pravṛttiḥ; api tu vidhita eva । atha phalasiddhirniyogasyāvāntaravyāpāraḥ, tadānuṣṭhanānantanaraṃ phalasya darśanaṃ syāta; niyogasyāniṣpannatvāt, apūrvānabhyupa- gamācca । na ca śābdī sirddhardvayasya, abhāvāt । tasmānna kāmādhikāre phalasya sādhyatvam । atha bhāvārthaviṣayo vidhiḥ niyojyaviśeṣaṇasya bhāvārthasādhyatāmanā- pādya na paryavasyatyeveti, hanta tarhi “brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ” ityatrāpi nañarthaviṣayo vidhiḥ hananasyāniṣṭaphalatāmanāpādya na paryavasyatyeveti । evaṃ samāne sati yaḥ svargasya sādhyatāṃ kalpayati, sa na narakapātasyetyetadapi durbhaṇam । api ca vārtikakārasyedaṃ darśanam niṣedhavidhau viparyaye narakapāta eva phalamiti । taduktam—
“niṣedhebhyo niṣedhyānāmanārthatvena nirṇayaḥ ।” iti ।
tasmād vidhireva codanocyatāṃ tallakṣaṇāveva tvarthānarthāviti ।।
yadapi samarthanamuktaṃ vidhiniṣedhau dvāvapi codanāśabdavācyau; tatra vidhi- lakṣaṇatvaṃ brahmahatyādīnāṃ mā bhūt, niṣedhalakṣaṇāstu bhaviṣyantīti; tadayuktam; yato vidhireva codanā; niṣedhādhikāre taveda pramāṇam; brahmahatyādayo'pi talla- kṣaṇā evetyuktam ।
idamaparaṃ samarthanam—bhavatu vidhireva codanā; tathāpīdaṃ bhāṣyamevaṃ neyam—“ubhayamiha codanayā lakṣyate” sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca; sādhyamapi dvividham artho'narthaśceti; jyotiṣṭomādisādhyaḥ svargādyarthaḥ śyenādināṃ tu yat sādhyaṃ hiṃsātmakaṃ so'nartha iti । etadapyasamañjasam । tathāhi—kā punariyaṃ hiṃsā nāma ? yadi prāṇaviyogaḥ, tasya prayojyavyāpāratvena pratiṣedhasambandhābhāvānnānartha- tvam । atha tadutpādako vyāpāraḥ, sa tarhi śyena eva; tasyānarthatve sādhanasyai- vānarthatvam । atha prāṇaviyogabhāvakaḥ karotyartho hiṃsā, sa ca śyenasādhyaḥ, tata- gasya niṣpanna. mā. syāniṣphalatā. mā.
bruvan sphuṭīkarotīṣṭamupadeśo hi nānyathā ।
vidhitvamādiśabdāt syāditikartavyatāsvapi ।। 230 ।।
ścāyamarthaḥ—yaḥ prāṇaviyogaṃ kartumicchet, sa śyenena kuryāditi; sa eva prāṇaviyogāvacchinnaḥ karotyartho niyojyaviśeṣaṇam, sa eva śyenāvacchinno vidhe- rviṣaya iti prāṇaviyogāvacchinnasya ca pratiṣedhādanarthatvam “na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni” iti । tadanupapannam prāṇaviyogāvacchinnānāṃ puruṣasyāpravṛtterapratiṣedhāt; anubandhadvayāvacchinna eva bhāvārthe puruṣaḥ pravartate nivartate vā; phalānubandhastu sarvadecchāviṣaya eva, na tu tatra pravṛttirlipsayā vidhinā vā; upāya eva hi tau pravartakāvagatānavagatabhedena; tasmāt śyenādāvitikartavyatānubandhavat karaṇānu- bandhe'pi vaidhī pravṛttirityataḥ śyenādau na kasyācidanarthatvam; brahmahattyādaya eva tvanarthatvenārthapadavyāvartyāḥ । taduktam—
“tasmādubhayamityatra vidheyapratiṣedhyayoḥ ।
yāgādibrahmahatyādivargayoḥ syānnidarśanam ।।” iti ।
śyenādīnāṃ tu na sākṣānnāpyupacāreṇa nāpi tatphalasyānarthatvamiti tasyānarthatvaprati- pādanaparam—“śyeno vajra iṣuḥ” ityevamādi bhāṣyamupekṣaṇīyam । taduktam—
“gurorapyavaliptasya kāryākāryamajānataḥ ।
utpathapratipannasya parityāgo vidhīyate ।।” iti ।
“śyenādīnāṃ vidheyatvādiṣṭasyāpi ca sādhanāt ।
upacārādanarthatvaṃ phaladvāreṇa varṇyate ।।”—
iti vyakhyānāntaraṃ tvanabhipretameva bhāṣyagamanikāmātreṇoktamiti kṛtamativistareṇa, prakṛtamanusarāmaḥ ।।
“śyenādayaḥ kartavyā vijñāyante” ityatra ādiśabdena karaṇavaditikarta- vyatāyā vidhisaṃsparśena pratiṣedhāviṣayatvaṃ darśayati bhāṣyakāraḥ । tadabhiprāyaṃ vyācaṣṭe—vidhitvamiti । omitted nivartate. mā. tāvagatāyāḥ. mā. dhādaviṣaya. mā. tadayaṃ pratyācaṣṭhe. mā.

aviśeṣeṇa yacchāstraṃ śirovaditi cotaram ।

viṣaye'syāḥ phalaṃ yādṛk pretya kartustathāvidham ।। 235 ।।
yastu sāṅkhyaḥ śabdapramāṇānabhijño bāhyahiṃsāvadasyāpi niṣedhamāha, tasya “aviśeṣeṇa yacchāstram” “śirovat” iti cotaradvayaṃ dātavyamityāha—aṃśa- dvaye'pīti । “aviśeṣeṇa yacchāstram” ityanena padāhavanīyanyāyena sāmānya- viśeṣabādhaṃ darśayati; “śirovat” ityanenāpi śavapratiṣedhaśāstrasya “nāraṃ spṛṣṭvāsthi sasneṃha savāsā jalamāviśet” iti; tasya vidhiśāstreṇa “puruṣaśīrṣa- mupadadhāti” ityenena bādhaḥ ।
nāpi pratyakṣādinā tatrānarthatvaṃ pratīyata ityāha—niṣedheneti sārdhena ।।
nāpi bāhyahiṃsāvad vicikitsābalenātrānarthatvam, śāstrānusāritvena vicikitsāyā evābhāvādityāha—bāhyo'pityardhena ।
nāpi hiṃsyamānaduḥkhitvadarśanena kartṛduḥkhānumānam, pratyakṣavirodhādi- tyāha—hiṃsyamānasyeti ।
idānīṃ sāṅkhyoktameva prayogaduṣaṇāyopanyasyati—viṣaye'syā iti । vimatyadhikaraṇabhāvā hiṃsā dharmiṇī, viṣayaphalatulyaṃ dadātīti sādhyo dharmaḥ ; kriyāviśeṣatvāditi hetuḥ; śāstroktadānavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ । dvaye tu yā nāma. cau, ananta. mu. pramāṇatā. ananta. mu. duḥkhatvam. mā. tadviparyataḥ cau. ananta. mu. viṣayo'syāḥ. cau. mu. balenātranārtha. mā.

idānīmabhyupagamyaikāntikatvaṃ viruddhatāmāpādayati—viruddheti । hiṃsā vidhigamyamaduḥkhātmakaṃ phalaṃ pretya karturdiśati, kriyāviśeṣatvācchastroktadānava- dityarthaḥ ।
sādhyavikalatvena dṛṣṭāntamapi dūṣayitumāha—na ca yeti । dāturamṛtatvaṃ phalam, saṃpradānasya tu sukhalavaprāptiḥ phalamityarthaḥ ।
api ca—saṃpradānaṃ ca dāne te viṣayaḥ karma hiṃsane ।। vaiṣabhyamiti । ayamabhiprāyaḥ—viṣayaphalatulyaphalaṃ dadātītyatra karmapratipādako vā viṣayaśabdaḥ, saṃpradānakarmapratipādako vā ? tatrobhayapratipādakatvamabhipretaṃ bhavataḥ; yato dāne saṃpradānaṃ viṣayaḥ, pradeyasya hiraṇyādeḥ phalātmatābhāvāt; hiṃsāyāṃ tu karma viṣayaḥ ; yataḥ tasyaiva duḥkhātmakaṃ phalam; tadetasmin prayoge ubhayaparatvaṃ viruddhamiti ।
athaitaddoṣaparijihīrṣayā agnīṣomīyādihiṃsāyā api devatārūpaṃ saṃpradāna- meva viṣayaḥ, tatrāpyabhimatasādhyāṅgavirodhinī pratijñetyāha—saṃpradānaṃ tviti । dāvastutenarhedṛṣṭho....yate. mā. pakṣastvetadviruddhatā. cau. mu, pakṣe tvetadviruddhatā. ananta. mu. matam. cau. mu. naṃ surāpānādiviṣayam. mā.
