tasya nādharmayogaḥ syāt pūrvoktā yadi kalpanā ।
tasmādanugrahaṃ pīḍāṃ tadabhāvamapāsya ca ।। 248 ।।
dharmādharmārthibhirnityaṃ mṛgyau vidhiniṣedhakau ।
kvacidasyā niṣiddhatvāta śaktiḥ śāstreṇa bodhitā ।। 249 ।।
nanvadharmatvenābhigamyasya pīḍāmutpādayatyevetyāśaṅkyāha pīḍātaśceti ।
aśāstrajñasya tvevamādipadārthakaraṇe citodvego'pi nāstītyāha—evamādā- viti ।
prakṛtamupasaṃharati—tasmāditi ।
sāṅkhyanāyakamādhavastvāha—vihāyānumānādīn vidhipratiṣedhatvānibandhana- tvameva dharmādharmayoravalambyāgnīṣomīyādiṣvadharmatāmāha—kvaciditi ślokatrayeṇa । ayamarthaḥ—satyaṃ vidhipratiṣedhanibandhanāveva dharmādharmau; tau tu vidhipratiṣedhau tayoriṣṭāniṣṭaśaktijñāpakau, na punaḥ kārakau; tataḥ kimiti cet, idaṃ tato bhavati—hiṃsā nāma tāvadekā vyaktistrailokye'pi; tasyāśca kvacilloke brahmahattyā- diṣu “na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni” iti pratiṣedhādaniṣṭasādhanatvaśaktiravagamitā; na ca pratihatā sedānīm; vidheyeṣvagnīṣomīyādiṣu hiṃsāyā aviśeṣānnāpagacchati; na hi teṣu vidheḥ aniṣṭasādhanatvāvagame agnīṣomīyādiṣu brahmahattyādiṣu vā kaścid viśeṣaḥ; tatra yadi nāmāgnīṣomīyādiṣu vidhiraparaḥ pratīyate kiṃ tāvatā pūrvapratimā śaktirapagacchati ? na hi vidheḥ avagatāniṣṭasādhanaśaktyapagame kaccid vyāpāraḥ, tatra vidhitaḥ śreyassādhanatvāvagamāt । ataḥ sarvaśāstrānusārādeva hiṃsādīnāma- dharmatvaṃ kalpyate, na punaranumānata iti sthitamagnīṣomīyādiṣvadharmatvam ।
pratyavāyanimittatvaṃ vidhānānnāpagacchati ।
śāstreṇa na hi śaktināmāvāpodvāpanakriyāḥ ।। 250 ।।
vidyamānā hi kathyante śaktayo dravyakarmaṇām ।
tadeva cedaṃ karmeti śāstramevānudhāvatā ।। 251 ।।
hiṃsādīnāmadharmatvaṃ kalpyate nānumānataḥ ।
evaṃ ye nipuṇaṃ prāhustairapyetat parikṣyatām ।। 252 ।।
surāpānādibhiḥ śūdraḥ kiṃ yāti narakaṃ kṛtaiḥ ।
vaiśyastomena vā kiṃ syād viprarājanyayoḥ phalam ।। 253 ।।
pañcamyāmiṣṭikaraṇānmadhyāhne cāgnihotrataḥ ।
tasmād yad yādṛśaṃ karma yatphalotpattiśaktikam ।। 254 ।।
śāstreṇa gamyate tasya tādṛśasyaiva tat phalam ।
hiṃsā cāṃśadvayādanyā yā tasyāḥ pratiṣedhajam ।। 255 ।।
pratyavāyārthatājñānaṃ vidhinānyatra vāryate ।
jñānameva tu śaktīnāṃ nāvāpodvāpanakriyāḥ ।। 256 ।।
evaṃ codite sati atiprasaṅgāpādanadvāreṇa taddūṣaṇamāha—evamiti ślokadvayena । viprakartṛkasyā surāpānasya niṣiddhatvenāvadhāritā narakotpādikā śaktiḥ śūdrakartṛke'pi nāpagacchati; tathā vaiśyakartṛkasya vaiśyastomasya vihitatvenādhāritā svargotpādikā śaktiḥ viprarājanyakartṛke'pi nāpagacchati; paurṇamāsyamāvāsyā- kālaviśiṣṭasya darśapūrṇamāsasya vihitatvenāvadhāritā svargotpādikā śaktiḥ pañcamyā- mapi nāpagacchatītyādi; tatraivaṃ dūṣite satyavaśyamevaṃ parihāro vaktavya ityāha —tasmāditi ।
kimevaṃ satītyāha—
hiṃsā ceti । niṣedhaśāstraṃ ca karaṇetikartavyatāvyati- riktāyāḥ pratyavāyotpadikāṃ śaktiṃ bodhayati; tasyā eva tu karaṇetikartavyatāyāṃ vidhiśāstreṇa bādhitatvānna jñāpayatītyarthaḥ । yat punaridamuktam—“śāstreṇa na hi śaktīnāmāvāpodvāpanakriyāḥ” iti, satyam; tadeva tu jñāpakatvaṃ viṣayabhedenetyāha —jñānameveti । ttatve vidhinā nāpagacchati, cau, ananta, mu. kathyate. cau, ananta. mu. bādhyate. mā. ca. cau, ananta. mu. varṇakartṛkasya. mā.
kriyante śāstratastāstu kriyābhede vyavasthitāḥ ।
vyavasthāḥ śaktibhedānāṃ dṛṣṭartheṣvapi karmasu ।। 257 ।।
abhinnatve'pi dṛśyante bhujeḥ svasthātureṣviva ।
rūpābhede'pi hiṃmādeḥ bhedo'ṅgānaṅgahetukaḥ ।। 258 ।।
tathāpyekaphalatvaṃ cet kriyātvāt sarvasaṅkaraḥ ।
yajitvādyaviśeṣācca citādiphalatulyatā ।। 259 ।।
bhedāt tatra vyavasthā cedihāpyevaṃ bhaviṣyati ।
vidhīnāṃ cāpi sarveṣāṃ sākṣāda vyavahito'pi vā ।। 260 ।।
puruṣārthaḥ phalaṃ tena nānartho'pi pratīyate ।
na ceṣu śrūyate'nartho niṣedhānna ca kalpyate ।। 261 ।।
ekasyāpi karmaṇaḥ śaktiviśeṣāṇāṃ vyavasthā dṛśyata evetyāha—vyavasthā iti । yathaikameva dadhibhojanaṃ pitaśleṣmopahatena kriyamāṇamanārogyāya, vātulena tu kriyamāṇaṃ śāntaye ।
yattviduktam—“tadevaṃ cedaṃ karma” iti, tatrāpyaha—rūpābhede'pī- tyardhena ।।
evaṃ bhede satyapi yadi hiṃsārūpakriyaikyamabhyupagamya pratyavāyotpādakatva- mucyate, tadā kriyārūpatayaikyāt svargotpādakatvamapi syāta; tadāha— tathāpīti ।।
athaikye satyavacchedamaṅgīkṛtya parihārastatra, tathehāpi bhaviṣyatītyāha— bhedādityardhena । api ca puruṣārthaparyavasāyitvād vidheḥ tadviśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyā- manarthasyāvasara eva nāstītyāha—vidhīnāmiti ।
na cātrānarthaḥ phalatvena śrūyate, nāpi kalpyata ityāha—na cetyardhena ।। jñāyante. cau, ananta. mu. bhedavyava. cau, ananta. mu. tureṣvapi. cau, ananta. mu. ṅgakāritaḥ. cau, ananta. mu. vāpi. cau, ananta. mu. nānartho'taḥ. cau, ananta. mu. niṣedhyānna. mā.
na ca prakaraṇasthatvāt puruṣārthaḥ phalaṃ bhavet ।
karmopakāraḥ kalpyastu dṛṣṭo'dṛṣṭo'pi vā tataḥ ।। 262 ।।
kalpanāvasarastatra nānarthasyānapekṣaṇāt ।
kratvarthaścāpi saṃskāraḥ paśonārādupakriyā ।। 263 ।।
dṛṣṭaiva tvavadānānāṃ niṣpatiḥ kratvapekṣitā ।
abhicāre'pyupāyasthā hiṃsā nārdhama iṣyate ।। 264 ।।
tasmādanaṅgabhūtāyāṃ hiṃsāyāmetaducyate ।
uddeśācca phalatvena śyenādau na vidhīyate ।। 265 ।।
bhāvanāvidhirapyeṣa phalāṃśād vinivartate ।
ataḥ svato na dharmatvaṃ śyenādernāpyadharmatā ।। 266 ।।
api ca niradhikārasya adhikārāntarasannidhau śravaṇāt tādarthyenaiva bhavati- vyam, kutastatrānarthagandho'pītyāha—na ceti sārdhena ।
kratvarthatāpi śeṣabhūtapaśusaṃskārakatvena tatrāpyapekṣitāvadānaniṣpattisamarpaka- tvenetyāha—kratvarthaśceti ।
tasmādavasthitametat—aṃśadvayagatāyā vihitatvenāpratiṣedhānnānarthatvam; ataśca śyene'pi codakaprāptāyāṃ naivādharmatvam; śyenasādhyāyā hiṃsāyāḥ vidhi- saṃsparśābhāvena pratiṣiddhatvādadharmatvamityāha—abhicāre'pīti ।
uktameva phalāṃśasyāvidheyatvaṃ smārayati—uddeśācceti ।
śyenādīnāṃ tu na svato dharmatvam, pāramparyeṇāniṣṭaphalatvāt; nāpyadharma- tvam, pratiṣedhābhāvāt; aupacārikastu tatrānarthaśabdaprayoga ityuktamityāha— ata iti । kārakalpyastu. mā. adṛṣṭo'thavā. punaḥ. cau, ananta. mu. ucyate. cau, ananta. mu. rapyevam. cau, mu. tatvena pratiṣedhāsānartha. mā.
phalānarthānubandhitvāt taddvāreṇopacaryate ।
nirākāṅkṣasya caikena śyenasya na phaladvayam ।। 267 ।।
tasmāt kriyāntarādeva hiṃsāto'dharma ucyate ।
phalato'pi ca yat karma nānarthenānubadhyate ।। 268 ।।
kevalaprītihetutvāt taddharmatvena gīyate ।
nanu ceṣṭābhyupāyatvāt śyenāderdharmatā bhavet ।। 269 ।।
phalaṃ tāvadadharmo'sya śyenādeḥ saṃpradhāryate ।
yadi yeneṣṭasiddhiḥ syādaniṣṭānanubandhinī ।। 270 ।।
tasya dharmatvamucyate tataḥ śyenādivarjanam ।
yadā tu codanāgamyaḥ kāryākāryānapekṣayā ।। 271 ।।
dharmaḥ prītinimittaṃ syād tadā śyene'pi dharmatā ।
yadi tvaprītiheturyaḥ sākṣād vyavahito'pi vā ।। 272 ।।
nanu kimiti śyene phalasyāniṣṭānubandhitvam, śyenasyaivāniṣṭaphalatvaṃ kimiti na bhavatītyāśaṅkyāha—nirākāṅkṣasyeti । dharmatvaṃ tarhi śyenasya bhavatvityā- śaṅakyāha—phalato'pīti । evaṃ sthite sati ślokārdhena codayati—nanvi tyardhena ।।
atrocyate-śyenasādhyasya prāṇaviyogabhāvakavyāpārasya niṣiddhatvena tāvada- dharmatvam; śyenādīnāṃ tu dharmatvamadharmatvaṃ vetyetad vicārayāma ityāha—phalamitya- rdhena । vṛddhavyavahāraparyālocanaṃ cātra saṃpradhāraṇam । kīdṛśe'rthe vṛddhairdharmādharmaśabdau prayuktāvityāha—yadīti । yadi yaḥ puruṣārthaṃ sādhayatyaniṣṭānubandhī ca na bhavati, tatra vṛddhairdharmaśabdaḥ prayujyate; tadā śyenādayo dharmaśabdena varjyante; yadi vidheye prītisādhake ca padārthe satyapyaniṣṭānubandhitve dharmaśabdaḥ prayujyate, tadā śyene'pi dharmatvamityāha—yadā tviti । yadā tvaniṣṭānubandhini loke dharmaśabdaḥ prayujyate, tadā śyene'pyadharmatvamityāha—yadi tviti । tatra pūrveṇa śyenādeḥ dharmatvaṃ nāstī- rvā hiṃsāto nārthaḥ cau, ananta. mu. hīṣyate. cau, ananta. mu. syādanuṣṭhānānu. cau, mu.
tasyādharmatvamucyeta tadā śyene'pyadharmatā ।
ye tu hiṃsātvasādharmyād bāhyavaccoditāsvapi ।। 273 ।।
vadantyanarthahetitvaṃ teṣāmāgabādhanam ।
tamanādṛtya yo brūyādyāgādāvapyasau vadet ।। 274 ।।
svargādisādhanāśaktiṃ kriyātvād bhojanādivat ।
gītāmantrārthavādairyā kalpyate'narthahetutā ।। 275 ।।
pratyakṣaśrutibādhyatvāt sānyārthatvena vāritā ।
śiṣyān pratyaviśiṣṭatvāt sūtravaidikavākyayoḥ ।। 276 ।।
tyuktam madhyena dharmatvamuktam tṛtīyenādharmatvamiti । ye tu hiṃsātvasādharmyeṇa bāhya- hiṃsāvadagnīṣomīyāderadharmatvamāhuḥ, teṣāmāgamavirodho vaktavya ityāha—ye tviti । yastvāgamavirodhamanādṛtya bravīti, tasyeṣṭavighātakṛd viruddhaścodbhāvanīya ityāha— tamanādṛtyeti । yadapyarthavādarūpeṇa mantreṇa saṃśabditam, tadapyanyārthatvādagnīṣomī- yasya phalaṃ na bhavatītyāha—gītāmantrārthavādairiti । vidhivirodhādanyārthatvācca nedaṃ phalamityarthaḥ ।
“nanvaśaktamidaṃ sūtramimāvarthau vaditum” iti; asyottarabhāṣyam— “ucyate, yatra vākyādartho'vagamyate, tatraivam; tattu vaidikeṣu, na sūtreṣu” ityādi । tasyāyamarthaḥ—yatra śabdaikasamadhigamyo'rthaḥ, tatraikatvāt tātpāryasyārthadvayaparatve vākyaṃ bhidyate; vaidikeṣu caitat pramāṇāntarāpratipannārthasamarpakatvāt; laukikasya sūtra- vākyasya nāyaṃ doṣa iti । tadetad dūṣayituprāha—śiṣyāniti । sūtravākyamapi pramāṇāntarāpratipannameva vedārthaṃ śiṣyān pratipādayati । taduktam—
“nānyato vedavidbhyaśca sūtravṛttikriyeṣyate” iti ।
anyaparasya cānyārthapratipādanāśaktirvedavākyavat sūtravākye'pyastyeveti anuttara- midamiti । so'dharmaścodanārthaḥsyāt. cau, ananta. mu. yastu. cau, ananta. mu. vaccodanāsva cau, ananta. mu. vadatyanarthahetutvaṃ tasyāpyā. cau, ananta. mu. gāderapya. cau, ananta. mu. nīyate. cau, ananta. mu.
aśakteścobhayoḥ sāmyānna sūtreṣvityanuttaram ।
prāguktaparisaṃkhyāyāḥ phalametat prakāśyate ।। 277 ।।
sūtreṣu hyanayā yuktyā gatireṣāpi yujyate ।
tasmādāvatata sūtraṃ tantraṃ vā śaktibhedataḥ ।। 278 ।।
ekadeśānumānād vā dve sūtre parikalpite ।
itaretarasamīpyādetāveva parasparam ।। 279 ।।
kalpyete vākyaśeṣāya nānyāvayavakalpanā ।
viśiṣṭārthānuvāditvādathavetyapi bhāṣite ।। 280 ।।
vākyabhedaḥ sa eveti saṃjñātantratvamuttaram ।
arthaṃ vā pratyupādānaṃ saṃjñālakṣaṇaśabdayoḥ ।। 281 ।।
tantraṃ lakṣaṇaśabdo vā vācyo dharmārthaśabdayoḥ ।
dharme sāmānyataḥ siddhe pramāṇaṃ kathyate yadā ।। 282 ।।
evaṃ dūṣite samarthayitumāha—prāgukteti । ayamabhiprāyaḥ—pramāṇāntara- pratipannārthasūcakatvāta na sūtrasyāyaṃ doṣa iti ।
pramāṇāntareṇa ca codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharmatvena prasiddhaḥ; ato yathā tamarthaṃ samarthayati, yathā vyākhyeyamityāha—tasmāditi ।
nanu sūtradvayaparikalpanāyām ‘codanālakṣaṇo dharmaḥ’ ityatrānarthasyāpi dharmatvaṃ prāpnoti, ‘artho dharmaḥ’ ityatra kṛpyāderapītyāśaṅkyāha—itaretarasāmīpyāditi ।
idamaparaṃ parihārabhāṣyam—athavārthasya sataścodanālakṣaṇasya dharmatvamitye- kārthatvamevaṃ iti; tadetat dūṣayitumāha—viśiṣṭārtheti tripādyā । tasmāt pūrvaiva vyākhyā śobhanetyāha—saṃjñātantratvamuttaramiti । saṃjñāśabdena dharmaśabdamāha ।
arthalakṣaṇaśabdayorvā tantratvamāha—arthaṃ veti ।
nanu yadā ‘sāmānyataḥ siddhaṃ dharmamanūdya codanā pramāṇatvena pratijñāyate’ itīyaṃ vacanavyaktiḥ, tadānarthasya dharmatvaṃ prāpnotyeva; kimarthaśabdena vyudasyata iti codayati—dharma iti । dānāt saṃjñā. cau, ananta mu. omitted na. mā. vamarthaśa. mā.
prāptameva tadāthatvaṃ kimarthaṃ punarucyate ।
codanālakṣaṇatvasya dharmaṃ prati vidheyatā ।। 283 ।।
labhyate'rthānuvādena saṃśayo hyanyathā bhavet ।
tathā ca ye'pyanarthasya sādhanatvena lakṣitāḥ ।। 284 ।।
niṣedhaiste'pi dharmāḥ syuścodanālakṣaṇatvataḥ ।
tasmādarthāparityāgādekārthagrahaṇaṃ yayā ।। 285 ।।
labhyate vacanavyaktyā sā syādarthānuvādataḥ ।
viśeṣaṇād vinā caitadarthasāmarthyakāritam ।। 286 ।।
kathyate bhāṣyakāraṇe phalaṃ hiṃsādivarjanam ।
satyamevam; eṣaiva vacanavyaktiḥ arthapadena vinā labhyata ityāha—codaneti tripādyā । ‘yaścodanālakṣaṇaḥ, sa dharmaḥ’ ityetasyāṃ vacanavyaktāvarthaśabdasya na vidhe- yatvam, vākyabhedaprasaṅgāta; nānuvādatvam, atiprasaṅgāta; dharmānuvādena codanā- khyapramāṇavidhānamiti tu vacanavyaktāvanuvādatvenānvayaḥ; ‘codanālakṣaṇo dharmaḥ’ ityetāvati sūtre satyeṣāpi vacanavyaktirāśaṅkyate—yaścodanālakṣaṇaḥ sa dharmaḥ iti, tataśca brahmattyādīnāmapi niṣedhalakṣaṇānāmadharmāṇāmapi dharmatvaprasaṅgaḥ; tadāha— saṃśayo hyanyathā bhavet ityādinā sapādaślokena ।
abhimatā vacanavyaktirarthaśabdaprayoge sati labhyata ityāha—tasmāditi । nanu ‘yo dharmaḥ, sa codanālakṣaṇaḥ’ iti vacanavyaktau “ubhayamiha codanayā lakṣya- te'rtho'narthaśceti, tatrānartho dharma ukto mā bhūdityarthagrahaṇam” iti । idaṃ bhāṣya- masambaddhamityāśaṅkyāha—viśeṣaṇāditi । naivānarthasya dharmatvaṃ prāptam, yannivṛttya- rthamarthapadam; arthapadaprayoge tu sā vacanavyaktireva na bhavati yayānarthasya dharmatvaṃ prāpnotīti phalamarthaśabdaprayogasyānarthanivṛttiriti vaktuṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa “anartho dharma ukto mā bhūdityarthagrahaṇam” ityuktamiti ।। iti bhaṭṭombekaviracitāyāṃ tātparyaṭīkāyāṃ dvitīyasūtraṃ samāptam vṛttameva tadārthatve. cau, ananta. mu. kalpitāḥ. cau, ananta. mu. thathā cau, ananta. mu. pṛhahatyā. mā.
tasya nimittaparīṣṭiḥ ।।
pratijñāvyatirekeṇa bhāṣyakāreṇa yadyapi ।
vakṣyamāṇā svapakṣasya yuktiḥ pūrvaṃ nidarśitā ।। 1 ।।
pratijñāmātramityetajjaiminermatamucyate ।
vṛttikāro'dhikaṃ vāpi bhūtādi dvāramabravīt ।। 2 ।।
atra bhāṣyam-“uktaṃ codanānimittaṃ dharmasya jñānamiti; tat pratijñāmātre- ṇoktam” iti । atra keciccodayanti—pratijñāvyatirekeṇa yuktirapi tatroktaiva— “codanā hi bhūtam” ityādinā “bhāṣyagranthena nānyat kiṃcanendriyam” ityevamantena; ataḥ kathaṃ tat pratijñāmātreṇoktamityāśaṅkya parihariti—pratijñā- vyatirekeṇeti sārdhena ślokenā “codanā hi bhūtam” ityādi vakṣyamāṇaṃ pratijñā- samarthanārthaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa tatroktam; sūtrakārābhiprāyeṇa tvidamucyate “tat prati- jñāmātreṇoktam” iti ।
parihārāntaramāha—vṛttikāra ityardhena । pratijñāsamarthanārthaṃ prāmāṇyasambhā- vanājñānajanakatvena tatroktaṃ yat “codanā hi bhūtam” ityādinā, tatpratijñārtha- siddhyartham । taduktam “evaṃjātīyakamarthaṃ śaknotyevāvagamayitum” iti । vārti- kakāreṇāpi tathaiva vyākhyātaṃ bhāṣyam—“saṃbhāvyate pramāṇatvam” iti pratijñārthā- bhiprāyeṇa tu “tatpratijñāmātreṇoktam”, satsaṃprayogasūtrāpātanārthamityadoṣam ।। iti bhaṭṭombekaviracitāyāṃ tātparyaṭīkāyāṃ nimittasūtraṃ samāptam
satsaṃprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣamanimittaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvāt ।। 1-1-4 ।।
varṇyate sūtrabhedena yena pratyakṣalakṣaṇam ।
tena sūtrasya sambandho vācyaḥ pūrvapratijñayā ।। 1 ।।
lakṣaṇasyābhidhānaṃ ca kenāṃśenopayujyate ।
kimarthaṃ cānumānāderlakṣaṇaṃ nātra kathyate ।। 2 ।।
na tāvadapramāṇatvaṃ teṣāṃ nāpyakṣabuddhiṣu ।
śakyate'ntargatirvaktuṃ na ca lakṣaṇatulyatā ।। 3 ।।
ketidetat sūtraṃ dvidhā kṛtvā “satsaṃprayoge” ityādi “tatpratyakṣam” ityevamantaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇaparatvena vyācakṣate, “animittaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvāt” itīdaṃ tasya dharmaṃ pratyanimittatvaparatvena । bhāṣyakāreṇa tu sakalamevedaṃ sūtramanimi- ttatvaparatvena vyākhyātam । tatra pūrvaprasthānaparityāge karaṇamāha vārtikakāraḥ— varṇyata iti । yaḥ pratyakṣalakṣaṇaparamidaṃ sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe, tenāsya “codanā- lakṣaṇo'rtho dharmaḥ” ityanayā pratijñayā saha sambandho vaktavyaḥ; na cāsāvastī- tyabhiprāyaḥ ।।
śabdapramāṇādhikāre ca pratyakṣalakṣaṇamatīvānupayogītyāha—lakṣaṇasyetyardhena ।
athānuktasvarūpasyānimittatvameva pratipādayituṃ na śakyata ityacyate, tatrā- pyāha—kimarthamityardhena । tatra na tāvadapramāṇatvaṃ teṣām; nāpyakṣabuddhiṣu śakya- te'ntargatirvaktum; na ca lakṣaṇatulyatā—iti nigadavyākhyātam ।।
atha matam-pratyakṣalakṣaṇādeva tatpūrvakatvenānumānādīnyapi siddhyantīti na pṛthaglakṣaṇaṃ prayojayiṣyamantīti, tatrocyate—prāmāṇyena vā tatpūrvakatvena siddhyanti ? tu. cau. ananta. mu itīdaṃ tu svadharmam. mā. ityanayājñayā. mā. ṇyeta tāvatpūrva. mā.
na cāpi siddhisteṣāṃ syādarthāt pratyakṣalakṣaṇāt ।
na hi tatpūrvakaṃ sarvaṃ pramāṇamiti niścitam ।। 4 ।।
pratyakṣalakṣaṇoktiśca nānumānādilakṣaṇāt ।
vinā na sidhyatītyevamarthākṣepo na vidyate ।। 5 ।।
tadatatpūrvakatve dhīrna ca tallakṣaṇād bhavet ।
taduktervānumānādi kiṃ na syāt tadapūrvakam ।। 6 ।।
na ca lakṣaṇabhedasya svarūpe yattayorapi ।
pratyakṣalakṣaṇādeṣāṃ kathaṃcidavadhāraṇā ।। 7 ।।
prasiddhatvādavācyatvaṃ pratyakṣe'pi prasajyate ।
tenānyaparisaṃkhyārthaṃ sūtraṃ mūḍhena vocyate ।। 8 ।।
lakṣaṇato vā ? na tāvat prāmāṇyenetyāha—na cāpīti । yataḥ pratyakṣapūrvajāpi smṛtiḥ na pramāṇam ।।
nāpi lakṣaṇata ityāha—pratyakṣeti ।।
āstāṃ tāvadidaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ svarūpaṃ vā; pratyakṣalakṣaṇādeṣāṃ tatpūrvakatvātatpū- rvakatve eva na siddhyata ityāha—tadatatpūrvakatva iti ।।
na ca pratyakṣalakṣaṇādeṣāṃ svarūpamiyattā vā pratīyata ityāha—na ca lakṣaṇabhedasyeti ।।
prasiddhatve cānuāmānādīnāṃ lakṣaṇākaraṇaṃ pratyakṣe'pi samānamityāha—prasi ddhatvādityardhena ।
evaṃ ca sati kevalapratyakṣalakṣaṇakaraṇamanyanivṛttiṃ mūḍhatāṃ vā sūtrakārasya sūcayatītyāha—tenānyeti । siddhireṣām. cau, ananta. mu. lakṣaṇam. mā lakṣāśaktiśca. mā. yujyate. cau, ananta. mu. tadetat. cau, mu. sūtramūḍhena co. mā. māṇyetyāha. mā. vṛttimūḍha. mā.
na hyakeṃ lakṣayedeṣu buddhipūrvaṃ kathaṃcana ।
sambhavatyekavākyatve vākyabhedaśca neṣyate ।। 9 ।।
na cāpyanena sūtreṇa pratyakṣaṃ lakṣyate sphuṭam ।
tadābhāse'pi tulyatvāt svapnajñānaikavarjanāt ।। 10 ।।
taddhindriyārthasaṃyogavyāpāreṇa vinā bhavet ।
kenacit saṃprayoge tu bhrāntyādiḥ syānniyogataḥ ।। 11 ।।
grāhyeṇānyena vetyetat kṛtaṃ naiva viśeṣaṇam ।
saṃprayogasya yena syād viśeṣo vakṣyamāṇavat ।। 12 ।।
asāmarthyaṃ ca matvāsya vṛttikāreṇa lakṣaṇe ।
tatsaṃprayoga ityevaṃ pāṭhāntaramudāhṛtam ।। 13 ।।
tenānyenāpi saṃyoge cakṣurāderyadutthitam ।
viṣayāntaravijñānaṃ tat pratyakṣaṃ prasajyate ।। 14 ।।
animittapratipādakatvena caikavākyatve sati na vākyabhedo yukta ityāha— sambhavatītyardhena ।।
idānīmativyāpakatvaṃ lakṣaṇasya darśayitumāha—na cāpyaneneti ślokadvayena । yataḥ śuktikāyāmapi rajatajñānamindriyārthasaṃprayogajameva, tadbhāvabhāvitvenāvagamāt ।।
atha pratibhāsamāno'rthaḥ saṃprayogasya viśeṣaṇam, na cātra tadastītyāha— grāhyeṇeti । “satsaṃprayoga” ityetāvaduktam, na tu tadviśeṣitam—pratibhāsye- nānyena veti, yathā ‘tatsaṃprayoge’ ityādi vṛttikāramate vyākhyāsyati ।।
yathāśrutasya cāsāmarthyaṃ matvā tatsatorvyatyataṃ kṛtvopavarṣeṇa vyākhyātam; tadāpi tairna dṛṣṭamityāha—asāmarthyamiti ।।
uktamativyāpakatvamupasaṃharati—tenānyenāpīti ।। na tvekam. cau, ananta. mu. cāpyetena. cau, ananta. mu. bhāseṣu tulya. ananta. mu sambandha. causa ananta mu.
satsaṃprayoganirdeśo vyarthaścedetadeva hi ।
pratipādyaṃ parasyāpi lakṣaṇāsiddhireva ca ।। 15 ।।
svapnādīnāṃ nivṛttirvā phalaṃ tasya bhaviṣyati ।
tasmād vidhyanuvāditvaṃ nānukte lakṣaṇe bhavet ।। 16 ।।
tena naiṣā vacovyaktiryat satīndriyasaṅgame ।
vijñānaṃ jāyate tasya pratyakṣatvaṃ pratīyatām ।। 17 ।।
pratyakṣaṃ yañjane siddhaṃ tasyaivaṃdharmakatvataḥ ।
vidyamānopalambhatvaṃ tena dharme'nimittatā ।। 18 ।।
evaṃlakṣaṇakatvaṃ ca na svarūpavivakṣayā ।
evaṃliṅgakamityetad bhāṣyakāreṇa varṇyate ।। 19 ।।
yato'sti tatra dharmo'yaṃ vidyamānopalambhanam ।
tasmāt tena prasiddhena gamyatāmanimittatā ।। 20 ।।
nanvenaṃ satyapārthakamidaṃ satsaṃprayogasūtrapadopadānam । ayamaparo doṣo'stu, nātiprasaṅganivṛttiḥ svapnapratyayanivṛttirvā phalaṃ tasyetyāha—satsaṃprayoganirdeśa iti sārdhena । ativyāpakatve cāsaṃpūrṇatvāllakṣaṇasya na taduddiśya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyata ityāha —tasmādityarghena । tena nātra lakṣaṇamuddiśya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate । kiṃ tu loka- prasiddhasya pratyakṣasya satsaṃprayogajatvena vidyamānopalambhanatvāt dharmaṃ pratyaprāmāṇyamiti ।।
sūtrasya tātparyaṃ ślokadvayena darśayitumāha—tena naiṣeti ślokadvayena ।।
nanvanimittapare'pi sūtre sati kathamidaṃ bhāṣyam “evaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ hi tat” ityāśaṅkyāha-evaṃlakṣaṇakatvamiti ślokadvayena । evaṃliṅgakam evaṃhetukamityarthaḥ ।। tasyaḥ ananta. mu. tvamāne dharmo'ni. mā. tenātra. mā. na tu. mā.
pratyakṣatvamado hetuḥ śeṣaṃ hetuprasiddhaye ।
asmadādau prasiddhatvād yogyarthamabhidhīyate ।। 21 ।।
prakṛtena ca sambandhaḥ śeṣāprāmāṇyadarśanāt ।
tadaprāmāṇyasiddheśca sambandhāderanīkṣaṇāt ।। 22 ।।
śakyamanyāpramāṇatvamiti sūtrairna badhyate ।
na ca paryanuyogo'tra lakṣaṇānupayogataḥ ।। 23 ।।
yadi hi lakṣaṇamuddiśya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate, tadā pratyakṣalakṣaṇamarthavad bhavati; animittapare tu satsaṃprayogajatvavidyamānopalambhanatvābhyāṃ tatsiddherapārthakamidamityā- śaṅkyāha—pratyakṣatvamadoheturityardhena । animittapratipādanapare'pyaprāmāṇyaprati- pādakahetudvayasiddhyarthamityadoṣaḥ ।
nanvevamanimittapratipādakamapīdaṃ sūtramanarthakameva asmadādipratyakṣasya dharmaṃ pratyaprāmāṇyasya siddhatvādityāśaṅkyāha—asmadādāvityardhena ।।
animittapratipādanasya tu ‘codanaiva dharme pramāṇam’ ityanayā pratijñayā saha sambandho'stītyāha—prakṛtena cetyardhena ।
nanvanimittapratipādake'pi sūtre sati pratyakṣavadanumānādīnāmanimittaprati- pādakaṃ sūtrāntaraṃ kartavyamityāśaṅkyāha—tadaprāmāṇyasiddheriti । pratyakṣasyānimi- ttatve pratipādite sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣatvena tatpūrvakatvādanumānādīnāmapyaprāmāṇyaṃ siddhyatyeveti na pṛthaksūtramanumānādīnāmanimittatvapratipādakaṃ kartavyamityarthaḥ ।
na cāsmin pakṣe lakṣaṇānupayoge paryanuyogo vaktavyaḥ । kasmāta ? atatpara- tvādityāha—na ca paryanuyoga ityardhena ।। mate hetuḥ. mā. siddhiśca. cau, ananta. mu. bādhyate. mā. prayogata. ananta. mu. mato hetuḥ. mā. katvameva. mā.
na ca nyūnātirekādiprasaṅgo lakṣaṇaṃ prati ।
sarvathā lokasiddhatvād dharmo'yaṃ tāvadiṣyata ।। 24 ।।
tataśca mṛgatṛṣṇādi na pratyakṣaṃ prasajyate ।
animittaprasaṅgastu tasyāpi vinivāryate ।। 25 ।।
atītānāgate'pyarthe sūkṣme vyavahite'pi ca ।
pratyakṣaṃ yogināmiṣṭaṃ kaiścinmuktātmanāmapi ।। 26 ।।
vidyamānopalambhatvamasiddhaṃ tatra tān prati ।
bhaviṣyattvasya vā hetostadgrāhyairvyabhicāritā ।। 27 ।।
mā bhūtāmiti tenāha lokasiddhaṃ sadityayam ।
na lokavyatiriktaṃ hi pratyakṣaṃ yogināmapi ।। 28 ।।
ata evāvyāptyativyāptī naivātra bhaviṣyata ityāha—na ca nyūnātireke- tyardhena । yato nātra sūtre lakṣaṇamuddiśya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate; api tu yat satsaṃprayo- gajam, tad dharmaṃ pratyanimittam; asti cāyaṃ dharmo lokaprasiddhasya pratyakṣasyetyāha— sarvathetyādisārdhena ।।
nanu vidyamānopalambhanatvādaprāmāṇyamityetāvataivālam, satsaṃprayogagrahaṇamana- rthakamityāśaṅkyāha—atītānāgata iti sārdhaślokadvayena । atītānāgataviṣaya- tvena yogipratyakṣe vidyamānopalambhanatvasyāsiddhatvamāśaṅkya tatparihārārtham, ata eva tadgrāhyairbhaviṣyattvasya hetoranaikāntikatvamāśaṅkya tatparihārārthaṃ ca satsaṃprayogagrahaṇa- marthavad bhavatīti sārdhaślokadvayasyārthaḥ । tadayaṃ pramāṇārtha—yogipratyakṣaṃ vidya- mānopalambhanam, satsaṃprayogajatvādasmadādipratyakṣavat ।
yaccāpyuktam—“pratyakṣatvamadohetuḥ śeṣaṃ hetuprasiddhaye” iti, tatrāpi prayoga- māha—na lokavyatiriktamiti sārdhena । tatrāpyayaṃ prayogārthaḥ—yogipratyakṣaṃ tasyāpi na ni. mā. vā. ananta. ma. omitted hetoḥ mā. prayojakam mā.
pratyakṣatvena tasyāpi vidyamānopalambhanam ।
satsaṃprayogajatvaṃ vāpyasmatpratyakṣavad bhaveta ।। 29 ।।
teṣāmavartamāne'rthe yā nāmotpadyate matiḥ ।
pratyakṣaṃ sā tatastveva nābhilāṣasmṛtādivat ।। 30 ।।
loke cāpyaprasiddhatvāt pratyakṣatvapramāṇataḥ ।
pratibhāvaddvayāsattvaṃ sadityetena kathyate ।। 31 ।।
laukikī pratibhā yadvat pratyakṣādyanapekṣiṇī ।
na niścayāya paryāptā tathā syād yogināmapi ।। 32 ।।
avidyamānasaṃyogāt syāccet pratyakṣadhīḥ kvacit ।
bhaviṣyatyapi dharme syācchaktetyāha sadityayam ।। 33 ।।
vidyamānopalambhanam, satsaṃprayogajatve sati vidyamānopalambhanatvāt asmadādi- pratyakṣavaditi ।।
yadi cātītānāgataviṣayaṃ taducyate, tadā tata evābhilāṣasmṛtādivat teṣāṃ tatpratyakṣameva na bhavatītyāha—teṣāmiti ।।
atha pratyakṣameva saddharmaṃ prati pramāṇam, bhavatu; kiṃ pratyakṣatvenetyāśa- ṅkyāha—loke cāpyaprasiddhatvāditi । tadayaṃ prayogārthaḥ—apratyakṣamapramāṇaṃ ca yogijñānam, pratyakṣatvena pramāṇatvena ca loke'prasiddhatvāt pratibhāvaditi । satsaṃprayogaphalaṃ cedam, satsaṃprayogajasya loke pratyakṣatvena pramāṇatvena ca prasiddha- tvāt । taduktam—“sadityetena kathyate” iti ।।
idānīṃ hetoḥ sādhyenānugamapradarśanapūrvaṃka pakṣadharmatāmāha—laukikīti ।।
yadi tu satsaṃprayogajatvena vidyamānopalambhanatvaṃ na sādhyate yogijñāne, tadā ayaṃ doṣaḥ syādityāha—avidyamānasaṃyogāditi ।। syācchaṅketyāha. mā. vidyānopratyakṣa. mā. jñānapratya. mā.
pratyakṣaḥ prāganuṣṭhānānna dharmo'nuṣṭhito'pi vā ।
phalasādhanarūpeṇa tadānīṃ yena nāstyasau ।। 34 ।।
asmatpratyakṣavaccāpi vidyamānopalambhanam ।
pratyakṣaṃ yogināṃ dharme'pratyakṣatvācca neṣyate ।। 35 ।।
avidyamānasaṃyogat pratyakṣatvanirākṛtiḥ ।
yogināṃ kena labhyeta neṣṭaṃ sadgrahaṇaṃ yadi ।। 36 ।।
idānīṃ bhavatu nāma satsaṃprayogajatvena vidyamānopalambhanatvaṃ pratyakṣasya, tathāpi dharmasya vidyamānatvāt kimiti pratyakṣagamyatvaṃ bhavatītyāśaṅkyāha—pratyakṣa iti ।।
tadanupannam; dravyakriyāguṇādīnāṃ śreyaḥsādhanatvaṃ nāma dharmatvam; taccānuṣṭhā- nāt prāguttarakālaṃ ca vidyata eva । yo hyanuṣṭhānāt prāguttarakālaṃ ca śreyaḥsādhanaṃ na, kastatra niṣphale pravartate ? na ca phalabhavanakāle śreyaḥsādhanateti, tadānīṃ sādhanasya vinaṣṭatvāt । yadi tvapratyakṣatvaṃ dharmasya vācyam, tato'paraṃ satsaṃprayoga- jatvādevoktam । tasmādevaṃ vyākhyeyam—vidhiriha bhāvanāyāḥ kāryatvamavagamayati । tacca kālatrayāsaṃspṛṣṭam; tādrūpyeṇa ca saiva bhāvanā dharma ityucyate । tasmād vidya- mānopalambhanasya pratyakṣasyāgocaro dharma ityarthaḥ । tadanena prakāreṇa vidhyasamā- nārthatāṃ pratyakṣasya darśayatītyanavadyam ।।
mā bhūdasmatpratyakṣasya vidhiviṣayatā, yogipratyakṣasya bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkyāha— asmadityādiyogināmityantena । sa cāyamarthaḥ “na lokavyatirikaṃ hi pratyakṣaṃ yogināmapi” ityanenokta ityanenokta eva smāritaḥ । idānīmabhyupagamyāpi vartamānatāṃ dharmasya, agocaratvāt pratyakṣeṇa na gṛhyate rasavaccākṣuṣeṇetyāha—dharme'pratyakṣatvācca neṣyata iti ।।
evaṃ saṃprayogaśabdaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā sacchabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe—avidyamāna- saṃyogāditi ।। pratyakṣam. mā. dhyāyināṃ dharme pra. cau, ananta. mu. omitted na. mā. dhana......tadā. mā. tato varaṃ. mā. mānārthānām. mā.
saptamyaiva tu labhyeta sadarthaḥ kalpanā punaḥ ।
pareṣāṃ vāraṇīyeti yatno jaimininā kṛtaḥ ।। 37 ।।
samyagarthe ca saṃśabdo duṣprayoganivāraṇaḥ ।
prayoga indriyāṇāṃ ca vyāpāro'rtheṣu kathyate ।। 38 ।।
duṣṭatvācchuktikāyogo vāryate rajatekṣaṇāt ।
evaṃ satyanuvādatvaṃ lakṣaṇatvena saṃbhavet ।। 39 ।।
tataścāprāpyakāritvād yad bauddhaiḥ śrotracakṣuṣoḥ ।
lakṣaṇavyāptisiddhyarthaṃ saṃyogo neti kīrtyate ।। 40 ।।
nanvayamarthaḥ saptamyaiva tu labhyate, “yasya ca bhāvena bhāvalakṣaṇam” iti smaraṇādityaśaṅkyāha—saptamyeti । satyamevaṃ; saiva tu saptamī satilakṣaṇeti; pareṣāṃ sandehavyudāsārthaṃ sacchabdopādānamiti ।।
idānīṃ saṃśabdagrahaṇasya prayojanamāha—samyagarthe cetyardhena ।।
adhunā prayogaśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe—prayoga ityardhena ।।
adhunā saṃśabdavyāvartyaṃ darśayati—duṣṭatvādityardhena । asambaddhatvena lakṣa- ṇaparatvaṃ na vyākhyātaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa, īdṛśi tvavayavārthavyākhyāne lakṣaṇaparatve'pi na doṣa ityāha—evaṃ satītyardhena ।।
tataśca yadaprāpyakāritvāccakṣuśśrotrayoravyāpakatvaṃ nāma dūṣaṇamuktam—aprā- pyakāritvaṃ ca sāntarādhiṣṭhānārthādhikārthagrahaṇena; nahi nirantaradeśe gandhasparśādau sāntarā pratipattiradhikārthagrahaṇaṃ ceti, tadasmadyākhyāne na bhaviṣyati; yato na saṃprayogaśabdena saṃyoga ityucyate, api tu vyāpāramātramityāha—tataśceti sārdha- ślokadvayena । saptamyāpi, cau, ananta. mu. ṇasyāpi. cau, ananta. mu. saptamītilakṣaṇeti. mā. sa...pra. mā. omitted ī. mā. kārārtha. mā.
prāpyagrahaṇapakṣe ca sāntarāgrahaṇaṃ kila ।
adhiṣṭhānādhikaścārtho na gṛhyata tvagādivat ।। 41 ।।
vyāpāramātravācitvādaviruddhaṃ tadatra naḥ ।
yadi vārthārjavasthānaṃ saṃprayogo'tra varṇyate ।। 42 ।।
yogyatālakṣaṇo vānyaḥ saṃyogaḥ kāryalakṣitaḥ ।
sāṃkhyādīn vā vinirjitya prāptipakṣo'tra dūṣyatām ।। 43 ।।
tayośca prāpyakāritvamindriyatvāt tvagādivat ।
kecit tayoḥ śarīrācca bahirvṛtiṃ pracakṣate ।। 44 ।।
cikitsādiprayogaśca yo'dhiṣṭhāne prayujyate ।
so'pi tasyaiva saṃskāra ādheyasyopakārakaḥ ।। 45 ।।
taddeśaścāpi saṃskāraḥ sarvavyāptyartha iṣyate ।
kaḥ punarasau vyāpāraḥ ? arthasya vā ṛjudeśatvenāvasthānamindriyasya vā yogyatāṃ kāryalakṣitāṃ saṃprayogaśabdo bravītītyāha—yadi veti ।
idānīṃ saṃyogameva saṃprayogaśabdasyārthamabhyupagamya sāṅkhyamatena pariharati— sāṃkhyādīn veti । ayaṃ prayogarthaḥ—prāpyakāriṇī cakṣuḥśrotre, indriyatvāt tvagādivaditi ।
kathaṃ punaḥ prāpyakāritvamityāśaṅkyāha—kecidityardhena । kecidgrahaṇaṃ śrotraviṣayam । kecidāhuḥ—śrotravṛttireva śabdasamīpaṃ gacchatīti । apareṣāṃ tu darśanam-saṃyogavibhāgādutpannaḥ śabdaḥ śabdāntarārambhakrameṇa śrotradeśaṃ gacchatīti ।।
yatpunaridamuktam—adhiṣṭhānadeśa evendriyam, tatra cikitsādiprayogā- diti; tatrāha—cikitsāditi । adhiṣṭhānasaṃskāra evāsāvindriyamupakaro- tītyarthaḥ ।।
evaṃ tarhi tatsthāyā evendriyavṛtterupakārako'sau, bahirvṛtterna prāpnotītyāśa- ṅkyāha—taddeścetyardhena । pakṣe'pi. cau, ananta. mu. ragrahaṇam. mā. vācyaḥ cau, ananta. mu. prāptapakṣaḥ cau, mu. ucyate. cau, aśenta. mu. kāryalakṣyatām. mā.
cakṣurādyupakārastu pādādāvapi dṛśyate ।। 46 ।।
tasmānnaikāntataḥ śakyaṃ saṃskārāt tatra vartanam ।
bahirvṛttistataśceṣṭā pṛthvagrā santatāpi ca ।। 47 ।।
adhiṣṭhānādhikaṃ tena gṛhyate yatra yādṛśam ।
pārthavaṃ vṛttibhāge syād dūre'pi grahaṇaṃ tathā ।। 48 ।।
dīpaprabhā yathā tasmin vinaśyati vinaśyati ।
tathā vahirgatāpyeṣā mūlacchedād vinaśyati ।। 49 ।।
adhiṣṭhānapidhāne ca satyapyucchinnayatnayā ।
tayārtho'nupanītatvādātmanā nānubhūyate ।। 50 ।।
dṛṣṭaṃ caitadanyatra saṃskāro'nyatra copakāra ityāha—cakṣurādītyardhena ।।
tasmādanaikāntiko hetuḥ । adhiṣṭhānasamānadeśa evendriyam, tatra ciki- tsādiprayogādityāha—tasmānnetyardhena ।
yatpunarimuktam—adhiṣṭhānādhikasya grahaṇaṃ na prāpnotīti, tatrāpyāha— bahirvṛttiriti sārdhena ।।
nanvevaṃ tarhi bahirjātāyāṃ vṛttau yadādhiṣṭhānavināśaḥ tadāpi grahaṇaṃ prāpno- tītyāśaṅkyāha—dīpaprabhetina ।।
adhiṣṭhānapidhāne tarhi avinaṣṭatvānmūlasyārthagrahaṇaṃ prāpnotītyāśaṅkyāha— adhiṣṭhānapidhāne ceti ।।
adhiṣṭhānāpekṣayā ca sāntarāpratipattirityāha—vicchinna ityardhena । kāraśca. cau, ananta. mu. tayośceṣṭā. cau, ananta. mu. yathā. ananta. mu. tasmādvinaśyati.......mā. ta. cau, ananta. mu. satyāpyucchinnayatnayā. । yo'rtho. mā. tathāpi. mā.
vicchinna iti buddhiḥ syādadhiṣṭhānamapekṣya tu ।
śabde tvādhikyāvicchedau bhrāntyaivoktāvasaṃbhavāt ।। 51 ।।
puruṣendriyaśabdau ca vyavadhānena kalpitau ।
puruṣo laukiko vā syād yo vāsmin sādhayiṣyate ।। 52 ।।
vikriyā jñānarūpāsya na nityatve virotsyate ।
śabdasya tu nityatvavibhutvābhyāmadhiṣṭhānādhikyaṃ sāntaratvaṃ ca na bhavatī- tyāha—śabde tvityardhena ।।
“satsaṃprayoge puruṣasya” ityucyamāne puruṣasya sarvagatatvāt ‘satsaṃprayoge’ ityaviśeṣaṇam, avyabhicārāt sarvakriyāsādhāraṇatvācca; “indriyāṇāṃ buddhi- janma” ityucyamāna indriyacaitanyaprasaṅgādayuktarthadvamāśaṅkyāha—puruṣendriya- śabdāvityardhena । satsaṃprayoga indriyāṇāṃ puruṣasya buddhijanmetyarthaḥ ।
kaḥ punaratra puruṣo'bhipretaḥ ? yadi tāvallaukikaḥ kāyaḥ, tadā tasyāceta- natvāt kathaṃ buddhijanma ? athātmā, tatrāpi buddhāvutpannāyāṃ tasya vikāra utpadyate, na vā ? tatrāvikṛtipakṣe pūrvavadevāvasthānaprasaṅgaḥ; utpattipakṣe'pi vyatireke sati sa eva doṣaḥ ; avyatirekapakṣe'pyātmano'nityatvaprasaṅgaḥ । taduktam—
“buddhijanmani puṃsaśca vikṛtiryadyanityatā ।
athāvikṛtirātmānyaḥ pramāteti na yujyate ।।” iti ।
tadāśaṅkyāha—puruṣa ityardhena । anyaparatvāt sūtrasya nātra tātparyamityarthaḥ ।।
athāpi lakṣaṇaparatvam, tathāpi na kaścid doṣa ityāha—vikriyetyardhena । buddhāvutpannāyāmutpadyata evātmano jñātṛrūpo vikāraḥ, tathāpi nāsau nityatvaṃ vināśa- yati, pratyabhijñāpratyayenāvasthādvaye'pyanusandhānātḥ sa evātmā kenacidātmanā naṣṭaḥ, kenacidutpannaḥ, kenacidāsta iti; tathāvabhāsanāt kuṇḍalādiṣu sarpavaditi । ca. cau, ananta. mu. kāryaḥ. mā. atha vilakṣaṇa, mā.
buddhijanmeti cāpyāha jāyamānapramāṇatām ।। 53 ।।
vyāpāraḥ kārakāṇāṃ hi dṛṣṭo janmātirekataḥ ।
pramāṇe'pi tathā mā bhūditi janma vivakṣyate ।। 54 ।।
na hi tat kṣaṇamapyāste jāyate vāpramātmakam ।
yenārthagrahaṇe paścāt vyāpriyetendriyādivat ।। 55 ।।
tena janmaiva viṣaye buddhervyāpāra ucyate ।
tadeva ca pramārūpaṃ tadvatī karaṇaṃ ca dhīḥ ।। 56 ।।
“buddhijanma pratyakṣam” ityuktam । tadanupapannamivāśaṅkyate—buddhirvā janmaśabdenocyate, arthāntaraṃ vā ? tatra buddhipakṣe buddhisamānārthatvādaprayogaprasaṅgaḥ; arthāntarapakṣe'pi janmaśabdasya tat kīdṛśam ? aparibhāṣaṇād vaiśeṣikakalpitasya grahaṇam; taiśca janmaśabdena samavāya ucyate, tasya ca nityatvenānakṣajatvādapratyakṣa- tvaprasaṅgaḥ—itīdamāśaṅkya svamatenāvyatirekapakṣaṃ tāvadāha—buddhijanmetisārdhena । jāyamānā buddhiḥ pramāṇam; na bhūtā, nāpi bhāvinī । tadanena pramāṇena kārakānta- ravailakṣaṇyaṃ buddherdarśayati; kārakāntaraṃ hi janmātirekeṇa vyāpārāntareṇa ca pradhāna- kriyāṃ niṣpādayati; na tathā buddheḥ kārakatvamityarthaḥ ।।
kasmādityāha na hi tatkṣaṇamapīti । yadi hyakārakarūpā buddhirutpadyate, utpannā vā kiñcidantaramavatiṣṭheta, indriyādivadevaṃ syāt; na tu tadubhayamapyastī- tyarthaḥ । sāmagrayantaraniṣedhaparaṃ cedaṃ kṣaṇikatvasaṅkīrtanam; na tu kṣaṇikatvapratipāda- nāya, vidyudādivadanimiṣadṛṣṭerbuddhigatayorutpattivināśayorapratibhāsanāt । āśutara- vināśamūlā ceyaṃ kṣaṇikatvavācoyuktirjvālādivat tatra tatra draṣṭavyā; āśutaraṃ vināśo'pi kasyāṃcidavasthāyām, na sarvatreti ।।
kaḥ punaratrāvāntaravyāpāraḥ, kā ca pradhānakriyetyāha—tena janmaiveti ।। iṣyate. cau, ananta. mu. karaṇadhīḥ. mā. jñāyamānā. mā. vākāñcādantara. mā. vaddaivam. mā.
janma cāvyatirekeṇa bhāṣyakāreṇa varṇitam ।
tacca bhūyabhaviṣyatvāt kṛtaṃ buddherviśeṣaṇam ।। 57 ।।
yadāpyaulūkyasiddhāntāt samavāyasya janmatā ।
vyaktistasyendriyādhīnā tena pratyakṣamucyate ।। 58 ।।
pramāṇaphalabhāvaśca yatheṣṭaṃ parikalpyatām ।
sarvathāpyanimittatvaṃ vidyamānopalambhanāt ।। 59 ।।
yadvendriyaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt tasya vārthena saṅgatiḥ ।
manaso vendriyairyoga ātmanā sarva eva vā ।। 60 ।।
idamapi kārakāntaravailakṣaṇyapratipādanaparameva vyākhyeyam । kārakāntaraṃ hyavāntara- vyāpāreṇa pradhānakriyāṃ niṣpādayati । indriyārthasannikarṣotpannāyāstu buddherarthaprakā- śasvabhāvatvānnāstyavāntaravyāpāraḥ । athāvaśyamavāntaravyāpāreṇaiva prayojanam’ tadā sa evārthānubhāvo'vāntaravyāpāraḥ, sa eva pradhānakriyeti ekatvāt tasya nātra kāṣṭhajvālā pāka iva kārakāntaravyāpāraḥ pradhānakriyāyāṃ yojanīyaḥ ।।
bhāṣyakāreṇāpi ‘jāyamānā buddhiḥ pratyakṣapramāṇam’—ityevaṃ vadataivameva janmaśabdo vyākhyāta ityāha—janma cāvyatirekeṇeti ।।
athāpi paramatamapratiṣiddhamanumataṃ bhavatīti vaiśeṣikaḥ svakāraṇasattāsambandhaḥ samavāyo janmāpatati, tathāpi tasya nityatve'pyakṣādhīnā hi vyaktiḥ; vyakteḥ pratyakṣatvamaviruddhamityāha—yadeti ।।
“buddhirvā janma vā sannikarṣo vā” ityādi bhāṣyaṃ, tada vyācaṣṭe— pramāṇaphalabhāvaśceti । animittaparaṃ hīdaṃ sūtram; ato yadyat pramāṇam, tasya tasya vidyamānopalambhanatvād dharmaṃ pratyaprāmāṇyaṃ siddhyatyeveti kimanenāvādhāritenetyarthaḥ ।।
tāṃ yatheṣṭatāṃ darśayati—yadvendriyamiti । indriyaṃ vā pramāṇam, indri- yārthasannikarṣo vā, indriyamanaḥ saṃyogo vā, ātmamanaḥ saṃyogo vā, sarvasaṃyogo vā; buddhistatre. cau, ananta. mu. kṣāmaśnutte. cau, mu. bhāvastu. ananta. mu. yaścendriyam. mā. vākṣeṇa. mā.
yadā jñānaṃ phalaṃ tatra vyāpārācca pramāṇatā ।
vyāpāro na yadā teṣāṃ tadā notpadyate phalam ।। 61 ।।
na ca sarvātmanākṣeṇa sambandho'rthasya vidyate ।
yena sarvāthabodhaḥ syāt tatpramāṇābhidhāyinām ।। 62 ।।
prāptimātraṃ hi saṃyogo nendriyasyābhyupeyate ।
mā bhūt kāraṇamātreṇa tvacā rūpāvadhāraṇam ।। 63 ।।
yathā pramāṇaniṣpattau yogyatvādindriyārthayoḥ ।
niyatā saṅgatirhetuḥ phale'pyevaṃ bhaviṣyati ।। 64 ।।
“ātmā manasā saṃyujyate, mana indriyeṇa, indriyamarthena” iti saṃyogatritayamekaṃ vā pramāṇam; yataḥ pramāṇaśabdaḥ karaṇavācī; “sādhakatamaṃ karaṇam”; tamabartha- ścātiśayaḥ; sa cāpekṣita iti vivakṣāvaśenātrātiśayakalpanā । ataḥ pramāṇa- vikalpaḥ pañcadhā darśitaḥ ।।
kiṃ punasteṣāṃ pramāṇatvena phalamityāha—tadā jñānaṃ phalamiti । kathaṃ punareteṣāṃ tatra pramāṇatvamityāśaṅkyāha—tatra vyāpārācca pramāṇateti । tatra teṣāṃ vyāpāraḥ kathamavagamyata ityāha—vyāpāra ityardhena । tadbhāvabhāvitvaṃ darśitam ।।
nanvindriyārthasannikarṣapramāṇapakṣe sarvātmanā arthasyendriyasannikṛṣṭatvāt sarva- viṣayaphalotpattiprasaṅga ityāśaṅkyāha—na ca sarvātmaneti । yogyatālakṣaṇa eva sannikarṣaḥ ; yogyatā ca kāryānumeyā; niyataṃ jñānākhyaṃ kāryamupalabhyamānaṃ niyatā- meva yogyatāmavagayatītyarthaḥ ।।
yasyāpi jñānaṃ pramāṇam, indriyārthasannikarṣaḥ pramāṇotpādakaḥ; tenāpi yogyatālakṣaṇa eva sannikarṣo vyākhyeyaḥ; anyathā sarvaviṣayaphalotpattivat sarvaviṣa- yapramāṇotpattiprasaṅga ityāha—prāptimātramiti ।।
ato yaḥ pramāṇātiprasaktau parihāraste, sa no'trāpi bhaviṣyatītyāha— yathā pramāṇeti ।। pramāṇaṃ hi. mā. sambandhaḥ cau, ananta. mu. mātre'pi tvayā. mā. datyapīha. mā.
yogasya dvayāśrayatvepi bhavatyanyatarāśrayaḥ ।
vyapadeśo'thavāpyakṣaṃ tatrāsādhāraṇaṃ bhavet ।। 65 ।।
saṃyoge tvātmamanasoḥ syācced viṣayabhinnatā ।
pramāṇaphalayornāsāvarthe hi vyāpṛtaṃ dvayam ।। 66 ।।
athāpyāśraya iṣṭaste vijñeyāviṣayāntaram ।
ātmasthatvena vijñānaṃ na bhinnaviṣayaṃ tataḥ ।। 67 ।।
prakṛṣṭasādhanatvācca pratyāsatteḥ sa eva naḥ ।
karaṇaṃ tena nānyatra kārake syāt pramāṇatā ।। 68 ।।
pramāṇe sarvasaṃyoge doṣo naiko'pi vidyate ।
ubhayāśritatve'pi sannikarṣasya bhavatyekena vyapadeśo bherīśabdavat, atha- vākṣasyāsādhāraṇatvenetyāha—yogasyeti ।।
nanvātmamanaḥ saṃyogapramāṇapakṣe pramāṇaphalayorviṣayabhedaḥ prāpnoti; ātmamanaḥ- saṃyogo hyātmamanasorviṣayaḥ, phalaṃ ca jñānākhyaṃ bāhyārthaviṣayam; na caitad yuktam, kriyākārakayorekaviṣayatvābhyupagamāditi svayamevāśaṅkate—saṃyoga ityādinī phalayorityantena । uttareṇa pariharati-nāsāvarthe hi vyāpṛtaṃ dvayamiti । aya- mabhiprāyaḥ—prameyavacano vā viṣayaśabdaḥ, āśrayavacano vā ? tatra prameyavacanaṃ viṣayapadamaṅgīkṛtya pramāṇaphalayorviṣayaikyamāha—arthe hi vyāpṛtaṃ dvayamiti ।।
āśrayavacane'pi viṣayaśabde viṣayaikyamāha—athāpīti । ātmamanassaṃ- yogavijñānayorubhayorapyātmāśritatvānnāsti viṣayabheda ityarthaḥ ।।
pratyuta jñānākhyāṃ kriyāṃ pratīndriyāpekṣayā sannikṛṣṭatvena karaṇatvādātmamanaḥ- saṃyogasyaiva pramāṇyaṃ yuktam, sannikṛṣṭaṃ ca ubhāyorapyekārthasamavāyādityāha— prakṛṣṭasādhanatvācceti ।।
saṃyogatritayapramāṇapakṣe tu na sarvaviṣayaphalotpattiḥ, nāpi viṣayabheda ityāha—pramāṇa ityardhena । vyāścaya. mā. vāpratyakṣam. mā. na yogādvi. cau, ananta. mu. saṃyogo'syātma. mā. vācinaṃ viṣayamaṅgī. mā.
pramāṇaṃ tvindriyaṃ yasya tasyaiko viṣayaḥ sphuṭaḥ ।। 69 ।।
pramāṇaphalate buddhyorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyeyoḥ ।
yadā tadāpi pūrvoktā bhinnārthatvanivāraṇā ।। 70 ।।
viśeṣaṇe tu boddhavye yadālocanamātrakam ।
prasūte niścayaṃ paścāt tasya prāmāṇyakalpanā ।। 71 ।।
niścayo hi phalaṃ tasya nāsāvālocite yadā ।
tadā naiva pramāṇatvaṃ syādarthānavadhāraṇāt ।। 72 ।।
hānādibuddhiphalatā pramāṇaṃ ced viśeṣyadhīḥ ।
indriyapramāṇapakṣe tu sphuṭameva viṣayaikyamityāha—pramāṇantvityardhena ।।
evaṃ tāvat svapakṣe bhikṣuṇoktāni dūṣaṇāni parihṛtya naiyāyikapakṣe'pi parihartumāha—pramāṇaphalate iti । yadyapi viśeṣye prameye viśeṣaṇajñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ viśeṣyajñānaṃ ca phalam, taduktam—“samavāyinaḥ śvaityāt śvaityabuddheśca śvete buddhiste kāryakaraṇabhūte”—ityevaṃ vadadbhiḥ, tathāpi viśeṣaṇajñānasya viśeṣya eva vyāpṛta- tvānnāsti viṣayabhedaḥ । taduktam—“tatra vyāpārācca pramāṇatā” iti ।।
