nanu jagadvaicitryānyathānupapattyā pratīyata eva dharmaḥ, kimityarthāpattigamyo na bhavatītyāha—nanvarthāpattirevamiti ।।
sukhaduḥkhādibhedena kadācit jagadvaicitryamanupapadyamānaṃ vilakṣaṇamadṛṣṭaṃ kalpa- yati । na ca sevādhyayanādi dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ jagadvaicitryopapādakam, vyabhicārādi- yā/?/ha—dṛṣṭasya vyabhicāritvāditi ।।
evaṃ naiyāyikamatamupanyasya lokāyatadarśanābhyupagamena parihāramāha— syādevamityardhena । svabhāvata eva kānicit kāraṇāni sukhirūpaṃ padārthamupajana- yanti, kānicit duḥkhirūpam; kimadṛṣṭakalpanayetyarthaḥ । avaśyaṃ cāyaṃ svābhāvika- pakṣo'dṛṣṭavādinā'pyabhyupagantavya ityāha—dharmaśakteścetyardhena ।।
adṛṣṭamapi jagadvaicitryopapādakaṃ vicitramevābhyupagantavyam । taccāpi vaicitrya- madṛṣṭasya svābhāvikam, adṛṣṭāntarakalpanāyāmanavasthāprasaṅgāt । evaṃ ca sati jagadvaicitryameva svābhāvikaṃ bhaviṣyatītyapārthakamadṛṣṭakalpanamityāha—yathāveti ।।
idānīmabhyupagamyādṛṣṭamātraṃ pratyarthāpatteḥ prāmāṇyaṃ adṛṣṭaviśeṣābhiprāyeṇa “athāto dharmajijñāsā” ityuktam । tatraiva ca pratyakṣādyanupraveśavyavacchedena coda- karma. cau, ananta. mu. vathā. ca. cau, ananta. mu. tathāpi. ci. cau, mu.
adharme dharmarūpe vā hyavibhakte phalaṃ prati ।
kimapyastīti vijñānaṃ narāṇāṃ kvopayujyate ।। 105 ।।
kiṃ nu yāgāṃdito duḥkhaṃ hiṃsādeḥ kiṃ sukhodbhavaḥ ।
svargaputrādibhedaśca kīdṛśāt karmabhedataḥ ।। 106 ।।
iti yāvadavijñānaṃ tāvannaiva pravartate ।
pravṛttyaṅgaṃ ca yajjñānaṃ tasya mūlaṃ pratīkṣyate ।। 107 ।।
tasmāt siddhe'pi sāmānye viśeṣo nāgamādṛte ।
viśeṣasya tu jijñāsā sūtrakāraṇe sūtritā ।। 108 ।।
gamyamāne viśeṣe ca tadantarbhāvakāritaḥ ।
sāmānyapratyayo'pi syācchāstrādevetyakāraṇam ।। 109 ।।
yathārthāpattirevaṃ ca nānumā nopameṣyate ।
śāstraṃ cet tadapekṣeta tasyaiva syāt pramāṇatā ।। 110 ।।
pratyakṣāgrahaṇaṃ yattu liṅgāderavikalpanāt ।
nāyāḥ pramāṇyaṃ pratijñātam—“codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharmaḥ”-iti, tasyaiva pravṛttya- ṅgatvāt । tatra ca nārthāpatteḥ pramāṇyamityetat ślokacatuṣṭayenāha—adharma ityā- dinā ।।
yadā ca viśeṣe codanā pramāṇaṃ tadā tadantargatatvenādṛṣṭamātre'pi saiva pramā- ṇam, yadi tena prayojanamityāha—gamyamāna iti ।।
evamanumānopamānoyorarthāpattivadadṛṣṭaviśeṣaṃ prati śāstrāpekṣitvādakāraṇatva- mityāha yathārthāpattiriti ।।
evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣadvāratvāditi bhāṣyaṃ paramatena vyākhyāyādhunā svamatena vyācaṣṭe—pratyakṣagrahaṇamityardhena ।।
prayogasamarpakamevedaṃ bhāṣyam । ayaṃ prayogārthaḥ—anumānopamānārthāpattī- nāmiti dharminirdeśaḥ, dharmaṃ pratyakāraṇatvamiti, sādhyo dharmaḥ, pratyakṣadvāratvāditi hetuḥ ।
“pratyakṣagrahaṇaṃ yattu liṅgāderavikalpanāt” iti ।
tanneṣṭatvād vikalpasyāpyartharūpopakāriṇaḥ ।। 111 ।।
asti hyalocanājñānaṃ prathamaṃ nirvikalpakam ।
bālamūkādivijñānasadṛśyaṃ śuddhavastujam ।। 112 ।।
tataścāsiddho heturiti yuktam; tasya kaḥ parihārastatrāpyāha—tanneṣṭatvādityardhena । savikalpasyāpyartharūpopakāriṇaḥ pratyakṣatveneṣṭatvānnāsiddhatvaṃ hetoḥ । tatrārtharūpo- pakāriṇaḥ ityanena bhrāntismṛtijñānayoḥ vyavacchedaṃ karoti; te hi nārtharūpa- mupakurutaḥ, ekatra viparītapratibhānāt, anyatra ca gṛhītatayā pratibhāsena pūrva- pramāṇaśeṣatvāt ।।
idānīṃ nirvikalpakamastitvena pramāṇatvena ca sādhayitumāha—asti hīti । nanu savikalpakaṃ vijñānamākṣiptaṃ tadeva ca sādhyatvena pratijñātam; tadana- ntaraṃ nirvikalpakajñānasādhanamasambandhamucyate । apiśabdāt tasyāpi pratijñānāt tena ca vinā savikalpakasyānutpatteḥ sadbhāvādārabhya vipratipatteśca nāsambandhatvam । tathācāhuḥ—
“na so'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte ।
anuviddhamiva jñānaṃ sarvaṃ śabdena gamyate”।। iti ।
tatrāstītyanena saṃvedanasadbhāve pramāṇamāha; saṃvedyagataṃ hi śabdāsaṃjalparahitamartha- saṃvedanam । tathā coktamanyairapi—
“sahṛtya sarvataścintāṃ stimitenāntarātmanā ।
sthito'pi cakṣuṣā rūpamīkṣate sākṣajā matiḥ”।। iti ।
ālocanajñānamityanena bodhakatvaṃ prāmāṇye hetumāha; । prathamamityanenāpyastitvaṃ- nirvikalpakatvaṃ ca yuktayā sādhayati । vācakaśabdasmaraṇasamanantaraṃ hi savi- kalpakajñānamutpadyate; prabuddhaśca saṃskāraḥ smṛtimupajanayati; arthadarśanaṃ ca saṃskārodbodhakamiṣyate । vācakasmaraṇācca pūrvaṃ yadarthadarśanam, tadeva śabdasañcalpa- rahitatvānnirvikalpakaṃ śabdasambandhagrahaṇābhāvena bālamūkayoriva vijñānam; śuddha- na hi so'sti. mā. baudhakatvamiṣyate. mā.
na viśeṣo na sāmānyaṃ tadānīmanubhūyate ।
tayorādhārabhūtā tu vyaktirevāvasīyate ।। 113 ।।
mahāsāmānyamanyaistu dravyaṃ saditi cocyate ।
sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ ca pratyakṣasyaivamāśritam ।। 114 ।।
viśeṣāstu pratīyante savikalpakabuddhibhiḥ ।
te ca kecit pratidravyaṃ kecid bahuṣu saṃśritāḥ ।। 115 ।।
tānakalpayadutpannaṃ vyāvṛttānugatātmanā ।
gavyaśve copajātaṃ tu pratyakṣaṃ na viśiṣyate ।। 116 ।।
vastujamitīdaṃ ca śabdasaṃjalpavyudāsenendriyajatvasiddhyārścasāmarthyenotpannatāṃ darśa- yati ।।
idānīṃ bauddhadarśanābhiprāyeṇa tasya viṣayaṃ darśayitumāha—na viśeṣa iti । vyaktiśabdena svalakṣaṇamāha । sāmānyaviśeṣasaṃkīrtanaṃ tu parābhiprāyeṇa; na tu bauddhadarśane sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ pratyādhārādheyabhāvo'sti, tayorabhāvāt ।।
vedāntavādinastu—mahāsāmānyaṃ nirvikalpakasya viṣayamāhuḥ । tacca kecit sattāmāhuḥ, apare dravyamityetad darśayati—mahāsāmānyamiti ।।
yatra tu savikalpake bhedāvagamaḥ, tat pratyakṣameva na bhavatītyāha—viśeṣā- stviti । yatsāmānyameva gotvādirmahiṣyādibhyo nivartamāno viśeṣaḥ, sa bahuṣu saṃśrita iti ।।
evaṃ sattvabhedapratipādakasya “ātmā vā idaṃ sarvam” ityevamādeḥ āga- masya nāsti pratyakṣeṇa virodhaḥ । tataśca siddhādvaitasiddhirityāha—tānakalpayaditi । viśeṣāpratibhāsādagamyatve copajātasya nirvilpakasya na kaścidviśeṣaḥ ।। omitted pratidravyaṃ kecit. mā. tānna kalpa. mā. vyāvṛttyanu. ananta. mu. sidhyarthasāma. mā. bhāsāgamyatve. mā.
tadayuktaṃ pratidravyaṃ bhinnarūpopalambhanāt ।
na hyākhyātumaśakyatvād bhedo nāstīti gamyate ।। 117 ।।
nirvikalpakabodhe'pi dvyātmakasyāpi vastunaḥ ।
grahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇākhyeyaṃ jñātrā śuddhaṃ tu gṛhyate ।। 118 ।।
tatrānantaraṃ śrotriyapakṣameva tāvad viśeṣavikalpakasiddhayarthaṃ nirākartumāha— tadayuktamityardhena । saṃvedanaṃ parāmṛśatu bhavān; aśve gavi ca yat saṃvedanadvayaṃ tayoḥ kiṃ bhinnaṃ saṃvedyamutābhinnam ? ekasyāṃ vyaktau saṃvedadvayavat tatrāsmākaṃ tāvadbhinnaṃ saṃvedyam । tapasvināṃ tu na vidmaḥ kīdṛśamiti । yadi ca viṣayato bhedo na prati- bhāsate, kimiti tarhi godarśanādaśvārthī nivartate ? kimiti vā godarśane satyaśva- śabdasmaraṇaṃ na bhavati ? nanvitaretarābhāvo bhedaḥ, sa kathamiva pratyakṣasya te viṣayaḥ ? sa ca yadi bhāsate, kimiti viṣayo na bhavati ? atha na pratibhāsata eva, tarhi vaktavyaṃ kimabhāvatvena ? na cetaretarābhāvo bhedaḥ । kiṃ tarhi ? bhinnayoritaretarā- bhāva; । kaḥ punarasau bhedaḥ ? kaścetaretarābhāvaḥ ? padārthayoryatsvarūpaṃ sa eva bhedaḥ; parasparavaiviktyamabhāvaḥ । na cāśvavaiviktyameva gosvarūpam, aśvatvagotvayorekatvapra- saṅgāt । api ca yo bhedapratyayo'vabhāsate, sa eva bhedaḥ; abhāvapratyayo'bhāvaḥ । idaṃ cāyamitaretarābhāvavādī vikalpa praṣṭavya;—kiṃ bhinnayoritaretarābhāvaḥ. utā- bhinnayoḥ ? yadi bhinnayoritaretarābhāvaḥ, tarhyanyo bhedaḥ; athābhinnayoḥ; kathamitare- taravyapadeśaḥ ? kathaṃ ca tasyaiva tatrābhāvaḥ ? iti । nanu nirvikalpake ‘bhinnaḥ’ ityevaṃ nāstyavabhāsaḥ । mā bhūdevam, tathāpi bhinnamavabhāsata evetyāha—na hyākhyātumi- tyardhena । taduktamanyairapi “cakṣurvijñānasamaṃ hi nīlaṃ vijānāki nīlaṃ nīlam” iti ।।
yadapyuktam—vyaktirevāvasīyata iti, tatrāpi sāmānyavikalpasiddhyartha- māha—nirvikalpaketi । gavaye puro'vasthite sati tatra bhedapratibhāso'pyasti; nīlaśuklayoriva bhedānuvṛttau satyāmevābhedapratibhāso'pyasti । tatra bhedapratibhāsānnā- nātvamanayorabhedapratibhāsāccaikyam; yacca bhinnayoraikyam, tadeva sāmānyam; nānātvaṃ yadaikyasya, sā vyaktiḥ; tathaivaikasyāṃ bāhuleyavyaktāvupalabdhāyāṃ vyaktyantaraṃ
na tvasādhāraṇatvena paravyāvṛttyakalpanāt ।
viśeṣānugamāklṛpteḥ sāmānyamiti nāpi tat ।। 119 ।।
tataḥ paraṃ punarvastu dharmairjātyādibhiryayā ।
buddhyāvasīyate sāpi pratyakṣatvena sammatā ।। 120 ।।
śābaleyākhyamupalabhyamānaṃ pūrvānubhūtavyaktyaikyena nānātvena cāvabhāsate; idameva ca tadbhinnābhinnatvam; na tu jāteḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ prati bhedābhedau ।।
nanu prathamavyaktisandarśane sati jātyabagamo nāstiḥ tatkathaṃ lakṣyāntaropa- labdhau ‘sa evāyam’ iti pratyabhijñā pratyayaḥ ? na ca pratyabhijñāpratyayānyathānupapattyaiva pūrvaṃ jātyanubhavo'pyāsīditi kalpayituṃ śakyate, kalpye'nubhave pratyabhijñānutpādāt । kathaṃ ca prakāśarūpasya astitvamasaṃvedyamānasya ? ucyate—kena vā pratyabhijñāpratya- yotpattirdarśitā ? vyaktyantaramupalabhyamānaṃ pūrvanubhūtavyaktyaikyena nānātvena cāvabhā- sata iti vayaṃ brūmaḥ । kiñca pratyabhijñāpratyayaṃ muktvā aikyāvagamo'pyasti ? bāḍha- masti; ananubhūtapūrvaḥ prathamameva yugapad yadā gavayadvayaṃ pratipadyate, tadā kimaikyā- vagamo nāsti ? yadi ca nirvikalpake sāmānyāvagamo nāsti, kathaṃ tadanantaraṃ sāmānyaśabdayojanātmakaṃ vijñānamutpadyate ? svalakṣaṇadarśane sati sāmānyaśabdasmara- ṇānupapatteḥ, “yatsannidhāne yo dṛṣṭaḥ” iti nyāyāt । asya tvakṣaratrayanyūnasya kārikārdhasya satyamarthaṃ na vidmaḥ—“lakṣaṇākhyeyaṃ jñātrā śuddhaṃ tu gṛhyate” iti । viśeṣa ityevaṃ sāmānyamityevaṃ na gṛhṇāti, vyāvṛttyanugamavikalpayorabhāvādityāha- na tviti । śabdānusandhānapratiṣedhaparo'yaṃ ślokaḥ । sāmānyaviśeṣeṇa tu sāmānyaviśeṣarūpatayā pratibhāsate । taduktam “dvyātmakasyāpi vastuno grahaṇam” iti ।।
evaṃ tāvannirvikalpakasyāstitvaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ ca sāmānyaviśeṣaviṣayatvaṃ ca sādhitam । idānīṃ savikalpakasya yat pratyakṣatvaṃ pratijñātam, tat sādhayitumāha— tataḥ paramiti । tatra tataḥ paramityetena nirvikalpakādutpannatāṃ savikalpakasya darśa- na hyāsā, ananta. na. cāsā. cau, mu. parāvṛttyavika. mā. gamākāraḥ. mā. tyevaṃ ca gṛ. mā.
karaṇaṃ cendriyaṃ buddherna tatra jñānamāhitam ।
tataḥ smṛtyasamarthatvād vikalpo'to na vāryate ।। 121 ।।
ātmanyeva sthitaṃ jñānaṃ sa hi boddhātra gamyate ।
smaraṇe cāsya sāmarthyaṃ sandhānādau ca vidyate ।। 122 ।।
tenendriyārthasambandhe vidyamāne smarannapi ।
vikalpayan svadharmeṇa vastu pratyakṣavān naraḥ ।। 123 ।।
taccaitadindriyādhīnamiti tairvyapadiśyate ।
tadasambandhajātaṃ tu naiva pratyakṣamiṣyate ।। 124 ।।
yati । (punariti) pāramparyeṇāpyakṣajatvamastītyetat pradarśayituṃ bauddhaparikalpitamā- nasapratyakṣavat । vastvityanenārthasāmarthyotpannatāṃ nirvikalpakavad darśayati । dharmairitya- nenārthantaranyāsaṃ nirākaroti । jātyādibhirityanenāpi śabdādhyāsaḥ । etaduktaṃ bhavati—jātyādibhirdharmabhūtairviśiṣṭo'rthoṃ yathāvasīyate, na śabdaviśiṣṭo nāpya- rthāntararūpeṇa । buddhyāvasīyate ityanena bodhakatvaṃ prāmāṇye hetumāha । sāpi pratya- kṣatvena saṃmatetyanenāpi tadbhāvabhāvitvenākṣajatvaṃ darśayati ।।
yat punaridamuktam—kiñcit savikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ smṛtaśabdasaṃjñatvenotpa- dyate—‘devadatto'yam’ iti, kiñcit pūrvānubhūtārthānusandhānenotpadyate ‘sa evā- yam’ iti; na cendriyasya smaraṇādau sāmarthyam, acetanatvāditi । tatrāha— karaṇaṃ ceti ślokadvayena । ayamabhiprāyaḥ—kriyā karmaṇi kartari vā samavaiti; na cendriyasya jñānakriyāyāṃ karmatvam, apratibhāsanāt । nāpi kartṛtvam, aboddhṛtvāt । ātmani tu kriyā samavaiti, tasyaiva cetanatvādastyeva smaraṇādau sāmarthyamiti ।।
yadyātmanaḥ smaraṇādau sāmarthyamastīti kṛtvā savikalpasya pratyakṣatvamucyate hanta tarhi nivṛttendriyavyāpārasyāpi śabdaṃ smarato yat savikalpakaṃ jñānamutpadyate ‘gaurayam’ iti, tasyāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ prāpnotītyāśaṅkyāha—tenendriyārthasambandha iti । indriyārthasannikarṣotpanne jñāne loke pratyakṣaśabdaḥ prayudajyata ityarthaḥ ।।
idānīṃ pratyakṣaśabdaprayogasya nimittaṃ darśayitumāha—taccaitādityardhena । tatsmṛtyādyasamartha. ananta. mu. śabdasajjatvena. mā. asyeva. mā.
punaḥpunarvikalpe'pi yāvānadhigamo bhavet ।
tatsambandhānusāreṇa sarvaṃ pratyakṣamiṣyate ।। 125 ।।
na hi praviṣṭamātrāṇāmuṣṇād garbhagṛhādipu ।
arthā na pratibhāntīti gṛhyante nendriyaiḥ punaḥ ।। 126 ।।
yathā tvābhāsamātreṇa pūrvaṃ jñātvā svarūpataḥ ।
paścāt tatrāvabudhyante tathā jātyādidharmataḥ ।। 127 ।।
yadi tvālocya saṃmīlya netre kaścid vikalpayet ।
na syāt pratyakṣatā tasya sambandhānanusārataḥ ।। 128 ।।
atadadhīne tu pratyakṣaśabdo na prayukta ityāha—tadasambandhajātantvi- tyardhena । nanu yadīndriyajatvena pratyakṣatvam, evaṃ tarhi savikalpakasya tanna prāpnoti; taddhi sāmānyāvabhāsamutpadyate । na cendriyasya sāmānyena saha sambandho'sti । tadabhāvādyadi syāt, prathamacakṣussannipāto'pi pratīyeya । tatra “nirvikalpakabodhe'pi dvyātmakasyāpi vastuno grahaṇam” ityuktameva ।।
abhyupagamavādena tvāha—punaḥ punariti ।।
idamatra bhavān vikalpya praṣṭavyaḥ—anuparatendriyavyāpārasya nirvikalpaka- jñānasyānantaraṃ savikalpakaṃ sāmānyāvabhāsaṃ jñānamutpadyate, uta na ? yadi notpradyate, tatastadabhāvādevāpratyakṣatvam, kimandriyajatvena ? athotpadyate, tatpratibhāsādeva svalakṣaṇavat sāmānyādīnāmastitvamindriyayogyatvaṃ cāyātu; prathamacakṣussannipātāda- pratītiḥ, tayaitāvat siddhyati—yaduta nirvikalpakagrahaṇayogyāḥ sāmānyādayo na bhavantīti; na tu pratīyamānasya savikalpakena nāstitvam । na ca prathamacakṣussanni- pātādapratītyā nāstitvamityāha—na hi praviṣṭamātrāṇāmiti ।।
astitvena tu pratībhāsaṃ sādhayataḥ svalakṣaṇapratībhāsakāle sāmānyādīnāmapi pratībhāsaprasaṅgaḥ, svalakṣaṇadharmatvāt teṣāmityāha—yathā tviti ।।
uparatendriyavyāpārotpannasya tu pratyakṣatvaṃ nāstītyāha—yadi tviti ।। satī jātiḥ pratīyate cau, ananta. mu śabdena prayu. mā. yadindriya. mā. bhāvādvikalpya. mā.
asambandhavikalpe'pi tulyamātmādi kāraṇam ।
tenāsādhāraṇatvaṃ syādatrākṣasyaiva kalpane ।। 129 ।।
nirvikalpakabodhe'pi nākṣaṃ kevalakāraṇam ।
tatpāramparyajāte vā rūḍhiḥ syāt paṅkajādivat ।। 130 ।।
animittaiva vā rūḍhiḥ sutarāṃ savikalpakam ।
pratyakṣaṃ saṃmataṃ loke na tathā nirvikalpakam ।। 131 ।।
vṛddhaprayogagamyāśca śabdārthāḥ sarva eva naḥ ।
tena yatra prayukto'yaṃ na tasmādapanīyate ।। 132 ।।
siddhānugamamātraṃ hi kartuṃ yuktaṃ parikṣakaiḥ ।
na sarvalokasiddhasya lakṣaṇena nivartanam ।। 133 ।।
ātmendriyakāraṇatve samāne'pyasādhāraṇatvādakṣeṇaiva vyapadeśo nātmane- tyāha—asambandhavikalpe'pīti ।।
sāmagryantarotpanne'pi ca yathākṣeṇaiva vyapadeśo nirvikalpake, tathā savikalpa- ke'pi bhaviṣyatītyāha—nirvikalpakabodhe'pītyardhena ।
idānīmetad darśayitumāha—tatpāramparyajāte veti sārdhena । aparokṣā- rthāvabhāsi yat savikalpakaṃ jñānamutpadyate, yatra tāvad buddhaiḥ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ prayujyate; tatra yadi sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vākṣavyāpārastatrāsti, tadā yaugiko'yaṃ pratyakṣaśabda- statra bhaviṣyati utpale paṅkajaśabdaprayogavat; atha nāsti, tadā devadattādiśabda- vadavyutpannaiva saṃjñā; sarvathā pratyakṣaśabdaprayogādasti pratyakṣatvaṃ savikalpakasya ।।
athaivaṃ satyapi kalpanāpoḍhalakṣaṇavirahānnāstītyucyate, tatrāpyāha—vṛddha- prayogagamyāśceti ।।
api ca, kalpanāpoḍhalakṣaṇavirahād vā savikalpakasya pratyakṣatvaṃ neṣṭam, indriyajatvābhāvād vā ? tatra lakṣaṇasyāyaṃ viṣaya eva na bhavatītyāha—siddhānugama- tena sādhāraṇa. mā. lpe'ṣi vijñāne. mā.
kalpanāyāḥ svasaṃvittāvindriyādhīnatā katham ।
manastatrendriyaṃ cet syād gotvādāvapi tat samam ।। 134 ।।
svasaṃvittau tadiṣṭaṃ celloko na hyevamicchati ।
tasmād rūḍhitvameṣyavyaṃ pāribhāṣikatāpi vā ।। 135 ।।
manasastvindriyatvena sukhaduḥkhādibuddhiṣu ।
yathā pratyakṣataivaṃ nastadadhīnā bhaviṣyati ।। 136 ।।
tadadhīnatvasāmye'pi kalpanāpoḍhaśabdanāt ।
pratyakṣaṃ kiñcideveṣṭaṃ yathā tava tathaiva naḥ ।। 137 ।।
mātrāmiti । lokaprasiddhireva lakṣaṇenānugamyate na sarvalokaprasiddhasya svecchāvaśena lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā nivṛttiḥ, nirmūlatvaprasaṅgāt ।।
akṣajatvābhāvena tu savikalpakasyāpi svasaṃvittau pratyakṣatvamiṣṭam, tanna prāpnotītyāha—kalpanāyā ityardhena ।
athākṣajamānasasaṃjñasamanantarapratyayajanyatvenākṣādhīnatvāt pratyakṣamiṣṭamityā- śaṅkya—manastatrendriyaṃ cetsyādityanena gotvādāvapi tatsamamityanena pari- harati । svaprakāśavad viṣayaprakāśe'pi tasya tulyatvādityarthaḥ ।।
svaprakāśa eva tasya vyāpāra iti cet tadāha—svasaṃvittau taṃdiṣṭaṃ cediti । atra parihāramāha—loko na hyevamicchatīti । aṃśāṃśibhāvasyā- vidyamānatvādityarthaḥ । ato yathā svasaṃvittau pratyakṣaśabdo rūḍhaḥ pāribhāṣiko vā, tathā viṣayaprakāśe'pi bhaviṣyatītyāha—tasmādityardhena ।।
api ca bāhyākṣajanyatvaṃ vināpi yathā sukhādiviṣayavijñānaṃ manojanyatvāt pratyakṣamiṣṭaṃ naiyāyikānām, tathātrāpi bhaviṣyatītyāha—manasastviti ।।
samāne'pi ca manojanyatve pratyakṣaśabdaprayoga eva niyāmako bhaviṣyati bhavatāmiva kalpanāpoḍhalakṣaṇamityāha—tadadhīnatvasāmye'pīti ।। nāpi. mā.
liṅgādyabhāvataścāpi nānumānādidhīriyam ।
na ca pūrvamadṛṣṭatvāt smṛtitvamupapadyate ।। 138 ।।
bādhakapratyayāsattvānnāprāmāṇyaṃ ca yujyate ।
tasmāt pratyakṣamevedaṃ vyavahārastathaiva vaḥ ।। 139 ।।
jātyādyarthāntaraṃ yasmādasadrūpe'pi vastuni ।
bhavatyadhyasya dhīstasmānmṛgatṛṣṇādibhiḥ samā ।। 140 ।।
naitadaśvādibuddhīnāmadhyāropādyasambhavāt ।
sthitaṃ naiva hi jātyādeḥ paratvaṃ vyaktito hi naḥ ।। 141 ।।
pariśeṣyādapi savikalpakasya pratyakṣatvaṃ pramāṇaprāptamityāha—liṅgādyabhā- vata ityardhena । trirūpaliṅgānutpattyā tāvannānumānam ।
bhavaddarśane ca sāmānyapratibhāsatvāt savikalpakasya svalakṣaṇaviṣayanirvi- kalpakapratyakṣaviṣayatā nāstīti na smṛtitvam; tadāha—na ca pūrvamityardhena ।
nāpyaprāmāṇyaṃ bādhakapratyayāsattvāt tadāha—bādhaketyāditripādyā ।
bhavatāmapi savikalpakena pratyakṣeṇaiva vyavahāraḥ । tathā hi—jñātasambandho dṛśyamāno'rtho'rthāntaramavagamayati; sāmānyarūpatvācca liṅgaliṅginorna nirvikalpakena svalakṣaṇaviṣayeṇa ca sambandhagrahaṇamityāha vyavahārastathaiva vaḥ iti ।।
idānīṃ “bādhakapratyayāsattvānnāprāmāṇyaṃ ca yujyate” iti yaduktam, tadākṣipannāha—jātyādyarthāntaramiti । svalakṣaṇād bhinnā hi jātiguṇakriyādaya iṣyante, ananyaśvetavat, sadbhāvaprasaṅgāt । ayaṃ pramāṇārthaḥ—savikalpakaṃ vijñānama- pramāṇamiti pratijñā, arthāntare arthāntarāropeṇotpadyamānatvāditi hetvarthaḥ. ūṣare salilajñānavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।
tadetad dūṣayitumāha—naitaditi । yadi hi jātyādayaḥ svalakṣaṇād bhinnāḥ syuḥ, tadārthāntare dravye'rthāntarajātyādirūpeṇotpadyamānatvādadhyāsaḥ syāt; na tu ‘bādhaka’ ityasyānantaram ‘na ca’ ityarddhaḥ mā. tathaiva ca. cau, ana. mu. baudhaka. mā.
yadi hyekāntato bhinnaṃ viśeṣyāt syād viśeṣaṇam ।
svānurūpāṃ sadā buddhiṃ viśeṣye janayet katham ।। 142 ।।
sphaṭikādau tu lākṣādisvarūpā yā matirbhavet ।
avyutpannasya sā mithyā vyutpannāyāṃ hi bhedadhīḥ ।। 143 ।।
na tu jātyādibhirmuktaṃ vastu dṛṣṭaṃ kadācana ।
tadvimokena vā tāni lākṣādisphaṭikādivat ।। 144 ।।
tatrāpi cenna dṛśyeta bhedaḥ kaiścit kadācana ।
raktādibuddhisamyaktvaṃ vinivāryeta kena vā ।। 145 ।।
na cāpyayutasiddhānāṃ sambandhitvena kalpanā ।
nāniṣpannasya sambandho niṣpattau yutasiddhatā ।। 146 ।।
tadastītyuktam—nirvikalpakabodhe'pi dvyātmakasyāpi vastunaḥ । grahaṇam” iti । tadanena hetorasiddhatvamuddhāritam (muddhāṭitam) ।।
jātyādīnāṃ dravyādabheda eva pramāṇāntaramāha—yadi hīti । ayaṃ pramā- ṇārthaḥ—viśeṣyādabhinnaṃ viśeṣaṇamiti pratijñā, viśeṣye sadā svānurūpabuddhijana- katvāditi hetvarthaḥ svalakṣaṇasvarūpavaditi dṛṣṭantaḥ ।।
nanu bhinnā api lākṣādayo bhinne sphaṭikādau svānurūpāṃ buddhiṃ janadhantye- vetyanaikāntikatvamāśaṅkya sadetiviśeṣaṇaphalaṃ darśamitumāha—sphaṭikādāviti ।।
na tu jātyājayaḥ svalakṣaṇaviviktāḥ, svalakṣaṇaṃ vā jātyādiviviktamu- palabdhamityāha—na tu jātyādibhiriti ।।
yadi tu tatrāpi sadaivābhedabuddhiḥ syāt, tadā sapakṣa eva syādityāha— tatrāpi cediti ।।
nanu ca bhinnā api jyātyādayaḥ samavāyād dravye svānurūpāṃ budviṃ janayiṣya- ntīti aprayojakatvaṃ hetorityāśaṅkyāha—na cāpīti । ayamabhiprāyaḥ—ayuta- na hi. ananta. mu. tyādinirmuktam. cau, ananta. mu.
tathā ca sati sambandhe hetuḥ kaścinna vidyate ।
ṣaṇṇāmapi na sambandhaḥ padārthānāṃ pratīyate ।। 147 ।।
samavāyaniyogācca viśleṣaḥ syāt parasparam ।
tatklṛptāvavyavasthā syāt tasya tasyānyasaṅgateḥ ।। 148 ।।
atha tasyātmarūpatvānnānyasambandhakalpanā ।
abhedāt samavāyo'stu svarūpaṃ dharmadharmiṇoḥ ।। 149 ।।
na hi sa vyatiriktaḥ san sambandhaṃ pratipadyate ।
siddhānāṃ sambandhaḥ samavāya iṣyate; taccānupapannam; aniṣpannasyāvidyamānatvena sambandhābhāvāt । ata eva na niṣpavidyamānayoḥ, niṣpattyuttarakālaṃ ca sambandhani- ṣpattau yutasiddhatāprasaṅgādityarthaḥ ।।
yutasiddhatve ca dravyaguṇayoryutasiddhatvena dravyāśritatvena ca samavāyasaṃyoga- yorabhāvāt tayoḥ sambandho na prāpnotītyāha—tathā cetyardhena । āstāṃ tāvad dravyaguṇayoḥ samavāyaṃ vinā sambandhābhāvaḥ, ṣaṇṇāmapi padārthānāṃ sambandho na prāpnotītyāha—ṣaṇṇāmityardhena । dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ dravyeṇa saha sama- vāyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ parasparaṃ caikārthasamavāyalakṣaṇaḥ samavāyaṃ vinā na prāpno- tītyarthaḥ ।।
api ca, samavāyaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ vyatirikto vā syādavyatirikto vā ? vyatiriktapakṣe'pi tābhyāṃ sambandho'sambandho vā syāt ? yadi tāvad vyatirikto'- sambandhaśca tadā dūṣaṇamāha—samavāyetyardhena । atha sambandhaḥ, tatrāpi saṃyoga- stāvannāstyeva, samavāyasyādravyatvāt; samavāyāntarābhyupagame cānavasthetyāha— tadityardhena ।।
avyatirekapakṣe dūṣaṇamāha—atha tasyeti । avyatirekapakṣe tābhyāmana- nyatvena samavāyasya yadi sambandhāntarakalpanābhāva iṣyate, tadā dharmadharmiṇo rūpānu- praviṣṭasya tasyābhāvaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ ।।
vyatiriktastu samavāyaḥ sambandharūpo'pi sambadhyamānaḥ saṃyogavat sambandhā- ntaramapekṣata evetyāha—na hītyardhena । sambandhāntaraṃ vineti vākyaśeṣaḥ ।
tasmiṃstābhyāmabhinne tu na nānātvaṃ tayorbhavet ।। 150 ।।
nanu dharmātirekeṇa dharmiṇo'nupalambhanāt ।
tatsaṅghamātra evāyaṃ gavādiḥ syād vanādivat ।। 151 ।।
āvirbhāvatirobhāvadharmakeṣvanuyāyi yat ।
taddharmi yatra vā jñānaṃ prāgdharmagrahaṇād bhavet ।। 152 ।।
ato jātyādirūpeṇa dharmi yad gṛhyate naraiḥ ।
pārarūpyaṃ na tasyāstītyaprāmāṇyaṃ na yujyate ।। 153 ।।
yasyāpi vyatirekaḥ syād dharmebhyo dharmiṇaḥ sphuṭaḥ ।
anyatiriktapakṣe dūṣaṇamāha—tasminnityardhena । yadi samavāyaḥ samavāyibhyo'- vyatiriktaḥ syāt tadā tayorekasmādananyatvena padārthatrayavināśaḥ syādityarthaḥ ।।
“tataḥ paraṃ punarvastu dharmaiḥ” ityuktam, tadanupapannam; yato na rūparasā- divyatiriktamanyaṃ dharmiṇamupalabhāmahe, rūpādināmagrahaṇe tasyāpratibhāsanāt yathā vṛkṣāgrahaṇe vanamityapratibhāsanāt na vṛkṣavyatirekeṇa vanaṃ nāmānyat syāt । ekade- śasthitāṃstu vṛkṣānālocya ‘vanam’ iti pratyakṣa utpadyate, tathaikadeśāvasthitān rūpādīnālocya ‘gaurayama,’ ‘ghaṭo'yam’ iti vā pratyaya utpadyate । tadāha— nanu dharmātirekeṇati ।।
tatra tāvaddharmisadbhāve pramāṇamāha—āvirbhāvāditaddharmyantena । āmāvā- syāyāṃ haritaṃ badaramupalabhya punastadeva pakvaṃ pītaviśiṣṭamupalabhamānaḥ ‘sa evāya- mupahataharitāvastha upasañjātapītāvasthaḥ’ ityavasthādvaye'pyanusandhatte । tasmādevamava- sthopasthānamastīti siddham । evaṃ dharmisadbhāve pramāṇamabhidhāyedānīṃ “tadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvāt” iti yaduktaṃ tatrāsiddhatvaṃ nāma hetordūṣaṇamāha—yatra veti śeṣeṇa । dharmagrahaṇe'pi dharmī pratīyate, yathā pradoṣasamaye śuklāgrahaṇe'pi balākā- paṅktiravadhāryate ।।
prakṛtamupasaṃharannāha—ato jātyādirūpeṇeti ।।
athāpi dravyavyatiriktā jātyādayaḥ, tathāpi jātiviśiṣṭatayaiva nityamavaga- myamānatvānna mithyātvamityāha—yasyāpi vyatireka iti ।।
nityaṃ tasyāpi tādrūpyānna mithyātvaṃ prasajyate ।। 154 ।।
yo hyanyarūpasaṃvedyaḥ saṃvedyatānyathā punaḥ ।
sa mithyā na tu tenaiva yo nityamavagamyate ।। 155 ।।
na cānekendriyagrāhyaṃ bhinnatāṃ pratipadyate ।
mā bhūd bhinnaśarīrasya grāhyatvād rūpabhinnatā ।। 156 ।।
jātyabhedādabhedaścedindriyatvena tatsamam ।
tulyabuddherato bhinnā na sattendriyabhedataḥ ।। 157 ।।
buddhibhedācca naikatvaṃ rūpādināṃ prasajyate ।
ekānekatvamiṣṭaṃ vā satārūpādirūpataḥ ।। 158 ।।
bādhakapratyayo'pi hi mithyātve hetuḥ, na vyatiriktaviśiṣṭatvamityāha— yo hīti ।।
nanu jātyādīviśiṣṭamekaṃ dravyaṃ pratīyate; na ca tadekam, anekendriya- grāhyatvāt rūparasavat । taduktam “darśana sparśanaṃ ca dravyam” iti । tatkathamiva na mithyātvamityāśaṅkyāha na cānekendriyagrāhyamiti । tadanena hetoranaikāntikatvaṃ darśayati । etasminnapi rūpasvalakṣaṇe bhinnaśarīrasthānekendriyagrāhyatvadarśanāditi ।।
atha cakṣuṣṭvajāterekatvenānekendriyagrāhyatā nāstītyanekāntikatvaṃ parihriyate, tadendriyajāterekatvādanekendriyagrāhyatā dravyasya nāstītyasiddhatvaṃ hetorityāha— jātyabhedādityardhena । pratibhāsabhedo hi pratibhāsyabhedāvagame pramāṇam, na bhinnendriyagrāhyatvam; tena rūparasagandhasparśaśabdeṣu bhinnandriyagrāhyāpi sattaikai- vetyāha—tulyabuddherityardhena । anenāpyanaikāntikatvameva darśitam । sattāyā vipakṣe dharmiṇi darśanāt ।।
idānīmaprayojakatvaṃ darśayitumāha—buddhibhedādityardhena । pratibhāsabheda- prayukto hi rūparasādibhedaḥ na bhinnendriyagrāhyatvādityarthaḥ । omitted ayamardhaḥ. cau. mu. saṃvedyo vānya. ananta. mu. tvādbhinnarūpatā. cau. ananta. mu. bhedataḥ. ananta. mu.
kvacicca saṅkarānnākṣamekamityavasīyate ।
dārḍhyadaurbalyabhedena vyavasthāpi yataḥ kvacit ।। 159 ।।
yathā hi manasaḥ sārdhaṃ rūpādau cakṣurādinā ।
pravṛttiḥ sukhaduḥkhādau kevalasyaiva dṛśyate ।। 160 ।।
na kvacit saṅkarābhāvāt sarvatraiva nivartate ।
kvacicca saṅkaraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṅkaro'nyatra kalpyate ।। 161 ।।
śrotrāderupaghāte'pi śabdādismṛtidarśanāt ।
vartamānasya cājñānād vyavasthā saṃpratīyate ।। 162 ।।
siddhasādhyatāṃ pratyakṣavirodhaṃ ca darśannāha—ekānekatvamityardhena । dravyasya hi rūparasādirūpatayā bhedo'pyastyeva ‘yamahamadrākṣaṃ tamahaṃ spṛśāmi’ iti tattvapratyayādityarthaḥ ।।
evaṃ tarhi indriyāntarāviṣaye'pi indriyāntaraṃ pravartata ityanekendriyākatvaṃ vṛthaivetyāśaṅkyāha—kvacicceti । yadi nāma dravye darśanasparśanayoḥ saṅkarastathāpi rūpasparśādau vyavasthādarśanādastyevendriyāntaraphalamityarthaḥ ।।
tatra tāvadāntarasyendriyāntare sukhaduḥkhādau bāhye ca rūparasādau cakṣurādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ saṅkare vyavasthāyāṃ ca dṛṣṭāntaṃ darśayitumāha—yathā hīti ।।
tadeva vivṛṇoti—na kvaciditi । na kvacit sukhaduḥkhādau saṅkarābhāvā- danyatrāpi rūparasādau saṅkarābhāvaḥ; kvacidvā rūparasādau saṅkaradarśanādanyatrāpi sukha- duḥkhādau saṅkara ityarthaḥ ।।
idānīṃ “dārḍhyadaurbalyabhedena” iti yaduktaṃ tadvivṛṇoti—śrotrāderiti । bāhmendriyopaghāte'pi śabdādayaḥ smaryante, sukhaduḥkhādayaśca pratīyante; na tvaparo- kṣatayā śabdādayaśca pratīyanta ityarthaḥ ।।
nanu ca tvagavyatirekāt tvagevaikamindriyamiṣṭamitīṣṭamevaikendriyatvamiti kecit । tataścānekendriyaparikalpanaṃ vṛthaiveti kā tatrāniṣṭāpattirityāśaṅkya dūṣaya- gamyate. ananta. mu. yāṅkatvam. mā.
ekaṃ yadi bhavedakṣaṃ sarvaṃ gṛhyeta vā na vā ।
kalpyate śaktibhedaścecchaktirevendriyaṃ bhavet ।। 163 ।।
śṛṇuyād badhiraḥ śabdaṃ saṅkare cakṣurādinā ।
manaso vā svatantratve vartamānārthabuddhiṣu ।। 164 ।।
na smared badhiraḥ śabdaṃ śrotraṃ cet smṛtikāraṇam ।
smṛtivad vā bhavedasya vartamānārthadhīrapi ।। 165 ।।
smṛtiśca na bhavet paścād gṛhṇīyāt tanna cenmanaḥ ।
nnāha—ekaṃ yadītyardhena । ekākṣaparikalpanāyāṃ hi tasya duṣṭatve sarvasyaiva rūparasā- derapratipattiḥ, aduṣṭarūpatve vā pratipattiḥ syāt; rūpasparśayorgrahaṇāgrahaṇe na syātā- mityarthaḥ । anekaśaktikalpanāyāmapyasmatpakṣa evetyāha—kalpyata ityardhena । tasmādanekamindriyaṃ kvacit saṅkīrṇaṃ kvacid vyavasthitamiti ।।
yastu kvacit saṅkarādarśanādanyatrāpi saṅkaramāpādayati, tasyāyaṃ doṣa ityāha— śṛṇuyādityardhena । yadi ca yathāntare bāhyendriyanirapekṣaṃ manaḥ pravartate, tathā bāhye'pi syāta; tathāpi sa eva doṣa ityāha—manasa ityardhena । “śṛṇuyād badhiraḥ śabdam” iti vākyaśeṣaḥ ।।
yadi bāhyavadāntare'pyarthe bāhyendriyasahitaṃ manaḥ pravartate, tadā sa eva doṣa ityāha—na smaredītyardhena ।
āntarasya tu bāhye'rthe bāhyendriyanirapekṣasya pravṛttāvayaṃ doṣa ityāha— smṛtivadvetyardhena ।।
kathaṃ punaridamavagamyate—manasaḥ sārdhaṃ rūpādau cakṣurādibhiḥ pravṛttiḥ, na punaścakṣurādereva tadbhāvabhāvitvenetyāśaṅkyāha—smṛtiśceti tripādyā । yadi rūpādau cakṣurādipravṛttikāle manaso'pi pravṛttirna syāt tadā utarakālamagṛhītatvāt smaraṇaṃ na prāpnotītyarthaḥ । tadanupapannam; ātmā grahītā; tasya ca cakṣurādibhirgrahaṇaṃ manasā sarvairgṛhyeta. cau, ananta. mu. śaktimeva. mā. sthitivadvā. mā. āntaram. mā.
śrotragrahaṇavelāyāṃ na ca sarvā smṛtirbhavet ।। 166 ।।
bodhātmakatayā puṃsaḥ sarvatra grahaṇaṃ bhavet ।
yugapadviṣaye'pyasya karaṇāpekṣitā na cet ।। 167 ।।
tasmājjñānānusāreṇa vyavasthāsaṅkarau kvacit ।
grāhyagrāhakaśaktibhyaḥ kāryadvāreṇa kalpitau ।। 168 ।।
cakṣūrūpādibhedastu pañcadhaiva vyavasthitaḥ ।
ca smaraṇanupapannameva । atha matam—amanaskasya cakṣurādeḥ pravṛttau manaso'pravṛttatve- nāvyagratvāt grahaṇavelāyāmeva smaraṇaṃ prāpnoti, nottarakālam; taduktam— “smṛtiśca na bhavet paścāt” iti । tadanupapannam, grahaṇasmaraṇayoryaugapadyāsambha- vāt; atikrāntavijñānāntarakarmatayā grahaṇaṃ smaraṇaṃ ca gataḥ । tasmādayamarthaḥ— anvayavyatirekābhyāmidamavagamyate, na bāhyendriyaviṣayālokātmāna eva kevalā bāhyā- rthāvagateḥ kāraṇam, satsvapi teṣu kiñcid vijñānānutpatteḥ । ato'nyadapi kāraṇam । tacca manaḥ । tadapi ca grāhakam । taccenna śrotragrahaṇavelāyāṃ pravartate, tataḥ sāmagrīvaikalyāt grahaṇabhāvapūrvikā smṛtiripi na prāpnotītyarthaḥ ।
idānīmantaḥkaraṇasadbhāve pramāṇāmāha—na ca sarvā smṛtirbhavediti । cakṣurādyabhāve'pi śabdādismaraṇaṃ sukhādigrahaṇaṃ cātmanastāvat samupajāyate । kriyāyāṃ ca pravartamānaḥ kartā karaṇamapekṣata iti karaṇāntarakalpanamāpatati, tacca manaḥ ।।
atraiva pramāṇāntaramāha—bodhātmakatayeti । yadi hi bāhyendriyaviṣayā- lokātmāna eva kevalā bāhyārthāvagame kāraṇam, tadānīṃ kālādiṣu ca puro'vasthiteṣu yā kadācid yugapajjñānādyutpattiḥ, sātmādivyatiriktakāraṇāntaraṃ kalpayatītyarthaḥ ।।
sānprataṃ saṅkare vyavasthāyāṃ ca kāryadarśanaṃ pramāṇāmāha—tasmāditi । rūpa- rasagandhasparśaśabdeṣu vyavasthopalabdhidarśanāt cakṣurādervyavasthā pratīyate; sattāyāṃ dravye cāvyavasthitopalabdhidarśanādavyavasthetyarthaḥ ।।
yadi rūpāpekṣayā rasādiviṣayāntaradarśanādindriyāntaraṃ parikalpyate hanta tarhi pītāpekṣayā nīlādiviṣayāntaradarśanādānantyamindriyāṇāmityāśaṅkyāha— cakṣūrūpādibhedastviti ।। viṣayeṣyasya. mā. kāraṇā. ananta. mu.
tena nīladibhede'pi nendriyānantyakalpanā ।। 169 ।।
tasmāt pañcabhirapyakṣaiḥ bodhaḥ sattāguṇatvayoḥ ।
dravyamūrtī punardvābhyāṃ rūpādāvekaśaḥ sthitiḥ ।। 170 ।।
nanu jātyādirūpe'pi śabdābhedopacārataḥ ।
pravartamānā mithyā syād buddhirūpe'mbubuddhivat ।। 171 ।।
na śabdābhedarūpeṇa buddhirartheṣu jāyate ।
prāk śabdād yādṛśī buddhiḥ śabdādapi hi tādṛśī ।। 172 ।।
sāṃpratamuktāṃ saṅkaravyavasthāṃ sodāharaṇamupasaṃharati-tasmāt pañcabhiriti ।।
nanu jātyādirūpe'pi vastuni śabdasamāropeṇa ‘gaurayam’ iti savikalpaka vijñānamutpadyamānamūṣare'mbubuddhivadapramāṇaṃ syādityāha-nanu jātyādirūpe'pīti ।।
sa cāyaṃ śabdasamāropastriprakāraḥ ‘gaurayam’ ityakṣajaṃ savikalpakaṃ vijñānaṃ śabdaviśiṣṭamarthaṃ pratibhāsayati; gośabda eva vā śābaleyādiṣvadhyastaḥ samānatayā prakāśate, na gotvādayaḥ; gośabda eva vā bahirūpatayā pratibhāsamāno'rtho na dravya- guṇādayaḥ । taduktam—
“anādinidhanaṃ brahma śabdatattve vyavasthitam ।
vivartate'rthabhāvena prakiyā jagato yataḥ ।।” iti ।
śabdo'pyātmaviśiṣṭamarthaṃ pratipādayati ātmānaṃ vā śābaleyādiṣu adhyastabahīrūpa- tayā, na dravyaguṇādayaḥ; tadetannirākartumāha—na śabdābhedarūpeṇetyardhena ।
agṛhītasambandhastāvad varṇatrayaviviktamarthaṃ pratyeti; gṛhītasambandhasyāpi prameyāvagatistādṛśyeva, na varṇatrayaviśiṣṭā ‘śuklo'yaṃ ghaṭaḥ’ itivat tadāha— prāgityardhena ।। dravyamūrtiḥ mā. mūrtau. cau. ananta. mu. buddhīrūpeṣu buddhivat. cau. ananta. mu. “śabdatattvaṃ yadakṣaram” iti mudritavākyapadīyapāṭhaḥ
nanu gotvādirūpeṇa gavākārādibuddhayaḥ ।
na prāk śabdārthasambandhajñānāt santi kadācana ।। 173 ।।
jātyādestatsvarūpaṃ cedaśabdajño'pi lakṣayet ।
anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śabdarūpatvaniścayaḥ ।। 174 ।।
yathā rūpādayo bhinnāḥ prāk śabdāt svātmanaiva tu ।
gamyante tadvadevaitat saṃjñitvaṃ kevalaṃ param ।। 175 ।।
na cāvikalpitaḥ śabdāditi vācyo na gṛhyate ।
tenāgṛhītaśabdo'pi gotvādīn pratipadyate ।। 176 ।।
śrutisaṃsparśabodhe'pi naivābhedopacāratā ।
atra kaciccodayanti—nanu gotvādirūpeṇeti dvayena । kimidamucyate— “prāk śabdād yādṛśī buddhiḥ śabdādapi hi tādṛśī” iti ? gṛhītasambandhasya ‘gaurayam’ iti pratibhāsaḥ, nā gṛhītasambandhasya । tadatra yadabhyadhikaṃ pratibhāsate, yadi tadartharūpameva syādagṛhītasambandhasyāpi pratibhāseta । tato'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śabdarūpamidamarthasamānādhikaraṇaṃ pratibhāsata iti ślokadvayasyārthaḥ ।।
atra samādhimāha—yathā rūpādaya iti ।।
yathā hi rūparasagandhādīnagṛhītasambandhaḥ parasparaviviktānātmīyenaiva svarū- peṇa pratyeti; na śabdasvarūpatayā, tathā gavādīnapi । yattu gṛhītasambandhasya ‘gaura- yam’ ityabhyadhikaṃ pratibhāsate, na tadarthasya śabdaviśiṣṭatvam; kintu sambandhagraha- ṇakāle pratipannapadārthasya saṃjñitvam, tadatrābhyadhikaṃ pratibhāsate । tathāhi ‘gaura- yam’ iti nāyaṃ vākyārthaḥ pratibhāsate, gośabdo'yaṃ ceti nīlamutpalamitivat । nāpi śabdātmaka evārthaḥ, śabdasañjalpaviraheṇāpi pratīyamānatvāt tadāha—na cāvikalpita iti ।।
athāpi sadā śabdānusāro yenaivārthāvagatiḥ tathāpi nādhyāsaḥ, nāpi śabdā- tmakatvamarthasyetyāha—śrutisaṃsparśabodhe'pīti । śabdaviśiṣṭatārthasya na śrotreṇa pratī- Omitted. na. mā. tadvadevaite saṃ. mā. cārataḥ. mā.
vivekādarthaśabdānāṃ cakṣuśrotradhiyā kṛtāt ।। 177 ।।
anantadharmake dharmiṇyekadharmāvatāraṇe ।
śabdo'bhyupāyamātraṃ syānnātmādhyāropakāraṇam ।। 178 ।।
na copeye'bhyupāyasya rūpādhyāsaḥ prasajyate ।
na hi dīpendriyādīnāṃ rūpe'dhyāropa iṣyate ।। 179 ।।
nityaṃ yadi ca gotvādi śabdarūpeṇa gṛhyate ।
rūpāntaramadṛṣṭaṃ ced bhedādhyāsau kutonvimau ।। 180 ।।
yadyabhede na mithyātvaṃ bhedaścet syāt svarūpataḥ ।
nādhyāropaprasaṅgaḥ syād bhrāntyā tvadhyāsakalpanā ।। 181 ।।
śabdenaiva ca nirdeśo gṛhīte'rthe'vakalpate ।
gaurityeva ca nirdeśo vācyatadbuddhivācinām ।। 182 ।।
yate, yasya śabdamātraviṣayatvāt । nāpi cakṣuṣā, tasyāpi rūpaviṣayatvādityarthaḥ ।।
pratiniyamasaṃjñitvāvadhāraṇe tu pratiniyataśabdasmaraṇamupāyatāṃ pratipadyate; tenā- tmānamāropayatītyāha—anantadharmaka iti ।।
yastūpāyatvādevāropaṃ manyate, tasya cakṣuḥpradīpābhyāmanaikāntikatvaṃ vaktavya- mityāha—na copeya iti ।।
yadi ca gotvādilakṣaṇo'rthaḥ sadā śabdākāreṇaiva pratīyate, tadā bhedā- bhāvāt kuto'dhyāsaḥ, tadabhāvāt kuto mithyātvamityāha—nityaṃ yadi ceti sapādena ।
bhedāvagatau tu sutarāmadhyāso nāstītyāha—bhedaścet syāt svarūpata iti tripādyā ।।
idānīmāropabhrāntermūlamāha ślokadvayena—śabdenaivetyādinā ।। rūpādhyāropaḥ. cau, ananta. suḥ raṃ na dṛṣṭam. cau. ananta. mu. bhenaśca syāt. mā. hi. mā. vādinām. cau. ananta. mu.
nirdeśatulyatāyāṃ ca śrotrā vaktṛsvarūpatā ।
śabdajñānaprameyeṣu vijñānasyāvasīyate ।। 183 ।।
bhrāntihetusamānatve'pyupāyatvānmatiśrutī ।
manyate'rthe samadhyaste nārthādhyāsaṃ tayoḥ punaḥ ।। 184 ।।
gotve sāsnādimadrūpā gādirūpābhidhāyake ।
nirākārobhayajñāne saṃvittiḥ paramārthataḥ ।। 185 ।।
yadi cābhedarūpeṇa śabdenārthaḥ pratīyate ।
ekarūpatvamakṣādau devanādeḥ prasajyate ।। 186 ।।
syādanakṣanivṛttyā cet na prāk śabdāt pratīyate ।
arthajñānaśabdeṣu triṣvapi samānanirdeśatvaṃ bhrāntermūlam । tadāhi—kīdṛśo 'rthastvayā pratipannaḥ—iti pṛṣṭaḥ sannevamāha ‘gauḥ’ iti; tathā kīdṛśo'yaṃ śabdaḥ ? ‘gauḥ’ iti; kīdṛśaṃ ca jñānamutpannam? ‘gauḥ’ iti; triṣu samānanirdeśācchabdavada- rtho'pi śabdākāraḥ pratīyata iti ‘gaurayam’ iti śabdasamānadhikaraṇo'yamadhyāsa- bhramaḥ । bhrāntihetusamānatve'pyarthasya pratipattāvupāyatvācchabdajñānayorarthe । śabdāropaṃ manyante, na śabde cādhyāropamityāha—bhrāntihetusamānatve'pīti ।।
paramārthatastu viviktā evaite pratyatā ityāha—gotva iti । ‘gaurayam’ ityatra gakāraukāravisarjanīyavivikto'rtho'parokṣatayā sāsnādimadrūpo'vabhāsate । abhidhāyakastu tadvivikta eva gakārādirūpo'vabhāsate abhidhānābhidheyajñānaṃ tu ubhayaviviktatvānnirākāramevetyarthaḥ ।।
evamakṣaje pratyaye śabdasamāropaṃ nirākṛtyedānīṃ śabdo'pi nāma samāropeṇārthaṃ pratipādayatītyāha—yadi cābhedarūpeṇeti । triṣvapyāropyamāṇasyaivaikatvādityarthaḥ ।।
nanu cākṣanivṛttyāstyevaikarūpateti codayati—syādanakṣanivṛttyā cediti । tatra tāvadidaṃ vivektavyam—bhavatvanivṛttirūpā pratipattiḥ; akṣaśabdākārā tu na prāpnotīti vaktavyam । abhyupagamyaitadapi nāstītyāha—na prāk śabdātpratīyata iti । tāyāśca śrotravaktṛ. mā. adhyāsayoḥ. mā.
gavādiṣvapi tulyaṃ cennaikarūpasya darśanāt ।। 187 ।।
traye vibhītakādīnāṃ naikadharmānvayo'sti hi ।
śabdaḥ sādhāraṇasteṣāṃ jātiśabdād vilakṣaṇaḥ ।। 188 ।।
parasparavibhinnaṃ tu jñāyate'trākṛtitrayam ।
tadadhyāse na yujyeta tadrūpasyāvibhāgataḥ ।। 189 ।।
bhinnāḥ syurakṣaśabdāścennārthe saṃśayadarśanāt ।
na sāmānyādṛte sa syād rūpābhedaśca gamyate ।। 190 ।।
anakṣanivṛtteravastutvena pratyakṣādyagocaratvād grahaṇābhāvaḥ, tadabhāvācca na śabdaviṣa- yatetyarthaḥ । evameva tarhi gośabdasyāpi sāmānyavācakatvaṃ na prāpnotīti codayati— gavādiṣvapi tulyaṃ cediti । tatrāpohena sahāsmadabhyubhagatasya sāmānyavailakṣaṇya- māha—naikarūpasya darśanāditi । vasturūpatayāsmatsāmānyasya pratyakṣatve nāsti sambandhagrahaṇamityarthaḥ ।।
vibhītakāditraye tu vasturūpaṃ sāmānyaṃ nāstītyāha—traye vibhītakādi- nāmiti dvayena ।।
vibhītakatraye tu vācakaikatvamuktvā triṣvanugatamevāvāntarasāmānyaṃ śābale- yādiṣviva gorūpamanyannāstīti parasparavilakṣaṇārthatrayapratipattiradhyāsapakṣe na prāpnoti bhinnatvādakṣaśabdasya na doṣa iti dūṣaṇaparihārakāma āha—bhinnāḥ- syurakṣaśabdāścediti । idānīṃ dūṣaṇamāpādayituṃ śabdaikatvamāha—nārtha iti dvipādya । yadi hyeko'yamakṣaśabdo jātitrayasya vācakaḥ syāt, tadā śāvaleyādiṣviva gotvasāmānyaśabdaśravaṇe satyarthe saṃśayaḥ syāt—katamārthapratipādanaviṣayo'nena prayuktaḥ iti । anyathā tu śabda eva saṃśayaḥ syādityarthaḥ । evaṃ tāvad yuktyā śabda- syaikatvaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ tadeva pratibhāsena sādhayitumāha—rūpābhedaśca gamyata iti ।। āsti. tu mā. pūrvottarārdhau vyatyāsena vartete mā. Omitted. nā. mā. rūpabhedaśca. mā. rūpabhedaśca. mā.
bhavatyādau ca bhinne'pi nāmākhyātatvasajñayā ।
rūpaikatvena cādhyāse tulyārthatvaṃ prasajyate ।। 191 ।।
śabdaniṣpattyabhedācca tiṅantārthasya sādhyatā ।
kathaṃ kathaṃ ca mūrtārtho vācake mūrtivarjite ।। 192 ।।
gavāśvaśuklaśabdādeḥ vācyarūpānapekṣaṇe ।
vācakatvavyavasthānaṃ kathaṃ jātiguṇādiṣu ।। 193 ।।
vṛkṣaplakṣādiśabdānāṃ tulye bhede ghaṭādibhiḥ ।
viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvaṃ kathamarthānapekṣayā ।। 194 ।।
sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca na syād vācakabuddhivat ।
ekatra copasaṃhāro na buddhyornirvikalpake ।। 195 ।।
vastumātre sa cedevaṃ sarveṣāmekavācyatā ।
bhavati—bhavati—śabdayoḥ suptiṅantayoradhyāsapakṣe'dhyasyamānarūpaikatvena paryāyatvaṃ prāpnotītyāha—bhavatyādau ceti ।।
śabdādhyāsapakṣe tu niṣpannatvācchabdasya sādhyāvagamo na prāpnotītyāha— śabdetyādikathamantena । mūrtāmūrtatvaṃ śabdārthayorna prāpnotītyāha—kathañceti śeṣeṇa ।।
devadatto-gauḥ-pacati-śukla-ityevamādiṣu dravyajātiguṇakriyāvācakatvaṃ na prāpnotītyāha—gavāśvaśuklaśabdāderiti ।।
adhyāsapakṣe ca vṛkṣaplakṣaśabdayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣarahitatvena bhinnārthatvād ghaṭa- paṭayoriva viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo na prāpnotītyāha—vṛkṣaplakṣādiśabdānāmiti ।
ata eva sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ śabdālambanayoriva tadbuddhyorna prāpnotītyāha— sāmānādhikaraṇyamityardhena । atha dvayoḥ śabdayorekasminnātmādhyāsena pravarta- mānayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyamucyata ityāśaṅkyāha—ekatretyardhena ।।
na tāvadekasmin svalakṣaṇe dvayorvṛttiḥ, atadviṣayatvāt; nāpi vastu, tanmātratvalakṣaṇavyatikereṇa tasyānavagamāt । abhyupagamyāpi dūṣaṇamāha—vastumātre sa cediti । sarveṣāṃ hi gavādiśabdānāṃ vastumātraviṣayatvena paryāyatvaprasaṅgādityarthaḥ ।। kalpakaḥ. mā. ghaṭaghaṭayoriva. mā.
bhaved gavādiśabdānāṃ sarvairvastu hi gamyate ।। 196 ।।
na cāsādhāraṇe bhede nīlotpalamitīṣyate ।
na hi śabdapravṛttiḥ syādanyatrānyatra ceṣyate ।। 197 ।।
na ca nīlotpalaṃ nāma vastvekaṃ kiṃcidiṣyate ।
śabdārthayoryato bhedo gamyate'vayavānugaḥ ।। 198 ।।
śabdadvayasya cādhyāsaḥ paryāyeṣvapi dṛśyate ।
ekādhikaraṇāstena syuste nīlotpalādivat ।। 199 ।।
na cānavagate pūrvaṃ padamarthe prayujyate ।
tatra sambandhavelāyāṃ kīdṛśo'rthaḥ pratīyate ।। 200 ।।
nanu nīlotpalaṃ nāmaikaṃ svalakṣaṇamabhinnam; na hi tatra nīlatvotpalatve staḥ; nīlotpalaśabdo'pi nirvibhāgaḥ tasyaiva vācakaḥ; na hi tatrāpi nīlotpalaśabdo staḥ; arthāntare tu nīlatvotpalatvādau darśanānnīlaśabdotpalaśabdayoḥ apohadvāreṇaikasmi- nnātmādhyāsena pravṛttayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyamityāśaṅkyāha—na ceti । avayavātha- rahitanīlotpalasvalakṣaṇāntarābhyupagame hi teṣāṃ bahutvād yasminneva nīlotpalasvala- kṣaṇe sambandhagrahaṇaṃ tato'nyatra nīlotpalaśabdaprayogo na prāpnotītyarthaḥ ।।
api ca yayorarthayornīlotpalaśabdau prayukto tayoranyatrāpi nīlotpale darśanā- nnāvayavaśaktitiraskāreṇa samudāyasya śaktyantaraṃ kalpayituṃ labhyata ityāha— na ca nīlotpalamiti ।।
yadi ca dvayorekasminnātmādhyāsena pravṛttayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyamucyate, tadā paryāyāṇāmapi sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prāpnoti, bahūnāmekasminnātmādhyāsena pravṛttidarśanā- dityāha—śabdadvayasya ceti ।।
api ca sambandhagrahaṇasāpekṣaḥ śabdo'rthaṃ pratyāyayati, sambandhagrahaṇakāle ca śabdaviśiṣṭasyārthasyādarśanāt kathamātmaviśiṣṭaṃ śabdo'rthaṃ pratyāyayatītyāha— na ceti sārdhena । raṇo bhedaḥ. mā. cekṣaṇāt. mā. vidyate. mā. ste'pi. mā. kīdṛgarthaḥ. mā.
tadānīṃ nārtharūpe hi śabdarūpasya sambhavaḥ ।
na cāsādhāraṇāṃśena sambandhānugamaḥ kvacit ।। 201 ।।
tatra pūrvānapekṣatve yadyātmādhyāsaśaktatā ।
śabdasya prathame'pi syācchravaṇe'dhyastarūpatā ।। 202 ।।
mama vācyānabhijñatvānna bhavet smaraṇaṃ tataḥ ।
bhavatastvartharūpasya vācakeṣvapi darśanāt ।। 203 ।।
yathā tvajñātaśabdānāṃ vācye taddhīrna jāyate ।
tathaivājñātavācyānāmupalabdhe'pi vācake ।। 204 ।।
tasmānnātīva vācyānāṃ vācakādhīnatā bhavet ।
smārakatvācca teṣveva pāratantryaṃ pratīyate ।। 205 ।।
bhavatpakṣe ca sambandhagrahaṇaṃ na prāpnoti tāvat svalakṣaṇeṣu, teṣāmānantyāt; nāpi sāmānye, śabdādanyasya śabdādhyāsavādināṃ sāmānyasyābhāvāt; śabda evaiko bahuṣu svalakṣaṇeṣvadhyastaḥ pratīyata ityadhyāsavādināṃ darśanama; tadāha—na cāsādhāraṇetyardhena ।।
tatra yadi śabdarahite'pyarthe sambandhagrahaṇādātmaviśiṣṭaṃ pratyāyayati, hanta tarhi prathamaśravaṇe'pi pratyāyayedityāha—tatra pūrvānapekṣatva iti ।।
yeṣāmapi śabdaviparivartarūpo'rthaḥ teṣāmagṛhītasambandhānāmevārthāgatiḥ prāpnoti; sambandhapekṣatāyāṃ hi kva kasya sambandhagrahaṇaṃ syāt ? asmatpakṣe tu bhinnatvādasti sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣetyāha—mama vācyānabhijñatvāditi ।।
yatheti । asmatpakṣe tu yathā gṛhītasambandho'pyaśrutaśabdo'rthaṃ na pratyeti, tathā śrutaśabdo'pyagṛhītasambandha ityarthaḥ ।।
tasmācchabdaviparivartarūpatvānna śabdatantro'rthaḥ, api tu smārakatvena śabdasya, tattantratvamarthasyetyāha—tasmāditi ।। rūpe'pi śabda. mā. ndhānubhavaḥ mā. tvaṃ na bhavetkāraṇāntaram. mā. vācakaṣveva. mā. naiṣāmāna. mā. rūpo'rtho mā teṣām. mā.
tena sambandhavelāyāmarthātmā yo'vasīyate ।
śabdādapi sa eveti nārtharūpaṃ praṇaśyati ।। 206 ।।
pravṛttau vā nivṛttau vā yāṃ śabdaḥ kurute matim ।
tādātmyaṃ tasya śabdasya na kathañcit pratīyate ।। 207 ।।
karahastādiśabdebhyaḥ śabdarūpasya bhedataḥ ।
bhinno'rthaḥ saṃpratīyeta tadadhyāropakalpane ।। 208 ।।
ātmādhyāsaśca sādṛśyāduparāgācca dṛśyate ।
na tāvadarthasādṛśyaṃ śabdasyeha pratīyate ।। 209 ।।
na cānurāgaḥ śabdena bhinnadeśasya yujyate ।
dūrasthapratibimbaṃ ca nārūpasya pratīyate ।। 210 ।।
śabdasarvagatatvena yadyarthaprāptirucyate ।
sarvārthānāṃ bhavecchabdaiḥ sarvairevānurañjanam ।। 211 ।।
upasaṃharati—tena sambandhavelāyāmiti । sambandhagrahaṇavelāyāṃ hi yādṛgarthaḥ pratīyate śabdādapi hi tādṛgeva pratīyate, na śabdaviśiṣṭo nāpi viparivartarūpaḥ ।।
adhyāsapakṣe ca pravṛttinivṛttirūpārthāvagatirna prāpnoti, atadātmakatvā- cchabdasyetyāha—pravṛttau veti ।।
adhyāsapakṣe ca karahastādiśabdānāṃ paryāyatvaṃ na prāprotītyāha—karahastā- diti ।।
api ca arthāntaramarthāntare ātmānamāropayati sādṛśyānurāgābhyāṃ yathā śuktikāyāṃ rajatam, lākṣādi vā sphaṭikādau; taddarśayati-ātmādhyāsaścetyardhena ।
tatrārthasādṛśya śabdasya nāstītyāha—na tāvadityardhena ।।
bhinnadeśatvādarthasya śabdenānurāgo'pi nāstītyāha-na cānurāga ityardhena ।
nīrūpatvācca pratibimbo'pi nāstītyāha—dūrasthetyardhena ।
nanu sarvagatatvenāstyevārthasamānadeśatvaṃ śabdasyetyāśaṅkyāha—śabdasarvagata- tveneti ।।
na ca bhinnendrigrāhyaṃ kvacidastyanurāgakṛta ।
na hi lākṣānurakte'pi sphaṭike dhīstvagādibhiḥ ।। 212 ।।
anumānāgamau mithyā syātāmadhyāsakalpane ।
nirūpaṇasya mithyātvāt sarvābhāvaḥ prasajyate ।। 213 ।।
bhavatviti yadi brūyānmithyā svavacane sati ।
kathamevaṃ vadedartho nānṛtāddhi pratīyate ।। 214 ।।
śūnyavādottarāccāpi yathārthaṃ buddhiśabdayoḥ ।
pravṛttirna tu tattantramartharūpaṃ kadācana ।। 215 ।।
tasmāt prāgapi ye śabdād bhinnaikatvādibuddhibhiḥ ।
gṛhyante sarvadā teṣāṃ paramārthāstitā bhavet ।। 216 ।।
śabdābhyupāyake'pyarthe tadabhāve ca yadyapi ।
arthabuddhirna jāyeta nārthe rūpaṃ praṇaśyati ।। 217 ।।
na ca śabdānuraktārthaścakṣurindriyeṇa śrotreṇa vā pratīyate, bhinnendriyagrāhyaṃ- tvā tayorityāha—na ca bhinnendrigrāhyamiti ।।
yadi savikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ śabdasamāropeṇotpadyamānatvadapramāṇaṃ tadāgamānumāna- yorapi mithyātvaṃ prāpnoti, tayorapi nirūpaṇātmakatvādityāha—anumānāgamā- viti । nirūpaṇaśabdena savikalpakaṃ jñānamucyate ।।
bhavatvevaṃ ko doṣa iti cedityāśaṅkyāha—bhavatvitīti ।।
api ca “sa hi bahirdeśasambandhaḥ pratyakṣamupalabhyate” ityanenaiva yathārtha- buddhyoḥ bhinnatvaṃ pratipāditam, tathaiva śabdadhyāso'pi nirākṛtaḥ; yataḥ ‘gaurayam’ ityatra bahirarthaḥ pratīyate'sañjalpaśca śabda—śūnyavādottarāccāpīti ।।
prakaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—tasmāditi ।।
evaṃ tāvacchabdasamāropaṃ nirākṛtyedānīṃ tadviparivartaṃ nirākartumāha— śabdābhyupāyaka iti । yadyapi śabdaikasamadhigamyā gotvādayastathāpi na śabdavipa- rivartarūpo'rthātmā; tathāpi gavādiśabdatattvamarthabhāvena viparivartata ityasya bhāṣitasya tathāstiti. cau. ananta. mu.
cakṣurāderabhāve hi rūpādyātmā na gṛhyate ।
svarūpanāśo rūpādestāvanmātreṇa neṣyate ।। 218 ।।
sambandhasya ca nityatvānnārthasya syādarūpatā ।
yugapanna hi sarveṣāmanyākārārthavedanam ।। 219 ।।
tadākāre'pi tadvacced dvaye sati parīkṣyatām ।
kintvarthasyātathābhāvo grahītuḥ kiṃnvaśaktatā ।। 220 ।।
sadasadbhāvayorarthe virodhitvādasambhavaḥ ।
ko'rthaḥ ? na tāvat ‘gaurayam’ ityatra gośabda eva bahiravasthitaḥ ‘ayam’ iti atra pratibhāsate; nāpi gośabda eva gotvādirūpeṇa viparivartamānaḥ ‘ayam’ iti pratibhāsata ityatra pramāṇamasti; śabdapariṇāmapakṣe'pi pariṇatasya gotvāderaśabdātma- katvānna śabdātmako'rthaḥ । ataḥ śabdātmaivārthabhāvena viparivartata iti pariṇāma- pratipādanaprayojanamapi nopalabhyate ।।
atraiva dṛṣṭāntamāha—cakṣurāderiti । ye'pi cakṣurindriyādyekasamadhigamyā rūpādayaste'pi nendriyaviparivartarūpāḥ ।।
idānīmabhyupagamya śabdādhyāsaṃ vikalpakasya prāmāṇyamāha—sambandhasya ce- tyardhena । yadyapi savikalpakavijñānaṃ śabdaviśiṣṭamarthaṃ gṛhṇati; tathāpi naivāprāmāṇyam, tadākāratvenādhyāsābhāvāt । nāpi śabdasambandhāt pūrvamatadākāratā, gotvāderartha- śabdayoḥ sambandhasya nityātvādityarthasambandhagrahaṇāt pūrvaṃ tadākārapratipattirbādhitā bhaviṣyatīti cedityāśaṅkyāha—yugapadityardhena । yadyapyagṛhītasambandhānāma- tadākāratvena pratipattiḥ, tathāpi gṛhītasambandhāḥ śabdākāramevārthaṃ pratipadyante; kathamiyamatadākārapratipattiḥ bādhikā bhaviṣyatīti ।।
nanu tadākāratāpi na sarve tadākāratāvat pratīyata iti codayati— tadākāre'pi tadvaccediti । tatrāha—dvaye satīti tripādyā ।।
astyetad dvayam; idaṃ tu vicārayāmaḥ—yad gṛhītasambandhaiḥ śabdā- kāratvena grahaṇamarthasya, tat kimatadākāratvādutopāyābhāvāditi ? tatra kiṃ yukta mityāha—sadasadbhāvayoriti sārdhena । rārthabodhanam mā. arthābhāvena. mā.
grahītṛbhedācchaktatvamaśaktatvaṃ ca yujyate ।। 221 ।।
yathāndhānandhayoḥ pārśve rūpasyetyabhidhāsyate ।
tenārthe dhvanyupāyasya taddhīrnānyasya jāyate ।। 222 ।।
devadattādiśabde tu sambandhādyatvadarśanāt ।
arthasyānityatāyāṃ ca tādrūpyasyāpyanityatā ।। 223 ।।
tatrāpyautpattikī śaktistadrūpapratyayaṃ prati ।
grāhyagrāhakayoriṣṭā niyogasya tvanityatā ।। 224 ।।
tatra sarvairatādrūpyaṃ prāṅ niyogāt pratīyate ।
sadasadbhāvayorekasminnarthe virodhādidameva yuktamuttaram—yadagṛhītasambandhaiḥ śabdākāratvenāsyāgrahaṇam, tadagṛhītasambandhānāṃ śabdasmaraṇopāyābhāvāt; gṛhīta- sambandhaitu śabdasmaraṇopāyasadbhāvāt grahaṇaṃ yathā ghaṭasamavadhāne satyandhānandhānāma- grahaṇagrahaṇe । etadevopasaṃharannāha—tenārtha ityardhena । gotvādilakṣaṇamarthaṃ dhvanyu- pāyaḥ puruṣaḥ śabdaviśiṣṭaḥ pratyeti, nānya ityarthaḥ ।।
yatra tu yadṛcchāśabdeṣvarthasyānityatvena sambandhasyānityatvam, yatra bhavatva- dhyāsasya mithyātvamityāha—devadattādiśabde tviti ।।
nanu yadṛcchāśabdasyāpi jātiśabdevadarthena saha nitya eva sambandha iti vakṣyati—“devadatte'pi vā vyaktāṃ śaktimicchanti yuktayaḥ” iti । kimucyate “devadattādiśabde tu sambandhādyatvadarśanāt” iti codayati—tatrāpīti tripādyā । tatra jātiśabdena saha yadṛcchāśabdasya vailakṣaṇyamāha—niyogasya tvanityateti sapādaślokena । yadi nāma yadṛcchāśabdasyāpi kaiścinnityārthapratipādikā śakti- rabhipretā, tathāpi samayasyānityatvāt prāk samayāt sarvairatādrūpyapratipattistādrūpya- pratipatterbādhikā bhaviṣyatīti jātiśabdād viśeṣaḥ । niyogaśabdena samayamāha; sa cānityo'pi nityasambandhābhivyañjakatveneṣṭa iti samayāt pūrvaṃ jātamātrāvasthāyāṃ sarvairaśabdaviśiṣṭa evārthaḥ pratīyate ।। ndhānā....nāgrahaṇe. mā. tatra tu. mā.
teneṣṭameva mithyātvaṃ kaiścidadhyāsakalpane ।। 225 ।।
yadā tu yādṛśaḥ piṇḍaḥ pūrvaṃ śabdāt pratīyate ।
tādṛśasmaraṇe hetuḥ śabdastatra yathārthatā ।। 226 ।।
niyogāt parato vāpi śabdena vyajyatāmiyam ।
tadgrāhyaśaktirarthasya pārarūpyaṃ na tāvatā ।। 227 ।।
sarvākāraparicchedyaśakte'rthe vācake'pi vā ।
sarvākārārthavijñānasamarthe niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ ।। 228 ।।
abhyupagamyādhyāsaṃ yadṛcchāśabde mithyātvamabhihitam; paramārthatastu nādhyāso na mithyātvamityāha—yadā yādṛśa iti ।।
anye tvāhuḥ—jātiśabdavad devadattaśabdo'pi nityenaiva sambandhenārthaṃ pratipādayati, samayo'pi tasyaivībhivyañjakaḥ, na tu sambandhāntaratiraskāreṇārthaprati- pādakaḥ । tena yaduktaṃ jātiśabde “sambandhasya ca nityatvāt” iti, tattulyamatrā- pītyāha—niyogāditi । niyogo hi vyañjako grāhyagrāhakaśaktyorarthaśabdagatayoḥ, tayośca nityatvena śabdākāra(ta)ārthasya nāpaitītyarthaḥ ।।
yadi yadiṛcchāśabdasyāpi nityanava sambandhenārthapratipādakatvam, kimevaṃ sati samayeneti samayasyopayogamāha—sarvākāreti । yadṛcchāśabdānāṃ hi sarvārthaviṣayā nityā vācikā śaktiriṣyate; sarvārthānāṃ ca sarvaśabdaviṣayā vācyaśaktiḥ; yato devadattaśabde uccarite sati saṃśayaḥ—kamarthaṃ pratipādayitumanenoccārita iti buddhirbhavati । yattu svagṛhe nāmakaraṇaṃ tanniyamārtham iha—devadattaśabdenāsminnarthe vyavahartavyam; amumevārthamaṅgīkṛtya “vṛddhirādaic” iti niyamārthaṃ vyākhyātam ।।
evaṃ tāvat savikalpake jñānamātre śabdasamāropaṃ nirākṛtyedānīm ‘sa evāyaṃ devadetta upalabdhaḥ,’ śābaleyasya ca piṇḍāntaradarśane sati ‘saiveyaṃ gauḥ’ iti hetuśabdaḥ cau. mu. tyajyatāṃ mithaḥ. ananta. mu. kutaḥ mā. niyamārthaṃ vyākhyārtham. mā.
tatra śabdārthasambandhaṃ pramātuḥ smarato'pi yā ।
buddhiḥ pūvagṛhītārthasandhānādupajāyate ।। 229 ।।
cakṣuṣā sannikṛṣṭe'rthe nāpratyakṣamasau bhavet ।
viviktā eva te'pyarthāḥ smṛtipratyakṣagocarāḥ ।। 230 ।।
smaryete śabdasambandhau mā bhūt pratyakṣatā tayoḥ ।
tadapratyakṣabhāvena na tvarthasyāpi vāryate ।। 231 ।।
gṛhītamapi gotvādi smṛtispṛṣṭaṃ ca yadyapi ।
tathāpi vyatirekeṇa pūrvabodhāt pratīyate ।। 232 ।।
vyaktikālādibhedena tatrāstyavasaro miteḥ ।
śabdapratyabhijñārūpasya savikalpakasya visphārite cakṣuṣi śabdasambandhasmaraṇottarakālaṃ pūrvagṛhītārthānusandhānena cotpadyamānatvādanakṣajatvenāpratyakṣatvanubhūte vastunyanubhūta- tayaivābhraṣṭasaṃskārasya utpadyamānatvāt smṛtitvamāśaṅkya pratyakṣatvaṃ tāvat samarthaya- nnāha—tatreti sārdhaślokena ।
yadyapi pratyabhijñārūpaṃ vijñānaṃ śabdasmaraṇottarakālaṃ pūrvagṛhītārthānusandhānena cotpadyate ‘sa evāyaṃ devadattaḥ’ iti; tathāpīndriyārthasannikarṣeṇa aparokṣārthāva- bhāsitayā cotpadyamānatvāt pratyakṣatvamastyevetyarthaḥ । na tāvat smaryamāṇaśabdānu- sandhānenotpadyamānatvādapratyakṣatvam, arthaśabdayoḥ vivekapratibhāsena tadabhāvādi- tyāha—viviktā iti sārdhaślokena ।।
nāpi pramite'rthe pramitatayaivābhraṣṭasaṃskārasyotpadyamānatvāt smṛtitvam, abhya- dhikārthapratibhāsādityāha—gṛhītamapīti । apiśabdadvayena prathamagrahaṇe pratiyogi- grahaṇābhāvenānugatapratibhāsābhāvāt jāteragrahaṇam, tadabhāve cāsmaraṇam, ubhayā- bhāvena ca jātipratyabhijñābhāvaṃ darśayati ।।
abhyupagamya tu grahaṇaṃ smaraṇaṃ ca gotvāderadhikagrahaṇena smaraṇāduttārayati, tadādhikyaṃ darśayitumāha—vyaktikāletyardhena । pūrvamanyakālaviśiṣṭaṃ pratipannamidānīṃ rthasambandhādupa. ananta. mu. vyatirekādi. mā.
yaḥ pūrvāvagato'tra sa na nāma pratīyate ।। 233 ।।
vartamānakālaviśiṣṭatayā ‘sa evāyaṃ devadattaḥ’ iti । tacca sāmānyapratyabhijñānamapi pūrvamanyavyaktigatatvena gṛhyamāṇamāsīta idānīmanyavyaktigatatvenānubhūyate । tadeva vispaṣṭayannāha—yaḥ pūrvamityardhena । nātra pūrvāvagatamātraṃ pratīyate । kiṃ tarhi ? tadevānyakālaviśiṣṭamanyavyaktigatatvena ca pratīyate; na ca vartamānakālaviśiṣṭatā pūrvāvagatetyarthaḥ ।।
nanvatītavijñānakarmatāparokṣatve pratibhāsete; na cendriyasyātītādau sāma- rthyam, nāpyaparokṣe saṃskārasya । tasmādanubhayadvayamidam; ekaṃ tatra smaraṇamaparaṃ ca grahaṇam; na cānyadupāyāntaramasti, yat smaryamāṇāparokṣayorekatvaṃ gṛhṇīyāt । kathaṃ cāpratyakṣe kāle tadviśiṣṭaṃ pratyakṣe pratibhāsate ? tadanupapannam; eko hyayamanubhavaḥ atītavijñānakarmatāparokṣatve ekādhikaraṇe gṛhṇannutpadyata iti sarvasvasaṃvedyam, ‘śuklo'yaṃ paṭaḥ’ itivat । yacca apratyakṣe kāle kathaṃ tadviśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsata iti । tadviśiṣṭatā cetpratibhāsate, kathamapratyakṣatā kālasya ? atha na pratibhāsate, etadeva tarhi vācyam; kimapratyakṣatvena ? na ca liṅarthasyeva kālatrayānavacchinnasya ‘ghaṭo'yam’ iti pratibhāsaḥ । tathā apratibhāse ca ghaṭārthinaḥ pravṛttirna syāta; na hyatīte bhāvini vā pravṛttiḥ । yattu kimetasya janakamiti; kimanena bādhopahatasecanena kāraṇavikalpena ? na hi prakāśamānasya kāraṇavikalpena nāstitvaṃ śakyaṃ pratipāda- yitum; nāpyaprakāśamānasya tadvikalpairastitvam; na ca kāryārthinaḥ kāraṇairasti prayojanam । athotpanne'pi kārye kāraṇe'pi tat, astyeva saṃskārasahitamindriyam, tadbhāvabhāvitvenāvagamāt । athāpi pratyayadvayamidaṃ grahaṇasmaraṇarūpam; tathāpi ghaṭa- smaraṇa/?/ṭagrahaṇayoḥ nirantarotpannayorvilakṣaṇamidam, parasparaviṣayaikatvena pratibhāsa- nāt; aparokṣa evārtho'tītavijñānakarmatayā smṛtau pratibhāsate; atītavijñāna- viśiṣṭatā aparokṣatayā pratyakṣe ‘tadayam, smarāmyahametat’ iti pratibhāsanāt । jñānāmapi. mā. grahaṇa. mā. māsate tena cendriyasya. mā. sāmarthyānnāpya. mā. bhavadvaya. mā. cāpratyakṣakāle, mā. tathāprati. mā. tadāstyeva. mā.
idānīntanamastitvaṃ na hi pūrvadhiyā gatam ।
na hi smaraṇato yata prāk tat pratyakṣamitīdṛśam ।। 234 ।।
vacanaṃ rājakīyaṃ vā vaidikaṃ vāpi vidyate ।
na cāpi smaraṇāt paścādindriyasya pravartanam ।। 235 ।।
vāryate kenacinnātastattadānīṃ praduṣyati ।
tenendriyārthasambandhāt prāgūrdhvaṃ vāpi yatsmṛteḥ ।। 236 ।।
nanu satyapi tatvāvabhāse'nuvṛtterapratibhāsanāt kathaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhakasyānumānasya pratyabhijñābādhaḥ ? ucyate—animeṣadṛṣṭeryadutpattivināśarahitānuvṛttatattvāvasāyaḥ, sa bādhakaḥ; nāvasitasya kālāntare tattvāvasāyaḥ । kṣaṇapradhvaṃsitayā ca yaḥ pratikṣaṇa- manyatvaṃ vadati, tasyāyaṃ bādhaḥ । pratyabhijñāmātreṇānanyatve vinaṣṭasyāpi, tattvāvagama- pratyabhijñāyāmiva tasyaivotpatteḥ kimantarā vyavahārakālaśūnyayānuvṛttyetyalamati- prasaṅgena ।।
nanu visphārite cakṣuṣi puro'vāsthite'pyarthe pūrvagṛhītārthasmaraṇottarakālaṃ ‘sa evāyaṃ devadattaḥ’ iti savikalpakavijñānamutpadyamānaṃ śabdasmaraṇenārthasmaraṇena ca vyavahitatvāt kathamakṣajaṃ syāt ? yadeva visphārite cakṣuṣi samanantaramutpadyate, tasyaivākṣajatvena pratyakṣatvaṃ yuktam । taduktam—
“arthopayogo'pi punaḥ smārtaṃ śabdānuyojanam ।
akṣadhīryadyapekṣeta so'rtho'vyavasito bhaveta ।।” (iti ।)
ityāśaṅkya ślokatrayeṇa parihāramāha—na hi smaraṇata iti । indriyārthasanni- karṣanimittaṃ pratyakṣatvam; tasmin iti śabdasmaraṇāt pūrvamuttarakālaṃ vā bhavatu, na kaściddoṣa ityarthaḥ ।।
na hyakṣasya śabdasmaraṇasāpekṣatāyāṃ savikalpakasyākṣajatvamapaiti; nāpīndriya- vyāpārasamanantaramutpadyāmānasya punaḥ śabdasmaraṇapekṣatvāt savikalpakasyotpatti- ranakṣajā bhavati; na hi devadattasya pāke kāṣṭhāpekṣāyāṃ kartṛtvamapaiti; yadi syānni- nāpi. mā. nyatve'pi naṣṭasyāpi tattvāvagamātpra. mā. śūnyayānuvṛ. mā vyavasthita. mā. smaraṇasāpekṣa. mā.
vijñānaṃ jāyate sarvaṃ pratyakṣamiti gamyatām ।
vimanaskā yadā kecit sambaddhamapi cendriyaiḥ ।। 237 ।।
na budhyante tathā cānye sādṛśyātivimohitāḥ ।
tatra yo'rthaṃ vivekena kauśalāt sādṛśeṣvapi ।। 238 ।।
sūkṣmaṃ vāpi prapadyeta tasya bhrāntirna tāvatā ।
yathā ṣaṅjā/?/dibhedena gāne laikikavadike ।। 239 ।।
vivekenāvagacchanti yeṣāṃ tatsaṃskṛtā gatiḥ ।
gānamātraṃ vijānanti tatrānadhikṛtāstu ye ।। 240 ।।
tadajñānānna mithyātvaṃ vaktuṃ śakyaṃ vivekinām ।
te hi ṣaḍjādiśabdebhyo vināpyeṣāṃ viviktatām ।। 241 ।।
yathāvadadhigacchanti tavdad gotvādivastvapi ।
saṅkīrṇamarthamātraṃ tu budhyante'bhyāsavarjitāḥ ।। 242 ।।
rvikalpakasyāpyanakṣajatvaṃ prāpnoti, visphārite cakṣuṣi paro'vasthite'pyarthe āloka- manassāpekṣatvāt; tadāha—vimanaskā yadā keciditi ślokadvayena ।।
atraivodāharaṇamāha—yatheti ślokadvayena । yadyapyasaṃskṛtā gānamātraṃ prati- padyante, tathāpi *viśākhilasaṃskārasaṃskṛtānāṃ vivekapratipattirna mithyetyarthaḥ ।।
na ca ‘ṣaḍjo'yam’, ‘niṣādo'yam’ iti vā śabdamātrabhedāvagatiḥ, agṛhītasambandhasya vivekapratipatterityāha—te hīti tripādyā । tasmādyathā satyā- mapyālokamanassāpekṣatāyāṃ nirvikalpakasyākṣajatvaṃ nāpaiti, tathā savikalpasya smaraṇa- sāpekṣatāyāṃ nākṣajatvamapaiti । nāpi mithyātvaṃ bhavatītyāha—tadvadgotvādiva- stvapīti ।।
ato yadyapi nirvikalpakaṃ vijñānaṃ saṃjñitayā na viviktamarthaṃ gṛhṇāti, tathāpi śabdasmaraṇopāyavaśena tatra jātiguṇakriyādau saṃjñitayā vivekapratipatteḥ na mithyā- tvamityāha—saṅkīrṇamiti ।। sambandha. mā. kiñcit. mā. tatranādhi. mā. omitted niṣādo'yam. mā. viśvāvasuriti nyāyaratnākarapāṭhaḥ
vivekaṃ pratipadyante ye śabdasmṛtisaṃskṛtāḥ ।
yathā rūpādimatyarthe yasyaivāsti yadindriyam ।। 243 ।।
sa tanmātraṃ gṛhītvānyanna gṛhṇātyanupāyataḥ ।
tathā vivekahetūnāṃ yadāṃ yaṃ pratipadyate ।। 244 ।।
tadupeye tadā jñānaṃ vartate tadanugrahāt ।
tena yāvat pramātṝṇāṃ vivekopāyadarśanam ।। 245 ।।
na syāt tāvadbhavet teṣāṃ vijñānaṃ nirvikalpakam ।
tasmādyatra prakalpyeta vastu vastvantarātmanā ।। 246 ।।
nanu nirvikalpake'pi jātiguṇakriyādayo vivekenaivāvabhāsante yathā rūpasparśa- gandhādayaḥ; saṅkīrṇārthāvagame tu śabdaviśeṣasmaraṇaṃ na syāt; ataḥ kimidamucyate “saṅkīrṇamarthamātrāṃ tu” iti ? satyamevametat; saṃjñitvābhānena tu saṅkīrṇatāṃ manyate; śabdasmaraṇottarakālaṃ tu saṃjñitayā pratibhāsanādvivekamāha ।।
atraivodāharaṇamāha—yathā rūpādimatīti । yathā rūpasparśādisaṅkīrṇe'pi purovasthite'rthe cakṣurādyanurodena tatra tatra rūpādau pratipattiḥ, evamatrāpi śabda- smaraṇopāyavaśena tatra tatra jātiguṇakriyādau saṃjñitayā vivekena pratipattiḥ ।। etadevopasaṃharannāha—tathā vivekahetūnāmiti ।।
na hīndriyasya śabdagrahaṇāpekṣatāyāṃ kārakatvamapaiti; tadāha—tena yāvāditi ।।
prakaraṇārthamupasaṃharati—tasmādyatreti । yadeva hi savikalpakaṃ vijñānamartha- marthāntarāropeṇāvabhāsayati, tadeva hi pratyakṣābhāsaṃ yathoṣare salilajñānam; na tu jātyādibhirdharmabhūtairyad bhāsayati ‘gaurayam, śuklo'yam’ iti cetyarthaḥ । taduktam—
“tataḥ paraṃ punarvastu dharmairjātyādibhiryayā” iti ।। numānataḥ. cau. mu. tadā. mā. vikalpyata. ananta. mu. saṅkīrṇo'pi. mā. smaraṇāpāya. mā. yāḥ kārakameveti. mā.
pramāṇābhāsatā tatra na svadharmavikalpane ।
pratyakṣatvamataḥ siddhaṃ sāmānyasya tathaiva ca ।। 247 ।।
sambandhasyeti tatpūrvamanumānādi jāyate ।
sarvaṃ cāpyanumānādi pratyakṣe nirvikalpake ।। 248 ।।
na pravartata ityetadanumāne'bhidhāmyate ।
nanvevaṃ sati yāpyagnedūrādapyaupṇyakalpanā ।। 249 ।।
sāpi pratyakṣameva syādyathā gotvādibuddhayaḥ ।
pratyāsannataraṃ gotve pratyakṣatvena saṃmatam ।। 250 ।।
evaṃ sati siddho'yaṃ hetuḥ-pratyakṣadvāratvāditītyāha—pratyakṣatvamata iti । evaṃ sati savikalpakasya pratyakṣatvasiddherliṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandhasya pratyakṣatvāta bhavati pratyakṣapūrvakatvamanumānasyetyarthaḥ ।।
yathā cānumānamevaṃ śabdādayo'pi sambandhagrahaṇasadṛśagrahaṇānyathānupapadya- mānagrahaṇasāpekṣatvāt savikalpakavijñānena pravartanta ityetadanumāne vakṣyāmaḥ । tadāha—sarvaṃ cāpīti ।।
yadīndriyasambandhānusāreṇotpadyamānatvāt śabdasmaraṇavyavahitamapi savi- kalpakavijñānamakṣajatvānnāpaiti, hanta tarhi yadvisphārite cakṣuṣi dūrasthite'pyagnau ‘uṣṇo'yam’ iti jñānam, tasyāpi pratyakṣatva prāpnotīti codayati—nanvevaṃ satīti ।
pratyakṣagṛhītaikārthasamavāyino rūpādidaṃ sparśajñānaṃ laiṅgikam, agṛhīta- sambandhasyānutpatteḥ; na tvekārthasamavāyi pratyakṣagṛhītaṃ kiñcidgotva iti tasyaiva pratyakṣatvaṃ yuktamityāha—pratyāsannataramiti ।। kalpanāt. mā. sambandhasyaive. mā. rādṛṣṭau. mā. syādgotvādimatayo. yathā. mā. tare gotve. mā. savikalpakaṃ vijñānaṃ na pravartate mā.
vijñānaṃ nānyadastīti pratyakṣamidameva naḥ ।
tatrāpyakṣairasambandhaṃ manvānasyopajāyate ।। 251 ।।
yadā buddhirstadā nava pratyakṣatvena kalpyate ।
sparśanena tu sambandhe pratyakṣatvena jāyate ।। 252 ।।
matirauṣṇye parokṣeyaṃ cakṣuṣāgnau prakāśite ।
tasmādyadindriyaṃ yasya grāhakatvena kalpitam ।। 253 ।।
tenaiva sati sambandhe pratyakṣaṃ nānyathā bhavet ।
evaṃ samāne'pi vikalpamārge yatrākṣasambandhaphalānusāraḥ ।
pratyakṣatā tasya tathā ca loke vināpyado lakṣaṇataḥ prasiddham ।।
tatrāpi yadaikārthasamavāyinaṃ gṛhītvā nimīlitākṣasya ‘gaurayam’ iti vijñānamutpadyate, tadā naiva pratyakṣamityāha—tatrāpīti ।।
yadeva tvagindriyajamuṣṇasparśajñānaṃ tasyaivākṣajatvena pratyakṣatvaṃ yuktam, na tvekārthasamavāyino rūpādutpannasyetyāha—sparśanena tviti ।।
tasmādyadindriyasyaivānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ yo viṣayaḥ pratipannaḥ, tajjanyameva tatra jñānaṃ pratyakṣamityāha—tasmādyadindriyamiti ।।
anantaramupasaṃharati—evaṃ samāne'pīti । samāne'pi rūpasparśajñānayoḥ savikalpakatve yadevākṣajaṃ tadeva pratyakṣam, na tvekārthasamavāyino rūpāditi ।। iti bhaṭṭombekaviracitāyāṃ tātparyaṭīkāyāṃ pratyakṣasūtraṃ samāptam kṣo'yam. mā. pratyakṣatvam. mā. rūpādīti. mā.
athautpattikasūtram ।। autpattikastu śabdasyārthena sambandhastasya jñānamupa- deśo'vyatirekaścārthe'nupalabdhe tatpramāṇaṃ bādarāyaṇasyānapekṣatvāt ।। 1-1-5 ।।
pratyakṣādau niṣiddhe'pi nanu lokaprasiddhitaḥ ।
dharmādharmau pramāsyete brāhmaṇādivivekavat ।। 1 ।।
dhārmikādhārmikatvābhyāṃ pīḍānugrahakāriṇau ।
prasiddhau hi tathā cāha pārāśaryo'tra vastuni ।। 2 ।।
idaṃ puṇyamidaṃ pāpamityetasmin padadvaye ।
ācaṇḍalaṃ manuṣyāṇāmalpaṃ śāstraprayojanam ।। 3 ।।
nirmūlāsambhavādatra pramāṇaiḥ saiva mṛgyate ।
kutaḥ punaḥ pravṛtteti pratyakṣādi tu vāritam ।। 4 ।।
evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣādyarthāpattiparyanteṣu niṣiddheṣvidānīṃ tadupalambhakapramāṇā- bhāvena dharmasyābhāvamāśaṅkya tadupalambhakaṃ śabdaṃ pramāṇamupadarśayitumāha—“abhā- vo'pi nāsti, yataḥ” “au—tvāt” । tadadhunā codanā ca pramāṇameveti ca yat pratijñātaṃ sādhayati, tatrāha—“abhāvo'pi nāsti, yataḥ” iti bhāṣyam, avaśiṣṭaṃ sūtramiti ।।
nanu niṣiddheṣvapi pratyakṣādiṣu lokaprasiddhita eva dharmādharmau pramāsyete; tatastadabhāvasyānavasara iti codayati—pratyakṣādau niṣiddhe'pīti ।।
tāmāha—dhārmiketyādinā prasiddhau hītyantena ।
tāmeva lokaprasiddhiṃ vyāsavacanena darśayati—tathā ceti saśeṣeṇa ślokena
satyamevametat; prasiddhereva tu mūlāntaraniṣedhena nirmūlatvamāśaṅkya śabda- mūlatāṃ darśayatītyāha—nirmūlāsambhavādatrati । taduktam—
“dharme sāmānyataḥ siddhe pramāṇaṃ codaneṣyate ।।” iti ।। sthāvasara. mā. atra prasiddhyabhāvasya nirūpaṇāvasaraḥ ityarthaḥ ।
na caitāni parityajya pṛthag loke pramāṇatā ।
saṃsāramocakādeśca hiṃsā puṇyatvasaṃmatā ।। 5 ।।
na paścāt puṇyamicchanti kecidevaṃ vigānataḥ ।
mlecchāryāṇāṃ prasiddhatvaṃ na dharmasyopapadyate ।। 6 ।।
na cāryāṇāṃ viśeṣo'sti yāvacchastramanāśritam ।
tanmūlāryaprasiddhistu tatprāmāṇye sthite bhavet ।। 7 ।।
tasmādabhāvavaktrasthau dharmādharmau na śaknuyāt ।
codanā cet samuddhartuṃ grastau tenaiva paśyatām ।। 8 ।।
upadeśo hi bhavati jñānaṃ tasyeti yojyate ।
jñāyate yena tajjñānamevādhikaraṇatvataḥ ।। 9 ।।
nanu prasiddhirapi pramāṇam, yena pratyakṣādibhiḥ saha vikalpyeta ? smaraṇaṃ hi prasiddhiśabdenocyate; tacca pratyakṣādimūlamevetyaha—na caitānītyardhena ।
kiñca na tāvat prasiddhimātrasya śabdanirapekṣasya dharmādharmau prati prāmāṇyaṃ vigānādityāha—saṃsāramocakāderiti sārdhena ।।
nāpyāryaprasiddheḥ, śāstrasya dharmaṃ prati prāmāṇyānaṅgīkaraṇe'nāryavivekābhāvena “śāstrasthā vā” iti tannimittasyābhāvādityāha—na cāryāṇāmityardhena ।
śabdamūlatvenāryaprasiddhiranāryaprasiddherviśiṣyate; sā kathamiva śabdaprāmāṇyā- naṅgīkaraṇena dharmaṃ prati pramāṇaṃ syādityāha—tanmūletyardhena ।।
evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣādiṣvārthāpattiparyanteṣu niṣiddheṣu dharmādharmayorabhāvamukhapraveśaṃ codanaiva śaktā vārayitumityasyāsadbhāvādityāha—tasmāditi ।।
evaṃ tāvadbhāṣyaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe । tatra “tasya jñānamupadeśaḥ” iti jñānopadeśaśabdau samānādhikaraṇyena pravṛttau yuktau । tayośca vijñānaśabdavāca- katvena bhinnārthatvāt tadabhāvamāśaṅkya sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ darśayitumāha—upadeśo hīti ।। hiṃsādharmatva. mā. vijānataḥ. gā. vaktṛstho. co. mu. ddhairna dharmam. mā. Omitted. iti. mā sa katham. mā. prāmāṇyam. mā.
autpattikagirā dopaḥ kāraṇasya nivāryate ।
abādho'vyatirekeṇa svatastena pramāṇatā ।। 10 ।।
sarvasyānupalabdhe'rthe prāmāṇyaṃ smṛtiranyathā ।
codanā copadeśaśca vidhiścaikārthavācinaḥ ।। 11 ।।
upadeśaśabdena vidhāyakaṃ vākyamucyate । jñānaśabdena jñāyate'neneti vyutpattyā pramāṇamāha । tatrāyaṃ vākyārthaḥ—dharma upadeśo jñānam, dharme savidhikaṃ vākyaṃ pramāṇamityarthaḥ । “autpattikastu śabdasyārthena sambandhaḥ” ityanenāpi kāra- ṇadoṣābhāvamāha । śabdārthayornityaḥ sambandho na samaya ityāha—autpattikagire- tyardhena । avyatirekaśabdenāpi bādhakapratyayābhāvamāha—abādho'vyatirekeṇeti । nanu jñānaśabdenaiva prāmāṇyamupadeśasyoktam, ataḥ ki/?/nena “tatpramāṇam” ityā- śaṅkyārthāntaramasya darśayannāha—svatastena pramāṇateti । vijñānaśabdenopadeśasya prāmāṇyamuktam; “tatpramāṇam” ityanena tvanapekṣatvena yat pramāṇyaṃ pratijñātam, tat svata iti ।।
idānīṃ “arthe'nupalabdhe” iti vyācaṣṭe—sarvasyetyardhena ।
tadanena kārye'rthe śabdapramāṇyaṃ darśitam । apravṛttaprerakopadeśaścātra pramāṇam; viṣayaviśeṣaṇaṃ caitadanupalabdhagrahaṇam; pratyakṣādayastūpalabdhe'pi pravartante । sarva- grahaṇaṃ cotpattiviniyogavidhyabhiprāyam । “smṛtiranyathā” ityanuvādakatvamāha । tadu- ktam—“tenetarapramāṇaiḥ” iti । nanu codanāyāḥ kārye'rthe prāmāṇyaṃ prati- jñātam—“codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharmaḥ” iti; upadeśasya sādhitam—“tasya jñānamupadeśaḥ” iti; tadetadasambaddhamityāśaṅkyāha—codanetyardhena ।।
kimarthaṃ punarjaimininā vidhirāśritaḥ tasyāpyaṅgīkaraṇaṃ svargayāgayoḥ sādhya- sādhanabhāvāvagamāya pravṛttisiddhaye vā ? tāvat sādhyasādhanabhāvāvagamāya; yato'- ntareṇāpi vidhinā ākhyāteṣveva sādhyasādhanabhāvo'vagamyate; tāni hi karotyarthaṃ nityasambandhaḥ mā. abhāvo vyati. mā. śasya sādhi. mā. tasya vyaṅgī. mā.
vākyāntare samarthe'pi kimarthaṃ vidhirāśritaḥ ।
sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ sarvākhyāteṣu vidyate ।। 12 ।।
sarvavākyeṣu cākhyātaṃ tenākāṅkṣānivartanāt ।
pravṛttisiddhiricchātaḥ pratibandhānnivartanam ।। 13 ।।
bhāvānāmavagamayanti; sā ca sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ cāntareṇa nopapadyate । tatraitat syāt sādhyamātrāmantareṇa bhāvanā nopapadyate sādhyanamātraṃ ca yattu svargasyaiva sādhyatvaṃ yāgasyaiva sādhanatvam, tatra vidherupayoga iti; tadasata; “svargakāmo yajeta” iti, svargayāgau iti vā, svargayāgābhyām iti vā, bhāvanāvagabhyate; sā ca sādhyasādhanāpekṣiṇī; na ca dvayorapi sādhyasādhanatve yukte; anyatarasya tu kalpya- māne svargasyaiva prayojanatvenāvagamāt sādhyatvaṃ yuktam; iṣyamāṇārthatayaiva niṣpāda- nena ca sādhanatvāvagamād yāgasyaiva sādhanatvamavagamyata iti nāsti pramāṇayojanaṃ vidherupayoga iti codayati—vākyāntara iti sārdhena ।।
tatraitat syāta—pravṛttisidhyarthaṃ tadāśrayaṇam; tadayuktam; viśiṣṭaprayojanā- ṅgibhāvanāmavagamya tatprayojanārthina icchayaiva pravartante; yastu tat prayojanaṃ necchati, tasya vidhirapi kiṃ kuryāta ? atha kaścid brūyāt—karaṇārthe bhavatu pravattiḥ, tasye ṣṭasādhanatvāt; itikartavyatānubandhe tu vidhimantareṇa neyaṃ pravattirbhavati; na hi tatphalasādhanamiti । tanna, tasyāpi phalabhāvanāṃ prati sādhanatvāt । tadeva tu phalasādhanatvaṃ karaṇopakāradvāreṇa, na tu karaṇatvena; utpattiśiṣṭakāraṇāntarāvaro- dhādavāntaradvārasamarpakatvācca phalabhāvanārthasyaiva sataḥ śrutyādayaḥ । yadyapi karaṇārthaive- tikartavyatā bhavatu, tathāpi na tatra vidhiḥ puruṣaṃ pravartayati; svargakāmasyātatsādhane prerayitumaśakyatvāt । karaṇopakārakāmasya tu tatsādhane'pīcchoreva pravattiriti; tade- tadāha-pravṛttisiddhiricchātaḥ iti । niṣedhādhikāre'pi rāgato hanane pravartamāno pratiṣedhāttu varjanam. cau. ananta. mu. sādhanamanta. mā. tayā vā niṣpramādena. mā. vidhintareṇa. mā. sandhānatvāt. mā. ntaravirodhā. mā. masyārthata. mā. mānena ca nirtata. mā.
vidhāvanāśrite sādhyaḥ puruṣārtho na labhyate ।
śrutasvargādibādhena dhātvarthaḥ sādhyatāṃ vrajeta ।। 14 ।।
nañā nivartyata iti kiṃ vidhinā ? vidhirapyatra śrūyamāṇo rāgādilakṣaṇameva pravṛtti- manuvadet—yaddhananaṃ kuryāt iti; na tvasau vidhāyakaḥ । tathā hi—na tāvaddhananaṃ vidadhāti, tatra rāgata eva pravṛttatvāt । nāpi nañartham, abhāvarūpatvāt । nāpi nañarthāvacchinnāṃ bhāvanāṃ vidadhāti, tadavacchinnāyāstasyāścābhāvarūpatvāt । nāpi nañarthāvacchinnasya hananasya, tasyāpyabhāvarūpatvāt । nāpi rāgato hananāvacchinnāyāṃ pravartamānastatparyudastāyāṃ niyujyate, anavacchinnāyāstasyā vidhiviṣayatvāyogāt । nāpi ahananāvacchinnā vidhīyate’ abhāvasyāvyāpārarūpatvenānavacchedakatvāt । athāpi nañupahitā hantirabrāhmaṇādinyāyena hananaparyudastadhātvarthāntaravācitvāt tadavacchinnāṃ bhāvanāṃ pratipādayati, sā ca vidherviṣaya ityāśayaḥ, tadasat; hanana- vyatiriktadhātvarthāvacchinnāyāṃ puruṣasya svata eva pravṛttatvāta; avaśyaṃ jīvan pumān kiñcit karoti gacchati kvacidāsta iti । api caivaṃ sati punarapi bhāvārthavidhi- revāyātaḥ । tatrottaramuktam । na ca rāgataḥ pravṛttiṃ vidhiḥ pratibadhnāti; tatasta- syāpravartakatvāpātāt । na ca nañupahitasya pratibandhakatvam, tasyāpyabhāvarūpā- patteḥ । atha nañā pratibandhaḥ kriyate, tatadbhāvabhāvitvena naña eva tat sāmarthyam, na vidheriti kṛtamativācālatayā । tadetadāha—
pratibandhānnivartanamiti । eva- mākṣipte sati vidherupayogaṃ darśayitumāha—
vidhāvanāśrita iti । vidhyabhāve hi “svargakāmo yajeta” ityatra sannihitadhātvarthakarmikāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ padāntaropātta- svargakāmaḥ kartā ityetāvadavagamyate—svargakāmo yāgaṃ karotīti । nanu vidhyā- śrayaṇe'pi preryaviśeṣaṇasya sādhyatvaṃ yāgādeśca sādhanatvaṃ kathamavagamyate, na hi vidhiḥ phalaṃ vinā vidhātumasamarthaḥ, tasya preryaviśeṣayamātrāpekṣaṇāta; preryaviṣayaśravaṇā- nnairākāṅkṣye sati preryaviśeṣaṇasya dhātvarthasādhyatvakalpanā puruṣabuddhiprabhavaiva syāta; omitted hananasya. mā. pyatīta. mā. mā. nāpi hananā. mā. pratisaṃpāda. mā. bahusta. mā. tasyāḥ prava. mā. ttadabhāva. mā. kartavyotāva. mā.
vidhau tu tamatikramya svargādeḥ sādhyateṣyate ।
tatsādhanasya dharmatvamevaṃ sati ca labhyate ।। 15 ।।
yataḥ preryaviśeṣaṇaṃ bhāvanābhāvyatāmapratipadyamānamapi jīvanavat preryaṃ viśeṣaṇayituṃ śaknotyeva । nāpi bhāvanāyāṃ bhāvyākāṅkṣāyāṃ sannihitatvāt preryaviśeṣaṇasya sādhyatvam, jīvanasyāpi sādhyatvaprasaṅgāt । athāsiddhameveṣyamāṇatvenopāttaṃ loke dṛṣṭam—haritakīṃ bhakṣayed virekakāmaḥ ityādau, jīvanaṃ ca siddham: tadanupapannam; sarvatra preryaviśeṣaṇasyāsiddhatvāt । ata evaṃ vākyārthaḥ—yaḥ puruṣaḥ svargādi kāma- yate, sa yāgādiviśiṣṭāṃ bhāvanāṃ kuryāt iti । kimarthamasau niṣphalānuṣṭhāne pravartata iti cet, vidhistāvadavagamyate; yadi ca tathā na pravartate, kimatra kurmaḥ ?
api ca, vidhiḥ sādhyāsādhanabhāvamanāpādya kiṃ na vidadhātyeva, uta vida- dhadapi na paryavastati ? yadi tāvadādyaḥ pakṣastata itaretarāśrayatvam; vaidhaṃ hīdaṃ phala- mucyate, na ca phalādvinā vidhirvidadhāti । athāparyavasānam, tanna jānīmaḥ— kimetadaparyavasānaṃ nāmeti । vidhinā saphale niṣphale vā vyāpāre puruṣaḥ pravartata ityetāvān liṅarthaḥ । na hi pravartakatvaṃ muktvānyo vyāpāra ityuktam । pratiṣedhādhi- kāreṣu “brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ” ityevamādiṣu kamipadopādānamapi dūrotsāritameva । tatra narakapātaḥ phalaṃ hananasya vā kalpyeta, nañarthasya vā ? na tāvaddhananasya, tatra puruṣasyāpravartyamānatvāt; na hyavidhīyamānānāṃ phalasambandhaḥ । kvacidabhimataḥ nāpi nañarthasya, tatra puruṣasya pravartyamānatvāt; na hi narakaphale vyāpāre kaścit pravartate । atha matam—pratiṣedhavidhinā rāgataḥ puruṣo hanane pravartamānastato niva- rtate, sa yadi hananasyāniṣṭatāṃ nāvagacchati, tataḥ kimiti nivartata iti vidheḥ prāmāṇyam; parihṛtamevetyāsaṅkyāha—vidhau tu tamiti । tu. mā. nābhāvatām. mā. ṇasya jīvana. mā. ṇatvaṃ nopā. mā. ṇasya siddha. mā. pravartakaṃ mu. mā. phalaṃ buddhihanana. mā. mānāṃphala. mā. tatra. mā. dheraprāmāṇyamaparihārya. mā.
ayamabhiprāyaḥ— vidhistāvat sarvatra bhāvanāyāṃ puruṣaṃ prerayatīti vakṣyāmaḥ । bhāvyaniṣṭhaśca bhāvakavyāpāro bhāvanā; tasyāñca bhavanakriyākarturbhāvyatvamiti vakṣyati । vidhirapi na svargakāmamātmaneṣyaprāṇopāyāpekṣamanavagatatadupāyaṃ bhāvanāyāṃ yāgahomadā- nādyavacchinnāyāmapravṛttaṃ prerayati; avagatatadupāyeṣu tathaiva pravṛttatvāt na prerayati; tadāha । bhāṣyakāro'pyāha—“jānātyevāsau mayaitat kartavyamiti, upāyaṃ tu na veda” iti । sa ca vidheḥ puruṣa evaṃvidhāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ preraṇāṃ pratipadyamāna eva svaviśeṣaṇasya bhavadiṣyamāṇatvenopāttasya dhātvarthātikrameṇa vidheyabhāvanābhāvyatvaṃ pratipadyate । na cātra bādhakapratyayo'sti; nāpi karaṇadoṣajñānam; ataḥ pramāṇa- miyamavagatiḥ । dhātvarthastu sādhyāṃśāt pracyuta upapadārthamātre bādhena karaṇāṃśe nivi- śamānaḥ svargabhāvakavyāpārasādhakatvena dharmatāṃ pratipadyate । taduktam—“na ca tenā- niyujyamānaḥ phalakalpanānimittaṃ labhate” iti । niṣedhādhikāre'pi rāgato hananā- vacchinnāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ pravartamāno nañarthaviśiṣṭahananadhātvārthāvacchinnāyāṃ preraṇaṃ prati- padyamāna eva hananasya narakasādhanatvaṃ pratipadyate । nanu “brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ” ityatra niyojyaviṣayaśravaṇānnairākāṅkṣaye sati kalpyamāno narakapātaḥ puruṣabuddhiprabhava eva syāt । evaṃ tarhi “yajeta svargakāmaḥ” ityatrāpi niyoganiyojyaviśeṣaṇasya sādhyatvaṃ kalpamānaṃ puruṣabuddhiprabhavameva syāta; yato niyojyaviśeṣaṇaṃ bhāvārthasādhya- tāmapratipadyamānameva jīvanavanniyojyaṃ viśeṣayituṃ śaknotyeva । nāpi bhāvyākāṅkṣāyāṃ sannihitatvānniyojyaviśeṣaṇasya sādhyatvam, jīvanasyāpi sādhyatvaprasaṅgāt । athā- siddhasyeṣyamāṇatvenopāttasya talloke dṛṣṭam, jīvanaṃ tu siddham । tadanupapannam, sarvatra niyojyaviśeṣaṇasyāsiddhatvādityuktam । jīvanādhikāre ca sannihitasyāyogya- tvāt sādhyāntaraṃ kalpayatu bhavān । atha tatra bhāvārthasya bhāvakatvaṃ niyogārthaṃ pratyevoktam, tatkāmādhikāre'pyaviśiṣṭaṃ tasya; sati dharmāderanvayābhāva ityuktam । atha bhāvārthaviṣayo vidhirniyojyaviśeṣaṇasya sādhyatāmanāpādya na paryavasyati, evaṃ tarhi “brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ” ityatrāpi nañarthaviṣayo vidhirhananasyāniṣṭaphala- tasyāśca. mā. omitted iti. mā. nābhāvatvam. mā. gamayati. mā. mānam. mā. thasya siddha. mā.
tāmanāpādya na paryavasyati yaḥ svargasya sādhyatāṃ kalpayati, sa na narakapātasya ityetadatidurbhaṇam ।।
aparaṃ matam—prerakasya liṅarthaṃsya preryākāṅkṣāyāṃ viṣayākṣiptaḥ kartā preryatvena saṃbadhyate; viṣayasya ca bhāvyākāṅkṣāyāṃ sannihitadhātvarthātikrameṇa preraṇāyāṃ preryasya prāptatvāt svargakāmādipadasya lohitoṣṇīṣavadupasarjanaparatvena svargaṃ kāma- yata iti vā vyutpattau svargapadasya bhāvyasamarpakatvam, prakṛtyaṃśasya yajyādeḥ sādhanāpekṣāyāṃ sādhanasamarpakatvena yāgādeḥ dharmatvamiti । tadanupapannam, viṣayā- kṣiptasya pravṛttakriyatvenāpravṛttakriyatvenāpravṛttaprerakeṇa vidhinā saha sambandhābhāvāt । kartṛmātraṃ ca viṣayeṇākṣiptam; na ca tasya svargabhāvanāyāṃ preraṇaṃ saṃbhavati । atha viṣayākṣiptasya svargakāmādipadāt tadviśeṣaḥ, tarhi tasyaiva samarpakatvam; kimantarā viṣayākṣepeṇa ? nāpi bhāvanaiva svargaviśiṣṭā kartṛviśeṣaṃ gamayati; avagate hi vidhibhāvanayoḥ viṣayaviṣayibhāve dhātvarthātikrameṇa viṣayasya svargabhāvakatvam; preryapūrvakaśca tayoḥ viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ; taditaretarāśrayaprasaṅgaḥ ।
api ca vidhikṛto viṣayaṃ prati svargayāgayoḥ karmakaraṇabhāvaḥ; preryapūrvikā- ca vidherbhāvanāviṣayatā; yaduttarakālaṃ ca bhāvanāyāṃ svargayāgayoḥ karmakaraṇabhāvastatra preraṇāpratipattivelāyāṃ svargakāmādipadopāttaviṣayākṣiptayoḥ kasya preryatvamiti cintāyāṃ viṣayākṣiptasya sannidhāne pravṛttakriyatvenānvayāyogyatvāt tadatikrameṇa svargakāmādipadopāttasyaiva preryatvam । vakṣyati ca—
puruṣaḥ svarge [na] pravartate, sa vidhiraṅgapradhānavatyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ puruṣaṃ niyoja- yati । “svavyāpāre hi puruṣaḥ kartṛtvena niyujyate” iti । karaṇetikartavyatayoḥ svapravṛttapuruṣaniyogāt pradhānasya pramāṇavācino dhātoḥ pareṇa pratyayena phalakartṛtvaṃ codyata ityanavagatasvargopāyāpekṣeṇa । avagatopāyena bhāvārthāśrayaṇe svargakāmaḥ kartṛ- tvena yāgaḥ sādhyatvena—svargakāmo yāgaṃ kuryāditi । tadā satvayostu sādhyā- tikrameṇa tadapekṣitopāyatveneti । tadanupapannam svargakāmāderyāgādyavacchinnāyāṃ niyogāvagamāt । yākṣiptakartā. mā. praryamāṇāyām. mā. janatvena para. mā. vāpyutpattau. mā.
svapratyayāntarāpekṣā syādanāptanaroktiṣu ।
āptoktiṣu narāpekṣā nobhayaṃ codanāsu naḥ ।। 16 ।।
vakṣyati ca—“svavyāpāre hi puruṣaḥ kartṛtvena niyujyate ।” iti । vidhipuruṣayorhi preryaprerakalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ; tatra yāgādayo viṣayatvena saṃbadhyante, na punariṣyamāṇo- pāyatayā । athāpekṣaṇamanyathā ca prerakatvavidhātāt; preryaprerakaviṣayapratipattyuttarakālaṃ na viṣayasyeṣyamāṇaṃ pratyupāyatvam, kalpanāt । taduktam “na ca tenāniyujya- mānaḥ phalakalpanānimittaṃ labhate” iti ।।
api ca jīvanavadyajetetyatra kiṃ jīvanopāyāpekṣā upāttaduritakṣayādikalpanā viṣayakartavyatāvagatipūrvikaiva, niṣedhādhikāre'pi nañarthaniyogāvagatipūrvikaiva, hananā- deraniṣṭakalpanāt; tadabhyupāyaṃ tu bhavet...tasyāyamabhyupāyasādhanāpekṣiṇastasya “śreyassādhanatā hyeṣāṃ nityaṃ vedāt pratīyate” ityevamādayaḥ bhāṣyakāravārtika- kārasaṃbandhino vidhyākṣiptapramāṇamevaṃ vyākhyeyāḥ ।।
idānīṃ anapekṣatvāditi vyācaṣṭe—svapratyayāntarāpekṣeti । anāptapraṇīte hi vākye pratipattṛpramāṇasaṃvādena prāmāṇyam āptapraṇīteṣu tu na tatprāmāṇyāpekṣā; codanāyā apauruṣeyatvenobhayāpekṣāpi nāstītyanapekṣatvādityuktam ।। iti bhaṭṭombekaviracitāyāṃ tātparyaṭīkāyāṃ autpattikasūtraṃ samāptam na ca niyujyamānaṃphala. mā. omitted. na. mā.

ādiśabdo makārānto luki kleśena saṅgatiḥ ।
nañadhyāhiṛyate sūtre saṅkarāt paricodanā ।। 1 ।।
pramāṇalakṣaṇajñānād vyabhicārāt parīkṣaṇam ।
naitat pratyakṣamityevamaparikṣopasaṃhṛtā ।। 2 ।।
tatrānyasyāyathārthatvaṃ pratyakṣe tu yathārthatā ।
yadābhāsaṃ hi vijñānaṃ tatsaṃyoge tadiṣyate ।। 3 ।।
saṃpūrṇa lakṣaṇaṃ tatsatorvyatyayaḥ kṛtaḥ ।
śobhanārthastu sacchabdo yadvādhyāhārakalpanā ।। 4 ।।
idānīṃ vṛttikāramatena bhāṣyakāraḥ sūtratrayamanyathā vyākhyāsyannāha— “vṛttikārastvanyathemaṃ granthaṃ varṇayāñcakāra tasya nimittaparīṣṭirityevamādim” iti । atrādiśabdaṃ kecilluptamakāraṃ paṭhanti; tathātve napuṃsakaliṅgasyādiśabdasya grantha- śabdena puṃliṅgena saha sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na prāpnotītyāha—ādiśabda ityardhena । napuṃsakaliṅgatve “svamornapuṃsakāt” iti luk smaryate । tadanyathābhāvaṃ darśa- yati—nañadhyāhiṛyate sūtre iti । “nanu vyabhicārāt” iti “saṅkarāt paṃri- codanā । pramāṇalakṣaṇajñānādvyabhicārāt parikṣaṇam” iti । “ucyate— yadvyabhicarita na tatpratyakṣam” ityādi siddhāntabhāṣyam, tasyābhiprāyamāha— naitatpratyakṣamiti sārdhena ।।
sattacchabdayoretkarṣāpakarṣābhyāmidaṃ lakṣaṇasūtraṃ vyākhyeyaṃ tatsaṃprayoge puru- ṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma pratyakṣamiti yat yat pratibhāsate, tat satatsaṃprayoga ityarthaḥ । na cedṛśaṃ vyabhicaratītyāha—sampūrṇamityardhena । utkṛṣṭasya sacchabdasyārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe— śobhanārthaśca sacchabdaḥ iti । anyasyaiva vā tacchabdasyādhyāhāra ityāha— yadvāddhyāhārakalpaneti ।। “na tatpratyakṣam” iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ.
arthāpattyetareṣāṃ ca pratyakṣābhāsalakṣaṇam ।
bādhakajñānalabho hi pūrvābādhe na saṃbhavet ।। 5 ।।
sa cāstītyavabodhatve sati nānyonyasaṃśrayam ।
na cānāgatabādhena pūrveṇātmā hi labhyate ।। 6 ।।
nimittadoṣabodhena paścād yatrāpyabādhanam ।
bhavatyeva hi tatrāpi narāntaraviparyayaḥ ।। 7 ।।
sarveṣāṃ sarvadā yatra dhīḥ syāt tatrāpyabādhanam ।
atatsaṃprayoge tu pratyakṣābhāsatvamarthāduktaṃ bhavatītyāha—arthāpattyetyardhena ।
“bādhakaṃ hi yatra jñānamutpadyate, tadanyasaṃprayoge” iti siddhāntabhāṣyam; tatredamāśaṅkate—bādhaketi astītyantena । dvayoḥ parasparaviparitārthaprāpakatve sati kathamuparitanasyaiva bādhakatvama, na tu pūrvasyaivetyāśaṅkyāha—avabodhatva iti śeṣeṇa । apavādarahitabodhatvādevoparitanasya prāmāṇyam, na pūrvavijñānāprāmāṇyakṛta- mityarthaḥ । na ca pūrvavijñānamuparitanasyāpavādakam; yasmānna pūrvavijñānamuparitana- jñānagṛhītārthapratiṣedhapratibhāsamityāha—na cetyardhena । yatra tarhi dvicandrādijñānā- dāvanantaraṃ timiropahatacakṣuṣo bādhakavijñānaṃ notpadyate kathamanyasaṃprayogajatva- mityāśaṅkyāha—nimittadoṣabodhenetyardhena । tatrāpi kāraṇadoṣajñānādanyasaṃprayogā- vagatirityarthaḥ । bādhāpratyayāt vijñānakāraṇaduṣṭatā kathamavagamyata ityāśaṅkyāha— bhavatyeva hītyardhena ।।
yadi tarhi bādhāpratyayāt kāraṇadoṣajñānena vānyasaṃprayogāvagatiḥ, hanta tarhi ‘gaurayam’ ityapi savikalpakaṃ vijñānamanyasaṃprayogajam; sāmānyādipratibhāsaṃ hi tadutpadyate, vyatirekāvyatirekavṛttivikalpena teṣāmabhāvāt । prameyotthamanumāna- meva bādhakam; doṣasahakāri cendriyamavidyamānasāmānyapratibhāsameva vijñānaṃ jana- yati śuktikāyāmiva rajatajñānamityāśaṅkyāha—sarveṣāmityardhena । bādhe ca. cau. mu. doṣabhedena. cau. mu. tatra na bādha. cau. ananta. mu bādhapratyayavijñāna. mā.
na hi kāraṇaduṣṭatvabuddhistatra balīyasī ।। 8 ।।
jātyādiṣu yadā jātā buddhiḥ paścādasambhavāt ।
nāśyate yuktibhistatra vyaktamanyonyasaṃśrayam ।। 9 ।।
svataḥ prāmāṇyataścātra nirṇayo'stitvabodhanāt ।
tadrūpapratyayotpattestadasadvādināmapi ।। 10 ।।
yuktaṃ yadrajatajñānasya ‘nedaṃ rajatam’ ityabhāvajñānaṃ bādhakamupagatam, upa- rata eva pratyakṣe tasyotpadyamānatvāt; sāmānyajñānaṃ tu sarvadā sarveṣāṃ cotpadyata iti prameyatvānumānānumeyamapi kāraṇadoṣajñānaṃ pratyakṣavirodhād durbalaṃ tadāha—na hītyardhena ।।
