na ca tasya pratyakṣābhāsatvena virodhaḥ, itaretarāśrayaprasaṅgādityāha— jātyādiṣviti । siddhe hi prameyavijñānasya prāmāṇye pratyakṣābhāsatvam, pratyakṣā- bhāsatvācca anumānaṃ pramāṇamiti ।।
nanu ca tvatpakṣe'pi siddhe'numānāprāmāṇye pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyam, siddhe ca pratyakṣasya prāmāṇye'numānasyāprāmāṇyamitītaretarāśrayamevetyāśaṅkyāha—svataḥprā- māṇyataścātreti । tvatpakṣe parataḥ prāmāṇyāt tathā; asmatpakṣe tu svata eva bodha- katvena sāmānyāvayavijñānaṃ prāmāṇam, na prameyavikalpotthānumānagatāprāmāṇyāt । na tu prameyavikalpotthānumānaṃ muktvā tadasatattvāmitivat tadabhāvajñānamātraṃ bādhakam, tadānīmapi sarveṣāṃ sarvadā sāmānyāvayavijñānasyotpadyamānatvāditi ।। iti bhaṭṭombekaviracitāyāṃ tātparyaṭīkāyāṃ vṛttikāragranthaḥ samāptaḥ ।। kamuparatamupaḥ mā. mānaprāmā. mā. syāprāmā. mā. syāprāmā. mā. nasya prāmā. mā omitted tvatpakṣeparataḥ prāmāṇyāt. mā. prāmeyaṃ ca savika. mā. mānyasyāvayavi. mā.
nirālambanavādaḥ
pramāṇatvāpramāṇatve puṇyapāpādi tatphalam ।
vidhyarthavādamantrārthanāmadheyādikalpanā ।। 1 ।।
sarveṣu lakṣaṇeṣvevaṃ svapramāṇagaṇaiḥ sthitiḥ ।
vacanavyaktibhedena pūrvasiddhāntapakṣatā ।। 2 ।।
karmabhyaḥ phalasambandhaḥ pāralaukyaihalaukikaḥ ।
sarvamityādyayuktaṃ syādarthaśūnyāsu buddhiṣu ।। 3 ।।
tasmād dharmārthibhiḥ pūrvaṃ pramāṇairlokasaṃmataiḥ ।
“nanu sarva eva nirālambanaḥ svapnavat pratyayaḥ” ityadinā śūnyavādaparya- ntena bāhyārthābhāvamāśaṅkya tatsadbhāvaṃ pratipādayati bhāṣyakāraḥ । tatra bāhyārthaprati- pādanasya svatantropayogitāṃ darśayitumāha vārtikakāraḥ—pramāṇatveti trayeṇa । ślokatraye'trāyamabhiprāyaḥ—bāhyārthābhāve pramāṇatadābhāsavyavasthā na syāt, svāṃśā- lambanasyaiva sarvatra vidyamānatvāditi । nāpyarthakriyāsaṃvādasadbhāvena pramāṇatadābhāsa- vyavasthā, svapnāvasthāyāmudakajñāne maṇibuddhāvarthakriyāsaṃvādadarśanāt । nāpyavicchinna- vāsanājanitatvena prāmāṇyaṃ vicchinnavāsanājanitatvena cāprāmāṇyamiti vyavasthā, vijñānavādinastadvyatiriktavāsanābhāvāt । na ca paribhāṣyā; loke hi saṃvāda- visaṃvādādhīne prāmāṇyāprāmāṇye । tayośca bāhyārthasadasadbhāvādhīnatvam । tathā dharmā- dharmayoḥ svarganarakayośca tatphalayorbāhyārthabhāve sadbhāvo na syāt । vidhyarthavādamantra- nāmadheyakalpanā śabdāntarādiṣaṭkena ca yadbhedapratirapādanam śrutyādibhiśca tādarthya- pratipādanam svargādibhāvanāyāṃ ca dhātvarthasya karaṇatvamupapadārthasya ca tādarthyaṃ yacca niyojyaviśeṣaṇasya svargavṛṣṭyāderaihikāmuṣmikaphalatvam, tat sarvamevamādi bāhyā- rthābhāve na syāta—iti ślokatrayārthaḥ ।।
idānīṃ bāhyārthapratipādanasya svatantropayogitāmuktāmupasaṃharati—tasmā- diti । lokasaṃmataiḥ pramāṇairarthasadbhāvaḥ pūrvamanuṣṭhānārthibhiḥ pratipādanīyaḥ । kriyā- śabdaścātrānuṣṭhānavācī ।। laukike. cau. mu. Omitted svapnavat. mā. Omitted na ca. mā. yaśca. mā.
arthasya sadasadbhāve yatnaḥ kāryaḥ kriyāṃ prati ।। 4 ।।
yadā saṃvṛtisatyena sarvametat prakalpyate ।
jñānamātre'pi kasmādvo vṛthāgrāho'rthakalpane ।। 5 ।।
saṃvṛterna tu satyatvaṃ satyabhedaḥ kuto nvayam ।
satyaṃ cet saṃvṛtiḥ keyaṃ mṛṣā cet satyatā katham ।। 6 ।।
satyatvaṃ na tu sāmānyaṃ mṛṣārthaparamārthayoḥ ।
virodhānna hi vṛkṣatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ vṛkṣasiṃhayoḥ ।। 7 ।।
tulyārthatve'pi tenaiṣāṃ mithyāsaṃvṛtiśabdayoḥ ।
vañcanārtha upanyāso lālāvaktrāsavādivat ।। 8 ।।
nāstikyaparihārārthaṃ saṃvṛtiḥ kalpaneti ca ।
nanu bāhyārthabhāve'pi sāṃvṛtamarthamaṅgīkṛtya prāmāṇyāprāmāṇyavyavahāro dharmā- dharmopadeśaśca ghaṭata eveti codayati—yadeti । taduktam—
“dve satye samupāśritya buddhānāṃ dharmadeśanā ।
loke saṃvṛtisatyaṃ ca satyaṃ ca paramārthataḥ”।। iti ।
taccaitadātmādvaitavādibhirapīṣṭameva bāhyārthaprapañcamithyātvaṃ vadadbhiḥ ।।
tadetat satyādvayābhāvena nirākartumāha—saṃvṛteriti ślokadvayena । na hi saṃvṛtiparamārthavyaktyoḥ satyatvaṃ nāma sāmānyam, ekatra virodhādanyatra ca paunaruktyaprasaṅgādityarthaḥ ।।
tulyārthatve'pi mithyāsaṃvṛtiśabdayoḥ pratāraṇārtho'yaṃ saddharme saṃvṛtisatya- tvopanyāsaḥ lālā vaktrāsavaḥ pīyate itivadityāha—tulyārthatve'pīti ।।
nāstikyaparihārārthaṃ ca sāṃvṛtakālpanikopanyāsaḥ; paramārthatastu nirvastuke vijñānādabhinne jagati naiva kiñcit bhavati; kiṃ hi tadā kena kalpyate ityāha—nāstikyeti ।। naca. cau. mu. lokasaṃvṛttisatyatvam. mā. satyaṃ nāma. mā. prakāraṇārthaḥ. mā. nnatve jagato naiva bhavati. mā. kalpate. mā.
kalpanāpi tvabhinnasya naiva nirvastuke bhavet ।। 9 ।।
tasmād yannāsti nāstyeva yattvasti paramārthataḥ ।
tat satyamanyanmithyaiva ca satyadvayakalpanā ।। 10 ।।
svapnopabhogavaccāpi yopabhogasya kalpanā ।
tannivṛttyarthameveha paramārthe prayatyate ।। 11 ।।
na hi svapnasukhādyarthaṃ dharme kaścit pravartate ।
yādṛcchikatvāt svapnasya tūṣṇīmāsyeta paṇḍitaiḥ ।। 12 ।।
paramārthaphalaprāptimicchadbhistena yatnataḥ ।
pratipattirvidhātavyā yuktibhirbāhyavastuni ।। 13 ।।
tatrārthaśūnyaṃ vijñānaṃ yogācārāḥ samāśritāḥ ।
tasyāpyabhāvamicchanti ye mādhyamikavādinaḥ ।। 14 ।।
idānīṃ virodhapaunaruktyoktameva stayadvayābhāvamupasaṃharati—tasmāditi ।।
jyotiṣṭomādiphalānāṃ ca svapnopabhogatulyatvanirāsārthaṃ paramārthasatyatāyāṃ prayatyate; sāṃvṛte tu phalopabhoge na kathañcana buddhipūrvakārī tatsādhane pravarteta, tasya yadṛcchayaiva kadācidutpatteriti ślokadvayenāha—svapnopabhogeti ।।
anantaroktamupasaṃharati—paramārtheti ।।
atra bhāṣyakāreṇa yogācāradarśanameva pūrvapakṣīkṛtam, arthasadasadbhāvavi- cārāt । yadi mādhyamikadarśanaṃ pūrvapakṣīkṛtamabhipretaṃ syāta, tadā vijñānasadasadbhāva- vicāra eva kriyeta; nārthasadasadbhāvavicāraḥ । tatpradarśanārthaṃ darśanadvayamupanyasyati vārtikakāraḥ—tatrārthaśūnyamiti ।। anyanmithyeti. cau. mu. svapnādibhoga. cau. mu. gatvakalpanā. cau. mu. phalāvāsi. cau. mu. vastuṣu. cau. mu. pratyatyate. mā.
tatra bāhyārthaśūnyatvaṃ tulyaṃ tāvad dvayorapi ।
nivartyārthaṃ tato jñāne tadvatsaṃvṛtikalpanāt ।। 15 ।।
tasmāt sādhāraṇatvena tanmūlatvena cāpyayam ।
bāhyārthasadasadbhāve yatno bhāṣyakṛtā kṛtaḥ ।। 16 ।।
bāhyārthāpahnave dvaitameko'rthasya parikṣaṇāt ।
pramāṇamāśritaścaikastatrāstāṃ yaḥ prameyataḥ ।। 17 ।।
pramāṇatastu mūlatvādihedānīṃ vicāryate ।
nanu mādhyamikavādino'pi naiva grāhyagrāhakavikalpaśūnyatāṃ svaśabdenāhuḥ । ataḥ kathamucyate “tasyāpyabhāvamicchanti” iti ? atrāyamabhiprāyaḥ—nirākṛte hyanubhāvya ākāre'nubhāvyābhāvenāniṣṭamapyanubhavasyāsattvaṃ balādāpadyata iti ।।
tatra nirākāryatve samāne'pi yogācāramādhyamikadarśanayoryadyogācāradarśana- meva pūrvapakṣitam, tatra prayojanamāha—tatra bāhyārtheti ślokadvayena । bāhyārthābhāvo hyubhayadarśanasādhāraṇaḥ । atastasminnirākṛte yogācāradarśanavanmādhyamikadarśanamapi nirākṛtameva bhavati, tanmūlatvāt; anubhāvyābhāva evānubhavābhāve mūlam । tasmādarthasadadbhāva eva vicāritaḥ, na jñānasadasadbhāvaḥ । sa ca yadyapi bauddhairbā- hyārthābhāvaḥ prameyaparīkṣayā pramāṇavṛttyaśaktyā pratipāditaḥ; tathāpi prameyaparīkṣāṃ parityajya pramāṇavicāra evāṅgīkṛtaḥ tanmūlatvāta prameyasya । yadi bāhyārthagrāhakatvena pravartante pratyakṣādayaḥ, tataḥ prameyavikalpānāṃ tadviruddhatvādaprāmāṇyam; atha na pravartante, tataḥ prameyābhāvādeva kutastadvikalpa ityāha—bāhyārthāpahnava iti sārdhena ।। nivṛttyāsya. cau. ananta. mu. kalpanā. cau. ananta. mu. pramāṇasthastu. cau. ananta. mu. parīkṣyate. cau. ananta. mu. nyāṃ svacchaśabdenāha. mā. (svacchaṃ śabdena ?) bhāvena naṣṭama. mā. parīkṣāyām. mā.
prastutaḥ sa dvidhā cātra prathamaṃ tvanumānataḥ ।। 18 ।।
pratyakṣabādhena cokte paścāt tacchaktyapekṣaṇāt ।
tatrānumānamāhedaṃ nanvityasya ca saṅgatiḥ ।। 19 ।।
tatsaṃprayogajaṃ nānyat pratyakṣamiti bhāṣitam ।
tatrendriyārthasambandhabhedo na paramārthataḥ ।। 20 ।।
kalpitaḥ saṃprayogastu svapnādāvapi vidyate ।
nanu bāhyārthābhāvavad vijñānābhāvo'pyatra śaṅkita eva “śūnyastu” ityādinā; tat kathaṃ yogācāradarśanamevātra pūrvapakṣīkṛtam, na mādhyamikadarśana- mityāśaṅkayāha—prastuta iti dvyardhena । “śūnyastu” nānena māvyamikadarśanaṃ pūrvapakṣitam; na hyatra jñānābhāvaḥ pratipādayitumabhipretaḥ kiṃ tarhi ? arthābhāva eva, “atastadbhinnamartharūpaṃ nāma na kiñcidastīti paśyāmaḥ” iti pūrvapakṣopasaṃhārāt । sa eva tu bāhyārthābhāvaḥ prathamamanumānena pratipāditaḥ— “nanu sarva eva nirālambanaḥ pratyayaḥ” ityādinā । punastasya pratyakṣavirodharūpaṃ dūṣaṇamuktam—“nanu jāgrato buddhiḥ supariniścitā kathaṃ viparyasiṣyati” ityādinā । tataḥ pratyakṣasya bāhye'rthe pravṛttiśaktirnāstīti pratyakṣavirodhaparihāreṇa punarupakrāntaṃ pūrvapakṣavādinā “śūnyastu । katham ? arthajñānayorākārabhedaṃ nopalabhāmahe” ityādinā । punaḥ pratyakṣavirodha eva samarthitaḥ siddhāntavādinā “syādetadevam, yadyarthākārā buddhiḥ” ityādinā । tadanenaitad darśayati—ekamevedaṃ vādasthānakam iti । “prathamaṃ tvanumānataḥ” ityuktam । kiṃ panustadanumānamityāśaṅkyāha—tatrānumānamāhedaṃ nanviti । “nanu sarva eva” isyādibhāṣyamanumānapratipādakamityarthaḥ । kaḥ punarasya bhāṣyasya pūrveṇa saha sambandha ityāśaṅkyāha—asya ca saṅgatiriti saśeṣeṇa ślokadvayena । tatsaṃprayogajaṃ rajate rajatajñānaṃ pratyakṣam, atatsaṃprayogajam tu śuktikāyāṃ rajata- jñānamiti yaduktam, tasya cāyamākṣepaḥ “nanu sarva eva” iti । bāhyārthābhāvā- dindriyārthasambandhaḥ pāramārthiko na kvacidasti, sāṃvṛtastu sarvatrāstītyabhiprāyaḥ । avakṣeṇāt. cau. ananta. mu. nāma patyakṣa. cau. ananta. mu.
tadatadyogajatvasya vibhāgastena durlabhaḥ ।। 21 ।।
mithyātvaṃ yad dvidhaivoktaṃ nānyathetyatra cocyate ।
sarvasyaiva hi mithyātve kiṃ viśeṣo'bhidhīyate ।। 22 ।।
stambhādipratyayo mithyā pratyayatvāt tathā hi yaḥ ।
pratyayaḥ sa mṛṣā dṛṣṭaḥ svapnādipratyayo yathā ।। 23 ।।
siddhasādhanatā cāṃśe dṛṣṭāntābhāva eva ca ।
mā bhūtāmevaśabdaśca vyartho'śeṣaprasādhane ।। 24 ।।
sarva eveti tenātra jāgradbuddhiparigrahaḥ ।
svāṃśābhyupagamāccāpi bāhyāgrāhyanivāraṇam ।। 25 ।।
“yasya ca duṣṭaṃ karaṇaṃ yatra ca mithyeti pratyayaḥ, sa evāsamīcīnaḥ” iti taduktam, tasya cāyamākṣepaḥ “nanu sarva eva” itītyāha—mithyātvamiti ।।
idānīṃ bhāṣyakārapratipāditasyānumānasya pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntaṃ darśayitumāha— stambhādipratyaya iti ।।
atra bhāṣyakāreṇa pakṣadharmapratipādanavelāyām “jāgrato'pi stambhaḥ” ityādi dharmaviśeṣaṇamupāttam; tasya phalaṃ vārtikakāraḥ pradarśayitumāha—siddha- sādhanateti sārdhena pratyayamātrasya pakṣatve svapnādipratyayānāṃ nirālambanatvābhyupa- gamādaṃśe siddhasādhyatā, sarveṣāṃ ca pakṣatve sapakṣābhāvāt dṛṣṭāntābhāvaḥ; evaśabdaśca “nanu sarva eva” ityatra bhāṣye pratyayamātrasya nirālambanatve sādhye vyavacchedyābhāvā- danarthakaḥ syāt; yadi hi svapnādipratyayānāṃ nirālambanatvamubhayavādisiddhaṃ syāt, tadaivamucyate । kimidamucyate svupnādipratyayānāmeva nirālambanatvam ? sarva eva tu nirālambanāḥ—iti । tajjāgratpratyayānāmeva nirālambanatvaṃ sādhyata iti siddhasādhya- tāparihārārtham । sādhyadharmaṃ nirālambanatvaṃ viśinaṣṭi—svāṃśābhyupagamāccāpītyardhena ।। janyasya, cau. ananta. mu. syaiva ca. ananta. mu. viśiṣyāmi. cau. ananta. mu. sādhanamāvāṃśe. cau. ananta, mu.
pratyayasyeti sādhyāṃśavyāptahetunidarśanam ।
hetuścopanayenātra jāgrato'pīti darśitaḥ ।। 26 ।।
vivakṣābhāvataścātra vyatireko na kathyate ।
sāmānyasya ca hetutvaṃ na syāt pakṣaikadeśatā ।। 27 ।।
jāgrajjñāne viśeṣo'yaṃ yataḥ supariniścayaḥ ।
bāhyālambanasambandho na prasiddhaḥ paraṃ prati ।। 28 ।।
tasmādyad bhāṣyakāreṇa dattamuttaramatra tu ।
katamena punaratra bhāṣyeṇa dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratipāditaḥ, kena vā heturityāha— pratyayasyeti । “pratyayasya hi nirālambanatā svabhāva upalakṣitaḥ svapne” ityanena pratyayatvasya hetornirālambanatvena sādhyena vyāptiṃ svapnādāvupasaṃhṛtāṃ darśayati । “jāgrato'pi stambha iti” ityanenāpi pratyayatvasya pakṣadharmatāmāha ।।
nanu sālambane pratyayatvaṃ nāsti—ityapi vaktavyam; na coktamityāśa- ṅkyāda—vivakṣābhāvata ityardhena । nanu pratyayānāṃ nirālambanatve sādhye pratya- yatvāt—ityayaṃ hetuḥ pakṣaikadeśatvādasiddhaḥ pakṣadharmatvenetyāśaṅkyāha—sāmānya- syetyardhena । pratyayasvalakṣaṇānāṃ pakṣatvam, pratyayasya ca sāmānyasya hetutvenopādā- namityarthaḥ ।।
“nanu jāgrato buddhiḥ supariniścitā kathaṃ viparyasiṣyati?” ityādi siddhāntabhāṣyaṃ kecidevaṃ vyācakṣate—pūrvapakṣāvādyuktasyānumānasyānumānabādhaṃ prati- jñāyāḥ kila darśayati bhāṣyakāraḥ—bāhyārthālambanā jāgratpratyayāḥ, supariniści- tatvāt—iti । tadetad dūṣayitumāha vārtikakāraḥ—jāgraditi । vailakṣaṇyamātraṃ tvidamuktaṃ svapnapratyayena jāgratpratyayānām, na tu supariniścitatvaṃ bāhyālambanavyāptaṃ parasya siddhamityarthaḥ ।।
tasmānnedamuttaramuttarābhāsaṃ tvidamityāha—tasmāditi । yadi svapnapratyaya- sādharmyāt pratyayatvāt nirālambanatvaṃ stambhādipratyayānām, tadā svapnapratyayavaidha- rmyāt supariniścitatvāt sālambanatvaṃ kimiti na bhavatītyarthaḥ ।। tutvātkasmātpakṣai. cau. mu. tvānna syātpakṣai. ananta. mu. tutvenopapādana. mā. yattvaṃ nirā. mā.
vikalpasamatā vā syād vaidharmyasamatāpi vā ।। 29 ।।
duṣṭatvāt pūrvapakṣasya jātyuktiḥ kaiścidāśritā ।
pratijñādoṣamevāhuḥ kecit pratyakṣabādhanam ।। 30 ।।
śakṣyāmo yadi vispaṣṭaṃ svāṃśagrāhyanivāraṇam ।
tadā te śuddha eva syāt pakṣo grāhyanivāraṇaḥ ।। 31 ।।
pratyakṣādeśca viṣayo bāhya evāvatiṣṭhate ।
tanniṣedhakṛtastasmāt tairbhaveta pakṣasādhanam ।। 32 ।।
suniścayena caiteṣāṃ bādhakapratyayādṛte ।
pramāṇābhāsatā nāstītyetasmāt kathyate balam ।। 33 ।।
apramāṇagṛhīte'rthe pratiṣedho hi yujyate ।
gṛhītamātrabādhe tu svapakṣo'pi na sidhyati ।। 34 ।।
atra ketidāhuḥ—duṣṭatvena pūrvapakṣasya jātiprayoga evāyamuttaratvena bhāṣya- kārasyābhipreta ityāha—duṣṭatvādityardhena । anye tvāhuḥ—pakṣabādha evāyamanena pratyakṣeṇoktaḥ, na punaranumānenetyāha—pratijñeti sārdhadvayena । pratyakṣādiviṣayaniṣe- dhakasyānumānasya taireva pratyakṣādibhirnirākariṣyamāṇasvāṃśālambanairbādha ityarthaḥ ।।
supariniścitagrahaṇaṃ ca bādhakapratyayanivṛttyartham, na tu pratyakṣādināṃ bāhyā- lambanatvāsiddhau liṅgamḥ svata eva teṣāṃ bāhyāmālambanamanātmatayā nīlasya pratibhā- sanādityāha—suniścayeneti । apramāṇagṛhīte cārthe bādho yuktaḥ, gṛhītamātra- bādhe tu bhavatprayuktasyāpyanumānasya bādhāt svapakṣasiddhirapi na prāpnotītyāha— apramāṇagṛhīte'rtha iti । vaśiṣyate. ananta. mu. tasya tai. cau. ananta. mu. te'numā. mā. duṣṭajñānagṛhītārthapra. cau. ananta. mu. jātipratyayoga. mā. lambanamanāmatayā. mā. bodhaḥ mā.
agrāhyatvācca bhedena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ।
aprasiddhobhayatvaṃ vā vācyamanyatarasya vā ।। 35 ।।
vaktṛśrotrośca yajñānaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ।
tannirālambanatvena svavāgbādho dvayorapi ।। 36 ।।
sambhavo na hi bhedasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ।
tasmānnirūpaṇaṃ nāsti pratijñārthasya śobhanam ।। 37 ।।
nirālambanatā nāma kiñcid vastu na gamyate ।
tenaitad vyatirekādau praśno naivopapadyate ।। 38 ।।
evaṃ tāvat bhāṣyakāroktamabhidhāyedānīmātmīyaṃ pratijñādoṣamāha—agrā- hyatvācca bhedeneti । viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoryajjñānaṃ tasyāpi pratyayatvena nirālambanatvāt tayoraprasiddhiḥ । tataścāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvamaprasiddhaviśeṣyatvamaprasiddhobhayatvaṃ vā yatheṣṭaṃ vaktavyam । śloke ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyaśabdauḥ dharmadharmipratipādakatvena draṣṭavyau ।।
svavacanavirodhaścetyāha—vaktṛśrotroriti । dvayorapi dharmadharmiṇoryajjñānaṃ tasyāpi pratyayatvena nirālambanatvāt na pratyayo nāpi nirālambanatvamityarthaḥ ।।
na ca bhavatpakṣe vijñānavyatiriktaṃ nirālambanatvam, vijñānavyatiriktasya vastvantarasyābhāvāt; avyatirekapakṣe'pyekatvāt pratijñābhāvaḥ; yato dharmidharma- viśiṣṭaḥ pratijñārthaḥ; “prasiddho dharmī prasiddhaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatayā” iti vacanādi- tyāha—sambhava iti ।।
nanvavastutvānnirālambanatvasya kuto vyatirekāvyatirekavikalpāviti coda- yati—nirālambanateti । na ca. cau. ananta. mu. na kiñcidvastu gamyate. cau. ananta. mu. tena tadvyati. cau. ananta. mu. mātbhīyaprati. mā. prasiddheḥ. mā. tasyāpyapratyayatvameva. mā. pakṣe'pi jñāna. mā. bhāvastataḥ. mā.
yadyavastu kathaṃ tvasmāṃstvaṃ bodhayitumicchasi ।
budhyase vā svabuddhyā tvaṃ kalpitā tvatha sādhyate ।। 39 ।।
asataḥ kalpanā kīdṛk klṛptau vastu prasajyate ।
kathamiṣṭamabhāve ced vastu so'pīti vakṣyate ।। 40 ।।
tathā pratyaya ityeṣa karma bhāvādi vā vadet ।
bhāvādiṣu virodhaḥ syāt karma cet siddhasādhanam ।। 41 ।।
pratyāyyasya hi rūpādernirālambanateṣyate ।
avijñānātmakatvena kiñcinnālambate hyasau ।। 42 ।।
kartṛtve karaṇatve vā pakṣatvaṃ śabdayorapi ।
tat pariharati—yadīti sapādārdhena । kathamavastuno bodhotpādakatvami- tyarthaḥ । ‘kalpitā tvatha sādhyate’ iti cet tatrāha—asata ityardhena । sade- vānyākāreṇa kalpyata ityarthaḥ । kathamabhāvasyāvastunastvatpakṣe'pi bodhotpādakatvamiti codayati—kathamiṣṭamabhāve cediti । tatra parihāramāha—“vastu so'pīti vakṣyate” iti । abhāvasyāpyabhāvagranthe vastutvaṃ pradipādayiṣyāmaḥ ।।
evaṃ tāvat sādhyadharmaṃ nirālambanatvaṃ vikalpyādhunā dharmiṇaṃ vikalpayitu- māha—tatheti । dharminirdeśako hi pratyayaśabdaḥ karmasādhano vā syāt pratīyata iti, bhāvasādhano vā pratītiriti, kartṛsādhano vā pratyetīti, karaṇasādhano vā pratīya- te'neneti ? tatra bhāvakartṛkaraṇasādhanapakṣe svavacanavirodhaḥ । karmasādhanapakṣe ca siddhasādhyatetyarthaḥ ।।
tatra karmasādhanapakṣe siddhasādhanatvaṃ yat pratijñātaṃ tat pradarśayitumāha— pratyāyyasyeti । karmasādhano'yaṃ pratyayaśabdo rūpādīnyapi pratipādayati । teṣāṃ cāvijñānātmakatvānnirālambanatvamiṣṭameveti siddhasādhyatā ।।
api ca, kartṛkaraṇasādhano'yaṃ pratyayaśabdo dharmadharminirdeśakamapi śabdaṃ prati- pādayet; śabdasya ca nirālambanatvamarthāpratipādakatvam; tataśca sādhanāvasare pakṣā- nuktirnāma doṣa ityāha—kartṛtva iti ।। bhavet. cau. ananta. mu.
tannirālambanatvena pakṣābhāvaḥ prasajyate ।। 43 ।।
pratyāyyena ca bhinnena vinā kartrādyasambhavaḥ ।
pratyaye tannimitte vā bādhaḥ svavacanena te ।। 44 ।।
athāpi rūḍhirūpeṇa pratyayaḥ syāt tathāpi tu ।
grāhakaṃ vastu siddhaṃ naḥ pratyayo'nyasya vastutaḥ ।। 45 ।।
tamabhyupetya pakṣaścedabhyupetaṃ virudhyate ।
viśeṣyasyāprasiddhiśca tavāsmākamatādṛśe ।। 46 ।।
ātmadharmasvatantratvakalpane'pi tathā bhavet ।
na ca pratyayamātratvaṃ kiñcidastyanirūpaṇāt ।। 47 ।।
idānīṃ “bhāvādiṣu virodhaḥ syāt” iti yaduktaṃ tad darśayitumāha— pratyāyyeneti । vyatiriktavastugrāhakaṃ pratyāyaśabdena dharmiṇaṃ nirdiśya tasya nirā- lambanatvamapratyāyakatvaṃ sādhyata iti svavacanavirodhaḥ ।।
atha rūḍhyāyaṃ pratyāyaśabdo'mumarthaṃ pratipādayati, tasya dharmitvam, tatrābhyu pagamavirodhinī pratijñetyāha—athāpi rūḍhirūpeṇeti sārdhena । vyatiriktavastugrāhake pratyayaśabdo loke rūḍha ityarthaḥ ।
api ca vyatiriktālambanasya ca pratyayasya dharmitvam, svāṃśālambanasya vā ? tatra pūrvasmin pakṣe tavāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣaḥ; uttarapakṣe'pi mametyāha—viśe- ṣyasyetyardhena ।।
tathātmadharmasya vā pratyayasya dharmitvaṃ syāt svatantrasya vā ? tatrātmadharmatve tavāprasiddhaviśeṣya pakṣaḥ; svatantrapakṣe'pi mīmāṃsakasyetyāha—ātmadharmetyardhena । na cobhayadharmarahitasya pratyayamātrasya dharmitvam, tasyānirūpaṇādityāha—netyardhena ।।
nanu dharmiṇi vikalpyamāne'numānocchedaḥ; gośabdasyāpi hi nityatvaṃ sādhya- mānaṃ buddhirūpasya vā sādhyeta, varṇātmakasya vā ? tatra buddhirūpatve mīmāṃsakasyāprasi- ddhaviśeṣyatvam, buddhivyatiriktavarṇātmakapakṣe ca bauddhasya । tasmādevaṃ bhavatīpyava-
śabdārthamātrarūpeṇa yathānyeṣāṃ nirūpaṇam ।
tathāpi bhavato na syād vācyabhedamanicchataḥ ।। 48 ।।
nirālambanatā ceha sarvathā yadi sādhyate ।
viśeṣaṇāprasiddhiḥ syād dṛṣṭāntaśca na vidyate ।। 49 ।।
kenaciccet prakareṇa nirālambanatocyate ।
rasajñānasya rūpādiśūnyatvāt siddhasādhaman ।। 50 ।।
atha buddhiryadākārā tadālambanavāraṇam ।
svākārasyābhyupetatvāt tadabhāvo virudhyate ।। 51 ।।
bāhyānālambanatve'pi bāhya ityagraho yadi ।
gantavyam—darśanabhedenābhyupagatān dharmān parityajya śabdaśabdavācyena rūpeṇa dharmitvam; tathehāpi bhaviṣyati ityāśaṅkyāha—śabdārthamātrarūpeṇeti । mamai- tadyuktaṃ vyatiriktasya bāhyasyābhyupagamāt, tava tu netyarthaḥ ।।
evaṃ sādhyadharmiṇaṃ vikalpya punarapi sādhyadharmaṃ nirālambanatvaṃ vikalpayitu- māha—nirālambanatā ceti । yadi rasajñānasya sarvātmanā nirālambanatvaṃ sādhyate, tadā sādhyavikalatvaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya; aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaśca pakṣaḥ; yataḥ sarvātmanā nirā- lambanatvaṃ bauddhasyāprasiddham, svāṃśālambanatvābhyupagamāt ।।
atha kathañcinnirālambanatvaṃ sādhyate, tadā siddhasādhyatetyāha—kenaci- diti ।।
atha yatpratibhāsaṃ vijñānamutpadyate, tannālambata ityucyate, tatrāpyāha— atheti । stambhapratibhāsaṃ vijñānamutpadyate tasya vijñānatmatayeṣṭatvāt, tadabhāve'bhyu- pagamavirodhaḥ ।।
atha bāhyaviśiṣṭanirālambanatvasādhānānnābhyupagamavirodhaḥ, tatrāpyāha— bāhyeti । yadi tāvat stambhajñānaṃ stambham ‘bāhyaḥ’ ityevaṃ nāvalambata ityucyate, tataḥ siddhasādhyatvam; na hi stambhajñāne bāhyāvabhāso'sti ।। tathā ca bhavato. cau. ananta. mu. bhavato nānyat. mā. cāpi. cau ananta. mu. aprasiddhaścadṛ. cau. ananta. mu. ityāgrahaḥ. ananta. mu. dharmatvam. mā.
stambhādau naiva tadvuddhirityevaṃ siddhasādhanam ।। 52 ।।
atha stambhādirūpeṇa nirālambanatocyate ।
saṃvedanasya dṛṣṭatvāt tadvirodhaḥ prasajyate ।। 53 ।।
dvicandrādiṣu tulyaścennendriyāprāptito hi naḥ ।
tatrānālambanoktiḥ syānnārthasaṃvittyabhāvataḥ ।। 54 ।।
sarvatrārthendriyāṇāṃ naḥ saṃyogasadasattayā ।
saṃvittau vidyamānāyāṃ sadasadgrāhitā sthitiḥ ।। 55 ।।
bhavatastvindriyādīnāmabhāvād grahaṇādṛte ।
nālambanasya hetuḥ syānniṣedho'to na yujyate ।। 56 ।।
‘athāpi stambhaḥ’ ityevaṃ na gṛhṇātīti sādhyate, tatrāpyāha—atha stambhādīti । stambhasaṃvedanātmake hi vijñāne tadasaṃvedanātmakaṃ nirālambanatvaṃ sādhyamānaṃ tatsaṃvedanāviruddhameva syādityarthaḥ ।।
nanu dvicandrajñānaṃ nirālambanatveneṣṭaṃ mīmāṃsakaiḥ; tatra kathaṃ saṃvedanavirodho na syāditi codayati—dvicandrādiṣu tulyaścediti । tatra parihāramāha—nendri- yāprāptito hi na iti tripādyā bhrāntābhrāntayorarthasaṃvedane satyeva pratibhāsyene- ndriyasambandhābhāvāt nirālambanatvavācoyuktiḥ; na pratibhāsaśūnyatvenetyarthaḥ ।।
etadeva vivṛṇoti—sarvatreti ।।
bauddhasyāpyevameva bhaviṣyatīti cedityāśaṅkyāha—bhavata iti । bhavatastu vijñānavyatiriktendriyārthasambandhānāmabhāvāt pratibhāsaśūnyānātmakatvameva sālamba- natvam, pratibhāsaśūnyātmakatvaṃ ca nirālambanatvam; īdṛśi ca nirālambanatve sādhye saṃvedanavirodhaḥ syādityarthaḥ ।। tathā. ananta. mu. tatra nālambanokti. mā. sadatadgrāhyatā. ananta. mu. nālambanatvahe. cau. ananta. mu.
bahirbhāvāprasiddhatvāt tenānālambanā matiḥ ।
kathaṃ ca sādhyate naiṣa pakṣo hi jñāyate tadā ।। 57 ।।
yathānyabodhanāśakternāprasiddhe viśeṣaṇe ।
pakṣasiddhistathaiva syād viśeṣaṇaviśeṣaṇe ।। 58 ।।
nāprasiddhe padārthe hi vākyārthaḥ saṃpratīyate ।
tatpūrvakatvāt pakṣaśca vākyārthaḥ sthāpayiṣyate ।। 59 ।।
paryudāse niṣedhe vā vyatiriktasya vastunaḥ ।
prameyatvādyabhedena jagataḥ siddhasādhanam ।। 60 ।।
yadi cātyantabhinnena nirālambanatocyate ।
bāhyatve ca nirālambanaviśeṣaṇatvenopadīyamāne bauddhaṃ prati tasyāprasiddhatve- nāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣa ityāha—bahirbhāvāprasiddhatvāditi ।।
nanvaprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣa iti śāstre pratijñādoṣatvena na paṭhita- mityāśaṅkyāha—yathānyabodhanāśakteriti । pakṣasya hi vākyārthatvāt, padārtha- pūrvakatvācca vākyārthasya tatpratītiḥ padārthapratipattipūrvikā; aprasiddhe ca viśeṣaṇa- padārthe saṃsargāvagatirnāstītyaprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ pakṣasya doṣaḥ । sa ca viśeṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇe'pyaprasiddhe samāna ityarthaḥ ।।
amumevārthaṃ spaṣṭayati—nāprasiddha iti ।।
atha vyatiriktānālambanāḥ pratyayāḥ—iti sādhyate, tatrāpi prasajyapratiṣe- dhābhyupagame vyatiriktaṃ nālambata iti, paryudāsābhyupagame'pi atiriktādanyadā- lambate ityubhayatrāpi siddhasādhyatā, prameyatvena nīlatadbudhyoravyatirekādityāha— paryudāsa iti ।।
athātyantabhinnaṃ nālambane-iti sādhyate, tatrāpi prameyatvena nīlatadbudhyo- ravyatirekāt sa eva doṣa ityāha-yadi cetyardhena । atha kathañcidbhinnaṃ nālambate— kathañcit. cau. ananta. mu. bhedena. cau. ananta. mu. Omitted na. mā.
kathañcicced virudhyeta prākpakṣaḥ kalpitena te ।। 61 ।।
vastvādyākārataścāpi dhīrnirālambaneṣyate ।
grāhakāccedabhinnatvaṃ śaktibhedo virudhyate ।। 62 ।।
nirālambanabuddheśca yadyutpattiḥ prasādhyate ।
dṛṣṭatvāt seṣyate'smābhirbāhyagrāhyavivarjitā ।। 63 ।।
satyatvaṃ punaretasyāstvaṃ necchasi kathaṃ punaḥ ।
ātmāṃśe'vasitā hyeṣā mṛgatṛṣṇādibuddhivat ।। 64 ।।
iti sādhyate, tatrāpi nīlatadbudhyoḥ sāṃvṛtena rūpeṇa bhedābhyupagamavirodhinī prati- jñetyāha—kathañcidityardhena ।।
sarveṣu pakṣeṣu siddhasādhyatā; yato nīlabuddhirnīlavastvākāratayā nālambata ityāha—vastvādyākārataścetyardhena । athātmālambanāḥ pratyayāḥ—iti sādhyate, yathoktam—
“sahopalambhaniyamādabhedo nīlabuddhiyoḥ” । iti, tatrāpyāha—grāhakāccedityardhena ।।
nanvekasya grāhyagrāhakaśaktidvayayoge ko virodhaḥ ? ucyate—pūrvasya viśe- ṣaṇe vastuni paścādutpannasya grāhakatvaṃ tadekasya paurvāparyeṇāvasthitaśaktidvayayuktasyotpa- ttisthitirviruddhā; evaṃ ca na pratijñārthaḥ śobhano labhyate । yadi parametat sādhyate— nirālambanāḥ pratyayāḥ—ityeṣā buddhirutpadyata iti, tatrāpi siddhasādhyatvam; yato dharmadharmipratipādakaśabdoccāraṇe satyeṣā buddhirutpadyata eva । bādhakapratyayasadbhāve tu mithyaiṣā buddhiḥ “eṣa vandhyāsuto yāti”-itivadityāha—nirālambanabuddheśceti ।।
tavāpyatra mithyātvamevetyāha—satyatvaṃ punariti । samyaktvam. cau. ananta. mu. kathañcana. cau. ananta. mu. buddhirnīlaṃ vastvā. mā.
caitrādipratyayānāṃ ca nirālambanatā yadi ।
dharmabhūtā na gṛhyeta sādhanojjhitayā dhiyā ।। 65 ।।
tato viṣayanānātvaṃ pratiyogyanirākṛtā ।
rūpāt sālambanaprāptiḥ satī kena nivāryate ।। 66 ।।
yadi pratyayaśabdo'pi pratyayatvena gṛhyate ।
saṃvittyālambanatvaṃ ca vāryate siddhasādhanam ।। 67 ।।
buddhyutpādanaśaktiśced vāryā sādhyaṃ na sidhyati ।
sādhanasya prayogo hi bodhakatvād vinā na te ।। 68 ।।
na cābhidhāstyasambandhādṛte bhedācca nāstyasau ।
na cāsau tadgataṃ bhedaṃ bodhayantyā dhiyā vinā ।। 69 ।।
yadi ca trirūpāt pratyayatvalakṣaṇāt liṅgādutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ svāṃśālambanam, tataścaitrādipratyayagataṃ nirālambanatvaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt । tato viṣayabhedena bādhyabādhakatvā- bhāvāt kimiti teṣāṃ nirālambanatvam ? anātmālambanatvaṃ tu svābhāvikameva, anātmatāyā nīlādīnāṃ pratibhāsanādityāha—caitrādīti ślokadvayena ।।
yadi cāyaṃ karaṇasādhanatvena dharminirdeśakaḥ pratyayaśabda ātmānamapi dharmi- tvena pratipādayeta, arthasaṃvedanarūpālambanatvaṃ ca vāryate; tadāpi siddhasādhyate- tyāha—yadīti । acetanatvena pratyayaśabdasyārthasaṃvedanaṃ nāstyevetyarthaḥ ।।
atha buddhyutpādanasāmarthyarūpālambanatvaṃ vāryate, tatrāpi nirālambanatvāt pratyayānāṃ sādhyatvena prāśnikān prati pratipādayitumabhipretaṃ na sidhyatītyabhi- prāyeṇāha—buddhyutpādanaśaktirityardhena । kasmādityāha—sādhanasyetyardhena ।।
itaśca bhavatpakṣe śabdasyārthapratipādakatvaṃ nāstītyāha—na ceti । samba- ndhabalenārthapratyāyakatvaṃ śabdasya, bhedanibandhanaśca sambandhaḥ; na cāsau bhedo'sti, śabdārthagrāhakasya pratyayasya nirālambanatvādityarthaḥ ।। dhanotthitayā. cau. ananta. mu. tvāt prati. cau. ananta. mu. natvena. cau. ananta. mu. go'tra bodhaka. co. ananta. mu. dhārthasamba. ananta. mu. tayā vinā. mā.
prāśnikairnāgṛhīte ca vākye sāvayave pṛthak ।
pakṣe hetau ca dṛṣṭānte vādini prativādini ।। 70 ।।
sādhanasyāprayogaḥ syādabhyupetyocyate yadi ।
pūrvābhyupagamenaiva pratijñā bādhyate tataḥ ।। 71 ।।
dharmādharmādibhede ca nāsiddhe paramārthataḥ ।
śiṣyātmanośca dharmāderupadeśo'vakalpate ।। 72 ।।
tadanuṣṭhānato buddhairiṣṭo bhedaḥ sphuṭaṃ ca taiḥ ।
sūtrāntare'bhyupetatvād bhavedāgamabādhanam ।। 73 ।।
sarvalokaprasiddhyā ca pakṣabādho'tra te dhruvam ।
bhavatpakṣe ca sādhanasya prayoge nāstītyāha—prāśnikairiti sapādaślokena । prāśnikān prati sādhanaṃ prayujyate ‘prāśnikānāmapratīto'rthaḥ pratipādyate’ iti vaca- nāt; na ca te sādhanaṃ pratipadyante, pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntavacanagrāhakāṇāṃ pratyayānāṃ nirālambanatvādityarthaḥ ।
atha teṣāṃ sālambanatvamiṣyate, tato'bhyupagamavirodhaḥ syādityāha— abhyupetyeti pādatrayeṇa ।।
bhavatpakṣe ca dharmādharmaśiṣyācāryagrāhakāṇāṃ pratyayānāṃ nirālambanatvāt dharmā- dharmopadeśaśca śiṣyān pratyācāryasya na prāpnotītyāha—dharmādharmādibhede ceti bheda ityantena । tadanena dharmādharmopadeśānyathānupapattilakṣaṇayārthāpattyā pratijñābādhaṃ darśayati ।।
dharmādharmopadeśasūtravyatirekeṇa sūtrāntaramapi vijñānavyatiriktārthapratipādana- paramastītyāgamavirodhaḥ pratijñāyā ityāha—sphuṭaṃ ca tairiti saśeṣeṇārdhena ।।
sarvalokavirodhinī ceyaṃ pratijñetyāha—sarvaloketyardhena । api ca, rūpatraya- grāhakāṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ nirālambanatvaṃ vā syāt sālambanatvaṃ vā ? nirālambanatvapakṣe vākyasyāvayave. cau. mu. sādhyate. cau. ananta. mu. buddheri. mā. pādyate. mā. jñāṃ darśayati. mā.
kṛtsnasādhanabuddhiśca yadi mithyeṣyate tataḥ ।। 74 ।।
sarvābhāvo yatheṣṭaṃ vā nyūnatādyabhidhīyatām ।
teṣāṃ sālambanatve vā tairanaikāntiko bhavet ।। 75 ।।
tadanyasa pratijñā cet tadanyapratyayo mṛṣā ।
tanmithyātvaprasaṅge ca pūrvapūrvaṃ na sidhyati ।। 76 ।।
stambhasādhanavijñānabhedo na hi tadā bhavet ।
yāvadyāvatpratijñeyaṃ tadanyasya praṇīyate ।। 77 ।।
rūpatrayasyāpyabhāvaḥ; ekasya vā rūpasya yatheṣṭamabhāvo vaktavya ityāha—kṛtsnasādhana- buddhiśceti । atha teṣāṃ sālambanatvamabhidhīyate, tatastatrāpi hetorvṛtteḥ anaikānti- katvamityāha—teṣāṃ sālambanatva ityardhena ।।
taddūṣaṇaparihārakāma āha—tadanyasya pratijñā cediti । sādhanabuddhya- nyatvaviśiṣṭaṃ pratyayatvaṃ hetutvena pratijñāyata iti nānaikāntikatvam; ata eṣa vākyārthaḥ—stambhādayaḥ pratyayā nirālambanāḥ, sādhanagrāhakabuddhyanyatve sati pratyayatvādityarthaḥ । tadetad dūṣayitumāha—tadanyetyādisapādaślokena । stambhā- dibuddhīnāṃ sādhanabuddhyanyatvagrāhikā yā buddhiḥ tasyā mṛṣātve tadanyasyābhāvādyaḥ pūrvamupāttaḥ tadanyatvaviśiṣṭaḥ pratyayasvalakṣaṇo hetuḥ “tadanyasya pratijñā cet” iti tasyāsiddhatvam; tadasiddhau ca tato'pi yat pūrvataramupātam ‘nirālambanāḥ pratyayāḥ’ iti tasyāpyasiddhiḥ । tadidamuktam—pūrvapūrvaṃ na sidhyati iti ।
atha sādhanabuddhyanyatvagrāhikāyā buddheḥ sālambanatvamiṣyate, tatastatra vṛtte- ranaikāntikatvam । atha sādhanabuddhyanyatvagrāhakabuddhyanyatvaṃ viśeṣaṇamupādīyate, tatrāpi sa eva doṣa ityāha—yāvadyāvaditi । yāvadyāvadviśeṣaṇavadanyatvamupādī- yate tāvattāvattanyatvagrāhakāṇāṃ pratyayānāṃ mithyātvāt saviśeṣaṇo heturasiddhaḥ । tadasiddhatve cādyasya pratijñārthasyāsiddhirityarthaḥ । vābhidhīyate. cau. ananta. mu. sarvaṃ pūrvam. cau. ananta. mu. yathā. cau. ananta. mu. pratīyate. cau. ananta. mu.
tāvattāvat pareṣāṃ syānmithyātvādādyabādhanam ।
viruddhāvyabhicāritvaṃ bādho vāpyanumānataḥ ।। 78 ।।
itthaṃ sarveṣu pakṣeṣu vaktavyaṃ pratisādhanam ।
bāhyārthālambanā buddhiritisamyak ca dhīriyam ।। 79 ।।
bādhakāpetabuddhitvād yathā svapnādibāhyadhīḥ ।
sāpi mithyeti ced brūyāt svapnādināmabādhanāt ।। 80 ।।
na syāt sādharmyadṛṣṭānto bhavataḥ sādhane'dhunā ।
vijñānāstitvabhinnatvakṣaṇikatvādidhīstadā ।। 81 ।।
samyak cedabhyupeyeta tayānaikāntiko bhavet ।
sarveṣu ca pakṣeṣu sapratisādhanatvaṃ pratyayatvalakṣaṇasya hetorvaktavyamanumānavirodho vā pratijñāyā ityāha—viruddheti ।
itthaṃ vaktavyamiti yaduktaṃ taddarśayati—bāhyārthālambaneti । ayaṃ prayogārthaḥ— ‘stambhādayaḥ pratyayā bāhyārthamālambante’ ityasmād vākyāt yā buddhirutpadyate sā dharmiṇī, samyaktvaṃ tasyā iti sādhyo dharmaḥ, bādhakapratyayarahitatve sati buddhitvādi tyaya hetuḥ, svapnādipratyayānāṃ yā bādhikā buddhistadvaditi dṛṣṭantaḥ । atha svapna- pratyayabādhikāyā api buddheḥ mithyātvād vyāptiśūnyo'yaṃ heturucyate, tatrāpyāha— sāpi mithyeti । bādhakapratyayamithyātve sati svapnādīnāṃ satyatvāt tavāpi tarhi vyāptiśūnyaḥ pratyayatvalakṣaṇo heturiti pūrvapakṣavādyabhipretasyāpi nirālambanatva- syāsiddhiḥ ।
api ca vijñānāstitvabhinnatvādigrāhakāṇāṃ pratyayānāṃ sālambanatve tatrāpi hetorvṛtteranaikāntikatvamityāha—vijñānāstitveti । tvādanya. cau. ananta. mu. samyaktva. mā. tasmāt, cau. ananata. mu. tathā. cau. ananta. mu. tathā. ananta mu. tadā. cau. mu. omitted yā. bhā. syāpi nīlāla.
tanmithyābhyupapattau vā pakṣābhāvaḥ prasajyate ।। 82 ।।
tathā ca bandhamuktyādivyavasthā na ca kalpate ।
tataśca mokṣayatnasya vaikalyaṃ vaḥ prasajyate ।। 83 ।।
vikalpotpadyamānā ca jñānāstitvādidhīryadi ।
mṛpeṣṭā na ca dṛṣṭātra pramāṇāntarato matiḥ ।। 84 ।।
pramāṇābhāvatastena jñānāstitvādi durlabham ।
sarvaṃ cāpyasmadādīnāṃ mithyājñānaṃ vikalpanāt ।। 85 ।।
sānnidhyaviprakṛṣṭatve sattvāsattve ca durlabhe ।
mithyājñānāviśeṣe'pi sāṃkhyādiparivarjanāt ।। 86 ।।
nirālambanatve tu teṣāṃ dharmadharmiṇorabhāvāt “prasiddho dharmī prasiddhaviśeṣaṇa- viśiṣṭaḥ” ityevaṃlakṣaṇasya pakṣasyābhāvaḥ prāpnotītyāha—tanmithyābhyupapattau veti sārdhena ।
nanu jñānāstitvādigrāhakaṃ savikalpakaṃ vijñānaṃ bhavatu mithyā, tathāpi nirvi- kalpakajñānāstitvādināṃ grahaṇāt kimiti pakṣābhāva ityāśaṅkyāha—vikalpo- tpadyamānā ceti sārdhena । pramāṇāntaraśabdena nirvikalpakaṃ vijñānamāha । na ca kṣaṇikatvādīnāṃ jñānasambandhitā nirvikalpakenāvasīyate, sambandhasya bhavatpakṣe' vastutvādityarthaḥ ।
api ca bhavatpakṣe sarvameva saṃsāriṇo vijñānamapramāṇam, grāhyagrāhakakalu- ṣitatvena savikalpakatvāt; na ca bāhyārthaśūnyavādinaḥ sadasadarthaviṣayatvena pramāṇā- pramāṇādivibhāga ityāha—sarvaṃ ceti ।
bhavatpakṣe ca—
“nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ ।”
“kṣaṇikāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ”
ityevamādīnāṃ mithyātvāviśeṣāt sāṃkhyadarśanaparyudāsena bauddhadarśanapakṣapāto mudhaivetyāha—mithyājñāneti । ca pakṣabādhaḥ cau. ananta. mu. baddhamuktādi. cau. mu. na prakalpate. ananta. mu. gatiḥ cau. ananta. mu.
bauddhadarśana ekasmin pakṣapātī na yujyate ।
mithyātvaṃ yadi buddheḥ syād bādhaḥ kiṃ nopalabhyate ।। 87 ।।
vādhād vinā mṛṣātvasya vyavasthā na ca kalpate ।
pratiyogini dṛṣṭe ca jāgrajjñāne mṛṣā bhavet ।। 88 ।।
svapnādibuddhirasmākaṃ tava bhedo'pi kiṃkṛtaḥ ।
na cānyat pratiyogyasti jāgrajjñānasya śobhanam ।। 89 ।।
yaddarśanena mithyātvaṃ stambhādipratyayo vrajet ।
svapnādipratiyogitvaṃ sarvalokaprasiddhitaḥ ।। 90 ।।
tadidaṃ dharmavaidharmyād bādhakapratyaye yathā ।
yogināṃ jāyate buddhirbādhikā pratiyoginī ।। 91 ।।
yadi ca jāgratpratyayānāṃ mithyātvam, kimiti deśādau bādhakapratyayo notpa- dyate ? atha daivabādhena mithyātvam, vyavasthā na prāpnoti—yogijñānaṃ pramāṇam, stambhādayastu pratyayā na pramāṇamityāha—mithyātvaṃ yadīti ।।
asmatpakṣe tu bādhakapratyayasadasadbhāvakṛteyaṃ pramāṇāpramāṇavyavasthetyāha— pratiyoginītyasmākamantena । bhavatpakṣe ca stambhajñānayogijñānayorbādhakapratyayā- bhāvena kiṃkṛteyaṃ vyavasthā—yogījñānaṃ pramāṇam, stambhādijñānapramāṇamityāha- tava bhedo'pi kiṃkṛta iti ।
nanu cāsti stambhādipratyayānāṃ bādhakamanumānam । taduktam—stambhādi- pratyayo mithyā pratyayatvāt iti । ataḥ kimidamucyate—“bādhaḥ kiṃ nopala- bhyate” ityāśaṅkyāha—na cānyaditi । astīdamanumānam; pratyakṣaviruddhatvāda- śobhanamityabhiprāyaḥ । pratyakṣasya pratyakṣāntarameva bādhakam; tacca nāstītyarthaḥ ।
yadi paraṃ svapnādayaḥ pratyayā jāgratpratyayasya bādhakāḥ, tatra caitad dharmavaidha- rmyāt pramāṇyaṃ sidhyatītyāha—svapnādīti । nanu yogijñānaṃ śūnyatvagrāhakaṃ bhavi- ṣyatīti codayati—yogināmiti । mṛṣātvam. cau. ananta. mu. vināpi taccetsyād vyavasthā na prakalpate. cau. ananta. mu. tadīya. cau ananta. mu.
jāgratstambhādibuddhināṃ tataḥ svapnāditulyatā ।
prāptānāṃ tāmavasthāṃ ca sarvaprāṇabhṛtāmapi ।। 92 ।।
bādho'yaṃ bhavitā tena siddhā sā pratiyogitā ।
iha janmani keṣāṃcinna tāvadupalabhyate ।। 93 ।।
yogyavasthāgatānāṃ tu na vidmaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati ।
yogināṃ cāsmadādīnāṃ tvaduktapratiyoginī ।। 94 ।।
tvaduktaviparitā vā bādhabuddhirbhaviṣyati ।
īdṛktve yogabuddhīnāṃ dṛṣṭānto na tavāsti ca ।। 95 ।।
dṛṣṭāntastvasmadīyānāṃ yo gṛhītaḥ sa vidyate ।
atha stambhādibuddhīnāṃ vadet sapratiyogitām ।। 96 ।।
saṃsāriṇo'pi tadavasthāṃ gatasyāyaṃ vādho bhaviṣyatītyāha—prāptānāmiti ।।
tatra parihāramāha—iha janmanīti । saṃsāriṇāṃ tāvannotpadyate; asma- dvilakṣaṇāstu yoginaḥ santi, teṣāmapi stambhādibuddhīnāṃ bādhakapratyayo'stītyatra na kiñcit pramāṇamastītyabhiprāyaḥ ।
atha niṣpramāṇakamevedamucyate, tasmādasmadādīnāmapi tvaduktapratiyoginī tvaduktaviparītā vā bādhabuddhirbhaviṣyatītyāha—yogināṃ ceti ।।
api ca, asmadvilakṣaṇā yoginaḥ santi, teṣāṃ ca stambhādipratyayabādhakaṃ jñānamastītyatra na kiṃcitpramāṇamastītyāha—īdṛktva iti । na tāvat pratyakṣam; nāpyanumānam, dṛṣṭāntābhāvādityarthaḥ ।।
santi tu tvadīyayogiviparītabuddhayo'smadyogino rathyāpuruṣadṛṣṭāntenetyāha— dṛṣṭāntastviti ।
nanu astyevānumānaṃ yogibuddhau pramāṇam—stambhādayaḥ pratyayā bādhyāḥ sapratiyoginyo vā, buddhitvāt mṛgatṛṣṇādibuddhivaditi darśayati—atha stambhā- dibuddhīnāmiti ।। saprati. cau. ananta. mu. asmadādīnām. cau. ananta. mu. tvagindriya. mā. omitted buddhi. mā.
bādhyatvaṃ vāpi buddhitvānmṛgatṛṣṇādibuddhivat ।
iṣṭaṃ sapratiyogitvaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇādibuddhibhiḥ ।। 97 ।।
tadātmanā ca bādhyatvaṃ grāhyāntaratayāpi ca ।
bādhakaiścāpyanaikāntastadanyatve ca pūrvavat ।। 98 ।।
mithyādhīpratiyogitvaṃ svapnādāviva te bhavet ।
rāgādikṣayayogitvanimittādhigatistathā ।। 99 ।।
yāvān viśeṣa iṣṭaste sarvabādhād viruddhatā ।
mahājanasya vābādhādidānīṃ bādhabuddhivat ।। 100 ।।
tatra siddhasādhyatayā tāvat pratijñāṃ dūṣayitumāha—iṣṭamiti । pratyakṣādīnā- miṣyanta eva mṛgatṛṣṇādibuddhayaḥ pratiyogitvena, kathaṃcicca tadaikyena; tasya ca bādhyamānatvena teṣāmapi bādhyatvam; viṣayāntarāpekṣayā rasajñānasya mithyātvamiṣyata evetyarthaḥ ।।
abādhye'pi bādhake yogijñāne buddhitvadarśanādanaikāntiko'yaṃ heturityāha— bādhakaiścāpyanaikānta iti । bādhakabuddhyanyatvaṃ ca hetorviśeṣaṇaṃ sādhanabuddhyanyatva- vannirākartavyamityāha—tadanyatve ca pūrvavaditi ।।
dharmaviśeṣaviparītasādhanatvācca viruddho'yaṃ heturityāha—mithyādhīprati- yogitvamiti sārdhena । sādhyasya hi yogijñānasya samyaktvarāgādikṣayayogitva- nimittādayo viśeṣā iṣyante; na ca tathāvidhena bādhyatvaṃ svapnapratyaye vyāptamavaga- tam; laukikānāmeva tu jñānaṃ svapnapratyayasya bādhakamityarthaḥ ।।
sapratisādhanaścāyaṃ heturityāha—mahājanasyeti । abādhyāḥ stambhādi- buddhayo mahājanasya, idānīmabādhāt yogijñānavaditi । cāpi. cau. ananta. mu. iṣṭaścet. cau. ananta. mu. sarvābhāvādvi. cau. mu. ṣyata eva. mā. buddhitvam. mā.
vācyo'numānabādho vā yadi vā pratisādhanam ।
pūrvasādhanadoṣāśca sandheyāstasya cādhunā ।। 101 ।।
sādhyabhedādavācyatvāddhetornobhayasiddhatā ।
pratyayatvaṃ ca sāmānyaṃ bhinnābhinnaṃ na vidyate ।। 102 ।।
bhavato'tyantabhinnaṃ ca matpakṣe'pi na kiṃcana ।
sādṛśyānyanivṛttī ca netyetat sādhayiṣyate ।। 103 ।।
tasmāddhetuna sāmānyamasti siddhaṃ dvayorapi ।
viśeṣayośca hetutvaṃ pakṣatattulyasaṃsthayoḥ ।। 104 ।।
na syādanvayahīnatvādataddharmatayāpi ca ।
na cārthahīnā tadbuddhirhetutvena bhaviṣyati ।। 105 ।।
bhāṣyakāraprayuktasādhanadoṣāścātrāpi sādhane yathāsambhavaṃ viniyojyā eve- tyāha—pūrvasādhanadoṣāśca sandheyā iti । idānīṃ tasyaiva sādhanasya pratijñādoṣaṃ pratipādya avasaraprāptaṃ hetumasiddhatvena dūṣayitumāha—tasyetyādisiddhatāntena । pratyayasvalakṣaṇānāṃ sādhyadharmitvena pratyayatvāt iti sāmānyena sādhanadharmeṇa bhavi- tavyam; tacca yadi svalakṣaṇādabhinnamiṣyate, tadā pratijñārthaikadeśatvādasiddho heturityarthaḥ ।
bhinnābhinnamapi bauddhasyāsiddhamityāha—pratyayatvāmityādinā bhavata itya- ntena । atyantabhinnamapi mīmāṃsakasyāsiddhamityāha—atyanteti śeṣeṇa । sādṛ- śyāpoharūpayorapi sāmānyayornirākariṣyamāṇatvādasiddhamityāha—sādṛśyeti ।
nāpi viśeṣasya hetutvam, pakṣasthasyānvayābhāvāt; sapakṣasthasyāpyapakṣadharma- tvādityāha—viśeṣayośceti ।
nāpi pratyayatvāt iti pratyayaśabdāt pañcamyantād yad vijñānamutpadyate anālambanam tasya hetutvam, anvayapakṣadharmatayorabhāvādityāha—na cārthahīne- tyardhena ।। kathañcana. cau. ananta mu. śārūpyānya. cau. ananta. mu. svālambanam. mā.
āśrayāsiddhatā coktā viśeṣyasyāprasiddhitaḥ ।
tathā hetorviruddhatvaṃ dṛṣṭānte sādhyahīnatā ।। 106 ।।
viśeṣaṇāprasiddhyarthavikalpenaiva bodhite ।
svapnādipratyaye bāhyaṃ sarvathā na hi neṣyate ।। 107 ।।
sarvatrālambanaṃ bāhyaṃ deśakālanyathātmakam ।
āśrayāsiddhatāpi aprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ pakṣaḥ—ityanenaivokta ityāha— āśrayāsiddhatetyardhena ।
sādhyavikalatvaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya viruddhatvaṃ ca hetoḥ aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣaḥ— ityanenaivoktamityāha—tathā hetoriti ।।
evaṃ tāvaddhetudoṣānabhidhāyedānīṃ sādhyavikalpatvena dṛṣṭāntaṃ dūṣayitumāha— svapnādīti pādatrayeṇa । svapnādipratyayānāṃ nirālambanatvamucyamānaṃ bāhyārthālambanā- bhāvādvā, pratibhāsaśūnyatvena vā, kāraṇābhāvādvā ? na tāvad bāhyārthālambanā- bhāvena svapnādipratyayānāṃ nirālambanatvam, sarvatra bāhyālambanatvasya vidyamānatvāt । jāgrajjñānavadatrāpi nīlīderanātmatayā pratibhāsanāt; svānubhavādanyatvaṃ hi nīlāderbāhyatvam; tacca tasminnevānubhave nīlākāratāvadabhāsata eva । ‘nīlamidam’ iti hi pratibhāsaḥ, na punaḥ ‘nīlamaham’ iti । na hi śuktikāyāṃ rajate ca rajatajñānasya sāmagrīvailakṣaṇyaṃ muktvā pratibhāse kaścid viśeṣaḥ— ityuktam । sāmāne'pi bāhyālambanatve bādhakapratyayāt svapnādipratyayānāmaprāmā- ṇyamityāha—deśakālānyathātmakamiti । śuktikāyāmapi rajatajñānasya aparo- kṣatayā anātmatvena ca pratibhāsitasyaiva ‘nedaṃ rajatam’ iti bādhakapratyayenā- nyathātvagrahaṇādaprāmāṇyam; yadanenālambitaṃ tadabhāve nedaṃ pramāṇam । prati- bhāsamānatayā ca rajatāderālambanatvam, na sadbhāvena; rajate'pi rajatajñānasya rajata- mālambanaṃ rajatapratibhāsāt, na tatsadbhāvāt; itarathā tu rajatākāratāvat dravyā- kāratāpyālambanaṃ syāt । rajatajñānasya pratibhāsikasyaiva tu sadasadbhāvena prāmāṇya- maprāmāṇyaṃ ca । tena svapnādivijñānaṃ sālambanamapi sadapramāṇam । athāpi pratibhāsa- aprasiddhatva. cau. mu.
janmanyekatra bhinne vā tathā kālantare'pi vā ।। 108 ।।
taddeśo vānyadeśo vā svapnajñānasya gocaraḥ ।
alātacakre'lātaṃ syācchīghrabhramaṇasaṃskṛtam ।। 109 ।।
gandharvanagare'bhrāṇi pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ gṛhādi ca ।
pūrvānubhūtatoyaṃ ca raśmitaptoṣaraṃ tathā ।। 110 ।।
mṛgatoyasya vijñāne kāraṇatvena kalpyate ।
dravyāntare viṣāṇaṃ śaśasyātmā ca kāraṇam ।। 111 ।।
nibandhanaṃ rajatāderastitvam, tacca sarvatrāviśiṣṭam; ‘nedaṃ rajatam’—ityapi bādhakapratyayena tatraiva viṣayāntarāvagamaḥ; tathāpi yasmin vijñāne utpanne sati ‘naitadevam’ iti vijñānāntaramutpadyate, tadapramāṇaśabdaprayogādapramāṇam । nāpi pratibhāsaśūnyatvena, pratibhāsyaśūnyasya pratibhāsasyābhāvāt; sa tu pratibhāsyo'rtho janmanyekatra bhinne vā bhavatu, mā vā bhavatu; na kiñcidanena graheṇetyāha-janmanye- katreti ।
nāpi kāraṇābhāvena nirālambanatvam, sarvatra kāryadarśanena kāraṇasya vidya- mānatvāt; tadbhāvabhāvitvena ca kāraṇaviśeṣadarśanādityetat “alātacakre'- lātam” ityādinā “pṛthivyādīni kāraṇam” ityantena pratipādayitumāha— alātacakre'lātamityādinā ślokapañcakena ।
anye tvālambanakathanaparatvena ślokapañcakaṃ vyācakṣate । tadayuktam; yataḥ yadyatra pratibhāsate tattatrālambanam; kimanena pṛṣṭena kathitena vā ? bhrāntasyāpyabhrānta- vad rajatamevāparokṣamanātmabhūtaṃ cālambanam; nātmakhyātirasatkhyātiḥ pramoṣo vā, tathā apratibhāsanāt । sadasattve tu viśeṣaḥ । sālambanamapi naiva samyak kathitam; na hi cakrajñānasyālātamālambanam; bhramaṇasaṃskṛtasya tu kāraṇatvamālambanavyatirekeṇa cakṣurādivat । nāpi nagarajñānasya dvayamālambanamabhrāṇi pūrvadṛṣṭagṛhādi ca abhrasyā- pratibhāsanāt; gṛhādestvagṛhītatayā pratibhāsanāt । evamūṣare salilajñānādiṣu । tasmādālambanavyatiriktakāraṇakathanaparāṇyetāni । taduktam— pūrvajñātam. ananta. mu. omitted bhramaṇasaṃskṛ. mā.
śaśaśṛṅgādhiyo mauṇḍyaṃ niṣedhe śiraso'sya ca ।
vastvantarairasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ padārthaḥ śūnyatādhiyaḥ ।। 112 ।।
kāraṇatvaṃ padārthānāmasadvākyārthakalpane ।
atyantānanubhūto'pi buddhyā yo'rthaḥ prakalpate ।। 113 ।।
tasyotpattau kathañcit syuḥ pṛthivyādīni kāraṇam ।
eṣa pratyakṣadharmaśca vartamānārthataiva yā ।। 114 ।।
sannikṛṣṭārthavṛttiśca na tu jñānāntareṣviyam ।
kathamutpādayejjñānaṃ tatrāsaṃścet kuto nviyam ।। 115 ।।
arthasyāvidyamānasya vijñānotpattyaśaktatā ।
bāhyālambanatāyāṃ nau vivādo'rthasya saṃnidhiḥ ।। 116 ।।
“mṛgatoyasya vijñāne karaṇatvena kalpyate”iti ।।
svapnādipratyayānāmālambanaṃ deśakālānyathātmakamityuktam; tadanupapannam, avartamānasyāsannikṛṣṭasya cālambanatvāyogāt kathamaparokṣatayā pratibhāsate ? yatrārtha, tatrāparokṣasyālambanatvamityāśaṅkyāha—eṣa iti । pratyakṣasya hi vartāmanaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ cālambanam, na jñānāntareṣvityarthaḥ ।
nanvālambanaṃ hi kāraṇam; asatastu kathaṃ vijñānotpādakatvamiti coda- yati—kathamutpādayejjñānaṃ tatrāsaṃścediti ।
tatra parihāramāha—kuto nviyamiti saśeṣeṇārdhena ।
ālambanatvenāyaṃ jñānamutpādayati, pratibhāsamānatayā cālambanatvam । sā cetavidyamānasyāpyasti, kimiti notpādayati ? api ca jāgratpratyayavadanātmatayā pratibhāsena sarvatra svapnādau bāhyālambanatvam; tatra cāvayorvivādaḥ । arthāsannidhāne ca parokṣasyāparokṣatayā pratibhāsena bhrāntatā bhavatu, nātmālambanatvam; na hi nīlakāre pratibhāse tasyāpāramārthikatvena pītākāratā bhavatītyāha—bāhyā- lambanatāyāmiti । mānatayā vā. mā. pītākāratayā. mā. mānatayā vā. mā. pītākāratayā. mā.
yadi nāsti tataḥ kiṃ syādasmāt pakṣānnivartanam ।
tasmād yadanyathā santamanyathā pratipadyate ।। 117 ।।
tannirālambanaṃ jñānamabhāvālambanaṃ ca tat ।
bhāvāntaramabhāvo'nyo na kaścidanirūpaṇāt ।। 118 ।।
bhavatā dvayamapyetad durnirūpaṃ sahetukam ।
pratijñādoṣavaccāpi yojyā hetorviruddhatā ।। 119 ।।
samastavyastadharmādisvarūpādiviparyayāt ।
dṛṣṭāntadoṣāḥ sarve ca yojyā na hyekavastuni ।। 120 ।।
tava sādhyāṃśahetvaṃśavyāptadharmādisambhavaḥ ।
kathaṃ tarhi samāne'pi bāhyālambanatve svapnādipratyayānāṃ nirālambanatvamasa- dālambanatvaṃ cocyata ityāśaṅkayāha—tasmāditi ।
bhavatāpyetadevābhāvālambanavijñānamabhyupagantavyam, yatrānyathā pratibhāsate; na punaḥ ‘iha pradeśe ghaṭo nāsti’ iti jñānam’ etasya sannihitaghaṭa- viviktabhūpradeśālambanatvena bhāvālambanatvābhyupagamādityāha—bhāvāntaramityardhena ।।
bauddhapakṣa eva tu sarveṣāṃ svāṃśālambanatvena tulyatvāt svapnādau nirālamba- nāsadālambanaśabdayoḥ sapramāṇakaḥ prayogo na prāpnotītyāha—bhavatetyardhena ।
dharminirdeśakapratyayaśabdavat hetupratipādakaṃ pratyayaśabdaṃ bhāvādisādhakatvena vikalpya dharmadharmyumayeṣāṃ dharmiviśeṣadharmaviśeṣobhayaviśeṣāṇāṃ ca viparyayasādhanāt viruddhatvamupapādanīyamityāha—pratijñādoṣavaditi ।
vijñānamātrābhyupagame ca svapnapratyasvalakṣaṇavyatiriktayoḥ sādhyasādhana- dharmayorabhāvāt sarve sādhanavikalatvādayo dṛṣṭāntadoṣā vatkavyā ityāha—dṛṣṭānta- doṣa iti । kimevaṃ syādarasmatpakṣani. cau. ananta. mu. bhavatām. anan. mu.
kecid vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto nāstītyapyanuyuñjate ।। 121 ।।
tadabhāvādavṛtteśca nāstyatrāvasarastava ।
vidhirūpratijñāyāmetad vaktuṃ hi śakyate ।। 122 ।।
tatrāvastuvipakṣe'pi prayogasya hi sambhavaḥ ।
yasminnanityatā nāsti kāryatāpi na vidyate ।। 123 ।।
tasmin yathā khapuṣpādādi/?/ti śakyaṃ hi bhāṣitum ।
atra tvavastusādhyatve vastunaśca viṣakṣatā ।। 124 ।।
tena syād vyatireko'sya vācyo yaścāpi darśayet ।
pratiṣedhadvayāt tena vidhireva pradarśitaḥ ।। 125 ।।
na ca śakyo vidhirvaktuṃ vastunyasati kenacit ।
evaṃ sthite tu sarvajñaniṣedhādāviyaṃ gatiḥ ।। 126 ।।
api ca bhavatpakṣe nityavipakṣānumānasyedaṃ lakṣaṇam “trirūpālliṅgato'rtha- dṛk” iti । na ca nirālambanapratijñāyāṃ sālambanavipakṣābhāvena vaidharmyaprayogāsambha- vāt trairūpyaṃ darśayituṃ śakyamityāha—kecidityardhena ।।
nanu ‘anityaḥ śabdaḥ’ ityasmin pratijñārthe nityavipakṣābhāve'pi khapuṣpaṃ vipakṣamāśritya yathā kṛtakatvasya trairūpyaṃ darśatam, uktaṃ ca “tadabhāvāttatrāvṛttenāyaṃ doṣaḥ” iti, tathehāpi bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkya vailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayitumāha—sārdhena śloka- catuṣṭayena tadabhāvādavṛtteścetyādinā । yatra vastu sādhyatvena pratijñāyate, tatrā- vastuno vipakṣatvādanityatvābhāvena kṛtakatvābhāvaḥ śakyo darśayitum—yathā khapuṣpādau; avastubhūtanirālambanatve tu sādhye khapuṣpāderapi sapakṣatvād vastuni vipakṣe nirālambanatvābhāvena pratyayatvābhāvo darśayitavyaḥ । na ca bhavatpakṣe sālambanaṃ kiñcidastītyabhiprāyaḥ ।
nanu sarvajñābhāvapratijñāyāṃ vaktṛtvāt ityasya vipakṣābhāvena tvayāpi trairūpya- maśakyaṃ darśayitumityāśaṅkyāha—evaṃ sthite tviti । sādhyatvam. cau. ananta. mu. ca. cau. ananta. mu.
pratyakṣāderasāmarthyāt tadīyasyāsmadādivat ।
vaidharmyāsambhave'pyetadanye tvāhuradūṣaṇam ।। 127 ।।
vinaiva tatprayogeṇa heturaikāntiko yataḥ ।
sarvathā sadupāyānāṃ vādamārgaḥ pravartate ।। 128 ।।
adhikāro'nupāyatvānna vāde śūnyavādinaḥ ।
nanu sarvaṃ bhavatsiddhaṃ mayedaṃ sādhanaṃ kṛtam ।। 129 ।।
kimarthaṃ madasiddhayā tvaṃ vikalpyātrāttha dūṣaṇam ।
vipralipsurivāhaivaṃ kimarthaṃ nyāyavid bhavān ।। 130 ।।
sarvajñatābhāvapratipādanavivakṣāyāṃ vā evaṃ prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ—buddhādeḥ pratyakṣaṃ dharmi dharmagrāhakaṃ na bhavati, pratyakṣatvāt asmadādipratyakṣavat iti । athavā kartṛtvena sarvajñābhāve'pi sādhye vipakṣābhāvena sutarāmaikāntikatvāt gamakatvaṃ vināpi trairū- pyadarśanena; yato nāsmākamidaṃlakṣaṇamanumānam “trirūpālliṅgato'rthadṛk” ityāha— vaidharmyāsambhave'pīti ।
api ca jñānādvaitavādinastadvyatiriktahetvabhāvena sādhanaprayoga eva na prāpno- tītyāha—sarvathā sadupāyānāmiti ।
tatrādvaitavādī pratyavatiṣṭhate—nanu sarvamiti । advaitavādī dvaitavādinaṃ prati prayuṅkte । tasya pratyayatvaṃ nirālambanatvena vyāptaṃ svapnādau, jāgratpratyayadharmatvenā- siddham । tatpratipattiphalaṃ cedamanumānam; uktaṃ ca “parārthamanumānaṃ tadadṛṣṭārtha- prakāśakam” ityarthaḥ ।
tadatra dvaitavādyaha—vipralipsuriveti । ubhayavādisiddhasya sādhanatvam, nānyatarasiddhasyeti diṅnāgenoktam—“tatra yo vādiprativādiniścitaḥ sa sādha- nam” iti ।
api ca parāsiddho'pi tāvat prayujyate—sādhayiṣyāmi ityanayā lakṣaṇayā śabdānityatvasiddhau kṛtakatvamiva yājñikān prati । advaitavādinastu tadvyatirikto sāmarthyam. cau. ananta. mu. tadasiddhyā. cau. ananta. mu. vādī prayukte. mā. anumānatastvadṛṣṭā. mā.
nāśrauṣīḥ sādhanatvaṃ kiṃ prasiddhasya dvayorapi ।
yo'pi tāvat parāsiddhaḥ svayaṃsiddho'bhidhīyate ।। 131 ।।
bhavet tatra pratīkāraḥ svato'siddhe tu kā kriyāḥ ।
taṃ sādhayan virundhyāddhi pūrvābhyupagamaṃ naraḥ ।। 132 ।।
asādhite tu sādhyo'rtho na tena pratipādyate ।
parāsiddho na paryāptaḥ pareṣāṃ pratipattaye ।। 133 ।।
tenasādhanatā yuktā svato'siddhe tu kiṃkṛtā ।
dvayoḥ siddhasya hetutvaṃ nādṛṣṭāyopadiśyate ।। 134 ।।
pratyeṣyanti svasiddhena sādhanena svayaṃ yataḥ ।
vadet kathamasiddhaṃ cedityanenāpi kiṃ tava ।। 135 ।।
gṛhītamagṛhītaṃ vā sādhyaṃ vā sādhanādi vā ।
mayocyate cet tvatsiddhaṃ kiṃ tvaṃ na pratipatsyase ।। 136 ।।
hetiḥ svata evāsiddhaḥ । tatra sādhyamāne tasmin advaitahāniḥ, asiddhau tu sādhyaṃ na sidhyatītyāha—yo'pi tāvaditi ślokadvayena ।
evaṃ sthite punaradvaitavādī pratyavatiṣṭhate—parāsiddha iti । parapratipattaye hi hetuḥ prayujyamānaḥ parasiddhimevāpekṣate; tatra vādyasiddho'pi prativādinaḥ siddho bhavati sādhanamityabhiprāyaḥ ।
“tatra yo vādiprativādiniścitaḥ”—ityetadapi prativādiniścitaparameva vyākhyeyam, nyāyamūlatvād vacanānāmityāha—dvayoriti ।
svayamapratipanno hetuḥ kathamanyasmai pratipādyata iti dvaitavādī codayati— vadet kathamasiddhaṃ ceditīti । tatrādvaitavādī parihāramāha—anenetyādinā gataṃ naraḥ cau. ananta. mu. sādhyārthaḥ. cau. ananta mu. pratipadyate cau. ananta. mu. sādhanāpi vā. cau. ananta mu. padyase. cau. ananta. mu. etena. mā.
yatra syāta puruṣādhīnā buddhistatraitaducyate ।
kuto'sya pūrvavijñānamityatraitanna yujyate ।। 137 ।।
yadi caivaṃ bhavedatra pratijñāmātra eva hi ।
maddoṣajñānamātreṇa pratipattirbhavet tava ।। 138 ।।
tatastu sādhanāpekṣā tenāsyaiva pramāṇatā ।
tatsmṛttyutpattimātre tu vākyavyāpāra iṣyate ।। 139 ।।
tasmād yathaiva sādhyāṃśavyāptahetunidarśanāt ।
sādhyaṃ gṛhṇanna vaktāramapekṣeta tathā bhavān ।। 140 ।।
yaccāpi bhavato jñānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa kimatra te ।
matprasiddhāsti yuktirvā sādhyaṃ vātra yathepsasi ।। 141 ।।
tasmānna viduṣāmetaduttaraṃ yujyate yataḥ ।
tava heturasiddho'yaṃ mama tena na sādhanam ।। 142 ।।
saśeṣeṇa ślokena । svayamapratipannamapi ‘parasyedaṃ siddham’ iti buddhyā hi prati- pādayati, kimiti na pratipadyase ityarthaḥ ।।
yatra vādipratyayenārthaḥ pratīyate, tatreṃda yujyate vaktum—kutaḥ punarbhavatā pratipannam ? iti; hetunā tvarthaṃ pratipadyamāno vaivādikasiddhamapekṣate ityāha—yatra syāditi ।।
yadi ca vādipratyayenārthaṃ pratipadyase tadā nityaḥ śabdaḥ—ityukte pratijñā- mātreṇaina pratipannaḥ kimiti hetumapekṣase ? hetvapekṣāyāṃ tu tasyaiva sādhanatvam; prativādipratipannameva tu rūpatrayaṃ vādī svavacanena smārayatītyāha—yaditi ślokadvayena ।।
yathā ca svārthānumānenārthaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ pratyakṣeṇa vā naiva vādipratipannatā- mapekṣate, tathātrāpītyāha—tasmādyathaiveti ślokadvayena ।।
sotprāsamupasaṃharati—tasmānneti ।। tatredamucyate. cau. ananta. mu. maddoṣājñāna. cau. ananta. mu. yathaika. mā. pratyakṣādiḥ. cau. ananta. mu. yathecchasi. cau. ananta. mu. buddhyādiprati. mā.
satyaṃ yadi mamaivātra pratipattiḥ phalaṃ bhavet ।
tadā tvadaprasiddhe'pi hetau māṃ prati hetutā ।। 143 ।।
yadā tu jñānamātratvapratipattau bhavānmayā ।
pṛṣṭaḥ ko heturatreti tadaivaṃ nopapadyate ।। 144 ।।
svayaṃ na hyagṛhītena matprasiddhena vā bhavān ।
hetunā sādhyametat tu pratipannaḥ kathañcana ।। 145 ।।
na ca vyāpriyate'nyatra vacanaṃ prāśnikān prati ।
svaniścayāya yo hetustasyaiva pratipādanāt ।। 146 ।।
matprasiddhatvametasya kutaścāvagataṃ tvayā ।
kathaṃ cetthaṃ vivakṣā te svayamarthamajānataḥ ।। 147 ।।
mayi jijñāsamāne'pi buddhipūrvābhidhāyinaḥ ।
iti jñātvā ca vo vṛddhairbhāṣitobhayasiddhatā ।। 148 ।।
evaṃ prāpte sati dvaitavādyaha—satyamityādicatuḥślokyā ।।
nanu ca prativādipratiptyarthameva parārthamanumānam; ataḥ kimucyate— “satyaṃ yadi mamaivātra pratipattiḥ phalaṃ bhavet”—iti ? ayamabhiprāyaḥ—svaniścaya- vadanyeṣāṃ niścayotpādanāya hetuḥ prayujyate । tatra yadi prativādī prāśnikāśca vādinaṃ pṛcchanti—advaitasiddhau bhavataḥ kiṃ pramāṇam ? iti, tadaitadapahāsyam—yadyapi mama pramāṇaṃ nāsti, tathāpi tvaṃ pratipadyasva iti ।।
svāṃśālambanatvena ca vijñānānāṃ matprasiddhatā ca hetoḥ kathamavagamyete- tyāha—matprasiddhatvametasyetyardhena ।
svayaṃ ca hetvarthamajānataḥ kathamīdṛśī vivakṣāpi—yadyapi mamāyaṃ heturasiddhaḥ, tathāpi bhavataḥ siddha ityāha—kathaṃ ceti ।
amumevārthaṃ paryālocya diṅnāgenoktam—“tatra yo vādiprativādisiddhaḥ sa sādhanam” ityāha—iti jñātvetyardhena ।। Omitted sa. mā.
tena yadvanmamaitena tvamādhitsasi hetunā ।
sādhyajñānaṃ tathaivāhamajñānaṃ tava dūṣaṇaiḥ ।। 149 ।।
yathaiva ca bhavānīdṛk sādhyamuktvāsya sādhanam ।
sādhyānurūpamajñātvā vihitaḥ pratipādanāt ।। 150 ।।
tathaiva pratipādyo'pi tādṛksādhyabubhutsayā ।
manvānaḥ sādhanaṃ duṣṭaṃ tataḥ sādhyaṃ na budhyate ।। 151 ।।
samyagvā sādhanaṃ muktvā tatsadbhāve dṛḍhe sati ।
sādhyasyāsambhavādeva tvaduktaṃ nāvavudhyate ।। 152 ।।
tenāśeyaṃ na kartavyā mohādapi mayerite ।
sādhane sādhanaṃ jñātvā para evāvabhotsyate ।। 153 ।।
vispaṣṭaścākṣapādokto virodho hetusādhyayoḥ ।
yamadṛṣṭvā parairuktamadūṣaṇamidaṃ kila ।। 154 ।।
tena yathaiva tvamasiddhenaiva sādhanena sādhyaṃ sādhayitumicchasi, tathavāhama- siddhenaiva dūṣaṇamāpādayāmītyāha—tena yavdaditi ।।
vijñānamātrapratijñārthaṃ ca tadvyatirikto heturyathā vādino'prasiddha iti kṛtvā prativādinā vihataḥ, tathaiva pratipādyo'pi tādṛksādhyabubhutsāyāṃ sādhyānurūpaṃ sādhanamajñātvā vihita ityāha—yathaiva ceti ślokadvayena ।।
vijñānavyatiriktaṃ cet sādhanamavabudhyate, tadā dvaitasadbhāvādadvaitahāniri- tyāha—samyagvā sādhanaṃ muktveti ।।
amumevārthamupasaṃharati—tenāśeyamiti । yathoktamakṣapādena—“pratijñā- hetvorvirodhaḥ pratijñāvirodhaḥ” iti ।।
tasyedamudāharaṇam—svavyatiriktaśūnyāḥ pratyayāḥ pratyayatvāt ityāha— vispaṣṭaśceti ।।
etasya pratijñādoṣasyedamudāharaṇam, yadadṛṣṭvaivodāharaṇāntaramakṣapādoktaṃ dūṣitaṃ diṅnāgenetyāha—yamadṛṣṭeti ।। saṃvittyā sādhanaṃ matvā. cau. ananta. mu.
nanu lokaprasiddhena pūrvametena hetunā ।
sādhyasiddhirmamāpyāsīt paramārtho'sya nāstitā ।। 155 ।।
yo'dhunā paramārthena nāstītyevaṃ prakāśate ।
kathaṃ pūrvamasāvāsīdasaṃścet sādhanaṃ katham ।। 156 ।।
sādhanaṃ cedavaśyaṃ ca paramārthāstitā bhavet ।
siddhirnāparamārthena paramārthasya yujyate ।। 157 ।।
idamudāharaṇaṃ dattaṃ pratijñāhetvorvirodhe—“nityaḥ śabdaḥ sarvasyānityatvāt” iti । asyedaṃ dūṣaṇamuktam—“nityatvapratijñāyāmasarvatvaṃ=nirāvayavasaṃjñakaṃ hetutvena vivakṣitaṃ sāṃkhyaiḥ—“sarvasyānityatvāt” iti । tatra vaidharmyaprayogaḥ । tatrāpi sādhyābhāvo hetvabhāvena vyāptaḥ kathayitavyaḥ—anityatvasya sarvatvāt iti । “sarvasyānityatvāt”—iti tu viparītavyāptikathanāt tadābhāsaḥ । taduktam—
“sa hi dṛṣṭānta evokto vaidharmyeṇāsuśikṣitaiḥ ।” iti
nanu sāṃvṛtena rūpeṇa pramāṇaprameyavyavahāro'styeva; ataḥ sāṃvṛtādeva pramā- ṇād advaitarūpaṃ satyaṃ pratīmaḥ; paramārthatāyāṃ tu na kiñcit pramāṇaṃ nāpi prameyam; api tu aparasādhanamekaṃ tattvam । iṣṭaṃ caitadeva vedāntavādibhirapi—“ātmai- vedaṃ sarvam” ityevaṃ vadadbhiḥ; ayaṃ tu sarvo'vidyāvijṛmbhito bhedaparāmarśaḥ, ātmaiveti tu satyamiti codayati—nanu lokaprasiddheneti ।।
tatra parihāramāha sārdhena—yo'dhunetyādinā । yasya hi paramārthena nāstitvam, tasya kathamastitvam ? kathaṃ sādhanatvamityarthaḥ ।
nanu asataḥ sādhanatvaṃ mā bhūt; saṃvṛtisatyena bhavatvityāśaṅkyāha— siddhirneti sārdhena ślokena । asatyātā hi padārthasya na svataḥ parata eva vā; tatra śaśaviṣaṇādayo na kvacidupāyabhāvaṃ pratipadyante; bāṣpādayastu dhūmarūpatayopāyabhāvaṃ pratipadyante, mithyātastebhyo'pi yāvadavagatirityarthaḥ ।। prakāśyate. mā.
na dṛṣṭā śaśaśṛṅgādeḥ samyagjñānādihetutā ।
bāṣpādinā hyadhūmena mithyā bahnyādibodhanam ।। 158 ।।
tasmādasatyahetoryā paramārthe matistava ।
sāpyasatyā na satyaṃ hi satyābhāsena gamyate ।। 158 ।।
ye'pi rekhādayo dṛṣṭā varṇādeḥ pratipādakāḥ ।
na te svenaiva rūpeṇa paramārthatvavarjitāḥ ।। 160 ।।
varṇātmanā na satyāścet sarvabhāveṣvayaṃ vidhiḥ ।
padārthāntararūpeṇa na satyaṃ kiñcidiṣyate ।। 161 ।।
svarūpe vidyamāne tu yadapyevaṃ prakāśate ।
svarūpābhāvaklṛptau tu na satyaṃ nāpyasatyatā ।। 162 ।।
hetvādīnāṃ tu bhavataḥ svarūpeṇāpyasatyatā ।
tena bāṣpādivat teṣāmupāyatvaṃ na lekhyavat ।। 163 ।।
evamadvaitāvagatāvapi avidyāvasthāyāmupāyopeyabhāvaḥ pāramārthiko bhavatyeva; advaitamevāvagamyamānamupāyasya bhrāntatāmavagamayati; vidyāvasthāyāntu pramāṇaprameya- pramātṛpratyastamayānna vidmaḥ—kimekamutānekam iti । tadāha—tasmāditi ।।
nanu asatyādapi lipyakṣarād varṇāvagatiḥ satyā dṛṣṭetyāśaṅkayāha—ye'pi rekhādaya iti । rekhārūpatayā hi lipyakṣarāṇāṃ varṇāvagatau sambandhagrahaṇam; tena rūpeṇa satyatvamevetyarthaḥ ।।
yadā tu varṇasāmānādhikaraṇyena lipyakṣarāvagatiḥ ‘gakāro'yam’ iti, tadā teṣāmasatyatā; tadā ca tatraiva pratīteḥ paryavasānādupāyopeyabhāva eva nāstī- tyāha—varṇātmaneti ।।
vidyamānasya ca padārthasya svarūpapararūpābhyāṃ satyāsatyatvam vijñānamātraprati- jñāyāṃ hetvādīnāṃ svata evāvidyamānatvānna bāṣpavadupāyatvaṃ nāpi lekhyavadityāha ślokadvayena—svarūpa ityādinā ।। pyadhūmena. cau. ananta. mu. varṇānām. cau. ananta. mu. svenāpi. cau. ananta. mu.
upāyānāṃ svarūpaṃ hi saṃvṛtyātmakameva naḥ ।
tathā ca satyateṣṭaiva svarūpāsatyatā katham ।। 164 ।।
saṃvṛttyā yatsvarūpaṃ hi tadvāṅmātranibandhanam ।
hetutvaṃ parāmārthasya pratipattuṃ na śaknuyāt ।। 165 ।।
paramārthācca lokasya na bhede heturasti te ।
laukikopāyagamyasya kena syāt paramārthatā ।। 166 ।।
nanvasatyapi bāhye'rthe buddhyārūḍhena sidhyati ।
vāsanāśabdabhedotthavikalpapravibhāgataḥ ।। 167 ।।
nyāyavidbhiridaṃ coktaṃ dharmādau buddhimāśrite ।
vyavahāro'numānādeḥ kalpyate na bahiḥsthite ।। 168 ।।
nanūpāyānāṃ saṃvṛtameva rūpam, tena ca rūpeṇa satyatvamastyeveti paricoda- yati—upāyānāmiti ।।
tatra parihāramāha—saṃvṛtyeti ।।
saṃvṛtisatyasya nirākṛtvādityarthaḥ । tadeva smārayati paramārthāccetyardhena ।
lokaśabde saṃvṛtisatyamāha; na ca saṃvṛtopāyagamyasya paramārthatetyāha— laukiketyardhena ।।
nanu vijñānamātrapratijñāyāmasatyapi bāhye hetau vāsanābhedena bhinnaśabdaja- nitavikalpapratibhāsārūḍhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ gamyagamakabhāva iti paricodayati— nanvasatyapīti ।।
bāhyārthavādino'pi pratītisattāṃ vihāya bahissattārūpeṇārthānāṃ gamyagamaka bhāvaḥ । tathā hi-na parvatasthasya dhūmasvalakṣaṇasya abhāvāt nāpi sarastīrasthasya apa- kṣadharmatvāt, nāpi dhūmajāteḥ tatvānyātvābhyāmanirvacanīyatvāt, nāpi adhūmavyāvṛtteḥ avastutvāt । uktaṃ ca diṅnāgena—“sarva evāyamanumānānumeyavyavahāro buddhyā- rūḍhena dharmadharminyāyena, na bahiḥsadasattvamapekṣate” ityāha—nyāyavidbhiriti ।।
astīdaṃ vacanaṃ teṣāmidaṃ tatra parikṣyatām ।
bhedo'sataḥ kathaṃ hi syād buddhiśabdaprakalpanāt ।। 169 ।।
nirvastuke kathañcit syāt prasavo buddhiśabdayoḥ ।
śabdabhedo'pi bhavatastadabhāvānna sidhyati ।। 170 ।।
yadi vāvidyāmāno'pi bhedo buddhiprakalpitaḥ ।
sādhyasādhanadharmādervyavahārāya kalpyate ।। 171 ।।
tato bhavatprayukte'smit sādhane yāvaducyate ।
sarvatrotpadyate buddhiriti dūṣaṇatā bhavet ।। 172 ।।
yaśca mantrastvayokto'yaṃ dharmyādau buddhimāśrite ।
na bāhyāpekṣayā sa syādasiddhyādau mayerite ।। 173 ।।
buddhipraklṛptisiddhiśca bhavatāṃ vyavahāriṇām ।
maduktaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ siddhaṃ tvaduktaṃ tu na sādhanam ।। 174 ।।
tatra parihāramāha—astīdamiti sārdhena । vacanaśabdena nyāyaśūnyatāṃ darśayati । idaṃ tvatra parikṣyatāmiti dharmadharmiṇorabhāvena śabdaprayogābhāvāt kutasta- duttho vikalpapravibhāga ityarthaḥ । vakṣyamāṇena ca vāsanābhāvena bhavataḥ śabdabhedo nāstītyāha—śabdabhedo'pītyardhena ।।
yathā cānādṛtyaiva bāhyamarthaṃ buddhyārūḍhatayā sādhanatvam, tathā bhavatsādhana- dūṣaṇamapi bhaviṣyatītyāha—ślokadvayena—yadi cetyādinā ।।
yacca sādhanasambandhitayoktam “sarva evāyam” iti, tacchakyaṃ dūṣaṇe'pyū- hitumityāha—yaśceti । “mantraḥ” ityūhaviṣayatāṃ darśayatyupahāsāya ।।
pratītimātravyavahāritvācca bāhyārthābhāve'pi bhavatāṃ maduktadūṣaṇaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ siddham; bāhyārthavādināṃ tu tadabhāvena tvaduktaṃ na siddhyatīti na sādhanamityāha ślokadvayena—buddhītyādinā ।। trodbhidyate. mā.
bāhyārthavyavahāritvājjñānotpāde sthite'pi naḥ ।
kathañcinna hi kalpyeta vyavahāro'rthavarjitaḥ ।। 175 ।।
nanu yadvanmayā heturneṣyate dūṣaṇaṃ tathā ।
tena me dūṣaṇābhāvādaduṣṭaṃ sādhanaṃ bhavet ।। 176 ।।
nedānīṃ dūṣaṇaiḥ kāryaṃ sādhanābhāvato yadi ।
tvayaivāsmadabhipretā svapakṣāsiddhirāśritā ।। 177 ।।
na cāsti vāsanābhedo nimittāsambhavāt tava ।
jñānabhedo nimittaṃ cet tasya bhedaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ ।। 178 ।।
vāsanābhedataścet syāt prāptamanyonyasaṃśrayam ।
svacchasya jñānarūpasya na hi bhedaḥ svato'sti te ।। 179 ।।
pramāṇaṃ vāsanāstitve bhede vāpi na vidyate ।
kuryād grāhakabhedaṃ sā grāhyabhedastu kiṃkṛtaḥ ।। 180 ।।
nanu sādhanavad dūṣamamapi tvaduktamasmābhirneṣṭamityāha—nanu yadvaditi ।।
tatrottaram—nedānīmiti । sādhanaistu vinaiva bāhyārthābhāvasyāsiddherjitaṃ bāhyārthavādibhirityarthaḥ ।।
vāsanābhedamabhyupagamya dūṣaṇamuktam; idānīṃ nimittābhāvena vāsanā- bhedo'pi nāstītyāha sārdhaślokena na cāstīti । jñānabhedo'pi vāsanābhedanimittaḥ, tasmācca tadbheda itītaretarāśrayam । na cātra bījāṅkuravat parihāra ityāha— svacchasyetyardhena । bodharūpatā hi vijñānānāṃ pāramārthikī; tayā caikyam; viṣa- yākāratayā tu vijñānāni bhidyante; sā ca vāsanayā; sā naiva pāramārthikī; apā- ramārthikastu vijñānabhedo na vāsanābhedanimittāyālamiti na bījāṅkuranyāyaḥ saṃbhavati ।।
idānīṃ bhedavadastitve'pi pramāṇaṃ nāstītyāha—pramāṇamityardhena ।
nanu vijñānajanyaḥ saṃskāro vāsanā; tatra cāvipratipattireva । taduktam— “vastudharmo doṣavadanubhavaḥ yadīyāt smṛtibījamāvṛttam ” ityāśaṅkayāha—kuryādi- hāritvajñāno. ananta. mu. kāryabheda. mā. bhāve'pi na vāsa. mā. vāsanā vāsanaiva pāra. mā.
saṃvittyā jāyamānā hi smṛtimātraṃ karotyasau ।
kṣaṇikeṣu ca citteṣu vināśe ca niranvaye ।। 181 ।।
vāsyavāsakayoścaivamasāhityānna vāsanā ।
pūrvakṣaṇairanutpanno vāsyate nottaraḥ kṣaṇaḥ ।। 182 ।।
uttareṇa vinaṣṭatvānna ca pūrvasya vāsanā ।
sāhitye ca tayornaiva sambandho'stītyavāsanā ।। 183 ।।
kṣaṇikatvād dvayasyāpi vyāpāro na parasparam ।
vinaśyacca kathaṃ vastu vāsyate'nyena naśyatā ।। 184 ।।
tyardhena । yadi vijñānajanyaḥ saṃskāro vāsanā; tayā ca sarvāṇi jñānāni janyante; tathā satyapi grahaṇasmaraṇayorbhede viṣayabhedo na prāpnotītyabhiprāyaḥ ।।
etadeva spaṣṭayati—saṃvittyetyardhena । savitterutpadyamānā saṃskārātmikā vāsanā tadviṣayameva smaraṇamātraṃ karotītyarthaḥ ।
apareṣāṃ darśanam—vijñānayoreva vāsyavāsakabhāvaḥ; pūrvavijñānavāsitamupa- ritanaṃ svakāryaṃ karotīti । tadetad vikalpya nirākaroti; na tāvat kramotpa- nnayoḥ vāsyavāsakabhāva ityāha—kṣaṇikeṣviti ।
yathaivoparitanaṃ vinaṣṭatvena na pūrvasya vāsakamiṣyate, tathaiva pūrvamanutpannatvādu- paritanasya cetyāha—pūrvakṣaṇairiti ।
nāpi yugapadutpannayoḥ, tādātmyatadutpatilakṣaṇasambandhābhāvādityāha— sāhitye cetyardhena ।
utpattyanantaraṃ ca kṣaṇikatvena vināśānna parasparaṃ vyāpāro'stītyāha— kṣaṇikatvādityardhena ।
nāpi vinaśyadavasthayorasattvena vāsyavāsakabhāvaḥ, tadāha—vinaśyadityardhena ।। api. ananta. mu.
avasthitā hi vāsyante bhāvā bhāvairavasthitaiḥ ।
avasthito hi pūrvasmād bhidyate nottaro yadi ।। 185 ।।
pūrvavad vāsanā tatra na syādevāviśeṣataḥ ।
bhaṅgure pūrvasādṛśyād bhinnatvāccāsti vāsanā ।। 186 ।।
naitadastyanurūpaṃ tu kṣaṇikatve dhiyāṃ tava ।
pūrvajñānaṃ tvanutpannaṃ kāryaṃ nārabhate kvacit ।। 187 ।।
na naṣṭaṃ na ca tasyāsti niṣpannasya kṣaṇaṃ sthitiḥ ।
tenotpadyavinaṣṭatvānnāstyārambhakṣaṇo'pi hi ।। 188 ।।
mīmāṃsakapakṣe tvavasthitasyātmano avasthitaireva vijñānairvāsyavāsakabhāvo ghaṭata ityāha—avasthitā hītyardhena । sthāyina eva jñānasyāśutaravināśitvābhi- prāyeṇa “kṣaṇika hi sā” iti vyavahāraḥ । evamavasthite mīmāṃsakapakṣaṃ nirākṛtya vāsyavāsakadarśanāntaramupanyasyati । tatra nirākaraṇam—kiṃ bhinnasyotpattirutā- bhinnasya ? bhinnotpattau tādavasthyaṃ tasya; abhinnotpatau tu ātmaivotpannaḥ syāta; tadāha—avasthito hīti । yadā samantarapratyaya evātmasadṛśyaṃ vijñānaṃ janavad vāsanocyate, tadā kṣaṇikatve'pi na kaściddoṣa ityāha—bhaṅgura ityardhena ।।
tadidamanupapannam, kṣaṇikatvena niranvayavināśitvena ca kāryakāraṇabhāva- sādṛśyayorabhāvādityāha—naitadityardhena । tatra tāvat kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ nirākā- roti—pūrvajñānamiti sārdhena । na tāvadanutpadyamānasyotpādakamānam; nāpyanu- tpannasya, kṣaṇāntare'bhāvāt; vinaśyadavastho'pyasattvādakāraṇam; atha kṣaṇadvayā- vasthāyī prāptaḥ nāvinaṣṭam, asatvāt ।
nanu caivamanantaramutpattimattvameva kāryatvamanantarapūrvabhāvitvameva kāraṇatvam; evaṃ tarhi santānāntaravartino'pi kāryatvaprasaṅgaḥ । niranvayavināśitvena ca sādṛśya- na vinaṣṭaṃ na tasya. cau ananta. mu. tenotpannavi. cau. ananta. mu. karaṇaṃ kiṃ hi tadāsya abhi mā. mānatvotpādaka. mā. mutpatti...meva. mā.
niranvayavināśitvādānurūpyaṃ kutaḥ punaḥ ।
na tadīyo'sti kaścicca dharma uttarabuddhiṣu ।। 189 ।।
samānadharmatāṃ muktvā nānurūpyaṃ ca vidyate ।
yadi syādānurūpyācca vāsanā godhiyo yadā ।। 190 ।।
hastibuddhirbhavet tatra valakṣaṇyānna vāsanā ।
tataḥ paraṃ ca gojñānaṃ nirmūlatvānna saṃbhavet ।। 191 ।।
sarvaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ jñānaṃ na syādeva vilakṣaṇāt ।
bāhyārthānugrahābhāvāt pārārthyenāvaśīkṛtāḥ ।। 192 ।।
mapi nāstītyāha—niranvayeti sārdhaślokatrayeṇa । sarvātmanā vinaṣṭatvānna pūrvā- parayoranugataṃ kiñcidastītyabhiprāyaḥ । sadṛśotpādakatvena ca vāsanātve vilakṣa- ṇayorutpādyotpādakabhāvo na prāpnotītyabhiprāyaṃ—yadi syāditi ślokadvayaṃ nigadavyākhyātam ।
aparaṃ darśanam—pravṛttijñānāni nīlapītādiviṣayākāraṇi svacchāyala- vijñāne saṃskāramādhāya vāsanārūpaṃ vinaśyanti; sā ca vāsanā yajjatīyād vijñā- nādutpadyate tajjātīyameva vijñānaṃ janayati etadapi vijñānaṃ svānuraktavāsanāmiti । tadvikalpya dūṣayati । taddhyālayavijñānaṃ pratikṣaṇadhvaṃsi sthāyi vā ? yadi pratikṣaṇa- dhvaṃsi tannāśe ca yadi tadādhārā vāsanā vinaśyanti, tataścātra kāryajananasvabhāvā eva kalpitā iti kāryaṃ janayeyuḥ; na ca bāhyāpekṣitā tāsām, tasyābhāvāt । tataśca krameṇa kāryotpāde na prāpnoti; tadāha—bāhyārthānugrahābhāvāditi । pārārthyenāvaśīkṛtā iti kāryajananasvabhāvā evetyarthaḥ ।
kāraṇavināśānantataraṃ ca sarvaṃ kāryamudetīti bauddhadarśanam, anyathā kramayau- gapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhāt; ālayavijñānavināśe ca tadādhārā vāsanā vina- śyanti; tataśca tāḥ svānurūpāṇi vijñānāni vicitrāṇi janayanti; ekasmina kāle vinaṣṭatvā. cau. ananta. mu. ṇayorutpādaka. mā. svānukta. mā.
niranvayavināśinyaḥ kuryuḥ kāryaṃ kathaṃ kramāt ।
vināśe kāraṇasyeṣṭaḥ kāryārambhaśca nānyathā ।। 193 ।।
tatraiva jñānanāśena vinaṣṭāḥ sarvavāsanāḥ ।
tena sarvābhya etābhyaḥ sarvākāraṃ yadutthitam ।। 194 ।।
jñānamekakṣaṇenaiva vināśaṃ gantumarhati ।
yadyāśrayavināśe'pi śaktyanāśo'bhyupeyate ।। 195 ।।
kṣaṇikatvaṃ ca hīyeta na cārambho'nyathā bhavet ।
vāsanānāṃ pravāho'pi yadi jñānapravāhavat ।। 196 ।।
vāsanātastato jñānaṃ na syāt tasmācca vāsanā ।
kuryātāṃ tulyamevaite nānyonyaṃ tu kadācana ।। 197 ।।
nānyo vilakṣaṇo heturyenānyādṛk phalaṃ bhavet ।
tasmāt saṃvṛtisatyaiṣā kalpitā nāsti tattvataḥ ।। 198 ।।
utpadyamānāni bhinnānyapīti na śakyate vaktum; ekameva tadvicitraṃ prāpnoti citrabuddhivat; tadāha—vināśa iti dvayena ।।
athālayavijñānavināśe'pi vāsanā na vinaśyanti, evaṃ kṣaṇikatvābhyupa- gamavirodhaḥ; sthāyinaśca kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhaḥ; tadāha—yadyāśraya- vināśe'pīti ।।
atha vinaśyanta eva vāsanāḥ ālayavijñānavināśe kāryaṃ janayanti, tatu vāsanāntarameva ālayavijñānakṣaṇāntarastham । yadyevaṃ vāsanājananasvabhāvatvā- pātāt tābhyo na pravṛttijñānotpādaḥ prāpnoti; vāsanājanyatvācca vāsanānāṃ na pravṛttijñānajanyatvaṃ syāt, cānyat sahakāri vidyate, yatsamavadhāne pravṛttijñānaṃ janayati; tadāha—vāsanānāmiti ślokadvayena ।
upasaṃharati—tasmāditi ।।
na cedṛśena bhāvena kāryamutpadyate kvacit ।
yasya tvavasthito jñātā jñānābhyāsena yujyate ।। 199 ।।
sa tasya vāsanādhāro vāsanāpi sa eva vā ।
kusume bījapūrāderyallākṣādyupasicyate ।
tadrūpasyaiva saṃkrāntiḥ phale tasyetyavāsanā ।। 200 ।।
yuktyānupetāmasatīṃ prakalpya yadvāsanāmarthanirākriyeyam ।
āsthānivṛttyarthamavādi bauddhaiḥ grāhaṃ gatāstatra kathaṃcidanye ।। 201 ।।
yatpunarmīmāṃsakapakṣe vāsyavāsakabhāvo na prāpnotītyuktam “avasthito hi” iti, tatrāpyāha—yasyeti ।।
nityatvādātmano jñānābhyāsena yujyate saṃskārādhānam, sthāyitvādādhārasya; ātmaiva vā smaraṇasamartho jāyata iti vāsanāpi sa evetyāha । taduktam–“vijñāna rūpasya na nityatvaṃ virotsyate” iti । yattu diṅnāgena dṛṣṭāntatvenoktaṃ vāsanāsiddhau “lākṣāvāsitakusumaṃ lohitaphalaṃ janayati” iti, tadasiddham, phale lākṣādirūpa- syaiva saṅkrāntatvāt saṅkrāntasya pratyabhijñāyamānatvādityāha—kusuma iti ।
bauddhamapi darśanaṃ tātparyeṇa nāvagatamityāha—yuktyānupetāmiti । sa hi buddhastatvadarśī nāma kathamapi yuktyānupetāṃ tata evāsatīṃ vāsanāṃ prakalpya lokayātrāsiddhyaṅgatayāyatata tasmād yathākathañcid rāgaparo lokaḥ saṃgrāhya iti । buddhenokte tatrānyathaivātattvadarśino mābhiniviṣṭā bhūteti ।। iti śrībhaṭṭombekaviracitāyāṃ tātparyaṭīkāyāṃ nirālambanavādaḥ samāptaḥ ।। tadasiddhamityāha-kusuma iti । bauddha. mā. tātparyeṇāvagata. mā. darśanātmakayamiva mā. tayātata. mā. kradhyavidragaparam. mā. saṅgrāhyavartaṃta ityetat. mā. tatranyathaiva mā. darśanomāviṣṭā iti. mā.
śūnyavādaḥ prārabhyate ।।
evamukte'numānasya jñānamāśritya dūṣaṇe ।
jñānapravṛttyaśaktyā tu paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate ।। 1 ।।
yattāvanmanyamānena pratyakṣaṃ bhavatocyate ।
dūṣaṇaṃ tadvirodhādi tadidānīṃ parīkṣyatām ।। 2 ।।
।। atha śūnyavādasthānakam ।।
“nanu sarva eva nirālambanaḥ”–ityādinā bāhyārthābhāvamāśaṅkya tatsadbhāva- pradarśanena yogācāradarśane niraste saṃprati tu vijñānasyāpyabhāvamāśaṅkya tatsadbhāva- pratipādanena mādhyamikadarśanaṃ nirākartumāha–“śūnyastu” ityādinā । tadanupapannam, pratipādite hi bāhyārthasadbhāve “jāgrato buddhiḥ”—ityādinā pratyakṣapratītibalena tadabhāvāśaṅkāyāṃ kāraṇābhāvāt; saṃvedyamāna eva hi vijñānābhāvo'pi bhavati iti tadabhyupagame'pi “sarva eva nirālambanaḥ”—ityanenaiva gatatvāt punaruktamidam— “śūnyastu” ityādītyāśaṅkya parihartumāha—evamiti । nanu “sarva eva nirālambanaḥ” ityādinā bāhyārthābhāve'numānaṃ pūrvamupanyastavān pūrvapakṣavādī । tatastasya pratyakṣavirodharūpaṃ dūṣaṇamabhihitam—“jāgrato buddhiḥ” ityādinā । sāṃprataṃ tu pūrvapakṣavādyeva nīlatadbudhyorekatvena pratyakṣasya bāhye'rthe pravartituṃ śaktirnāstīti pratyakṣavirodhaparihāreṇa pratyavasthitavān “śūnyastu”—ityādinā । taduktam— “prastutaḥ sa dvidhā cātra” iti । ata idamiha vicāraṇīyam—‘nīlamidam’, ‘pītamidam’, ‘rajatamidam’ ityevamāderanubhavasyotpadyamānasya kimātmaivānubhāvyaḥ, yathoktam—“sahopalambhaniyamādabhedo nīlataddhiyoḥ” iti; utānyo'nubhāvyaḥ ? iti । yadi tāvadātmaivānubhāvyaḥ, tato'rthanirākaraṇaparasyānumānasya svāṃśagrāhakeṇa pratyakṣeṇa viṣayabhede sati pūrvoktapratyakṣavirodhāsambhavāt jitaṃ śūnyavādinā । anubhavātiriktānubhāvyakalpanāyāṃ tu ekārthaviṣayatvāt pratyakṣānumānayorarthasadbhāva- grāhakeṇa pratyakṣeṇa bāghājjitaṃ mīmāṃsakenetyāha—yattāvadityādinā ślokatrayeṇa । ‘nīlamidam’ ‘pītamidam’ ‘rajatamidam’ iti yat pratyakṣaṃ manyamānena tāvat
pravartituṃ hi kiṃ śaktaṃ stambhādyarthe bahiḥsthite ।
athavātmāṃśa evaitadgrāhye kṣīṇaṃ na vastuni ।। 3 ।।
tadyadyetena bāhyo'rtho gṛhyate dūṣaṇaṃ tataḥ ।
tvaduktaṃ savamātmāṃśe grāhye tannopapadyate ।। 4 ।।
pratyakṣavirodhadūṣaṇamuktamanumānasya, tat parīkṣaṇīyam—kiṃ tasyaivātmaivānubhāvyaḥ, utānya iti ślokatrayārthaḥ ।।
nanu sandeha evātra nāsti, sarvatra grahaṇe parasparavilakṣaṇatritayapratibhāsāt ‘nīlamidamahaṃ gṛhṇāmi’ ityādiṣvanātmatayā nīlādayaḥ kasyacit pratibhāsante, na punarnīla eva kevalaḥ svaprakāśaḥ, tathā pratibhāsābhāvāt; anubhūyamānānanubhūyamāna- yośca parokṣāparokṣatayā viśeṣo na syāt । ekasminnapi nīle saṃnikṛṣṭāsaṃnikṛṣṭayo- rviśeṣo na syāt । svaprakāśe ca nīle ‘mamāyaṃ prakāśate, nānyasya’ iti pratibhāso na syāt । tasmāt sarvatrānubhavitānubhavo'nubhāvyaśca prakāśate । ‘nīlamahaṃ jānāmi’ iti cātrāpi pītavilakṣaṇo'nubhāvānubhavitṛvilakṣaṇaścānubhāvyo'nubhūyate, svani- ṣṭhasya nīlatvenānātmatayā pratibhāsanāt; na hyayaṃ nīlapītādiḥ svavyāpārastadīyabodha- vat prakāśate । pratibhāsanimittā ca bhedābhedavyavasthā । itarathā ‘nīlamidam, pītamidam’ ityanubhāvyabhedo'pi parasparato na syāt । viparyayāvagamo'pi tritkya- pratibhāsa eva; ‘nedaṃ rajatam’ ityanubhavāntarādanubhūtasyaiva vānubhūyamānasya vā asattvamavagamyate ; na tvanubhavānubhāvyayoraikyam । yatra tu parasparavilakṣaṇatritaya- pratibhāso'sti, niṣedhānubhavāntaraṃ ca nāsti ; tatra kathamavibhakto'pi buddhyātmā, kathaṃ nedaṃśabdaprayuktatā abhedasyeti na vidmaḥ । nanu cātrānubhāvyātiriktānu- bhavābhāvo'satyeva, ānumānikaviṣayābhyupagamāt । taduktam—“sahopalambhaniya- mādabhedo nīlataddhiyoḥ” iti । tadanupapannam ; parasparavilakṣaṇatritayapratibhāse- nānumānābhāsatve sati bādhakābhāvāt, sahopalambhasyābhedādhiṣṭhānavirodhād viruddho hetuḥ । athaikopalambhāditi hetvarthaḥ, atrāpyasiddhatvam ; sarvatra grahaṇe kevalasvapra. mā. kathaṃ caiva śabda. mā.
tatra tāvadidaṃ siddhaṃ sarvaprāṇabhṛtāmapi ।
grāhyatvaṃ nīlapītādidīrghādyākāravastunaḥ ।। 5 ।।
na cāpyākārabhedena jñānajñeyāvadhāraṇā ।
na cānyataradharmatvaṃ vispaṣṭaṃ tatra gṛhyate ।। 6 ।।
gṛhyamāṇasya cāstitvaṃ nāgrāhyasyāpramāṇakam ।
tasmādākāravad vastu grāhyatvād vidyate dhruvam ।। 7 ।।
ataḥ parīkṣamāṇānāṃ jñānamākāravadyadi । parasparavilakṣaṇapratibhāsāt । evaṃ sandehābhāvenādhikaraṇamanārabhyamāśaṅkya sande- hakāraṇaṃ darśayitumāha—tatra tāvadidaṃ siddhamityādinā ślokapañcakena ।
nanu siddhe grāhyasya sadbhāve tasyārthāntaratvaṃ jñānākāratvaṃ vā parīkṣituṃ śakyam ; tatsiddhireva kutaḥ ? ata āha—tatra tāvaditi । sarvaprāṇabhṛtāmavivādasiddham— yannīlādyākāraṃ kiñcid vastu prakāśata iti । tavāpi jñānajñeyayorubhayorapi prakāśa- nādubhayamaṅgīkriyatām । kimanyat parīkṣyate ? ata āha—na cāpītyardhena । eka- meva nīlākāraṃ vastu prakāśate ‘nīlam’ iti ; tathāpi yasyaiva prakāśate sarvajñānasya cāyamākārastasyaivāstu ; kaḥ parīkṣāvasaraḥ, ata āha—na cānyataradharmatvamitya- rdhena । nāyamākāro'rthajñānayoranyataradharmatayā nirddhārito'vabhāsate, yataḥ parīkṣāva- saro na syāt iti । nanvekasminnapi prakāśamāne'nyadaprakāśameva sidyati, tathāpi sidhyatyeva dvaitam ; ata āha—gṛhyamāṇasyetyardhena । tasmādekasyaiva dhruvamastitvam ; dvitīyaṃ tu ‘asti’, ‘nāsti’ iti parīkṣaṇīyamityāha—tasmādityardhena ।
tena yadi parīkṣamāṇā jñānamevākāravadadhyavasyāmaḥ, tatastanmātra eva pratyakṣa- pramāṇamityarthakalpanāṃ vijahīmaḥ; jñānasya hi svayaṃprakāśasya nārthamantareṇānupa- pattiriti sidhyatyadvaitam । atha tu bāhyasyaivākāravattayā prakāśaḥ, tatastāvat prakā- śamānatvādasti ; tasya hi jaḍatvena parādhīnaprakāśatvāt prakāśopapattaye jñānamapi kalpyata iti sidhyati dvaitam ; ata āha—ata iti dvayena ।। anyatare dharma. mā. sidhyatavadbaitam. mā. pramākīṇeti artha. mā.
tanmātre ca pramā kṣīṇā tato nāstyarthakalpanā ।। 8 ।।
yadi tvākāravattā syād bāhyasyaiveha vastunaḥ ।
tadasti gṛhyamāṇatvāt tatsidhyaivāstidhīrapi ।। 9 ।।
kiṃ tāvadatra yuktaṃ syāt jñānamākāravat kutaḥ ।
ekamākāravad vastu grāhyamityadhyagīṣmahi ।। 10 ।।
tadyadyākāravānartho bāhyaḥ kalpyeta tasya ca ।
grāhyatvamanyathā na syāditi grāhakakalpanā ।। 11 ।।
tenākāravataḥ klṛptād grāhyādākāravarjitam ।
vastvantaraṃ pṛthak kalpyaṃ grāhakaṃ niṣpramāṇakam ।। 12 ।।
tasyākalpanamicchaṃścedarthe grāhakatāṃ vada ।
saṃjñāmātre visaṃvādaḥ siddhā tvekārthakalpanā ।। 13 ।।
pūrvapakṣaṃ parigṛhṇāti—kiṃ tāvadatra yuktaṃ jñānamākāravaditi । nanu vahiravabhāsamānasya jñānākāratvaṃ kathamiti pṛcchati—kuta iti । uttaramāha— ekamākāravadityardhena । ekameva hi nīlākāraṃ vastu prakāśate, na dvayam— ityetat tāvadadhigatavanto vayam ; atastanmātramevāśrayitavyam ।।
tathāpi kathaṃ jñānākāratetyāha—tadyadyākāravāniti । arthasya grāhyākā- ratve tasya jaḍasya grāhyatvasiddhaye grāhakajñānamaṅgīkartavyamiti ।।
tataḥ ko doṣaḥ ? āha—tenākāravata iti । klṛptenaivopapattau nāklṛpta- kalpanaṃ yuktamiti ।।
śaṅkate—tasyetyardhena । vijñānavadartha eva svayaṃ prakāśo'stviti । dūṣa- yati—saṃjñāmātra ityardhena । ekameva svayaṃprakāśaṃ vastviti no matam ; tasya ‘arthaḥ’ iti saṃjñāmātraṃ bhavatocyate, nārthaviśeṣaḥ kaściditi ।। siddhaivāsti. cau. mu. prakalpyaṃ syāt. cau. ananta. mu. vadeḥ. ananta. cau. mu.
grāhyagrāhakayoraikyaṃ sarvathā pratipādyate ।
bāhyābhyantararūpaśca parikalpo mṛṣeṣyate ।। 14 ।।
matpakṣe yadyapi svaccho jñānātmā paramārthataḥ ।
tathāpyanādau saṃsāre pūrvajñānaprasūtibhiḥ ।। 15 ।।
citrābhiścitrahetutvād vāsanābhirupaplavāt ।
svānurūpyeṇa nīlādigrāhyagrāhakadūṣitam ।। 16 ।।
pratibhaktamivotpannaṃ nānyamarthamapekṣate ।
etadeva vivṛṇoti—grāhyagrāhakayoraikyamityardhena । jñānaṃ tāvad bhavatvartho vā, sarvathā siddhaṃ grāhyagrāhakayorekatvam ; tāvadevāsnābhiḥ pratipādyate, nānyaditi । nanvartho bāhyaḥ sthāyī, jñānantvāntaraṃ kṣaṇikam ; tat kathaṃ vastvaviśeṣaḥ ? ata āha—bāhyābhyantararūpaścetyardhena । ekamapekṣyaivetaraṃ bāhyam, tamapekṣya cānya- dāntaram ; advitīye vastuni mṛṣaivāyaṃ vibhāgaḥ । svaprakāśatve cāsyāpi kṣaṇi- katvameva, sthāyinaḥ suṣuptyādāvaprakāśanānasya svaprakāśatvānupapatteḥ । ato vastu- viśeṣābhāvāt saṃjñāmātre no vivāda iti ।।
nanu yadi jñānamātrameva tattvam, tasya svacchasaṃvinmātrarūpatvānnīlādergāhyā- kārasya kathamavabhāsaḥ ‘nīlamidam’ iti ? kuto'smadarthagrāhakasya na ‘aham’ iti ? ata āha—matpakṣa iti sārdhaślokadvayena । anādau saṃsāre vicitranīla- grāhyagrāhakākārabuddhijanyābhirvicitrābhirvāsanābhirjanyamānasya jñānasya svahetvānurū- pyeṇa vicitranīlādigrāhyagrāhakākāraśabalasyāvibhaktasya vicitrasyotpattisiddherna vaici- tryasiddhye'rthāpekṣā saṃbhavati । yathāhuḥ—
“avibhāgo hi buddhyātmā viparyāsitadarśanaiḥ ।
grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittibhedavāniva lakṣyate ।।” iti ।
upaplavāt—grāhyākārasamāropādityarthaḥ । karūṣitama. ananta. mu. jñānaṃ tāvadbhramatvāthoyā sarvathā. mā. jñānantvākāraṇam. bhā. kṣaṇikameva mā. mātreṇa vivā. mā. iti...anādau. mā.
anyonyahetutā caiva jñānaśaktyoranādikā ।। 17 ।।
anekakalpanāyāśca jyāyasī hyekakalpanā ।
śaktimātrasya bhedaśca vastubhedād viśiṣyate ।। 18 ।।
tasmādubhayasiddhatvājjñānasyākārakalpanā ।
jyāyasī bhavatastvarthaṃ kalpayitvā bhavediyam ।। 19 ।।
tadasiddhāvaśaktatvāt tenaivaṃ viprakṛṣṭatā ।
nanu jñānavaicitryād vāsanāvaicitryam, tataśca tadvaicitryamitītaretarāśraya- mityuktaṃ nirālambanavāde । ata uktamanādau saṃsāra iti । tadvivṛṇoti—anyo- nyahetutetyardhena । śaktiriti vāsanocyata ityekayā vāsanayakaiṃ jñānaṃ janyate, tenā- pyanyā vāsanā, tayāpyanyajjñānamiti netaretarāśrayam । na ca sarvādyasya kathaṃ siddhi- riti vaktavyam, anāditvāt saṃsārasyeti ।।
kalpanālāghavādapi jñānākārataiva nīlāderyuktetyāha—aneketyardhena । nanu bhavatāpi jñānavāsanayoḥ kalpanādastyanekakalpanā ; ata āha—śaktimātrasye- tyardhena । jñānasya śaktimātraṃ vāsanā ; tanmātrakalpanā ca vastubhedakalpanāllaghīyasī, tena śaktirūpasya saṃskārasyārthavādināpyabhyupagamāt । sarvaṃ cedaṃ jñānātiriktavāsanā- bhyupagamenoktam । paramārthatastu na jñānātiriktaṃ kiṃcidasti bauddhānām ; jñānānyeva samanantarapratyayavaśena vicitranīlapītādirūpāṇi jāyamānāni kāryakāraṇarūpāṇi santānarūpeṇa vahanti nārtharūpamapekṣanta iti ।।
ubhayavādisiddhatvācca jñānasya tadākārakalpanaivārthākārakalpanāto jyāyasī- tyāha—tasmāditi jyāyasyantena । tasmādarthākārakalpanādityarthaḥ । bhavatastvarthaṃ kalpayitvā punariyaṃ jñānākārakalpanāvaśyamaṅgīkartavyetyāha—bhavatastviti śeṣeṇa ।।
tatra kāraṇamāha—tadasiddhāvaśaktatvāditi । nīlādyākārāsiddhau hi saṃvinmātrarūpaṃ jñānaṃ nīlādikamarthaviśeṣamupasthāpayituṃ na śaknuyāt ; na hyasati saṃvi- dbhede saṃvedyabhedaḥ saṃbhavati । nīlādyākārābhāve ca saṃvidāṃ na bhedaḥ syāt, saṃvi- drūpasya sarvasamānatvāt । nīlādirūpeṇārthasvarūpaṃ jñānaṃ svarūpārthaviṣayaṃ bhavatīti yuktam ।
pratyāsannaṃ ca sambaddhaṃ grāhyaṃ mama bhaviṣyati ।। 20 ।।
yadāha—“ na hi saṃvittisattayaiva tadvedanā yuktā, tasyāḥ sarvatrāviśeṣādaviśeṣapra- saṅgāt ; tāsu tu sārūpyamāviśat sarūpayituṃ ghaṭayet”—iti । tathā—
“tatrānubhavamātreṇa jñānasya sadṛśātmanaḥ ।
bhāvyaṃ tenātmanā yena pratikarma vibhajyate” ।। iti ।
tato'vaśyamarthaviṣayatvasiddhaye jñānānāmapi nīlā dyākāravattvamaṅgīkartavyam । yadyapi svabhāvata eva saṃvido vyatibhidyeran, tathāpyasau bhedo na nīlādyuparāgamanta- reṇa śakyate nirūpayitum ; na cānirūpitabhedāḥ saṃvedyabhedamalamupasthāpayitum ; na hi saṃvidastītyetāvatā nīlāvadhāraṇaṃ saṃbhavati, tadrṛpasya pītādisādhāraṇatvāt । tasmājjñānākāro nīlādiḥ, nārthākāra iti ।
kiṃcaivamarthākāratve nīlasya tena jñānena viprakṛṣṭatā bhinnatā syāt, tata- stena tasya prakāśo na syādityāha—tenaivaṃ viprakṛṣṭeteti । matpakṣe tu saṃbhavati grāhakatvamityāha—pratyāsannamiti । pratyāsattistādātmyam । grāhyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti vakṣyamāṇeṇa sambandhaḥ । tadeṣa prayogaḥ—nīlarūpaṃ nīlavedanādabhinnam, taduttpattau saṃvedyamānatvāt tatsvarūpavat ; bhinnatve vā saṃvedyatā na syāt pītavaditi । tadanena “savedanāt” iti bauddhokto heturdarśita iti ।
