aparamapi “grāhyalakṣaṇayogāt” iti taduktameva hetuṃ darśayati—sambaddhaṃ grāhyaṃ mama bhaviṣyatīti । mama hi jñānasambaddhameva nīlam, tadātmatvāt tatsvarū- pāt । tataśca yuktaṃ tasya grāhyatvam । idameva hi grāhyalakṣaṇaṃ yat tādātmyam । tava tvarthāntaratvānna tāvat tādātmyam । na cānyo'pi kaścijjñānārthayoḥ sambandho'sti iti, yadvaśādartho grāhyalakṣaṇamanupatet । tatrāsati sambandhe grāhyatvābhyupagame sarvavi- ṣayatā syāt । tatra sarvaḥ sarvavit syāt । hetutvaṃ grāhyalakṣaṇamiti cet na, pramāṇā- bhāvāt ; na hi nīlo'rtho jñāne nīlākāramarpayatīti kiṃcana pramāṇamasti ; jñānavai- māhaśaraṃ sarūpa. mā. sadṛśāmanā. mā. pratyāsattistamiti pratyāsattistadātya- ntaṃ grāhyam. mā.
itaścākāravajjñānaṃ yasmāt tadvaḥ prakāśakam ।
svayaṃprakāśahīnasya bāhyasyopāyasabhmatam ।। 21 ।।
na cāgṛhīte jñānākhyaprakāśe'rtho'vadhāryate ।
tadadhīnaprakāśatvād dīpābhāse yathā ghaṭaḥ ।। 22 ।।
citryasya samanantarapratyayādevopapatteriti vakṣyāmaḥ । sārūpyaṃ grāhyatvamiti cet, asaṃ- nihito'pi nīlārtho nīlajñānagrāhyaḥ syāt । kiṃca kathaṃcit sārūpyaṃ sarvajñānānāṃ sarvārthairaviśiṣṭam, sarveṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt ; tataśca saiva sarvajñatāpattiḥ । sarvātmanā tu sārūpye'rthavajjñānasyāpi jaḍatvaṃ syāt । yathāhuḥ—
“ekadeśena sārūpye sarvaḥ syāt sarvavedakaḥ ।
sarvātmanā tu sārūpye jñānamajñānatāṃ vrajet ।।” iti ।
sārūpyatadutpattibhyāṃ grāhyatvamiti cet, dhārāvāhikeṣu pūrvamuttarasya grāhyaṃ syāt । tasmāt sarvā buddhayaḥ svātmānamevānubhavanti, nānyat ; svayameva cānubhūyante, na buddhyantareṇa tasyāpi buddhyantarasya svātmaparyavasāyitvāt । yathāhuḥ—
“nānyo'nubhāvyo buddhyāsti tasyā nānubhavo'paraḥ ।
grāhyagrāhakavaidhuryāt svayaṃ saiva prakāśate” ।। iti ।।
itaśca jñānākāro nīlādirityāha—itaścākāravajjñānamiti । idameva sādhayitumutpattyavasthāyāmeva jñānaṃ gṛhyata ityetat tāvad darśayati—yasmāttadvaḥ prakāśakamiti । bhavatāmapi jñānaṃ prakāśakamiti । kasya prakāśakam, taddarśayati— svayaṃprakāśahīnasyeti ।।
tataḥ kimityāha—na cāgṛhīte jñānākhya iti । na hyagṛhītaṃ prakāśakaṃ prakāśyaṃ prakāśayati, dīpaprabhāvaditi । yathāhuḥ—
“apratyakṣopalambhasya nārthadṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati” । iti । tadvatprāśakam. cau. ananta. mu. jñānākhye prakāśyo'rtha. cau. ananta. mu. cānubudhyante. mā. ityetāvadda. mā.
utpanneṣvapi cārtheṣu prakāśābhāvataḥ kvacit ।
pratibandhakayogādvā saṃvittirnopajāyate ।। 23 ।।
jñānasyotpadyamānasya pratibandho na kaścana ।
na cāprakāśarūpatvaṃ yenāsyāgrahaṇaṃ bhavet ।। 24 ।।
prāk cārthagrahaṇādiṣṭā tasyotpattiḥ sadaiva ca ।
saṃvedanaṃ bhavet tasya na cet kālāntare'pi na ।। 25 ।।
kiṃ hi tasya bhavedūrdhvaṃ prāk ca nāsīnna yena tat ।
pūrvaṃ gṛhītaṃ paścācca gṛhītamiti bhāṣyate ।। 26 ।।
jñānāntarasya cotpattiṃ prakāśo na pratīkṣate ।
tasya tasyāpi cānyena saṃvittāvasthitirbhavet ।। 27 ।।
itaścotpattāveva gṛhyata ityāha—utpanneṣvityādinā bhavettasyetyantena । prāgeva tāvadarśagrahaṇājjñānotpattirbhavatāmapīṣṭā, anutpannasya grāhakatvāyogāt । utpannāśca bhāvā dvidhaiva na gṛhyante, prakāśābhāvāt pratibandhakasadbhāvādvā yathā santamase kuḍyavyavāye ca ghaṭaḥ । na ca jñānasya pratibandhakamasti ; na ca prakāśā- bhāvaḥ, svayaṃprakāśatvāt । ato'vaśyamutpattāveva grahītavyamiti । yadi caivaṃ na gṛhyeta kālāntare'pi na gṛhyeta, aviśeṣādityāha—na ceti śeṣeṇa ।।
aviśeṣameva darśayati—kiṃ hi tasyeti ।।
jñānāntaramiti cet, tatrāha—jñānāntarasyetyardhena । ghaṭādīnāmaprakāśā- tmanāṃ svaprakāśāya prakāśāpekṣā yuktā ; na tu prakāśātmano jñānasyeti । sajātī- yāpekṣāyāṃ cānavasthetyāha—tasyeti । mā nāma saṃvedi jñānamiti cet, na ; utta- rakāle smṛtidarśanāt । evaṃ caikaviṣayajñānapravāhe evāyuḥparyavasānād viṣayāntarasa- ñcāro na syāt । yathāhuḥ—
“jñānāntareṇānubhave'niṣṭhā tatrāpi ca smṛtiḥ ।
viṣayāntarasañcārastathā na syāt sa ceṣyate ।।” iti ।।
tadaiva ca. cau. ananta mu. bhavedasya. cau. ananta. mu.
jñānapṛṣṭhena yo'pyūrdhvamarthābhāve'pi dṛśyate ।
parāmarśo'rtharūpasya sa kathaṃ copapadyate ।। 28 ।।
tadrūpamarthamālikhya yadi dhīrnopajāyate ।
bhūtakāle ca yadyarthastatpūrvaṃ nopalakṣitaḥ ।। 29 ।।
vaktāraścāpi dṛśyante vartamānārthabuddhiṣu ।
nīlo'rtho'yaṃ yato me'tra tadrūpā jāyate matiḥ ।। 30 ।।
tasmāt pūrvagṛhītāsu buddhiṣvarthopalambhanam ।
na copalabdhirastīha nirākārāsu buddhiṣu ।। 31 ।।
vivekabuddhyabhāvācca sākārasya ca darśanāt ।
itaśca jñānapuraḥsara evārthānubhavaḥ, jñānākāraśca nīlādirityāha—jñānapṛ- ṣṭheneti dvayena । jñātamarthamuttarakālaṃ parasmai kathayan jñānapuraḥsarameva smṛtyā parāmṛśya kathayati ‘jñāto mayā ghaṭaḥ’ iti, yathānubhavaṃ ca kathanam ; tathātīte'nāgate cārthe'rthākārasya nīlādeḥ parāmarśo'sati jñānākāratve nopapadyate ; na hyasatā ghīranurajyate । ato jñānapuraḥsaramevārthagrahaṇam ; jñānākāraśca nīlādiḥ; jñānapṛṣṭhena yo'pyūrdhvaṃ parāmarśo'rtharūpasya, sa kathamupapadyate ? bhūtakāle ca yadyarthastatpūrvaṃ nopala- kṣitaḥ iti nānvayaḥ tathārthābhāve yaḥ parāmarśo'rūpasya sa kathamupapadyate ? tadrūpamartha- mālikhya yadi dhīrnopajāyata iti ।।
na kevalamanubhūtārthakathanam, anubhūyamānakathanamapyevamevetyāha—vaktāra- ścāpīti ।।
upasaṃharati—tasmādityardhena । bhavatu jñānapuraḥsaramarthagrahaṇam, tathāpi kathaṃ nīlāderjñānākāratvamityāha—na cetyardhena । ‘nīṃlamidam’ iti nīlākāraṃ vastu prathate, na nirākāramiti ।।
evamartho'pi sākṣātkāraḥ syāt, yadyākāradvayaṃ dṛśyate ; natu tadastītyāha— vivekabuddhyabhāvācceti । yadi na kiñcidapi sākāraṃ vastu dṛśyeta, tato'rthavajjñānaṃ sākāraṃ na syāt ; dṛśyate kiñcit sākāraṃ vastvityāha—sākārasya ca darśanā- diti । tasmāddhetutrayājjñānaṃ sākāram, nārtha ityāha—sākāretyardhena । bopapadyate. cau. ananta. mu.
ākāravattayā bodho jñānasyaiva prasajyate ।। 32 ।।
na hyevaṃ kalpanā śakyā nirākārādito matiḥ ।
gṛhyate'rthastataḥ paścāt sākāraḥ saṃpratīyate ।। 33 ।।
ākāravattvabhedo hi jñātvā śakyeta bhāṣitum ।
prāg buddhigrahaṇādarthe saṃvittirneti sādhitam ।। 34 ।।
na cārthākāra evāyaṃ jñānārūḍhaḥ pratīyate ।
na hi so'ntaḥpraveśāya paryāpto nārthahānaye ।। 35 ।।
itthaṃbhāve pramāṇaṃ ca tasya vaktuṃ na śakyate ।
tadīyapratibimbatvametasmādeva neṣyate ।। 36 ।।
niścandrabimbarūpaṃ hi dṛṣṭaṃ yena divā jalam ।
sa rātrau khe ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā jānāti pratibimbatām ।। 37 ।।
prathamahetuṃ vivṛṇoti—na hyevamiti ।।
dvitīyaṃ vivṛṇoti—ākāravattvetyardhena । yadi tvagṛhītaiva buddhirarthaṃ gṛhṇī- yāt tatastasyā nirākāratvamarthasya cākāravattvaṃ siddhyet, na tu tadastītyukta- mityāha—prāgityardhena ।।
kecittvāhuḥ—satyaṃ nīlākāratayā jñānaṃ gṛhyate, na tvasāvākāraḥ tasyaiva ; kintvarthākāra evāsau jñāne samārūḍho dṛśyata iti ; tān nirākaroti—na cetya- rdhena । kāraṇamāha—na hītyardhena । kathaṃ khalvarthadharmaḥ svāśrayaṃ hitvāntaraṃ jñānaṃ praviśediti ।।
jñānākāratayā gṛhyamāṇasya niṣpramāṇakamarthadharmatvamityāha—itthamityardhena । mā nāmārthaṃ vihāsīt ; arthasthasyaiva pratibimbamidaṃ nīlarūpaṃ svacchādarśasaṅkāśe jñāne prakāśate, tatrāha—tadīyetyardhena । etasmāditi pramāṇābhāvādityarthaḥ ।।
evaṃ hi pratibimbatā pramāṇavatītyāha—niścandreti ।। sākāra. ananta. mu. mā. vattvabhedo'tra. ananta. mu.
vijñāne na kadācit tu prāṅnirākāradarśanam ।
bāhye vākāravattādhīryenaivaṃ kalpanā bhavet ।। 38 ।।
śabdagandharasādīnāṃ kīdṛśī pratibimbatā ।
jñāne ca gṛhyamāṇasya kathaṃ syādarthadharmatā ।। 39 ।।
bāhyābhyantaradeśatvānna cārthajñānayormithaḥ ।
saṃparko'sti yato mohādavivekamatirbhavet ।। 40 ।।
asaṃmūḍhasya cādṛṣṭerna saṃmohaprakalpanā ।
kalpyamāne'tha vāpyevaṃ na dvayoravatiṣṭhate ।। 41 ।।
saṃsargadharma ākārastasmādeva na yujyate ।
na tvevamatrāstītyāha vijñāna iti ।।
cākṣuṣāṇāmeva pratibimbaṃ dṛṣṭam, ataḥ kathaṃ śabdādīnāṃ jñāne darśanami- tyāha—śabdagandharasādīnāmityardhena । na kevalaṃ pratibimbatvamapramāṇakam, artha- dharmatvamapyapramāṇakamityāha—jñāne cetyardhena ।।
mā bhūt pratibimbam, jñānārthau tu saṃsṛṣṭau saṃmohādaviviñcannarthadharmaṃ nīlaṃ jñāne'dhyavasyati, atrāha—bāhyābhyantaradeśatvāditi ।।
kiñca sarvasya jagataḥ saṃmohakalpanamatisāhasam ; na hi kañcidapyasaṃmūḍho dṛśyate ityāha—asaṃmūḍhasyetyardhena । tadevaṃ satyapi saṃmohakalpanā na dvayorevāva- tiṣṭhate ; arthasahasrasyākāraḥ saṃsargasaṃmūḍhamekavadavabhāsata iti kiṃ na kalpyata ityāha—kalpyamāna ityardhena ।।
kecittvāhuḥ—na jñānadharmo nīlādiḥ, na cārthasya nirākārayoreva tayoḥ saṃsṛ- ṣṭayorayaṃ niṣpadyate cūrṇaharidrayorivāruṇimeti ; tānnirākaroti—saṃsargadharma ityardhena । rasānāṃ ca. cau. ananta. mu. jñāne na /?/ cādṛṣṭe na sa. cau. ananta. mu. dapikiñcanārtha. mā.
deśabhedādasaṃsagoṃ mūrtāmūrtaptayā tathā ।। 42 ।।
trailokyena prasaṅgācca saṃsargo naikakālatā ।
na cāpyārjavataḥ sthānaṃ jñānenārthamya vidyate ।। 43 ।।
sarvathā kalpanāyāṃ ca cakṣuṣāpi rasādayaḥ ।
gṛhyeran sarvabhāvānāmaṇvākāgaśca tadgatāḥ ।। 44 ।।
na cāpi viṣayatvena sthāne saṃsargakalpanā ।
viṣayatvaṃ hi kīdṛk syāt prāgākāgepalambhanāt ।। 45 ।।
na hyasaṃcetito bhāvo viṣayatvena kalpyate ।
viṣayatvāt tadākāra ākāgad viṣayaśca te ।। 46 ।।
tasmādityetad vivṛṇoti—deśabhedādasaṃsarga iti । kiñca mūrtayoreva saṃsargā- dākāro niṣpadyate, na mūrtāmūrtayoḥ ; nāpyamūrtadvayasya ; tadiha jñānaṃ tāvadamūrtam, arthastu yadi mūrtā yadi vāmūrto dvedhāpi nānayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayorākāro niṣpadyata ityāha—mūrtāmūrtatayā tatheti ।।
nanu tasyāpi deśabhede kālaikyāt saṃsargo bhaviṣyatyatrāha—trailokyenetya- rdhena । jñānasamayavartināṃ sarveṣāmīdṛśasaṃsargasambhavāt sarveṣāmākārāḥ jñāna ekasminnu- palabhyeranniti । yadi jñānārjavena ābhimukhyenārthasyāvasthānaṃ saṃsargaḥ, tatrāha—na cāpītyardhena । jñānasyābhimukhyābhāvāditi ।।
kiñca, yenaivārthena jñānaṃ saṃsṛjyate, tenaiva sarvātmanā prāpnoti ; na hi saṃsarge kañcidaṃśaḥ parihartuṃ śakyate ; tataścaikasmin ghaṭādau bhāve cakṣuṣānubhūyamāne tadgatā rasādayaḥ paramāṇavaścānubhūyerannityāha—sarvatheti ।।
viṣayatayāvasthānamarthasya saṃsargaḥ, na cātiprasaṅga iti cet tatrāha—na cetyardhena । kāraṇamāha—viṣayatvamityardhena ।।
kimiti viṣayatvaṃ na bhavatyatrāha—na hītyardhena । evaṃ cetaretarāśrayaṃ syādi- tyāha—viṣayatvādityardhena । viṣayatvarūpādeva hi saṃsargādākāraniṣpattiḥ; ākā- ca saḥ. cau. ananta. mu. tadahamajñānam. mā
dvayorākāranirmuktaṃ sattvaṃ saṃsṛṣṭatāṃ tathā ।
svarūpataḥ paricchidya vaktumityādi yujyate ।। 47 ।।
na cāpyasyeha sadbhāvaḥ prāggṛhīto na copari ।
na hyākāravinirmuktaṃ grāhyamastīti bhāṣitam ।। 48 ।।
tasmādarthena saṃsargo niṣpramāṇaka eva te ।
jñānavaicitryasidhyarthaṃ na cāstyarthasya kalpanā ।। 49 ।।
tadadhīnaṃ hi vaicitryaṃ kva dṛṣṭaṃ yena kalpyate ।
raniṣpattau copalabhyamānatvalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayatvam, nirākāropalambhābhāvāt ; tato'nyo- nyāśrayamiti ।।
kiñcaivaṃvidhe viṣaye saṃsargadharmatvamākārasya yuktamityāha—dvayoriti।।
na caivamastītyāha—na cetyardhena । kathamityāha—netyardhena ।।
upasaṃharati—tasmādityardhena । nanvasatyapyarthasaṃsarge yadidaṃ nīlapītādi- rūpeṇa jñānānāṃ vaicitryam, tannopapadyate ; na ca samanantarapratyayamātrādasyotpattiḥ saṃbha- vati, tasya sarvatrāviśiṣṭatvādavilakṣaṇena ca vilakṣaṇakāryaniṣpattyayogāt । evamā- lokendriyamanaskārāṇāmapi sādhāraṇyādeva vaicitryānimittatvam । tadidaṃ nīla- rūpamanyeṣu satsvapi kadācidanutpadyamānaṃ kāraṇabhūtamarthasaṃsargaṃ kalpayatītyatrāha— jñānavaicitryasiddhyarthamiti । na hyarthasaṃsargakṛtaṃ vaicitryam, yatastaddarśanādarthasaṃsargaḥ kalpyata iti । kiñca, saṃsargadharmākāravādināṃ prāk saṃsargānnirākāro'rthaḥ jñānaṃ ca; tatkathaṃ saṃsargādākāro niṣpadyate kathaṃtarāṃ ca tadvaicitryamityāha—nirākāreṇetyardhena ।
“tatra tāvadidaṃ siddham” iti ślokamārabhya “nirākāreṇa” iti śloka- paryantaṃ vijñānākāravādaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ । ye tu jñānavaicitryasiddhyarthamarthamapi nīlapī- tādivicitrākāraṃ kalpayanti, teṣāṃ sautrāntikāṇāmapi tulyamidaṃ nirākaraṇam— tadadhīnaṃ hi vaicitryaṃ kva dṛṣṭaṃ yena kalpyate । iti । ayamabhiprāyaḥ—sa hi nanvenam. mā. omitted. vijñāna...karaṇam. mā.
nirākāreṇa cotpattirvaicitryākārayoḥ katham ।। 50 ।।
nirākārācca viṣayād buddhyākāro'tivismayaḥ ।
smṛtisvapnādibodhena syādanākāratā tava ।। 51 ।।
na hi tatrārthasaṃsargaḥ kevalā vāsanaiva tu ।
hetutvenopapanneti saiva jāgraddhiyāmapi ।। 52 ।।
nīlalakṣaṇo'rthaḥ pratyakṣo vā syādanumeyo vā ? na tāvat pratyakṣaḥ, aparokṣadhiyopa lambhābhāvāt; nānumeyaḥ, nīlajñānalakṣaṇaliṅgaikasamadhigamye tasminnīlajñānasya tadu- tpattilakṣaṇasambandhagrahaṇābhāvāt ; nityānumeye tasminnīlajñānasya tadadhīnatā tatkā- ryatā na kvacid dṛṣṭetyarthaḥ ।
nanu kādācitkatvamagnyādau hetumattvena vyāptama ; nīlajñāne'pi tadupala- bhyamānaṃ kāraṇamavagamayati; indriyaviṣayāntarasadbhāve'pi kvacidanutpādādubhayavai lakṣa- ṇyena tadanumīyamānaṃ nīlameva syāt । naitadevam ; nīlābhāve'pi nīlajñānadarśanena vāsanādhīnatvānnaikāntato nīlajñānaṃ nīlamevāvagamayati । nanu ca yathā sākāro'rtho nirākāraṃ vijñānamanumāpayati, evaṃ nīlākāramapi vijñānaṃ anīlamarthamanumāpayatītyā- śaṅkyāha—nirākāreṇa cotpattirvaicitryākārayoḥ katham ।। iti ।।
nanu cakṣurindriyamanīlamapi nīlajñānaṃ janayati; tatkathamucyate—nirākā- reṇa cotpattirityāśaṅkyāha—nirākārāccetyardhena । ālambanatvena hyarthasya kāraṇa tvam ; na ca nīlākārasya jñānasyānīlamālambanaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ । taduktam—
“svarūpaviparītasya kathaṃ grāhyaṃ bhaviṣyati” iti ।
saṃsargadharmākāravādinastvayamaparo doṣaḥ—arthābhāve'pi smārtaṃ vijñānamutpadyate svapnāvasthāyāṃ ca ; tatrākāropalambho na syāt, arthābhāvena saṃsargābhāvādityāha— smṛtīti tripādyā ।
ato yathā svapnāvasthāyāmanapekṣitabāhyārthaṃ vāsanāmātrajanyaṃ nīlapītādyākāraṃ vijñānam, evaṃ jāgradavasthāyāmapi bhaviṣyatīti na sākāravijñānapakṣe parikalpanāyāṃ kiñcit pramāṇamityāha—kevaleti tripādyā ।।
anvayavyatirekābhyāmevaṃ jñānasya gamyate ।
ākāro na hi bāhyasya jñānāpeto nidarśyate ।। 53 ।।
bāhyārpeto mayā yadvat tasmāt saṃsargavāgiyam ।
nirākāre'pi vijñāne vāsanāsveva yujyate ।। 54 ।।
dvayorapyeka ākāra ityetaccāpramāṇakam ।
deśabhedādasaṃsargād dvayoścānavadhāraṇāt ।। 55 ।।
evamevārthabuddhyoḥ syāt sādṛśyānnāvibhaktatā ।
bhede jñāte hi sādṛśyaṃ nājñāte syāt khapuṣpavat ।। 56 ।।
tathā dvicandramāyādāvanyathārthe vyavasthite ।
yā syādākārasaṃvittirnāsāvarthanibandhanā ।। 57 ।।
anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ caitadavagamyate, yaduta vijñānasyaivāyamākāro nārthasya tatsaṃsargasya vā; arthābhāve'pi svapnāvasthāyāmākāradarśanād vijñānabhāve cādarśa- nādityāha—anvayeti sapādaślokena ।
tasmāt saṃsargavādināmapi vāsanāvijñānayorya saṃsargaḥ, taddharmo'yamākāra ityabhyupagantavyam ; nārthajñānayoḥ, arthābhāve'pi svapnāvasthāyāmākāradarśanādi- tyāha—tasmāditi tripādyā ।।
na cāpyarthajñānayorekenākāreṇākāravattā, saṃsargābhāvena dvayānavadhāraṇe tatra pramāṇābhāvādityāha—dvayoriti ।।
atha satyapi dvitve dvayānavadhāraṇaṃ sādṛśyāt, tanna; bhedāvagatipūrvakatvāt sādṛśyasya; anavagate tu bhede śaśaviṣāṇakhapuṣpayorapi sādṛśyābhāvādityāha— evamiti । evamevāpramāṇakamityatideśaḥ ।।
arthākārapakṣe ca dvicandramāyādāvākāropalambho na syāt, arthābhāvādi- tyāha—tatheti ।। bāhyopetaḥ. ananta. mu. tasyāpramāṇatā. cau. ananta. mu. asaṃsarga cau. mu.
nakṣatraṃ tārakā tiṣyo dārā ityevamādiṣu ।
naikatrārthe viruddhatvālliṅgānekatvasambhavaḥ ।। 58 ।।
parivrāṭkāmukaśunāṃ kuṇapādimatistathā ।
dīrghahrasvatvabuddhiśca hyekasminnapyapekṣayā ।। 59 ।।
ghaṭatvapārthivadravyasajjñeyādimatistathā ।
yugapadgrāhakāṇāṃ ca na syādaikātmyavattayā ।। 60 ।।
nārthe hyekatra yugapad viruddhākārasambhavaḥ ।
pratyayānāṃ tu bhinnatvād bhavecchaktyanusārataḥ ।। 61 ।।
nirapekṣaṃ svarūpeṇa tasmājjñānaṃ yadākṛti ।
tathārtho na yathārthaṃ tu jñānamutpadyate kvacit ।। 62 ।।
yadapyekasminnarthe viruddhadharmadvayapratibhāsaṃ vijñānatrayamutpadyate—nakṣatram, tārā, tiṣyaḥ; dārāḥ iti bahutvapratibhāsaścārthākārapakṣe na syāt ; ekasya viruddhānekadha- rmatvaṃ ca vipratiṣiddhamityāha—nakṣatramiti ।।
atraivodāharaṇāntaramāha—parivrāḍityādinā sārdhena ślokena ।
tatraitat syāt—ekasyāpyarthasya viruddhānekākāratā kālabhedena naiva viru- ddhyate yathaikatra dravye raktāraktatve ityāśaṅkyāha—yugapadityardhena । parivrāṭkāmu- kaśunāmekasmin pramadārūpe'rthe yugapadanekākāratāvasīyata ityarthaḥ ।।
tasmādekatvādarśasya yugapadanekākāratā nopapadyate, vijñānānāṃ tu bhinnatvā- dupapadyata ityāha—nārtha iti sapādena । śaktiśabdena vāsanāmāha ; vāsanā- kāreṇeti yāvat । etaduktaṃ bhavati—nīlajñānajanitā vāsanā anapekṣitabāhyārthā svapnāvasthāyāmiva jāgradavasthāyāmapi nīlajñānaṃ janayatīti । tasmādarthasyāpi nīlā- kāratāmicchatā vijñānasyāpi sābhyupagantavyā, tadadhīnatvādarthasadbhāvasya ; na tu jñānasya nīlākāratārthādhīnā, tadabhāve'pi darśanādityāha—tasmāditi tripādyā ।। tvapārthivadrabyasaṃjñe. cau. ananta. mu. ca. ananta. mu.
itthaṃ vijñānatantratve ko nvarthaṃ kalpayiṣyati ।
dhīranāropitākārā svātmanyevopayokṣyate ।। 63 ।।
naitadasti tvayaivaikaṃ grāhyaṃ grāhakamiṣyate ।
na caikasyaivamātmatve dṛṣṭāntaḥ kaścidasti te ।। 64 ।।
agnyādayo ghaṭādīnāṃ prasiddhā ye prakāśakāḥ ।
na te prakāśyarūpā hi prakāśasyānapekṣaṇāt ।। 65 ।।
grāhyatvaṃ tu yadā teṣāṃ tadākṣaṃ grāhakaṃ matam ।
akṣagrahaṇavelāyāṃ grāhikā dhīrbhaviṣyati ।। 66 ।।
tataḥ kimiti cedityāha—itthamiti । arthanīlatā ced vijñānanīlatā- ghīnā, tarhi nīladvayopalambhābhāve vṛthā arthakalpanamiti ।।
evaṃ prāpta ucyate—naitadastītyardhena । ayamabhiprāyaḥ—sarvasyāsya bhāvi- tasyāyamarthaḥ ‘nīlamidaṃ’ iti vijñānamutpadyamānamātmānameva prakāśayadutpadyata iti ; na hi nīlapītādayaḥ paraprakāśyāḥ ; nāpi ‘nīlam’ ityanubhavaḥ paraprakāśakaḥ ; nīlādaya eva tu prakāśyaprakāśakobhayākārayuktāḥ । taduktam—
“nānyo'nubhāvyo buddhyāsti na tasyānubhavo'paraḥ ।
grāhyagrāhakavaidhuryāt svayaṃ saiva prakāśate ।।” iti ।
tadunupapannam, evaṃvidhatvakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt । tatra dṛṣṭāntābhāvenānumānaṃ nirākartumāha—na caikasyetyardhena ।।
nanvagnyādayaḥ svaparaprakāśakā iṣyanta eva ; kimucyate “na caikasyaivamā- tmatve” ityāśaṅkyāha—agnyādaya iti । na hi cakṣurindriyamāloke pravartamā- namālokaṃ sahakāriṇamapekṣate ; yadi hyanāloka ivāloke'pi ālokaṃ sahakāriṇa- mapekṣate, tataḥ prakāśāntarābhāvādātmana evātmani prakāśakatvaṃ syāt ; na tu tadastītyarthaḥ ।।
yadi hyagnyādayaḥ svaprakāśā na bhavanti, tatsadbhāve tarhi kiṃ pramāṇamityā- śaṅkyāha—grāhyatvamityardhena । akṣasyaiva tarhi grāhyagrāhakabhāvena dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ bhava- tītyāśkyāha—akṣagrahaṇavelāyāmityardhena । viṣayapratipattyanyathānupapattijanyā hi buddhirakṣaṃ gṛhṇātītyarthaḥ ।। tvayaikaṃ hi grāhyam. cau. mu. ṇakāle. cau. ananta. mu.
tasyāṃ tu gṛhyamāṇāyāmanyā dhīrgrāhikeṣyate ।
nanvātmā grāhako grāhyo bhavatābhyupagamyate ।। 67 ।।
kathaṃciddharmarūpeṇa bhinnatvāt pratyayasya tat ।
grāhakatvaṃ bhavet tatra grāhyaṃ dravyādi cātmanaḥ ।। 68 ।।
yastu nātyantabhedo'tra kva vāsāviṣyate mayā ।
pratyāsattinimittā tu pratyagātmapravartitā ।। 69 ।।
asmatprayogasaṃbhinnā jñānasyaiva tu kartari ।
bhavantī tatra saṃvittiryujyetāpyātmakartṛkā ।। 70 ।।
na cākṣagrāhikaiṃva buddhiḥ svaprakāśiketyāha—tasyāṃ tvityardhena । aprati- pattyanyathāpratipattijanyā hi buddhirakṣagrāhikāṃ buddhiṃ gṛhṇīyādityarthaḥ ।
ātmanastarhi grāhyagrāhakabhāvena dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti codayati— nanvityardhena ।।
tatrāpi dharmabhedena grāhyagrāhakayorvaiśeṣikābhimatena bhedo'stītyāha— kathañciditi । bodharūpatayā tasya grāhakatvaṃ dravyarūpatayā tasya grāhyatvamityarthaḥ । ‘pratyayasya tat’ iti bodharūpatāmāha ।।
atyantabhedastu ghaṭatajjñānayorasmābhirnaiveṣṭa ityāha—yastvityardhena । pratyā- sattilakṣaṇena sambandhenātmasambandhino bodharūpasya ātmasambandhinyāmeva dravyarūpa- tāyāṃ pravartitetyāha—pratyāsattītyardhena । kadācidātmasambandhinī bodharūpatāsya viṣayaḥ, tatra ghaṭādayo bodhyāḥ; kadācit pratyāsattilakṣaṇena sambandhenātmagatadravya- rūpatā viṣayaḥ, tadātmaivātmano bodhya ityucyate; tatrāpi na grāhyagrāhakayoraikya- mityarthaḥ ।।
idānīṃ svamatena parihāramāha—asmatprayogasaṃbhinneti । apiśabdasyāya- marthaḥ—bhavatyātmasambandhinī jñātṛtaiva grāhyā jñātṛtaiva grāhikā, tathāpi grāhyagrāha- yat. ananta. mu. pravṛttitā. ananta mu. grāhakatva. mā. tatrāpi grāhya. mā.
na cātra karaṇajñānagrāhakākāravedanam ।
grāhyatvaṃ yena buddheḥ syādabhinnatve'pi pūrvavat ।। 71 ।।
anyākārāpi saṃvittiryadyanyaviṣayeṣyate ।
jñānākārāpi saṃvittiḥ kasmānnārthasya kalpyate ।। 72 ।।
kayorbhedaḥ; yasmād viṣayabhedena saiva bhidyate; na hi paṭagatajñātṛtāyāmaghaṭaṃ jānāti; tatra yadā ghaṭādiviṣayā jñātṛtā grāhyā bhavati, tatrātmaviṣayā grāhikā ‘ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmi’ iti । etaduktaṃ bhavati—ghaṭaṃ jānantamātmānaṃ jānāmāti । athāpi kiṃ tarhi tena yuktaṃ yadyātmakartṛkā saṃvittirvijñānasya kartari samupajāyate ? etaduktaṃ bhavati—yuktaṃ tadyadātmakartṛkāyāṃ saṃvittau saṃvedanakarturevātmanaḥ karmatvam ; svayaṃ- prakāśatve vā karmatvābhāve'smatprayogasaṃbhinnatvāt saṃvitteḥ ‘ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmi’ ityasmadarśapratibhāsanādityarthaḥ ।।
idānīmātmajñānena saha viṣayajñānasya vailakṣaṇyamāha—na cātreti । na tvatra nīlānubhave ‘nīlamaham’ ityātmatayā bhāsante nīlādayaḥ; ‘nīlam’ ityanātmatayā pratibhāsanāt । yadi vijñānasambandhyākāratrayaṃ karaṇarūpatā bodha- rūpatā grāhakarūpatā ca nīlādigatatvena cetyante, tataḥ svayaṃ sā buddhirnīlādibhāvena prakāśetābhinnatvenātmanā, nātra nīlādau karaṇajñānagrāhakākāravedanamasti, yena buddhireva nīlādibhāvena prakāśeta । ākāravedanamiti ca karaṇādiṣu pratyekaṃ saṃbadhyate । yadi nīlādayo grāhakatvenāvabhāsante, grāhako vā nīlādigrāhyatayāva- bhāsate, tadā pratibhāsabalenābhinnasyaiva prakāśyaprakāśakabhāvo bhavet । pūrvavaditi atrātmano dṛṣṭāntatvenopapādanam ।।
atha satyapyanātmatayāvabhāse viparyayajñāna iva grāhakasyātmabhūtā eva nīla- pītādayaḥ, yathoktam—“yadantarjñeyam, tadbahirivāvabhāsate” ityāśaṅkyāha— anyākārāpīti । yadi vinaiva bādhakapratyayenāvabhāsitasyānyathātvam, tadātmā- na tvatra. ananta mu. anyarūpāpi. cau. mu. kārā hi. mā. tayāmāghaṭajñānāti. mā. tadyadātma. mā. na yatra. mā. citranīlā. mā. yatve tadbahiravabhā. mā.
abhinnatvaṃ yadā ceṣṭaṃ grāhyagrāhakavastunoḥ ।
tadānyatarasaṃvittau dvyākāragrahaṇaṃ bhavet ।। 73 ।।
yadā tu grāhyamākāraṃ nīlādi pratipadyate ।
na tadā grāhakākārā saṃvittirdṛśyate kvacit ।। 74 ।।
tasmādabhinnatā cet syāt tasyāpyanubhavo bhavet ।
grāhyo vā nānubhūyeta grāhakānanubhūtivat ।। 75 ।।
grāhakagrahaṇe'pyevaṃ grāhyasaṃvedanaṃ bhavet ।
śuddhameva nirākāraṃ grāhakaṃ saṃvidasti hi ।। 76 ।।
vabhāse'pi anātmaivātmavat syāt ; viparyajñāne tu yuktamavabhāsitasyānyathātvaṃ bādhakapratyayasadbhāve । api ca viparyayajñāne'pyanātmāna eva nīlapītādayaḥ, tathāva- bhāsanāt । bādhakapratyayasamavadhānena tvetāvad bhavatu, yadutāvidyamānā nīlapītā- dayo'vabhāsanta iti ; na tu grāhakānanyatve kiñcana pramāṇamasti । taduktam— “bāhyālambanatāyāṃ nau vivādaḥ ।” iti ।।
evaṃ pratibhāsabalena bhedamuktvā adhunaitadeva tarkeṇa darśayitumāha—abhi- nnatvamiti ।।
yadi grāhyanīlāderabhinnameva grāhakaṃ bhavet, grāhakādyanubhavābhinnaṃ nīlapī- tādi yathoktam—“sahopalambhaniyamāt” iti, tadā grāhyagrāhakābhedena nīlā- dayo'vabhāseran ; grāhakaścānubhavo'vabhāseta, na tu nīlādayo grāhakatayāvabhāsante, anyaniṣṭhasya nīlāderapratibhāsanādityāha—yadā tviti ।।
nīlatadbuddhyorabhinnatve tu grāhyasya grāhakatayāpyavabhāso bhavet, grāhakatayā pratibhāsābhāve vā grāhyatayāpi pratibhāso na syādityāha—tasmāditi ।।
evameva grāhakasya grāhyatayāpyavabhāso bhavedityāha—grāhaketyardhena । asti tu nīlapītādigrāhyaparāmarśaśūnyasya grāhakasya saṃvedanamityāha—śuddhamityardhena ।।
grāhyādabhinnatāyāṃ ca sā saṃvittirna yujyate ।
grāhako vā na gṛhyeta tadgrāhyānanubhūtivat ।। 77 ।।
tathā ca grāhyasaṃvittau grāhakagrahaṇe'pi vā ।
grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittirnāstyeva syād dvayorapi ।। 78 ।।
sa bahirdeśasambaddha ityanena nirūpyate ।
grāhyākārasya saṃvittirgrāhakānubhavādṛte ।। 79 ।।
paraṃ prati na sādhyatvādarthasyākārasiddhaye ।
bahirdeśena sambandho na hetutvāya kalpate ।। 80 ।।
tasmād bahiritīhedaṃ niṣkṛṣṭaṃ grāhakāṃśataḥ ।
saṃvedyaṃ nīlapītādi pratyakṣāderudāhṛtam ।। 81 ।।
nīlatadbudhyorabhinnatve grāhakasya nīlādiparāmarśaśūnyā saṃvittiryuktetyāha— grāhyādityardhena । grāhyanīlādiparāmarśābhāvena ca grāhakaparāmarśo na syādityāha— grāhako vetyardhena ।।
tathā ca nīlalakṣaṇo'rtho grāhyatayā na saṃcetyate ; tadgrāhako vā nīlādi- rbāhyatayā evamubhayagrahaṇe'pyubhayagrahaṇaṃ nāstītyāha—tathāceti ।।
yadetat saṃvedanaparāmarśena ‘nīlamidam’ ityanātmatayā pratibhāsāt grāhaka- syāyamanātmā nīlādirgṛhyata iti pratipāditam, tatra “sa hi bahirdeśasambaddhaḥ pratya- kṣamupalabhyate” iti bhāvyaṃ yojayitumāha—sa bahiriti । “sa bahirdeśasambaddhaḥ” ityanena grāhakaśūnyasya nīlādergrahaṇaṃ darśayati । apare tvetad bhāṣyamevaṃ vyāca- kṣate—nīlapītādi dharmī, arthasyāyamākāra iti sādhyo dharmaḥ, bahirdeśasambandhi- tayā pratīyamānatvāditi hetuḥ । tānnirākartumāha—paraṃ prati tviti । prativādino vijñānamātratayā bahirdeśasyāsiddhatvādasiddho heturityarthaḥ ।।
tasmāt pūrvaiva vyākhyā śobhanetyāha—tasmāditi ।। yathā ca ananta. mu. yathāvaditi cau. mu. hetutvādityarthaḥ mā.
na pūrvaṃ jñāyate buddhirityatraitad vadiṣyate ।
grāhakasyaiva saṃvittirlakṣyate grahaṇe kvacit ।। 82 ।।
na smarāmi mayā ko'pi gṛhīto'rthastadeti hi ।
smaranti grāhakotpādaṃ grāhyarūpavivarjitam ।। 83 ।।
tasmādabhinnatāyāṃ ca grāhye'pi smaraṇaṃ bhavet ।
grāhakasmṛtinirbhāsā tatrāpyeṣaiva dṛśyate ।। 84 ।।
tadatyantāvinābhāvānnaikākāraṃ hi jāyate ।
anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ siddhaivaṃ bhinnatā tayoḥ ।। 85 ।।
grāhyāṃśo grāhakāṃśena gṛhyate grāhakaḥ punaḥ ।
gṛhyeteti na vaktavyaṃ grāhakāntaravarjanāt ।। 86 ।।
tarkeṇāpi yad grāhakasyāyamanātmā nīlādiriti pratipāditam “abhi- nnatvaṃ yadā ceṣṭam” ityādinā, tatrāpi bhāṣyaṃ yojayitumāha—na pūrvamiti ।।
“satyaṃ pūrvaṃ buddhirutpadyate, na tu pūrvaṃ jñāyate” ityādi bhāṣyaṃ darśayati grāhyād bhinnatvaṃ grāhakasya, nīlādigrāhyābhāve'pi grāhakasmaraṇasadbhāvādityāha— na smarāmīti ।
grāhyādabhinnatve tu grāhakasya grāhakasmaraṇe grāhyasyāpi smaraṇaṃ syādityāha— tasmādityardhena । grāhakasmaraṇarūpā tu saṃvittirutpadyate, natu grāhyasmaraṇarūpetyāha— grāhakasmṛtinirbhāsetyardhena ।
tadatyantāvinābhāvena tu nīlatadbuddhyoḥ grāhyasmaraṇaviviktaṃ grāhakasmaraṇaṃ na syādityāha—tadatyantetyardhena । tasmānnīlādigrāhyasmaraṇābhāve'pi grāhakasmara- ṇād grāhakaparāmarśaśūnyasya nīlādeḥ grahaṇādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ siddhā nīlatad- buddhyoḥ bhinnatetyāha—anvayavyatirekābhyāmityardhena ।।
nanu grāhyādabhinnatve'pi grāhakasya grāhyagrahaṇe yadagrahaṇaṃ tad grāhakāntarā- bhāvenānyathāsiddhaṃ na bhedaṃ sādhayati ; grāhakasya tu grāhakasamavadhāne sati yuktaṃ graha- ṇamiti codayati—grāhyāṃśa iti ।। bhāsāt. cau. mu.
grāhyāṃśenāpyaśaktatvānna tasya grahaṇaṃ bhavet ।
grāhakatvena caitasya hīyetaiva dvirūpatā ।। 87 ।।
grāhake gṛhyamāṇe ca grāhyamātraprasañjanam ।
na syādākāra ekaśceditarasyāpi nāstitā ।। 88 ।।
udbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ ca grāhyāgrāhyatvadarśanam ।
yathā dīpaprabhādīnāṃ rūpamātropalambhanam ।। 89 ।।
divā cāgneḥ samīpasthaiḥ sparśa evopalabhyate ।
gandhavad dravyavṛttau ca gandhasyaivopalambhanam ।। 90 ।।
na guṇāntarasaṃvittiryathātrābhibhavāt tathā ।
nākārāntarasaṃvittiḥ grāhyagrāhakabuddhiṣu ।। 91 ।।
na ca grāhyāṃśa eva tasya grāhakaḥ, grāhyatvena tasyāśaktatvādityāha— grāhyāṃśenetyardhena । grāhakatve grāhyāṃśasyāpi grāhakatvena grāhakamātrarūpatayā vijñānasya prakāśyaprakāśakatā na syādityāha—grāhakatvenetyardhena ।।
grāhake ca gṛhyamāṇe grāhyamātratayā punarapi prakāśyaprakāśakatā na syādi- tyāha—grāhaka ityardhena । grāhyākāramātre ca grāhyasyāpyākārasya grāhakāpekṣatvenābhāve siddhe vijñānasyāpyabhāvaḥ syādityāha—na syādityardhena ।
itarasyāpi, bhinnatvena nīlatadbuddhyorgrāhyagrahaṇe grāhakasyāgrahaṇaṃ grāhakagra- haṇe ca grāhyasyāgrahaṇamudbhavābhibhavenetyāha—udbhavābhibhavābhyāmityardhena ।।
atraivodāharaṇamāha—yatheti ślokadvayena tathāvarjam । yathā pradīpakāryasya prabhāsvarūpasya sparśaguṇayuktasyāpi rūpamātrāvagatī rātrau divā cāgneḥ samīpavartinaḥ prabhādravyasya sparśāvagatiḥ; yathā ca gandhānumeyagandhadravyasya gandhamātropalabdhi- rabhibhavāttu rūpasparśādayo nopalabhyante, tathā satyapyabhinnatve grāhyagrāhakayo- rgrāhyagrahaṇe grāhakasyāgrahaṇaṃ tadabhibhūtatvādityāha—tathetisaśeṣeṇa nākārāntare- tyardhena ।। tyāśaṅkyāha. mā. svarūpasparśa. mā. tathāca mā. grāhakatagrāhya. mā.
grāhyādananyabhūto'pi kaścinnaivopalabhyate ।
nityānityādayo dharmāḥ śabdādigrahaṇe yathā ।। 92 ।।
abhedaṃ vābhyupetyāyaṃ prasaṅgo yadi gīyate ।
ekasmin gṛhyamāṇeṃ'śe na gṛhyetāparaḥ katham ।। 93 ।।
tasmādyat syādyadā yogyaṃ tasyaiva grahaṇaṃ tadā ।
dvayaṃ ca tvadupanyastaṃ śaktyabhāvānna gṛhyate ।। 94 ।।
kuto'yamekavastutve yogyāyogyatvasambhavaḥ ।
udbhāvābhibhavātmatvaṃ kathaṃ caikasya kalpitam ।। 95 ।।
ananyatve tasmin gṛhyamāṇe parasparasyāgrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭamityāha—grāhyādananya- bhūto'pīti । śrotrendriyeṇa hi śabde'vasīyamāne nityānityatvaparāmarśaśūnya eva avasīyate । ayaṃ ca nityānityatvādayaḥ tadātmabhūtā evetyarthaḥ ।।
yadi cābhedamabhyupagamya grāhyagrahaṇe grāhakasyāpi grahaṇaprasaṅga ityucyate, tadā gṛhyata eva ; keyaṃ prasaṅgāpattirityāha—abhedamiti ।।
ayogyatvena caikasmin gṛhyamāṇe parasyāgrahaṇamityāha—tasmādityardhena ।
tasmād yadgrāhyagrahaṇe tadgrāhakasyāgrahaṇamuktam “yadā tu grāhyamākāraṃ nīlādi pratipadyate” ityatra grāhakagrahaṇe vā tadgrāhyasyāgrahaṇamuktam “na smarāmi mayā ko'pi” ityatra tadayogyatvenetyāha—dvayaṃ ca tvadupanyastamiti । tasmādabhi- nnatve ca yadekasyāgrahaṇe satītarasyāgrahaṇaṃ tacchaktyabhāvādityāha—śaktyabhāvānna gṛhyate iti । tasmādabhinnatve'pi grāhyagrāhakasya yad grāhyagrahaṇe satyagrahaṇaṃ grāha- kasya tad grāhakāntarābhāvenābhibhūtatvena yogyatvābhāvena veti paricodanārthaḥ ।।
tatrānantaroktameva yogyāyogyatvapadaṃ nirākartumāha—kuta ityardhena । grāhya- grāhakayoraikye sati yogyāyogyatvavibhāgo na syādityarthaḥ । udbhavābhibhavāvapyekasya nopapadyeyātāmityāha—udbhavetyardhena ।। dyadgrahaṇe grāha. mā.
ekāṃśābhibhave ca syāditarābhibhavo'pi te ।
tathā tasyābhibhūtatvāt grāhyatvaṃ na ca yujyate ।। 96 ।।
ayogyatāpi kalpyaivaṃ dṛṣṭāntā ye'tra kīrtitāḥ ।
rūpādibhedāt tatra syādudbhavābhibhavādyapi ।। 97 ।।
yadāpyekāntato bhedo rūpāderna parasparam ।
tadāpi dravyarūpasya pariṇāmastathā tathā ।। 98 ।।
ananyatve'pi na grāhyamiti yaccābravīd bhavān ।
kṛtakatvādidharmāṇāṃ dhībhede'nanyathā katham ।। 99 ।।
na hyanyat pratyayādasti bhinnād grāhyasya bhedakam ।
na ceyattaiva bhedasya deśato mūrtito'pi vā ।। 100 ।।
grāhakābhibhave tadananyatve grāhyasyāpyabhibhavaḥ syāt ; tataśca grāhakagraha- ṇābhāve grāhyasyāpi grahaṇaṃ na syādityāha—ekāṃśābhibhava iti ।।
ayogyatāpyevameva kalpanīyetyāha—ayogyatāpi kalpyaivamiti । yattu rūpasparśavataḥ prabhādravyasya rūpamātrāvagatī rātrau gandhānumeyasya ca dravyasya gandhamā- tropalabdhirityuktam ; tatrāha—dṛṣṭāntā iti tripādyā । rūpasparśayorbuddhibhedena bhede sati yuktamudbhavābhibhavatvena grahaṇāgrahaṇakalpanamityarthaḥ ।।
athāpi rūpasparśayoraikyaṃ tathāpi rūparūpatayā pariṇatatvāt prabhādravyasya sparśābhāvenaivāgrahaṇaṃ rātrau divā ca sparśarūpatayā pariṇatatvena rūpasyāgrahaṇami- tyāha—yadāpīti ।।
yattu śabdasyātmabhūtā api kṛtakatvānityatvādayaḥ śabdagrahaṇe na pratibhāsanta ityuktam, tadanubhāṣyāha—ananyatve'pi na grāhyamiti । śabdānityatvakṛtakatvā- dīnāṃ bhinnapratibhāsasaṃvedyatvenānyatve sati nīlapītayoriva kathamananyatvamityarthaḥ । buddhibheda eva ca grāhyabhede pramāṇaṃ nānyadityāha—na hītyardhena । tena samānadeśa- vyavasthitayorapi kṛtakatvānityatvayo rūpasparśayoriva buddhibhedena bhedaḥ ; bhinnadeśayo- rapi buddhibheda eva bhede pramāṇam, na bhinnadeśavyavasthitatvamityāha—na ceyattaivetyardhena ।। tatrābhibhūta. cau. mu. abhinnatve'pi. cau. mu. tadanyatve. mā. Omitted na. mā.
kārakāṇāṃ hi sambandhaḥ kāryaiḥ kṛtakatocyate ।
vibhāgo'vayavānāṃ ca bhavet kvacidanityatā ।। 101 ।।
buddhyāderātmarūpādisthānaṃ nāśitvamucyate ।
nityatvaṃ sarvadā sattā vastutvaṃ saiva kīrtyate ।। 102 ।।
pramāṇajñānasambandhaḥ prameyajñeyatocyate ।
sarvatra cātra bhinnatvamasti kenacidātmanā ।। 103 ।।
tasmādyathaiva rūpāderdeśabhedādibhirvinā ।
buddhibhedena bhedo'sti tathaivātra pratīyatām ।। 104 ।।
kiṃrūpaṃ punaḥ śabdānityatvābhyāṃ bhinnaṃ kṛtakatvamityāha—kārakāṇāmi- tyardhena । kriyākārakasambandhaḥ kṛdantādutpannena bhāvapratyayenocyate, kṛttaddhitasamāseṣu sambandhābhidhānasmaraṇāt । anityatvamapi sāvayavasya ghaṭāderavayavavibhāga ityāha— vibhāga ityardhena ।।
niravayavasya tu buddhyāderghaṭajñātṛrūpatayā pariṇatasyātmanaḥ punarātmatayāvasthā- namanityatvamityāha—buddhyāderityardhena । nityatvasyāpi rūpaṃ darśayitumāha— nityatvaṃ sarvadā saceti । nityatvavad vastutvamapi saiva sattetyāha—vastutvaṃ saiva kīrtyate iti । nanu yadi sarvadā sattā vastutvam, anityasya ghaṭādeḥ vastutvaṃ na prāpnoti ; atha sattā vastutvam, tatrāpi abhāvasya vastutvaṃ na syāt, asadrūpatvāt । ucyate—saiva sattā tāvadvastutvam, “sarvadā” ityetadatra nātidiśyate ; abhā- vo'pi sadrūpa eva, ‘san ghaṭābhāvaḥ’ iti satpratyayasyāviśeṣāt । vakṣyati—
“tāmutpattyādyanusyūtāṃ satteti pratijānate ।” iti ।।
prasaṅgāt prameyatvajñeyatvayorapi svarūpamupadarśayitumāha—pramāṇetyardhena । pramāṇasambandhaḥ prameyam ; jñānasambandho jñeyamiti । sarvatra cātra buddhibhedena bhedo'- stītyudbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ grahaṇāgrahaṇaṃ prakalpayāma ityāha—sarvatretyardhena ।।
tasmādyathaiva rūpāderabhinnadeśasyāpi buddhibhedena bhedaḥ, tathānityatvakṛtaka- tvādīnāmapītyāha—tasmāditi ।। kāraṇānāṃ hi sambandhaḥ cau. mu. kāryaḥ. mā.
atyantabhinnatāsmābhirnaiva kasyacidiṣyate ।
sarvaṃ hi vasturūpeṇa bhidyate na parasparam ।। 105 ।।
sarvaṃ ca kṛtakatvādi kriyāhetvādyapekṣayā ।
gṛhyate tadasaṃvittāvabhede'pi na gṛhyate ।। 106 ।।
jñāne naivaṃvidho bhedo nāpekṣānyatra vidyate ।
paraspareṇa cāpekṣā syāccet sannihitaśca saḥ ।। 107 ।।
nanu grāhakamityevaṃ grāhyamityapi vā matiḥ ।
nīlādigrahaṇe nāstītyapekṣā kathamucyate ।। 108 ।।
mā bhūdevaṃ tathāpyatra dvyākāraṃ grahaṇaṃ bhavet ।
evaṃ cāgṛhyamāṇe vā jñāne dvyākāratā katham ।। 109 ।।
atyantabhedastu rūpasparśayorapi naivāsmābhiriṣṭaḥ sadrūpatayā rūpāderapyekatvā- dityāha—atyantabhinnateti ।।
api ca śabdānanyayorapi kṛtakatvānityatvayoryuktaṃ yacchabdagrahaṇe satyagra- haṇam, tadgrahaṇasāmagrībhedāt ; kriyāhetugrahaṇasāpekṣaṃ kṛtakatvagrahaṇam ; śabdagra- haṇaṃ tu śrotrasāpekṣamityāha—sarvaṃ ca kṛtakatvādīti ।।
na vijñāne grāhyagrāhakayorbhedo nāpi grahaṇasāmagrī bhidyata ityāha—jñāne naivamityardhena । atha grāhyanīlādigrahaṇaṃ grāhakasāpekṣam, grāhakasya ca grāhyāpekṣatva- mityastyeva sāmagrībheda iti, tatrāpyāha—paraspareṇetyardhena । tathāpi paraspara- sannidhānenaikagrahaṇenobhayaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ ।।
nanu nīlādayo naiva grāhyatayāvabhāsante, ‘nīlam’ iti nīlamātratayāvabhā- sanāt ; grāhyatā tu nīlādergrāhakasambandhena tadānībhevotpadyate ; na tu nīlānubhave nīlasya tatkarmatāvabhāsata iti kathaṃ nīlagrahaṇasya grāhakāpekṣitvamiti codayati— nanu grāhakamiti ।।
tatra parihāramāha—mā bhūdityardhena । grāhyagrāhakayorabhedena grāhyagrāhaka- bhāvena nīlādayo'vabhāseranniti vayaṃ brūmaḥ । grāhyagrāhakabhāvena cāprakāśamānamapi nīlaṃ svaprakāśamiti citramityāha—evamityardhena । nanu yadyapi nīlādayo grāhyagrāhaka- grāhakabhedena. mā.
uttarottaravijñānaviśeṣādyā prakalpyate ।
grāhakākārasaṃvittiḥ smaraṇāccānumānikī ।। 110 ।।
ekākāraṃ kila jñānaṃ prathamaṃ yadi kalpyate ।
tatastadviṣayāpyanyā tadrūpaiva matirbhavet ।। 111 ।।
ghaṭavijñānatajjñānaviśeṣo'to na sidhyati ।
grāhakākārasaṃvittau tvākārapracayo bhavet ।। 112 ।।
jāyate pūrvavijñānaṃ dvyākāraṃ yatra tatpunaḥ ।
tasyātmīyaśca pūrvau ca viṣayasyāvupaplutau ।। 113 ।।
pareṣvākāravṛddhyaivaṃ pūrvebhyo bhinnatā tathā ।
grāhyavatsmaraṇātpaścātsaṃvittau grāhakaḥ purā ।। 114 ।।
bhāvena nāvabhāsante, tathāpi viṣayākāravat grāhakākāratāpi tatrāstītyanumānā- davagamyate, ghaṭajñānatajjñānayoḥ viśeṣāt ; uttarakālaṃ ca viṣayākāravad grāhakā- kāratāpi smaraṇādavagatā । taduktam—
“ghaṭavijñānatajjñānaviśeṣāt taddvirūpatā ।
smṛteruttarakālaṃ ca na hyasāvavibhāvitaḥ ।।” iti ।।
tadetad dūṣayitumupanyasyati—uttarottareti ।।
tatrottarottaravijñānaviśeṣādityetat tāvad vyākhyātumāha—ekākāramiti sārdhena ślokena । yadi ghaṭajñānaṃ viṣayāvabhāsameva kevalamutpadyate, tadā tadviṣaya- syāpi vijñānasya viṣayākāratve ghaṭākāratvenāviśeṣaḥ syāt ; yadi tu ghaṭākāravat svākāramapi tat, tadā ākāradvayasaṅkrāntau satyāṃ tryākāratvena viśeṣo bhave- dityāha—grāhakākārasaṃvittāviti sārdhena ślokena ।।
pareṣvapyevamevākāravṛddhyā pūrvasmāt bhinnatā vaktavyetyāha—pareṣvityardhena । “smaraṇāccānumānikī” iti yaduktam, tadvyākhyātumāha—grāhyavadityardhena । ghaṭa- vijñānotpattyuttarakālam ‘gṛhīto mayā ghaṭaḥ’ iti ghaṭākāratadgrāhakākāratayā smara- ṇād ghaṭavijñānotpattikāle viṣayākāratā saṃvinniṣṭhā gṛhītaivetyanumīyata ityarthaḥ ।। yatra yatparam. ananta. mu. ghaṭajñānajñānam. mā. tvena ghaṭākāratvāt. cākāradvaya. mā. ratāvatsaṃviṣṭā. mā.
na tāvadevamākārān paśyāmaḥ pracayānvitān ।
viṣayavyapadeśācca narte jñānanirūpaṇam ।। 115 ।।
tasmājjñānātmanaikatve grāhyabhedanibandhanaḥ ।
saṃvittibhedaḥ siddho'tra kimākārāntareṇa naḥ ।। 116 ।।
nirākāratvasāmye'pi yathākāravatāṃ dhruvam ।
bhedaḥ svābhāvikastadvajjñānānāṃ kiṃ na siddhyati ।। 117 ।।
smṛteruttarakālaṃ cetyetanmithyaiva gīyate ।
tadaiva hyasya saṃvittirarthāpattyopajāyate ।। 118 ।।
“uttarottaravijñānaviśeṣāt” iti yaduktaṃ tad dūṣayitumāha—na tāvadi- tyardhena । na hi ‘ghaṭo'yam’ ityatra vijñāne ākāradvayapratibhāso'sti ; nāpyākā- ratrayapratibhāsaḥ tadviṣaye vijñāna ityarthaḥ । nanu nirākāratvena ghaṭajñānatajjñānayoḥ viśeṣo na syādityāha—viṣayavyapadeśācceti sārdhena । yasmādviṣayanirūpaṇapūrvakaṃ vijñānanirūpaṇam—nīlajñānaṃ pītajñānamiti, tasmāt jñānātmanaikatve'pi ghaṭajñāna- tajjñānayorviṣayabhedena viśeṣaḥ siddhātmaiva, kimapratīyamānenākārapracayena pūrvasya ghaṭa- viṣayatvāduttarasya ca tajjñānaviṣayatvāt ?
yathā cākāravattvasāmye'pi bhavatpakṣe ghaṭajñānatajjñānayoḥ svābhāviko bhedaḥ tathā nirākāratve'pi ghaṭajñānatajjñānayoḥ bhaviṣyatītyāha—nirākāratvasāmye'- pīti ।।
yadapyuttarakālaṃ smaraṇāt ghaṭajñānotpattikāle viṣayākāravat grāhakākāra- tānubhūtaiveti, tatrāpyāha—smṛteruttarakālañceti । ayamabhiprāyaḥ—yadi tāvat ghaṭajñānotpattikāle viṣayākāravat grāhakākāratāpi saṃvinniṣṭhā nānubhūyate, kiṃ tadā smaraṇopanyāsena ? athānubhūyate, tatrottarakālaṃ viṣayagrahaṇādyanyathānupapattyā grāhakaviṣayaṃ pramāṇamevopajāyata iti smaraṇabhramaḥ ।। sanniviṣṭānubhūyate. mā. pakṣayite. mā.
gṛhītameva yaccoktaṃ tadabhedānna tadyataḥ ।
nāsmābhirvākpravṛttestvaṃ nimittamanuyujyase ।। 119 ।।
grāhyagrāhakataivāsya kenacinnopalabhyate ।
pratyakṣajñānapakṣe ca naiṣā syādānumānikī ।। 120 ।।
ekākāre ca vijñāne yadyanyo'pyatra kalpyate ।
sahasrākārataikasya kasmānna parikalpyate ।। 121 ।।
yattu grāhye gṛhyamāṇe grāhako'pi tadabhedāt gṛhyata eva, keyamaniṣṭāpatti- riti, tatrāha—gṛhītamiti ।।
yadi vayameva brūmaḥ—kathaṃ grāhye gṛhyamāṇe grāhako'pyavabhāsamāno gṛhyata ityucyate, tadā yujyetāpi vaktuṃ tadabhedāditi ; grāhyagrāhakabhāvena tu nīlādayo na pratibhāsanta iti vayaṃ brūma ityāha—grāhyagrāhakatetyardhena । asmin pakṣe ca svayaṃ- prakāśasya jñānasya kathaṃ grāhakākāratā smaraṇānumeyā syādityāha—pratyakṣetyardhena ।।
viṣayamātrāvabhāse ca nīlapītādijñāne yadi grāhakākāratāpyatraiva bhāsa- mānāstīti parikalpyate, tadā nākāravyavasthā dvyākāraṃ vijñānamityāha—ekā- kāre ceti । tasmād grāhyagrahaṇe grāhakasyāpratibhāsanāt grāhakagrahaṇe'pi grāhyasyeti siddhā nīlatadbuddhyorbhinnatā ।।
evaṃ tāvadaparasādhanamekaṃ vijñānatattvam—
“avibhāgo hi buddhyātmā viparyāsitadarśanaiḥ ।
grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittibhedavāniva lakṣyate ।।”
ityevaṃvadadbhiryaduktam tannirākṛtam “naitadasti tvayaikaṃ hi” ityādinā “ekākāre ca vijñāne” ityevamantena । apareṣāṃ tu grāhyavādināmetad darśanam—vijñānasyaiva kaściddhamoṃ grāhakaḥ kiñcid grāhyam ; tena grāhakāddharmāntaraṃ grāhyamiti, tad dūṣaṇā- gṛhītamiti ananta. mu. vākyavṛtteḥ. cau. mu. tadā bhavet gṛ. mā. Omitted. yadi. mā. aptmatpakṣe. mā. vyavasthā dvyākāram. mā. Omittted. tannirākṛtam. mā.
grāhyagrāhakayorbhedo nanvastyeva parasparam ।
siddho naḥ pakṣa evaṃ syānna jñānatvādabhedataḥ ।। 122 ।।
bhinnābhinnaṃtvamekasya kuto'tra parikalpitam ।
tvayā sāṃkhyamatenaivaṃ muktvā buddhasya śāsanam ।। 123 ।।
ekaṃ ced grāhakaṃ grāhyaṃ kuto bhinnatvavāgiyam ।
bhinnaṃ cet kathamucyeta tasyaikatvaṃ punastvayā ।। 124 ।।
ekajñānādananyatvāt grāhyagrāhakayormithaḥ ।
ekatvena bhavejjñānaṃ grāhyaṃ grāhakameva vā ।। 125 ।।
tatra cānyatarāpāye dvitīyāpāyataḥ punaḥ ।
jñānasyāṃśadvayāsattvānnaiḥsvābhāvyādabhāvatā ।। 126 ।।
bhinnābhyāṃ vāpyabhinnatvād bhedo jñānātmano bhavet ।
tatsvātmavat tataścaivaṃ siddhaṃ vastudvayaṃ hi naḥ ।। 127 ।।
yopanyasyati sma—grāhyagrāhakayorityardhena । parastvagṛhītābhiprāya āha—siddho naḥ pakṣa evaṃ syāditi । grāhyagrāhakayorbhedenābhyupagame sati siddhā dvaitasiddhi- rityarthaḥ । itaraḥ svābhiprāyamāha—na jñānatvādabhedataḥ iti । ekajñānānanyatvena grāhyagrāhakayorabhedo'stītyarthaḥ ।।
tadanupapannamityāha—bhinnābhinnatvamiti । sāṅkhyamate tad bhavatu, bhavataṃstu parasparaviparyayātmakatvena bhinnābhinnayoḥ virodhe sati kathamekatra niveśa ityartheḥ ।।
virodhameva darśayitumāha—ekañcediti ।।
na caikajñānādanyatvena grāhyagrāhakabhūtayordharmayorekatvaṃ syāt । tatra parasparā- pekṣatve satyanyatarasyābhāvenānyatarasyāsattvaṃ syāt । tatrānyatarābhāve sati jñānasyā- pyabhāvaprasaṅgādityāha ślokadvayena—ekajñānāditi ।।
jñānātmano vā bhinnābhyāṃ grāhyagrāhakadharmābhyāmabhede sati tatsvātmavat bhedaḥ syāt । tataścāsiddhādvaitasiddhirityāha—bhinnābhyāṃ veti ।।
tatra ca grāhyanīlāderananyaniṣṭhatvenāvabhāsanādarthatvam, grāhakasya ca bodhā- tmakatvena jñānatvam ; evameva sthite yadi rūḍhyā dvayorapi grāhyagrāhakayoḥ jñāna- bhavedgrāhyaṃ jñānam. mā. sa caika. mā.
tayośca yadi saṃjñeyaṃ jñānamityastvathāpi vā ।
jñānaṃ jñāyata ityartho dhīrbhāve karaṇe'pi vā ।। 128 ।।
sarvathā vastubhedo naḥ siddhaḥ śabdo yathāruci ।
pravartatāṃ na nastatra kācid vipratipannatā ।। 129 ।।
atha satyapi bhinnatve grāhyaṃ jñānāntaraṃ vadet ।
jñānatve tasya kā yuktiḥ pūrvoktā yadi seṣyate ।। 130 ।।
jñānaṃ jñānamitītthaṃ tu na dvayoranuvartate ।
vyatiriktaṃ ca sāmānyaṃ tvayā nābhyupagamyate ।। 131 ।।
śabdābhidheyatvamabhyupagamyate, karmasādhanena vā jñānaśabdena grāhyo'bhidhīyate; bhāvaka raṇasādhanena vā grāhakasyābhidhānam, na kaścid vārayatītyāha—tayośca yadīti ।।
siddhe vastubhede śabdo yathāruci pravartatām, na nastatra kācid viprati- pannatetyāha—sarvatheti ।।
apareṣāṃ śūnyavādināṃ darśanam—grāhakād bhinnameva grāhyaṃ nīlapītādi; tatra jñānameva jñānayoreva bahirgrāhyagatabhāvaḥ sahotpannayoḥ taduktam—“pratyayo- vyabhicāritvātsaha” iti kramotpannayorvā nīlajñānaṃ hyātmasadṛśaṃ vijñānāntaraṃ janayati । tatra yajjanyaṃ tad grāhyaṃ yajjanakaṃ tad grāhakamiti taduktam—
“[ śaktyarpaṇāt kramāt ] bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti cet grāhyatāṃ viduḥ ।
hetutvameva tattva(yukti)jñā jñānākārārpaṇakṣamam ।।” iti ।
tadetaddūṣayitumupanyasyati sma—athetyardhena । tadetannirākartumāha—jñānatva ityardhena ।।
yadi tāvad vijñānaśabdābhidheyatvena grāhyaṃ nīlapītādyanavabodharūpamapi vijñānamucyate tadvaditi tadiṣyate । taduktam—“śabdo yathāruci pravartatām” iti । atha jñānatvasāmānyānuvṛttau grāhakavad grāhyaṃ nīlapītādi jñānamucyate, tatrāpyāha—jñānamiti ।।
na hi dvayoranubhavānubhāvyayoḥ janmatve sati jñānātmakasāmānyayogo bhavatābhyupagamyate । abhyupagame vā vyatirekapakṣe grāhyasya jñānānātmakatvena grāhaka- syāpi vijñānarūpatā na syādityāha—grāhyagrāhaketyardhena । bhavet. cau. mu. ktā tasya seṣyate. ananta. mu. mitīdaṃ tu. cau. mu. idamardhaṃ na dṛśyate. mā. tadvati taduktam. mā. sati jñānātmakatvena. mā.
grāhyagrāhakayośceṣṭā na jñānātmakatā bhavet ।
tadrūparahitatve ca jñānābhāvaḥ prasajyate ।। 132 ।।
tābhyāṃ ca tasya sambandhe pratyekaṃ vyatiṣajya vā ।
bhedasāvayavatvādidoṣo vaiśeṣikādivat ।। 133 ।।
yathā hi teṣāṃ jātyādau doṣā hyuktāḥ parairamī ।
tathaivaiṣāṃ prasajyante bhinnābhinnārthasaṅgatau ।। 134 ।।
tābhyāmavyatireke vā bhedaḥ pūrvokta eva te ।
sādṛśyāpohasāmānyakalpanā vārayiṣyate ।। 135 ।।
vastvantarasya cābhāvāt tvayāpoho'pi duṣkaraḥ ।
nājñānaṃ nāma kiñcit syādapohyaṃ jñānavādinaḥ ।। 136 ।।
grāhyagrāhakarūparahitatvena jñānasya sāmānyatve sāmānyasyāpyabhāvaprasaṅga ityāha—tadrūpetyardhena ।।
atha vyatiriktamapi tābhyāṃ sambaddhamiṣyate, tadanupapannam ; vaiśeṣikādivat pratyekaṃ kārtsnyena sambandhe vyāsajya vā sambandhe bhedasāvayavatvādidoṣaprasaṅga ityāha—tābhyāñceti ।।
vaiśeṣikādivaditi yaduktaṃ tad vivṛṇoti—yathāhīti । yānyeva yuṣmābhirvaiśeṣikādipratijñāte vṛttivikalpena dūṣaṇānyuktāni, tānyeva jñānasvalakṣa- ṇasya sāmānyasyābhyupagame bhavatāmapi prāpnuvantītyarthaḥ ।।
avyatirekapakṣe dūṣaṇamāha—tābhyāmityardhena । bhinnābhyāmanubhāvānubhāvyā- bhyāṃ jñānatvasāmānyasyābhedena tatsvātmavad bhedaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ । nāpi jñānatvasāmānyaṃ sādṛśyam, apoharūpaṃ vā, dvayorapi nirākariṣyamāṇatvādityāha—sādṛśyetyardhena ।
na ca jñānavajjñānamātravādino jñānatvasāmānyamapoharūpaṃ saṃbhavati, jñānavyati riktavastvantarājñānarūpābhāvenāpohyābhāvādityāha—vastvantarasyeti । vyatireke tayorjñānānna. cau. mu. ca. cau. mu. Omitted. vaiśeṣikādivat. mā. sāmānyābhyupa. mā.
apoho na hyabhāvasya kathaṃcidupapadyate ।
vastvantaramabhāvaḥ syādapohyatvācca vastutā ।। 137 ।।
tenājñānanivṛttau hi jñāne'nyārthaḥ prasajyate ।
kalpitaṃ syādapohyaṃ cennātyantāsatyakalpanā ।। 138 ।।
buddhirajñānanirbhāsā tavājñānaṃ prakalpitam ।
tataśca jñānamevaikamapohyatvena saṃmatam ।। 139 ।।
na cātmāpoha evāsti kvacit sāmānyakalpane ।
vṛkṣasya na hyapohyatvaṃ vṛkṣeṇaiva kadācana ।। 140 ।।
apohye caiva vijñāne jñānatvaṃ na bhavet tava ।
vṛkṣatvaṃ na hyapohyeṣu ghaṭatvādiṣu yujyate ।। 141 ।।
nāpi bhavatpakṣe jñānābhāvarūpamajñānamapohyam, avastutvena karmatvābhāvādi- tyāha—apoha ityardhena । apohyatve cābhāvasya vastutvaṃ syāt ; tatra ca jñānavyati- riktavastvantaraprasiddhirityāha—vastvantaramityardhena ।।
etadevopasaṃharati—tenetyardhena । nāpi kalpitamajñānamapohyam, jñānavyati- riktavastvantarābhāvena kalpanāyā apyaśakyatvādityāha—kalpitamityardhena ।।
kalpyamānamapi tadajñānapratibhāsaṃ vijñānameva kalpyeta; na ca jñānatvasāmā- nyasya samānajātīyaṃ vijñānamevāpohyamityāha—buddhirityādisārdhena ।
atraivodāharaṇamāha—vṛkṣasyetyardhena ।।
yadi ca jñānatvasāmānyamajñānapratibhāsaṃ vijñānamevāpoheta, tadā tasmin vijñāne jñānatvaṃ na syāt ; na hi ghaṭādiṣu vṛkṣatvamasti; tataśca ajñānaśabdārtha- rūpābhyupagamena śūnyavādahāniprasaṅga ityāha—apohye ceti sārdhena । nāyāmapya. mā.
tataścājñānamevārtha iti bhinnārthatā bhavet ।
ajñānapratyayaścāyaṃ kimālambana iṣyate ।। 142 ।।
na tāvajjñānanirmuktamajñānaṃ grāhyamasti te ।
nanu vastu niṣiddhaṃ tadabhāvaḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate ।। 143 ।।
bhāvo na gṛhyate yena tasyābhāveṣu kā kathā ।
svāṃśaparyavasānaṃ ca tulyamatrāpi kāraṇam ।। 144 ।।
tena jñānāntaraṃ vā syād grāhyamātmāṃśa eva vā ।
svarūpaviparītaṃ ca kathaṃ grāhyaṃ pratīyate ।। 145 ।।
yathoṣṇe'nuṣṇadhīrnāsti jñāne'pyajñānadhīstathā ।
tena na jñānamātratve syādapohyaṃ kathañcana ।। 146 ।।
yaccedamajñānapratibhāsaṃ vijñānamevāpohyaṃ kalpitam, tasya bhavatpakṣe kimāla- mbanamiti vaktavyam; nājñānaṃ nāma ghaṭādijñānamātravādino'stītyāha—ajñāna- pratyaya iti ।
jñānābhāvo'pi nālambanam, avastutvena vastujñānotpādakatvābhāvāditi codyapūrvakamāha—nanu vastviti ।
svayaṃprakāśakatvena bhāvāntaramevājñānapratibhāsaṃ vijñānaṃ gṛhṇīyādityāha— svāṃśaparyavasāna ityardhena ।।
tena jñānāntaramevājñānapratibhāsaṃ vijñānaṃ gṛhṇīyāt ātmānameva vā, na jñānābhāvamityāha—tenetyardhena । etadapi nopapadyata ityāha—svarūpetyardhena । katha- majñānapratibhāsaṃ vijñānamātmānaṃ svajñānāntarasvarūpaviparītamālambata ityarthaḥ ।।
atraiva dṛṣṭāntamāha—yathoṣṇe'nuṣṇadhīrnāstīti । dārṣṭāntike yoja- yati—jñāne'pyajñānadhīstatheti । tasmājjñānamātravādino na jñānatvasāmānya- mapoharūpamityusaṃharati—tenetyardhena ।। ityaminnārtha. cau. mu. na ca vastu. cau. mu. ntare svarūpa. mā.
grāhyagrāhakayoścāto na jñānātmasamānatā ।
tasmādanyataratredaṃ jñānatvaṃ saṃpratīyatām ।। 147 ।।
tatrāpyubhayasiddhatvād grāhakasyeti gamyate ।
vastubhede prasiddhe ca vyapadeśo yathāruci ।। 148 ।।
jñānamastūbhayaṃ vārtho grāhako vārtha ucyatām ।
buddhyorayugapadbhāvānna dvayormeyamānatā ।। 149 ।।
kṣaṇikā hītyanenoktamartho hyeṣā prasajyate ।
anyonyanirapekṣatvād yugapaccāpi janmani ।। 150 ।।
tasmānna jñānatvasāmānyānuvṛttau grāhyagrāhakayorjñānarūpatetyāha—grāhyagrāha- ketyardhena । tasmādanyataratra jñānatvayogāt jñānarūpatā; sā cobhayasiddhatvāt grāhakasya yuktetyāha—tasmāditi । tasmāt siddhaṃ grāhakād bhinnaṃ grāhyamajñānarūpaṃ ca । vyapa- deśastu yathāruci pravartatām, na tatra kācid vipratipannatā—ityuktamityāha— vastubheda iti ।।
api ca na tāvat kramotpannayoḥ vijñānayormeyamānatvena grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ, uparitanajñānakāle pūrvasyātītatvāt । nāpyatītamevoparitanasyālambanam, ‘nīla- midam’ ityaparokṣatayā pratibhāsāta pratyakṣasya cāparokṣārthaviṣayatvābhyupagamāt tadāha—buddhyorityardhena ।।
tacca “kṣaṇikā hi sā, na buddhyantarakālamavasthāsyate” ityanena bhāṣye- ṇoktamityāha—kṣaṇikā hītyanenoktamiti । atha pūrvabuddhiruparitanabuddhikālaṃ yāvat tiṣṭhatyeva, artha eva tarhi setyāha—artho hyeṣā prasajyata iti । nāpi yugapadutpa- nnayoḥ, kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvāt ; kāraṇaṃ ca meyaṃ mānasyeṣyate; tadāha—anyonyeti ।
bhavatpakṣe ca tarhyarthajñānayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvena kathamarthasyālambanatvam ? sarvasya hi vijñānaṃ prati kāraṇatvamarthasyāpratipannasya vā pratīyamānasya vā pratipannasya yate. cau. mu. hyekaḥ. cau. mu. Omitted. na. mā. na. mā.
mānameyatvanāstitvaṃ kiyākārakavarjanāt ।
arthavijñānayoratra yā mitiṃ prati saṅgatiḥ ।। 151 ।।
kāryakāraṇabhāvo'yaṃ nānyatraivaṃ ca dṛśyate ।
niyamaśca na labhyeta savyadakṣiṇaśrṛṅgavat ।। 152 ।।
idaṃ kāryamayaṃ heturdvayaṃ nānyonyasaṃśrayāt ।
tadbhāvabhāvitāmātraṃ haitukairnaiva varṇyate ।। 153 ।।
paurvāparyavinirmuktaṃ kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇam ।
gavāśvasya yathā nāsti paurvāparye'pi tattathā ।। 154 ।।
vā ? na tāvadapratipannasya, cakṣurādivadagrāhyatvaprasaṅgāt । nāpi pratīyamānasya itaretarāśrayatvaprasaṅgāt ; pratīyamānatārthasya vijñānādhīnā, tacca tadadhīnamityabhyupa- gamaḥ । nāpi pratipannasya, vijñānaṃ vinā jaḍātmakasya pratipannatvābhāvāt ; tathā ca sati vijñānābhāva ityāśaṅkyā—arthavijñānayoriti । asmatpakṣe tvarthātiśa- yamitijanakatvena jñānārthayoḥ grāhyagrāhakabhāva upapadyate, arthātiśayamitijanakatvena hi vijñānasya grāhakatvamarthasya ca vijñānajanyātiśayaviṣayatayā grāhyatvam, na tu kramotpannayoḥ jñānayoryugapadutpannayorvā tadastītyarthaḥ ।
yugapadutpannayośca kāryakāraṇaniyogabhāvena grāhyagrāhakaniyamo na syādi- tyāha—niyamaśceti tripādyā । na ca yugapadutpattau dvayorapi parasparādhīnatā itare- tarāśrayatvenetyāha—dvayaṃ nānyonyasaṃśrayāditi ।
nanu kramotpannayorapi bījāṅkurayoḥ tadbhāvabhāvitvena kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ ; tacca yugapadutpannayorapi jñānayoḥ pradīpaprabhayorivāstyevetyāśaṅkyāha—tadbhāvabhāvitā- mātramiti । paurvāparyavyavasthitisahitaṃ tadbhāvabhāvitvaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ gamayati ; na tadbhāvabhāvitvamātram ।।
satyapi paurvāparye tadbhāvabhāvitvaśūnye kāraṇabhāvo nāstītyāha—gavāśva- syetyardhena ।। hetuḥ kenaiva kalpyate. cau. mu.
yugapañjāyamāne'pi santatyantaraje kṣaṇe ।
rūpādiṣu ghaṭe yadvat tasmād pūrvamavasthite ।। 155 ।।
yo yasmājjāyate paścāt sa tatkāryamitīṣyatām ।
hetuhetumatāṃ siddhaṃ yaugapadyanidarśanam ।। 156 ।।

bhāgayoryaugapadye'pi tathaiva syānnirākriyā ।
na ca śaktyarpaṇadvārā krameṇālambanaṃ bhavet ।। 158 ।।
tadbhāvabhāvitvamapi paurvāparyaśūnyaṃ na kāryakāraṇabhāvāyālamityāha—yuga- paditi tripādyā ।
tasmāt pūrvamavasthite yasmin yo jāyate, sa tatkāryamityupasaṃharati— tasmāditi tripādyā ।
yat punaryugapadutpannayorapi pradīpaprabhayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo'stītyuktam, tada- nubhāṣya dūṣayitumāha—hetuhetumatāmiti sārdhena । tatraitat tāvad vaktavyam—pradī- paprabhayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva eva nāsti dvayorapyekasāmagrījanyatvena ; tailāgnivartisaṃ- yogena hi tejodravyamutpadyamānaṃ ghanaṃ svacchaṃ ca samupajāyate । tatra yaddhanaṃ tatpradīpa- śabdenocyate ; svacchasya prabhāśabdenābhidhānam । evamānamanonnamanayorapi paraspa- rādhīnaṃtā nirākartavyā । athāpi pradīpaprabhayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvastathāpyavidyamāna- syājanakatvena paurvāparyavibhāgo'styeva ; śīghratvāttūtpalapatraśatacchedavat pratyakṣeṇa nopalabhyata ityarthaḥ ।।
evamekavijñānasambandhinorapi dharmayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvena grāhyagrāhaka- bhāvo nirākartavya ityāha—bhāgayorityardhena । nanu pūrvavijñānaṃ vāsanādvāreṇopari- tanaṃ janayati ; tadevoparitanasyālambanaṃ bhaviṣyati ; kimatra yugapadbhāvenetyāśa- ṅkyāha—na ca śaktyarpaṇadvāreti tripādyā । pratyakṣavijñānamaparokṣatayārthamavabhāsayati; tat kathamatītālambanaṃ syādityarthaḥ । nāpi tādrūpyajanakatvena । yathoktam— itauṣyate. cau. mu. yaugapadyena cau. mu. dvāraṃ krameṇa. cau. mu.
grāhyaṃ tadā hyatītaṃ syāt tādrūpyaṃ cāpramāṇakam ।
atītatvānuviddho hi smṛtyā grāhyo'nubhūyate ।। 159 ।।
tadvadeva bhavedatra svapne na syād viparyayāt ।
tatra hyavartamāno'pi gṛhyate vartamānavat ।। 160 ।।
bādhajñānādidaṃ siddhaṃ na tvatraivaṃ viparyayaḥ । <lg">

hetutvameva yuktijñā jñānākārārpaṇakṣamam ।।” iti ।
kṣaṇikatvena niranvayavināśitvena ca janakatvasārūpyayorabhāvādityuktama ; tadāha— tādrūpyaṃ cāpramāṇakamiti ।
yadi ca pratyakṣavijñānamatītālambanaṃ syāt, tadā smṛtivadatītatayā cāva- bhāsetetyāha—atītatvānuviddha ityādinā atretyantena ।
nanu ca svapnavasthāyāmatītālambanamapi vijñānaṃ nātītatayārthamavabhāsayati । nanu nātītatayārthamavabhāsayati, atītālambanaṃ ceti vipratiṣiddham । avartamānasyā- śakyatve kathamālambanatvam ? uktamasmābhiḥ—yat pratibhāsate, tadālambanam ; na tu yadastīti ; na hi śuktikāyāṃ rajatajñānaṃ rajatābhāvena śuktikālambanamiti śakyaṃ vaktum । nanvālambanaṃ hi kāraṇam, asataśca kathaṃ kāraṇatvam ? ālambanatayā ca tat kāraṇam ; pratibhāsamānatayā cālambanam । tathā ca tadastyeva ; bādhakapra- tyayo hi pratibhāsitasyābhāvamavabhāsayati ; ‘yat rajatamiti pratibhāsitam, tat rajataṃ na bhavati’ iti, na tu ‘yat rajatarūpatayā pratibhāsitam’ iti । rajate rajatajñāne'pi rajatasya pratibhāsamānatayaiva kāraṇatvam na svarūpasadbhāvena; sā ca prati- bhāsamānatā svarūpasaṃnidhānābhāve'pi śuktikādau rajatajñānādastyeva । tasmāt prati- bhāsamānatayā rajatasaṃnidhānaṃ sarvatrāstīti ; svarūpasaṃnidhānaṃ tu bhrāntavadabhrānte'pyanu- payogīti tatsvarūpabhāve na bhrānte'pyālambanatvakṣatiḥ । tadidamuktam—“arthasya saṃnidhiḥ । yadi nāsti kimevaṃ syāt” iti । tadetadabhyupagamyāha—svapne na syādityevamādinā na tvatraivaṃ viparyaya ityevamantena । yuktaṃ yat svapnāvasthāyāmavarta- bhavettatra. cau. mu. bhrāntam. cau. mu. yati. atītālambanaṃ ceti vipratiṣiddhaṃ nanu avarta. mā. tataḥ kasmāt. mā.
tasmāt pratyakṣabuddhīnāṃ nātīto viṣayo bhavet ।। 161 ।।
atītatvād yathaivāsāṃ vṛtto janmāntareṣu yaḥ ।
tadrūpatvena vājñānaṃ heturbhāvivaducyate ।। 162 ।।
atītatve'pi nārtho'yaṃ dhīreṣetyatra kā pramā ।
atītaṃ yacca vijñānaṃ grāhyatvena prakalpitam ।। 163 ।।
tat syād grāhakarūpaṃ vā grāhyaṃ vobhayathāpi vā ।
grāhyākāratvamātre syādarthaḥ śabdāntareṇa te ।। 164 ।।
svakāle cāpyasaṃvitterna syācchaktyarpaṇaṃ tataḥ ।
yathaivānāgatajñānāt santatyantarajādapi ।। 165 ।।
mānālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ vartamānatayārthamavabhāsayati viparyayāt bhrāntitvādityarthaḥ । bhrāntatā ca bādhakapratyayāvaseyā ; na tu ‘nīlam’ iti vijñāne bādhakapratyayo- 'stītyarthaḥ ।
atraiva pramāṇamāha—tasmāditi । anantarātītavijñānaṃ dharmi, pratyakṣasyā- lambanaṃ na bhavatīti sādhyo dharmaḥ, atītatvāditi hetuḥ, janmāntarātītavijñānava- diti dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।
pūrvasminneva pratijñārthe hetudṛṣṭāntāntaramāha—tadrūpatvenetyardhena । atītata- yāpratibhāsamānatvād bhāvivijñānavat ।।
bhavatu vāpyapratibhāsamānatvenāpyatītasyālambanatvam ; vijñānameva tu, nārthaḥ ityatra na kiñcit pramāṇamityāha—atītatve'pītyardhena । yaccedamatītavijñānamupari- tanasya grāhyatvena bhavadbhiriṣṭam, tad grāhyakāraṃ vā syāt grāhakākāraṃ vā syāt ubhayākāraṃ vā—iti dūṣaṇāyopanyasyannāha—atītaṃ yacceti ।
tatra kevalagrāhyatvābhyupagame'rtha eva jñānaśabdenoktaḥ syādityāha—grāhyā- kāratvamātre syādityardhena ।।
kevalagrāhyatve cātītasya grāhakākāratābhāvenotpattāvasaṃcetitasya vāsano- tpādakatvamanāgatasantatyantarajñānavanna syādityāha—svakāle cāpīti ।। atīte. cau. mu. tasmāt. cau. mu. cātha saṃvittaḥ cau. mu. gatājjñānāt. cau. mu.
dṛḍhatvenāpyavijñātād yathotpannād vinaśyataḥ ।

kimapekṣya ca tasyedaṃ grāhakatvaṃ prakalpyate ।

tataścottaravijñānaṃ na pratīkṣeta bodhakam ।
dvyākārakalpanāyāṃ ca parasyātmāṃśa eva te ।। 168 ।।

grāhyagrāhakarūpe syād viṣayo nāsarūpataḥ ।
jñānamapi ca yat spaṣṭatayā na jñātam, naiva vāsanāmutpādayati ; kiṃ puna- grāhakābhāvena yadajñātameva yathotpannavinaṣṭamityāha—dṛḍhatvenāpītyardhena । grāhakā- kāramātre coparitanaṃ prati grāhyatā na syādityāha—kevalagrāhakatva ityardhena ।।
sarveṣāṃ grāhakatve sati grāhyābhāvena grāhakatāpi na syādityāha—kimape- kṣyetyardhena । dvyākāratāpi—“naitadasti kva tarhi” ityādinā nirastaivetyāha— dvyākāratā nirastaiveti ।

evamevoparitanasyāpi dvyākāratā nirākartavyā ; tadapi svayaṃprakāśatvena nātītaṃ grāhyamapekṣata ityāha—dvyākārakalpanāyāmiti ।
kevalagrāhyākāratve tūparitanasya pūrvaṃ prati grāhakatvaṃ na syādityāha— pūrvagrāhyetyardhena ।।
kevalagrāhakākāratvenoparitanasya atītasya kevalagrāhyākāratvena ca sarūpa- janakatvābhāvena bhavatpakṣe grāhyagrāhakabhāvo na syādityāha—grāhyagrāhakarūpa ityardhena । nātha vijñānāttatho. cau. mu. svarūpatve. mā. grāhakākāramātre syādviṣayo vāsarūpataḥ. cau. mu.

vāsyavāsakabhāvaśca jñānatvādekasantatau ।

api ca, vāsanādvāreṇa pūrvavijñānamuparitanaṃ janayati । na ca kṣaṇikatvena tajjñā- nasya vāsanotpattau vyāpāro'stītyāha—na ca śaktyarpaṇasyātretyardhena ।।
mīmāṃsakapakṣe tu sthāyitvād vijñānasya sthāyyātmagatāṃ saṃskārātmikāṃ vāsanāmutpādayitumalamityuktam—“avasthitā hi vāsyante” ityādinā । jñānasya tu kṣaṇikatvena vāsyavāsakabhāvo nāstītyuktamityāha—śaktyarpaṇasyetyardhena । atraiva trailakṣaṇyamāha—santānāntaravaditi । atra ekasantatāviti dharmiviśeṣaṇam, eṣāmiti dharminerdeśaḥ, niṣedhyā hetusādhyatā vāsyavāsakabhāvaśceti sādhyo dharmaḥ, jñānatvāditi hetuḥ, santānāntarajñānavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।
evaṃ tāvat dvayorgrāhyagrāhakabhāvo nāstītyatra trailakṣaṇyamabhidhāyedānīm “abhinnatvaṃ yadā ceṣṭam”—ityatra trailakṣaṇyamāha—tasmāditi ślokadvayena । rūpasvalakṣaṇagrāhakaṃ tat svagrāhyād bhinnam ; rūpasvalakṣaṇagrāhyaṃ tat svagrāhakāda- bhinnam iti pratijñā ; hetudṛṣṭāntau tāveva । prayogāntaramāha—dvayamityardhena । vimatyadhikaraṇabhāvāpannagrāhyagrāhakadvayaṃ parasparabhinnamiti pratijñā ; hetudṛṣṭāntau tāveva ।। yadbhāsakam. cau. mu. grāhakāccaiva. cau. mu.

na tvatra kāraṇaṃ tādṛk śaktibhedakṛdasti te ।। 178 ।।
atraiva prayogāntaramāha—aikarūpyegetyardhena । nīlabudhyoriti dharmitvam paraspareṇa bheda iti sādhyo dharmaḥ, nīlamidam—iti bhedopalambhanāditi hetuḥ । abhedasādhakasya sahopalambhasya, paroktasya vā sahopalambhaniyamādityasyāsiddhatāmane- nāha । idānīmekavijñānasaṃbandhinorddharmayorgrāhyagrāhakabhāvo nāstīti yaduktam, tatra prayogamāha—jñānaṃ svāṃśaṃ na gṛhṇātīti । jñānaṃ svāṃśaṃ na gṛhṇāti na vā svāṃśena gṛhyate jñānotpatteḥ vāsanāvat । śloke svaśaktiśabdena vāsanāmāha । dvayahīnā hītyanena sādhyasadbhāvena sapakṣatāṃ darśayati ।
prayogāntaramāha—caitrajñānamiti । caitrajñānaṃ dharmi, tadudbhūtajñānāṃśagrāhyabo- dhakaṃ na bhavatīti sādhyo dharmaḥ, jñānatvāditi hetuḥ, dehāntarodbhavajñānavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ । abhedo'pi grāhyagrāhakayorevameva nirākartavya ityāha—etayaiva diśe- tyardhena । jñānamātmānaṃ na gṛhṇāti, jñānādutpadyamānatvāt vāsanāvat ।।
asmadarśapratibhāsabalena tvātmagrāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ, na tu jñāne tathāvidhaprati- bhāso'stītyāha—pramāṇāntarasiddhatvāditi ।।
tasmādubhayasiddhatvena lāghavādivaśena ca vijñānasyaivākāro nīlapītādi, nārthasyeti yaduktam, tadayuktam, gṛhītamidam—iti pratibhāsavirodhādityāha— ṇa vijñānāt. cau. mu. grāhyatva prati. cau. mu. hīnā dvi. cau. mu. danyatrāneka. cau. mu. jñānaṃ....svāṃśena. mā. tṛtīyamidam. ma.

cakṣurādīndriyairasya tadanaikāntikaṃ bhavet ।
yadapyapratibandhatvādutpattau gṛhyatāmiti ।। 180 ।।
tatrātmanā na śakyaṃ tannānyotpattistadasti vā ।
tenaitatkāraṇābhāvāt tadānīṃ nānubhūyate ।। 181 ।।
nānyathā hyarthasadbhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ sannupapadyate ।

na cāpi pratibandhena kevalenāgraho bhavet ।
viśiṣṭakāraṇābhāve'pyartho naivānubhūyate ।। 183 ।।
tasmādityardhena । yadapi sākāratvasidhyarthaṃ pratipatteḥ pūrvaṃ vijñānagrahaṇamuktam, tasyānaikāntikatvamityāha—upāyatvācceti । rūpādipratipattāvupāyabhūtānyapi cakṣurādīni rūpādipratipattyuttarakālaṃ pratīyanta ityarthaḥ ।
yadapyapratibandhatvādarthagrahaṇāt pūrvamutpattikāla eva jñānasya grahaṇaṃ prāpno- tītyuktam, tatrāpyāha—yadapyapratibandhatvāditi sārdhena । vidyamānamapyarthagrahaṇāt pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ pramāṇābhāvānna pratīyata ityarthaḥ ।।
kiṃ punastatpratipattau pramāṇam । yadarthagrahaṇāt pūrvaṃ nāstītyucyate ityā- śaṅkya pramāṇamupadarśayitumāha—nānyathā hīti । dṛṣṭaghaṭasadbhāvānyathānupapatyā hi tadavagamyamānarthagrahaṇāt pūrvamapyutpannaṃ paścādevāvagamyata ityarthaḥ ।।
vedyatārthātiśayalakṣaṇāsya dṛṣṭā, na saṃvedanaviśiṣṭatā ; sarvasyārthendriyamanaḥ- saṃnikarṣe satyārthasyāpi vedyatālakṣaṇaparokṣarūpātiśayo'sti yadutpannaḥ ; atmano 'pyarthātiśayānyathānupapattigamyā yasmin sati jñātṛtā sañjāyata iti prakriyā ।।
na ca sataḥ kevalena pratibandhasadbhāvenāgrahaṇam ; grāhakābhāve'pyartho naivānubhūyata ityāha—na ceti ।। tvallāgha. cau. mu. pūvagrahaṇa. cau. mu. atra. cau. mu. vaddhatvāt. cau. mu. na śaktatva na. mā. tadaiva ca. mā. māṇādupa. mā. na cānyaprati mā kṣaṇaṃ parekṣa. mā. bhāvehyarthaḥ. mā.
vyāpṛtaṃ cānyasaṃvittau jñānaṃ nātmānamṛcchati ।
tena prakāśakatve'pi bodhāyānyat pratīkṣate ।। 184 ।।
īdṛśaṃ vā prakāśatvaṃ tasyārthānubhavātmakam ।
na cātmānubhavo'styasyetyātmano na prakāśakam ।। 185 ।।
sati prakāśakatve'pi vyavasthā dṛśyate yathā ।
rūpādau cakṣurādīnāṃ tathātrāpi bhaviṣyati ।। 186 ।।
prakāśakatvaṃ bāhye'rthe śaktyabhāvāttu nātmani ।
anyena nanu saṃvittāvanavasthā prasajyate ।। 187 ।।
tatra tatra smṛtiṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvānubhavakalpanāt ।
ekena hyanubhūtatve sarvaṃ tatraiva saṃbhavet ।। 188 ।।
tatrāpi smṛtirityetanna lokānugataṃ vacaḥ ।
yacca “jñānāntarasya cotpattiṃ prakāśo na pratīkṣate” ityuktam, tatrāpyāha—vyāpṛtaṃ cānyasaṃvittāviti । prakāśarūpamapi jñānamanyatra vyāpṛ- tatvānnātmānaṃ gṛhṇātītyarthaḥ ।।
anātmaviṣayaṃ caitasya prakāśakatvam, nātmaviṣayam, yataḥ ‘nīlamidam’ iti pratibhāsaḥ, na punaḥ ‘nīlamaham’ itītyāha—īdṛśamiti ।।
dṛṣṭaṃ ca vyavahitaviṣayaprakāśakatvamityāha—sati prakāśatva iti sārdhena ।
yadi ghaṭagrāhakamutpannaṃ grāhakāntareṇa gṛhyeta, tadā grāhake'pi smaraṇada- rśanāt tadanyathānupapattyā ghaṭagrāhake'pi grāhakāntarakalpanāyāmanavasthā syāt । taduktam— “jñānāntareṇānubhave'niṣṭā tatrāpi ca smṛtiḥ” iti । tadetad dūṣaṇāyopanyasyati sma—anyena nviti । yadā tu nīlamevaikamubhayātmakamutpadyate, tadāsminneva jñāne grāhyagrāhakākārayorubhayorapi sambhave sati grāhakāntarābhāvāt nānavasthetyāha—ekena hītyardhena ।।
tadetat pramāṇābhāvena dūṣayitumāha—tatrāpīti ।। vyāvṛttaṃ cānyasaṃvṛttau. mā. cātmānam. ca. cau. mu. katve ca. cau. mu. anyena vānubhāve'sāvanavasthā. cau. mu. kalpanā. cau. mu. kānumatam. cau. mu. Omitted. grāhaka. mā.
na hi vijñānasantānaṃ kaścit smarati laukikaḥ ।। 189 ।।
ghaṭādau ca gṛhīte'rthe yadi tāvadanantaram ।
arthāpattyāvabudhyante vijñānāni punaḥ punaḥ ।। 190 ।।
yāvacchamaṃ tataḥ paścāt tāvantyeva smariṣyati ।
tadāpyakalpite'pyevaṃ smṛtirvandhyāsutādivat ।। 191 ।।
smṛtibhrāntiśca yāpyatra paścājjñāneṣu jāyate ।
tadaivārthasmṛtereṣāṃ tajjñānādipramāṇatā ।। 192 ।।
yāvacchamaṃ ca tadbuddhistatprabandhe ca satyāpi ।
śramād rucyānyasaṃparkād vicchedo viṣayeṣviva ।। 193 ।।
yadi tāvad ghaṭagrahaṇasamanantaraṃ tadanyathānupapattyā grāhakagrahaṇaṃ yāvacchamam, tāvatyeva tadottarakālaṃ smaraṇamiti kānavasthetyāha—ghaṭādāviti sārdhena ।
atha ghaṭagrahaṇasamanantaraṃ ghaṭagrāhake cārthāpattirnaivotpannā, tadottarakālamana- nubhūtasya vandhyāsutasmaraṇatulyaṃ smaraṇamityāha—tadāpyakalpite'pītyardhena ।।
yattu—tatrāpi bhavatu smaraṇābhimānaḥ ‘gṛhīto mayā ghaṭaḥ’ iti ghaṭavat grāhakasyāpi parāmarśāt iti, tadanupapannam; ghaṭasyaiva tatra smaraṇamanubhūtatvāt ; grāhakasye tu anubhūtatvena ghaṭasmaraṇānyathānupapattyā grāhakagrahaṇamevetyāha—smṛti- bhrāntiśceti ।।
nanu ghaṭapratipattyanyathānupapattyā grāhakakalpanāyāṃ tatsantānapratipattau satyāṃ viṣayāntarāvagamo na syāt । taduktam— “viṣayāntarasañcārastadā na syāt sa ceṣyate” itītyāśaṅkyāha—yāvaditi । satyāmapi grāhakasaṃvittau śramāt rucyā viṣayāntarasaṃparkād vā vicchedo bhaviṣyati yathā nīlatvajñānasantatāvarthasya pītajñāna- mityarthaḥ ।। ghaṭādāvagṛhī. cau. mu. yāvacchramam. cau. mu. tāvatyeva. cau. mu. tadātvaka. cau. mu. reṣā tajjñā. mā. bandhe mahatyapi. cau. mu. cekṣyate. mā. drūpyādviṣayā. mā.

pramāṇavattvādāyātaḥ pravāhaḥ kena vāryate ।। 195 ।।
atha tānyādyavijñānaviṣayāṇīti kalpyate ।
nottarottarabuddhīnāṃ viśeṣa upapadyate ।। 196 ।।

viṣayajñānatajjñānaviśepastena durlabhaḥ ।। 197 ।।
smaran yathaiva vijñānaṃ nirākāraṃ smaratyayam ।
tathā smaran gṛhītārthaṃ nirākāratayā smaret ।। 198 ।।
api ca, “tatrāpi ca smṛtiḥ” iti yaducyate, sā yadi ghaṭagrāhaka eva tadanyathānupapattikalpitagrāhake tadā nānavasthetyāha—tatrāpīti । ghaṭagrāhakasmara- ṇānyathānupapattyā ghaṭagrāhakagrāhakakalpanāyāṃ nānavasthetyarthaḥ ।।
atha grāhakagrāhake'pi sarvatra smaraṇam, tadā yāvatsmaraṇaṃ grahaṇakalpanāyāṃ nānavasthetyāha—smaraṇaṃ tviti ।।
atha sarvāṇi smaraṇānyādyaghaṭaviṣayagrāhakaviṣayāṇyeva, na grāhakagrāhaka- viṣayāṇi ; tadāpi sarveṣāṃ ghaṭagrāhakaviṣayaikatvena viśeṣābhāvaḥ ; tadanyathānupapattyaiva grāhakakalpanāyāṃ nānavasthetyādyameva pakṣamupasaṃharati—atha tānīti ।।

pratyāsannatvasambandhau grāhyasyāsambhavāccyutau ।

pratyakṣādanyavijñānamatītānāgatairapi ।

miti । yadyapi ‘nīlam’ ityatra viveko nāsti, athāpyuttarakālaṃ grāhakavannirā- kāratayā tasya smaraṇābhāvādarthasyaivāyamākāraḥ, na grāhakasyetyarthaḥ ।।
yat punaridamuktam—uttarakālam ‘gṛhīto mayā ghaṭaḥ’ iti vijñānapṛṣṭhenaiva smaraṇājjñānapṛṣṭhenaiṃva pūrvaṃ grahaṇaṃ saṃjātama ; tatra jñānasyaivāyamākāra iti, tatrā- pyāha—jñānapṛṣṭheneti । tatredameva tāvad vaktavyam—vijñānapṛṣṭhena smaraṇaṃ nāstyeva, arthasyaiva tu tatra smaraṇam ; grāhakasya tu tadanyathānupapattyā tadeva grahaṇam । bhavatu vottarakālaṃ jñānapūrvakamarthasya paryālocanam ; tathāpi tadarthagrahaṇāt pūrvaṃ vijñānagrahaṇaṃ na sādhayati, anyathopapannatvāt । yadarthapratipattāvupāyatvaṃ tasya, tatkṛtamityarthaḥ ।।
yattu— “pratyāsannaṃ ca sambandham”—ityuktam, tatrāpyāha—pratyāsanna- tvasambandhāvityardhena । nīlāderanātmatayā pratibhāsamānatvena tayorasambhavādityarthaḥ । viṣayatvena vā nīlasya grāhakādanātmabhūtasyāpi tau bhaviṣyataḥ, kimavibhaktadeśatvena ? viṣayatvaṃ ca tatra bhāsanādityāha—viṣayatvenetyardhena ।।
yat punaridamuktam—arthābhāve'pi ‘rajatam’ ityākāradarśanāt kathamartha- syāyamākāraḥ iti tatrāpyāha—arthākārasyeti । tatrāpyanātmaivāvidyamānamā- lambanamityuktam “sarvatrālambanaṃ bāhyam” ityatretyarthaḥ ।।
atītānāgatayorapyarthayorālambanatvamuktam— “eṣa pratyakṣadharmaśca” ityatre- tyāha—pratyakṣāditi ।। na tu grāhyatva. cau. mu grāhyatvāsambha. cau. mu. vāsanāsu satīṣu vā. mā. Omiteed. na mā.
yaḥ punarnānubhūto'rtho na vāpyanubhaviṣyate ।

vinaiva vāsanātaścet buddhirutpadyate tataḥ ।
vāsanāyā nimittatvamabhyupetaṃ vihanyate ।। 204 ।।
vāsanā ced bhavedatra sā ca saṃvittipūrvikā ।
tathā sati ca pūrvatra gṛhītaḥ kvāpyasau dhruvam ।। 205 ।।
evaṃ ca naiva vaktavyamatyantābhavanaṃ kvacit ।
anyathānupapattyā hi siddhā janmāntare'stitā ।। 206 ।।
duṣṭatvena ca vijñānamanyathāpi vyavasthitam ।
pṛthivyādiṣu gṛhṇīyādākāraṃ tannibandhanam ।। 207 ।।
nanu svaśiraśchedapratibhāsaṃ svapnāvaskhāyāṃ yadvijñānamutpadyate, tatra kālatraya- śūnyasya svaśiraśchedanasya kathamālambanatvamityukte satyetadeva vaktavyam—pratibhāsa- mānasyāsato'pyālambanatvam, apratibhāsamānasya sato'pyālambanatvaṃ na bhavatīti ; kimatra kālatrayasadasadbhāvena ? iti । atha kālatrayaśūnyālambanatvamanupapannam, tavāpi tarhi vāsanābhāvenaivaṃvidhajñānotpattiḥ kathamityāha—yaḥ punariti ।।
tatra yadi vāsanābhāvenaivaṃvidhajñānotpattiriṣyate, tadā anapekṣitabāhyārthaṃ vāsanābalena sarvaṃ vijñānamutpadyate—iti pratijñā hīyetetyāha—vinaiva vāsanā- taścediti ।।

“na cārthavyapadeśamantareṇa buddherupalambhaḥ”—iti siddhāntabhāṣyam । tadidaṃ mādhyamikadarśane'pi jñānasya pratyakṣatāṃ nirākarotītyāha—na ceti sārdhena ślokadvayena । svaprakāśamapi vijñānaṃ nīlapītādyākāratayaiva prakāśate । na ca bhavatpakṣe nīlapītādyākāratā vijñānasya pāramārthikīti । anubhavaikamātrarūpaṃ tu jñānamanīlamapi vāsanābalena nīlatayāvabhāsate । na ca kālpanikena rūpeṇāvabhāsa- mānasya pratyakṣatā ūṣarasyeva salilarūpatetyarthaḥ ।।
“api ca, niyatanimittaḥ”—ityādi bhāṣyam । tasyāyamarthaḥ-niyatastāvat kāryakāraṇabhāvo'vagamyate ; sa buddhimātrapakṣe na syāt । kimiti tantubuddhiḥ paṭabuddhimeva janayati, na ghaṭabuddhimiti ? tadetadākṣipannāha—nimittaniyatatvami- tyādinā ślokapañcakena । tantavo'pi tantuṣu buddhivat kasmāt paṭatayaiva jñānaṃ janayanti, na ghaṭatayā ? svābhāvikaśaktivaśena tantavaḥ paṭameva janayanti, na ghaṭam । hanta ! tarhi svābhāvikaśaktivaśena tantubuddhirapi paṭabuddhimeva janayiṣyati, na ghaṭabuddhim । evamubhayoḥ sāmye sati naikaścodayitavya ityarthaḥ ।। asmadgrāhya. mā. svacchatvāttu. cau. mu. param. mā. ca vyabhicārama. mā. mātraṃ rūpaṃ tu. mā. paṭa eva. mā.
nārabhyate ghaṭaḥ kiṃ tairmṛtpiṇḍārthena vā paṭaḥ ।। 249 ।।
tantumṛtpiṇḍavijñāne hyanuyojye mate yadi ।
arthaparyanuyogo'pi tadvadeva prasajyate ।। 250 ।।
arthārambhavyavasthā cet sāmarthyaniyamāśrayāt ।

tasmād yatrobhayordoṣaḥ parihāro'pi vā samaḥ ।
naikaḥ paryanuyoktavyastādṛgarthavicāraṇe ।। 252 ।।
deśakālanimittāni vyañjakānyarthavādinaḥ ।
śaktīnāṃ kāraṇasthānāṃ svakāryaniyamaṃ prati ।। 253 ।।
śaktayo'pi ca bhāvānāṃ kāryārthāpattikalpitāḥ ।
prasiddhāḥ pāramārthikyaḥ pratikāryaṃ vyavasthitāḥ ।। 254 ।।
bhavatastu na vijñānād bhinnābhinnā nirūpyate ।
śaktiḥ saṃvṛtisadbhāvamutsṛjya paramārthataḥ ।। 255 ।।
evamākṣipte samarthayitumāha— deśakālanimittānīti । tantavo'pi deśakālābhivyaktanijavayanaśaktivaśena niyataṃ kāryapaṭārthamutpādayanti ।।
asti ca teṣāṃ niyatakāryadarśanāvaseyā niyamaśaktirityāha—śaktayo'pi cetiṃ ।।
vijñānavādinastu vijñānavyatirekeṇa śaktiranyā nāvagamyate । atastantu- vijñānarūpatayaiva tantuvijñānaṃ paṭavijñānamupajanayati । tacca rūpamaviśiṣṭaṃ ghaṭavijñā- ne'pītyārambhakatvaprasaṅgaḥ । tasmād yadrūpamavagamyate tadaviśiṣṭam । anyattu niyāmakaṃ śaktyādivadarthatvānna tvayābhyupagantavyamityāhabhavatastu na vijñānā- diti ।। mābhayā. cau. mu. rthābhāvakalpitāḥ. ktānijanayantiśakti. mā. ni niyama. mā. vāsanaiva ca yuṣmābhiḥ śaktiśabdena gīyate ।
nimittaniyatatvaṃ ca vāsanāyā yaducyate ।। 256 ।।
tasyāścāsambhavenaitadapārārthyācca durlabham ।

matvaitadapi cetyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ paraṃ prati ।

tathā me tantubuddhibhyaḥ paṭabuddhiritīdṛśaḥ ।
evamādyapramāṇābhyāṃ na tāvad bāhyaśūnyatā ।। 259 ।।
āgamasya ca naiveha vyāpāro'to'nyathāpi vā ।
nopamā sadṛśābhāvādarthāpattiviparyayāt ।। 260 ।।
api ca bhavatpakṣe vāsanā śaktiśabdenocyate । niyatatvaṃ ca tasyā evocyamānamucyeta । tasyā astitvamārambhakatvaṃ ca nirākṛtamityāha—vāsanaiva ca yuṣmābhirityādinā sārdhena ślokena । na jñānamātravāde deśakālādyabhivyañjaka- mabhyugamyate śakteḥ । etatsakalamavagamya bāhyārthavādī śūnyavādinaṃ prati dūṣaṇamāhetyāha—deśakālanimittānīti । tasmāt nātrobhayoḥ samo doṣaḥ parihāro'pi vā samaḥ ityāha—tasmāditi ।
evaṃ sadupalambhakapañcapramāṇābhāvenābhāvāpramāṇagamyatvaṃ na śūnyasyetyāha— evamādyapramāṇābhyāmiti ślokadvayena ।।
anye tu prameyavikalpena bāhyārthamavayavijātiparamāṇurūpaṃ vināśayanti—na tāvadavayavino bāhyasya grāhyatvamavayavānanyatvena jvālāvat ; anyatve'pi tadagrahaṇe'pi grahaṇaprasaṅgāt । atha teṣu tasya vṛttestadagrahaṇe grahaṇaṃ nāsti, na ; teṣu tasya vṛttiḥ tvaṃ tu vāsanāyāvaducyate. mā. nimittādi. cau. mu. tu. cau. mu. viparyaye. mā. niyataṃ sañjatasyā ecya. mā. tacchaktyaitatsa. mā. tasmādyatnobhayo. mā. gamyatvaṃ śūnyetyāha mā.
tasmādabhāvāgamyatvaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ sthitaṃ hi naḥ ।
evaṃ pramāṇato'siddhā yaiḥ prameyāśrayocyate ।।
bāhyasyāṇusamūhādergrāhyasyāsambhavekṣaṇāt ।। 261 ।।
tairāntarāsambhavato yathoktāj jñeyaṃ tvamanyasya balādupeyam ।
grāhyā na ceṣṭāḥ paramāṇavo'taḥ ।। 262 ।।
iti bahirviṣayapratipādanā- nnatadabhāvakṛtā matisaṃvṛtiḥ ।
pratyekaṃ kārtsnyena vā ? kārtsnyena cedavayavino'nekatvaprasaṅgāt । nāpyavayavaśaḥ, avayavino'vayavāntarābhāvāt । sarvāvayavopalabdhau ca tadbuddhiprasaṅgāt । na ca sarvāvayavopalabdhirasti । evaṃ jātiparamāṇusamūhāvapi nirākartavyau । paramāṇavastu naiva sthūlapratibhāsaṃ vijñānamutpādayantyanālambanatvenetyāha—evaṃ pramāṇata iti ।।
tān prati pratyakṣavirodhadūṣaṇamāha—tairantareti ।।
devadattaḥ gauḥ ayam—ityanātmatayāvayavijātirūpamavabhāsate । na ca bādhakapratyayo'sti । yattu prameyavikalpotthamanumānam, tat pratyakṣaviruddhatvādapramāṇa- mevetyuktam । jātyādiṣu yadā jātetyarthaḥ ।।
yata evaṃ tasmānna bāhyārthasyānta ityāha—iti bahirityardhena । dabhāvagamya. cau. mu. mā. tāyāḥ sthitam. cau. mu. jñeyaṃsvamanya. cau. mu. māṇavo naḥ. mā. Omitted. na. cau. mu. na cāvaya. mā. jātīyapara. mā. māṇuvastunaścaiva mā. ntyālambana. mā.
ubhayatattvavidāṃ paramārthataḥ kṣamamidaṃ dhuri dharmavicāraṇe ।। 263 ।।
idānīṃ dvaitapratipādanasya “pramāṇatvāpramāṇatve” ityādinā svatantropayo- gamuktamupasaṃharati—ubhayatatvavidāmiti ।। iti bhaṭṭombekaviracitāyāṃ tātparyaṭīkāyāṃ śūnyavādaḥ samāptaḥ ।।
anumānam.
pratyakṣāvyabhicāritvādevaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ ca yat ।
prasiddhamanumānādi na parīkṣyaṃ tadapyataḥ ।। 1 ।।
pramātā jñātasambandha ekadeśyatha vocyate ।
।। athānumānam ।।
evaṃ pratyakṣamavyabhicāritve'pi śaṅkānivṛttaye “satsaṃprayoge” ityādinā lakṣaṇataḥ pratipādya idānīṃ tulyaprayojanatvāt anumānādilakṣaṇapradarśanārthatvācca pratyakṣasūtrasya anumānalakṣaṇaṃ tāvadāha bhāṣyakāraḥ—“anumānaṃ jñātasambandhasyaika- deśadarśanādekadeśāntare'sannikṛṣṭe'rthe buddhiḥ” iti । ādau tasya tātparyaṃ vyācaṣṭe vārtikakāraḥ—pratyakṣeti । ayamarthaḥ—mūlapramāṇavyabhicāreṇa vānumānasya vyabhi- cāraḥ syāt, svakīyalakṣaṇavyabhicāreṇa vā ? na tāvanmūlapramāṇavyabhicāraḥ, pratya- kṣasyāvyabhicāritvāt । nāpi svakīyalakṣaṇavyabhicāraḥ, evaṃlakṣaṇakatvāt । atha kiṃ tallakṣaṇam ? “anumānaṃ jñātasambandhasyaikadeśadarśanādekadeśāntare'sannikṛṣṭe'rthe buddhiḥ” iti । anumānamiti lakṣyapadam ; avaśiṣṭaṃ tu lakṣaṇam । lakṣaṇaparatve cāsya bhāṣyasya pratyakṣalakṣaṇaparasūtravat pūrvapratijñayā sambandhābhāvamāśaṅkya sakala- lakṣyalakṣaṇānuvādena parīkṣyatvaṃ vikalpya prayogavacanavyaktimāha—na parīkṣyaṃ tadapyata iti । pūrvoktakāraṇadvayādityarthaḥ ।।
idānīmavayavārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe—pramātā jñātasambandha iti । sambandho jñāto yena pramātretyarthaḥ । vyākhyānāntaramāha—ekadeśyatha vocyata iti । jñātaḥ sambandho yasmaikadeśina ekadeśābhyāmityarthaḥ । nanu ca sarvanāmārthe bahuvrīhismara- ṇam ; sannihitaśca sarvanāmno'rthaḥ, na caikadeśī pramātā vā kenacidupātta ityasanni- dhānāt kathaṃ tayoḥ samāsārthatvamityanyathā vyācakṣate—ekadeśyatha vocyata iti । asyārthaḥ—jñātaḥ sambandho yasyaikadeśasya liṅgākhyasyaikadeśāntareṇa sādhyenetyarthaḥ । sa cātraikadeśapadopādānāt sannihita eveti upapadyate samāsārthatvamiti । tada- kṣasyāvyami. mā. ityāditasya. mā. na.... ....cātra. mā.
yuktam ; ekadeśasyāpyanupāttatvenāsannidhānāt ; “ekadeśadarśanāt” iti hyasyo- ttarapadārthaviśeṣaṇatvāt । na cānyapareṇopādāne sannihitaḥ samāsārtho bhavati, atiprasaṅgāt । darśanaśabdena sahaikadeśapadasya samāsānupapattiḥ, jñātasambandhapadasā- pekṣatvāt । na cāyaṃ pradhānabhūtaḥ sāpekṣaḥ, uttarapadārthaviśeṣaṇatvāt । atra keci- dāhuḥ—yadyapi śabdata ekadeśasya guṇabhāvaḥ ; tathāpi vastutaḥ prādhānyameva, darśanasya dṛśyapradhānatvāt । api ca ekadeśasyeti karmaṇīyaṃ ṣaṣṭhī ; darśanāditi kṛtprayogāt । karma ca kriyayā vyāpyamānaṃ bhavatīti śabdato'pi prādhānyamevaiṃkade- śasyāvagamyata iti pradhānameva sāpekṣaṃ bhavatīti ca ‘pradhānasya sāpekṣasya samāsaḥ । ityacodyametat iti । atrocyate—iha hi vyākaraṇe śabdārtho'rthaḥ, na vastvarthaḥ’ uktaṃ ca taiḥ “śabdapramāṇakā vayam” iti । anyathā hi ‘rājapuruṣaḥ śobhanaḥ’ ityatra samāsārthānupapattiḥ, rājapuruṣasya guṇabhūtatvāt ; ‘ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ’ ityatra samāsaḥ syāt, rājñaḥ pradhānatvāt, śabdārthāgrahaṇāt ; viparyayādubhayamupapannaṃ bhavati । nanu ca yadyanyathā vastvartho'nyathā śabdārthaḥ, āyātaṃ tarhyarthāsaṃsparśitvaṃ śabdānām । maivaṃ vocaḥ ; dvividho hi guṇapradhānabhāvaḥ—viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvarūpaḥ, upakāryopakārakabhāvarūpaśca । dvividho'pi cāyaṃ paramārthataḥ sanneva । śabdastu viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyarūpaṃ guṇaprādhānyamāha rājapuruṣādiṣu ; taccāpekṣayaiva, etadanusārāt ; saṃbhavati vai (?) pradhānasya sāpekṣasyāpi samāsa ityacodyametat । yat punaridramu- ktam—ekadeśasya karmatvācchabdato'pi prādhānyaṃ pratīyata iti, pratyuktaṃ tat samāsavṛtterupakāryopakārakabhāvamanapekṣya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvarūpaguṇaprādhānyāśrayeṇena pravṛttestadāśrayatvācca sāpekṣasamāsānuśāsanasya ; anyathā hyukto'tiprasaṅga ityanupāsi taguruvyākhyānamupekṣaṇīyam । yat punaridamuktam—anupāttasyāsannidhānāt kathaṃ pramāturekadeśino vā samāsārthatvam iti, kvopādānamatropayujyate ? sannihitamātraṃ hi sarvanāmno'rthaḥ; tatrāyaṃ samāsaḥ; sannihitau cātraikadeśipramātārau, buddhiśabdādeka- deśadvayasambandhācca ; anyatareṇāpi ca niyamena sannidhāpitaḥ sannihita eveti samā- sārthasyāvighātaḥ । nanu pramāturanumeyānumāpakatvabhāvāt lakṣaṇavākye kathaṃ sambandhaḥ ? karmavatkriyayā. mā. pekṣaiva. mā. kathamasambandhaḥ. mā.
karmadhārayapakṣo vā sambandhinyekadeśatā ।। 2 ।।
dvayaṃ vā jñātasambandhamupalabdhaṃ parasparam ।
tasyaikadeśaśabdābhyāmucyete samudāyinau ।। 3 ।।
sambandho vyāptiriṣṭātra liṅgadharmasya liṅginā ।
ucyate—anumānānumeyavyavahārasya pratisambandhirūpatvāt tasya cātra sambandhyantara- mantareṇānupapattiḥ । sarvapramāṇalakṣaṇe caitat samānam । taduktam—“puruṣasya buddhijanma” iti sūtrakṛtā । samāsabalīyastvena vyākhyānāntaramāha—karmadhārayapakṣo veti । jñātaśvāsau sambandhaścetyarthaḥ । nanu sambandhasya niravayavatvāt “ekadeśa- darśanādekadeśāntare” ityanupapannamityāśaṅkyāha — sambandhinyekadeśateti । sambandhinau cārambhakatvādekadeśatvenopacaryete ityarthaḥ ।।
pracayaśiṣṭyārthādavagataḥ samudāyo vā samāsārtha ityāha—dvayaṃ veti । pūrvavadārambhakatvena samudāyasya samudāyināvekadeśināviti “ekadeśadarśanāt, ekadeśāntare” ityetābhyāṃ śabdābhyāmupādīyete ।।
evaṃ samāsārthaṃ vyākhyāya adhunā vartipadārthau vyācaṣṭe । tatra jñeyasvarūpe'- vadhārite tajjñānaṃ śakyaṃ nirūpayitumiti jñātapadavilaṅghanena sambandhapadaṃ vyākhyāsya- nnāha—sambandho vyāptiriṣṭeti । nanu cānye'pi svabhāmibhāvādayaḥ sambandhāḥ santītyata āhaatreti । atrānumānānumeyavyavahāre vyāptilakṣaṇaḥ sambandho'ya- mityarthaḥ । nanu ca tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇaḥ sambandho'numānāṅgam ; kāryameva hi dhūmo'gnim, tadātmikā ca śiṃśapā vṛkṣatvaṃ gamayatīti । tadasat, kāryakāraṇa- bhāvatādātmyarahitānāmapi kṛttikārohiṇyudayādīnāṃ gamyagamakabhāvadarśanāt । api ca, kāryamapi kāryatvānna kāraṇaṃ gamayati । kiṃ tarhi ? tena niyatatvāt । anyathā hi kāryaṃ ca bhaviṣyati kāraṇaṃ ca nānumāpayiṣyati ; ko nvatra virodha iti śakyaṃ vaktum । yastu tena niyamaḥ, tato'numāpayatīti sa evānumānāṅgam, sa eva ca vyāptiśabdenābhidhīyate । yadi ca dhūmaḥ kāryatvādagnimanumāpayet, tataḥ sarvātmanā sandhāntararūpa. mā.
vyāpyasya gamakatva tu vyāpakaṃ gamyabhiṣyata ।। 4 ।।
yo yasya deśakālābhyāṃ samo nyūno'pi vā bhavet ।
sa vyāpyo vyāpakastasya samo vāpyadhiko'pi vā ।। 5 ।।
kāryatvāt kaṭuśyāmordhvagatyādibhirākārairanumāpayeta ; na ca bhavatāṃ kathaṃcit kārya- tvam, niranvayavināśābhyupagamāt । atha satyapi kāryatve ya evāsau niyataḥ sa evānumāpayiṣyati ; vyabhicarati tarhi kāryatvam ; tatsadbhāve'pyagamakatvāt punaśca niyama evāṅgīkṛtaḥ syāt । tadātmakasya gamakatvaṃ durotsāritameva, bhedādhiṣṭhāna- tvād gamyagamakabhāvasya ; na hyabhinne pratibandho nāma । nāpi śiṃśapā vṛkṣātmikā, tato vyāvartamānatvāt ; yo hi yasmād vyāvartate na sa tadrūpaḥ ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ ; vyāvartate khadirādibhyaḥ śiṃśapetyatadātmikā ; tadātmakatve ca liṅgagrahaṇavelāyā- mevāvyatirekāt svarūpata eva liṅgigrahaṇaprasaṅgādanumeyatvahāniḥ ; tādātmyena ca śiṃśapāyā gamakatve tādātmyāviśeṣād vṛkṣatvasyāpi śiṃśapāṃ prati gamakatva- prasaṅgaḥ । athāniyatatvādagamakatvam ; niyatataiva tarhi gamakatve hetuḥ ; na tādā- tmyam, vyabhicāriṇyapi vṛkṣatve tādātmyadarśanāt । atha tadātmataiva vṛkṣatve nāsti; śiṃśapāpi tarhi na tadātmikā । sarvathā yayorekatvam, na tayorgamyagamakabhāvaḥ ; nānātve tu tādātmyābhāvaḥ । evaṃ ca śiṃśapāvṛkṣāpohayorapohabudhyorvā gamyagamaka- bhāvo nirākartavyaḥ । nanu vyāpteḥ sambandhatvāt saṃyogavad dhūmāgnisambandhisamave- tatve sati dhūmavadagnerapi gamakatvaprasaṅga ityāśaṅkyāha—liṅgadharmasya liṅgineti । vyāpyalakṣaṇasambandhisamavetaiva vyāptiḥ ; na tviyaṃ saṃyogavadubhayasamavetā, tathā adarśanādityarthaḥ । yata evaṃ tasmānna dhūmavadagnerapi gamakatvamityāha—vyāpyasyeti ।।
idānīṃ vyāpyaikasambadhisamavetaiva vyāptiḥ, na tu saṃyogavadubhayasambandhi- samavetetyetat pradarśayituṃ vyāpyavyāpakayorlakṣaṇaṃ karoti—yo yasyeti ।।
