na hyanyathā bhavatyeṣā vyāpyavyāpakatā tayoḥ ।। 6 ।।
vyāpakatvagṛhītastu vyāpyo yadyapi vastutaḥ ।
ādhikye'pyaviruddhatvād vyāpyaṃ na pratipādayet ।। 7 ।।
vispaṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭametacca goviṣāṇitvayormitau ।
vyāpyatvād gamikā gāvo vyāpikā na viṣāṇitā ।। 8 ।।
tena yatrāpyubhau dharmau vyāpyavyāpakasammatau ।
tatrāpi vyāpyataiva syādaṅagaṃ na vyāpitā mitau ।। 9 ।।
tena dharmyantareṣveṣā yasya yenaiva yādṛśā ।
tvādinā deśakālābhyāṃ yathāsaṃkhyena samo vādhiko vā, sa vyāpakaḥ । tasmād vyāpyasamavetaiva vyāptiḥ; atastasyaiva gamakatvam, na tu vyāpakasyetyāha—tena vyāpya iti ।।
nanu samalakṣaṇe vyāpake'pi vyāptisamavāyāt kimiti kṛtakatvaṃ pratyanitya- tvasyāpi gamakatvaṃ na bhavatītyāśaṅkyāha—vyāpakatveti । ka evamāha—ani- tyatvasya kṛtakatvaṃ prati gamakatvaṃ nāsti iti ? ubhayarūpe tu tasmin vyāpyarūpasama- vetaiva vyāptiḥ ; na tu vyāpakarūpasamavetā ; ādhikye'pyetasya rūpasyāgnyādau darśa- nādityato'nityatvasyāpi vyāpyatayaiva gamakatvam ; na tu vyāpakatayetyarthaḥ ।।
atraivodāharaṇamāha—vispaṣṭamiti ।।
yata evaṃ tena yatrāpītyāha—tena yatrāpīti ।।
“vyāpakaṃ gamyamiṣyate”—ityuktam, tadanupapannam ; dharmidvayānavacchi- nnasya hi tasya gamyatvaṃ syāt, sādhyadharmāvacchinnasya vā । tatra dharmidvayānavacchinna- pakṣe'gnimātrasya sādhyatāyāṃ siddhasādhyatā ; sādhyadharmāvacchinnapakṣe'pi parvata- viśiṣṭasya sādhyatāyāṃ hetoranugamābhāvaḥ ; na hi yatra yattra dhūmastatra tatra parvatāvacchinno'gnirityāśaṅkyāha—tena dharmyantareṣveṣā yasyetyādinā yādṛśī. cau. mu.
deśe yāvati kāle vā vyāpyatā prāṅganirūpitā ।। 10 ।।
tasya tāvati tādṛk syād dṛṣṭo dharmyantareṣu naḥ ।
vyāpyāṃśo vyāpakāṃśasya tathaiva pratipādakaḥ ।। 11 ।।
bhūyodarśanagamyā hi vyāptiḥ sāmānyadharmayoḥ ।
jñāyate bhedahānena kvaciccāpi viśeṣayoḥ ।। 12 ।।
ślokadvayena । ayamarthaḥ—na vayaṃ sāmānyaṃ vā viśeṣaṃ vā vijānīmaḥ ; kintu yādṛśo yo yena yādṛśā ca dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi vyāpto'vagataḥ, sa tādṛśastaṃ tādṛśameva sādhyadharmiṇi dṛṣṭo'vagamayati । “vyāpyatā prāṅnirūpitā” “dṛṣṭo dharmyantareṣu naḥ” ityanena sambandhidvayāvagatipūrvikāṃ sādhyāvagatiṃ darśayati । sādhyadharmaparyupa- sthāpane hi prathamaṃ vikalpadvayena doṣadvayamāśaṅkyeta । na tvasannikṛṣṭasādhyasannidhau prathamaṃ kiṃcit pramāṇamastīti ślokadvayasyārthaḥ ।।
jñātasambandhasya—ityayaṃ jñātasambandhamanumānāṅgamāha ; na ca tadavagatau kiṃcit pramāṇamupalabhāmahe ; ananyabhāvāvagamapūrvikā hyagninā dhūmasya vyāptiḥ ; na punaragnau darśanamātrāvaseyā । na ca deśakālaviprakṛṣṭeṣvanagniṣu dṛśyādarśanamastītyā- śaṅkyāha—bhūyodarśanagamyā hi vyāptiriti । ayamarthaḥ sannikṛṣṭānagnya- bhāvāvagame sati śataśo yadagnau dhūmadarśanaṃ tadanyathānupapattyā ‘niyato'yamagninā’ iti tāvanniyamajñānamupajāyate । niyamajñānasya cānagnau dhūmadarśanam bādhakapratyayaḥ । na ca tadasti । bhaviṣyati—ityāpi bādhakapratyayāśaṅkā rajate'pi rajatajñāne samānā । uktaṃ ca tatra samādhānam—“doṣajñāne tvanutpanne nāśaṅkā niṣpramā- ṇikā” iti । evaṃ cārthaṃ bhūyodarśanaślokasya svayameva vadiṣyati “na cādarśana- mātreṇa gamakaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ” —iti । nanvagnisvalakṣaṇasya dhūmadarśanānantaraṃ vināśāt punaragnyantare dhūmāntaradarśanam, tat kathaṃ bhūyodarśanamucyata ityāśa- ṅkyāha —sāmānyadharmayoḥ । jñāyate bhedahāneneti । ubhayabhedaparityāgena dhūma- tvasyāgnitvena punaḥpunardarśanamastītyarthaḥ । kvacittu viśeṣayorapi bhūyodarśanamastī- tyāha—kvaciccāpi viśeṣayoriti ।। sa dṛṣṭaḥ. cau. mu. ntare punaḥ. cau. mu. gamyā ca. cau. mu. yādṛśo yena mā. .......sahakāriṇaḥ. mā.
kṛttikodayamālakṣya rohiṇyāsattiklṛptivat ।
vyāpteśca dṛśyamānāyāḥ kaścid dharmaḥ prayojakaḥ ।। 13 ।।
asmin satyamunā bhāvyamiti śaktyā nirūpyate ।
anye paraprayuktānāṃ vyāptīnāmupajīvakāḥ ।। 14 ।।
dṛṣṭairapi na tairiṣṭā vyāpakāṃśāvadhāraṇā ।
ye tu tānapi visrabdhaṃ sādhyaṃsiddhau prayuñjate ।। 15 ।।
sulabhapratihetvādidoṣairbhrāmyanti te ciram ।
teṣvāgamaviruddhatvaṃ svayaṃ ceṣṭavighātitā ।। 16 ।।
alaukikavivādāśca varjyāste haitukaistataḥ ।
niṣiddhatvena hiṃsānāmadharmatvaṃ prayujyate ।। 17 ।।
atraivodāharaṇamāha—kṛttiketyardhena । pratidivasam ‘sa evāyam’ iti tattvapratyayād bhedapratyayābhāvācca vyaktinibandhanaiveyaṃ tattvāvagatiriti viśeṣayore- vātra bhūyodarśanaṃ yuktam ।
nanu vyāpyasya gamakatve'gnīṣomīyādiṣvadharmatvāvagatau hiṃsātvasyāpi hetutva- prasaṅgaḥ, vyāptā hi hiṃsā brahmahattyādiṣvadharmatvena ; aniṣṭaṃ caitadityāśaṅkyāha— vyāpteśca dṛśyamānāyā ityādinā ślokadvayena । iha tāvad brahmahattyādiṣvadharmatva- yukteṣu hiṃsātvaniṣiddhatve upalabhyate । tatrobhayadharmasannidhāne'pi niṣiddhatva- mevākṣepakamadharmatvasya ; na hiṃsātvam ; yato niṣedhavidhiprayuktā tatrāniṣṭānuba- ndhitā, na hiṃsātvaprayuktā । ākṣepakaṃ vākṣipyamāṇena niyatam ; na hiṃsātvamākṣe- pakam ; yadi hi niṣedhavidhānaṃ na syāt, tato vināpyadharmatvaṃ syādeva hiṃsā- tvam ; ākṣepakaṃ cānyatropalabhyamānamākṣepyaṃ sannidhāpayati ; anākṣepakastūpalabhya- māno'pi na dharmāntaraṃ sannidhāpayati, aniyatatvāditi ślokadvayārthaḥ ।
aprayojakahetuprayoge pratyakṣānumānāgamavirodhādayaḥ pratijñādoṣāḥ viruddhā- naikāntikatvaṃ ca hetoḥ sādhyavikalatā ca dṛṣṭāntasya ; prayojakahetau prayukte kuta- steṣāmavasara ityāha—ye tvityādinā ślokadvayena ।
idānīṃ prayojakāprayojakavivekaṃ karoti—niṣiddhatvenetyādinā śloka- tairdṛṣṭairapi naiva. cau. mu. sādhyasidhyai cau. mu. sulabhaiḥ, cau. mu. yukte tavāniṣṭā. mā.
tadabhāve na tatsiddhirhiṃsātvādaprayojakāt ।
hetudvayaprayukta ca mithyātve sarvabuddhiṣu ।। 18 ।।
jñānatvotpattimattvādisādhako na prayojakaḥ ।
traivarṇikaprayuktā ca yāgādeḥ svargahetutā ।। 19 ।।
na manuṣyatvamātreṇa śūdratvena prayujyate ।
kṛtasāvayavatvādiprayuktā ca vināśitā ।। 20 ।।
prayatnānantarajñānasadṛśairna prayujyate ।
jātimattvaindriyatvādi vastusanmātrabandhanam ।। 21 ।।
śabdānityatvasiddharthaṃ ko vaded yo na tārkikaḥ ।
tasmād ya eva yasyārtho dṛṣṭaḥ sādhanaśaktitaḥ ।। 22 ।।
sa eva gamakastasya na prasaṅgānvito'pi yaḥ ।
upāttaścekadeśābhyāṃ dharmābhyāmekadeśavān ।। 23 ।।
catuṣṭayena । tatrādharmatvamithyātvasvargahetutvānityatveṣu sādhyeṣu yathāsaṃkhyena niṣiddhatva- bādhakapratyayatvavihitatvakṛtakatvādayo dharmāḥ prayojakāḥ । hiṃsātvapratyayatvamanuṣya- kartṛkatvaprayatnānantarīyakatvādayastvaprayojakāḥ ।
evaṃ ca śabdānityatvasiddhau prayatnānantarīyakatvajātimattvaindriyakatvādīn kutārkiko yaḥ sa prayuṅkta ityāha—jātimattveti । prakṛtamupasaṃharati— tasmāditi ।
“ekadeśadarśanāt” ityuktam ; tadanupapannam ; ekadeśāntare vāgnyākṣepa- kasyaikadeśasya dhūmākhyasya darśanaṃ syāt, ekadeśini vā parvatākhye ? na tāvade- kadeśāntare, tasyāsannikṛṣṭārthatvāt ; nāpyekadeśini, lakṣaṇavākye'nupādānādi- tyāśkyāha—upāttaścetyardhena । “ekadeśadarśanādekadeśāntare” ityetābhyāmeka- deśino'pyupādānādeṣa vākyārthaḥ—ekadeśinyekadeśadarśanāt, ekadeśāntare'sa- nnikṛṣṭe'rthe buddhiḥ iti ।। janakaḥ. mā. nāprayo. cau. mu. hetukām. cau. mu. tasmātsa eva. mā. dharmyapyatraika. cau. mu. kṛtamupa. mā.
apārārdhye hi dhūmādeḥ svarūpe naikadeśatā ।
sa eva cobhayātmāyaṃ gamyo gamaka eva ca ।। 24 ।।
asiddhenaikadeśena gamyaḥ siddhena bodhakaḥ ।
āttaḥ pṛthagabhinno vā prayoktṝṇāṃ vivakṣayā ।। 25 ।।
anityaḥ kṛtako yasmād dhūmavānagnimāniti ।
dharmyabhinnamupādānaṃ bhedo'trāgniritīdṛśe ।। 26 ।।
ekadeśaviśiṣṭaśca dharmyevātrānumīyate ।
na hi tannirapekṣatve saṃbhavatyanumeyatā ।। 27 ।।
kathaṃ punarekadeśābhyāmekadeśina upādānamityāha—apārārthya ityardhena । ekadeśaśabdo hi dharmidharmatayāgnidhūmāvāha, nāgnidhūmarūpatayā ; dharmaścāvinābhāvena dharmiṇaṃ gamayatyevetyarthaḥ । gamyagamakabhāvābhāvenānumānalakṣaṇe kathamanvayo dharmiṇa ityāśkyāha—sa eva cetyardhena ।।
sannikṛṣṭāsannikṛṣṭayorgamyagamakatve sati kathamekasya gamyagamakabhāva iti cet—ityāśaṅkyāha—asiddhenetyardhena । dhūmaviśiṣṭatayā gamakatvamagniviśiṣṭata- yāsyaiva dharmiṇo gamyatvamityarthaḥ । prayoktṛvivakṣāvaśena ca dharmiṇa eva dharmābhyāṃ bhedenābhedena copāttasya gamyagamakabhāva ityāha—āttaityardhena । nanu svārthānu- māne śabdaprayogabhāvāt—āttaḥ, prayoktṝṇām iti caitaddvayamapyanupapannam । ucyate—āttaḥ iti pratīyamānatāmāha । prayoktṛśabdenāpi trirūpe liṅge prayo- ktāraṃ pramātāramāha ।।
atraivodāharaṇamāha—anitya iti । antaḥsañjalpavivakṣayā ca bhedenā- bhedena vā dharmābhyāṃ dharmiṇa upādānam ; na tu svārthānumāne śabdaprayogo'stī- tyuktam ।।
nanu kimidamityucyate—dharmyevāsiddhenaikadeśena viśiṣṭo gamyate iti, yāvataikadeśamātrasyaivāsiddhatvād gamyatā kimiti na bhavatītyāśaṅkyāha—ekadeśe- tyardhena । kasmādityāha—na hīti ।। svarūpairnaika. cau. mu. vā. cau. mu. ataḥ cau. mu.
na dharmamātraṃ siddhatvāt tathā dharmī tathobhayam ।
vyastaṃ vāpi samastaṃ vā svātantryeṇānumīyate ।। 28 ।।
ekadeśasya liṅgatvaṃ sādhyenānugamo'sya ca ।
dvayaṃ ca na syādiṣṭaṃ sat pakṣeṣveṣu yathākramam ।। 29 ।।
anityatvādino dharmāḥ kṛtakatvādayo na hi ।
dhvaninānugamo naiṣāṃ nobhayasyobhayena vā ।। 30 ।।
sambandho'pyanupādānānnāmnā ṣaṣṭhyāpi vā mitau ।
na cāpyanugamastena liṅgasyeha nidarśyate ।। 31 ।।
na cākāradvayaṃ tasya sādhyasādhanabhāg bhavet ।
ekadeśaviśiṣṭadharminirapekṣatayānumeyakalpanāyāṃ dharmadharmyubhayeṣāmanumeyatvaṃ syāt, tatra ca siddhasādhyatetyāha—na dharmamātramiti ।।
evameteṣāmanumeyatvaṃ siddhasādhyatayā nirākṛtya adhunaiteṣveva sādhyeṣu hetu- doṣaṃ pratipādayitumāha—ekadeśasyeti ।।
tatrānityatatvamātrānumeyapakṣe kṛtakatvasya pakṣadharmatā na syāt ; śabdalakṣa- ṇe'pi ca dharmiṇyanumeye vyāptirna syāt ; na hi śabdena kṛtakatvaṃ vyāptam ; ubhayānumeyapakṣe tūbhayaṃ na syātḥ na hi śabdānityatvayoḥ kṛtakatvaṃ dharmaḥ, nāpyu- bhayena vyāptamityāha—anityeti ।।
nāpi dharmadharmiṇoḥ sambandho'numeyaḥ, nāmapadena ṣaṣṭhyā vā lakṣaṇavākye'nu- pādānādityāha—sambandha ityardhena । na ca kṛtakatvena saha dharmadharmisambandhasya vyāptilakṣaṇaḥ sambandho'stītyāha—na cetyardhena ।
nāpi kṛtakatvasya dharmadharmisambandhadharmatetyāha—na cākāretyardhena । tasmād yathā daṇḍiśabdasya daṇḍaviśiṣṭaḥ puruṣo'rthaḥ, sambandhastu gamyamānaḥ ; evaṃ dhūma- tatomayam. mā. manumānatvam. mā.
tasmādarthagṛhītatvānmatuvarthasya gamyatā ।। 32 ।।
na svātantreṇa mantavyā yathā daṇḍyādiśabdataḥ ।
viśiṣṭārthapratītau syāt sambandho nāntarīyakaḥ ।। 33 ।।
viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvamāpannau dvāvimāvataḥ ।
gamyāvaṅgāṅgibhāvastu kaiścidiṣṭo vikalpataḥ ।। 34 ।।
sarvathā dharmiṇo dharmo dharmeṇa tvavagamyate ।
viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatve na viśeṣo'vadhāryate ।। 35 ।।
tatrottaraṃ vadantyanye yadi dharmī viśeṣaṇam ।
hetudharmeṇa sambandhastatrāprādhānyato'sphuṭaḥ ।। 36 ।।
syāpi dharmī dharmaviśiṣṭo'numeyaḥ, sambandhaśca gamyamāna ityāha—tasmādityādinā sārdhena ślokena ।।
tasmād viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāpannayordharmadharmiṇoranumeyatvam, naikasya, nāpi dvayorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvarahitayorityāha—viśeṣaṇeti gamyau ityantena । tatra kecidāhuḥ—bhavatu viśiṣṭasyānumetvam ; dharmiṇa eva tu dharmaviśiṣṭasya, na punarviparyaya ityatra na kiñcit pramāṇaṃ prayojanaṃ ceti ityāha—aṅgaṅgibhāva iti śeṣeṇa ।।
etāvattvatra tantramityāha—sarvathetyardhena । viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaniyame na pramāṇam, nāpi prayojanamityāha—viśeṣaṇetyardhena ।।
tadetad dūṣayitumāha—tatrottaramityādinā ślokadvayena sapādena । yadi dharmasyāpi dharmiviśiṣṭasyānumeyatvaṃ syāt tadā svārthānumānapūrvakatvena parārthānumānasya śabdaviśiṣṭānityatvapratijñāyāṃ kṛtakatvamupādīyamānaṃ naiva dharmiṇā śabdena saṃbadhyeta, dharmaṃ pratyupasarjanatvena nirdeśāt ; iṣyate ca taddharmatvam । kṛtakatvasya viśeṣyatvena prādhānyād dharmeṇaiva saha sambandhaḥ prāpnoti । tatastatrānupapadyamānamānarthakyatadaṅganyā- yena dharmiṇā śabdena yojayitavyamiti viprakarṣaḥ śabdasya vā punaruccāraṇaṃ kartavyam- sādhyatā. mā. pratītā syāt. cau. mu. tasyāprādhānyataḥ sphuṭaḥ. cau. mu. Omitted. iti. mā.
pradhānatvāddhi dharmeṇa sambandho vākyato bhavet ।
tatrāsambhavataḥ paścāt kalpyo'sau dharmiṇā saha ।। 37 ।।
dhvanerityathavā vācyamanvayasya tu darśane ।
bhedopāttasya dharmasya guṇabhāvo na duṣyati ।। 38 ।।
argerdeśaviśiṣṭatve na caitat pakṣalakṣaṇam ।
viśiṣṭatāsya deśena bhavedevaṃprakārikā ।। 39 ।।
yo'gni so'sti kvacid deśe yo dṛṣṭo yatra tatra vā ।
agniḥ pūrvānubhūto vā deśamātreṇa saṅgataḥ ।। 40 ।।
anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvācchabdasya iti । nanu dharmaviśiṣṭadharmipratijñāyāmapi hetu- vacanavadanvayavākye'pi dharmiṇaiva saha sambandhaḥ prāpnoti ; na dharmāntareṇānityatvena, pratijñāvākye dharmyupasarjanatvena nirdiṣṭatvāt—yo yaḥ kṛtakaḥ sa śabdaḥ ; na punaḥ- yadyat kṛtakaṃ tattadanityamityāśaṅkyāha—anvayasya tu darśana ityāditripādyā । yadyapi pratijñāvākye dharmyupasarjanatvena dharmanirdeśaḥ, tathāpi sa na doṣāya, punaruccāritasyānvayavākyena sambandhāt । avaśyaṃbhāvi ca punaruccāraṇam anyathānvayānavagamādityarthaḥ ।।
itaśca deśaviśiṣṭasyāgneranumeyatvaṃ nāstītyāha—agnerityardhena । agnimātraṃ vā deśamātreṇa viśiṣṭamanumeyaṃ syāt, sambandhagrahaṇakālapratipannasya vāgniviśeṣasyā- nirdhāritadeśaviśiṣṭasyānumeyatvam, tasyaiva vāgniviśeṣasya sarvadeśaviśiṣṭasyā- numeyatvam, agnimātraṃ vā sannihitadeśaviśiṣṭamanumeyaṃ syāt, sambandhagrahaṇakālā- vagatasya vāgniviśeṣasya pratyakṣadeśaviśiṣṭasyānumeyatvam, parvatasthasya vāgniviśeṣasya deśamātreṇa viśiṣṭasyānumeyatvam, tasyaiva vāgneḥ rasavatyākhyadeśaviśiṣṭasyānumeyatvam, parvatādigatasya vāsannihitadeśaparvatādiviśiṣṭasyānumeyatvaṃ syādityetānaṣṭau pakṣān dūṣaṇāya pradarśayitumāha-ślokatrayeṇākṣaratrayaśūnyena viśiṣṭetyādinā । tatrādyayoḥ siddhasādhyatā pakṣadoṣaḥ, tṛtīyādiṣu saptamapakṣaparyanteṣu pratyakṣādivirodhinī pratijñetyāha—akṣaratrayādhikena iha tu ityādinārdhena ।। deśāviśiṣṭatve. cau. mu. ṣaṇasya. mā.
yo'gniḥ so'nena yukto vā yo dṛṣṭo'nena so'thavā ।
yo'yaṃ sa deśamātreṇa yuktaḥ pūrveṇa vāpyayam ।। 41 ।।
etaddeśaviśiṣṭo vā yo'yamagniritīha tu ।
pūrvayoḥ siddhasādhyatvaṃ pareṣu syād viruddhatā ।। 42 ।।
vyāptiretena deśena sarvāgnīnāṃ nū yujyate ।
nāpi pūrvasya nāpyeṣa vahniḥ sarvairviśiṣyate ।। 43 ।।
deśaiḥ pūrveṇa vāpyasya na deśena viśeṣyatā ।
etaddeśaviśiṣṭo'yamityetat kathyate katham ।। 44 ।।
yadā deśānapekṣo'gnirnāyamityavadhāryate ।
agneḥ pūrvataraṃ cātra deśa evāvadhāryate ।। 45 ।।
tajjñānakālabuddhaśca na deśaḥ syād viśeṣaṇam ।
deśasya parvatādestu svarūpe pāvakādṛte ।। 46 ।।
gṛhīte'gniviśiṣṭasya punarjñānaṃ na duṣyati ।
tasmād dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ syāt prameyatā ।। 47 ।।
tatrāpi spaṣṭatayā tṛtīyapakṣaparityāgena caturthādārabhya virodhamupadarśayitu- māha—sārdhena ślokena vyāptirityādinā । idānīmaṣṭamapakṣaṃ nirākartumāha— etaddeśeti । ayamagniretaddeśaviśiṣṭaḥ sādhayitumabhipretaḥ yadaiva pramāṇāntareṇa sanni- hitadeśanirapekṣaḥ ‘agnirayam’ iti pratipannaḥ syāt, tadā sannihitadeśaviśiṣṭo'- numeyaḥ syāt yathā utpalarūpatayāvadhāritasya nīlamavacchedakam ; na tvatra sannihita- deśanirapekṣaḥ ‘agnirayam’ ityavadhārayituṃ śakyate । tasmānna ‘ayam’ iti nirdiṣṭe'sannihitadeśasyāvacchedakatvam, sannihitadeśāvacchinnasyaiva ‘ayam’ iti nirdeśāditi । agninirapekṣastu deśaḥ pūrvameva ‘ayam’ iti pratīyate ; ataḥ śakyate'gniviśiṣṭatayānumātum ‘ayamagniviśiṣṭaḥ’ iti । tasmādayameva pakṣārthaḥ- agnimānayam, na punaḥ-ayamagniretaddeśavān iti ityāha—agneḥ pūrvataramiti । nanu dharmiṇo'numeyatve sannikṛṣṭatvāt tasya asannikṛṣṭagrahaṇamanarthakamityāśaṅkyāha— deśasyeti । pāvakarahitasya parvatāderaparokṣatā, agniviśiṣṭatayā cānumeyatvam । tathā ca tasyāsannikṛṣṭataivetyarthaḥ । upasaṃharati—tasmādityardhena ।। cāpyasya. mā. yate na śakyate. mā.
sā deśasyāgniyuktasya dhūmasyānyaiśca kalpitā ।
nanu śabdavadeva syālliṅgamyaṃ viśeṣaṇam ।। 48 ।।
naivaṃ na hyatra liṅgasya śaktyanekatvakalpanā ।
na ca tasyānumeyatvaṃ viśeṣyaścāvadhāritaḥ ।। 49 ।।
viśiṣṭatvena cājñānāt tanmātrasyānumeyatā ।
nanu dhūmasya dharmitve hetoḥ pakṣaikadeśatā ।। 50 ।।
dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇo'numeyatvamuktam, tadanupapannam ; deśasya parvatāderddha- rmitvaṃ syāt, dhūmasya vā ? na tāvat parvatādeḥ ; yo hi parvatāvayavo'gnisaṃyuktaḥ ; sa eva tena viśiṣṭaḥ । yastu parvatāvayavaḥ pratyakṣaḥ, tasyāgniviśiṣṭatā nāsti ; yadi syāt, pratyakṣagamyataiva syāt ; dhūmasya tu dharmitve pratijñārthaikadeśatā hetoḥ syāt । tasmādaparokṣatvena taddharmatā dhūmasya na śakyāvagantumityāśaṅkyāha—sā deśasyetyardhena । parvatasyāvayavino dhūmasya vā dharmitvam ; avayavinaścobhayātmatayā gamyagamakabhāvo yukta evetyarthaḥ । nanu śabdavadeva nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇanyāyena viśeṣaṇamātraviṣayataiva dhūmasya kasmānna bhavatīti codayati—nanvityardhena ।।
tatra parihāramāha—naivamityardhena । yuktaṃ yacchabdasya viśeṣaṇamātraviṣayatvam ; viśeṣyaviṣayatve hi śaktyanekatvakalpanā syāt ; na tatkalpanāyāṃ pramāṇamasti, vyaktipratipatteranyathāpyupapadyamānatvāt । liṅgasya tu vyāptibalena gamakatvam’ na śaktyā । matvarthaśca matvarthena vyāpta iti tayoreva gamyagamakabhāvaḥ, nāgnidhūmayo- rityarthaḥ । na ca viśeṣaṇamātrasyānumeyatvam, agnyādeḥ siddhasādhyatvāt । nāpi viśeṣyamātraparvatādeḥ, pratyakṣeṇaiva sannikṛṣṭatvāt । dharmaviśiṣṭasya tu dharmiṇaḥ pramāṇāntareṇāsannikṛṣṭatvāt tasyaivānumeyatvamityāha—na ca tasyeti ।
nanu dhūmasya dharmitve pratijñārthaikadeśo heturbhavatviti codayati— nanvityardhena । tasmāttasya. mā. dhūmaviśeṣyatve. cau. mu. ṣṭaḥ । tasmāda... ....ntum । yastu. mā. parvatāvayavinaḥ. mā.
naitadasti viśiṣṭe hi sādhye sāmānyahetutā ।
dhṛmatajjñānasambandhasmṛtigrāmāṇyakalpane ।। 51 ।।
phalena viṣayaikatvaṃ tadvyāpārāt puroditam ।
prameyadhīpramāṇatvaṃ bhāṣyakārastu manyate ।। 52 ।।
pratyakṣāniyamoktiśca sarvatraivānuṣajyate ।
anumānagṛhītasya tenaiva pratipādanam ।। 53 ।।
tatra parihāramāha—naitadastītyardhena । dhūmasvalakṣaṇasyāgniviśiṣṭasyānu- meyatvam, dhūmatvaṃ ca liṅgam । atra ca yadāgnijñānaṃ phalam, tadā dhūmajñānasambandha- smṛticatuṣṭayasya vikalpena prāmāṇyam ; phalena ca vipayaikatvam, tatra vyāpārāt । taduktam “tatra vyāpārācca pramāṇatā” ityāha—dhūmatajjñāneti । nanu bhāṣyakāraḥ prameyabuddheḥ prāmāṇyamāha—“anumānamasannikṛṣṭe'rthe buddhiḥ” iti । tat bhāṣyakāraḥ prameyabuddheḥ prāmāṇyamāha—“anumānamasannikṛṣṭe'rthe buddhiḥ” iti । tat kathaṃ dhūmādicatuṣṭayasya vikalpena prāmāṇyamityāśaṅkyāha—prameyadhīti । pradarśanārthametat- “anumānamasannikṛṣṭe'rthe buddhiḥ” iti ; pratyakṣasūtroktameva tvaniyamābhidhānam— “buddhirvā janma vā” ityādi sarvatrānumānādau yojanīyamityarthaḥ ।
atra keciccodayanti—“anumānaṃ jñātasambandhasya” iti parārthānumāna- manenā'vyāptamiti । tatraivaṃ codite parārthānumānābhāvenaivāvyāpteḥ parihāro vaktavyaḥ ; rūpatrayayuktasya hi kṛtakatvādervādinaṃ prativādinaṃ ca pratyanumānatvam ; tasya ca svārthataiva । rūpatrayapratipādakasya tu vākyasya tatra parārthatā । tasya cāgamakatvānnānumānatvam । prativādisiddhameva tu rūpatrayaṃ vādī svavākyena smārayati । taduktam—
“yatastu sādhanāpekṣā tenāsyaiva pramāṇatā ।
tatsmṛtyutpattimātre tu vākyavyāpāra iṣyate ।।” iti ।
evaṃ ca vadataitat pradarśitam—yāvataiva rūpatrayasmṛtirbhavati, tāvadeva prayoktavyam ; nādhikaṃ pratijñāvacanādi, asādhanāṅgatvāditi । athāpi kimetena ? bhavatu parā- rthānumānam ; tatrāpyabhyupagamavādenaitallakṣaṇaṃ yojayitumāha—anumānagṛhītasyeti । viśeṣe. cau. mu. manenāptamiti. mā. athāpi kiṃ na tena bhavatu paramārthānu. mā.
parebhyo vāñcachatā vācyaḥ pūrvaṃ pakṣo yathoditaḥ ।
tatra dharmiṇamuddiśya sādhyadharmo vidhīyate ।। 54 ।।
niyamastadvipakṣācca kalpyate nāvirodhinaḥ ।
asannikṛṣṭavācā ca dvayamatra jihāsitam ।। 55 ।।
tādrūpyeṇa paricchittistadviparyayato'pi vā ।
pramitasya pramāṇe hi nāpekṣā jāyate punaḥ ।। 56 ।।
yadānumānagṛhītamanumānenaiva pratipādayituṃ vivakṣyate tadā yathoditaḥ pakṣo dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī pūrvaṃ pratipādanīyaḥ ।
nanu parārthānumāne pratijñāvacanamasādhanāṅgam, pratijñārthasiddhāvanupayujyamā- natvāt । tathā hi—na tat sākṣādanityatvaṃ sādhayati, anityatvenāniyatatvāt । nāpi sādhanapratipādakatvenāṅgatvam hetutvavacanavat, sādhyābhidhānāt । nāpi sādhanaviṣayapratipādakatvena, sādhanasādhanaviṣayapratipādanasyaivānupayogitvāt ; apradarśitaviṣayamapi rūpatrayaṃ prayoktuṃ śakyata eva ; prayuktaṃ ca sādhyaniścayaṃ janayatveva । satyamevametat ; pratijñāvacana eva tu parārthānumānavādinaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ । abhyupagamavādena tvetallakṣaṇaṃ parārthānumāne'pi yojitam ; na tu parārthānumānaṃ nāma kiṃcidastītyuktam ।
kathaṃ pratipādanīya ityāha—tatra dharmiṇamityardhena । tatra pratyakṣasiddhaṃ dharmiṇamuddiśyāsiddhamanityatvādyupādīyate—yaḥ śabdaḥ, so'nityaḥ iti ।।
nanūpādīyamānamanityatvamatroddiśyamānaśabdaviśeṣaṇam ; tatra yadyayamarthaḥ— śabda evānityo na ghaṭādiḥ iti) tadā vyāptiśūnyatā hetoḥ ; atha— śabdo'nitya eva iti) tadāpyapakṣadharmatetyāśaṅgyāha—niyama iti । śabdoddeśena hyanityatvamupādīyamānamanityatvavirodhidharmāntaravyavacchedenaiva viśeṣaṇam—anitya eva śabdaḥ, na nityaḥ iti, ato na vyāptiśūnyatvaṃ nāpyapakṣadharmatā hetorityarthaḥ । asannikṛṣṭagrahaṇena ca tādrūpyeṇa tadviparyayeṇa vā sannikṛṣṭasya pakṣābhāsatāṃ darśayati—asannikṛṣṭeti । yataḥ pramāṇāntarapramite vastuni pramāṇāntarāpekṣaiva nāstītyāha—pramitasyetyardhena ।। pūrvapakṣa;. cau. mu. ca. cau. mu. tathā. mā. mānaṃ śabda. mā. Omitted. iti. mā. Omitted. iti. mā.
tādrūpyeṇa paricchinne pramāṇaṃ niṣphalaṃ param ।
vaiparītyaparicchinne nāvakāśaḥ parasya tu ।। 57 ।।
mūle tasya hyanutpanne pūrveṇa viṣayo hṛtaḥ ।
pratyakṣādeśca ṣaṭkasya yenaivārtho'vadhāritaḥ ।। 58 ।।
yadi tāvadyathaiva sādhayitumiṣṭastathaiva pramāṇāntareṇa pratipannaḥ ; tataḥ siddha- sādhyatetyāha—tādrūpyeṇa paricchinna ityardhena । atha siṣādhayiṣitānityatva- viparyayeṇa pratyakṣādinā pratipannaḥ, tataḥ pratyakṣādivirodhinī pratijñetyāha— vaiparītyetyardhena । pratyakṣeṇa siṣādhayiṣitadharmaviparyayeṇāvagate śabdādāvanumānasyā- vakāśa eva nāstīsyarthaḥ ।।
nanu yadi nāma siṣādhayiṣitadharmaviparyayeṇa pratyakṣādibhyaḥ śabdādayo'vaga- myante’ tathāpyanumānasyāvakāśaḥ kimiti na bhavati ? kṛtakatvaṃ hyanityatvena vyāptaṃ śabdadharmatayā avagamyamānamanityatvajñānaṃ janayati ; tacca rūpatrayayuktaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ pratyakṣādivirodhe'pi pratijñāmātraparyavasite'styeva ; ataḥ pratyakṣādivirodho na pratijñādoṣa ityāśaṅkyāha—mūle tasyetyardhena । pratyakṣādinā siṣādhayiṣitadharmavi- paryayeṇāvagate śabdādau kṛtakatvamanityatvajñānaṃ na janayatyeva, nityatve'pi darśanāda- naikāntikatvādapakṣadharmatvādvā । hetudoṣa eva tarhyayam’ na pratijñādoṣaḥ । satyam ; rūpatrayabādha evāyam ; pakṣaviparyayadvāreṇa tu pakṣadoṣa ityucyate sādhyavikalatvādaya iva dṛṣṭāntadoṣāḥ, na tu pakṣamātraparyavasito'yaṃ bādhaḥ, pakṣasyāpramāṇatvāt ; hetuścedabādhitarūpaḥ ; pratyakṣādinā sādhyaviparyayāvagame'pi kimiti sādhyajñānaṃ na janayati ? rūpatrayayuktasya tu bādhena tallakṣaṇameva dūṣitaṃ syāt । bhavatu pratyakṣeṇa viparyayāvagame'numānasya bādhaḥ, anumānena tu viparyayāvagame tulyatvena kimi- tītarasya bādha ityāśaṅkyāha—pratyakṣādeśceti । pratyakṣādīnāṃ madhye yenaiva siṣādha- yiṣitadharmaviparyayo'vagamyate tenaivetarasya bādhaḥ । anumānenāpi hi siddhāvayavena athasiddhasādha. mā. kṛtatvasya nityatvena vyāptaśa. mā. atha pratyakṣādi. mā. ṣādha saṃsiddhau. dhātupāṭhaḥ
tenaivottarabādhaḥ syād vikalpāderasambhavāt ।
agrāhyatā tu śabdādeḥ pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate ।। 59 ।।
teṣāmaśrāvaṇatvādi viruddhamanumānataḥ ।
na hi śrāvaṇatā nāma pratyakṣeṇāvagamyate ।। 60 ।।
sānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ gamyate badhirādiṣu । ।
tridhā śabdavirodhaḥ syāt prasiddhyadivibhāgataḥ ।। 61 ।।
pratijñāpūrvasañjalpasarvalokaprasiddhitaḥ ।
yāvañjīvamahaṃ maunītyuktimātreṇa bādhyate ।। 62 ।।
sarvavākyamṛṣātve tu dharmauktyaivātmabādhanam ।
viparyaye'vagate hetvantaramasiddhāvayavaṃ siṣādhayiṣitadharmaviparyaye'pi darśanāda- naikāntikatvenāpakṣadharmatvena vā sādhyajñānaṃ na janayatīti vikalpasamuccayau nāśa- ṅkitavyāvityarthaḥ ।
tatra tāvat pratyakṣavirodhamāha—agrāhyatetyardhena । śabdo na pratīyate—iti pratijñāyāṃ pratyakṣavirodho vaktavyaḥ ।।
anumānavirodhamāha—teṣāmityardhena । aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ—iti pratijñā- yāmanumānavirodho vaktavyaḥ । nanu diṅnāgena “pratyakṣodāharaṇametat” iti varṇitam ; tannirākaraṇārthamāha—na hīti । śrotragrāhyatā hi śabdadharmaḥ śrotreṇa nāvasīyate, kintu badhirādigatānvayavyatirekaliṅgāvaseyā ।।
idānīṃ prasiddhyādivibhāgena triprakāraṃ śabdavirodhamāha—tridhetyardhena ।।
prasiddhyādivibhāgena—iti yaduktaṃ tatrodāharaṇamāha—pratijñetyardhena । tatra tāvat pratijñāvirodhaṃ triprakāramāha—yāvañjīvamityardhena । yāvajjīvamahaṃ maunī—iti pratijñāte pratijñoccāraṇenaiva dharmadharminirapekṣeṇa pratijñārtho bādhyate, maunitvaśabdoccāraṇayorvirodhāditi ।।
idārnī dharmaparyālocanena pratijñayaiva pratijñārtho bādhyata ityāha—sarvavākye- tyardhena । sarvaṃ vākyaṃ mṛṣā—iti pratijñārthe pratipādakasyāpi vākyasya dharmitvena pratijñādi. cau. mu. Omitted. anaikāntikatvena. mā.
dharmyuktyāha yato jātaḥ sā vandhyā jananī mama ।। 63 ।।
bauddhasya śabdanityatvaṃ pūrvopetena bādhyate ।
candraśabdābhidheyatvaṃ śaśino yo niṣedhati ।। 64 ।।
sa sarvalokasiddhena candrajñānena bādhyate ।
jñātagogavayākāraṃ prati yaḥ sādhayedidam ।। 65 ।।
mṛṣātve satyanyeṣāmamṛṣātvaprasaṅgaḥ । sāṃprataṃ dharmiparyālocanena pratijñayaiva pratijñārtho bādhyata ityāha—dharmyuktyetyardhena । jananītvameva hi vandhyātvasya bādhakam । vivakṣātaścaitaducyate—dharmyuktyeti ; vandhyātvamapi jananītvasya bādhakaṃ yataḥ ।।
adhunā pūrvasañjalpabāghodāharaṇamāha—bauddhasyetyardhena । kṣaṇikāḥ sarva- saṃskārāḥ—ityabhyupagamya śabdanityatvapratijñatā pūrvatanasvābhyupagamena tāṃ bādhata ityarthaḥ । nanu ca pratyakṣānumānavyatirekeṇābhyupagamapramāṇābhāvāt ko'yamabhyupagama- virodho nāma ? atha tayorevānena mukhenopanyāsaḥ, tābhyāmeva tarhi bādhaḥ ; sa ca pradarśita eva । śabdabādhaprakārapradarśane naiva prasaṅgaḥ syāt । satyamevam ; pramāṇā- ntarapūrvakeṇaiva tu kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamānna pratijñābādho'yam ; tāvanmātrālocaneno- cyata ityadoṣaḥ ।

upasaṃharati—tasmādityardhena । dvayoḥ pṛthaggamakayoḥ viruddhārthasambandhayo- rekatra darśanaṃ viruddhāvyabhicāriṇyudāharaṇamiti । evaṃ sandehahetostriprakāratāmupa- nyasyedānīṃ viparītahetordarśanabhedenānekaprakāratāṃ darśayitumāha—ṣoḍheti । śrutyartho- ktasya pratijñārthasya hetunā bāghāyāṃ viruddhatvam ; ṣaṭprakāraṃ tadeke manyante—dharma- dharmyubhayeṣāṃ svarūpaviśeṣe viparītasādhanāt, catuṣprakāratvamapare—dharmadharmisvarūpa- viparītasādhanādubhayasvarūpobhayaviśeṣayostatraivāntarbhāvāt ; sādhyaviparyayasādhanā- dekaprakāramapare ।
hetunā sādhyadharmasvarūpabādhāmudāharati—nityatva ityardhena । hetunārthokta- dharmaviśeṣabādho'yamatra prayoga ityāha—bādha iti sārdhena । śabdasvarūpaṃ dharmi, pūrvamapi sambandhāvadhāraṇādarthavaditi sādhyo dharmaḥ, vibhaktimattvāditi hetuḥ, sambandhagrahaṇottarakālavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ । pūrvaṃ sambandhagrahaṇādarthavattā sidhyantī svarūpeṇaivārthena sidhyatītyarthavattvasādhyadharmaviśeṣo'yamarthokto'bhipretaḥ ।।
yathā cārthoktadharmaviśeṣabādhastathā darśayitumāha—asvarūpārthayogastviti ।। vāpi. cau. mu. daśitau. cau. mu. Omitted pṛthaggamakayoḥ mā. Omitted dṛṣṭāntaḥ. mā. sidhyantītyartha. mā.
tena prāgapi sambandhādasvarūpārthatā bhavet ।
ihapratyayahetutvād dravyādervyatiricyate ।। 100 ।।
samavāyo yathehāyaṃ ghaṭa ityādisaṅgatiḥ ।
atrāpyasamavāyatvaṃ saṃyogasyeva sidhyati ।। 101 ।।
tena dharmisvarūpasya vaiparītyād viruddhatā ।
yacca sattāvadekatvaṃ samavāyasya kalpitam ।। 102 ।।
tatra saṃyogavadbhedāt syād viśeṣaviruddhatā ।
nityamātmāstitā kaiścid yadā sautrāntikaṃ prati ।। 103 ।।
sādhyate'vayavābhāvād vyomavad dvayabādhanam ।
tadobhayorviśeṣasya bādhaivaṃ sādhyate yadā ।। 104 ।।
idānīṃ dharmisvarūpabādhaṃ pradarśayituṃ prayogamudāharati—iheti । samavāya- svarūpaṃ dharmi, dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣebhyo vyatiricyata iti sādhyo dharmaḥ, iha- pratyayotpādakatvāditi hetuḥ, saṃyogavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।
atra prayoge dharmisvarūpaviparītasādhano'yaṃ heturityāha—atrāpīti ।।
saṃyogavadihapratyayahetutvena guṇāntargatisādhanād dharmiviśeṣaviparītasādha- ko'pyayaṃ heturityāha—yacceti । ekatvaṃ samavāyasya dharmiṇo'bhipretam ; ihapratyaya- hetutvaṃ ca saṃyogavadanekatāṃ sādhayati ।।
ubhayasvarūpabodho'tra prayoga ityāha—nityeti । niravayavatvasyobhayābhāvena vyāpterākāśe sautrāntikasyetyetatpradarśanārthaṃ sautrāntikagrahaṇam ।।
ubhayaviśeṣabādho'tra prayoga iti darśayati—tadobhayoriti । cakṣurādīnā- miti dharminirdeśaḥ, pārārthyamiti sādhyo dharmaḥ, bhāgavattvalakṣaṇāt saṅghātāditi hetuḥ, śayanādivaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।। samavayitvaṃ saṃyogasyaiva. mā. bādho'yam. cau. mu. dharmasvarūpa. rmā. hetuśca. mā. māvatvalakṣaṇāt. mā. svapanādi. mā.
pārārthyaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ saṅghātācchayanādivat ।
śayane saṅghapārārthaṃ bhautikavyāptahetuke ।। 105 ।।
ātmānaṃ prati pārārthyamasiddhamiti bādhanam ।
asaṃhataparārthatve iṣṭe saṃhatatāpi ca ।। 106 ।।
anāhaṅkārikatvaṃ ca cakṣurādeḥ prasajyate ।
gamakasyaikadeśasya vyāptiṃ gamyena bhāṣitum ।। 107 ।।
sādhyasādharmyavaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ pratipādyate ।
tatra hetvarthamuddiśya sādhyopādānamiṣyate ।। 108 ।।
adhunā yathobhayaviśeṣabādhaḥ tathā darśayati—śayana iti । śayanākhye hi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi khaṭvāyāṃ sāvayavatvalakṣaṇo hetuḥ saṃhatapārārthyena bhautikatvena ca vyāpto dṛśyamānaścakṣurādīnāṃ tathāvidhameva pārārthyaṃ bhautikatvaṃ ca sāghayatītyabhi- matātmasiddhiviparyayasādhanād viruddhatvamiti ।।
cakṣuḥparārthatvayoḥ dharmadharmisvarūpayoḥ yau viśeṣāvabhipretau—asaṃhatābhauti- katve tadubhayaviśeṣaviruddho'yamucyata ityāha—asaṃhateti ।
“sandehaviparītatvahetū cātra nirākṛtau । jñātasambandhavacanāt”— ityuktam ; kathaṃ punarekadeśasyaikadeśāntareṇa niyamasambandhaḥ parasmai pratipādyata ityāha—gamakasyeti । gamakasya hi dhūmādergamyenāgninā saha vyāptipratipādanāya sādharmyavaidharmyadṛṣṭāntau prayoktavyāvityarthaḥ ।।
evaṃ sati rūpadvayapratipādakatvena hetuvacanāvevaitau pakṣadharmāpratipādakatvena na tathā vyavahāraḥ । tatra sādharmyadṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇaṃ tāvadāha—tatretyardhena । sādharmyadṛṣṭā- ntavākye hi hetumuddiśya sādhyamupādeyam—yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityameva iti ।। dṛṣṭa. cau. mu. anaha. cau. mu. vyāptiḥ. cau. mu. bādhaka. mā. tatvehatau. mā. ajñātasambandha. mā. dharmapratipādake. vyavahāraḥ. mā.
uddeśyo vyāpyate dharmī vyāpakaścetaro mataḥ ।
yadvavṛttayogaḥ prāthamyamityādyuddeśyalakṣaṇam ।। 109 ।।
tadvṛttamevakāraśca syādupādeyalakṣaṇam ।
vadatyarthaṃ svaśaktyā ca śabdo vaktranapekṣayā ।। 110 ।।
sādhyahetutvamarthānāṃ vyāptiśaktyanurodhataḥ ।
tatrājñānād yadā vaktā sahabhāvavivakṣayā ।। 111 ।।
evaṃ hetvarthaḥ sādhyena vyāptaḥ kathito bhavatītyāha—uddeśya ityardhena । kathaṃ punaruddiśyamānasya nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ, kathaṃ copādeyasyetyāha—yadvṛttayoga iti । uddiśyamānaṃ hi yadvṛttayuktaṃ prathamaṃ ca nirdeṣṭavyam ; upādīyamānaṃ tadvṛtattai- vakārābhyāṃ—yat kṛtakaṃ, yataḥ kṛtakaḥ ; tadanityameva, tato'nitya eva—iti vā । yato vṛttagrahaṇena tadvibhaktyantaṃ pratīyāt taratamau ca pratyayāviti ।।
idānīmuktasādharmyadṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇānanvitatvenārthasiddhaṃ sādharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāsama- prayogāya darśayituṃ prasaktiṃ tāvadāha—vadatyarthamiti । yadi hetoḥ sādhyenānugama- pradarśanavivakṣāyāṃ yāvaduccāryate sāhityapratipādakaṃ viparītapratipādakaṃ vā vākyam, tatsarvaṃ vakturvivakṣānurodhena svārthaparityāgena tathaiva pratipādayet—anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt, paṭe kṛtakanāśitve staḥ, yadanityaṃ tat kṛtakameva iti vā ; tadā naiva sādharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhavet ; tathā samyak prayukte'pi vākye yadi śabdānu- rodhenaivārtho vyavatiṣṭheta, tadāpi naiva sādharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhavet—amūrtatvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ, yadamūrtaṃ tadanityameva karmavat ityādi ; yadā tu vaktṛvivakṣāpari- tyāgena svaśaktyā śabdo'rthaṃ pratipādayati, gamyagamakabhāvo'pi vārthānāṃ vastubala- pravṛttavyāptyapekṣayā, na śabdānurodhena ; tadāsti prasaktiḥ sādharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāsasya śabdadoṣeṇa vastudoṣeṇa vā । tatra śabdadoṣakṛtaṃ tāvat sodāharaṇamāha—tatrā- jñānāditi sārdhena ślokadvayena । yadā hetoḥ sādhyenānugamapradarśanamajānan uddeśa. mā. upādāna. ratnākaraḥ. sahacāra. cau. mu.
viparyayeṇa vā hetorna vyāpyatvaṃ vivakṣati ।
vivakṣannapi vā śabdaṃ tadyogyaṃ na vaded yadā ।। 112 ।।
ghaṭe kṛtakanāśitve nāśi vyāptaṃ kṛtena vā ।
na tadeṣṭasya hetutvaṃ syādaniṣṭasya vāpi tat ।। 113 ।।
tasmād vyāpyatvarūpeṇa vācyo hetutvasammataḥ ।
yadā samyak prayukte'pi vākye'rtho na tathā bhavet ।। 114 ।।
sādhyahetūbhayavyāptiśūnyatvāt paramārthataḥ ।
nityo dhvaniramūrtatvāt karmavat paramāṇuvat ।। 115 ।।
paṭavad vyomavaccāpi tadasadvādinaṃ prati ।
dharmyasiddhāvapi hyevaṃ dṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhavet ।। 116 ।।
sāhityamātraṃ viparītavyāptiṃ vā pratipādayati, jānannapi vā vivakṣānusāreṇa śabda- parijñānena pramādādvā noccārayati-ghaṭe kṛtakanāśitve nāśi vyāptaṃ kṛtena vā darśayati, tatra sāhityapakṣe kṛtakatvasya hetutvenābhimatasya hetutvaṃ na syāt । viparītapakṣe tu sādhyatvenābhimatasyānityatvasya hetutvaṃ syāditi sādharmyadṛṣṭāntā- bhāsatetyāha—tatrājñānāditi । upasaṃharati—tasmādityardhena ।।
“sādhyahetutvamarthānāṃ vyāptiśaktyanurodhataḥ” । iti vastudoṣasya yaduktaṃ taddarśayati—yadeti । nityaḥ śabdo'mūrtatvāt yadamūrtaṃ tannityameva—ityeva prayukte'pi sādharmyavākye yadā sādhyahetūbhayavyāptiśūnyatvena vyāpyatvaṃ mūrtasya karmādyālocanayā nāsti, tadāpi sādharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāsatvamityarthaḥ ।।
atraivodāharaṇamāha—nityo dhvaniriti paṭavadantena । yadā śabda- nityatvapratijñāyāmamūrtatvaṃ hetutvenopadiśyate, tadā kriyāparamāṇughaṭānāṃ yathāsaṃkhyena sādhyahetūbhayaśūnyatā ।
ākāśasyāpi tadasadvādinaṃ sautrāntikaṃ prati tadabhāvenaivobhayaśūnya- tetyāha—vyomavaccāpīti saśeṣeṇārdhena ।। vāhetau na. cau. mu. yadi. cau. mu. cauma. cau. mu. tvarthaḥ । upa. iti bhāṣyam ? mā.
tatsadbhāve'pi ca vyomni dvayayukte'pi kīrtite ।
karmādyālocanād vyāptirhetornāstīti varjanam ।। 117 ।।
vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyamapekṣate ।
sahabhāvitvadṛṣṭyā tu yadāvyāptiṃ na lakṣayet ।। 118 ।।
paraḥ sādharmyadṛṣṭāntāt taṃ vā nāpekṣate yadā ।
vaktā vā sahabhāvitvaṃ śuddhaṃ tena vaded yadā ।। 119 ।।
viparītānvayatvaṃ vā tatsamādhitsayā tadā ।
pūrvajñānopamardena vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanam ।। 120 ।।
vyāptiśūnyatāyāmudāharaṇamāha—tatsadbhāva iti । ākāśasyaiva sadbhāva- vādinaṃ prati satyapi nityatvāmūrtatvadvayayoge karmādau nityatvābhāve'pi amūrtatvā- darśanād vyāptiśūnyatetyarthaḥ ।।
“gamakasyaikadeśasya vyāptiṃ gamyena bhāṣitum ।
sādhyasādharmyavaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ pratipādyate ।।”
iti yaduktaṃ tadanupapannamityāha—vyāptyetyardhena । yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgniḥ—ityukte sādharmyamātrādevāgninā dhūmasya vyāptiravagatā, kiṃ vaidharmyeṇa ? nāpi vikalpena pakṣe'rthavattā, asādhāraṇe'pi vaidharmyaprayogeṇātulyārthatvāt । nāpi viruddhānaikāntikapratipakṣeṇa sādharmyavaidharmyadvayaṃ prayoktavyam, yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgniriti sādharmyamātrādapi siddheḥ । satyamevam ; tathāpi yadā nāma kadācide- vamāpatati tadaivaṃ prayoktavyam । kathaṃ punarāpatatītyāha—sahabhāvitveti sārdha- ślokadvayena । vādinā samyak prayukte'pi sādharmye yadā prativādī bhrāntyā saha- bhāvitvadarśanena vyāptimapratipadyamāno vipakṣavyatirekaṃ na pratipadyate, avagate vā sapakṣānvaye vipakṣavyatirekākāṅkṣāyāṃ sādharmyaṃ nāpekṣate ; yadā vā vādī hetusādhyayoḥ sahabhāvamātraṃ aparijñānena sādhyasya vā hetunā vyāptiṃ pratipādayati, tadā vipakṣa- vyatirekasiddhaye vaidharmyamapi prayoktavyamityarthaḥ ।। apekṣyate. cau. mu. taṃ ca nā. cau. mu. anvayaṃ vāpi. cau. mu. tadupa. mā.
sāhityamātraṃ pūrvoktaṃ hetostatropayujyate ।
vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo hi bhāvayoryādṛgiṣyate ।। 121 ।।
tayorabhāvayostasmād viparītaḥ pratīyate ।
dhūmabhāve'gnibhāvena vyāpte'nagnistataścyutaḥ ।। 122 ।।
adhūma eva vidyetetyevaṃ vyāpyatvamaśnute ।
tathānagnāvadhūmena vyāpte dhūmastataścyutaḥ ।। 123 ।।
anyatrānavakāśatvād vyāpyate dhruvamagninā ।
vyāpakau tu yadocyete bhāvābhāvau tadā tataḥ ।। 124 ।।
tatra tadā vaidharmyādeva vipakṣavyatireke siddhe kiṃ sādharmyeṇetyāśaṅkyāha— sāhityamātramityardhena । asādhāraṇe'pi vipakṣavyatirekadarśanāt tannivṛttaye sapakṣānvayapratipattiphalaṃ sādharmyamityarthaḥ । kathaṃ punastatprayoktavyamityāha— vyāpyavyāpaketi । yādṛganvayasiddhaye sādharmyadṛṣṭāntena hetusādhyabhāvayordhūmāgnayoḥ vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ pradarśitaḥ, tathā vipakṣavyatirekasiddhaye tayorabhāvayoḥ viparīta- vyāptipratipādakavaidharmyavākyaṃ prayoktavyam—yatrānagnistatrādhūma eva iti ।
yathaiva sādharmyavākyaṃ hetubhāvasya sādhyabhāvena vyāptiṃ pratipādayat hetubhāve sādhyaviparyayavyatirekadvāreṇa sādhanāṅgatāṃ pratipadyate, tathā vaidharmyavākyamapi sādhyaviparyayasya sādhanaviparyayeṇa vyāptiṃ pratipādayat sādhyaviparyaye'nagnau sādhana- dhūmacyutidvāreṇa sādhanāṅgatāṃ pratipadyata ityāha—dhūmabhāva iti ślokadvayena ।
yadi tu yathāgnibhāvo dhūmabhāvaṃ prati vyāpakatvena darśitaḥ sādharmyavākyena tathā tadabhāvo'pyanagnirhetvabhāvamadhūmaṃ prati vyāpakatvena kathyate, tadānagninādhūmasya niyatatvena hetvabhāve sādhyaṃ nāstīti darśitam । anagnistvadhūmenāniyata ityanagne- rvipakṣasya vyāpyād dhūmāt pracyutirna kathiteti vaidharmyasya sādhanāṅgatā na syādityāha—vyāpakāviti । tanvivṛttayema.....nvaya. mā. tathāhipakṣa. mā. pracyunirna........teti. mā.
naiva vyāpyād vipakṣasya pracyutiḥ kathitā bhavet ।
tasmād dhūmena sādhyatvamagneḥ prārthayate yadā ।। 125 ।।
tadānagniradhūmena vyāptervāpi viparyaye ।
anagnyadhūmasāhitye vyāptervāpi viparyaye ।। 126 ।।
na prastutopayogaḥ syādanyad vāpi prasādhyate ।
tatrāpyarthasya śūnyatvaṃ dvābhyāmekena vā bhavet ।। 127 ।।
yadanityaṃ tu tanmūrtamaṇuvad buddhivat khavat ।
sādhyena vyāptisidhyau ca vyatireko'tra kathyate ।। 128 ।।
tasmād dhūmasya gamakatvamicchatānagniradhūmena vyāptaḥ kathayitavya ityāha— tasmāditi ।
evaṃ tāvad vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ—“vadatyarthaṃ svaśaktyā ca śabdo vaktranapekṣayā”—ityanena nyāyena vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāsaprasaktiṃ pradarśayitu- māha—anagnīti । “tatrājñānād yadā vaktā” ityanena nyāyena sahabhāvā- vivakṣayā sāhityamātraṃ pratipādayati, vivakṣannapi vā sādhyābhāvasya hetvabhāvena vyāptiṃ tatpratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ pramāṇaṃ noccārayati, adhūmaṃ vānagninā niyataṃ pratipāda- yati, tadā sāhityapakṣe'nagneradhūmenāniyatatvāt pratijñātavipakṣavyatirekopayogitāṃ na syāt ; viparyaye'pyadhūmasyānagninā niyatatvenānagnistato nivartamāno'dhūmaṃ gamaya- tīti prastutaviparītaṃ syādityarthaḥ ।
tathā—nityaḥ śabdo'mūrtatvāt yadanityaṃ tanmūrtam ityevaṃ samyak prayukte vaidharmye yadārthastathā nāsti sādhyahetūbhayavyāvṛttiśūnyatayā, tadāpi vaidharmyābhāsa- tetyāha—yatrāpyarthasyeti ।
nityatve'mūrtatvasya hetorvyatirekamukhena vyāptisiddhye vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ prayujyate । sādhyahetūbhayavyāvṛttiśūnye vastuni paramāṇvādau vipakṣavyatirekābhāvena vaidharmyābhāsatetyāha—sādhyeneti । upakāraḥ. cau. mu. va. cau. mu. vivakṣayā vivakṣannapi vā sādhyābhāvasya hetvabhāvena vyāptipratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ pramāṇaṃ noccārayati sāhityamātramadhūmam. mā.
yasyāyaṃ nāstyasau hetustena sādhyena nāpyate ।
tena dṛṣṭe'pi sāhitye na sarvo gamya iṣyate ।। 129 ।।
sahadṛṣṭirna sambandho vyāptirnaiva ca tāvatā ।
mūrtānityatvayukte'pi tasmādaṅgīkṛte ghaṭe ।। 130 ।।
karmādau vyāptyabhāvena na dṛṣṭāntatvamiṣyate ।
aśeṣāpekṣitatvācca saukaryāccāpyadarśanāt ।। 131 ।।
sādhane yadyapīṣṭo'tra vyatireko'numāṃ prati ।
tāvatā na hyanaṅgatvaṃ yuktiḥ śabde'bhidhāsyate ।। 132 ।।
bodhaprasaṅgo bhedānāṃ na cāvyārterbhaviṣyati ।
asti sāmānyavastveṣu vyāpitvaṃ tatra gamyatām ।। 133 ।।
tena nityaḥ śabdo'mūrtatvāt jātivat—iti dṛṣṭe'pi sapakṣānvaye sādhya- hetūbhayavyāvṛttiśūnyatā vipakṣavyatirekābhāvānnāsti gamyagamakabhāva ityāha— tenatyardhena ।
idānīmubhayābhāvayukte'pi vastuni—yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ ghaṭavat iti vyāpti- śūnyatayā vaidharmyābhāsatetyāha—mūrtānityatvayukta iti ।
“sādhyena vyāptisiddhau ca vyatireko'tra kathyate ।” ityuktam, tada- nupapannamityāśaṅkyate—aśeṣavipakṣāpekṣitvenādarśanamātravaseyatvena ca sukhagrāhya- tvādanvayanirapekṣasya vyatirekamātrasyaivāṅgatvāt ; anvayastu darśanādavaseyaḥ ; na ca tat sarvatra sapakṣe saṃbhavati sakalasapakṣagrahaṇābhāvena—ityāśaṅkyāha—aśeṣeti sārdhena ślokena । yadyapi vipakṣavyatirekasyāṅgatvam ; tathāpi nānvayanirapekṣasya asādhāraṇe'pi bhāvādityarthaḥ ।।
yattu sakalasapakṣagrahaṇāsambhavenānvayagrahaṇasyāśakyatvenāgamakatvamāśaṅkyate, tatrāpyāha—baudheti । dhūmatvamagnitvenānvitaṃ sapakṣe'vagantavyamasādhāraṇāśaṅkā- nivṛttyartham । tattvekasminnapi dhūmasvalakṣaṇe sakalamastīti nānvayagrahaṇamaśeṣasva- śābde hi vakṣyate. cau. mu. vyāpitā. cau. mu.
kecit sādharmyadṛṣṭānte vyāptyāpi kathite punaḥ ।
vaidharmyoktimapīcchanti vyāvṛttiniyamecchayā ।। 134 ।।
hetau sādharmyadṛṣṭāntāt sādhyenaivāvadhārite ।
vyāvṛttiḥ sarvataḥ prāptā sādhyābhāve niyamyate ।। 135 ।।
tattu mandamalaṃ yasmāt pakṣe'pyetannirūpitam ।
vyāpakābhāvamātraṃ hi vyāpyānnityaṃ nivartate ।। 136 ।।
tasmād yathaiva śuklatve paṭasyokte virodhinām ।
nivṛttirna tu dairdhyādestathātrāpi bhaviṣyati ।। 137 ।।
dvaividhyaṃ nopapannaṃ tu yathaiva hyagnidhūmayoḥ ।
pratyakṣadṛṣṭaḥ sambandho gatiprāptyostathaiva hi ।। 138 ।।
lakṣaṇagrahaṇāpekṣamityarthaḥ । “vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyamapekṣata” iti darśanam ‘yadā tu nāma kadācidevamāpatati tadaivaṃ prayoktavyamityantena nirā- kṛtam ।’ apareṣāṃ tu darśanam—yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityameva—ityukte nityavadanya- trāpi nivṛttau satyāṃ nityatve tu kṛtakatvaṃ nāstīti vyāvṛttiniyamecchayā vaidharmya- mapi prayoktavyamityāha—keciditi dvayena ।
tadayuktamityāha—tattviti dvayena ।
kṛtakatvoddeśenānityatvamupādīyamānaṃ prasaktasyaiva vyavacchedaṃ karoti nityatvaṃ ca virodhitvena prasaktam ; yato yathā śuklādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇatvaṃ virodhinīlādivyava- cchedena tathātrāpi bhaviṣyati ; tadetat pakṣe'pi nirūpitam—
“niyamastadvipakṣācca kalpyate nāvirodhinaḥ” iti ।
“tattu dvividham” ityādi bhāṣyam ; tadākṣipannāha—dvaividhyamiti ślokadvayena । yathaiva dhūmatvāgnitvayoḥ pratyakṣatvena mahānasādau pratyakṣadṛṣṭaḥ sambandhaḥ, tathaiva ‘calati’ iti pratyayālambanatvena gamanasya pratyakṣatvād devadattādau prade- śāntaraprāptyā saha pratyakṣadṛṣṭa eva sambandhaḥ । ‘calati’ iti pratyayasya saṃyoga- vibhāgamātrālambanatvena gamanasya nityānumeyateti cet, evamapi pratyakṣadṛṣṭatānumāna- dṛṣṭatā ca vaktavyā ; kimidam “sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandham” iti ? na ca ‘ayaṃ pekṣe'pyevam. cau. mu. tyarthaḥ । apareṣām. mā.
āditye'nupalabdhiścenna deśe'pyadhunātane ।
kvacit tatropalabdhiśced devadatte'pi dṛśyatām ।। 139 ।।
yadi dharmyantarāpekṣā tatra sāmānyadṛṣṭatā ।
syādagnidhūmayoḥ saivaṃ tasmādevaṃ pracakṣate ।। 140 ।।
pratyakṣadṛṣṭaḥ sambandho yayoreva viśeṣayoḥ ।
gomayendhanatajjanyaviśeṣādimatiḥ kṛtā ।। 141 ।।
calati’ iti pratyayaḥ saṃyogavibhāgamātrālambanaḥ ; saṃyogavibhāgavyatirekeṇānya- syāpi pratibhāsanāt, acalato'pi ‘calati’ iti pratyayaprasaṅgāt, aviratasaṃyoga- vibhāgālambanatve'pyatītavartamānabhāvināmekasyālambanatvenāviśeṣāt, puruṣabhūmi- gatayośca saṃyogavibhāgayorubhayatra ‘calati’ iti pratyayaprasaṅgāt । pratyakṣāvagata- saṃyogavibhāgaliṅgajanyo'yamiti cenna, aparokṣatayā yugapaccalanasaṃyogavibhāgayoḥ pratibhāsanāt, sambandhagrahaṇāsambhavācca, yato nityaṃ saṃyogavibhāgānumeyaiva gatiḥ । nāpi sayogavibhāgayoranyathānupapadyamānayoścalanāvagatatikārakatvam, aparokṣatayā yugapat pratibhāsanādityuktatvāt । āditye'numeyatvādapratyakṣateti cet, etadagnitvasyāpi sādhyadharmiṇi tulyam । mahānasādau dhūmatvāgnitvayoḥ pratya- kṣatve pratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandhateti cet , etadapi devadattādau gatiprāptyoḥ pratyakṣatvena tulyam । tasmādubhayorapi pratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandhatvena dvaividhyamanupapannamityarthaḥ ।।
athaikasmin dharmiṇi devadattākhye gatiprāptyoḥ sāmānyataḥ pratyakṣeṇa sambandhamupalabhyādityākhye dharmiṇi deśāntaraprāptidarśanena gatyanumānaṃ sāmānyato- dṛṣṭasambandhamanumānamucyate ; etadapyagnidhūmayormahānasādau sāmānyata eva sambandha- darśanādaviśiṣṭamityubhayoḥ sāmānyatodṛṣṭasambandhatvena dvaividhyābhāva ityāha—yadi dharmyantarāpekṣeti tripādyā । evaṃ dvaividhyamākṣipya pratisamādhāsyannāha—tasmā- devamiti pādanyūnena ślokatrayeṇa । yasminneva dharmiṇi gomayendhanajanyāgniviśe- ṣatajjanyadhūmaviśeṣayoḥ sambandhagrahaṇaṃ tasminneva kālāntare dhūmaviśeṣadarśanena punaḥ punaḥ sandihyamānasadbhāvasya yadagneranumānam, tat pratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandhamucyata itya- dṛṣṭasambandham. cau. mu. nādityaviśiṣṭam. mā.
taddeśasthena tenaiva gatvā kālāntare'pi tam ।
yadāgniṃ budhyate tasya pūrvabodhāt punaḥ punaḥ ।। 142 ।।
sandihyamānasadbhāvavastubodhāt pramāṇatā ।
viśeṣadṛṣṭametacca likhitaṃ vindhyavāsinā ।। 143 ।।
ākṛtyoreva caiṣeṣṭā vyavacchedena kenacit ।
hetusādhyavyavastheti viśeṣo nopadarśitaḥ ।। 144 ।।
agnidhūmāntaratve ca vācye sāmānyato mitau ।
sāmānyadṛṣṭamekāntādatretyāditya ucyate ।। 145 ।।
sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ ca pratyakṣasya prasādhitam ।
bhiprāyaḥ । nanu viśeṣadṛṣṭatvenaitasya “dhūmākṛtidarśanādagnyākṛtivijñānam” iti bhāṣyamanupapannamiti codayati—viśeṣadṛṣṭamityardhena ।।
tatra parihāramāha—ākṛtyoriti । nātra svalakṣaṇayorgamyagamakabhāvaḥ, sambandhagrahaṇakālāvagatayorvinaṣṭatvāt ; ākṛtyoreva gomayendhanādinā kenacida- vacchedenāvacchinnayorgamyagamakabhāva ityarthaḥ । dharmyantare tu devadattākhye gatiprāptyoḥ sambandhamupalabhyādityagatyanumānaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭasambandhābhilapyat ।।
evaṃ tarhi dharmyantaravivakṣāyāṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭasambandhasyāpyetadevodāharaṇa dātavyam “dhūmākṛtidarśanādagnyākṛtivijñānam” iti kimucyate “devadattasya” iti—ityāśaṅkyāha—agnidhūmāntaratva iti । satyamevametat, ādityo- dāharaṇāt kadācit tatra na pratyakṣadṛṣṭatā saṃbhavati, sarvadāditye deśāntara- prāptyānumeyatvād gaterityarthaḥ ।।
nanvavastutvena sāmānyasya svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣam । taduktam— “svalakṣa- ṇaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣam, sāmānyaviṣayamanumānam” iti । ataḥ kathaṃ dhūmākṛtidarśa- nādagnyākṛtivijñāne pratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandhatetyāśaṅkyāha—sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ ceti yadāgnirbudhyate. cau. mu. pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ ca sāmānyasya. mā. Omitted. na. mā. svalakṣaṇāviṣayam. mā. Omitted. iti. mā.
vastutvaṃ cātra heturvā dvayasyāpyabhidhīyate ।। 146 ।।
dhūmādagnyanumānasya vastvālambanatā bhavet ।
abhāvānyapramāṇatvāt svārthe śrotrādibuddhivat ।। 147 ।।
sāmānyasya ca vastutvaṃ pratyakṣagrāhyatāpi ca ।
abhāvānyaprameyatvādasādhāraṇavastuvat ।। 148 ।।
sāmānyaṃ nānumānena vinā yasya pratīyate ।
na ca liṅgavinirmuktamanumānaṃ pravartate ।। 149 ।।
asāmānyasya liṅgatvaṃ na ca kenacidiṣyate ।
na cānavagataṃ liṅgaṃ kiñcidasti prakāśakam ।। 150 ।।
tasya cāpyanumānena syādanyena gatiḥ punaḥ ।
tadutpattiśca liṅgāt syāt sāmānyajñānasaṃhitāt ।। 151 ।।
vastutvaṃ cetyantena । “nirvikalpakabodhe'pi dvyātmakasyāpi vastunaḥ । grahaṇam” ityatra prasādhitamityarthaḥ । atraiva tāvat svalakṣaṇaviṣayatāpratyakṣasya sādhakaṃ ceti pramāṇamucyata ityāha—atra heturiti śeṣeṇa । tadāha—dhūmāditi । dhūmā- dagnyanumānaṃ dharmi,—atra heturiti śeṣeṇa । tadāha—dhūmāditi । dhūmā- dagnyanumānaṃ dharmi, vastvālambanamiti sādhyo dharmaḥ, abhāvānyatve sati pramāṇa- tvāditi hetuḥ, svārthe śrotrādibuddhivaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।
sāṃprataṃ sāmānyasya vastutvasiddhau pratyakṣagrāhyatāyāṃ ca pramāṇamāha— sāmānyasyeti । sāmānyaṃ dharmi, vastu pratyakṣagrāhyaṃ taditi sādhyadharmadvayam, abhāvānyatve sati prameyatvāditi hetuḥ svalakṣaṇavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ । evaṃ siddhe sāmānyasya pratyakṣatve siddhā dhūmākṛtidarśanādagnyākṛtivijñānasya pratyakṣadṛṣṭasamba- ndhateti ।।
anumānaikasamadhigamye tu sāmānye liṅgasya—nārthaśabdaviśeṣasya— ityanena nyāyena(?) sāmānyarūpatve satyanumeyatvenānavasthānādanumānavyavahāroccheda- prasaṅga ityāha—sāmānyamityādinā ślokadvayena ।। na. vāpyanu. cau. mu. jñānasaṃhatāt. cau. mu. viṣayapratyakṣanidarśanenānumānaviṣayaṃ dharmi prasādhya tasya vastutāyāḥ sādhakaṃ pratyakṣa- ttvasya sādhakaṃ ceti—iti bhāvyamiti bhāti. sāmānyavastutva. mā.
tasya cāpyanumānasya bhavel liṅgena codbhavaḥ ।
anumānāntarādeva jñātenaivaṃ ca kalpite ।। 152 ।।
liṅgaliṅgyanumānānāmānanyādekaliṅgini ।
gatiryugasahastreṣu bahuṣvapi na vidyate ।। 153 ।।
atha sāmānyabhūte'pi liṅge'nyasmād gatirbhavet ।
pramāṇādapramāṇād vā liṅginyapi tathā bhavet ।। 154 ।।
evamapyanumānasya nityocchedaḥ prasajyate ।
pramāṇāntarameyaṃ syāt sāmānyasyāvabodhakam ।। 155 ।।
apramāṇāvabuddhād vā lliṅgālliṅgini yā matiḥ ।
sāpi mithyā bhavennityaṃ bāṣpajātāgnibuddhivat ।। 156 ।।
nanvapramāṇabhūtāpi sambandhasmṛtiriṣyate ।
yathā liṅgigatau hetustathā liṅgatirbhavet ।। 157 ।।
atha sāmānyabhūtasyāpi liṅgasya pratyakṣānumānavyatiriktena vijñānāntareṇa, grahaṇam, yathoktam—“anyadevedaṃ tatsahacarasamudāyaviṣayaṃ smārtamabhedena jñāna- mutpadyate” iti tadanupapannam । tadvijñānāntaraṃ pratyakṣānumānavyatiriktaṃ pramāṇa- mapramāṇaṃ vābhyupagamyeta ? tatra pramāṇapakṣe tāvad dūṣaṇamāha—atheti ślokadvayena । evamapyanumānoccheda eva ; etadeva pramāṇāntaramanumeyasyāpi sāmānyasya grāhakaṃ bhaviṣyati kimanumānenetyarthaḥ ।।
athāpramāṇabhūtam ; tatrāha—apramāṇeti । sarvamevānumānamapramāṇaṃ prāptam, apramāṇāvagataliṅdajanyatvena dhūmavijñānaviṣayīkṛtabāṣpajātāgnibuddhivadityarthaḥ ।।
nanu vyāptismaraṇamapramāṇamapyanumitāvaṅgatveneṣṭam ; evaṃ hi liṅgagrāhakamapi bhaviṣyatīti codayati—nanvapramāṇeti ।। mānatvāt. cau. mu. kalpane. cau. mu. tathāliṅgigatiḥ. cau. mu. evaṃ syāt. cau. mu. mānaṃ pramāṇam. mā.
tatra yat pūrvavijñānaṃ tasya prāmāṇyamiṣyate ।
tadupasthānamātreṇa smṛteḥ syāccaritārthatā ।। 158 ।।
na tu liṅgatau kiñcit pramāṇamupapadyate ।
tadabhāvāt smṛtiścātra na kathañcit pravartate ।। 159 ।।
smārtametadabhedena vijñānamiti yo vadet ।
tasya vandhyāsute'pyasti nūnaṃ smaraṇaśaktatā ।। 160 ।।
na cāsādhāraṇo'rthātmā sāmānyajñānakāraṇam ।
yasmānnāsyāvinābhāvastena dṛṣṭaḥ kathañcana ।। 161 ।।
syād vā sambandhadṛṣṭyāsau sāmānyaṃ kṛtakatvavat ।
na hyasādhāraṇaṃ vastu pūrvatreha ca vidyate ।। 162 ।।
tatra parihāramāha—tatreti । vyāptigrāhakapramāṇaparyupasthānena tasyopayogaḥ ।
tatra liṅgagrāhakaṃ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā pravṛttam, svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt pratyakṣasya ; anumānagrahaṇe vānavasthetyāha—na tu liṅgatāvityardhena । tadabhāvena ca smārta- tāpi liṅgajñānasya durbhaṇaivetyāha—tadabhāvādityardhena ।।
evaṃ satyapi smaraṇamucyamānaṃ vandhyāsutasmaraṇatulyamāyātītyāha—smārta- metadabhedeneti ।।
nanu dhūmasvalakṣaṇasyaiva liṅgatvamata drūpaparāvṛttyā, tasya ca pratyakṣāvaseyatvāt ; liṅgagrahaṇe nānavasthetyāśaṅkyāha—na ceti । na dhūmasvalakṣaṇasvarūpatayā liṅgatvam, parvatasthasya rasavatīsthenāgnisvalakṣaṇena sahānanvayāt ; rasavatīsthasyāpyapakṣadharma- tvena । adhūmavyāvṛttirapi dhūmasvalakṣaṇādanyā vānanyā vā syāt ; anyatve sati na pratyakṣāvaseyā ; ananyatve tu svalakṣaṇasvarūpānatiriktaivetyarthaḥ ।।
atha rasavatīsthasyaiva dhūmasvalakṣaṇasyāvagatānvayasya parvate'pi sadbhāva iṣyate, hanta ! tarhi sāmānyameva tat prāptamityāha—syādveti।।
na cāpyavyapadeśasya vikalparahitasya ca ।
vinā pūrvānusandhānālliṅgatvamupapadyate ।। 163 ।।
kalpyante'pi viśeṣā ye te'pyaliṅgamananvayāt ।
etasmādeva hetoḥ syāt tajjñānasyāpyaliṅgatā ।। 164 ।।
sāmānyarūpatāyāṃ ca tathaivānavadhāraṇam ।
kvacid vā dṛṣṭasambandhe sarvaḥ pratyāyako bhavet ।। 165 ।।
sambandhānubhave'pyevameṣitavyaṃ ca liṅginā ।
anumānapravṛtteśca prāṅmānaṃ tatra nāsti te ।। 166 ।।
itaśca svalakṣaṇasya liṅgatvaṃ nāstītyāha—na cāpīti । yo hi parvata- dharmatayāgnikāryatvena ca vikalpāspadaṃ na bhavati, tasya kathaṃ liṅgatvamityarthaḥ ।।
atha dhūmasyaivānyatra vyāvartamānasya kālpanikīṃ viśeṣarūpatāmabhyupagamya liṅgatvamucyate, tatrāpyāha—kalpyante'pītyardhena । viśeṣāṇāmapi svalakṣaṇavadana- nvayādityarthaḥ । nāpi dhūmajñānasyāgnijñānaṃ prati liṅgatvam, ananvayādevetyāha— etasmādityardhena ।।
atha sāmānyarūpatāmabhyupagamyānvaya iṣyate, tatrāpi svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt pratyakṣeṇāgrahaṇam, anumānena grahaṇe tathaivānavasthayānavadhāraṇamityāha—sāmānye- tyardhena । atha svalakṣaṇasyaiva rasavatīsthasyānvayagrahaṇam, parvatasthasya ca liṅgatvam, tatrāpyāha—kvacidityardhena ।।
itaścānumānaikasamadhigamye sāmānye satyanumānoccheda ityāha—samba- ndhānubhava iti । sambandhagrahaṇasavyapekṣamanumānam ; na ca bhavatpakṣe sambandhagrāhakaṃ pramāṇamasti । sāmānyayorgamyagamakabhāvaḥ ; na ca tayoḥ sambandhaḥ pratyakṣāvaseyaḥ, svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt pratyakṣasya ; nāpyanumānāvaseyaḥ, anavasthāprasaṅgādityarthaḥ ।। deśasya. cau. mu. kalpante. mā. vā. cau. mu. bhavo'vaśyameṣitavyaśca. cau. mu. tteśca prāgjñānam. cau. mu.
na cāpi vāsanāmātrālliṅgajñānasya sambhavaḥ ।
liṅgijñānaṃ ca tadvat syāt trirūpālliṅgato na tat ।। 167 ।।
yatrābhāvasya liṅgatvaṃ na cāsāvānumānikaḥ ।
pramāṇāntaravedyatvāt tatra doṣo na jāyate ।। 168 ।।
pratyakṣāvagatālliṅgād yasya liṅgigatirbhavet ।
tasya nāto'dhikaṃ kiñcit prārthanīyaṃ prasajyate ।। 169 ।।
yatrāpyanumitālliṅgālliṅginograhaṇaṃ bhavet ।
tatrāpi maulikaṃ liṅgaṃ pratyakṣādeva gamyate ।। 170 ।।
liṅgatvaṃ kṛtakatvādau kriyāyāḥ kārakasya vā ।
pratyakṣatvaṃ ca tasyeṣṭamiti dūraṃ na gamyate ।। 171 ।।
nanvanumānena liṅgagrahaṇe satyanavasthā ; pratyakṣānumānavyatiriktaṃ tu vāsanā- mātrabalena vijñānamutpadyamānaṃ liṅgagrāhakaṃ bhaviṣyatīti nānavasthetyāśaṅkyāha— na cāpīti । yadi vāsanābalena liṅgagrāhakaṃ vijñānamutpadyamānaṃ pramāṇamiṣyeta, tadā pratyakṣānumānavyatiriktapramāṇaprasaṅgaḥ । liṅgasāmānyavacca liṅgisāmānyasyāpi parokṣasya tadeva grāhakaṃ bhaviṣyatīti kimanumānena ? tadāpyanumānatrairūpyavarji- tatvādityarthaḥ ।।
abhāvagamye'pi liṅge tasyānumānāt pramāṇāntaratvena nānavasthetyāha— yatrābhāvasyeti ।।
asmatpakṣe tu nāyaṃ doṣa ityāha—pratyakṣāvagatāditi ।।
anumitānumāne tu satyapi liṅgasyānumeyatve liṅgagrāhakasya pratyakṣapūrvakatve nānavasthetyāha—yatrāpyanumitādiṃti ।।
nadu yadyanumānagamye liṅge satyanavasthā, kṛtakatvasya tarhi na syālliṅgatva- manityatvāvagatau ; kriyākārakasambandho hi tat kṛtakatvam, “kṛttaddhitasamāseṣu sambandhābhidhānaṃ bhāvapratyayena” iti smaraṇāt ; tasya cānvayavyatirekaliṅgānumeya- tvenānavasthetyāśaṅkyāha—liṅgatvamiti । utpattikriyaivānityatvāvagatau liṅgam ; tatra. cau. mu. gamyatvāt. cau. mu. liṅgini. cau. mu. pratyakṣādyena. mā.
evaṃ śabdopamānādau sāmānyāśrayatā yataḥ ।
taddausthityena dausthityaṃ sarvatrātaḥ prasajyate ।। 172 ।।
tasmāt pratyakṣapūrvatvaṃ pramāṇāntara iṣyatām ।
pratyakṣatvaṃ ca sāmānye nānyathā hi gatirbhavet ।। 173 ।।
pratyakṣālambanatvaṃ ca viśeṣasya kathaṃ bhavet ।
yadā vastvantarāpekṣaḥ sāmānyāṃśaḥ sa kīrtyate ।। 174 ।।
rūpādayo hi sāmānyaṃ sarve nīlādyapekṣayā ।
svaviśeṣānapekṣyātha nīlādīnāṃ samānatā ।। 175 ।।
te cāpi tāvat sāmānyaṃ yāvat syuḥ paramāṇavaḥ ।
dvyaṇukasyāpi yadrūpaṃ taddhi sādhāraṇaṃ dvayoḥ ।। 176 ।।
kṛtakatvapradarśanaṃ tadupalakṣaṇārthameva ; pratyakṣā ca kriyeti sādhitam ; kārakasaṅkīrtanaṃ ca śloke pradarśanārtham, na tu kārakasya pratyakṣatā ; śaktistadavacchinnaṃ vā dravyaṃ kārakam ; sā cārthāpattisamadhigamyeti vakṣyāmaḥ ।।
evamanumānaikasamadhigamye sāmānye sati tasyābhāvaḥ, tadabhāvācca—
“nārthaśabdaviśeṣasya vācyavācakateṣyate ।
tasya pūrvamadṛṣṭatvāt sāmānyaṃ tūpadekṣyate ।।”।
ityanena nyāyena sāmānyaviṣayatvenānumānavacchabdopamānādīnāmapyabhāva ityāha— evamiti ।।
upasaṃharati—tasmāditi ।।
evaṃ dhūmākṛteḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭatāsidhyarthaṃ sāmānyaviṣayatāpi pratyakṣasyāstīti pratipādya idānīṃ prauḍhyā sāmānyameva pratyakṣamiti sādhayitumāha—pratyakṣeti ।।
taddarśayati—rūpādaya iti ślokadvayena । sarvameva rūpādi dvyaṇukarūpa- paryantaṃ nīlādisvaviśeṣāpekṣaṃ sāmānyamityarthaḥ ।। iṣyate. cau. mu. rākṣepaḥ. mā.
na cāntyena viśeṣeṇa vyavahāro'sti kasyacit ।
na ca pratyakṣatā tasya saṅghāte kevalasya vā ।। 177 ।।
bhedenāgṛhyamāṇaśca na bhedo grāhyatāṃ vrajet ।
na ca bhinneṣvabhinnatvabuddhigrāhyatvasambhavaḥ ।। 178 ।।
samudāyo na cāpyasti bhavatāṃ na ca sarvadā ।
sarveṣāmasatārthena pratyayotpattisambhavaḥ ।। 179 ।।
na caikajātiyogena vināsti samudāyatā ।
samudāye'pi cāṇutvaṃ na teṣāmapagacchati ।। 180 ।।
atha paramāṇavaḥ ‘devadatto'yam’ iti yat pratyakṣaṃ tasyālambanam, teṣāṃ ca viśeṣātmakatvena viśeṣaviṣayatā pratyakṣasya ; tadapi nāstītyāha—na cāntyeneti । paramāṇavo hi samuditāḥ pratyekaṃ vālambanam ? na pratyekam, sthūlapratibhāsanāt ; nāpi samuditāḥ, ghaṭaśarāvādiṣu buddhiprameyavailakṣaṇyābhāvaprasaṅgādityarthaḥ ।।
abhinnapratibhāsaṃ cedaṃ vijñānamutpadyate ; parasparavibhinnāśca paramāṇavaḥ ; te kathamabhinnasaṃvedanagrāhyā ityāha—bhedeneti ।।
nāpi paramāṇusamudāyasyālambanatvam, samudāyivyatirekeṇa samudāyasya bhavadbhiranabhyupagatatvādityāha—samudāyo na cāpyasti bhavatāmiti । na cāsata eva samudāyasyālambanatvena sarvadā sarveṣāṃ jñānotpādakatvamityāha—na ca sarvadeti śeṣeṇa ।।
api ca parasparavibhinnānāmekadharmāvacchedena samudāyatvāpattirbhavati, na ca tadastītyāha—na cetyardhena । na ca paramāṇutvamevāvacchedakamityāha— samudāye'pītyardhena । aṇutvāvacchinnaḥ kathaṃ sthūlapratibhāsasaṃvedya ityarthaḥ ।। maṇasya nābhedaḥ. cau. mu. na vāpyastiu. cau. mu. naiteṣām. cau. mu. dena ca na ca samu. mā. idam ‘na ca bhinneṣu’ ityuttarārddhamātrāvataraṇaṃ saṃgacchate ।
sāmānyamityadṛśye'pi tena sāmānya eva naḥ ।
vyāsaṅgini bhavatyeṣā dhīrvināpyekakalpanāt ।। 181 ।।
vyāsajyavartamānasya sāmānyasya yathendriyaiḥ ।
grahaṇaṃ tadvadeva syāt prativyakti niveśinaḥ ।। 182 ।।
mīmāṃsakaiśca nāvaśyamiṣyante paramāṇavaḥ ।
yadbalenopalabdhasya mithyātvaṃ kalpayed bhavān ।। 183 ।।
samūharūpaṃ pratyakṣamadṛśyaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ ।
yo hareta śaśasyāpi so'bhāvaṃ śrṛṅgato vadet ।। 184 ।।
samūhaparamārthatve sthite tadbuddhihetukā ।
yadi nāmāvagamyeta paramāṇvastitā punaḥ ।। 185 ।।
tasmāt ‘devadatto'yam’ iti jñānaṃ paramāṇukāryamavayavyākhyamabhinnaṃ sthūla- mālambate, tathā pratibhāsāt । sa tu svāvayaveṣu vyāsajyavartamānatvāt sāmānya- meveti sāmānyaviṣayatā pratyakṣasyetyāha—sāmānyamiti ।।
evameva ‘gaurayam’ ityapi pratyakṣaṃ prativyaktisamavetasāmānyagrāhakami- tyāha—vyāsajyeti ।।
atha sthūlapratibhāsaṃ vijñānaṃ paramāṇuṣvevopapadyamānatvāt sthūlaṃ na kalpayati, tatrāpyāha—mīmāṃsakairiti । ‘devadatto'yam’, ‘ghaṭo'yam’ iti sthūla- pratibhāsaṃ vijñānamutpadyate ; tatrānupalabhyamānamapi sūkṣmamasti, tadbalena copalabhya- mānasya bādha iti citram ।।
yaśca sthūlapratibhāsaṃ vijñānamutpadyamānaṃ paramāṇuṣvevābhyupagamya sthūlabādhamāha, sa śaśaśrṛṅgābhyupagamena śaśabādhaṃ kuryādityāha—samūharūpamiti ।।
kalpyamānamapi sūkṣmaṃ sthūlapratipattyanyathānupapattyaiva kalpyata iti na sthūla- sambādhane samarthamityāha—samūheti ।। mānyameva. mā. vyāsaṅginī. mā. cau, mu. yo'pahṇate. cau. mu. tatsiddhihetukā. cau. mu.
tasmād yad gṛhyate vastu yena rūpeṇa sarvadā ।
tat tathaivābhyupetavyaṃ sāmānyamathavetarat ।। 186 ।।
sattādisāmānyamapekṣya sarvaṃ gotvādyasādhāraṇatāmupaiti ।
tasmādasādhāraṇamakṣagamyaṃ vadanna sāmānyamapahnuvīta ।। 187 ।।
sāmānyarūpeṇa na gṛhyate cet kiṃ vāstyasādharaṇabuddhiratra ।
yadvastu lokaḥ pratipadyate'tra dvidhāpi tacchakyata eva vaktum ।। 188 ।।
ityanumānaparicchedaḥ ।
upasaṃharati—tasmāditi ।।
athavāsādhāraṇaviṣayatve'pi pratyakṣasyocyamāne dhūmākṛteḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭatā naivāpaiti, sattādyapekṣayā dhūmatvasyāpi viśeṣarūpatvādityāha—sattādīti ।।
athavāstu samānyarūpataiva dhūmatvādeḥ, tathāpi nirvikalpakapratyakṣaviṣayatā naivāpaiti । taduktam-“nirvikalpakabodhe ca” iti । atha ‘sāmānyam’ ityevaṃ pratibhāsābhāvenāgrahaṇam, hanta tarhi ‘asādhāraṇam’ iti pratibhāsābhāvena svalakṣaṇasyāpyagrahaṇaprasaṅga ityāha—sāmānyetyardhena । sarvathā yat pratyakṣaprameya- mavayavajātyādi tadubhayamapyuktena prakāreṇa sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇābhyāṃ śakyaṃ vyapadeṣṭu- mityanupapannametat—svalakṣaṇaviṣayameva pratyakṣam, sāmānyaviṣayamevānumānam— itītyāha—yaditi ।। iti bhaṭṭombekaviracitāyāṃ tātparyaṭīkāyāṃ anumānaṃ samāptam gotvādi sādhāraṇa. cau. mu. loke pratipadyate. mā. padyate'smin. cau. mu.
atha śabdaparicchedaḥ ।
pratyakṣādiṣu/?/ vaktavyaṃ śabdamātrasya lakṣaṇam ।
tadatitvariteneha kiṃ śāstrasyābhidhīyate ।। 1 ।।
sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ muktvā viśeṣasyaiva lakṣaṇāt ।
na śakyaṃ kevalaṃ vaktumito'pyasya na vācyatā ।। 2 ।।
yaccoktaṃ śabdavijñānādarthe jñānamitīdṛśam ।
aviśiṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭasya na tacchāstrasya lakṣaṇam ।। 3 ।।
pravṛttirvā nivṛttirvā nityena kṛtakena vā ।
puṃsāṃ yenopadiśyeta tacchāstramabhidhīyate ।। 4 ।।
atha śābdaṃ pramāṇam ।।
“śāstraṃ śabdavijñānādasaṃnikṛṣṭe'rthe vijñānam” iti bhāṣyam । tatra śāstramiti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ ; śabdavijñānādasannikṛṣṭe'rthe vijñānamiti lakṣaṇam । tadasambaddhatvena dūṣayitumāha vārtikakāraḥ—pratyakṣādiṣviti । pratyakṣānumāna- śabdopamānādiṣu vyabhicāraśaṅkāyāṃ tannivṛttaye śabdamātrasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam ; tadviśeṣalakṣaṇakaraṇamasambaddham । tathā ca sūtrakāreṇa satsaṃprayogasūtreṇa pratyakṣamātra- syaiva lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam, na tadviśeṣasya cākṣuṣasyetyarthaḥ ।।
na ca śakyetāpi sāmānyalakṣaṇaparihāreṇa viśeṣasya lakṣaṇaṃ kartumityāha —sāmānyalakṣaṇamiti ।।
lakṣaṇamapyetad viśeṣasya na bhavatītyāha—yacceti । “śabdavijñānāda- sannikṛṣṭe'rthe vijñānam”—iti śabdamātrasyaiva lakṣaṇam, na tadviśeṣasya śāstra- syetyarthaḥ ।।
idaṃ tu tadviśeṣasya śāstrasya lakṣaṇamityāha—pravṛttiriti ।। tyaktvā cau. mu.
svarūpakathanaṃ yattu kasyacit tatra dṛśyate ।
tadgatvena tasyāpi śāstratvamavagamyate ।। 5 ।।
bhāvanāyāṃ samastāyāṃ vākyādevopajāyate ।
pravṛttirvā nivṛttirvā tacchāstraṃ na padādyataḥ ।। 6 ।।
aparīkṣāmiṣeṇāpi lakṣaṇāni vadannayam ।
na svatantropayogitvanirapekṣāṇi jalpati ।। 7 ।।
tatra yallokavākyasthaṃ kathayecchabdalakṣaṇam ।
vedaṃ vyākhyātukāmasya tannātīvopayujyate ।। 8 ।।
nanvetasminnapi lakṣaṇe svarūpapratipādakasya “so'rodīt” ityevamādera- śāstratvamityāśaṅkyāha—svarūpakathanamiti । svarūpapratipādakasyāpi stutinindā- paratvena pravṛttinivṛttipratipādakāṅgatvāt śāstratvam “vidhinā tvekavākyatvāt” ityarthaḥ ।।
evaṃ tarhi preraṇāpratipādakasya pratyayasya stutinindāpratipādakasahitasya bhavatu śāstratvam ; preryaviṣayaviśeṣapratipādakasya tu na prāpnoti ityāśaṅkyāha— bhāvanāyāmiti । anubandhadvayāvacchinnāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ preryaviṣayasamarpakapadasavya- pekṣasyaiva prerakatvam । tadanena preraṇāpratipādakasya stutinindāviṣayapreryaviṣayasāpekṣa- tvena vākyasya śāstratvamuktaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ ।।
evaṃ dūṣite samarthayitumāha—aparīkṣāmipeṇeti । aparīkṣāvyājenāpi lakṣaṇamucyamānaṃ codanopadeśaśabdābhyāṃ prastutasya tadviśeṣasyaiva śāstrasya vyabhicāra- vṛttaye lakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam ; na śabdamātrasya, aprastutatvāt ।।
gāmānaya—ityādivyaktisthasya śabdasya lakṣaṇamatīva vedavyākhyāyāmanupa- yogītyāha—tatra yaditi ।।
pratyakṣādyupayogantu varṇamātrāditaḥ purā ।
śāstrārthajñānavelāyāṃ matvā tallakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam ।। 9 ।।
yatti gāmānayetyādivākyasthaṃ śabdalakṣaṇam ।
tasya nehopayogo'sti tasmācchāstragataṃ kṛtam ।। 10 ।।
viśeṣaśca na sāmānyamantareṇāpi kaścana ।
tasmāt tamapyudāhṛtya sāmānyaṃ lakṣayet sphuṭam ।। 11 ।।
sāmānyarūpamapyetadadhikārād viśiṣyate ।
codanā copadeśaśca śāstramevetyudāhṛtam ।। 12 ।।
pratyakṣalakṣaṇamapi vedavyākhyāyāmanupayogīti na vaktavyamityāśaṅkyāha— pratyakṣādyupayogantviti । avagatasya pramāṇatvaṃ vedasya ; tadavagame ca— ‘viśvajitā yajeta svargakāmaḥ prakṛtivat’ ityādau pratyakṣādayaḥ pramāṇam । atasteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vyabhicāranivṛttaye codanālakṣaṇapratijñāyāmupayogi ।।
‘gāmānaya’ ityādivākyagatasya tu codanālakṣaṇapratijñāyāmupayogitā nāstītyāha—yattviti ।।
yat punaridamuktam—sāmānyalakṣaṇamakṛtvā viśeṣalakṣaṇamaśakyaṃ kartum iti, tatrāpyāha—viśeṣaśceti । viśeṣasthameva sāmānyaṃ lakṣayituṃ śakyate ; na viśeṣaparityāgena, apratīterityarthaḥ ।।
yaccāpyuktam—lakṣaṇamapyetad viśeṣasya na saṃbhavati iti, tatrāpyāha— sāmānyarūpamityardhena । “codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharmaḥ” ityatra śabdaviśeṣārtha- viśeṣayoḥ prakṛtatvādiha sambandhaḥ ; ata eṣa lakṣaṇārthaḥ—vidhāyakaśabdavijñānāt kārye'rthe vijñānaṃ śāstram iti । hanta ! tarhi ‘codanā’ iti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ ; kimidam “śāstram” itītyāha—codanā copadeśaśceti ।। upayogitvam. mā. naḥ. mā. ṇāsti. cau. mu. sukham. cau. mu. upayogaṃ tu. cau. mu.
yathā ca codanāśabdo vaidikyāmeva vartate ।
śabdajñānārthavijñānaśabdau śāstre tathā sthitau ।। 13 ।।
pratyakṣādyaparīkṣyatve tadantargatihetukam ।
śāstrasyāpyaparīkṣyatvamanayaiva diśoditam ।। 14 ।।
tatrānumānamevedaṃ bauddhavaiśeṣikaiḥ śritam ।
bhedaḥ sāṃkhyādibhistviṣṭo na tūktaṃ bhedakāraṇam ।। 15 ।।
pūrvasaṃskārayuktāntyavarṇavākyādikalpanā ।
vivakṣādi ca dhūmādau nāstītyetena bhinnatā ।। 16 ।।
bhavati prakramabalena viśeṣalābha ityāha—yathā ceti । yathā “athāto dharmajijñāsā” iti prakramāpekṣayā “codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharmaḥ” ityatra codanāśabdo vaidikyāmeva vartate, tathā lakṣaṇagranthe śabdavijñānārthavijñānaśabdau vidhāyakaśabdakāryārthaviṣayau draṣṭavyāvityarthaḥ ।।
yadapi pratyakṣādyantargatatvena śāstrasya avyabhicāritvamuktam—“pratyakṣā- dīni prasiddhāni pramāṇāni ; tadantargataṃ ca śāstram” ityasmin bhāṣye, tadapi “na svatantropayogitvanirapekṣāṇi jalpati” ityanenaivābhiprāyeṇetyāha—pratya- kṣādyaparīkṣyatva iti ।।
nanu śabdavijñānādasaṃnikṛṣṭe'rthe yad vijñānaṃ tadanumānameva, “sadṛśātmanaḥ । apratyakṣasya sambandhādanyataḥ pratipattitaḥ ।।” ityanena nyāyena । tataśca “anu- mānaṃ jñātasambandhasya”—ityanenaivānumānalakṣaṇena lakṣitatvāt pṛthag lakṣaṇaṃ na kartavyamiti codayati—tatrānumānamityardhena । nanu bhedaḥ sāṃkhyādibhiriṣṭa eva ; tadabhiprāyaṃ pṛthag lakṣaṇam ; tatrāha—bhedaḥ sāṃkhyādibhistviṣṭa ityardhena ।।
nanu pūrvavarṇajanitasaṃskāraviśiṣṭasyāntyavarṇasyārthapratipādakatvaṃ vivakṣāvaśena; na tu dhūmādayo vivakṣāvaśenārthaṃ pratipādayantītyuktameva bhedakāraṇam, kimucyate- “na tūktaṃ bhedakāraṇam” iti ityāśaṅkyāha—pūrveti sapadadvayena ślokena । bauddhairvaiśe. sthitam. mā. pramāpe. mā. nirapekṣāṇi kalpanīti. mā. śabdaśā.......apra. mā. pratipatteḥ. mā.
yairuktā tatra vaidharmyavikalpasamajātitā ।
dhūmānityaviṣāṇyādiviśeṣānna hi bhinnatā ।। 17 ।।
trailakṣaṇyaparityāgo yāvanna pratipādyate ।
tāvad viśeṣamātreṇa vadato jātitā bhavet ।। 18 ।।
yatheṣṭaviniyogena pratītiryāpi śabdataḥ ।
na dhūmāderitīhāpi vyabhicāro'ṅgavṛttibhiḥ ।। 19 ।।
hastasaṃjñādayo ye'pi yadarthapratipādane ।
bhaveyuḥ kṛtasaṅketāste talliṅgamiti sthitiḥ ।। 20 ।।
puruṣāpekṣitāyāṃ ca tathaiva vyabhicāritā ।
padavaidikavākyānāṃ na setyavyāpikā bhavet ।। 21 ।।
sambandhānubhavaścāyaṃ so'nyatrāpi vilakṣaṇaḥ ।
etasmin puruṣāpekṣo deśāpekṣo'gnidhūmayoḥ ।। 22 ।।
satyamuktam ; na tu bhedakāraṇaṃ tadityāha—tatra vaidharmyeti śeṣeṇa ।
anumānāparityāgenaiva vailakṣaṇyamātrametat ; tadanumāne'pi pratiliṅgamastī- tyāha—dhūmānityetyardhena ।।
sarvathānumānād bhedaṃ pratipādayatā trailakṣaṇyaparityāgo vaktavyaḥ ; tamanu- ktvaivaitat pūrvamuktam ; kāraṇamabhidhāsyate ca yatheṣṭaviniyojyatvāt iti ; tat sarvaṃ jātyuttaramityāha—trailakṣaṇyeti ।।
nāpi yatheṣṭaviniyojyatvenānumānād bhedaḥ, yatheṣṭaviniyojyatvasyānumāne'pi sadbhāvādanaikāntikatvādityāha—yatheṣṭeti ।।
vipakṣatāṃ darśayati—hastasaṃjñādaya iti ।।
āptapuruṣasāpekṣatvamaṅgavṛttibhireva vyabhicāraṇīyamityāha—puruṣāpekṣitā- yāmityardhena । bhāgāsiddhatāpyatrāstīti darśayati—padavaidikavākyānāmityardhena । padavaidikavākyānāṃ nityatvenāptapraṇītatvābhāvādityarthaḥ ।।
api ca, āptapraṇītatvamavisaṃvāditvena vyāptamupalabdhamiti sambandhopa- lakṣaṇaparametat । tasya cānumāne'pi pratiliṅgaṃ vilakṣaṇatvena bheda ityāha— sambandheti ślokena sapādena ।। naliṅga. cau. mu. pekṣā. cau. mu.
kālādyapekṣayā cānya uktā cānyairabhinnatā ।
āptavādāvisaṃvādasāmānyādanumānatā ।। 23 ।।
na cāpūrvādiśabdānāṃ bhedāt sarvatra bhidyate ।
na cehāśvādiśabdebhyo bhedasteṣāṃ pratīyate ।। 24 ।।
na cāpyajñātasambandhaṃ padaṃ kiṃñcit prakāśakam ।
sambandhānanubhūtyāto na syādananumānatā ।। 25 ।।
tulyākāratayāpyatra śabdajñānārthataddhiyāt ।
agnidhūmeṣvadṛṣṭatvānna bhedastannivāraṇāt ।। 26 ।।
pratibimbeṣvanekānto bimbaṃ yādṛgghi darpaṇe ।
tādṛṅmukhādi budhyante na cātrānanumānatā ।। 27 ।।
api ca, āptavādāvisaṃvādasāmānyenaiva kaiścidanumānatvamuktam ; tat kathaṃ bhedaṃ sādhayatītyāha—ukteti pādatrayeṇa ।।
nanu vaidikānāmapauruṣeyatvena tannāstīti kathamanumānatvamityāśaṅkyāha— na cāpūrvādiśabdānāmityardhena । bhaved vaidikānāmapauruṣeyatvenāptavādāvisaṃvāda- sāmānyābhāvenānumānād bhedaḥ, na tāvatā bhedo'nyeṣāmapi bhavedityarthaḥ ।।
api ca, ta evamāhuḥ—vaidikānāmapi pauruṣeyatvādāptavādāvisaṃvāda- sāmānyenāstyeva sambandhagrahaṇamiti nāśvādiśabdebhyasteṣāṃ bheda ityāha—na ceti sārdhaślokena ।।
nāpi śabdārthatadbuddhīnāṃ tulyākāratvenānumānād bhedaḥ, tannirākaraṇādi- tyāha—tulyākāratayāpīti । “gotve sāsnādimadrūpā” ityatra tulyākāratvasya nirākṛtatvādasiddhatvaṃ hetorityarthaḥ ।।
abhyupagamya siddhatvamanaikāntikatvaṃ darśayati—pratibimveṣviti ।। bhinnatā. cau. mu. bhavadasādha. mā. daḥ na kṛtaṃ bhedāda. mā. ṇamiti । nāpi śabdārtha. mā.
pratyakṣatā yadā tatra tadānyairvyabhicāritā ।
yatra pādādi bimbena gatānāmanumīyate ।। 28 ।।
ekavākyāt sakṛccoktānnāpyanekasya tatkṣaṇāt ।
syād viruddhāviruddhasya bodhādetasya bhinnatā ।। 29 ।।
liṅgasyāpi hi tādrūpyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hetuviruddhayoḥ ।
virodhānnānumānaṃ cet syādanāgamatāpi te ।। 30 ।।
yatra caikārthatā vākye tatra syādanumānatā ।
sakṛduccarite vākye vivakṣaikaiva dṛśyate ।। 31 ।।
athāpi tatra pratyakṣatvena sapakṣatvam, tathāpyatrānaikāntikatvamityāha— pratyakṣateti । tatra gatānāmiti parokṣaviṣayatvenānumānaviṣayatvaṃ darśayati ।।
nāpyekasya vākyasya sakṛduccāritasyaikasmin kṣaṇe viruddhānekārtha- pratipādakatvenānumānād bhedaḥ śabdasyetyāha—ekavākyāditi ।।
kasmādityāha—liṅgasyāpītyardhena । hetubhūtasyāpi liṅgasya śiṃśapādera- viruddhānekārthapratipādakatvam । nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt—iti viruddhasyāpi viruddhānekārtham, vastutastu viparyayamevaiṃkaṃ sādhayatītyarthaḥ । atha viruddhānekārthaprati- pādakasyānumānābhāsatvenāvipakṣatā, hanta ! tarhi viruddhārthapratipādakasya śabdasyā- pyāgamābhāsatvena na anumānāt pramāṇāntaratetyāha—virodhādityardhena ।।
bhāgāsiddhaścāyaṃ heturiti darśayati—yatra caikārthatetyardhena । anekārtha- syāpi ‘śveto dhāvati’ ityekasminnuccāraṇe ekārthapratipādakatvamityasiddhatāṃ darśayati—sakṛdityardhena ।। tadāpyatra. cau. mu. kṣaṇam. cau. mu. ruddhārthe bodhāt. mā. cāsmina. cau. mu. Omitted. viruddhā. mā. Omitted. na. mā.
yastvanirddhāritārthānāmanekapratibhodbhavaḥ ।
sa liṅge'pyasphuṭe dṛṣṭastasmānnaitena bhidyate ।। 32 ।।
dṛṣṭāntānabhidhānaṃ ca dhūmādau vyabhicāritam ।
prasiddhatvāddhi tatrāpi na dṛṣṭānto'bhidhīyate ।। 33 ।।
anabhyaste tvapekṣante śabde sambandhinaḥ smṛtim ।
atra prayukta ityevaṃ budhyate hi cirāt kvacit ।। 34 ।।
paroktā hetavaścātra nābhedasya nivāritāḥ ।
śabdānumānayoraikyaṃ dhūmādagnyanumānavat ।। 35 ।।
anvayavyatirekābhyāmekapratyakṣadarśanāt ।
sambandhapūrvakatvācca pratipattirito yataḥ ।। 36 ।।
yastu prakaraṇādyaparāmarśenānekārthapratibhodbhavaḥ, sa liṅge'pyasphuṭe dṛṣṭa ityanai- kāntikatvānnaitenāpi bhidyata ityāha—yastviti ।
nāpi dṛṣṭāntanirapekṣārthapratipādakatvena pratyakṣavacchabdasyānumānād bhedaḥ, abhyastasambandhasyānumāne'pi sadbhāvādanaikāntiko'yamityāha—dṛṣṭāntānabhi- dhānamiti ।।
anabhyastasambandhe tu śabde'pyapekṣyata ityasiddho'yaṃ heturiti darśayati— anabhyaste tviti ।।
tasmād yadyat sāṃkhyādibhirbhedakāraṇamuktam, tadīdṛśam ; paroktābheda- hetunirākaraṇamapi na taiḥ kṛtamiti darśayati ślokatrayeṇa—paroktā ityādinā । śabdānumānayoriti dharminirdeśaḥ, aikyamiti sādhyo dharmaḥ, dhūmādagnyanumānavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ, anvayavyatirekābhyamekapratyakṣadarśanāt sambandhapūrvakatvācceti hetutrayam । pratipattirito yataḥ—iti ca pratyekamanuṣajyate । pratyakṣānyapramāṇatvādityādi cātraiva sādhye hetu catuṣṭayam ।। śabdasambandhinaḥ. mā. budhyante. cau. mu. parokṣāḥ. mā. sambandhastu. mā.
pratyakṣānyapramāṇatvāt tadadṛṣṭārthabodhanāt ।
sāmānyaviṣayatvācca traikālyaviṣayāśrayāt ।। 37 ।।
kaiścin mīmāṃsakairukto bhedo'sya viṣayāntarāt ।
pūrvābhyāṃ hyaparicchinne śāstramarthe pravartate ।। 38 ।।
tatrāpi nāgamatvaṃ syāt puruṣoktestathāstu cet ।
pratyayaḥ kiṃnimitto'rthe vaktṛbuddheḥ kuto nvasau ।। 39 ।।
na śabdārthasya sā liṅgaṃ na śabdo'syāḥ kathañcana ।
viśeṣo gamyate tābhyāṃ na caitasyānumeyatā ।। 40 ।।
anye tu mīmāṃsakā eva viṣayāntaratvena śāstrasyānumānāt bhedaṃ varṇa- yanti—sambandhagrahaṇāsāpekṣatvena pratyakṣānumānapratīto'rtho'numānasya viṣayaḥ; sāstrasya tu pratyakṣānumānābhyāmapratītaḥ kāryarūpo'rtho viṣayaḥ iti । tadetadāha— kaiściditi ।।
tadetad dūṣayitumāha pūrvapakṣavādī—tatrāpi nāgamatvaṃ syāt puru- ṣokteriti । bhavatu śāstrasya viṣayāntarato'nyapramāṇatvam, pauruṣeyasya tu vākyasya viṣayānyatvābhāvena pramāṇāntaratvābhāvādaprāmāṇyaprasaṅga ityabhiprāyaḥ । pauruṣeyasyā- pyanumānatvena prāmāṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti naiva pramāṇāntaratve'pi naḥ kṣatiriti caidi- tyāha—tathāstu cediti । viṣayānyatvābhāvena pramāṇāntaratvābhāvād vakṣyamāṇe- naiva nyāyenānumānatvābhāvādaprāmāṇyamityāha—pratyayaḥ kiṃnimitto'rtha iti । itaro'numānābhiprāyeṇāha—vaktṛbuddheriti । vākyād vaktṛbuddhiḥ pratīyate ; tato'rthatattvāvasāya ityarthaḥ । evamukte sati pūrvapakṣavādī svābhiprāyaṃ prakaṭayati— kuto nvasāviti ।।
avagatā hi vaktṛbuddhiḥ śabdārthatathātvāvagatau liṅgam ; na ca tadavagatau kiñcilliṅgāntaramupalabhāmaha ityāha—na śabdārthasyeti । sambandhagrahaṇasāpekṣatvena atra. cau. mu. Omitted. to na pramāṇam. mā. na iti codityāha. mā.
tena vakturabhiprāye pratyakṣādyanirūpite ।
puruṣoktirapi śroturāgamatvaṃ prapadyate ।। 41 ।।
na cāpyananumeyatvamāgamārthasya śakyate ।
liṅgaṃ hi śabda evāsya dhūmo'gneriva kalpyate ।। 42 ।।
na cāpyananumeyatvāt pramāṇāntaragamyatā ।
rūpasyāśrāvaṇatvena na hyapratyakṣagamyatā ।। 43 ।।
evaṃ sthite svayūthyā naḥ kecinnātiprayatninaḥ ।
anumānaviśeṣo'yamīdṛg dharmasya bodhakaḥ ।। 44 ।।
sāmānyaviṣayamanumānam, vaktṛbuddherarthatathātvasya ca viśeṣātmakatvānnānumānaviṣa- yatvamiti pūrvavādyabhiprāyaḥ ।।
tenāvaśyaṃ pauruṣeyasya vākyasya vaktṛbuddhau vākyārthatathātve vā prāmāṇya- mabhyupagantavyam ; na ca taduktena nyāyenānumānam । nāpi bhavatpakṣe viṣayānya- tvābhāvena prāmāṇāntaramityāha—tena vakturabhiprāya iti ।।
api ca, śabdaliṅgajamanumānaṃ kāryārthagrāhakaṃ dhūma ivāgnerityāha— cāṃpyananumeyatvamiti ।।
na cārthātmakaliṅgābhāvena pramāṇāntaraprameyatvaṃ kāryasya, śabdātmakaliṅga- sadbhāvāt yathā śrotrendriyagrāhyatvābhāve'pi rūpasya na pramāṇāntaraprameyatvaṃ cakṣurgrā- hyatvena pratyakṣataivetyāha—na ceti । tadevamuktena prakāreṇa na pramāṇāntaratvam । anumānāntargatasya ca tallakṣaṇenaiva lakṣitatvāt pṛthag lakṣaṇamavacanīyamiti ।।
evaṃ prāpte ucyate—evaṃ sthita ityādinā । kecidevaṃ samarthayanti— śabdavijñānādasaṃnikṛṣṭe'rthe yad vijñānaṃ tadanumānameva । śabdaliṅgajasyaivānumāna- viśeṣasya kārye'rthe prāmāṇyaṃ pratijñātam “codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharmaḥ” iti ; atra pratijñārthe na kācit kṣatirityarthaḥ ।। kṣateṣyate. cau. mu. evaṃ sati. cau. mu. prapañcinaḥ. cau. mu. lakṣaṇamevacanīya. mā.
bhaviṣyatyartharūpaṃ tu liṅgaṃ dharme nirākṛtam ।
saṃjñānumānatecchā tu na duṣyedāgame'pi naḥ ।। 45 ।।
lakṣaṇena tvabhinnatvaṃ yadi śabdānumānayoḥ ।
vedajñānāpramāṇatvaṃ syādatallakṣaṇatvataḥ ।। 46 ।।
āptavādāvisaṃvādasāmānyānnṛvacassu hi ।
lakṣaṇenānumānatvāt prāmāṇyaṃ siddhimṛcchati ।। 47 ।।
vede tvāptanarābhāvāt sambandhānubhāvād ṛte ।
lakṣaṇaṃ nānumānasyetyaprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyate ।। 48 ।।
nanvekadeśasatyatvāt tasya syādanumānatā ।
vedatvādagnihotrādau vāyukṣepiṣṭhavākyavat ।। 49 ।।
nādityayūpe'naikāntāt tadvad vā gauṇatā bhavet ।
lakṣaṇaikyābhyupagamena tu śābdānumānayoraikyābhyupagame vedasyātallakṣaṇa- tvenāprāmāṇyaprasaṅga ityāha—lakṣaṇeneti ।।
kiṃ punastallakṣaṇam, kathaṃ ca tadvede nāstītyāha—āptavādeti śloka- dvayena । āptavādatvamavisaṃvāditvena vyāptamupalabdham । laukikeṣu ca tatsadbhāvāt bhavatvanumānatvenaiva prāmāṇyam ; vedasya tvapauruṣeyatayā sambandhagrahaṇābhāvādaprāmāṇya- prasaṅga ityarthaḥ ।।
nanu lakṣaṇaikyenāpi śābdasyānumānatve sati kimityaprāmāṇyaṃ vedasya ? anumānatvenaiva kārye'rthe vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ bhaviṣyati । evaṃ hi tatra sambandhagrahaṇaṃ vāyukṣepiṣṭhatvādiṣu vedaikadeśatvaṃ satyattvena vyāptamupalabdham ; vidhyuddeśādiṣu tadupalabhyamānaṃ satyatāṃ sādhayatītyāha—nanvekadeśasatyatvāditi ।।
tadanupapannamityāha—nādityayūpe'naikāntāditi । “ādityo yūpaḥ” ityasatye'pi vedaikadeśatvadarśanādanaikāntikatvamityarthaḥ । atha tatrāstyeva guṇavādena satyatve. cau. mu.
pātaḥ pratyanumānānāmevaṃ pūrvoktayā diśā ।। 50 ।।
tasmāllakṣaṇabhedena yadi śabdapramāṇatā ।
samā loke ca vede ca siddhā vedapramāṇatā ।। 51 ।।
tena cāptopadeśatvaṃ na syādāgamalakṣaṇam ।
nāptasya sambhavo vede loke nāsmāt pramāṇatā ।। 52 ।।
purastād varṇitaṃ hyetat tasmācchabdena yā matiḥ ।
tasyāḥ svataḥpramāṇatvaṃ na cet syād doṣadarśanam ।। 53 ।।
anumānena caitasya prāmāṇyaṃ kevalaṃ samam ।
pade tāvat kṛto yatnaḥ parairityatra varṇyate ।। 54 ।।
kārye'rthe prāmāṇyamiti sapakṣatā, evaṃ tarhi viruddhatā vāstu hetorityāha—tadvadā guṇatā bhavediti । tadevamuddhāvanīyam—gauṇe'rthe vidhyuddeśasya prāmāṇyam, vedaika- deśatvāditi “ādityo yūpaḥ” ityādivat iti । “svargayāgādisambandhaviṣa- yāścodanā mṛṣā” ityanenaiva nyāyena pūrvoktena sapratisādhanatā vaktavyetyāha— pāta ityardhena ।।
tasmāt pramāṇāntaratvenaiva śabdaprāmāṇye sati vedasya prāmāṇyam, nānyathe- tyāha—tasmāditi ।।
pramāṇāntaratve'pi vāptapraṇītatvānna prāmāṇyamabhyupagantavyam, tathaiva veda- syāprāmāṇyaprasaṅgādityāha—tena ceti pādatrayeṇa ।
yatrāpyāptapraṇītatvaṃ saṃbhavati tatrāpi svata eva prāmāṇyam, āptapraṇītatvasya doṣābhāve vyāpārādityuktam ; tadāha—loka iti sapādaślokena ।।
evaṃ bhedapratipādanasya codanāprāmāṇyasiddhiṃ prayojanamabhidhāya idānīṃ bhedaṃ pratipādayitumāha—anumānenetyardhena । pramāṇatayā śabdānumānayoraikyam ; vastu- tastu viṣayabhedena sāmagrībhedena ca pratyakṣavacchābdamanumānād bhinnameva । tatra padātmakasya satyapyapramāṇatve parairanumānatvenābhyupagatatvād bhedaṃ pratipādayati— pada ityardhena ।। nātaḥ. mā, cau. mu. parairanyatra mā. sapakṣata evam. mā. bhaktatāvāyuhetoḥ. mā.
viṣayo'nyādṛśastāvad dṛśyate liṅgaśabdayoḥ ।
sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ hi padasya sthāpayiṣyate ।। 55 ।।
dharmī dharmaviśiṣṭaśca liṅgītyetacca sādhitam ।
na tāvadanumānaṃ hi yāvat tadviṣayaṃ hi tat ।। 56 ।।
sāmānyādatiriktaṃ tu śābde vākyasya gocaraḥ ।
sāmarthyādanumeyatvādaśrute'pi padāntare ।। 57 ।।
saṃkhyādimān padārthaścenna tāvat so'vyayādiṣu ।
yatrāpi te pratīyante tatra vyakterviśeṣaṇam ।। 58 ।।
tatrāpi viṣayabhedena tāvad bhedamāha—viṣaya iti ślokadvayena । sāmānyamātraṃ hi padasya viṣaya ityākṛtyadhikaraṇe sthāpayiṣyāmaḥ । prasiddhadharma- viśiṣṭaśca dharmī liṅgasya viṣaya ityetat sādhitam—“ekadeśaviśiṣṭaśca dharmye- vātrānumīyate” ityatra, “asiddhenaikadeśena gamyaḥ siddhena bodhakaḥ”—ityatra ca ।।
yattu sāmānyātiriktaṃ saṃsargādi pratīyate, tat sāmarthyaprakaraṇādilabhyapada- samabhivyāhārātmakasya vākyasya viṣaya ityāha—sāmānyāditi ।।
nanu padasyāpi saṃkhyādiviśiṣṭapadārthaviṣayatvādasiddho'yaṃ hetuḥ—viṣaya- bhedāditi codayati—saṃkhyādimān padārthaścediti । tatra parihāramāha—na tāvat so'vyayādiṣviti । bhuktvā ityādiṣu “aliṅgamasaṃkhyamavyayam” iti smaraṇāt apratīteśceti । yatrāpi—“paśunā yajeta”—ityādiṣu pratītiḥ, tatrāpyāśrayāśrayibhāvena vyakteḥ aidamarthyena padāntaropāttasya bhāvārthasya viśeṣaṇamiti vakṣyāmaḥ—“śabdavattūpalabhyate”—ityatretyāha—yatrāpi ta iti । tvaṃ ca. cau. mu. ṣyati. cau. mu. dharmādharma. cau. mu. ṣayaṃ na tat. cau. mu. bhuṅktetyādiṣu. mā. smaraṇādapratīti ceti. mā.
padāntarābhidheyasya tādarthyācca kriyātmanaḥ ।
vākyārthe'pi padaṃ yatra gomadādi prayujyate ।। 59 ।।
satyapyatra viśiṣṭe siddhatvānaiva pakṣatā ।
tāvāneva hi tatrārtho yaḥ pūrvamavadhāritaḥ ।। 60 ।।
bhedabuddheśca vaiṣamyaṃ prakṛtipratyayārthayoḥ ।
viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyārthasvātantryagrahaṇaṃ na ca ।। 61 ।।
viśeṣyapūrvikā tatra buddhiścātra viparyayaḥ ।
atha śabdo'rthavattvena pakṣaḥ kasmānna kalpyate ।। 62 ।।
nanu matvantasya viśiṣṭaviṣayatvena viṣayabhedāditi bhāgāptiddho'yaṃ hetu- rityāśaṅkyāha—vākyārthe'pi ityardhatrayeṇa । prasiddhadharmaviśiṣṭo hi dharmī liṅgasya viṣayaḥ gomānityevamādiṣu tvidānīṃ dharmiṇo'pyasiddhatvaṃ sambandhagrahaṇakāle ca dvayorapi siddhetetyarthaḥ ।।
evaṃ tāvadabhyupagamya viśiṣṭaviṣayatvamasiddhatvena viṣayabhedaḥ sādhitaḥ । idānīṃ viśiṣṭaviṣayataiva nāstītyāha—bhedabuddherityardhena । viśiṣṭaviṣayatā hi liṅgasya ; gomān ityevamādiṣu tu prakṛtipratyayorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyamātraviṣayatvena naika- syāpi viśiṣṭaviṣayatetyarthaḥ ।
api ca, viviktāvagatayorviśeṣyapratipattipūrvikā liṅgād viśiṣṭāvagatiḥ, padāttu viśiṣṭa eva sambandhagrahaṇāt viśeṣaṇapratipattipūrviketyāha—viśeṣaṇaviśe- ṣyeti । anenāpi prakāreṇa viṣayabheda eva pratipāditaḥ । atha gośabdasyātmai- vārthaviśiṣṭaḥ kasmād viṣayo na bhavati ? tathoktam—“deśasyāgniyuktasya dhūma- syānyaiśca kalpitā” iti codayati—atha śabdo'rthavattvenetyardhena ।।
atrāpi dūṣaṇamāha—pratijñārtheti dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyām । arthaviśiṣṭatayā yātmanoḥ. mā. pūrvakāt. mā.
pratijñārthaikadeśo hi hetustatra prasajyate ।
pakṣe dhūmaviśeṣe hi sāmānyaṃ heturiṣyate ।। 63 ।।
śabdatvaṃ gamakaṃ nātra gośabdatvaṃ niṣetsyate ।
vyaktireva viśeṣyāto hetuścaikā prasajyate ।। 64 ।।
bhaved vyañjakabhedāccenna tvevaṃ pratyayo'sti naḥ ।
kathaṃ cārthaviśiṣṭattvaṃ na tāvad deśakālataḥ ।। 65 ।।
tatpratītiviśiṣṭaścet paraṃ kimanumīyate ।
na pratyāyakaśaktiśca viśeṣasyānumīyate ।। 66 ।।
viśeṣāṇāṃ na śaktirhi saikadeśe'gnijātivat ।
sāmānyasyaiva śaktatvaṃ pakṣo hetuḥ sa eva ca ।। 67 ।।
gośabdavyakteḥ pakṣatve gośabdavyaktereva liṅgatvaṃ syāt gośabdatvaśabdatvayorvā ? na tāvad gośabdavyaktereva liṅgatvam, pratijñārthaikadeśatvenāsiddhatvāt । nāpi gośa- bdatvaśabdatvayoḥ, asiddhānaikāntikatvābhyām । dhūmaviśeṣe tu dharmitve sāmānyasya liṅgatvamuktamityabhiprāyaḥ ।।
nāpi gośabdavyaktereva tadrūpāvyavacchadena dharmitvamanavacchinnāyāstu liṅga- tvam, anavacchinnāyāḥ sambandhagrahaṇābhāvenāpratipādakatvādityāha—bhaved vyañja- kabhedādityardhena । api ca, arthaviśiṣṭasya vā śabdasya pakṣatvaṃ syāt, artha- pratītiviśiṣṭasya vā ? na tāvadarthasya viśeṣaṇatvam, taddeśādāvasadbhāvāt ; nāpya- pratīteḥ, liṅgavyāpārābhāvāt । sambhave vā paraṃ kimanumeyamityāha—kathamiti । ata eva na drutādibhedenārthapratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭatayā śabdasya pakṣatvam drutā- dyanugatasya liṅgatvam, drutādyavacchinnasya sambandhagrahaṇābhāvenāśaktatvādityāha— na pratyāyakaśaktiriti । vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntatvenopādānam yathā pratideśamagnijātirekā, naivaṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ śaktireketyarthaḥ । drutādyanugatasya tu rūpasya sambandhagrahaṇasadbhāvā- cchaktatvena pakṣatve hetvantarābhāvena tasyaiva hetutve'styeva pratijñārthaikadeśa- tetyāha—sāmānyasyetyardhena ।। cāsya viśi. cau. mu. gotvaśabdatvayoḥ mā. tāvalliṅgāt śabda. mā. śabdavyapekṣatvam. mā. bhūtādyanu. mā. śrutādya. mā.
tasmādarthaviśiṣṭasya na śabdasyānumeyatā ।
kathaṃ ca pakṣadharmatvaṃ śabdasyeha nirūpyate ।। 68 ।।
na kriyākartṛsambandhād ṛte sambandhanaṃ kvacit ।
rājā bhartā manuṣyasya tena rājñaḥ sa ucyate ।। 69 ।।
vṛkṣastiṣṭhati śākhāsu tā vā tatreti tasya tāḥ ।
