deśe'gnimati dhūmasya kartṛtvaṃ bhavanaṃ prati ।। 70 ।।
kāryakāraṇabhāvādau kriyā sarvatra vidyate ।
na cānavagatākāraḥ sambandho'stīti gamyate ।। 71 ।।
na cāstyasati sambandhe ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣo'pi vā ।
tasmānna pakṣadharmo'yamiti śakyā nirupaṇā ।। 72 ।।
nivṛtte'nyatra sambandhe ye'pi tadvipayātmanā ।
vadeyuḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ śabdasyānupalabdhivat ।। 73 ।।
vyavahitamupasaṃharati—tasmādityardhena । evaṃ pratyakṣavad viṣayabhedenānu- mānācchabdasya bhedaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ pratyakṣavadeva sāmagrībhedenāpi bhedaṃ pradarśayitumāha ślokatrayeṇa—kathaṃ cetyādinā । arthadharmatā hi śabdasya kriyākārakasaṃbandhena vā syāt svasvāmibhāvādiśeṣarūpeṇa vā ? tatrobhayorapi nityatvena kriyākārakalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ tajjanyatvācca tadabhāve śeṣalakṣaṇo'pi nāstīti । taduktam—“sambandhaḥ kārakebhyo'nyaḥ kriyākārakapūrvakaḥ” iti ślokatrayasyārthaḥ ।
ubhayarūpavyatirekeṇa sambandhābhāvena vṛttivākyayorubhayorapyabhāva ityāha— na ceti । upasaṃharati—tasmādityardhena ।।
yairapyuktam—vināpi kriyākārakabhāvādinā sambandhena viṣayaviṣayibhāvena śabdasyārthadharmatvaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā ghaṭābhāve sādhye ghaṭānupalabdheḥ pakṣadharmatvamiti, taddarśayati—nivṛtte'nyatreti ।। syārthasadharma.
tairapyetannirūpyaṃ tu śabdastu viṣayaḥ katham ।
na taddeśādisadbhāvo nābhimukhyādi tasya ca ।। 74 ।।
tasmādurtthāpayatyeṣa yato'rthaviṣayāṃ matim ।
tatastadviṣayaḥ śabda iti dharmatvakalpanā ।। 75 ।।
tatra vācakatāyāṃ vaḥ siddhāyāṃ pakṣadharmatā ।
na pratītyaṅgatāṃ gacchenna caivamanumānatā ।। 76 ।।
gamakatvācca dharmatvaṃ dharmatvād gamako yadi ।
syādanyonyāśrayatvaṃ tu tasmānnaiṣāpi kalpanā ।। 77 ।।
na cāgṛhītasambandhaḥ svarūpavyatirekataḥ ।
śabdaṃ jānāti yenātra pakṣadharmamatirbhavet ।। 78 ।।
tatrāpyāha—tairapyetaditi । arthaviṣayatā hi śabdasya samānadeśatvena vā syāt samānakālatvena vā ? na tāvat samānadeśatvam ; “mukhe hi śabdamupalabhāmahe bhūmāvartham”—iti vakṣyāmaḥ । nāpi samānakālatvam, yudhiṣṭhirābhāve'pi yudhi- ṣṭhiraśabdaprayogasadbhāvāt । nityatvavibhutvābhyāmapyucyamāne sarvasya sarvatra gamakatvaṃ syāt ; arthābhimukhyaṃ tu śabdasya dūrotsāritamevetyarthaḥ ।।
arthaviṣayapratītyutpādakatvena śabdasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvenārthadharmatvapratipattā- vanaṅgatvena nānumānatvamityāha—tasmāditi dvayena । pakṣadharmatvamukhena yadvijñāna- mutpadyate tadanumānamiti tārkikasthitiḥ । arthapratipattyuttarakālaṃ tu viṣayatvena pakṣa- dharmatvaṃ na pratītāvaṅgamiti ślokadvayasyārthaḥ ।।
tatra budhyutpādakatvena tadviṣayatvāt pakṣadharmatvamiti itaretarāśrayatvaṃ prāpnoti; gamakatvena tadviṣayatvāt pakṣadharmatvam, pakṣadharmatvācca gamakatvamiti darśayati— gamakatvācceti ।।
itaśca, anvayavyatirekavyatiriktarūpaṃ pakṣadharmatvaṃ śabdasya nāsti ; yadi syādagṛhītasambandho'pi śabdasvarūpasya vyatirekamādhikyamarthadharmatāṃ pratipadyeta । śabdasvarūpamātrāmeva tu pratipadyate, nārthadharmatvamityāha—na cāgṛhītasambandha iti ।। śabdastadviṣayaḥ. cau. mu. vā. cau. mu. dutpādaya. cau. mu. ca. cau. mu. hi. cau. mu. sambandhāḥ. cau. mu. jānanti. cau. mu. Omitted. vyatireka. mā.
na ca svarūpamātreṇa dhūmādeḥ pakṣadharmatā ।
na cāpi dhūmasambandhamapekṣyaiṣā pravartate ।। 79 ।।
dhūmavānayamityevamapūrvasyāpi jāyate ।
pakṣadharmamatistena bhidyetottaralakṣaṇāt ।। 80 ।।
na tvatra pūrvasambandhādadhikā pakṣadharmatā ।
na cārthapratyayāt pūrvamityanaṅgamiyaṃ bhavet ।। 81 ।।
na ca dharmī gṛhīto'tra yena taddharmatā bhavet ।
parvatādiryathā deśaḥ prāgdharmatvāvadhāraṇāt ।। 82 ।।
yaścātra kalpyate dharmī prameyo'sya sa eva naḥ ।
na cānavagate tasmiṃstaddharmatvāvadhāraṇā ।। 83 ।।
sādhyadharmidharmatā ca pakṣadharmatvam, na svarūpamityāha—na ca svarūpetyardhena । athānvayavyatirekavyatiriktasyāpi pakṣadharmatvasya sambandhagrahaṇasāpekṣaṃ grahaṇamitya- gṛhītasambandho na pratipadyate, tadapi nāstītyāha—na cāpi dhūmasambandhamiti mitirityantena । pūrvamagṛhītānvayavyatireko'pi dhūmasya parvatadharmatāṃ pratipadyata ityarthaḥ । upasaṃharati—tena bhidyetottaralakṣaṇāditi । yasmādanvayavyatirekaṃ vināpi prameyatvādeḥ parvatadharmatvamasti, tasmin satyapi nāsti cākṣuṣatvādeḥ, tadgrahaṇanira- pekṣaṃ ca grahaṇam ; ato'nvayavyatirekalakṣaṇāduttarād bhinnamidaṃ rūpāntaram ; na ca śabde tadasti, sambandhagrahaṇanirapekṣairdhūmavadarthadharmatayāpratīteḥ ।।
abhyupetyavādamātraṃ caitat ; gṛhītasambandho'pyarthadharmatayā naiva śabdaṃ prati- padyata ityāha—na tvatretyardhena । arthapratipādakatvena tu tadviṣayatvāt pakṣadharmatva- muttarakālīnatvādanaṅgamiti pūrvoktamupasaṃharati—na cārthapratyayādityardhena ।।
evaṃ pakṣadharmatvābhāvaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ grahaṇābhāvaṃ darśayitumāha ślokadvayena— na ca dharmīti । parvatavat tṛtīyasya vastuno'trāvidyamānatvādartha evātra dharmīṃ । na ca tasminnapratipanne taddharmatvāvadhāraṇaṃ śakyamiti ślokadvayasyārthaḥ ।। prasajyate. cau. mu. dhṛte. cau. mu.
prāk sa cet pakṣadharmatvād gṛhītaḥ kiṃ tataḥ param ।
pakṣadharmādibhirjñātairyena syādanumānatā ।। 84 ।।
anvayo na ca śabdasya prameyeṇa nirūpyate ।
vyāpāreṇa hi sarveṣāmanvetṛtvaṃ pratīyate ।। 85 ।।
yatra dhūmo'sti tatrāgnerastitvenānvayaḥ sphuṭaḥ ।
na tvevaṃ yatra śabdo'sti tatrārtho'stīti niścayaḥ ।। 86 ।।
na tāvat tatra deśe'sau tatkāle vāvagamyate ।
bhavennityavibhutvāccet sarvārtheṣu ca tatsamam ।। 87 ।।
tena sarvatra dṛṣṭatvād vyatirekasya cāgateḥ ।
sarvaśabdairaśeṣārthapratipattiḥ prasajyate ।। 88 ।।
athaivaṃ deśakālābhyāmasatyanvayadarśane ।
vācakapratyayaṃ kaścid brūyādarthadhiyānvitam ।। 89 ।।
pratīyate cet pakṣadharmatvagrahaṇakāla eva pratipannatvādarthasya kimaparamanumeya- mityāha—prāk sa cediti ।
evaṃ pakṣadharmatvaṃ nirākṛtyādhunānvayaṃ nirākartumāha sārdhena ślokadvayena— anvayo na cetyādinā । niyamalakṣaṇena hi sambandhenāgnirdhūmamanveti ; na ca śabdo'rthena deśakālābhyāṃ niyataḥ, tadabhāve'pi bhāvādityarthaḥ ।
atha śabdārthayorniyatatvena sarvagatatvena cānvaya ucyate, tatrāpi gośabdasya gotvāśvatvayorapi darśanāt sarvatra gamakatvaṃ syādityāha—bhavennityavibhutvā- ccediti sārdhena ślokena ।।
kaścidāha—vināpi śabdasvarūpasyārthasvarūpeṇānvayaṃ śabdajñānasyārthajñāne- nānvayo bhaviṣyati । yatra yatra gośabdajñānaṃ tatra tatra gojñānamiti darśayati— athaivaṃ deśakālābhyāmiti ।। nirasyate. mā. anvitatvam. cau. mu. niścitam. mā. yakalpane. mā.
naivamapyasti dṛṣṭo hi vināpyarthadhiyā kvacit ।
vācakapratyayo'smābhiravyutpannaṃ naraṃ prati ।। 90 ।।
dvitīyādiprayoge'tha bhavedanvayakalpanā ।
śatakṛtvaḥ prayukte'pi naiva dṛṣṭārthadhīḥ kvacit ।। 91 ।।
nanu ye jñātasambandhāsteṣāṃ dṛṣṭo'nvayaḥ sadā ।
yadyevamanvayāt pūrvaṃ sambandhaḥ ko'pi kalpitaḥ ।। 92 ।।
nāṅgamarthadhiyāmeṣā bhavedanvayakalpanā ।
anvayādhīnajanmatvamanumāne vyavasthitam ।। 93 ।।
jñāte pratītisāmarthe tadvaśādeva jāyate ।
paścādanvaya ityeṣa kāraṇaṃ kathamucyate ।। 94 ।।
tasmāt tannirapekṣaiva śabdaśaktiḥ pratīyate ।
na ca dhūme'nvayāt pūrvaṃ śaktatvaṃ gamyate tathā ।। 95 ।।
vyatireko'pyavijñātādarthācchābdadhiyo yadi ।
tatrāpyāha—naivamapīti ślokadvayena । agṛhītasambandhasyārthajñānavyatireke- ṇāpi śabdajñānadarśanāt kuto'nvaya iti ślokadvayārthaḥ ।।
nanvavagatasambandhānāṃ śabdajñānasyārthajñānenānvayo'styeveti codayati— nanu ya ityardhena ।
tatra dūṣaṇamāha ślokatrayeṇa sārdhena—yadītyādinā । anvayāt pūrvaṃ sambandhābhyupagame sati tasyaivārthapratipattāvaṅgatvenānvayasya tu tadadhīnatvenānaṅgatvā- nnānumānatvaṃ syāt ; yato'nvayabalena yadutpadyate vijñānaṃ tadanumānamiti tārkika- sthitiḥ ।।
evamanvayaṃ nirākṛtyādhunā vipakṣavyatirekaṃ nirākartumāha—vyatireka iti । na tāvad gottvābhāve gośabdavyatireko vaktavyaḥ, tasyāśvatvābhāve'pi bhāvena sphuṭaḥ. cau. mu. mānasya. ca sthitam. cau. mu. dhūmānvayāt. cau. mu. śaktatvamavagamyate. cau. mu. pūrvasambandhā. mā.
so'pi paścātkṛtatvena nārthapratyayakāraṇam ।। 96 ।।
sambandhaṃ yaṃ tu vakṣyāmastasya nirṇayakāraṇam ।
syādanvayo'tirekaśca na tvarthādhigamasya tau ।। 97 ।।
tasmādananumānatvaṃ śābde pratyakṣavad bhavet ।
trairūpyarahitatvena tādṛgviṣayavarjanāt ।। 98 ।।
sati cāsya pramāṇatve bhedābhedanirūpaṇā ।
yuktā na tu padajñānāt padārtho'tra pratīyate ।। 99 ।।
padaṃ prayujyamānaṃ hi caturdhārthe prayujyate ।
pratyakṣe ca paro'kṣe ca jñāte'jñāte'tha vā purā ।। 100 ।।
niyataṃ gamakatvaṃ na syāt । nāpyarthajñānābhāve śabdajñānābhāvaḥ, agṛhītasambandhasya tadabhāve'pi bhāvāt, gṛhītasambandhasya tu vyatirekābhyupagame pūrvavat tasyaivāṅgatvena vyatirekasyānaṅgatvāt । tasmānna śabdasyārthaṃ pratipādayato dhūmavadanvavyatirekāvaṅgam ।।
hanta tarhi kvānvayavyatirekayorupayoga ityāha—sambandhamiti । vācaka- śaktiniyāmakāvanvayavyatirekāvityarthaḥ । vakṣyati tu—
“anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ niṣkṛṣṭe'rthe niyamyate” iti ।
atraiva prayogadvayamāha—tasmāditi । śābdaṃ dharmi, ananumānatvaṃ tasyeti sādhyo dharmaḥ, trairūpyarahitatvena tādṛgviṣayavarjanāt iti hetudvayam, pratyakṣavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।
eva tāvadabhyupagamya padasya padārthe prāmāṇyaṃ pramāṇāntaratvamuktam । adhunā tu pramāṇatvameva nāstītyāha—sati ceti ।।
kasmādityāha—padaṃ prayujyamānamiti । padaṃ hi prayujyamānaṃ pratyakṣe vārthe prayujyate paro'kṣe vā । tatra prattyakṣe tu gṛhītasambandhe'gṛhītasambandhe vā tathā paro'kṣe'pīti vikalpacatuṣṭayam ।। sthitatvena. cau. mu. sādhanam. cau. mu. ajñāte'pi vā. cau. mu. Omitted. agṛhītasambandhe. mā.
tatra yat pūrvavijñāte pratyakṣe ca prayujyate ।
pramite ca pravṛttatvādanuvādo'dhikād vinā ।। 101 ।।
adṛṣṭapūrve tvajñānaṃ sambandhapratyayo'pi vā ।
sambandho na ca tasyārtho yo'rthaḥ sa tvanyato gataḥ ।। 102 ।।
parokṣe'nanubhūte ca nābhidheyamatirbhavet ।
parokṣaścānubhūtaśca yastatra smṛtiriṣyate ।। 103 ।।
pramite ca pravṛttatvāt smṛternāsti pramāṇatā ।
paricchedaphalatvāddhi prāmāṇyamupapadyate ।। 104 ।।
tataḥ kimityāha—tatra yaditi । pratyakṣeṇa pratīyamāne'rthe gṛhītasambandha- padaṃ prayujyamānaṃ pratipattiṃ janayati ; adhikābhāvena tu anuvādakatvādapramāṇamityarthaḥ ।।
agṛhītasambandhe tu pratyakṣe prayujyamānaṃ pratipattimeva na janayatītyāha— adṛṣṭapūrva ityardhena । ‘ayaṃ panasaḥ’ iti vā prayujyamāne vācyavācakalakṣaṇa- sambandhāvagatiḥ । na ca sa eva panasaśabdavācyaḥ, ayamiti prasiddhārthapada- sāmānādhikaraṇyāvaseyatvāt । artho'pi pramāṇāntarāvaseyo na tadā tata eva pratīyate ; na hi mahānasādau sambandhāvagatikāle dhūmānumeyo'gnirityāha— sambandho na cetyardhena ।।
paro'kṣe'pyagṛhītasambandhe pratipattimeva na janayatītyāha—paro'kṣa itya- rdhena । gṛhītasambandhe tu smaraṇamityāha—parokṣaścetyardhena ।।
nanu smaraṇe'pyanadhigatāvagamo'pyastyeva ; atītavijñānakarmatayā hi tatra ghaṭaḥ pratibhāsate tadviśiṣṭatayā vā gṛhīta iti । atīte tvaparo'kṣatayā ‘ayam’ iti grahaṇāt । tat satyapi smaraṇe kimiti na pramāṇamityāśaṅkyāha—pramite ceti ।। prayuktatvāt. cau. mu. anyagocaraḥ. cau. mu. dheye matiḥ. cau. mu. upajāyate. cau. mu. tvapratyakṣe. mā.
tādāttvikaparicchedaphalatvena pramāṇatā ।
pratyabhijñānavat kasmāt smṛterapi na kalpyate ।। 105 ।।
yāvān pūrvānubhūto'rthastāvānevāvadhāryate ।
smṛtyā tadanusāreṇa tadā sattve'sya naiva dhīḥ ।। 106 ।।
padamabhyadhikābhāvāt smārakānna viśiṣṭate ।
yadādhikyaṃ bhavet tatra sa padasya na gocaraḥ ।। 107 ।।
pramāṇamanumānaṃ ca yadyapi syāt padānmatiḥ ।
vākyārthasyāgamārthatvād doṣo nāgamavādinām ।। 108 ।।
nanu pramite pratyabhijñānaṃ tadārthasattāparicchedakatvena pramāṇamiṣṭam, tadvat padādāvapi padārthajñānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti codayati—tādātviketi ।।
tatra parihāramāha—yāvān pūrvānubhūta iti । pūrvānubhavavaśena smaraṇa- mutpadyamānaṃ tadanusāreṇaivotpadyate, tadā sattāṃ pratyabhijñānavanna bodhayatīti prakriyā ।।
nanu padaṃ padārthamanubhūtatayā naiva pratipādayati, tatkathaṃ smaraṇamityā- śaṅkyāha—padamabhyadhiketyardhena । ādhikyābhāvena smaraṇānna viśiṣyate—ityāha, na punaḥ smaraṇamevetyarthaḥ । yat punaḥ ‘gāmānaya’ ityādāvādhikyaṃ kriyānvayo'- vagamyate vākyāvagamyatvāt sa padasya na gocara ityāha—yadetyardhena ।।
idānīmabhyupagamya padasya padārthe pramāṇatvamanumānatvaṃ ca vivakṣāyāmiva śabdasya karaṇasyaivātmasiddhau na kadācit “codanālakṣaṇo'rtho dharmaḥ” iti pratijñāyāḥ kṣatirityāha—pramāṇamiti । vākyaṃ hi vākyārthe pramāṇatvena prati- jñātam ; tatra cānumānagandho'pi nāstītyarthaḥ ।।
kasmādityāha—vākyārthe hīti । tadanena pramāṇasvarūpamuktam vākyād vākyarthajñānaṃ dharmi, anumānād bhinnamiti sādhyo dharmaḥ, sambandhagrahaṇanirapekṣebhyaḥ padārthebhya utpadyamānatvāditi hetuḥ, pratyakṣavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।। pūrvaparicchinnaḥ. cau. mu. padādhikyaṃ bhavetkiñcit. cau. mu. vā. cau. mu. mitiḥ. cau. mu. vākyārthe tu. cau. mu. tadā.......ka. mā. jñānavadbodha. mā. ṇarūpātītam. mā.
vākyārthe hi padārthebhyaḥ sambandhānubhavādṛte ।
buddhirutpadyate tena bhinnā sāpyakṣabuddhivat ।। 109 ।।
vākyādhikaraṇe cāsya hetoḥ siddhirbhaviṣyati ।
sarveṣāṃ tu paroktānāṃ vākyabuddhāvasiddhatā ।। 110 ।।
vākyeṣvadṛṣṭeṣvapi sārthakeṣu padārthavinmātratayā pratītim ।
dṛṣṭvānumānavyatirekabhītāḥ kliṣṭāḥ padābhedavicāraṇāyām ।। 111 ।।
iti śābdaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam
padārthānāmapi vākyārthe sambandhagrahaṇasāpekṣatvādasiddho'yaṃ heuturityā- śaṅkyāha—vākyādhikaraṇa ityardhena । na padārthānāṃ vākyārthe sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣā, tadabhāve'pīndriyavad bodhakatvāt ; na cātiprasaṅgaḥ, apekṣāsaṃnidhiyogyatānāṃ niyāmakatvāt । sarvaṃ caitat tadbhūtādhikaraṇe vistareṇa sthāpayipyate ityarthaḥ । abhedapratipādakānāṃ ca “sambandhapūrvikā cātra pratipattirito yataḥ” ityeva- mādīnāṃ vākyabuddhāvasiddhatetyāha—sarveṣāmityardhena ।।
yadi vākyaṃ vākyārthe pramāṇam padaṃ tu padārthe'nuvādakatvāt smṛtivada- pramāṇam, kimarthaṃ tarhi paraistatrābhedapratipādanapūrvakaṃ vākye tadatidiṣṭam ? sāpi saṅgativijñānavyavacchinnetyartha iṣyate ; tena nānyo'numānata ityāśaṅkyāha— vākyeṣviti । prathamamadṛṣṭādapyabhinavakaviracitād vākyāt padārthavido vākyārtha- jñānaṃ dṛṣṭvā spaṣṭānumānavyatirekabhītāḥ kliṣṭāḥ padābhedavicāraṇāyāmiti ।। iti bhaṭṭombekaviracitāyāṃ tātparyaṭīkāyāṃ śābdaṃ samāptam minnāsāvakṣa. cau. mu. parokṣāṇām. mā. padārthacinmātra. mā. sambandhagrahaṇapū. mā.
upamānaprakaraṇam ।
kīdṛg gavaya ityevaṃ pṛṣṭo nāgarikairyadā ।
bravītyāraṇyako vākyaṃ yathā gaurgavayastathā ।। 1 ।।
etasminnupamānatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ śābare punaḥ ।
tasyāgamābahirbhāvādanyathaivopavarṇitam ।। 2 ।।
puruṣapratyayenaiva tasyārthaḥ saṃpratīyate ।
tadīyavacanatvena tasmādāgama eva saḥ ।। 3 ।।
sadṛśādupajāyeta yā matiḥ sadṛśāntare ।
dhyānādismṛtitulyatvāt sā pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ bhavet ।। 4 ।।
athopamānam
“upamānamapi sādṛśyamasaṃnikṛṣṭe'rthe buddhimutpādayati” iti bhāṣyam । tasyāyamarthaḥ—upamānamapi na vyabhicarati, sādṛśyamasaṃnikṛṣṭe'rthe buddhimutpādayati- ityevaṃlakṣaṇakatvāt iti । tatra loke ‘gauriva gavayaḥ’ iti vākyamupamānatvena- prasiddham । naiyāyikānāṃ tu—pratyakṣadṛṣṭagotvānām ‘gauriva gavayaḥ’ iti śrutāti- deśavākyānāṃ vane gavayadarśanāt ‘asau gavayaḥ’ iti gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayagrāhakaṃ yad vijñānaṃ tadupamānatvena prasiddham । tatrobhayavipratipattinirāsārthamudāharaṇāntara- māha bhāṣyakāraḥ—“yathā gavayadarśanaṃ gosmaraṇasya” iti । pratyakṣeṇa pratipannāyāṃ gavi smaraṇāyāṃ ca vane gavayadarśanāt ‘etatsadṛśī gauḥ’ iti yad vijñānaṃ tadu- pamānamiti । tatra vārtikakāraḥ sarvaprakāramupamānaṃ dūṣayitumāha—kīdṛgityā- dinā tatra yadyapi gāṃ smṛtvā tajjñānamupajāyate ityevamantena । tatra yallauki- kamupamānaṃ tasyāgamatvena pramāṇāntaratvābhāvāditi kīdṛg gavaya ityādi- ślokatrayasyārthaḥ ।।
yadapi bhāṣyakāreṇodāhṛtam tasyāpi smṛtitvena prāmāṇyābhāvaḥ ityāha— sadṛśāditi । yadapi sadṛśadarśanādanubhūte gavi paro'kṣe ‘upalabhyamānagavayasa- yadi. cau. mu. tatrārthaḥ. cau. mu.
deśakālādibhedena yathānyatra viśiṣyate ।
prameyaṃ naivamastyatra nagarasthānusārataḥ ।। 5 ।।
śrutātideśavākyānāmaraṇye gavaye matiḥ ।
yā sopamānaṃ keṣāṃcid gosāśyena rañjitā ।। 6 ।।
pratyakṣo gavayastāvat sādṛśye smṛtiratra tu ।
nanu sādṛśyayukte'rthe na smṛtinandriyād gatiḥ ।। 7 ।।
pūrvavākyārthavijñānānnādhikyaṃ gavaye yadi ।
dṛśo gauḥ’ iti jñānamupamānamudāhṛtam, tadapi dhyānādivadanubhūte sadṛśadarśanā- bhyutthasaṃskārajanyatvena smṛtivadapramāṇamityarthaḥ ।।
na cānubhūte saṃskārajanyatve'pi pratyabhijñānavat prāmāṇyamityāha— deśakāleti । anubhūte'pi pratyabhijñā deśāntarādiṣu pūrvānubhūtātirekeṇa sattāṃ gṛhṇāti । taduktam—
“idānīntanamastitvaṃ na hi pūrvadhiyā gatam” iti । upamānaṃ tu nagarasthānubhavānusāreṇotpadyamānamatulyaṃ pratyabhijñayetyarthaḥ ।।
idānīṃ naiyāyikoktamupamānaṃ dūṣayitumāha—śruteti । pratyakṣadṛṣṭagotvānām ‘gauriva gavayaḥ’ iti śrutātideśavākyānāṃ ca vane gavayadarśanāt ‘ayaṃ gavayaḥ’ iti gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayagrāhakaṃ yad vijñānaṃ tadupamānam । taduktam— “prasiddhasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanamupamānam” iti ।।
tadapi dūṣayitumāha—pratyakṣa ityardhena । gavayasvarūpālambanamupagamyeta, tadgatagosādṛśyālambanaṃ vā ? tatra pūrvasmin pakṣe indriyasaṃnikarṣotpannatvena pratyakṣa- tvam, itaratrāpyatideśavākyādeva gavayagatatvena gosādṛśyasyāvagatatvāt smṛti- tvamityarthaḥ । nanu sādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayagrāhakatvena smṛtipratyakṣābhyāmuttīrṇametaditi codayati—nanu sādṛśyayukta ityardhena ।।
atrāpi dūṣaṇamāha—pūrvavākyārthavijñānāditi । gavayatvopalakṣitavyakti- sādṛśyānurañjitā. cau. mu. sādṛśyasmṛti. darśanādivaktṛsaṃ. mā. mupagamyaitatadgata. mā.
smaraṇādaviśiṣṭatvāt saṅgaterna pramāṇatā ।। 8 ।।
atha tvadhikatā kācit pratyakṣādeva sā bhavet ।
yāvaddhīndriyasambandhastatpratyakṣamiti sthitam ।। 9 ।।
smaryamāṇasya cāṃśasya vivekenāpramāṇatā ।
śrutātideśavākyatvaṃ na cātīvopayujyate ।। 10 ।।
ye'pi hyaśrutatadvākyāsteṣāmapi bhavatyayam ।
pratyakṣadṛṣṭagotvānāṃ vane gavayadarśinām ।। 11 ।।
atha saṃjñānusandhānaṃ teṣāṃ nāstīti varṇyate ।
na nāma vastu tattāvat sarvathā taiḥ pratīyate ।। 12 ।।
mātraṃ vā gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭamālambanam, saṃnihitā vā vyaktiḥ ‘ayaṃ gavayaḥ’ iti ? tatra pūrvasmin pakṣe'tideśavākyādeva gavayatvopalakṣitasya vyaktimātrasya gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭatayāvagatatvāt smṛtitvam ।।
itaratrāpi saṃnihitasya gavayatvopalakṣitasya gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭatayākṣāvaseya- tvena pratyakṣatvamityāha—atha tvadhikateti ।।
kāmam ‘ayaṃ sa gavayaḥ’ ityatrāpi, ‘sa gavayaḥ’ ityetāvanmātraṃ smṛti- tvenāpramāṇaṃ syāt, na tu ‘ayam’ iti yatrāparo'kṣatayā gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭo'- rtho'vabhāsata ityāha—smaryamāṇasyetyardhena । idānīm ‘śrutātideśavākyānām’ ityupamānalakṣaṇāvayavaṃ dūṣayitumāha—śrutātideśavākyatvamiti sārdhena ślokena । aśrutātideśavākyānāmapi pratyakṣadṛṣṭagotvānāṃ vane gavayadarśanottarakālam ‘gosadṛ- śo'yam’ iti jñānamutpadyata evetyarthaḥ ।।
athāśrutātideśavākyānām ‘ayaṃ sa gavayaḥ’ iti saṃjñānusandhānena jñānaṃ notpadyate, mā bhūdevam ; tathāpi sādṛśyaviśiṣṭatayā saṃnihitam pratipadyata eve- tyāha—atha saṃjñānusandhānamiti ।। pratyakṣādivaśāda bhavet. cau. mu. vākyavyaktiḥ. mā. tayārthāvaseya. mā. tathā. mā.
na ca śabdārthasambandhaḥ prameyo'tra tadeṣyate ।
sādṛśyāvagate vācye vākyādavagato hyasau ।। 13 ।।
na cāsya pratyabhijñānaṃ punarutpadyate vane ।
śaktyoratīndriyatvena smṛtireva hi seṣyate ।। 14 ।।
śabdānuviddhabodho'pi pratyakṣamupapāditam ।
nanu ‘ayaṃ sa gavayaḥ’ ityupamānasya saṃjñāsaṃjñilakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ prameyatvene- ṣṭastaiḥ । taduktam—“saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhapratipattirupamānārthaḥ” iti । aśrutāti- deśavākyaśca gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭatayā saṃnihitaṃ pratipadyate gosadṛśo'yaṃ kimapi, na tu taṃ gavayaśabdavācyatayetyāśaṅkyāha—na ca śabdārthasambandha iti । ayamāśayaḥ- na tāvad gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭāyāṃ gavayavyaktau saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhajñānamānantyavyabhi- cārābhyām । atha gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭe gavayatvena yaḥ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaḥ sa upamānasya viṣaya iti, tatra gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭavyaktimātrasya gavayaśabdavācyatayāti- deśavākyādeva pratipannatvāt tadviṣayatvābhyupagame smṛtitvaprasaṅgaḥ । saṃnihitasya tu gavayatvopalakṣitasya sādṛśyaviśiṣṭatayālambanatve'bhyupagamyamāne pratyakṣatvamityuktam—
“atha tvadhikatā kācit pratyakṣādeva sā bhavet ।” ityatra ।
atha tvatideśavākyādavagata eva gosadṛśo gavayaśabdavācyatayā yena sa gavayameṃva punarapyakṣeṇa pratyabhijānātīti na smṛtitvam, tatrāpyāha—na cāsyeti । tatraitadeva tāvad vaktavyam—evamapi pratyakṣatvenopamānasya pramāṇāntaratvamapagata- meva । etadapi nāsti, vācyavācakaśaktyorarthāpattiprameyatvenākṣāvaseyatvābhāvāt ।।
nanu gosadṛśadarśane satyatideśavākyāvagatagavayaśabdasmaraṇottarakālam ‘ayaṃ sa gavayaḥ’ iti jñānamutpadyamānaṃ kathamakṣajaṃ syādityāśaṅkyāha—śabdānuviddha- bodho'pītyardhena । “tenendriyārthasambandhe vidyamāne smarannapi” ityatroktamiha parāmṛṣṭam । tasmādupamānasya pramāṇāntaratāmicchatā smṛtipratyakṣābhyāmaviṣayīkṛtaḥ sādṛśyaviśiṣṭo'rthaḥ prameyatvena vaktavyaḥ । na ca tadasti, gavayatvopalakṣitasya sādṛśyāvadhṛte vākye. cau. mu. tayā......sagavaya. mā. avagata. mā. arthāvaseya. mā.
tasmāt sādṛśyayukto'rthaḥ prameyo'pūrva ucyatām ।। 15 ।।
vyavasāyātmakatvaṃ tu pratyakṣasya yadeṣyate ।
jātyādivattadānena sādṛśyaṃ kiṃ na mīyate ।। 16 ।।
pratyakṣābhāsametat tu nirvikalpakavādinām ।
prameyavastvabhāvācca nābhipretā pramāṇatā ।। 17 ।।
sādṛśyasya ca vastutvaṃ na śakyamapabādhitum ।
bhūyo'vayavasāmānyayogo jātyantarasya tat ।। 18 ।।
saṃnihitasya gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭasya pratyakṣatvāt vyaktimātrasya ca gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭa- myātideśavākyādeva pratipannatvena smṛtatvādityāha—tasmādityardhena ।।
yasya tu ‘ayaṃ gavayaḥ’ ityupamānavādinaḥ “indriyārthasaṃnikarṣotpannam- vyapadeśyamavyabhicāri vyavasāyātmakam”—iti pratyakṣalakṣaṇam, tasya vyavasāyā- tmakatvena savikalpakatvāt ‘ayaṃ sa gavayaḥ’ iti sādṛśyagrāhakasya ‘gaurayam’ ityādivajjātigrāhakasya sutarāṃ pratyakṣatvamityāha—vyavasāyātmakatvamiti ।।
apare tvāhuḥ—gṛhṇīma etat ‘upamānākhyaṃ pramāṇāntarametanna bhavati ; iti, pratyakṣametaditi na mṛṣyāmaha ityāha—pratyakṣābhāsamiti ।।
savikalpakatvenāvastusādṛśyaviṣayatvena ca pratyakṣābhāsaḥ pramāṇaṃ nedamiti bauddhāḥ । tatra prāmāṇyasiddhaye sādṛśyasya vastutvaṃ tāvadāpādayati—sādṛśyasye tyādinā vastutve sati cāsyaivamityevamantena । bhūyasāmavayavasāmānyānāṃ kartṛ- tvādīnāṃ jātyantaropalakṣite'vayavini yo yogaḥ tat sādṛśyam । tacca sadṛśapratya- yotpādakatvena ‘gavayasadṛśena yajeta’ ityevamādicodanārthaniṣpādakatvena vārthakriyā- kāritvāt vastvevetyarthaḥ । avayavagrahaṇaṃ ca dharmapradarśanārtham । jātyantaragrahaṇaṃ copa- lakṣaṇaṃ vyaktyantarapradarśanārtham । tenedamapi siddhaṃ bhavati-agniriva māṇavakaḥ, yajñada- ttasadṛśaśca devadattaḥ iti । yatrāpi stryavayavānāṃ padmāvayavaiḥ sādṛśyam yathā ‘padmada- tasyāsādṛśya. mā. smṛtitvāt. mā. pramāṇaṃ cedam. mā. gavayenedṛśena. mā.
sadṛśāvayavatvaṃ tu yatra padmadalākṣivat ।
tatsvāvayavasāmānyabhūmnā tepāṃ bhaviṣyati ।। 19 ।।
evaṃ jātiguṇadravyakriyāśaktisvadharmataḥ ।
ekaikadvitrisāmastyabhedādasya ca citratā ।। 20 ।।
na dharmā eva sādṛśyaṃ bhūyastā vā tadāśrayā ।
bhūyamnvavaddhi jātyādi sadṛśatvena gamyate ।। 21 ।।
yamayoḥ kathametacced dṛṣṭatvāt kimihocyate ।
kvaciddhi bhūyasāmetat kvacidalpīyasāmapi ।। 22 ।।
lākṣī’ iti, tatrāpi svāvayavasāmānyāpekṣameva sādṛśyamiti na lakṣaṇasyāvyāpa- katvamityāha—sadṛśeti ।।
idānīṃ vastutvasidhyarthameva vicitratāṃ sādṛśyasya darśayati—evamiti ।।
bhūyo'vayavasāmānyayogaḥ—ityatra yogagrahaṇasya vyāvartyaṃ darśayitumāha— na dharmā iti ।।
atredaṃ codyam—yamayoḥ kathametaccediti । bhūyo'vayavasāmānyayoga- lakṣaṇe sādṛśye yamayoḥ kathametat sādṛśyamiti । tatra codayanti—yamayorapi bhūyo'vayavasāmānyayoge sati kimidamucyate ‘yamayoḥ kathametaccet’ iti ? atha jātyantaratvamatra nāsti, tadapi varṇitaṃ tatraiva—jātyantaragrahaṇamupalakṣaṇaṃ vyaktya- ntarapradarśanārtham iti । ayamāśayaḥ—avayavasāmānyayogaḥ sādṛśyamityuktam । nityaṃ ca sāmānyamabhyupagatam । tatra yamayorvināśenāvayavānāṃ vināśādāśrayābhāvena sāmānyasyābhāvāt sādṛśyasyābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ । tatra parihāramāha—dṛṣṭatvāt kimi- hocyata iti । yamayorapyavayavasāmānyayogasya dṛṣṭatvena sadbhāvādityarthaḥ । kvaciddhi bhūyasāmavayavasāmānyayogaḥ kvacid dvayoreva ; naitāvatāvayavasāmānyayogasyāvastutva- mityāha—kvaciddhīti । bhedādetasya. cau. mu.
naitāvatā viśeṣeṇa vastutvaṃ tasya hīyate ।
sāmānyānyapi caitāni nāśīnyāśrayanāśataḥ ।। 23 ।।
anantāśrayayogāddhi na nāśo'nyatra vidyate ।
tena sarvaṃ na sāmānyaṃ nityatvena prakalpyate ।। 24 ।।
sāmānyasya na vā nāśaḥ kvacidabhyupagamyate ।
sarvasya hyāśrayaḥ kaścidasti deśāntarādiṣu ।। 25 ।।
teṣāṃ bhūyastvavācedaṃ sādṛśyamatiricyate ।
tāni vyastāni santyeva sādṛśye'pi kvacit kvacit ।। 26 ।।
sādṛśāvayavattvaṃ tu yatra nāma pratīyate ।
tadapyavayavānāṃ syāt sāmānyāvayavāntaraiḥ ।। 27 ।।
evaṃ tāvadyato nāsti parābhedaprakalpanā ।
yat punaryamayorvināśādavayavānāmabhāvādanityatvaṃ sāmānyasyoktam, tatrā- pyāha—sāmānyānyapīti । āśrayābhāvena yadi kvacijjāteranityatvaṃ bhavati, bhavatu ; ko doṣaḥ ? gotvādestvanantāśrayasadbhāvena nityatvam, na jātitvādi- tyarthaḥ । upasaṃharati—tenetyardhena ।।
athavā yamayorapi yadavayavasāmānyam, tannityameva ; kvacit teṣāmavaya- vānāmavyastānāṃ piṇḍāntare'pi bhāvenāśrayasadbhāvāt ; bhūyastvābhāvena tu sādṛśyaṃ mā bhūt, na tvavayavānāmabhāva ityāha ślokadvayena—sāmānyasyetyādinā ।।
“sādṛśāvayatvaṃ tu yatra nāma pratīyate ।
tadapyavayavānāṃ syāt sāmānyāvayavāntaraiḥ ।।” ityetat ।
“sadṛśāvayatvaṃ tu yatra padmadalākṣivat” ityanena punaruktatvādupekṣaṇīyamiti ।।
evaṃ tāvat sāvayave vastuni sarvatra bhūyovayavasāmānyayogaḥ sādṛśyamityāha— evaṃ tāvadityardhena । bhedaḥ svāvayavaḥ, yadapekṣayā sāvayavatvamucyate ; tatpratiṣedho'bhedaḥ pratyakṣe'pi mā. svāvayavāpekṣayā sāvayavatvamucyate tatpratiṣedhabhedo niravayavatvaṃ yadyato yatra. mā.
tataḥ paraṃ tu sāmānyaṃ bhavet sādṛśyavarjitam ।। 28 ।।
pradhānānāṃ tu sāmānyaṃ yatraikaṃ saṃpratīyate ।
sa eveti bhavet tatra tadbhede sadṛśatvadhīḥ ।। 29 ।।
citrādau yatra sādṛśya sāmānyaṃ tatra kiṃ bhavet ।
tatrāpi pṛthivīvarṇaviśeṣādi samānatā ।। 30 ।।
rūpagandharasānāṃ ca kasyācit tulyatā kvacit ।
nāvaśyaṃ sarvasāmānyāt sādṛśyamupajāyate ।। 31 ।।
pṛthivyādiṣu caiteṣāṃ satāmeva svabhāvataḥ ।
pariṇāmādabhivyaktiryathādṛṣṭyavadhāryate ।। 32 ।।
na hi śaktyātmanā kiñcidasajjanma prapadyate ।
dharmāṇāṃ na ca nānātvamasti cāvāntarasthitiḥ ।। 33 ।।
niravayatvam, tat yataḥ yatra nāstītyarthaḥ । niravayavepu tu paramāṇuṣu sādṛśyameva nāstītyāha—tataḥ paramityardhena ।।
adhunā jātyantaragrahaṇasya vyavacchedyaṃ darśayati—pradhānānāmiti ।।
nanu yadi bhūyo'vayavasāmānyoga. sādṛśyam, kathaṃ devadattasya caitreṇa laipyena ca sādṛśyam ? na hi tatra devadattāvayavānāṃ sadbhāvo'stīti codayati— citrādāvityardhena । tatra parihāramāha sārdhena ślokena—tatrāpītyādinā । avayavasāmānyayogenopalakṣitatvādityarthaḥ ।।
idānī sāṃkhyamatena laipye'pi devadattāvayavānāṃ sadbhāvamāha—pṛthivyā- diṣvityādinā sārddhena ślokena । laipye'pi devadattāvayavānāṃ sadbhāvo'styeva ; viśiṣṭena tu pariṇāmenābhivyajyante । sarvameva ca ghaṭādi kulālādivyāpāreṇa sadevābhivyajyate vividhakāryaniyamadarśanādityarthaḥ ।।
yadyapi ca kathaṃcidavayavānāmekatvam, tathāpi bhinnābhinne vastuni bhedo'- pyastyevetyupapannaṃ bhūyo'vayavasāmānyalakṣaṇasādṛśyasya vastutvena prameyatvamityāha— dharmāṇāmityardhena । bahūnāmapyavayavānāmekāvayaviruddhatvenaikatvam, ekasyāpyavaya- vino'nekarūpatayā nānātvamityarthaḥ ।। yogasyopa. mā.
vastutve sati cāsyaivaṃ sambandhasya ca cakṣuṣā ।
dvayorekatra vā dṛṣṭeḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ na vāryate ।। 34 ।।
sāmānyavacca sādṛśyamekaikatra samāpyate ।
pratiyoginyadṛṣṭe'pi tasmāt tadupalabhyate ।। 35 ।।
tatra yadyapi gāṃ smṛtvā tajjñānamupajāyate ।
saṃnidhergavayasthatvād bhavedindriyagocaraḥ ।। 36 ।।
tasmāt yat smaryate tat syāt sādṛśyena viśeṣitam ।
prameyamupamānasya sādṛśyaṃ vā tadanvitam ।। 37 ।।
pratyakṣeṇāvabuddhe'pi sādṛśye gavi tu smṛte ।
evaṃ tāvat sādṛśyasya vastutvapratipādanena—‘prameyavastvabhāvācca nābhi- pretā pramāṇatā’—iti yadukta tannirastam । adhunā tu “pratyakṣābhāsametat”— iti yaduktaṃ tannirākartumāha—vastutva iti । evamuktena prakāreṇa vastutve sati sādṛśyasya na pratyakṣatvamapaitītyarthaḥ ।।
nanu vyāsajyavartamānasya kathamekatra grahaṇamityāśaṅkyāha—sāmānyavacceti । jātivadekatraiva sādṛśyasya samāptatvena dvayorekatra vā grahaṇamityarthaḥ ।।
nanu nirvikalpakena vane gavayaṃ dṛṣṭvā pratipannagosmaraṇottarakālam ‘ayaṃ sa gavayaḥ’ iti jñānamutpadyamānaṃ kathamakṣajaṃ syādityāśaṅkyāha—tatra yadyapīti । smaraṇottarakālamapyaparokṣatayā visphāritākṣasya ‘ayaṃ sa gavayaḥ’ ityatra saṃnihita- gavayavyaktigatatvena sādṛśyaṃ prakāśamānaṃ jātivat pratyakṣamityarthaḥ ।।
tasmāllaukikasyāgamatvaṃ bhāṣyakārodāhṛtamya smṛtitvaṃ naiyāyikoktasya ca pratyakṣatvamiti nopamānaṃ pramāṇāntaramiti lakṣyābhāvenālakṣyametaditi prāpte bhāṣya- karodāhṛtameva samarthayitumāha vārtikakāra—tasmāditi । gavayadarśanāt ‘etatsadṛśo gauḥ’ iti yad vijñānaṃ tadevopamānam । tasya ca prameyaṃ gavaya- sādṛśyaviśiṣṭatayā smaryamāṇaḥ paro'kṣo gauḥ smaryamāṇagogata vā gavayasādṛśya- mityarthaḥ ।।
yat punaridamuktam—“dhyānādismṛtitulyatvāt” iti, tatrāpyāha—pratyakṣe- ṇeti । smaryamāṇasya gavayasya sādṛśyaviśiṣṭatayā prameyatvam । na ca tathā gauḥ pramā- ekatraikasādṛśyasamāpta. mā.
viśiṣṭasyānyato'siddherupamānapramāṇatā ।। 38 ।।
pratyakṣe'pi yathā deśe smaryamāṇe ca pāvake ।
viśiṣṭasyānyato'siddheranumānapramāṇatā ।। 39 ।।
yatra tvasadṛśādeva kalpayitvopajāyate ।
sādṛśyapratyayastatra tadābhāsatvakalpanā ।। 40 ।।
bādhakajñānataścaiṣāṃ sādṛśyābhāsatā bhavet ।
yathā palālakūṭasya sādṛśyaṃ kuñjarādinā ।। 41 ।।
samīpastho vijānāti sādṛśyaṃ neti tatra hi ।
na bādhyate samīpādau yattu sādṛśyameva tat ।। 42 ।।
ṇāntareṇāvagataḥ, vanasthena pratyakṣeṇa gavayagatagosādṛśyamātrāvagamāt ; nagarasthena ca gavayasādṛśyaviviktagopadārthamātrāvagamāt, na hyanavagatagavayaḥ puruṣo gavayasādṛśya- viśiṣṭatayā gopadārthaṃ pratipadyate । nanu khuratvavarṇatvādiyogaḥ sādṛśyam । taccāva- gatameva nagarasthena pratyakṣeṇaiva, avayavagrahaṇapurassaratvādavayavigrahaṇasya ; agrahaṇe vā gavayagrahaṇe'pi sadṛśapratipattirna syāt । ucyate—anavagatagavayasya sadṛśa- pratibhāsābhāvena sādṛśyamavagatamiti citram । khuratvādayo'pi sādṛśyāntaropa- lakṣitāvayavigatatvena pratītāḥ punarjātyantaropalakṣitāvayavini pratīyamānāḥ sādṛśyarūpatāṃ pratipadyante, nānyathā । “bhūyovayavasāmānyayogaḥ” ityuktam । na cātra gaurgavayasādṛśyaviśiṣṭo gṛhītatayā pratibhāsate । tenātra smṛtigandho'pi nāsti ।।
atraiva dṛṣṭāntamāha—pratyakṣepīti ।।
tasmādevaṃlakṣaṇakatvādupamānamapi na vyabhicarati । yatra tu vyabhicāraḥ, tadupamānameva na bhavatītyāha—yatra tviti ।।
tatra tadābhāsatve kiṃ pramāṇamityāha—bādhakajñānata ityardhena । kimudā- haraṇamityāha—yathetyardhena ।।
bādhakapratyayaṃ darśayati—samīpastha iti ।। avagatagavayagraha. mā. sāmānyarūpatām. mā.
na caitasyānumānatvaṃ pakṣadharmādyasambhavāt ।
prākprameyasya sādṛśyaṃ na dharmatvena gṛhyate ।। 43 ।।
gavaye gṛhyamāṇaṃ ca na gavāmanumāpakam ।
pratijñārthekadeśatvād gogatasya na liṅgatā ।। 44 ।।
gavayaścāpyasambandho na goliṅgatvamṛcchati ।
sādṛśyaṃ na ca sarveṇa pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ tadanvayi ।। 45 ।।
ekasminnapi dṛṣṭe'rthe dvitīyaṃ paśyato vane ।
sādṛśyena sahaivāsmiṃstadaivotpadyate matiḥ ।। 46 ।।
yadarthāntarapratīteḥ pramāṇatvenānumātvam, tataśca “anumānaṃ jñātasambandha” ityanenaiva gatatvādupamānapṛthaglakṣaṇaṃ na kartavyamityāśaṅkyāha ślokatrayaṇa—na caitasyetyādinā । tadanena pramāṇaṃ nirūpitam ‘gavayasadṛśo gauḥ’ iti vijñānaṃ dharmi, anumānād bhinnamiti sādhyo dharmaḥ, pakṣadharmādyanaṅgatvāditi hetuḥ ; pratyakṣa- vaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ । gavayasādṛśyavattve'pyanumeye sādṛśyasya vā liṅgatvaṃ syāt gavayasya vā ? sādṛśyasyāpi gogatatvena vā pratīyamānasya gavayagatatvena vā ? na tāvad gogatasya, upamānajñānotpatteḥ prathamamapratīteḥ, tatprameyatvāt tasya; yadi tu pakṣadharmatā tatprameyā syāt, pratijñārthaikadeśatvaṃ syāt । nāpi gogatasyānu- meyatvaṃ gavayagatasya pratīyamānatvena liṅgatvaṃ vaktavyam, pakṣadharmatvābhāvāt । ata eva na gavayasyāpi liṅgatvam । anvayo'pi gavayagatasya sādṛśyasya gogatena nāstīti ślokatrayasyārthaḥ ।।
nanu gavayagatasādṛśyapratiyogitvasya gogavayau vā sadṛśadvayaṃ vā kiñcit yugapat paśyato gavayasādṛśyasyānvayo draṣṭuṃ śakyatā ityāśaṅkya tathādarśanābhāve'pi gomātraṃ dṛṣṭavato vane gavayadarśanānantaraṃ tatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭagopratīternaivamityāha— ekasminniti ।। pramāṇādārūpatitam. mā. numeyena grāhyasya. vā. mā. syāpi liṅgatvena. vā. bhā. na hi na pakṣa. mā. sāpi. mā. liṅgatvamiti ślokatrayasyārthaḥ । anvayo'pi gavayagatasya sādṛśyasya gopadārthena nāstītyāha—ekasminniti mā.
śrṛṅgitvāderathocyeta sambandhālliṅgatā gavi ।
naitepāṃ gavayajñānavyāpāraṃ pratyupakṣayāt ।। 47 ।।
yadi tebhyaḥ pratītiḥ syānnissādṛśyaiva sā bhavet ।
na gauḥ śrṛṅgādisadṛśaḥ sadṛśo gavayena tu ।। 48 ।।
sadṛśapratyayaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrṛṅgādipratyayāt param ।
gavayapratyayādeva gojñānamupajāyate ।। 49 ।।
sadṛśāvayavatve tu teṣāmevopamā bhavet ।
na ca śrṛṅgādayo yatra tatra gauranumīyate ।। 50 ।।
itthaṃ cānumimānasya bhrāntijñānaṃ prasajyate ।
nagarasthaṃ tu gojñānaṃ smaraṇaṃ nātivartate ।। 51 ।।
bhinnānumānādupameyamuktā sauryādivākyairasahāpi dṛṣṭam ।
nāpi gavayasambandhinaḥ śrṛṅgitvāderliṅgatvamityāha sārdhena ślokatrayeṇa— śrṛṅgitvāderityādinā । rūpasya hi kāraṇasya liṅgatvam, na ca gavayasambandhinaḥ śrṛṅgitvāderupamānotpattau kāraṇatvam, śrṛṅgādyavayavapratyayasya gavayāvayavipratyaya evopayogāt ; sadṛśadarśanaṃ copamānasya kāraṇam, na ca śrṛṅgasadṛśo gauḥ—iti ślokatrayasyārthaḥ ।।
tatra śrṛṅgāderliṅgatvaṃ nāstītyāha—na ca śraṅgādaya iti । śrṛṅgitvādayo hi vanasthagavayasamavetāḥ, sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaśca gaurnagara iti anityaḥ śabdaḥ, kākasya kārṣṇyāt—iti tulyatetyarthaḥ ।।
atha gavaya eva goviśiṣṭo'numeyaḥ, tatrāpyapratyakṣavirodhena pakṣe'bhāvo'stī tyāha—itthaṃ ceti ।।
idānīṃ bhedapratipādanasya svatantropayogitāmāha—bhinneti ।। śrṛṅgatvādeḥ. mā. na teṣām. cau. mu. sadṛśī sadṛśī. cau. bhu. bhrāntajñānam. cau. mu. smaraṇānnāti. cau/?/. mu. dṛṣṭām. mā. iva. mā. tatrāpi pratyakṣavirodhena pakṣābhāve satī. mā.
sādṛśyato'gnayādiyutaṃ kathaṃ nu pratyāyayedityupayujyate naḥ ।। 52 ।।
pratinidhirapi caivaṃ vrīhisādṛśyayogād bhavati tadapacāre yatra nīvārajātau ।
tadapi phalamabhīṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇasyopamāyāḥ pratikṛtirapi gauṇairbodhyate yatra cānyaiḥ ।। 53 ।।
yadi susadṛśamanyallabhyate tatra mithyā bhavati visadṛśatvānmandasādṛśyayuktam ।
matirapi ca tathaiva drāgivotpadyate'smin itaraviṣayabodhe satyapītthaṃ ca bādhaḥ ।। 54 ।।
ityupamānaṃ samāptam
adhunā prāmāṇyapratipādanasya svatantropayogitāmāha—pratinidhiriti tripādyā । atraivodāharaṇamāha—pratikṛtirapīti pādena । śamīpiṣṭaḥ kriyatām- iti yatra laukikāyamānaprayojanatā, tadapekṣaṇīyam ।।
idānīmāpekṣikatvaṃ tasyā darśayati—yadi susadṛśamanyadityardhena । bhavatu sadṛśadarśanāt susadṛśasyopādānam, tathāpi mandasādṛśye'pi sadṛśavadavagatirutpa- dyata eva ; kimiti sā na pramāṇamityāha—matirapīti । viśiṣṭābhāve susadṛśā ca tāvat pūrvamupamitirutpadyate, tadupādānādeva siddhe'rthe itaratra paścādutpannāpi kṛtaketyato bādhyata ityarthaḥ ।। iti śrībhaṭṭombekaviracitāyāṃ tātparyaṭīkāyāṃ upamānaṃ samāptam prakṛtirapi. mā, cau. mu. bādhyate. mā, cau. mu. darśanāssadṛśavadeva gatirutpadyate. mā.
athārthāpattiḥ
pramāṇaṣaṭkavijñāto yatrārtho nānyathā bhavan ।
adṛṣṭaṃ kalpayedanyaṃ sārthāpattirudāhṛtā ।। 1 ।।
dṛṣṭaḥ pañcabhirapyasmād bhedenoktā śrutodbhavā ।
pramāṇagrāhiṇītvena yasmāt pūrvavilakṣaṇā ।। 2 ।।
athārthāpattiprakaraṇam
“arthāpattirapi dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho'nyathā nopapadyata ityarthakalpanā” iti bhāṣyam । tatra arthāpattiriti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ ; dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vetyādi lakṣaṇam । tatra lakṣaṇagranthe śrutagrahaṇamanupapannamiva dṛśyate । tathā hi—dṛśirupalabdhigocare vā syāt cakṣurdṛṣṭe vārthe varteta ? tatropalabdhivacanatve “śruto vā” iti punarupādāna- manarthakam ; cakṣurdṛṣṭivacanatve cārthāpattidvayopādānenānumānādipūrvikā nopāttā syāt ; tatrāvyāpakatvaṃ nāma lakṣaṇasya ; tathā “nopapadyate” iti ; na hi pramā- ṇāvagatasya dāhāderanupapattiryuktā ; yadyavagato nopapadyate, kimityarthāntaraṃ kalpa- yati ? na hyaṅgulyagrādhikaraṇādau hasthiyūthaśatāvagatirarthāntaraṃ kalpayati ; atha pramāṇāvagato nopapadyate, kimidaṃ kalpayati—ityāśaṅkyāha—pramāṇaṣaṭka- vijñāta iti । yathāviṣayaṃ pramāṇavaṭkapramito'rtho'nyathānupapattyā yadarthāntaraṃ kalpa- yati, sārthāpattiḥ । upalabdhivacano'yaṃ dṛśiriti yāvat । avagato'nyathānupapadya- mānaśca yathaivāvagatastathaivopapadyamāno yadarthāntaraṃ kalpayatītyarthaḥ ।।
“śruto vā” iti tahyanarthakamityāha—dṛṣṭa iti । śrutārthāpatterbhedenopā- dānaṃ pramāṇaviṣayatvenārthaviṣayāyā dṛṣṭārthāpattervailakṣaṇyapradarśanārtham । vakṣyati ca “savikalpakavijñānaiḥ” iti ।। bhavet. cau. mu.
tatra pratyakṣato jñātād dāhād dahanaśaktatā ।
vahneranumitāt sūrye yānāt tacchaktiyogyatā ।। 3 ।।
śrutārthāpattiratraiva parastādabhidhāsyate ।
gavayopamitāyā gostajjñānagrāhyatā matā ।। 4 ।।
“pramāṇaṣaṭkavijñāto'rthaḥ” ityuktam, tatra pratyakṣapūrvikāṃ tāvadudāha- rati tatreti vahnerityantena ।
ita ārabhya “gṛhābhāvastu yaḥ śuddhaḥ” ( ślo. 21) iti pratī- kārambhaparyantaṃ samūlatātparyaṭīkāyāmasyāṃ granthapātaḥ; ataḥ kāśikayā pūryate ।
anumānapūrvikāmarthāpattimudāharati—anumitāditi । deśāntara- prāptyā sūrye yānamanumīyate ; tato'rthāpattyā tacchaktiḥ । atrāpi pramāṇāntara- virodha evānupapattiḥ । gamanaṃ hi prāṇināṃ viśiṣṭapādādisādhanakamavagatam । ayaṃ tu anumitatadvidharmasādhano'pi tathaiva gantumarhatīti vitarkaḥ । so'yaṃ śaktikalpanayā nivāryate—asti nāma sā kācidasya śaktiḥ, yayā gantra- ntaravidharmasādhano'pi pātanipātayoḥ samamupasarpatīti ।।
śrutārthāpattistu bhinnaviṣayā dṛṣṭārthāpattibhyo vivicya paścādevābhi- dhāsyata ityāha—śrutetyardhena ।।
upamānapūrvikāṃ darśayati—gavayetyardhena । ‘gavayasadṛśo gauḥ’ ityu- pamite sadṛśajñānagrāhyaśaktirgorarthāpattyā kalpyate । īdṛśī ca tatrānupapatti- rbhavati—kathaṃ gavi susadṛśajñānaṃ jāyate ? yadi hi janayet prathamadarśana eva kiṃ na janayet ? santi hi tadāpi gavi gavayāvayavasāmānyāni । tadevaṃ jātamapi gavyupamānamanupapattyāvasīdati; tacchaktikalpanayopapadyate । asti nāma ko'pi goratiśayaḥ, yaḥ pratiyogidarśanapratilabdhābhivyaktirgavayasadṛśīṃ dhiṃyamupajanayati ; yaccedaṃ samāne paśutve gaureva gavayasadṛśa ityupamīyate, tadapi tasya śaktiviśeṣābhyupagamād vinā nopapadyata iti । jñānāt. cau. mu. upamitā yā gauḥ cau. mu, mā.
abhidhānaprasidhyarthamarthāpattyāvabodhitāt ।
śabde bodhakasāmarthyāt tannityatvaprakalpanam ।। 5 ।।
abhidhā nānyathā sidhyediti vācakaśaktatām ।
arthāpattyāvagamyaivaṃ tadananyagateḥ punaḥ ।। 6 ।।
arthāpattyantareṇaiva śabdanityatvaniścayaḥ ।
darśanasya parārthatvādityasminnabhidhāsyate ।। 7 ।।
pramāṇābhāvanirṇītacaitrābhāvaviśeṣitāt ।
gehāccaitrabahirbhāvasiddhiryā tviha darśitā ।। 8 ।।
tāmabhāvotthitāmanyāmarthāpattimudāharat ।
arthāpattipūrvikāmudāharati—abhidhāneti । śabdānantaramarthapratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya tatkāraṇatvamavasīyate । na ca vyāpāramantareṇa kāraṇatvamupapadyata iti śabdasamavāyī vyāpāro'numīyate । sa cābhidheti prasiddham । tatsidhyarthaṃ ca śabde vācakasāmarthyaparthāpattyā pramīyate । abhidhāyakatve hyanumite bhavatyanu papattiḥ—nāyamabhidhāyakaḥ prāgiva । sambandhajñānāt gṛhītasambandhaḥ pratyāyaka iti cenna, tadabhāvāt । na hyasyārthena saṃyogādīnāmanyatamaḥ sambandho dṛśyate ; tadasyāmanupapattau śaktikalpanopapādikā bhavati । asti khalvanayorvācya- vācakaśaktirūpaḥ sambandhaḥ, yadagrahaṇānnārtho'vagamyata iti । evaṃ ca śakti- kalpanottarakālaṃ śakterapi nityatvamantareṇānupapatterarthāpattyantareṇa śabdasya nityatā pratīyata iti ।।
etadeva vivṛṇoti—abhidheti sārdhena ślokena । etacca svayaṃ jaimininaiva śabdādhikaraṇe'bhidhāsyata ityāha—darśanasyetyardhena ।।
abhāvapūrvikā tu bhāṣyakāreṇa svayamudāhṛteti na pṛthagudāhriyata ityāha—pramāṇābhāveti sārdhena । asyārthaḥ—“yathā jīvati devadatte gṛhābhāvadarśanena vahirbhāvasyādṛṣṭasya kalpanā” iti bhāṣye yā caitrasya bahi- rbhāvasiddhirdarśitā, tāmeva prakṛtā prakṛtābhyo'nyāmabhāvapūrvikāmarthāpattiṃ bhāṣyakāra udāhṛtavāniti ।
pakṣadoṣeṣu cānyāsāmudāharaṇavistaraḥ ।। 9 ।।
abhāvāvagatāccaitrād bahirbhāvasya sūcanam ।
pakṣadharmādyanaṅgatvāt bhinnaiṣāpyanumānataḥ ।। 10 ।।
bahirdeśaviśiṣṭe'rthe deśe vā tadviśeṣite ।
prameyo yo gṛhābhāvaḥ pakṣadharmastvasau katham ।। 11 ।।
tadabhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ tu gṛhaṃ dharmo na kasyacit ।
gṛhābhāvaviśiṣṭastu tadāsau na pratīyate ।। 12 ।।
prapañcastvarthāpattyudāharaṇānāṃ pakṣadoṣābhidhānāvasare “śrotrādināsti- tāyām” ityādinānumāne varṇita ityāha—pakṣadoṣeṣvityardhena ।।
idānīmarthāpatteranumānād bhede vaditavye bhāṣyoktatvādabhāvapūrvikāyā eva bhedaṃ tāvadāha—abhāveti । yeyamabhāvapramāṇena ‘gṛhe nāsti’ ityanena rūpeṇāvagatāccaitrād bahirbhāvasūcanātmikārthāpattiḥ, sāpi pakṣadharmādīnāmanaṅgatvāt śābdavadupamānavadanumānād bhidyata iti ।।
pakṣadharmādyanaṅgatvameva darśayati—bahirdeśeti । iha hi bahirdeśaviśiṣṭa- ścaitraḥ pakṣaḥ tadviśiṣṭo vā bahirdeśaḥ । na cobhayasyāpi gṛhagato'bhāvo dharma iti pakṣadharmatvaṃ katham ? na kathañcidityarthaḥ । nābhāvamātramaviśeṣiṃta caitrasya bahirbhāve liṅgam ; na cāsya gṛhaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati ; paratantraṃ hi viśeṣaṇam yathā nīlimotpaladravyasya । evamihāpi dravyabhūtaṃ gṛhameva tatparatantreṇābhāvena viśeṣyate iti yuktam । vyāpakatvāccābhāvo gṛhasya viśeṣaṇam ; śakyate hi tena caitrādhiṣṭhitaikadeśavyatiriktajagadvyāpinā gṛhaṃ vyāptum ; alpaṃ tu gṛhaṃ na mahāviṣayamabhāvaṃ vyāptuṃ śaknoti । ato yathā vyāpyasya dhūmasyāgniviśiṣṭatva- mavagamyate, anenāpi prakāreṇa gṛhamevābhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ bahirbhāvasya liṅgamityāpa- tati । tacca tadabhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ gṛhaṃ na kathañcit caitrabahirdeśābhyāṃ saṃbadhyate । abhāvasya tāvat kathañcidasti caitrānvayaḥ ; caitrābhāvaḥ—iti hi saṃpratīyate । gṛhaṃ tu na kathañciccaitrasambaddhamavagamyata ityapakṣadharma ityāha—tadabhāvetyardhena । itaśca gṛhābhāvo na pakṣadharma ityāha—gṛhābhāvetyardhena । gṛhīte hi pakṣe taddharmapratyayo bhavati ; na ca caitrabahirdeśau gṛhe'sattayāvagamyete iti ।।
gamyate tu gṛhaṃ tatra na ca caitraḥ pratīyate ।
na cātrādarśanaṃ heturyathābhāve'bhidhāsyate ।। 13 ।।
tena veśmanyadṛṣṭatvāditi heturna kalpyate ।
adarśanādabhāve ca prameyasyāvadhārite ।। 14 ।।
bahirbhāvamatirnāsau tenādarśanahetukā ।
caitrābhāvasya hetutvaṃ gehe'bhāvaśca saṃsthitaḥ ।। 15 ।।
pūrvaṃ na cāgṛhītasya dharmiṇaḥ syāt prameyatā ।
na cātra bāhyadeśo vā caitro vā gṛhyate purā ।। 16 ।।
nadīpūreṇa yā vṛṣṭirupariṣṭāt pratīyate ।
deśe kathamadṛṣṭe tu pakṣadharmatvasambhavaḥ ।। 17 ।।
gṛhameva tu tatra pratyakṣāvagatamiti taddharmapratītirevābhāve bhavatītyāha— gamyate tu gṛhamiti । na ca tatra gṛha eva caitro'numīyate, abhāvavirodhādi- tyabhiprāyeṇāha—tatra na ca caitraḥ pratīyata iti ।
ato gṛhe'darśanamaheturityāha—tenetyadhena । kiñca gṛhābhāvāvadhā- raṇopakṣīṇe'darśane bahirbhāvamatirbhavati ; kathamasau taddhetukā bhaviṣyatītyabhi- prāyeṇāha—adarśanāditi matiratvena । abhiprāyaṃ vivṛṇoti—nāsau tenādarśanahetuketi । adarśanāvadhāritasya caitrābhāvasyaivānyatrānupayuktasya hetutvaṃ saṃbhavati, taccāpakṣadharmatayā nirākṛtamityāha—caitrābhāvasyetyardhena ।।
evaṃ tāvat pakṣadharmatā nirākṛtā ; pakṣo'pyatrānumānāt pūrvaṃ nopalakṣyata ityāha—pūrvamiti ।।
atra codayati—nadīpūreṇeti । atra hyapratipanna evoparideśe pakṣe'taddharmaḥ pūro liṅgam, tadvadihāpi bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ ।।
vṛṣṭimatparadeśatvaṃ nadīpūravato'tra tu ।
deśasya pratipadyante yadvārthāpattireva sā ।। 18 ।।
jīvataśca gṛhābhāvaḥ pakṣadharmo'tra kalpyate ।
tatsaṃvittirbahirbhāvaṃ na cābudhvopajāyate ।। 19 ।।
agnimattānapekṣā tu dhūmavattā pratīyate ।
na tadgrahaṇavelāyāmagnyadhīnaṃ hi kiñcana ।। 20 ।।
gṛhābhāvastu yaḥ śuddho vidyamānatvavarjitaḥ ।
sa mṛteṣvapi dṛṣṭatvād bahirvṛtterna sādhakaḥ ।। 21 ।।
vidyamānatvasaṃsṛṣṭagṛhābhāvadhiyānayā ।
gehādutkālitaścaitro vidyate bahireva hi ।। 22 ।।
pariharati—vṛṣṭimaditi pratipadyante'ntena । evaṃ cānumīyamāne lokavirodhaḥ ; na hyevaṃ laukikā budhyante ; ata āha—yadvārthāpattireva seti । dṛṣṭasya pūrasya kāraṇābhāvānupapattyopariṣṭād vṛṣṭiḥ kalpyate । idamapi cānvārūḍhenoktam । paramārthena tu vyāptibalotthamidamanumānameva ; na cāpakṣadharmatā doṣaḥ, uparideśasya pūrasambaddhadeśasambandhāt ; asambaddho hi na heturbhaviṣyatīti ।।
itaśca gṛhābhāvo bahirbhāve na liṅgamityāha—jīvataśceti । niścita- rūpaṃ hi liṅgamanumāne gamakam ; iha ca yo jīvato gṛhābhāvaḥ, sa pramā- ṇāntarabirodhānniścetumeva na śakyate । evaṃ hi tatra bhavati vitarkaḥ—jīvatā hi kvacid bhavitavyam, kathamiha na syāt ? evaṃ cānadhyavasāyādapratiṣṭhito gṛhābhāvo'siddhatvādaliṅgam । siddhistu nānantarbhāvya bahirbhāvamasya bhavati ; tadantarbhāve ca parastāt prameyābhāva iti bhāvaḥ ।।
anumāne tvanapekṣitaprameyameva dhūmādiliṅgasya svarūpaṃ siddhamavagamyata ityāha— agnimatteti । yadi tvihāpi hetoranapekṣatvasidhyarthaṃ gṛhābhāvamātramaviśeṣitaṃ jīva- nena heturiṣyate, tato'naikāntika ityāha—gṛhābhāvastu yaḥ śuddha iti ।।
vidyamānatvasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ bahirvidyamānatāmavagamayatītyāha—vidyamānatvasaṃsṛṣṭeti ।। gehābhāvastu. cau. mu. saṃsṛṣṭamavidyamāna. mā.
gehābhāvatvamātraṃ tu yat svatantraṃ pratīyate ।
na tāvatā vahirbhāvaścaitrasyaivāvadhāryate ।। 23 ।।
siddhe sadbhāvavijñāne gehābhāvadhiyātra tu ।
gehādutkālitā sattā bahirevāvatiṣṭhate ।। 24 ।।
tenātra nirapekṣasya vyabhicāro mṛtādinā ।
yasya tvavyabhicāritvaṃ na tato'nyat pratīyate ।। 25 ।।
tasmāt pratyakṣato gehe caitrābhāve hyabhāvataḥ ।
jñāte yat sattvavijñānaṃ tadevedaṃ bahiḥsthitam ।। 26 ।।
pakṣadharmātmalābhāya bahirbhāvaḥ praveśitaḥ ।
tadviśiṣṭo'numeyaḥ syāt pakṣadharmānvayādibhiḥ ।। 27 ।।
pakṣadharmādivijñānaṃ bahiḥsaṃbodhato yadi ।
taiśca tadbodhato'vaśyamanyonyāśrayatā bhavet ।। 28 ।।
jīvanavadaparamapi gṛhābhāvasya caitratvaṃ caitrabahirbhāve prameye viśeṣaṇamiti darśayati—gehābhāvatvamātrantviti ślokadvayena ।।
jīvata eva caitrasyaivābhāvaścaitrasya bahirbhāvaṃ sādhayati, anyataraviśeṣaṇāpāye tu netyāha—tenātra nirapekṣasyetyardhena । na caitramātreṇa viśeṣitaṃ gamayati, mṛte'pi bhāvāt । nāpi jīvanamātreṇa, caitrabahirbhāvābhāve'pi devadattabahirbhāve sadbhāvādityarthaḥ । ubhayaviśeṣitasya tu gṛhābhāvasya bahirbhāvasādhakatvam, tasya copapattirbahirbhāvāvagatipūrviketi na tadavagatau tasya liṅgatvamityāha—yasya tvavyabhicāritvamityardhena ।।
upasaṃharati—tasmāditi dvayena । tasmād gṛhābhāvapratipatterbahirbhāvāva- gatipūrvakatvānna tatpratipattau tasya liṅgatvam ; anapekṣā tu dhūmavattā pratīyate, sambandhagrahaṇābhāve'pi tatpratīteriti vailakṣaṇyam ।।
evaṃ satyapi liṅgatvābhyupagame itaretarāśrayatvaṃ prāpnotītyāha—pakṣadharmādi- vijñānamiti ।। Omitted. nāpi. mā.
anyathānupapattau tu prameyānupraveśitā ।
tādrūpyeṇaiva vijñānānna doṣaḥ pratighātinaḥ ।। 29 ।।
avinābhāvitā cātra tadaiva parikalpyate ।
na prāgavadhṛtetyevaṃ satyapyeṣā na kāraṇam ।। 30 ।।
nanvarthāpatterapi bahirbhāve prameye pramāṇatvaṃ na prāpnoti, anupapadyamānaṃ hi bahirbhāvagrāhakajñānotpādakam ; kiṃ cātrānupapannam ? nanu jīvato gṛhābhāvaḥ । sa tarhi bahirbhāvasaṃvedanāt kiṃ pūrvaṃ pratipannaḥ, uta na ? na yadi pratipannaḥ, kiṃ nopa- padyate ? pratipannaścet kimidamucyate—“tatsaṃvittirbahirbhāvaṃ na cābudhvopajā- yate”—iti । api ca, bahirbhāvapratipattipūrvakatvādabhāvapratipatterbahirbhāve'nu- meye liṅgatvaṃ na yuktam, liṅgagrahaṇavelāyāmeva prameyasya dṛṣṭatvāditi, tadatrāpi samānam ; bahirbhāvapratipattipūrvakatvādanupapadyamānapratīteritaretarāśrayatvaṃ ca samānam— jīvato gṛhābhāvād bahirbhāvapratītiḥ tatpratīteścābhāvapratītirityāśaṅkyāha—anya- thānupapattau tviti । anumāna eva prameyānupraveśitvaṃ nāma dūṣaṇam ; tatra hyarthāntarapratītiḥ sambandhabalena ; nānupapattyā, agṛhītasambandhasya dhūmadarśane satyapi vahnipratīterabhāvāt । atra tu pramāṇadvayapratipannayorekādhikaraṇayorbhāvā- bhāvayoḥ saṃghaṭanārthameva bahirbhāvākhyaprameyānupraveśa iti na doṣaḥ । tadāha— tādrūpyeṇaiva vijñānāditi । avagataviśiṣṭagṛhābhāvopapādakatvenaiva bahirbhāvasya vijñānādityarthaḥ ।।
nanvatrāpi gṛhābhāvasya bahirbhāvena niyatatvādavinābhāvenaiva pratipatteranumāna- tvamevetyāśaṅkyāha—avinābhāvitā cātreti । satyapyatrāvinābhāvitve gṛhītā- vinābhāvasyaiva pratipādakatvena nānumānatvamityarthaḥ ।। anupapanne. mā. pratibhāti naḥ cau. mu. nāsti mātṛkāyāṃ mūlapāṭhaḥ । nyāyaratrākarādabhyūhito'yaṃ pāṭhaḥ—pratighātinaḥ iti । liṅgatvaṃ noktam. mā. tviti । prāyo'numāne. mā. katvenānumāna. mā.
gṛhābhāvabahirbhāvau na ca dṛṣṭau niyogataḥ ।
sāhitye tu pramāṇaṃ ca tayoranyanna vidyate ।। 31 ।।
anyathānupapattyaiva hyekenānyat pratīyate ।
tathā na kalpyate taccet sāhitya na pratīyate ।। 32 ।।
tena sambandhavelāyāṃ sambandhyanyataro dhruvam ।
arthāpattyāvagantavyaḥ paścādastvanumānatā ।। 33 ।।
gṛhadvāri sthito yastu bahirbhāvaṃ prakalpayet ।
yadaikasminnayaṃ deśe na tadānyatra vidyate ।। 34 ।।
tadāpyavidyamānatvaṃ na sarvatra pratīyate ।
yadi cārthāpatteḥ pramāṇāntaratvaṃ na syāt, tataḥ sambandhagrahaṇābhāvena gṛhābhāvasya bahirbhāve liṅgatvaṃ na syādityāha—gṛhābhāvetyādinā ślokatrayeṇa । avagate hi bahirbhāvākhye sambandhini gṛhābhāvasya tatra sambandhagrahaṇam । gṛhā- bhāvenaiva ca prathamaṃ sambandhagrahaṇanirapekṣeṇaiva bahirbhāvākhyaḥ sambandhī pratipādanīyaḥ । avagate tu prathamamarthāpattyā sambandhini sambandhagrahaṇottarakālaṃ bhavatvanumānamityarthaḥ ।।
nanu gṛhadvāri vyavasthitaḥ pratyakṣeṇāpi bahirbhāvaṃ pratipadya gṛhābhāvena sahāvinābhāvaṃ pratipadyata eva । kimucyate “tena sambandhaṃvelāyām” iti iti codayati—gṛhadvāri sthita iti ।।
tatraitasya codyasyodāharaṇāntaraparigraheṇa parihāramāha—tadāpyavidya- mānatvamityardhena । bhāṣyakārodāhṛte pratyakṣeṇāpi bahirbhāvamavagamya sambandhagraha- sambhavānmā bhūdarthāpattipūrvakatvam ; tadāpyagṛhītāvinābhāvasya vinā ca pakṣadharmatve- nopapadyamānatvānnānumānatvam । taduktam—“avinābhāvitā cātra”—iti, “pakṣadharmādyanaṅgatvāt” iti ca । yatra tu romaśāvyavasthitaṃ devadattamupalabhya tasminneva kāle tadanyathānupapattyaiva sarvatrābhāvamupalabhya romaśāvyavasthitena devadatta- bhāvenābhāvagrahaṇam, tatrārthāpattipūrvatvam । nanu caitrādhiṣṭhitavyatiriktasamīpadeśe astyanumānatā. cau. mu. mānatvādanumāna. mā. na tu. mā.
na caikadeśe nāstitvād vyāptirhetorbhaviṣyati ।। 35 ।।
nanvatrāvidyamānatvaṃ gamyate'nupalabdhitaḥ ।
sā cāpratyatnasādhyatvādekasthasyaiva sidhyati ।। 36 ।।
naitayānupalabdhyātra vastvabhāvaḥ pratīyate ।
taddeśāgamanāt sā hi dūrastheṣvasti satsvapi ।। 37 ।।
gatvā gatvā tu tān deśān yadyartho nopalabhyate ।
tato'nyakāraṇābhāvādasannityavagamyate ।। 38 ।।
nanu cāgnyādyabhāve'pi dhṛmādivyatirekiṇām ।
taddeśāgamanāt spaṣṭo vyatireko na sidhyati ।। 39 ।।
caitrasyābhāvamabhāvena pratipadyate abhāvenāvinābhāvagrahaṇāt ; kimucyate'rthāpattipūrva- katvamityāśaṅkyāha—na caikadeśe nāstitvādityardhena । caitrādhiṣṭhitavyati- riktānantadeśagato hyabhāvo bhāvasya sambandhinaḥ saṃnikṛṣṭavyatiriktagata eva ; tasya ca pramāṇāntareṇāvagamābhāvādarthāpattipūrvatvam । pañcamī ca tṛtīyārthe ।।
nanvanupalabdhirabhāvaliṅgam ; tenānumānenaikadeśavyavasthito'pi sarvatra caitrā- dhiṣṭhitavyatirikte deśe'bhāvaṃ pratipadyata eva । kimucyate'rthāpattipūrvatvamatreti iti codayati—nanvatrāvidyamānatvamiti ।।
tatra parihāramāha—naitayānupalabdhyā hītyādinā ślokadvayena । dṛśyānu- palabdhirabhāve liṅgam ; tvanupalabdhimātram, anaikāntikatvāt ।।
yadi hi dṛśyānupalabdhirabhāve liṅgam, na tarhi sarvatrānagnau dhūmābhāvaḥ pratīyate, dṛśyādarśanasyābhāvāditi sandigdho vyatireka iti codayati—nanu cāgnyādyabhāve'pīti । ye'pi dhūmādayo'gnyabhāve vyatirekiṇa iṣyante teṣāmapi vyatireko na sidhyati, anantānagnideśāgamanāditi ।। labdhyā hi. mā. liṅgakenānumānena. mā.
yasya vastvantarābhāvaḥ prameyastasya duṣyati ।
mama tvadṛṣṭamātreṇa gamakaḥ sahacāriṇaḥ ।। 40 ।।
nanvevamitaratrāpi sambandho'nupalabdhitaḥ ।
caitrābhāvasya bhāvena dṛṣṭatvādupapadyate ।। 41 ।।
sāhitye mitadeśatvād prasiddhe cāgnidhūmayoḥ ।
vyatirekasya cādṛṣṭergamakatvaṃ prakalpyate ।। 42 ।।
iha sāhityamevedamekasya sahabhāvinaḥ ।
anantadeśavartitvānna tāvadupapadyate ।। 43 ।।
tatra parihāramāha—yasya vastvantarābhāva iti । yasyānagnivyavacchedo gamyaḥ, tasyaiva tad dūṣaṇam ; tena hyanagnāvabhāvo grāhyaḥ ; na ca tat saṃbhavati, dṛśyānupalabdherabhāvāt । mīmāṃsakānāṃ tu darśanādarśanābhyāṃ niyamajñānamutpadyate । tatrānagnau darśanaṃ bādhakaḥ ; sa ca nāsti । āśaṅkāyāṃ tu parihāro datta eva “doṣajñāne tvanutpanne” iti ।।
nanvatrāpi kimarthāpattipūrvatvena romaśāyāṃ caitrasya sadbhāvaṃ pratyakṣeṇa prattipadya tadadhiṣṭhitadeśavyatiriktasamīpadeśe ca dṛśyānupalabdhyā caitrābhāvaṃ pratipadya caitra- saṃdbhāvasya tadadhiṣṭhitadeśavyatiriktasamīpadeśagatena caitrābhāvena sahacāritvamavagamya agnidhūmayorivottarakālaṃ caitradarśanādanyatrābhāvāvagatirlauṅgikī bhaviṣyatīti coda- yati—nanvevamiti ।।
tatra vailakṣaṇyamāha—sāhitye mitadeśatvāditi । yuktaṃ dhūmatvasyāgnitvena saha bhūyodarśanena sahacāritvagrahaṇam ; tayorubhayorapyekasmin pradeśe kṛtsnopalabdheḥ, vipakṣe ca darśanābhāvāt । vyatirekaśabdena vyabhicāramāha ।।
iha tu romaśāvyavasthitasyānantadeśasambandhī caitrābhāvaḥ prameyaḥ । na cāna- vagate tasmin romaśāvyavasthitasya caitrabhāvasya sahacāritvagrahaṇaṃ saṃbhavati । na ca tadanyathānupapattiṃ muktvā tatra kiṃcit pramāṇam । tatraitasminnudāharaṇe sambandha- velāyāṃ saṃbandhyanyataro dhruvamarthāpattyaiva gantavya ityāha—iha sāhityamevedamiti ।। tatraikasmin. mā.
nanu deśāntaraṃ śūnyaṃ caitreṇaivaṃ pratīyate ।
taddeśavyatigktitvāt samīpasthitadeśavat ।। 44 ।।
viruddhāvyabhicāritvaṃ tadvadeva hi gamyate ।
samīpadeśabhinnatvāccaitrādhiṣṭhitadeśavat ।। 45 ।।
puruṣasya tu kārtsnyena yadekatropalambhanam ।
tasyānyathā na siddhiḥ syādityanyeṣvasya nāstitā ।। 46 ।।
tenārthāpattipūrvatvamatra yatra ca kāraṇe ।
kāryādarśanataḥ śakterasthitvaṃ saṃpratīyate ।। 47 ।।
nanvarthāpattivyatiriktamanumānaṃ tadavagatāvastyeva pramāṇam ; kimucyate arthāpattyaivāvagantavya iti codayati—nanu deśāntaramiti । tadayaṃ prayogārthaḥ- vimatyadhikaraṇabhāvāpannadeśāntaraṃ caitraśūnyam, caitrādhiṣṭhitadeśavyatiriktatvāt, caitrādhiṣṭhita(deśa)samīpadeśavat iti ।।
tatra dūṣaṇamāha—viruddhāvyabhicāritvamiti । tatrāpyayaṃ prayogārthaḥ— tadeva deśāntaraṃ caitrayuktam, caitrādhiṣṭhitasamīpadeśavyatiriktatvāt, caitrādhiṣṭhitaṃ- deśavat iti ।।
nanvarthāpattyāpi kathaṃ deśāntare caitrābhāvāvagatiḥ, ubhayatrāpi jātivat sadbhāvopapatterityāśaṅkyāha—puruṣasyeti । ekasya sāvayavasya sakalāvayavagraha- ṇānyathānupapattiranyatrābhāve pramāṇamityarthaḥ ।।
upasaṃharati—tenārthāpattipūrvatvamatreti । idamaparamanumānaviviktamaryāpatte- rudāharaṇamāha—yatra ca kāraṇe iti tripādyā । agnisaparke sati śarīravikārā- tmakaṃ dāhamupalabhya tadanyathānupapattyāgnerdāhikā śaktirastīti yad vijñānaṃ sārthāpattiḥ ।। pattyaiva gantavyaḥ. mā.
kāryasya nanu liṅgatvaṃ na sambandhānapekṣaṇāt ।
dṛṣṭvā sambandhitāṃ caiṣā śaktirgamyeta nānyathā ।। 48 ।।
tadarśane tadānīṃ ca pratyakṣāderasambhavāt ।
arthāpatteḥ pramāṇatvaṃ trailakṣaṇyād vinā bhavet ।। 49 ।।
anumānādabhinnatvānnoktau jayaparājayau ।
vadhyaghātakabhāvena yau sarpanakulādiṣu ।। 50 ।।
pīno divā na bhuṅkte cetyevamādivacaḥśrutau ।
rātribhojanavijñānaṃ śrutārthāpattirucyate ।। 51 ।।
tāmarthaviṣayāṃ kecidapare śabdagocarām ।
kalpayantyāgamāccaināmabhinnāṃ pratijānate ।। 52 ।।
nanvidamapi kāraṇaśaktisadbhāve'numeyakāryaliṅgamanumānameveti codayati— kāryasya nanu liṅgatvamiti । tatra dūṣaṇamāha—na sambandhānapekṣaṇādityādinā nyūnapādena ślokadvayena । sambandhagrahaṇasāpekṣaṃ hi liṅgaṃ liṅginamavagamayati । sambandhigrahaṇapurassaraṃ ca sambandhagrahaṇam । na ca śaktyākhye sambandhini kāryā- nyethānupapattiṃ muktvā pratyakṣādi pramāṇamasti । nanu padārthasvarūpānantaraṃ kāryamupa- jāyamānaṃ tajjanyameva syāt ; kimatra parokṣātiśayakalpanayā ? tadanupapannam ; kvaci- dagnisaṃparke pratyabhijñāyāmapi kāryānutpādāt । śaktipakṣe'pyaviśiṣṭamiti cenna, kāryāvaseyasya yāvatkāryaṃ sadbhāvādityarthaḥ ।।
idānīṃ vṛttyantarodāhṛtaparityāgenodāharaṇāntarasya prayojanamāha—anu- mānādabhinnatvāditi ।।
“śrutārthāpattiratraiva parastādabhidhāsyate” ityuktam ; tāmāha—pīna iti ।।
nanu pramāṇagrāhiṇītvena pūrvamabhidhāyedānīṃ—“rātribhojanavijñānaṃ śrutā- rthāpattirucyate”—ityarthaviṣayatāṃ darśayati ; tadetat pūrvāparaviruddhamityāśaṅkyāha— tāmarthaviṣayāmiti ।। tāmarthagocarāṃ. cau. mu.
prāyaśaścānayā vede vyavahāro vyavasthitaḥ ।
so'vaidikaḥ prasajyeta yadyeṣā bhidyate tataḥ ।। 53 ।।
vacanasya śrutasyaiva so'pyarthaḥ kaiścidāśritaḥ ।
tadarthopaplutasyānyairiṣṭo vākyāntarasya tu ।। 54 ।।
na tāvacchrūyamāṇasya vacaso'rtho'yamiṣyate ।
na hyanekārthatā yuktā vākye vācakatā tathā ।। 55 ।।
padārthānvayarūpeṇa vākyārtho hi pratīyate ।
na rātryādipadārthaśca divāvākyena gamyate ।। 56 ।।
na divādipadārthānāṃ saṃsargo rātribhojanam ।
na bhedo yena tad vākyaṃ tasya syāt pratipādakam ।। 57 ।।
āgamāntarbhāvapratipādane teṣāṃ kiṃ prayojanamityāha—prāyaśaścānayā veda iti ।।
āgamavādino'pi kecichrutāgamaprameyatvameva rātribhojanasyāpi divābhojana- pratiṣedhavad varṇayanti । anye tu śrutāgamaprameyaparyavasthāpitasyāgamāntarasye- tyāha—vacanasya śrutasyaiveti ।।
tadevamanekadhā vipratipattau satyāṃ pramāṇāntaratvaṃ śabdagocaratvaṃ ca svatantra- prakriyānurodhena pratipādayitumāha—na tāvaditi । yadi śrūyamāṇasyaiva divā- bhojanapratiṣedhavaditaro'pyarthaḥ parikalpyate, tadānekaparatvaṃ śaktyantaraparikalpanaṃ ca prāpnoti ; na ca tadyuktam, anyathāpi rātribhojanapratīterityarthaḥ ।।
padārthānvayarūpeṇa hi pratīyamāno vākyārthaḥ śabdaśaktivikalpanāheturbhavati । na ca divāvākye rātryādipadārthānvayarūpeṇeti । evaṃ satyapi yadi vākyapadārthānāṃ bhedaḥ saṃsargo vā rātribhojanaṃ bhavet, tadā śrūyamāṇasyaiva divābhojanapratiṣedha- vadayamarthoṃ bhavet ; na tvetadastītyāha—padārtheti ślokadvayena ।। padārtheti sārdhena ślokadvayena na divādipadārthānāmiti. mā.
anyārthavyāpṛtatvācca na dvitīyārthakalpanā ।
tasmād vākyāntareṇāyaṃ buddhisthena pratīyate ।। 58 ।।
tasya cāgamikatve'pi yat tad vākyaṃ pratīyate ।
pramāṇaṃ tasya vaktavyaṃ pratyakṣādiṣu yad bhavet ।। 59 ।।
na tvanuccārite vākye pratyakṣaṃ tāvadiṣyate ।
nānumānaṃ na cedaṃ hi dṛṣṭaṃ tena saha kvacit ।। 60 ।।
yadi tvanupalabdhe'pi sambandhe liṅgateṣyate ।
taduccāraṇamātreṇa sarvavākyamitirbhavet ।। 61 ।।
na cārthāpattigamyāni sarvaiḥ sarvavacāṃsi hi ।
sambaddhānyupalabdhāni yena teṣvanumā bhavet ।। 62 ।।
na ca sattānumānena viśeṣo vānumīyate ।
tasmācchrūyamāṇavākyārthopaplutasya “rātrau bhuṅkte” ityasyaiva vākyasyā- yamarthaḥ ityāha—tasmādityardhena ।।
tasyānupaplutavākyaprameyatvenārthāpattiprameyatvaṃ mā bhūt ; tadvākyasadbhāva eva tu kiṃ pramāṇamityāha—tasya cāgamikatve'pīti ।।
na tāvat pratyakṣam, anuccaritatvāt । nānumānam, sambandhagrahaṇābhāvā- dityāha—na tvanuccārite vākya iti ।।
saṃbandhagrahaṇābhāvena tu liṅgatve vākyamātrasyānumeyatvamityāha—yadi tviti ।।
yadi liṅgādiparyupasthāpitāni vākyāni tādarthyāvagame pramāṇatveneṣyante, yathoktam—“viniyoktrī śrutistāvat sarveṣveteṣu saṃmatā” iti । teṣāmarthā- pattipramāṇaikasamadhigamyatvena sambandhagrahaṇāsambhavenānumeyatvaṃ na syādityāha—na cārthāpattigamyānīti ।।
api ca, vākyaviśeṣasyātra sattā pratīyate । na ca tayordvayorapyanumeyatvam, sattāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ bhāvābhāvobhayadharmasyāsiddhaviruddhānaikāntikatvena hetorabhāvāt sāmānyarūpatvācca liṅgaliṅginorityāha—na ceti ।। na hyanuccarite. cau. mu.
iha vākyaviśeṣasya sattaiva tvavagamyate ।। 63 ।।
pūrvasiddhaḥ-svatantro'rthaḥ svatantreṇa viśeṣitaḥ ।
dharmādharmaviśiṣṭo'tra nānumeyaḥ pratīyate ।। 64 ।।
atha śrutasya vākyasya mīyate tadviśiṣṭatā ।
tataḥ pakṣo'bhyupetaḥ syādaprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ ।। 65 ।।
kiṃca liṅgāntarābhāvādetasya yadi liṅgatā ।
pratijñārthaukadeśatvaṃ padavatte prasajyate ।। 66 ।।
tadvadeva nivāryātra vacaso dharmadharmitā ।
nāgṛhīte hi taddharmo gṛhīte nānumeyatā ।। 67 ।।
kriyākārakasambandhāt ṛte nāsti tu dharmatā ।
avācakatayā caitanna dharmo viṣayātmanā ।। 68 ।।
yādṛg liṅgasya viṣayastādṛśo'tra nāstītyāha—pūrvasiddhaḥ svatantra iti ।।
nāpi divāvākyasya rātriviśeṣasya aprasiddhatvenāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvāt pakṣa- tetyāha—atha śrutasya vākyasyeti ।।
liṅgāntarābhāvena ca pratijñārthaikadeśatāpi hetorityāha—kiñceti । yathā padasya padārthaviśiṣṭatayānumeyatve pratijñārthaikadeśatvam, evaṃ tatrāpītyarthaḥ ।।
padavadeva divāvākyarātrivākyayordharmadharmibhāvo nirākartavya ityāha— tadvadeva nivāryātreti । apratipanne rātrivākye dharmiṇi śrūyamāṇasya taddharmatayā grahaṇāsambhavāt pratipanne cānumeyābhāvādityarthaḥ ।।
padavadeva ca kriyākārakalakṣaṇasambandhābhāvena divāvākyasya rātrivākya- dharmatā nirākartavyetyāha—kriyākārakasambandhādityardhena । divāvākyasya rātri- vākyaṃ pratyavyāpakatvena viṣayaviṣayibhāvo'pi nāstītyāha—avācakatayā caitadityardhena ।। nirākāryā. cau. mu.
pratītervācakatvaṃ cet prasaktānekaśaktitā ।
anumāviṣayotthaṃ ced dharmatvaṃ niṣphalaṃ bhavet ।। 69 ।।
padārthairapi tad vākyaṃ nāsambandhāt pratīyate ।
sāmānyānyanyathāsiddherviśeṣaṃ gamayanti hi ।। 70 ।।
na tu vākyāntareṇaiṣāṃ vinā kiṃcinna sidhyati ।
na cāpyanyaḥ prakāro'sti tena vākyena saṅgatau ।। 71 ।।
athaitad vāci kalpyeta vākyamanyat tathaiva ca ।
prasaṅgāt tatra dūre'pi nāsambandhāt pramucyate ।। 72 ।।
atha divāvākyoccāraṇe sati rātrivākyapratīterastyeva vācakatvamiti codayati—pratītervācakatvaṃ cediti । tatra parihāramāha—prasaktānekaśakti- teti । pratipattyanyathānupapattyā śaktyantaraṃ tarhi kalpanīyam ; na ca tat kalpayituṃ śakyam, arthāpattyāpi tatpratīterityarthaḥ । atha laiṅgikīṃ pratipattimāśritya divā- vākyasya rātrivākyaviṣayatayā pakṣadharmatvam, tasyāpi pratipattyuttarakālatvena prati- pattāvanaṅgatvamityāha—anumāviṣayotthaṃ cedityardhena ।।
evaṃ tāvad divāvākyasya rātrivākyaṃ prati liṅgatvaṃ nāstītyuktam । adhunā tu divāvākyapadārthānāmapi sambandhagrahaṇābhāvena na tatpratipattau liṅgatva- mityāha—padārthairapi tadvākyamityardhena । nāpyanyathānupapattyā rātrivākyapratipattau teṣāṃ vyāpāraḥ sāmānyarūpatvāt padārthānāṃ vyaktimātreṇaiva vinānupapattiḥ, na rātri- vākyenetyāha—sāmānyānyanyathāsiddheriti ।।
na ca divāvākyapadārthānāmanyathānupapattiliṅgaṃ cāntareṇa rātrivākyaprati- pattau vyāpāra ityāha—na cāpyanya ityardhena ।।
evaṃ tāvanna rātrivākyasya pratyakṣatvaṃ nānumeyatvaṃ nāpi kalpyāgamaprameyatvam, kalpyasyāpi sambandhagrahaṇābhāvena tatpratipattau liṅgatvābhāvāt sambandhagrahaṇābhāvena ca pratipādakatve varaṃ śrūyamāṇasyaivārthāpattiparyupasthāpakatvena pramāṇatvam ; kimanye- netyāha—athaitadvāci kalpyeteti sārdhena ।। tu dharmatva. cau. mu.
tataśca prathamādeva varaṃ jñātumasaṅgatāt ।
anvayavyatirekau ca pratiṣedhyau pade yathā ।। 73 ।।
śrutavākyena sādṛśyaṃ nāśrutasyāsti kiñcana ।
tasmādanupamānatvamarthasyāpyanayā diśā ।। 74 ।।
upamānatvaliṅgena vākyaṃ prati nivārite ।
arthe'pi caivameva syāt tasmāt pūvaṣvasambhavaḥ ।। 75 ।।
ataḥ śrutasya vākyasya yadarthapratipādanam ।
tadātmalābha eva syād vinā netyetadiṣyate ।। 76 ।।
etadarthād vinā nāyamityarthaḥ kiṃ na kalpyate ।
evaṃ tāvad divāvākyasya rātrivākyaṃ prati pakṣadharmatvaṃ nāstītyuktam । adhunā tu padārthavadanvayavyatirekāvapi na sta ityāha—anvayavyatirekau cetyardhena ।।
nāpi divāvākyasya rātrivākyaṃ pratyupamānatvam, asādṛśyatvādityāha— śrutavākyena sādṛśyamiti ślokadvayena ।।
yathā ca divāvākyasya rātrivākyaṃ prati nopamānatvaṃ nāpi liṅgatvaṃ tathā tadarthasyāpi upamānatvaliṅgatve na sta ityāha—ataḥ śrutasyeti । pīnatve sati divābhojanapratiṣedhasyātmalābho rātrivākyaṃ vinā nopapadyata iti śrutārthāpatteḥ pramāṇaviṣayatvena dṛṣṭārthāpattervailakṣaṇyam ।।
atra codayati—etadarthādvinā nāyamityardhena । pīnasya divābhojana- pratiṣedho rātribhojanaṃ vinā nopapadyate, bhojanakāryatvāt pīnatvasya divāniṣedhena tasyaivānyatra sadbhāvaḥ pratīyate ; na rātrivākyasya । sa eva tvarthāpattyā pratipannasta- dbuddhau saṃnidhāpayati, nārthāpattipramitā vākyārthāvagatiḥ ; rātribhojanapratīteḥ pūrvaṃ rātrivākyapratipattau pramāṇābhāvāt । rātrivākyasyāpyetadupapādakārthapratipādakatvenaiva prameyatvam, na svarūpeṇa । na ca svatantre'pi kācit kṣatiḥ codanārthānyathānupa- pattyārthāntaramavagamyamānaṃ vināpi śabdakalpanayā codanālakṣaṇameva syāt kalpya- vākyavat liṅgādayaśca tādarthyāvagatau paryālocanayā viprakṛṣṭatvena śrutibādhyā
vākyārthavacca kiṃ nāyamāgamārthaḥ pratīyate ।। 77 ।।
savikalpakavijñānaiḥ śabdaḥ pūrvaṃ pratīyate ।
labdhaprayojane vākye paraṃ nāgamikaṃ ca naḥ ।। 78 ।।
nanu cāsati sambandhe sati vānavadhārite ।
gamyajñānamidaṃ vākyaṃ prasajyetāpramāṇakam ।। 79 ।।
bhaviṣyanti । taduktam—“rātribhojanavijñānam” iti । athavā divābhojana- pratiṣedhavadrātribhojanasadbhāvo'pi divāvākyasyaivārtho bhavatu, pramāṇāntaraparikalpanaṃ tu vṛtheti codanāntaramāha—vākyārthavacca kiṃ nāyamityardhena । taduktam—
“vacanasya śrutasyaiva so'pyarthaḥ kaiścidāśritaḥ” iti ।।
tatrādyasya tāvat parihāramāha—savikalpakavijñānairityardhena । śrutārthā- nyathānupapattyā hi savikalpakavijñānamutpadyate, tacca śabdānuvedhenārthaṃ viṣayīkaro- tīti prathamatarapratītatvena tasyaiva prameyatvam । tatpratipannāttu śabdādarthāvagatiriti । tadanupapannam—smaryamāṇasya hi śabdasya savikalpakajñānotpādakatvam ; na prameya- tvena । taduktam—“viviktā eva te'rthā hi” iti । api ca, dṛṣṭārthānya- thānupamattyāpi savikalpakameva vijñānamutpadyata iti śabdaprameyatvaprasaṅgaḥ pratyakṣā- diṣu ca । ayamāśayaḥ—pramāṇaikadeśaśravaṇānyathānupapattyā tadavayavasyaiva pari- kalpanā, nārthasya ; preryaviṣayapratipādakapadasahitasya hi prerakapratipādakasya bhāvanāyāḥ pramāṇatvam, nāvayavasya । tataḥ “śruto vā” iti ca pramāvayava- śravaṇamāha । śarīravikārātmakadāhagrāhakasya tu pratyakṣasya nāparipūrṇatā । tatprameyastvātmalābhasidhyarthaḥ śaktiṃ kalpayatītyarthaviṣayatā । codyāntaraparihāramāha —labdhaprayojane vākya ityardhena । divāvākyoccāraṇānantaraṃ divābhojanaprati- ṣedhapratipattyā labdhaprayojane divāvākye divābhojanapratiṣedhapratipattyuttarakālaṃ rātri- bhojanamavagamyamānaṃ śrutārthāpattiparyupasthāpitapramāṇāvayavasya pratipadyate, na śrūyamāṇā- gamasyetyarthaḥ ।।
nanu tādātmyatadutpattyavinābhāvādibhirasambaddhād divāvākyādrātrivākyā- vagatirbhavantī mithyā syāditi codayati—nanu cāsatīti
sambandhasya pramāṇatvaṃ sthitaṃ kiñceśvarājñayā ।
pratyakṣasya pramāṇatvaṃ kathaṃ vā saṅgatervinā ।। 80 ।।
astīndriyārthasambandhastatra cennānapekṣaṇāt ।
na hi pratyakṣavelāyāṃ sarveṇāsau nirūpyate ।। 81 ।।
yenāpi tu nirūpyeta paścādanubhavādasau ।
na syādeva pramāṇāṅgamasatā tulya eva saḥ ।। 82 ।।
aprāpyakāriṇī yeṣāṃ cakṣuḥśrotre ca te yathā ।
tajjñānasya pramāṇatvamicchantyevaṃ bhaviṣyati ।। 83 ।।
tatra parihāramāha—sambandhasya pramāṇatvamityardhena । yadyasambandhāda- pyarthāntarapratittirbādhakāpetā bhavati, kiṃ sambandhenetyarthaḥ । yathā cakṣurindriya- mavinābhāvādibhirvinaiva rūpapratipattiṃ pramāṇabhūtāṃ janayati, tadvadetadapītyāha— pratyakṣasya pramāṇatvamityardhena ।।
nanu cakṣurindriyamapi sambandhenaiva rūpapratipattiṃ janayati, tadabhāve tu rasaprati- pattimapi janayediti codayati—astīndriyārthasambandhastatra cediti । tatra parihāramāha—nānapekṣaṇaditi । yo hīndriyamapi sambandhabalenaiva pratipādaya- tīti manyate, sa dhūmavattatra sambandhagrahaṇamapekṣeta ; na tu cakṣurindriyaikasamadhigamye rūpe rūpaikasamadhigamyasya cakṣurindriyaptya sambandhagrahaṇamastītyarthaḥ । api ca yogya- tālakṣaṇena vā sambandhena cakṣurindriyaṃ rūpapratipattiṃ janayati, saṃyogena vā ? na tāvadyogyatayā, tatparāmarśābhāve'pi rūpapratipatterbhāvādityāha—na hītyardhena ।।
rūpapratipattilakṣaṇakāryapratipattyuttarakālaṃ ca yogyatāvagamyamānā kathaṃ tatpratiprattāvaṅgamityāha—yenāpi tviti ।।
nāpi saṃyogena, tadabhāvādityāha—aprāpyakāriṇīti । anenaitadapi pratyuktam—viṣayādipadārthapratipattyuttarakālamapetabādhakādipratyayaḥ tadanvayo'vagamya- pramāṇavaditi. mā. Omitte p. na. mā.
tasmādasattve sattve vā sambandhasya yadeva naḥ ।
jāyetābhaṅguraṃ jñānaṃ tasyaiva syāt pramāṇatā ।। 84 ।।
na cāpyasyāḥ pramāṇatve kaścid vipratipadyate ।
bhedābhede visaṃvādaḥ kṛtastatra ca nirṇayaḥ ।। 85 ।।
ṛte yatra tu sambandhād buddhireva na jāyate ।
tatra kiṃ kriyatāṃ so'pi prāmāṇye naiva kāraṇam ।। 86 ।।
smṛtyā śrutiryā parikalpyate'smin liṅgādibhiryā viniyojikā ca ।
mano'pekṣāsaṃnidhiyogyatvairabhidhānena padapratipāditārthanimittatayā ca codanālakṣa- ṇatvaṃ bhaviṣyati—iti ।।
upasaṃharati—tasmādasattve sattve veti ।।
na cātra pramāṇatāyāṃ vipratipattiḥ । yatra tu vipratipattistatra nirṇayaḥ kṛta evetyāha—na cāpyasyāḥ pramāṇatva iti ।।
nanu ca yadi vināpi sambandhenārthāntarapratiparttirbhavati, dhūmasyāpi tarhi kimavinābhāvena tadgrahaṇena cetyāśaṅkyāha—ṛte yatra tviti kriyatāmantena । yogyataivāgṛhītā svakāryaṃ karoti ; dhūmastvavinābhāve'gnimavagamayati, na yogyatayā ; sa ca pratīyamāno'vagatāvaṅgam, nānyatheti kiṃ kurmaḥ tasyāpi pratipattyutpādana evāṅgatvam ; utpannāyāstu bādhakāpetataiva prāmāṇyakāraṇamityāha—so'pi prāmāṇye naiva kāraṇamiti ।।
bhedapratipādanasya svatantropayogitāmāha—smṛtyā śrutirityādinā sārdha- ślokena ।। kṛte yatra ca. cau. mu. padapratipadārtha. mā. Omitted. iti. mā. cāpyasyām. mā.
phalādibhiryat paripūraṇaṃ ca sambandhadṛk tatra na kācidasti ।। 87 ।।
tat sarvamityādyasamañjasaṃ syā- nnacediyaṃ syādanumānato'nyā ।
evaṃsvabhāvāpyanumānaśabdaṃ labheta cedasti yathepsitaṃ naḥ ।। 88 ।।
ityatharpāttiprakaraṇam
evaṃ sāmagrībhedena pratyakṣavadanumānādarthāpatteḥ bhede sādhite yaḥ kaścit paścānmānasāmānyādanumānaśabdaṃ prayuṅkte, na ca kaścidvārayatītyāha—evaṃsva- bhāvāpīti ।। iti bhaṭṭombekaviracitāyāṃ tātparyaṭīkāyāṃ arthāpattiḥ samāptā paśvātmanā sāmānyā. mā. paścānmānāt iti ca pāṭhaḥ । cau. mu.
athābhāvavādaḥ ।
pramāṇapañcakaṃ yatra vasturūpe na jāyate ।
vastusattāvabodhārthaṃ tatrābhāvapramāṇatā ।। 1 ।।
vastvasaṅkarasiddhiśca tatprāmāṇyasamāśrayā ।
kṣīre dadhyādi yannāsti prāgabhāvaḥ sa ucyate ।। 2 ।।
athābhāvapramāṇam ।
“abhāvo'pi pramāṇābhāvaḥ” iti bhāṣyam । tasyāyamarthaḥ—abhāvo'pi na vyabhicarati, evaṃ lakṣaṇakatvāt iti । tatra bhūpradeśātirekeṇa ghaṭābhāvasyā- bhāvāt tatsadbhāve vā saṃnikṛṣṭasya pratyakṣāvaseyatvādubhayavipratipattinirāsāyāha— “nāstītyasyārthasyāsaṃnikṛṣṭasya” iti । tatra “nāstītyasyārthasya” ityanena bhāṣyakāro bhūpradeśātiriktasmaryamāṇaghaṭāvacchinnaṃ bhūpradeśādhikaraṇam—na tvākṣa- prameyam—abhāvaṃ darśayatītyāha vārtikakāraḥ—pramāṇapañcakamiti । yatra ghaṭākhye vastuni pratyakṣādi sadbhāvaṃ nopagrāhayate, tasya nāstitā bhūpradeśādhi- karaṇābhāvasya pramāṇasya prameyetyarthaḥ ।।
“asaṃnikṛṣṭasya” ityanenāpi bhāṣyakārastasya pratyakṣādyaviṣayatāṃ darśayatī- tyāha vārtikakāraḥ—vastvasaṅkarasiddhiścetyardhena । ghaṭaviviktatā hi bhūpradeśākhye dharmiṇi dharmo'bhāvaḥ । tatra dharmī pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate । taddharmastvabhāvapramāṇāva- seyaḥ । na ca ghaṭaviviktatā bhūpradeśādabhinnā, ghaṭasaṃnidhāne'pi “nāsti” iti vijñānaprasaṅgāt । na ca bhinnāpyakṣānumānāvaseyeti vakṣyāmaḥ—“jāyate'kṣāna- pekṣayā”—ityatra ca । tasmād ghaṭaviviktatā bhūpradeśasya tatpramāṇyasamāśrayā, na pratyakṣādiviṣayetyarthaḥ ।।
sāṃprataṃ tāmeva nāstitāmabhāvaprameyāṃ prāgabhāvādibhedena catuṣprakārāṃ darśa- yitumāha—kṣīre dadhyādītyādinā sārdhena ślokadvayena ।। riktāsmarya. mā. nopajagrāhakāyate. mā
nāstitā payaso dadhni pradhvaṃsābhāva iṣyate ।।
gavi yo'śvādyabhāvastu so'nyonyābhāva ucyate ।। 3 ।।
śiraso'vayavā nimnā vṛddhikāṭhinyavarjitāḥ ।
śaśaśrṛṅgādirūpeṇa so'tyantābhāva ucyate ।। 4 ।।
kṣīre dadhi bhavedevaṃ dadhni kṣīraṃ ghaṭe paṭaḥ ।
śaśe śrṛṅgaṃ pṛthivyādau caitanyaṃ mūrtirātmani ।। 5 ।।
apsu gandho rasaścāgnau vāyau rūpeṇa tau saha ।
vyomni saṃsparśitā te ca na cedasya pramāṇatā ।। 6 ।।
na ca syādvyavahāro'yaṃ kāraṇādivibhāgataḥ ।
prāgabhāvādibhedena nābhāvo bhidyate yadi ।। 7 ।।
na cāvastuna ete syurbhedāstenāsya vastutā ।
kāryādīnāmabhāvaḥ ko bhāvo yaḥ kāraṇādinaḥ ।। 8 ।।
abhāvapramāṇābhāve tu pūrvoktasya viparyayamāha—kṣīre dadhi bhavedityā- dinā ślokadvayena ।।
idānīmabhāvaprakāropavarṇanasyopayogitāmāha—na ca syāditi । yasya yatra prāgabhāvastasya tatkāryatvam । yasya yatra pradhvaṃsastatra tasya kāraṇatvam ।।
aparamapi bhedapratipādanasyopayogāntaramāha—na cāvastuna ityardhena । tadanena bhidyamānatvena pramāṇopapāditaṃ svalakṣaṇavadabhāvasya vastutvamiti । tenedamapi parihṛtaṃ bhavati—kathamabhāvasyāvastutvena prameyatvam iti । itaścābhāvasya vastutva- mityāha—kāryādīnāmityardhena । kāraṇasvarūpameva kāryasyābhāvaḥ । tasya ca vastutvamiṣṭameva । tadidamanupapannam ; ghaṭaviviktatāṃ bhūpradeśādhikaraṇāṃ vastva- saṅkaraśabdenābhāvamabhidhāyedānīm—“bhāvo yaḥ kāraṇādinaḥ”—ityanena bhāva- mevābhāvaṃ vadatīti pūrvāparaviruddham, bhāvasyābhāvatve pratyakṣāvaseyatvenābhāvapramāṇo- cchedaḥ । tasmāt kāryābhāvasya vastutvasiddhaye kāraṇadharmatāṃ darśayatīti vyākhyeyam ।। yo'māvaḥ. cau. mu. pramāṇadārūpāditaṃ bhidyamānatvena. mā.
yadvānuvṛttivyāvṛttibuddhigrāhyo yatastvayam ।
tasmād gavādivad vastu prameyatvācca gamyate ।। 9 ।।
na caupacārikatvaṃ vā bhrāntirvāpi yadṛcchayā ।
bhavatyato na sāmānyaviśeṣātmakatā mṛṣā ।। 10 ।।
pratyakṣāderanutpattiḥ pramāṇābhāva ucyate ।
sātmano'pariṇāmo vā vijñānaṃ vānyavastuni ।। 11 ।।
vastutvasiddhāveva prayogadvayamāha—yadveti । caturvidhasyāpi vastutvabhāva- syānuvṛttibuddhigrāhyatvena prameyatvena ca gavādivaditi ।।
na caitasya pratyayadvayasya mithyātvam, bādhakapratyayābhāvādityāha—na caupa- cārikatvamiti ।।
evaṃ tāvat prameyapratipādakaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā—“abhāvo'pi pramāṇābhāvaḥ” iti pramāṇapratipādakaṃ bhāṣye vyācaṣṭe । tatra “abhāvo'pi” iti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ, “pramāṇābhāvaḥ” iti lakṣaṇam । tadanupapannamiva śaṅkate । sarva- pramāṇābhāvo'bhāvasya lakṣaṇaṃ syāt, tadvyatiriktetarapramāṇābhāvo vā ? na tāvat sarvapramāṇābhāvasya lakṣaṇatvam, asambhavāt ; na hyabhāvākhye pramāṇābhāvākhyasya vyāpakatvāt । pratyakṣe'pi tadvyatiriktetarapramāṇābhāvasya sambhavāt । nāpyanenā- bhāvasyābhāvameva pratipādayati, “abhāvo'pi pramāṇābhāvo nāstītyasyārthasyāsaṃni- kṛṣṭasya” iti prameyanirdeśāt । “syādetadevaṃ yadi pañcaiva pramāṇānyabhaviṣyan”- ityādibhāṣyavirodhāccetyāśaṅkyāha—pratyakṣāderanutpattirityardhena । pratyakṣāderarthā- pattiparyantasya yathāviṣayamanutpattirabhāvasya pramāṇasya lakṣaṇamityarthaḥ । tāmeva pratyakṣādyanutpattiṃ vivṛṇoti—sātmano'pariṇāmo veti । uttarapadārthapratiṣedha- mātraviṣayā sātmanaḥ apariṇāmo vetyāha । ghaṭajñātṛrūpatayā pariṇatasyātmano ghaṭasadbhāvaḥ prameyaḥ । tathā apariṇatasya tadabhāva ityarthaḥ । uttarapadārthaparyudasta- vastvantaravivakṣāyāṃ—vijñānaṃ vānyavastunītyāha । bhūpradeśe ghaṭavyatirikta- sātmanaḥ pari. cau. mu. pariṇāmo. mā.
svarūpapararūpābhyāṃ nityaṃ sadasadātmake ।
vastuni jñāyate kaiścid rūpaṃ kiṃcit kadācana ।। 12 ।।
yasya yatra yadodbhūtirjighṛkṣā vopajāyate ।
cetyate'nubhavastasya tena ca vyapadiśyate ।। 13 ।।
vastuni ghaṭaviviktatākhye ‘iha deśe ghaṭo nāsti’ iti yad vijñānaṃ tadabhāvasaṃjñakaṃ pramāṇamityarthaḥ । ayamāśayaḥ—iha pradeśe dṛśyādarśanaṃ cāsti ; tadanantaram ‘ghaṭo nāsti’ iti jñānaṃ cotpadyate । tatra ghaṭābhāve prameye dṛśyādarśanameva kadācit pramā- ṇatvena vivakṣyate, tadā sātmano'pariṇāmo veti pakṣaḥ । atha tadanantaraṃ ‘nāsti’ iti jñānaṃ yat, tat pramāṇatvena vivakṣyate bodhakatvena bādhakapratyayābhāvena ca tadā—vijñānaṃ vānyavastani iti pakṣaḥ । nanu ghaṭādarśanavyatirekeṇa tadviparyayāva- gaterabhāvāt kasyābhāvaḥ prameyaḥ ? kathaṃ cocyate—‘vijñānaṃ vānyavastuni’ iti ? ghaṭāsadvyavahāro'pi ghaṭāpratipattinimittaka eva, na punastadviparyayāvagatinimittakaḥ । tadanupapannam, dṛśyādarśanānantaramabhāvasaṃvedanasyotpatteḥ, tadabhāve vā ghaṭārthinastatra nivṛttirna syāt । ghaṭādarśanasyāpi tadviparyayāvagatikāraṇatvenaiva ghaṭāsadvyavahāraka- tvam, nākiñcitkaratvena ; anyathā punarandhakāre'pi ghaṭādarśanād ghaṭāsadvyavahāraḥ syāt । dṛśyaviśeṣaṇasyāpyabhāvāvagatikārakatvenaivādarśanaṃ pratyarthavattā ।।

nanu bhavatu dṛśyādarśanādanantaram “iha pradeśe ghaṭo nāsti”—iti vijñānam । bhūpradeśa eva tu tasyālambanam । ghaṭābhāvo'pi sa eva, bhūpradeśa vyatirekeṇānyasyāpratibhāsāt । taduktam—“ghaṭaviviktabhūtalopalambha eva ghaṭānu- palambhaḥ ; ghaṭaviviktaśca bhūpradeśo ghaṭābhāvaḥ” itītyāśaṅkyāha—svarūpapararūpā- bhyāmiti ślokadvayena ।।

atha ya evamāha—ghaṭo nāsti—iti vijñānasyotpadyamānasya bhūpradeśa evālambanam iti, asau vikalpya praṣṭavyaḥ—pradeśamātrasya vālambanatvaṃ syāt, ghaṭaviviktatāviśiṣṭasya vā ? na tāvat pradeśamātrasya, ghaṭasaṃnidhāne'pi ‘nāsti’ iti vijñānaprasaṅgāt । nāpi ghaṭaviviktatāviśiṣṭasya ; ghaṭaviviktatā hi bhūprade- śād bhinnā vā syādabhinnā vā ? tatrābhinnatve ghaṭasaṃnidhāne'pi ‘nāsti’ iti

LG.l: ayameveti yo hyeṣa bhāve bhavati nirṇayaḥ ।

LG.p: vijñānaprasaṅgaḥ ; bhinnā cet, siddham tarhi prameyāntaratvamabhāvasya । tatrāsadaṃśodbhave sa prādhānyena cetyate ; yatastasyānubhava utpanna iti ; sadaṃśastu cetyamāno'pi asadaṃśopakāre vartate । evamitaragrahaṇe'pītarasyopakārakatvamityāha—tasyopa- kāratveneti ।।

kathaṃ punarabhāvasya bhāvapratipattāvupakārakatvam ? yato ghaṭābhāvaparāmarśaṃ vināpi pradeśasadbhāvaḥ pratīyata evetyāśaṅkyāha—ayameveti । sāvadhāraṇe hi bhāvagrahaṇe'bhāvagrahaṇasyopakārakatvam, na bhāvagrahaṇamātra ityarthaḥ ।।

sarvaṃ hyabhāvagrahaṇaṃ bhāvadvayopaṣṭambhaṃ vinā netyāha—nāstītyapīti । tatra sadeśaḥ pratyakṣādibhirarthāpattiparyantaiḥ pratīyate । abhāvāṃśe tu tadanutpatteḥ ‘nāsti’ iti jñānasya cāvyāpāraḥ । saṃnikṛṣṭāgrahaṇaṃ ca vaktavyam ।।
asaṃnikṛṣṭe tvarthāpattyādayo'pi pravartanta evetyāha—pratyakṣādyavatāra- stviti ।।

nanu bhavatu ghaṭābhāve prameye ‘nāsti’ iti jñānaṃ pramāṇam ; indriyārtha- saṃnikarṣeṇa tūtpadyamānaṃ pratyakṣamevedam । tathā hi—indriyārthasaṃnikarṣotpannatā pratyakṣa- lakṣaṇam । sa ca saṃnikarṣaḥ ṣoḍhā bhidyate-saṃyogād dravyagrahaṇam, saṃyuktasamavāyād guṇagrahaṇam, saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyād guṇatvagrahaṇam, samavāyāt śabdagrahaṇam, ṣaḍviśaślokamānaṃ samagramasti, anyeṣāṃ pratīkamātram. mā.
na tāvadindriyeṇaiṣā nāstītyutpadyate matiḥ ।
bhāvāṃśenaiva saṃyogo yogyatvādindriyasya hi ।। 18 ।।
nanu bhāvādabhinnatvāt saṃprayogo'sti tena ca ।
na hyanyantamabhedo'sti rūpādivadihāpi naḥ ।। 19 ।।
dharmayobhede iṣṭo hi dharmyabhede'pi naḥ sthite ।
udbhavābhibhavātmatvād grahaṇaṃ cāvatiṣṭhate ।। 20 ।।
idameva nimittaṃ ca vivekasya pratīyate ।
bhāvābhāvadhiyorakṣaiḥ sambandho'kṣānapekṣaṇam ।। 21 ।।
rūpāderapi bhedaṃ ca kecid grāhakabhedataḥ ।
varṇayanti yathaikasya puṃsaḥ putrādirūpatām ।। 22 ।।
samavetasamavāyācchabdatvagrahaṇam, saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatvādabhāvagrahaṇam ; yathā phalavatī śākhetyāśaṅkyāha—na tāvadindriyeṇeti ।। na saṃyogastāvadindriyasyābhāvena saha, adravyatvāt । nāpi saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatvamabhāvasya, bhāvābhāvayorbhavatpakṣe sambandhā- bhāvenāviśeṣaṇatvāt । na tāvadabhāvasya bhāvena saha saṃyogaḥ, adravyatvāt । nāpi samavāyaḥ ; guṇādicatuṣṭayasya dravyeṇa samavāyaḥ ; na cābhāvasya tatra pāṭhaḥ । saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatvena ca ghaṭābhāvasyākṣagrahaṇe rasādayo'pi cakṣuṣā gṛhyeran । athāyogyatvādagrahaṇam, yogyataiva kā tarhi kāryānumeyā grahaṇakāraṇamiti saṃnikarṣaṣaṭprakāratvamayuktam ।।
nanu bhāvādabhinnatvenābhāvasya kenāpi saha yogyatā nāstīti codayati— nanu bhāvādityardhena । tatra parihāramāha—na hyatyantamabhedo'stītyādinā sārdha- ślokena । abhinne'pi bhūpradeśākhye dharmiṇi rūparasādivadeva sadaṃśāsadaṃśayorbhedo'- styevetyarthaḥ ।।
rūparasādivadeva ca grāhakabhedastadbhedakāraṇamityāha—idamevetyādinā ślokadvayena ।। na tāvadindriyaireṣā. cau. mu. ślokadvayena idamevetyādinā ślokadvayena. mā.
buddhimātrakṛto bhedo rūpādau nityameva hi ।
na ca deśādyabhinnānāṃ samudāyāvakalpanā ।। 23 ।।
sadguṇadravyarūpeṇa rūpāderekateṣyate ।
svarūpāpekṣayā caiṣāṃ parasparavibhinnatā ।। 24 ।।
yadi tadvadapekṣātra na syād bhedo'tra naiva hi ।
sadasadrūpatā buddherbhavedanyataratra naḥ ।। 25 ।।
satsambandhe sadityevaṃ sadrūpatvaṃ pratīyate ।
nāstyatredamitīdaṃ tu tadasaṃyogahetukam ।। 26 ।।
athāpi rūparasādīnāṃ buddhibhedādbhedaḥ, tathāpi sadaṃśāsadaṃśayoḥ sadasad- buddhibhedādastyeva bheda ityāha—buddhimātretyardhena । nanu dharmātirekeṇa dharmiṇo'nu- palambhanāt kathaṃ dharmayorbhedaḥ ? iṣṭo hi dharmabhedo no dharmyabhede'pyavasthite’— ityuktam । ekadeśāvacchinnarūpādisamudāyamātrālambanaikārthapratyayavat pradeśapratyaya ityāśaṅkyāha—na ca deśādyabhinnānāmityardhena । taduktam—
“āvirbhāvatirobhāvadharmakeṣvanuyāyi yat ।
taddharmi yatra vā jñānaṃ prāgdharmagrahaṇād bhavet ।।”
tasmād yathaiva rūpādīnāṃ sadrūpatayā guṇarūpatayā ekadharmidharmatayā vābhedaḥ, svarūpā- pekṣayā tu bhedaḥ, tathaiva ca sadaṃśāsadaṃśayorapītyāha—sadguṇadravyarūpeṇeti ।।
athaivaṃ nābhyupagamyeta tadā sadaṃśāsadaṃśayorbhedapratibhāso na syādityāha— yadi tadvadapekṣātreti ।।
“bhāvāṃśenaiva sambandho yogyatvāt”—iti yadupakrāntam, tadupasaṃharati —satsambandha iti ।।
nanu viṣphārite cakṣuṣi pradeśasaṃjñānaṃ cotpadyate nāstīti jñānaṃ ca—iha pradeśe ghaṭo nāsti—iti, nimīlite ca cakṣuṣyubhayorabhāvaḥ । tatra samāne tadbhāvabhāvitve kathaṃ pradeśajñānamakṣajam, ‘nāsti’ iti tu jñānaṃ tadasaṃyogahetu- tatsambandhe sadityevaṃ tadrapatvaṃ. cau. mu. samudāyamātrālambana evārthaḥ pratyayavat. mā. cādyete. mā.
gṛhītvā vastusadbhāvaṃ smṛtvā ca pratiyoginam ।
mānasaṃ nāstitājñānaṃ jāyate'kṣānapekṣaṇāt ।। 27 ।।
svarūpamātraṃ dṛṣṭvāpi paścāt kiñcit smarannapi ।
tatrānyanāstitāṃ pṛṣṭastadaiva pratipadyate ।। 28 ।।
kamityāśaṅkyābhyupagamya tadbhāvabhāvitvamanyathāsiddhatāṃ darśayitumāha—gṛhītvā vastusadbhāvamiti । bhūpradeśagrahaṇasāpekṣatvādabhāvagrahaṇasya tasya cākṣajanyatvena tadbhāvabhāvitvamanyathāsiddham abhāvajñānasya । tadyathā—viṣphārite cakṣuṣi dūra- vyavasthite'gnau rūpajñānaṃ cotpadyate sparśajñānaṃ ca । tatra rūpajñānamevākṣajamiṣyate sparśajñānaṃ tvekārthasamavāyino rūpādānumānikamiṣyate । tadbhāvabhāvitvaṃ cānyathā- siddham, evamihāpīti ślokasyārthaḥ ।।
apare tvanyathā varṇayanti—viṣphārite cakṣuṣi pradeśagrahaṇaghaṭasmaraṇottara- kālam ‘ghaṭo nāsti’ iti jñānamakṣavyāpārasya vijñānadvayavyavahitatvena nākṣajaṃ syāt iti । taduktam—gṛhītveti । tadayuktam ; savikalpakasyāpratyakṣaprasaṅgāt tadapi gṛhītvā nirvikalpakena smṛtvā ca pūrvagṛhītamarthaṃ śabdaṃ ca—sa evāyam ityupajāyamānaṃ nākṣajaṃ syāt—“tatra śabdārthasambandhaṃ pramātuḥ smarato'pi ca” ityādi, “na cāpi smaraṇāt paścādindriyasya pravartanam” ityādi ca pūrvāpara- viruddhaṃ syāt । tasmāt tadbhāvabhāvitvamanyathāsiddhamanena darśayatītyevameva vyā- khyeyam ।।
idānīṃ tadbhāvabhāvitvameva nāstītyāha—svarūpamātramiti । kañcit pradeśaṃ svarūpeṇa dṛṣṭvā punaḥ kālāntare pradeśāntaragatasya—āsīttatra devadattaḥ ? ityanyena pṛṣṭasya pradeśaṃ smṛtvā—nāsīttatra devadattaḥ iti jñānamutpadyamānamatītā- bhāvagrāhakatvena kathamakṣajaṃ syādityarthaḥ ।।
