tadanupapannamiti kecit—devadattaviviktasya vā pradeśasyāvagatirāsīt, tatsahitasya vā ? ubhayathāpyuttarakālamanyena pṛṣṭasya pradeśavat pratipannatayā devadatta- tadabhāvayoḥ smaraṇam, nāpūrvāvagatiḥ । kiñcedam “svarūpamātraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ca” iti ? yadi tāvat bhūpradeśasya pratipattiḥ, devadattasya tatra na pratipattiḥ, nāpyapratipattirāsīt ; na hi savikalpakasya. mā.
na cāpyasyānumānatvaṃ liṅgābhāvāt pratīyate ।
bhāvāṃśo nanu liṅgaṃ syāt tadānīṃ nājighṛkṣaṇāt ।। 29 ।।
abhāvāvagaterjanma bhāvāṃśe hyajighṛkṣite ।
tasmin pratīyamāne tu nābhāve jāyate matiḥ ।। 30 ।।
na caiṣa tasya dharmatvaṃ padavat pratipadyate ।
saha sarvairabhāvaiśca bhāvo naikāntato gataḥ ।। 31 ।।
tata uttarakālaṃ devadattāṃśe sandehaḥ । atha sāvadhāraṇabhūpradeśagrahaṇam, tadanyābhāve saṃvittipūrvakameva । taduktam “ayameve” iti । tata uttarakālaṃ bhūpradeśavat devadattābhāve'pi smaraṇam । tasmādevaṃ vyākhyeyam—bhūpradeśapratipattivelāyāṃ devadattaviṣayaṃ dṛśyādarśanamāsīt । na ca tadā ‘nāsti’ iti vijñānamutpannam, ajighṛkṣitatvena sahakārikāraṇābhāvena ca । idānīṃ tvanyena pṛṣṭasya pradeśadevadatta- viṣayadṛśyādarśanaṃ ca smṛtvā—nāsīttatra devadattaḥ iti jñānamupajāyamānamanavagati- viṣayatvena pramāṇamanakṣajaṃ syādityarthaḥ ।।

evaṃ pramāṇaprameyayoḥ svarūpamupavarṇya pratyakṣācca bhedaṃ pratipādya idānīmanu- mānabhedamabhāvasya darśayitumāha—na cāpyasyānumānatvamityardhena । trirūpaliṅgajaṃ vijñānamanumānam । na cātra tadastīti tatra codayati—bhāvāṃśo nanu liṅgaṃ syāditi । tadvikalpya dūṣayati । bhūpradeśākhye dharmiṇa ghaṭābhāve'numeye ghaṭabhāvasya vā liṅgatvaṃ syāt, bhūpradeśasya vā ? na tāvaddhaṭasyetyāha—tadānīṃ nājighṛkṣaṇā- diti sapādena ślokena । ghaṭābhāvapratipattivelāyāmapratīyamānasya ghaṭasya kathaṃ liṅgatvam ? tatpratipattivelāyāṃ ca tadabhāvapratipattirnāstītyarthaḥ ।।

nāpi bhūpradeśasyaiva liṅgatvam, ghaṭābhāve'numeye bhūpradeśasya padavat taddharmatayā grahaṇābhāvādityāha—na caiṣa tasya dharmatvamityardhena । anenābhāvapratipattau ca liṅgatvābhyupagame sambandhagrahaṇābhāvena pratipattirna syādityāha—saha sarvairi- tyardhena ।।

LG.l: kvacid bhāve'pi sadbhāvo jñāto yasya kadācana ।
tadānīṃ na hi liṅgena sambandhigrahaṇaṃ bhavet ।

LG.p: itaśca ghaṭābhāve'numeye bhūpradeśasya liṅgatvaṃ nāsti, ghaṭabhāve'pi bhāvādi- tyāha—kvaciditi ।।
yatrāpi yasyābhāvo na kadācit pratipannaḥ, punastatraiva tadabhāvaḥ pratīyate, tatra sambandhagrahaṇābhāvena tadavagatau kathaṃ liṅgatvamityāha—yatrāpīti ।।
nāpi kasyacit saha sambandhagrahaṇenānyaliṅgatvam, atiprasaṅgādityāha— kasyacidyadi bhāvasyeti ।।
nāpi bhūpradeśapratipatteḥ ghaṭābhāvapratipattiṃ prati liṅgatvam, tadabhāve'pi bhāvādityāha—gṛhīte'pi ca bhāvāṃśa iti ।।

liṅgaikasamadhigamye ca ghaṭābhāve pramāṇāntarādavagatasya sambandhagrahaṇābhāve- nānumeyatvaṃ na syāt । pramāṇāntaragrahaṇapakṣe'pyabhāvasya pramāṇāntaratvaprasaṅga ityāha—sambandhe gṛhyamāṇa ityādinā ślokadvayena ।।

LG.l: sa cānyena grahītavyo nāgṛhīte hi liṅgatā ।
kvāpyasya syāt pramāṇatvaṃ liṅgatvena vinā dhruvam ।। 42 ।।

LG.p: nanu mā bhūddhaṭābhāve'numeye ghaṭasya bhūpradeśasya vā liṅgatvam ; pratyakṣādyanu- tpatterbhaviṣyatīti codayati—pratyakṣāderanutpattirityardhena । tadvikalpya nirā- karoti—na viśeṣaṇetyādinā sārdhena ślokena । ghaṭābhāve'numeye pratyakṣānutpatti- mātrasya liṅgatvaṃ syāt, ghaṭaviṣayāyā eva vā ? na tāvat pratyakṣādyanutpattimātrasya, ghaṭābhāve'pi bhāvāt, abhāvasya cāpratīterityarthaḥ । yathā tu ghaṭābhāve'numeye ghaṭaviṣayāyāḥ pratyakṣādyanutpatterliṅgatvaṃ nāsti tathopariṣṭādvakṣyāmaḥ—
“pramāṇānāmanutpatterna cābhāvasya dharmatā”—ityatra ।।

avagataṃ ca liṅgamanumeyāvagatau karaṇam ; pratyakṣādyanutpattyātmakaṃ ca liṅgama- bhāvātmakatvāt pratyakṣātmakenaiva liṅgena grahītavyam ; tasyāpyevameva grahaṇe'navasthe- tyāha—na ceti ślokadvayena ।।
evaṃ liṅgāgrahaṇe'navasthāmabhidhāyedānīṃ liṅgyagrahaṇe'pi sambandhigrahaṇakāle tathaivetyāha—liṅgyabhāve tathaiveti ityantena ।।

tasmādanavasthāparihārārthamante'pi pratyakṣādyanutpatterumayābhāvaṃ prati sambandha- grahaṇanirapekṣāyā eva pramāṇatvaṃ vaktavyam । ataśca siddhaṃ pramāṇāntaratvamityāha— ataḥ । kvāpyasyeti saikapadenārdhena ।।

LG.l: bhāvātmakasya mānatvaṃ na ca rājājñayā sthitam ।

LG.p: evaṃ tāvat paryudāsavṛtyā “nāsti” iti jñānaṃ pramāṇamāśritya bahirbhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ । yadā tu prasajyapratiṣedhābhiprāyeṇa ghaṭābhāve prameye dṛśyādarśanameva pramāṇam, “nāsti” iti jñānaṃ phalam ; tadānumānagandho'pi nāstītyāha— nāstīti dhīriti । kasmādityāha—trilakṣaṇena yā buddhiriti । trirūpaliṅga- janyaṃ vijñānamanumānam । na ca prāgabhāvasya janyatvam, nāpi vijñānarūpatva- mityarthaḥ ।।
kathamavastunaḥ pramāṇatvamiti codayati—mānaṃ kathamabhāvaścediti । tatra parihāramāha—prameyaṃ cātra kīdṛśamiti । tadeva vivṛṇoti—meyo yadvabhāvo hītyardhena ।।
tatra yathaiva bhāvātmake prameye ghaṭādāvabhāvasya prāmāṇyaṃ nāsti, tathaivābhāva- rūpe'pi prameye bhāvātmakayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayoḥ prāmāṇyaṃ nāstītyāha—bhāvātmake yatheti ।।
yad bhāvātmakasyāpyanumānādeḥ paricchedaphalatvena pramāṇatvam, tadabhāva- syāpyabhāvaparicchedakatvena samānamityāha—bhāvātmakasya mānatvamiti ।।
LG.fn: ito'smin prakaraṇe mūlaślokaḥ na samagrā dṛśyante mātṛkāyām.

LG.l: tathā sati ca pūrvokto vyavahāro na sidhyati ।। 49 ।।
yo na saṃnihitastatra tasya dharmo bhavediyam ।

LG.p: yadyavastutvenābhāvasya pramāṇatvaṃ neṣyate, liṅgatvamapi tarhi na prāpnotī- tyāha—yadi ceti sārdhena ślokena । janakaviśeṣasya liṅgatvam, avastunaḥ kathaṃ janakatvamityabhiprāyaḥ ।।
pramāṇāntaratvavadanumānatvamapi mā bhūditi cedityāśaṅkyāha—tathā sati cetyardhena ।।

yadi vābhāvapramāṇābhāvena—“vastvasaṅkarasiddhiśca tatprāmāṇyasamāśrayā” iti yaduktaṃ tadasadityarthaḥ । “pramāṇānāmanutpatteḥ”—ityādestu ślokacatuṣṭa- yasyāpakṛṣya vyākhyānaṃ kartavyam । yatredamuktam—“pratyakṣāderanutpattirliṅgaṃ tanna bhaviṣyati ।” iti, tatra ghaṭābhāve'numeye pratyakṣānutpattimātrasya vyabhicāreṇa liṅgatvaṃ nāstītyuktam—“na viśeṣaṇasambandhastasyāḥ”—ityādinā । sāṃprata- midamucyate—nāpi ghaṭaviṣayā pratyakṣānutpattirliṅgam apakṣadharmatvāt । na tāvat ghaṭābhāve'numeye taddharmatvam, ghaṭaviṣayā tadviparyayadharmatvaṃ kathaṃ pratipadyata ityāha— pramāṇānāmityardhena । ata eva na saṃnihitabhūpradeśadharmatvamityāha—yatrā- bhāvo'sti tenāsyā ityardhena ।।
tatrāsaṃnihitaghaṭasya dharmo bhavediyam । tasya tu dharmadharmirahitatvenānumeyatvaṃ na bhavatītyāha—yo na saṃnihita iti ।।

LG.l: tajjñānād viṣayatvaṃ ca jñāne meyaṃ na vidyate ।। 52 ।।
karmāṇi sarvāṇi phalaiḥ samastaiḥ sarvauryathāvacca yadaṅgakāṇḍaiḥ ।
LG.p: nanu viṣayaviṣayibhāvalakṣaṇena sambandhena ghaṭaviṣayāpi pratyakṣānutpattirabhāvatāṃ pratipadyata ityāśaṅkyāha—abhāvena tviti । ghaṭābhāvapratipattyuttarakālaṃ pratya- kṣānutpatterviṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ pratīyamāno na pramitāvaṅgamityarthaḥ ।।

nāpi saṃyogasamavāyādinā sambandhena ghaṭaviṣayāyāḥ pratyakṣānutpatterghaṭābhāva- dharmatvam, tadabhāvādityāha saṃyogetyardhena । avagate ca ghaṭābhāve pratyakṣānutpattesta- ddharmatayā grahaṇam ; tathā sati ca pakṣadharmagrahaṇottarakālamanumeyābhāva ityāha— nāgṛhīta ityardhena ।।

evaṃ pratyakṣāderabhāvasya bhedamabhidhāyedānīṃ tatraiva pramāṇamāha—abhāva- śabdavācyatvāditi । pramāṇābhāvo dharmī, pratyakṣāderbhidyata iti sādhyo dharmaḥ, abhāvaśabdavācyatvāditi hetuḥ, prameyābhāvavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।

tatraiva pramāṇāntaramāha—abhāvo veti । prameyābhāvo dharmī, svānurūpeṇa pramāṇena mīyata iti sādhyo dharmaḥ, prameyatvāditi hetuḥ, bhāvākhyaprameyavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ । tathā ca siddhaṃ bhāvātmakāt pratyakṣāderabhāvasyānyatvamityarthaḥ ।।
idānīmabhāvapratipādanasya svatantropayogitāmāha—karmāṇi sarvāṇīti । taduktam—“vastvasaṅkarasiddhiśca” iti ।।
LG.l: na saṅgatānīha parasparaṃ ca nāṅgaṃ tadetatprabhavaṃ kratūnām ।। 56 ।।
ato'dhikaṃ yad dvayamiṣṭamanyai- rbhedo na tasyetyapi siddhametat ।। 57 ।।
iha bhavati śatādau sambhavādyā sahastrā- nmatiraviyutabhāvāt sānumānādabhinnā ।
jagati bahu na tatthaṃ nityamaitihyamuktaṃ bhavati tu yadi satyaṃ nāgamād bhidyate tat ।। 58 ।।

LG.p: evaṃ pratyakṣāderabhāvaparyantasya vyabhicāranivṛttyarthaṃ lakṣaṇamuktamupasaṃharati— yuktyāgamābhyāmiti । sahasradarśanena śatasadbhāvātmakasyānubhavasyāvinābhāvenānu- mānāntarbhāvāt ‘iha vaṭe yakṣaḥ prativasati’—ityevamātmakasya caitihyasyāpramāṇa- tvāt pramāṇatve vā āgama evāntarbhāvānna pṛthaglakṣaṇaṃ kṛtamityāha— ato'dhikamiti ।।
LG.head: atha citrākṣepaḥ
LG.p: “animittaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvāt” iti sūtrāvayavaṃ pratyakṣasūtrādapacchidya vṛttikāreṇa pratijñātacodanāprāmāṇyākṣepaparaṃ vyākhyātam—“pratyakṣādīnyanyāni bhavantu nāma pramāṇāni ; śabdastu na pramāṇam, animittaṃ apramāṇaṃ śabdaḥ, vidya- mānopalambhanatvāt” ityādinā । tasya—“nanvatha”-ityādinā saha paunaruktya- māśaṅkya vārtikakāraḥ parihāradvayamāha—paralokaphalā iti । paralokaphalānāma- gnihotrādivākyānāṃ tatrākṣepaḥ ; aihikaphalānāṃ tu citrādivākyānāmatreti । athavā pūrvoktameva sarvaviṣayamākṣepaṃ sūtrārūḍhaṃ karotīti ślokārthaḥ । tadanupapannam ; “nanvatathābhūtamapi” ityatra lokāyatikamatena parataḥprāmāṇyābhyupagamena.... .... “codanā naiva pramāṇam” iti svataḥprāmāṇyapratijñākṣepaḥ ; atra tu anantaraṃ phalā- nupalabdhyā pratyakṣavirodhena ca pratijñārthasyākṣepaḥ ; tatra kā punaruktatā ? yacceda- muktam—paralokaphalānāṃ tatrākṣepaḥ, atra tvaihikaphalānām—iti ; tadapyayuktam ; parataḥ prāmāṇyenārthāsaṃsparśitayā vā tatrākṣepaḥ, sa caihikaphalānāmapyaviśiṣṭaḥ । atra “yadā tāvadasau vidyamānāsīt tadā phalaṃ na dattavatī, asatī kathaṃ dāsyati” ityevam ; sa paralokaphalānāmapyaviśiṣṭaḥ । api ca, atraihikaphalānāmākṣepe'bhyupa- gamyamāne—“evaṃ dṛṣṭāpacārasya svargādyapi phalaṃ nāsti iti manyāmahe” iti virudhyeta । yadapi “sūtrakāreṇa vocyate” ityuktam, tadapyākṣepaikye sati ghaṭate, nānyatheti । tasmānna paunaruktyāśaṅkyā parihāradvayamanupapannam । api ca, dhātvartha- karmatve nirākṛte vidhibalena bhāvanākarmatve sādhite apūrvadvāreṇa ca kālāntarabhāvi- tve'vasthite guṇavādena ca dṛṣṭavirodhaparihāre datte ko'yamākṣepa iti na vidmaḥ । alamativistareṇa ; prakṛtameva ākṣepavibhāgaṃ mukhyaṃ vastvanusarāmaḥ ।।

LG.l: na vā paśuphalā citrā svakāle tadadānataḥ ।

LG.p: idānīm—“animittaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvāt” ityanenākṣiptaṃ prayoga- māha—citrāpaśuphalatvādīti ślokadvayena । codaneti dharmī, mṛṣātvaṃ sādhyo dharmaḥ, citrāpaśuphalatvādītyādi dharmiviśeṣaṇam, pratyakṣādigocarapratipādakasya tairevāsaṅgateriti hetuḥ, vipralipsuvākyavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।

prayogāntaramāha—na veti tripādyā । citreti dharminirdeśaḥ, paśuphalā na bhavatīti sādhyo dharmaḥ, citrotpattāvanantarādarśanāditi hetuḥ, snānabhujyādiva- diti dṛṣṭāntaḥ । prayogāntaramāha—te'pīti tripādyā । paśavo dharmiṇaḥ, citrāsādhyā na bhavantīti sādhyo dharmaḥ, citrotpattāvadarśanāditi hetuḥ, svargatṛpti- sukhādivaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ । sukhaśabdaḥ pratyekamabhisaṃbadhyate । “na vā paśuphalā citrā”—ityatra prayoge mardanaṃ vaidharmyeṇa prayoktavyam ; “te'pi tatsādhyā na bhavanti vā” ityatra mardanasukhamityāha—vaidharmyeṇetyardhena । tasmādanantaraṃ phalānu- palabdhyā sādhyasādhanabhāvābhāvena vidhiviṣayabādhaḥ ।।
nanu vidhiḥ sādhyasādhanasambandhe pramāṇam ; tena ca kurvatyevoktā ; ataḥ ko'yamanantaraphalānupalabdhyā vidhiviṣayabādha iti codayati—ānantaryamanuktaṃ
cediti । tatra parihāramāha—neti tripādyā । kālāntare nimittābhāvena phalānu- tpādāt sāmarthyādānantaryamākṣiptamityarthaḥ ।।
idānīṃ bhāvārthasvabhāvaparyālocanayānantaryaṃ pratīyata ityāha—kālānta- rānupādānāditi । taduktam—“karmakāle ca karmaphalena bhavitavyam, yatkāle hi mardanam, tatkāle mardanasukham” iti ।।

idamaparamākṣepabhāṣyam—“dṛṣṭaviruddhamapi bhavati kiñcidvaidikaṃ vacanam” iti । tatra pūrvottarayorviṣayabhedamāha—atra tāvaditi । citrāvākye pratyakṣagrahaṇa- yogyasyāgrahaṇaṃ bādhaḥ ; itaratra tu svargagamanaviruddhabhasmopalabdhau pratyakṣavirodhaḥ ।।

etameva pratyakṣavirodhaṃ trailakṣaṇyenopanibadhnāti-yajñāyudhivaca iti । vacanaṃ dharmi, yajñāyudhīti dharmiviśeṣaṇam, mithyeti sādhyo dharmaḥ, pratyakṣaviruddhārthapratipāda- katvāditi hetuḥ, śilāvākyaṃ sādharmyeṇa āptavākyaṃ ca vaidharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntau ।।

athātmano gamanamayamāha, śarīragamanaviruddhasya ca pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇādavirodhaḥ tatrāha—śarīrānyābhidhāyinyāmiti । yajāyudhiśabdena śarīramucyate ; nātmā, uttarasya. cau. mu. śarīrādyadi cānyaḥ syāt. cau. mu. yuktāyudhāḥ. mā. durlabhaḥ. cau. mu. itaratra tu gamana. mā. śilāvākyaṃ sādharmyeṇa ca vaidharmyeṇa; omitted dṛṣṭāntau in. mā.
yadi syād vidhiśabdo'tra naivādarśanato bhavet ।
viśeṣo'syeti bhedena no cādadyādidaṃ tataḥ ।। 11 ।।
vidhiśabde bhaviṣyattvaṃ phalasya parikalpya hi ।
varodhaparihāraḥ syād vartamāne tu nāstyasau ।। 12 ।।
phalaṃ tu na bhavedevaṃ bhasmībhāvād vidhāvapi ।
tatsāmānyena yānyāpi kalpanā tāṃ niṣedhati ।। 13 ।।
yajamānaśravaṇāt gamanaśravaṇācca, śarīrasya hi yajñāyudhasambandhaḥ śrūyate, nātmanaḥ । tasyaiva cāsarvagatatvena gamanayogyatā ; yāgayogyaśca yajamānaśabdapravṛttau nimittam ; varṇatrayasya ca yāge'dhikāraḥ, śarīrasya ca varṇatrayavibhāgaḥ, nātmanaḥ ; tadgamana- viruddhopalambhaśca pratyakṣeṇa ; ātmanastu sadbhāvo'pi tāvat pratipādanīya iti ।।
“na caiṣa yāti iti vidhiśabdaḥ”-iti bhāṣyaṃ citrādivākyād yajñāyudhi- vākyasya bhedopanyāse prayojanaṃ darśayati । dvyācaṣṭa—yadi syāditi ।।
yadi ‘yāyāt’ iti śrūyeta, tataḥ kālatrayānyatamasasṛṣṭānupādānena citrā- divākyaphalavadasyāpi svargagamanasya kālāntarabhāvitvaṃ parikalpya virodhaparihāreṇa rkutrāpyadarśanameva syāditi ; “yāti” iti tu vartamānatāvacchinnasya gamana- syopādānaṃ tadviruddhabhasmagrahaṇena citrādivākyavailakṣaṇyāt bhedopanyāsaḥ ।
etadeva vivṛṇoti—vidhiśabde bhaviṣyattvamiti ।।
nanu vidhāvapi śarīravināśāt kālāntare'pi katha gamanasya phalatvam ? satyametat ; vidhiphalatvena tu jyotiṣṭomādivākyasāmānyato'dṛṣṭakalpanāpyatra nāstītyāha—phalantviti ।। nopāttaṃ syāt. cau. mu. api. cau. mu. ca. cau. mu. tatsāmarthyena yā cānyā. cau. mu. yatrāpyadarśanameva. mā.
prāyaścaivaṃprakāratvamarthavādeṣu dṛśyate ।
mantreṣu ceti te sarve pakṣīkāryāḥ prayatnataḥ ।। 14 ।।
evaṃ satyagnihotrādivākyeṣvapi mṛpārthatā ।
vedavākyaikadeśatvāccitrādivacaneṣviva ।। 15 ।।
svapakṣasādhanaṃ tāvadamṛṣā vaidikaṃ vacaḥ ।
nanu “dhūma evāgnerdivā dadṛśe” ityādāvapi pratyakṣaviruddhahetusadbhāvādanai- kāntikatvamāśaṅkyāha—prāyaśceti ।।
“tatsāmānyādagnihotrādicodanāsvapi nāśvāsaḥ” iti bhāṣyam । asyārthaṃ prayogārūḍhaṃ karoti—evaṃ satīti । agnihotrādivākyaṃ dharmi, mṛṣātvaṃ sādhyo dharmaḥ, vedaikadeśatvāditi hetuḥ citrādivākyavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।
“tasmānna codanālakṣaṇo dharmaḥ” ityupasaṃhṛte satyautpattikasūtrāvayavaṃ vṛtti- kāraḥ siddhānte yojayitumāha—“autpattikastu śabdasyārthena sambandhastasya jñānam iti । tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati । apauruṣeyaḥ śabdasyārthena sambandhaḥ, tasya jñānaṃ yathā codanālakṣaṇaḥ samyakpratyayaḥ”—ityādinā । tatra vārtikakāraḥ “atha yat uktamanimittaṃ śabdaḥ, karmakāle phalādarśanāt kālāntare ca karmābhāvāt pramāṇaṃ nāstīti taducyate ; na syāt pramāṇam, yadi pañcaiva pramāṇānyabhaviṣyan ; yena yena pramīyate tattat pramāṇam ; śabdenāpi pramīyate, tat śabdo'pi pramāṇaṃ yathaiva pratyakṣam । na ca pramāṇenāvagataṃ pramāṇāntareṇa nāvagatamityetāvatānavagataṃ bhavati । na caivaṃ śrūyate—“kṛte karmaṇi tāvatyeva phalaṃ bhavati”—iti, anena “yattu pratyakṣaviruddhaṃ vacanam “sa eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamānaḥ” iti śārīrakaṃ vyapa- diśatītyucyate śarīrasambandhādyasya taccharīraṃ so'pi tairyajñāyudhairyajñāyudhī” ityanena ca saha paunaruktyamāśaṅkyāha—svapakṣasādhanaṃ tāvaditi । “autpattikastu ṣvapi. cau. mu. atra. cau. mu. granthe citrākṣepaḥ samāptaḥ । saṃbandhākṣepaḥ prārabhyate iti vibhāgaḥ kṛtaḥ । tāvanna mṛṣā. cau. mu. asau puruṣeya. mā. śabdo'pi Omitted. mā.
svārthe vaktranapekṣatvāt padātha padabuddhivat ।। 16 ।।
tatkṛtaḥ pratyayaḥ samyaṅ nityavākyodbhavatvataḥ ।
vākyābuddhivadevātra pūrvoktāścāpi hetavaḥ ।। 17 ।।
nityāñcachabdārthasambandhānāśrityoktena hetunā ।
svataḥpramāṇyasidhyarthamaprāmāṇye nirākṛte ।। 18 ।।
asambandhodbhavatvena puro mithyātvamabravīt ।
sambandho'sti ca nityaścetyuktamautpattikādinā ।। 19 ।।
śabdasyārthena sambandhaḥ tasya jñānam”—ityanena tāvat svapakṣasiddhau pramāṇa- muktam । atha yaduktam—“yattu pratyakṣaviruddham”—ityanena pratyakṣānupalabdhi- pratyakṣavirodhākhyaṃ dūṣaṇadvayam, tat parihariṣyati । sāṃpratamautpattikastvityanenaiva sūcitaṃ prayogamāha—amṛṣeti tripādyā । vaidikaṃ vacanaṃ dharmi, amṛṣeti sādhyo dharmaḥ, svātha vaktranapekṣatvāditi hetuḥ, padārthe padabuddhivaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।
prayogāntaramāha—tatkṛta ityādikena buddhi vadevetyantena । pratyayo dharmī vaidikavacanakṛta iti pratyakṣādinirāsena dharmiṇaṃ viśinaṣṭi siddhasādhyatāparihārārtham, samyagiti sādhyo dharmaḥ, nityavākyodbhavatvata iti hetuḥ, vākyālambanabuddhivaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ । tatkṛtaḥ pratyayaḥ samyak ityatra ca sādhye pūrvoktā api hetavaḥ— “doṣavarjitaiḥ karaṇairjanyamānatvāt”—ityādayo vaktavyā ityāha—atra pūrvo- ktāścāpi hetava iti ।।
evaṃ sthite pūrvapakṣabhāṣyam—“syādetat ; naiva śabdasyārthena sambandho'sti, kuto'sya pauruṣeyatāpauruṣeyatā vā”—ityādi । tasya tātparyaṃ vyācaṣṭe— nityāniti sādharślokena ।।
śabdārthayornityasambandhābhyupagamena svārthe vaktranapekṣatvāt—ityanena hetunā- prāmāṇyanivṛttidvāreṇa svataḥprāmāṇye sādhite siddhāntavādinā, pūrvapakṣavādī śabdā- padārthapada. cau. mu. na. mā. Omitted. tat. mā.
mithyātvasya nirāsārthaṃ tatparairneṣyate dvayam ।
naiva cāstyatra sambandhaḥ kṛtako veti vakṣyate ।। 20 ।।
asambhavena śeṣāṇāṃ saṃśleṣaḥ pariśiṣyate ।
tasminneva ca sambandhe pratītirlaukikī dhruvā ।। 21 ।।
tanniṣedhamataḥ prāha na śabdo'rthena saṅgataḥ ।
taddeśānantarādṛṣṭervindhyo himavatā yathā ।। 22 ।।
evamartho dvayaṃ vāpi sādhanīyamasaṅgatam ।
rthayoḥ sambandhābhāvena mithyātvamāha—“syādetat naiva”—ityādinā । etadeva vivṛṇoti—sambandha iti । śabdārthayoḥ sambandho'sti, sa ca nityaḥ—ityukte “autpattikastu” ityādinā sūtreṇa paraḥ sambandhābhāvaṃ samayaṃ ca pratipādayatī- tyarthaḥ । tatrānantareṇa—“syādetat naiva” ityādinā sambandhābhāvaṃ pratipādayati ; “yadi prathamaśruto na pratyāyayati, kṛtakastarhi śabdārthayoḥ sambandhaḥ” ityādinā ca vyavahitenābhyupagamya sambandhakṛtakatvaṃ pratipādayiṣyatītyāha—naiva ceti ।।
“atha syāt kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭanapūraṇe syātām”— ityanena saṃyogalakṣaṇasambandhaṃ nirākaroti ; na cāsau mīmāṃsakenābhyupagata itya- sambaddhatvamityāśaṅkyāha—asambhaveneti sapādena ślokena । prathamaśrutādarthapratyayā- bhāvena svābhāvikasambandhābhāvācchabdārthayośca nityatvena kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇasambandhā- bhāvād bhinnayostādātmyābhāvena sambandho'bhyupagamyamānaḥ pariśeṣyāt saṃyoga evāvatiṣṭhate ; tatraiva ca laukikānāṃ sambandhaprasiddhiḥ । atastasyaiva niṣedhamāha “kṣura” ityādinetyarthaḥ । etadeva prayogārūḍhaṃ karoti—na śabdo'rtheneti tripādyā । śabdo dharmī, arthena na saṃyujyata iti sādhyo dharmaḥ, arthadeśānantara- madarśanāditi hetuḥ, vindhyo himavatā yatheti dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।
tābhyāmeva hetudṛṣṭāntābhyāṃ pratijñādvayena prayogadvayamāha—evamartho dvayaṃ vāpīti । arthasya śabdena saha sambandho nāsti, śabdadeśānantaramadarśanāt । asminneva.
kṣuretyādi ca sidhyarthaṃ hetoruktamathāparaḥ ।। 23 ।।
śaktirūpaṃ gṛhītvāha saṃśloṣo yadi vāryate ।
sambandhāsiddhasādhyatvamatha sambandhamātrakam ।। 24 ।।
pitāputrādisambandhairanaikāntaḥ prasajyate ।
ekabhūmyādisambandhād dṛṣṭānte sādhyahīnatā ।। 25 ।।
vācyavācakasambanadhaniṣedhe lokabādhanam ।
dvayorvā parasparasaṃyogo nāsti, parasparadeśānantaramadarśanāt iti ubhayatrāpi “vindhyo himavatā yathā”—iti dṛṣṭāntaśca । “kṣura”—ityādinā taddeśāna- ntaramadarśanāt—ityaptya hetoḥ siddhatāmāhetyāha—kṣuretyādi ca sidhyarthaṃ hetoruktamiti । śabdārthayorekatra sadbhāvena mukhe evārthasyāpi sadbhāvāt modaka- śabdoccāraṇe sati arthasaṃbandhino mukhasya pūraṇaṃ syādityuktaṃ bhāṣye । evamavasthite siddhāntabhāṣyam—“ucyacate—yo'tra vyapadeśyaḥ, tamekaṃ na vyapadiśati bhavān pratyāyyasya pratyāyakasya ca saṃjñāsaṃjñilakṣaṇasambandham”—iti । tasya vārtika- kārastātparyamāha—athāparaḥ śaktirupaṃ gṛhītvāheti । vācyavācakaśaktidvayābhi- prāyeṇāha vṛttikāraḥ pratyāyyasya pratyāyakasya ca saṃjñāsaṃjñilakṣaṇasambandhamiti । idānīṃ pūrvapakṣavādiprayuktasyānumānasya pratijñārthaṃ vikalpya dūṣayitumāha—saṃśleṣo yadi vāryata iti saśeṣeṇa sārdhena ślokena । śabdārthayoḥ saṃyoganiṣedhe'pi siddha- sādhyatā । sambandhamātraniṣedhe ca sambaddhayorapi pitāputrayoḥ svasvāminanośca tadde- śānantaramadarśanādityasya sadbhāvādanaikāntikatvam । sādhyavikalatā ca dṛṣṭāntasya himavadvindhyorapyekabhūmilakṣaṇasambandhasadbhāvenetyarthaḥ ।।
vācyavācakasambandhaniṣedhe'pyananyathāsiddhārthapratyayānyathānupapattyārthāpattibādha ityāha—vācyavācaketi । lokaśabdo'rthāpattireva kāraṇatvenopalakṣitā vācya- vācakasambandhābhāvena ca pratijñārtho'pi pratipādayituṃ na śakyata iti vacana- śabdayorekatra. mā. garbhasaṃbandhino. mā.
virodhaśca svavākyena na hi sambandhavarjitaiḥ ।। 26 ।।
pratijñārthaṃ padaiḥ śakyaḥ pratipādayituṃ paraḥ ।
abhidhānakriyāyāṃ hi karmatvaṃ vācyasaṃśritam ।। 27 ।।
śabdānāṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā kartṛtvaṃ vā nirūpitam ।
pratittāvupādānāt sāhitye ca vivakṣite ।। 28 ।।
niyamyete yadaikasyāṃ sambandhaḥ so'rthaśabdayoḥ ।
tatra yadyapyasambandhaḥ kārakāṇāṃ parasparam ।। 29 ।।
virodha ityāha—virodhaśceti । kathaṃ vācyavācakasambandhābhāvena dharmidharmaprati- pādakatvamityarthaḥ ।।
kiṃ punaridaṃ vācakatvam, yanniṣedhe lokabādhaḥ svavacanavirodhaścetyucyate ? yadi tāvadgamakatvam, dhūmāderapi vācakatvaprasaṅgaḥ । atha śabdāvacchinnagamakatvam, vivakṣāyāmapi śabdaniṣṭhāyāṃ vācakatvaprasaṅgaḥ । nāpyātmasādṛśyena gamakatvaṃ vācaka- tvam, dvitvasyāpi pādādau vācakatvaprasaṅgāt ; śabde tannāstītyavācakatva- prasaṅgādityāśaṅkyāha—abhidhānakriyāyāmiti । abhidhānakriyāyāṃ hi yada- bhidheyārthasamavetaṃ karmatvaṃ tadvācyatvam ; yadabhidhāyakaśabdasamavetaṃ karaṇatvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ vā tadvācakatvamiti । nanvarthapratipattirabhidhānakriyā । arthaḥ pratipattāvurpādāna- miti tasyāñca dhūmāderapi karaṇatvena vācakatvaprasaṅgaḥ । ucyate ; rūpatrayādirahi- tādanavagatādvā yā arthapratipattiḥ sābhidhānakriyetyadoṣaḥ ।।
nanvevamapi śabdārthayoḥ sambandho'nupapanna eva kārakāṇāṃ parasparasambandhā- bhāvenetyāśaṅkyāha—pratipattāviti । ekasyāmabhidhānakriyāyāmupādīyamānatvāt gotvagośabdayostayaiva tāvat prathamasambandhaḥ ; tatsambandhe ca tayoḥ sāhityamupādī- yamānamavagatatvena vivakṣitam । tata uttarakālamaruṇaiṃkahāyanyādivat parasparaniyamaḥ । sa eva cānayoḥ parasparasambandha ityāha—tatra yadītyardhatrayeṇa ।। niyamyate yadekasyāṃ. ayaṃ pādaḥ mā. na vartate. vatyapratipattāvupādānāditi tasyāśca. cau. mu. kāraṇāt. mā.
tathāpi yatkriyā tasyāmupakāryopakāritā ।
sa kriyāsaṅgateḥ paścāt sambandhaḥ kīrtyate tayoḥ ।। 30 ।।
na cāpyatrāvinābhāva upayogīti sādhitam ।
saṃjñeti gamakatvaṃ cenna tadaṅgamiyaṃ bhavet ।। 31 ।।
gamayantīṃ śrutiṃ dṛṣṭvā kalpyate vyavahārataḥ ।
na caiṣā gamayatyarthaṃ sambandhe'navadhārite ।। 32 ।।
tasmād gamakatā paścād dhūmāderiva jāyate ।
sānaṅgaṃ tadvadeva syānneyaṃ dhūmādibhiḥ samā ।। 33 ।।
nirūpite'vinābhāve tatra tatkāritā hyasau ।
gamakatvena pūrvaṃ ca tatra notpadyate matiḥ ।। 34 ।।
etasyāmabhidhānakriyāyāmupakāryopakārakabhāvena sambaddhayorarthaśabdayoryo'yaṃ parasparaniyamaḥ, sa eva tayoḥ sambandhaḥ । sākṣāt sambandhābhāve'pi tasyaiva cārtha- pratipattāvaṅgatvam । avinābhāvastu vidyamāno'pi nārthapratipattāvaṅgamityuktam ‘sambandhaṃ yaṃ tu vakṣyāma’ iti । tad darśayati—netyardhena ।।
atra codayati—saṃjñetyādinā sapādena ślokadvayena । saṃyogāvinābhāva- kāryakāraṇabhāvatādātmyābhāve sati saṃjñāsaṃjñibhāvo'bhyupagamyamānaḥ pāriśeṣyād gamyagamakabhāva evāvaśiṣyate । na ca tasyārthapratipattāvaṅgatvam, arthapratipattilakṣaṇa- kāryāvaseyatvāt । tadāha—gamayantīṃ śrutiṃ dṛṣṭvaivottarakālaṃ śabde gamakatā pratī- yata iti । na ca sambandhamantareṇa śabdasyārthapratipādakatvam । tatrāpyāha—na ceti । tasmāt sambandhāntaranimittārthapratipatyuttarakālaṃ gamakatvamavagamyamānarthapratipattā- vanaṅaṅgam । tañca sambandhāntaraṃ dhūmādāvivānvayavyatirekākhyam । tataśca tadvadevānu- mānaprasaṅgaḥ । tatra parihāramāha—neyamityādinā nyūnapādena ślokatrayeṇa ।। yā. kriyā. mā. sā. mā. cātrāpyavinābhāva. cau. bhu. gamayantī hi dṛṣṭaiṣā. mā.
iha vācakatāyāḥ prāṅ nāvinābhāvitā matiḥ ।
yadaiva ceha sambandhaṃ vṛddhebhyaḥ pratipadyate ।। 35 ।।
tadaiva gamako'syāyamiti nānyasvarūpataḥ ।
kathayanti kvacit tāvad boddhavyo'smādayaṃ tviti ।। 36 ।।
kvacid vācaka ityevaṃ vācyo'yamiti cocyate ।
kvaciduccaritācchabdād dṛṣṭvārthaviṣayāṃ kriyām ।। 37 ।।
keṣāṃcit tatra boddhṛtvamanumānāt prakalpyate ।
etenāsmād yataḥ śabdādartho'yamavadhāritaḥ ।। 38 ।।
tena nūnamimau siddhau vācyavācakaśaktikau ।
itthaṃ vācakatā siddhā saṅkīrṇārthā tataḥ param ।। 39 ।।
anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ niṣkṛṣṭe'rthe niyamyate ।
yuktaṃ dhūmādau gamakatvasyārthapratipattāvanaṅgatvam ; avinābhāvanimittārthaprati- pattyuttarakālāvaseyatvāt ; śabdārthayostu gamyagamakatāṃ vṛddhebhyaḥ pratipadyata iti tasyaivārthapratipattāvaṅgatvam ; na hi tatrārthapratipatteḥ pūrvaṃ dhūmādāvivāvinābhāvāva- gatiḥ, tato'rthapratipatti, tataḥ paścād gamakatvāvagatiriti kathaṃ punararthapratipatteḥ pūrvaṃ vṛddhebhyo gamyagamakabhāvaḥ pratipadyate ityāśaṅkya triprakāratāṃ darśayati— kathayantītyādinā ślokatrayeṇa । kvacit tāvadevaṃ kathayanti—gośabdena gotva- lakṣaṇo'rtho'vagantavyaḥ, kvacidevam—gośabdo gotvasya vācakaḥ gotvaṃ ca gośabdasya vācyam—iti । kvacittu kañcit kaścidāha—gāmānaya—iti ; tatastena śābaleyādikamarthamānīyamānamupalabhya pārśvastho'rthāpattyavaṃ pratipadyate— gośabdādanenāyamarthaḥ pratipannaḥ ; tasmādanayorvācyavācakabhāvaḥ—iti ।।
nanu gotvasattādravyaguṇādisaṃsṛṣṭa śa/?/leyamānīyamānamupalabhya kathamarthāpattyā gośabdasya gotvavācakatvaṃ pratipadyata ityāśaṅkyāha—itthaṃ vācakateti ।। sadaiva. mā. dṛṣṭārtha. bhā. pratīyate. cau. mu. loke vācakaśaktikau. cau. mu. saṅkīrṇāpi. pratipannaḥ iti. mā.
bahujātiguṇadravyakarma bhedāvalambanān ।। 40 ।।
pratyayān sahasā jātān śrautalākṣaṇikātmakān ।
na lokaḥ kāraṇābhāvānnirddhārayitumicchati ।। 41 ।।
balābalādisidhyarthaṃ vākyajñāstu viviñcate ।
kakṣyāntaritasāmānyaviśeṣeṣu hi durbalaḥ ।। 42 ।।
sāmānyavacanaḥ śabdo jāyate lakṣaṇābalāt ।
tenāvaśyaṃ vivektavyaṃ śabdena kiyaducyate ।। 43 ।।
kiyadvā nityasambandhādabhidheyena lakṣyate ।
tatra prayogabāhulyāt tadviśeṣepvasatsvapi ।। 44 ।।
yadyapi saṃsṛṣṭasyānayanam, tathāpi vakṣyamāṇābhyāmanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ niyata evārthe vācakatvamavagamyate । etadeva vivṛṇoti—bahviti ślokadvayena ।।
yadyapi gośabdoccāraṇe gotvasattāvyaktiguṇādayo'rthāḥ pratīyante ; na ca tannirdhāraṇe lokasya prayojanam—ayaṃ vācyaḥ, ayaṃ gamyamānaḥ—iti ; tathāpi sāmānyaviśeṣaśāstrayorbalābalādiprasidhyarthaṃ mīmāṃsakāstarkeṇa viviktaṃ kurvanti— gotvameva vācyam, sattādayastvabhidheyāvinābhāvena lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vā pratīyante—iti na ca laukikaviruddhatā tarkasya, pratītimātravyavahāritvāllokasya । punaratra sāmānyamātravācyatve sāmānyaśāstrasya vyaktiśāstrād durbalatvamityāha— kakṣyāntariteti । sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdenātra vyaktayo'bhidhīyante । yataścoktaprakā- reṇa saprayojano'yamanvayavyatirekāvaseyo vivekaḥ tenaḥ kartavya ityāha—tenāvaśyaṃ vivektavyamiti ।।
tāvanyayavyatirekau darśayati—tatra prayogabāhulyāditi । yatra yatra gotvaṃ tatra tatra prayogād bāhuleyābhāve'pi śābaleye prayogāt sattādisamanvite'pi bhedāvalambanāt. mā. bhedāvalambina. cau. mu. pratyayātsahasā jātā śrautalākṣaṇikātmakāt. cau. mu. kakṣāntarita. cau. mu. tatprayogeṣu. cau. bu. evārtho. mā.
prayogāt parasāmānye sati cāpyaprayogataḥ ।
sāsnādyutpannasambandhagotvamātrasya vācakaḥ ।। 45 ।।
gośabda iti vijñānamanvayavyatirekajam ।
tasmād gamakataivādāvabhidhāyakatā punaḥ ।। 46 ।।
tannimitteti sambandhaḥ saṃjñāsaṃjñitvalakṣaṇaḥ ।
sambandhaniyamo'yantu yāvinābhāvitocyate ।। 47 ।।
sambandhagrahaṇāt pūrvaṃ yasmānna gamayatyataḥ ।
gavādernābhidhāśaktirdevadattapade yathā ।। 48 ।।
yathaiva gamakaḥ śabdo vyavahārāt pratīyate ।
tathaiva śaktivijñānaṃ tasyopāyo'vagamyate ।। 49 ।।
mahiṣyādāvaprayogādanvayavyatirekabalenedṛśaṃ vijñānamupajāyate—gotvasyāyaṃ vācako gośabdaḥ—iti ।।
upasaṃharati—tasmāditi । tasmādarthapratipatteḥ pūrvamarthāpattyā vācakatvameva pratīyate ; tatastannimittameva gamakatvaviśeṣābhidhāyakatvamuttarakālamavagamyata iti siddhaḥ śaktidvayalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ । avinābhāvastu tasyaiva niyāmaka ityukta- mityāha—sambandhaniyama iti ।।
evamavasthite pūrvapakṣabhāṣyamāha—“yadi pratyāyakaḥ śabdaḥ, prathamaśrutaḥ kiṃ na pratyāyayati”—iti । tadanenopakṣiptaṃ prayogamāha—sambandhagrahaṇāditi । gośabdo dharmī, gotvaṃ prati tasya vācikā śaktirnāstīti sādhyo dharmaḥ, sambandha- grahaṇāt pūrvamapratipādakatvāditi hetuḥ, devadattapadavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।
atra siddhāntabhāṣyam—“sarvatra no darśanaṃ pramāṇam ; pratyāyaka iti hi pratyayaṃ dṛṣṭvāvagacchāmaḥ, na prathamaśruta iti prathamaśravaṇe pratyayamadṛṣṭvā ; yāvatkṛtvaḥ śrutena iyaṃ saṃjñā ityavadhāritaṃ bhavati, tāvatkṛtvaḥ śrutādarthāvasāyaḥ”—iti । tadvyācaṣṭe—yathaiva gamaka iti । gośabdasya hi śaktidvayaniyamasambandhabalenārthaṃ sāsnādyekārthasaṃbandhi. cau. mu. saṃbandhaniyame. yattu. mā. śaktidvayavilakṣaṇaḥ. mā.
svarūpagrahaṇaṃ cāsya yathā vyāpriyate phale ।
tathā saṃbandhavijñānaṃ nāśaktistatkṛtā bhavet ।। 50 ।।
yatsādhakatamatvena kasyacit kiñciducyate ।
tasyānugrāhakāpekṣā na svaśaktivighātinī ।। 51 ।।
na hi tat kāraṇaṃ loke vede vā kiñcidīdṛśam ।
itikartavyatāsādhye yasya nānugrahe'rthitā ।। 52 ।।
pratyātmaniyatatvācca tayaiva karaṇaṃ bhavet ।
bāhyāntaravibhāgena kvacit syādvā vibhāṣayā ।। 53 ।।
pratipādayatastajjñānamitikartavyatā yathā dhūmasyāvinābhāvajñānam । na ca karaṇa- syetikartavyatāpekṣāyāmaśaktatvamityarthaḥ ।।
atraiva dṛṣṭāntamāha—svarūpagrahaṇamiti । yathā svarūpagrahaṇāpekṣāyāṃ śabdasyārthapratipattilakṣaṇe phale śaktivighāto nāsti tathā sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣā- yāmityarthaḥ ।।
api ca, abhidhānakriyāyāṃ kārakatvaṃ vācakatvam ; tasya ca saṃbandhagrahaṇa- svarūpagrahaṇalakṣaṇetikartavyatādyanugrāhakāpekṣā na kāraṇaśaktivighātaṃ karotītyāha— yatsādhakatamatveneti ।।
na caitadabhinavaṃ yacchabde ; yato vaidikā āgneyādayo laukikāścakṣurādayaḥ svakriyāyāmitikartavyatāpekṣāḥ । tadāha—na hi tat kāraṇamiti ।।
evaṃ tāvat vaidikalaukikakāraṇānugrāhiṇīṃ prayājādidṛḍhamuṣṭilakṣaṇamiti- kartavyatāmabhidhāyedānīṃ karaṇasvarūpopapādikāmāha—pratyātmaniyatatvācceti । kāṣṭhānāṃ hi pākapravṛttau jvālādayo'vāntaravyāpāralakṣaṇāḥ pratikārakaṃ ca niyatāḥ kāraṇādīnāmutpādakāḥ । nanu rūpapratipattilakṣaṇāyāṃ kriyāyāmindriyālokasamana- yathā. mā. yathaiva. cau. mu. vivakṣayā. cau. mu. yathā. mā. itikartavyatāpekṣādyagrāhikā. mā.
udvigno hyandhakāreṇa kaścidevaṃ bravītyapi ।
kiṃ cakṣuṣā mamaitena dṛṣṭaṃ dīpena yanmayā ।। 54 ।।
nityavṛttau tu nāndhānāṃ dṛṣṭirdīpaśatairapi ।
rūpādidarśane yasmāt tasmāccakṣuḥ prakāśakam ।। 55 ।।
śarīrātmamanoyogādasādhāraṇatābalāt ।
vijñānāsattibhāvācca cakṣuḥ kāraṇamiṣyate ।। 56 ।।
tathaivehāpi sambandhajñānamaṅgaṃ prasiddhitaḥ ।
skatvādīnāṃ samāne tadbhāvabhāvitve kathamindriyasyaiva karaṇatvam, ālokādīnāṃ tu karaṇānugrāhakatvamityāśaṅkyāha—udvigno hīti ।।
sādhakatamaṃ karaṇam ; tamabarthaścātiśayaḥ ; andhakārodvignaścālokasyaiva sādhakatamatvaṃ vivakṣati ; tadā cakṣurāderālokaṃ pratyanugrāhakatvam । vivakṣāvaśenaita- duktam । paramārthatastu cakṣurindriyasyaiva rūpapratipattau karaṇatvam ; ālokasyānu- grāhakatvam ; andhasya pradīpasamavadhāne'pi rūpādyapratipatteḥ ।
nanu yadi śaktaḥ kimityapekṣate ? apekṣate cedapekṣyamāṇasyaiva śaktatvamu- bhayorvā । sahakārikāraṇasamavadhānaṃ śaktiḥ । ucyate—yathā rūpapratipattā- vindriyasyālokasahitasya ālokasya vendriyasahitasya ubhayorvā śaktatvam, evaṃ śabdasya vā sambandhagrahaṇasahitasya sambandhagrahaṇasya vā śabdasahitasya ubhayorvā śaktatvamityadoṣaḥ ।।
adhunā “bāhyāntaravibhāgena” iti yaduktam, tadvivṛṇoti—śarīreti ।।
śarīrasambaddhātmasamavete rūpajñāne ālokāpekṣayā cakṣurindriyasyaiva pratyāsatteḥ sādhakatamatvena karaṇatvam ; asādhāraṇyena ca saṃyogāpekṣuyā tasya rūparasajñāna sādhāraṇatvāt ; dārṣṭāntike yojayitumāha—tathaivehāpīti ।। hyanyakāreṇa. mā. ityanivṛttau tu nāndhādīnāṃ dṛṣṭi dīpaśatairapi. mā. sahakārikāraṇasamavadhānaṃ vā śaktiḥ. mā. saṃskārāpekṣayā. mā.
gauravāt karaṇatvena mataṃ cet kena vāryate ।। 57 ।।
yathā cakṣuritīdantu vyabhicāritvamucyate ।
devadatte'pi cāvyaktāṃ śaktimicchanti yuktitaḥ ।। 58 ।।
prakāśe'vasthite vāhye nāndhe rūpaṃ pratīyate ।
phalānantaryataścāpi cakṣuḥ karaṇamiṣyate ।। 59 ।।
puruṣādhīnavijñānastebhyaḥ prāganirūpitaḥ ।
yaḥ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaḥ sa ceṣṭaśced dhruvaṃ kṛtaḥ ।। 60 ।।
bhinnadeśādyadhiṣṭhānād yathā rajjughaṭādiṣu ।
atha vivakṣāvaśenālokavat sambandhagrahaṇasyaiva karaṇatvam, śabdastu tadanugrāhaka iti; bhavatu nāma na kaścid doṣa ityāha—gauravāditi ।।
“yathā cakṣurdraṣṭṛ na bāhyena prakāśena vinā”—iti bhāṣyam । tad vyācaṣṭe—yathā cakṣuritīdamiti । yat sāpekṣatvenāśaktatvamuktam tasya cakṣurā- dāvālokāpekṣāyāmanaikāntikatvamityarthaḥ ।।
“devadattapade yathā”—iti dṛṣṭāntatvena dattam ; tasya sādhyavikala- tāmāha—devadatte'pīti । devadattapadasyārthapratipādikā śaktiḥ kaiścidiṣyate । yuktiṃ cāhuḥ, yasmād devadattaśabda uccārite na vidmaḥ kasyārthasyāyaṃ vācaka iti ।।
evamavasthite pūrvapakṣabhāṣyam—“yadi prathamaśruto na pratyāyayati, kṛtaka- starhi śabdasyārthena sambandhaḥ”—iti । tad vyācaṣṭe—puruṣādhīnavijñāna iti ।
saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandho hi puruṣānvayavyatirekānuvivāyitvāt puruṣakāryaḥ samaya eva । sa cāsau nityasyaivābhivyañjakaḥ । abhyupagamyāpi taṃ samayābhyupagame- naivārthapratipatteḥ kimantargaḍunānena ? tadabhāve samayamātrādarthapratipattirna syāt । yatra yatra ca saṃketyate gośabdaḥ tatra tatra pratijñāṃ na janayati । “mukhe hi śabda- mupalabhāmahe, bhūmāvartham”—iti bhāṣyam । tadvyācaṣṭe—bhinnadeśādyadhi- ṣṭhānāditi ।। ayaṃ śloko mā. na dṛśyate ; na vā atra vyākhyātaḥ ।। ceṣṭaśce.... ...va kuta. mā.
samaṃ nāstyanayoḥ kiñcit tenāsaṅgatatā svataḥ ।। 61 ।।
iti citrākṣepavādaḥ
rajjughaṭayoriva bhinnatvena vyapadeśabhedena kṛtakaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandhaḥ । puruṣābhāvena ca vede samayābhāvāccodanaiva pramāṇamiti pratijñānaṃ samañjasam ।। iti bhaṭṭombekaviracitāyāṃ tātparyaṭīkāyāṃ citrākṣepaḥ samāptaḥ atra iti saṃbandhākṣepavādaḥ iti. cau. mu. vartate.
atha sphoṭavādaḥ
ādhārātmani vijñāte sukhamādheyabodhanam ।
tasyaiva tāvat prastāvādatha gaurityato'bravīt ।। 1 ।।
evamavasthite siddhāntavādī prasnapūrvakaṃ śabdārthayornirūpaṇaṃ karoti । “atha gaurityatra kaḥ śabdaḥ”—ityanantareṇa śabdanirūpaṇam ; “atha gaurityasya śabdasya ko'rthaḥ”—ityanena cārthanirūpaṇam । tatra sambandhākṣepānantaraṃ tatparihārāvasare śabdārthayornirūpaṇamasambaddhamāśaṅkya vārtikakāraḥ sambaddhatvaṃ darśayitumāha—ādhā- rātmanītyardhena । śabdārthasambandhasya hi śabdārthau sambandhināvādhārau . tatrādhāra- nirūpaṇadvāreṇādheyanirūpaṇamevedaṃ draṣṭavyamityarthaḥ । tatrāpi śabdapūrvakatvādarthaprati- patteḥ prathamaṃ śabdākhyameva sambandhinaṃ nirūpayatītyāha—tasyaiva tāvadityardhena ।।
atrānupāsitaguravaścodayanti—atha gauḥ—iti kasyāyaṃ praśnaḥ ? na tāvat pūrvapakṣavādinaḥ, tasya sambandhākṣepānantaraṃ tatpraśnānupapatteḥ । nāpi siddhānta- vādinaḥ ; tasyāpi sambandhākṣepānantaraṃ tatpratisamādhānāvasare sambandhipraśnānu- papatteḥ । “gakāraukāra” ityādi cottarabhāṣyaṃ svapraśnānantaramasambaddhameva syāt । yadapi vārtikakāreṇoktam—
“ādhārātmani vijñāte sukhamādheyabodhanam ।
tasyaiva tāvat prastāvādatha gaurityato'bravīt ।।” iti
tadapi yadi tāvat pūrvapakṣavādī, tato'nupapannam, tenādhāranirūpaṇāt pūrvamādheyasya nirūpitatvāt—“yadi prathamaśruto na pratyāyayati”—ityādinā । atha siddhānta- vādī, tarhi siddhāntavādipraśno'yam ; tatredamanupapannam—kaḥ svayamuttaraṃ tebhyo dadyāt—iti pūrvapakṣavādipraśno'yamiti darśayiṣyati । api ca, siddhāntavādi- no'pi nityatvena sambandhinirūpaṇaṃ sambandhanityatvapratipattāvupayujyate । tatra sphoṭa- niṣedhena varṇatrayātmakatvena sambandhinirūpaṇamasambaddham, sphoṭākhye'pi sambandhini tannityatvābhyupagamena sambandhanityatvopapatteḥ । tasmādālūnaviśīrṇo'yaṃ saha vivaraṇena bhāṣyagranthaḥ ।। nirūpaṇasaṃbandhaṃ. mā. sambandhapraśnānupapatteḥ. mā. Does he mean the. vārtika ?
pratyakṣe'pi visaṃvādo yeṣāṃ kaḥ svayamuttaram ।
tebhyo dadyāditi jñātvā vṛddhānāṃ matamabravīt ।। 2 ।।
atra samādhiḥ—siddhāntavādina evāyaṃ praśnaḥ sa hi sambandhākṣepānantaraṃ sphoṭātmakasambandhiniṣedhena varṇātmakasaṃbandhyavadhāraṇarūpaḥ । atha gauḥ—ityatra bhavataḥ sambandhī kaḥ śabdo'bhimataḥ, yasyārthena saha sambandhābhāvaṃ manyase ? yadi varṇayatrātirekeṇa sphoṭākhyaḥ sambandhyabhyupagamyate, tatastasya varṇatrayātirekeṇa vidhi- mukhyena buddhāvapratibhāsamānatvenābhāvādarśena saha sambandho na nityo nāpi sāmayikaḥ syāt । nāpyarthapratipattilakṣaṇakāryāvagatasya sambandhāvagatiḥ, apratipanne tasminna- syābhāvenetaretarāśrayaprasaṅgāt । bhāve vā vākyasphoṭāpekṣayā padasphoṭasyāsatyatvena sambandhasatyatā na syāt । varṇatrayātmake tu sambandhini vidhimukhenāvadhārite tasyārthena saha svarūpeṇa satyatvena ca sambandhagrahaṇaṃ śakyam, vākyārthavat padārtha- yorapi satyatvādityabhiprāyaḥ । vakṣyati ca—
“kāryāṇi vākyāvayavāśrayāṇi
satyāni kartuṃ kṛta eṣa yatnaḥ”—iti ।।
tasmāt—“atha gauḥ” iti bhāṣyaṃ, ādhārātmani—iti vārtikaṃ dvayamapyupapannam । “gakāraukāravisarjanīyāḥ” iti bhāṣyam; tasya svagatatvenopavarṣagrahaṇamasambaddhamā- śaṅkya vyācaṣṭe—pratyakṣe'pīti । pratīyamānanabādhitakalpaṃ varṇatrayamutsṛjya vidhimukhena kāryamukhena vā pratibhāsamānasya niṣprayojanasya svaprakriyayābhyupagamo yeṣāmanodhopaha- tānām, kaḥ svayamuttaraṃ tebhyo dadyāditi paryālocyopavarṣagrahaṇaṃ bhāṣye । “te ca śrotragrahaṇāḥ”—ityādi bhāṣyam । tasyāyamarthaḥ—śrotragrāhye vastuni loke śabda- śabdaḥ prayujyate । gakārādaya eva ca—gauḥ—ityetasmin vijñāne śrautre varṇatraya- vidhimukhena sambandhinirūpaṇaṃ prakrāntam—gauḥ—ityetasmin vijñāne śrautre varṇatraya- vyatirekeṇārthāntarāvabhāso'sti, uta na—iti । nāsti—iti siddhāntitam— “te ca śrotragrahaṇāḥ”—iti । tīrthāntare tu kāryamukhena sambandhinirūpaṇaṃ kṛtam— na hi sambandhāpekṣānantaram. mā. ayaṃ vākyabhāgaḥ adhastāt “kṛta eṣa yatraḥ” iti ityataḥ paraṃ mā. vartate. śabdāmimataḥ mā. itaḥ pūrvaṃ mā. sphoṭātmaka...avadhāraṇarūpaḥ iti vākyabhāgaḥ dṛśyate, yathoparinirdiṣṭam. svamatatvenāpakarṣagrahaṇasambaddhamāśaṅkya. mā. paryālocyopapannagrahaṇaṃ. mā. gakārādayada. mā.
tatrārthapratyayadvāraṃ kṛtaṃ śabdanirūpaṇam ।
yairāsatāṃ tu te tāvat pratyakṣeṇa ‘nirūpyate ।। 3 ।।
pratyakṣaṃ nāsamarthaṃ nastena cārthe'vadhārite ।
na heturbalavānanyaḥ parīkṣyeta yatastataḥ ।। 4 ।।
tasmācchrotraparicchinno yadyarthaṃ gamayenna vā ।
sarvathā tasya śabdatvaṃ lokasiddhaṃ na hīyate ।। 5 ।।
atha gauḥ—ityetasmin vijñāne śrautre bahavo'rthāḥ pratibhāsante ; tatra kasteṣā śabdaḥ ?—ityupakramya—“yenoccaritenārthapratyayo bhavati, sa śabdaḥ”—ityupa- saṃhṛtam । tatra vārtikakāraḥ kāryanirūpaṇadvāreṇa sambandhinirūpaṇaparityāgena vidhimukhena yat sambandhinirūpaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bhāṣye, tatra kāraṇamāha—tatrārthapratyaya- dvāramiti । gauḥ—ityetasminnakṣaje jñāne varṇayatrātirekeṇa yadi tat prakāśata eva, tato vyarthaṃ kāryamukhena tannirūpaṇam । atha na prakāśate, tataḥ sambandhagrahaṇā- bhāvena kutastato'rthāvagatiḥ ? nāpi kāryamukhenaivāvagatasya sambandhagrahaṇam, itare- tarāśrayāt ; avagamyamānaṃ hi sambandhabalena tadarthapratipattilakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ karoti । tasmād vidhimukhenaiva gamakanirūpaṇaṃ kartavyam ; yato'vagatasya sambandhagrahaṇabalena gamakaṃtvam, nānyathā । kāryamukhena tu gamakanirūpaṇaṃ kāraṇacarcāvadupekṣaṇīyam ।
evaṃ satyapi yadi pratyakṣagrahaṇayogyaḥ sa na bhavet, tataḥ kāryamukhena kalpyetāpi । na tvetadastītyāha—pratyakṣaṃ nāsamarthaṃ na iti । tatra yadi-gauḥ- ityakṣaje vijñāne varṇatrayavyatirekeṇārthāntaramavabhāsata eva, tato vyarthaṃ kāryamukhena parikalpanamityāha—tena cārtha iti tripādyā ।।
upasaṃharati—tasmāditi । tasmācchrotragṛhītasya gakārāditrayasya yadyartha- pratipādakatvaṃ vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena—“pūrvavarṇajanitasaṃskāraviśiṣṭo'ntyo varṇaḥ”- ityanena, tataḥ śabdakṛteyamarthapratipattirbhaviṣyati । athāpi nāsti, tathāpi śabda- śabdaprayogād gakārāditrayasyaiva śabdatvamityarthaḥ ।। parīkṣyate. cau. mu.
yadi tvarthagatau śaktirna syādasya tataḥ punaḥ ।
vastvantaraṃ prakalpyeta vinā śabdaprasiddhitaḥ ।। 6 ।।
agnyādīn gamayanto'pi śabdā dhūmādayo na hi ।
na cāpratyāyakatvāt syādekavarṇeṣvaśabdatā ।। 7 ।।
na ca prāgarthavijñānācchrotragrāhyeṣvaśabdadhīḥ ।
na cārthajñānataḥ paścādaśrautreṣvapi śabdatā ।। 8 ।।
parasparānapekṣāśca śrautrabudhyā svarūpataḥ ।
yadi tu varṇatrayasyārthapratipādakatvaṃ pratyekaṃ saṃbhūya yugapat krameṇa vā nopa- padyate vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena—“yadyarthapratyayo nopapadyate”—ityādinā, tato'rtha- pratipattyanyathānupapattyā abhyupagamyavādena kalpanā ; na tu tasya śabdatvam, śabdaśabdaprayogābhāvādityāha—yadi tvarthagatāviti ।।
api ca, “yenoccaritenārthapratipattirbhaviṣyati, sa śabda”—ityasya ko'rthaḥ ? yadi tāvad gauḥ—iti śrautravijñānapratibhāsanirapekṣamarthapratipattihetu- tvameva kevalaṃ sphoṭasya śabdatve kāraṇam, tato dhūmāderapi śabdatvaprasaṅga ityāha —agnyādīnityardhena । atha—gauḥ ityasmin vijñāne śrautre bahūnāṃ pratibhāsa- mānānāṃ yasyārthapratipattihetutvam, sa śabda iti, tataḥ gauḥ ityekasmin pade ekaikasya varṇasphoṭasya tannāstīti śabdatvaṃ na syādityāha—na cāpratyāyakatvami- tyardhena ।।
tathaikasyaiva padasphoṭasya sambandhagrahaṇānurodhena śabdatvamaśabdatvaṃ ca prāpnotī- tyāha—na ca prāgārthavijñānādityardhena । atha śrautrajñānapratibhāsitaiva śabdatve kāraṇam, nārthapratītihetutvam ; padasphoṭasyāpi tarhi śrautravijñānapratibhāsābhāvena satyapyarthapratītihetutve śabdatvaṃ syādityāha—na cārthajñānata ityardhena ।।
kathaṃ punaraśrautratvaṃ padasphoṭasyetyāśaṅkyāha—paraspareti । pūrvaśabdenātra kāraṇatvena paraparikalpitā gakāraparamāṇava ucyante । paraśabdenāpi parapari- vāpratyāyakatvāt. cau. mu. śrotragrāhye na. cau. mu. aśrautre'pi.ca. cau. mu. śrotrabuddhyā. cau. mu. śrotrajñāna. mā. śrotravijñāna. mā. paraparikalpitamabhivyaṅgyaṃ sphoṭaṃ. mā.
varṇā evāvagamyante na pūrvaparavastunī ।। 9 ।।
alpīyasāpi yatrena śabda uccarite matiḥ ।
yadi vā naiva gṛhṇāti varṇaṃ vā sakalaṃ sphuṭam ।। 10 ।।
pṛthaṅ naivopalabhyante varṇasyāvayavāḥ kvacit ।
na ca varṇeṣvanusyūtā dṛśyante tantuvat paṭe ।। 11 ।।
teṣāmanupalabdheśca na jñātā liṅgasaṅgatiḥ ।
nāgamastatparaścāsti nādṛṣṭe copamā kvacit ।। 12 ।।
kalpito'bhivyaṅgyaḥ sphoṭaḥ gatvādikāryaṃ ca gośabdāvayavyākhyamabhidhīyante । etaduktaṃ bhavati-gauḥ—ityetasmin vijñāne parasparānapekṣaṃ pūrvāparaśūnyaṃ gakārādi- trayamavabhāsate—iti । satyapi ca gotvapratipattau parasparasāpekṣatve paraparikalpita- gośabdāvayavyapekṣayānapekṣatvamucyate ; athavā sambandhagrahaṇāt pūrvamarthapratītyabhāve'pi tadbhāvena parasparānapekṣatvamastyeva ।।
tatra pūrvaṃ gakārāvayavanirākaraṇapratijñāṃ tāvat sādhayitumāha—alpīya- sāpīti । sāvayavasya hi paṭādeḥ sakalapratipattyapratipattivyatirekeṇāpi vikala- pratītirdṛṣṭā । gakārasya tu naiva grahaṇam, sakalasya vā grahaṇam ; na tu paṭavat vikalasyetyarthaḥ ।।
api ca, sāvayavasya hi paṭādestantvādayo'nārabdhakāryāśca pratīyante । na tu tathā varṇāvayavānāmupalabdhirityāha—pṛthaṅ neti । tantuvaditi vaidharmya- nidarśanam ।।
pratyakṣābhāvena saṃbandhagrahaṇābhāvādanumānasyāpi varṇāvayavagrahaṇe vṛttirnāstī- tyāha-teṣāmityardhena । āgamo'pi gakārāvayavasya pratipādako nāstītyāha— nāgamastatparaścāsti iti । na cādṛṣṭasyādṛṣṭasadṛśasya vopamānaprameyatvamityāha— nādṛṣṭe copamā kvaciditi ।। pūrvāparavastunī. cau. mu. śabdamuccaritaṃ cau. mu. na copalamyante. cau. mu. abhidhīyate. mā. gakārāvayavi. mā. ghaṭādeḥ mā.
na cāpyanupapattiḥ syād varṇasyāvayavairvinā ।
yathāntyāvayavānāṃ hi vināpyavayavāntaraiḥ ।। 13 ।।
pratyakṣeṇāvabuddhaśca varṇo'vayavavarjitaḥ ।
kiṃ na syād vyomavaccātra liṅgaṃ tadrahitā matiḥ ।। 14 ।।
tadvaccāsyaikabuddhitvād deśabhede'pyabhinnatā ।
nanu bhedamatirna syāt tavāpyekatvadhīḥ kutaḥ ।। 15 ।।
sāmānyeṣu mamaikā dhīstadvyaktiṣu ca bhedadhīḥ ।
na hīṣṭaṃ bhedamātraṃ me na syādekatvadhīryataḥ ।। 16 ।।
arthāpattirapi gakārāvayavagrāhikā nāstītyāha—na cāpīti । yathā bhavadabhimatānāṃ gakārāntyāvayavānāṃ paramāṇusaṃjñakānāṃ vināpyavayavāntarairupapattiḥ, evaṃ sthūlasyāpi gakārasya bhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ ।।
evamavayavābhāvaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ tatraiva prayogamāha—pratyakṣeṇeti । varṇo'va- yavavarjitaḥ kiṃ na syāditi pratijñā, avayavapratibhāsarahitā matirliṅgam, vyomava- diti dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।
idānīṃ parābhivyaṅgyagatvanirākaraṇapratijñāṃ sādhayitumāha—tadvadityardhena । tadanena prayoga upakṣiptaḥ—asyeti prakrāntasya varṇasya dharmitvenopādānam, deśabhede'pyabhinnateti sādhyo dharmaḥ, ekabuddhigrāhyatvāditi hetu, tadvaditi prakrāntaṃ vyoma nidarśanam । deśādibhedena pratīyamānasyāpi—sa evāyam—ityekabuddhi- grāhyatvena vyomavadekatvaṃ gakārasyetyarthaḥ । nanvekatve gakārasya drutamadhyamavilambi- tādibhedena pratibhāso na syāditi codayati—nanu bhedamatirna syāditi । tatra siddhāntavādyāha—tavāpyekatvadhīḥ kuta iti । drutādibhedena gakārādibhede tavāpi—sa evāyam—iti kathamekatvapratyaya ityarthaḥ ।।
tatra gatvavādī svābhiprāyaṃ tāvadāha—sāmānyeṣviti । yathaiva tava śāba- leyādiṣu bhedapratyayena bhede'vagate sāmānyālambano'yam—sa evāyaṃ gauḥ—iti yathāntyavayavānāṃ. cau. mu. hi. cau. mu.
vyaktestāvanna sāmānyaṃ bhinnarūpaṃ pratīyate ।
varṇeṣvanyatra śabdatvānnānyacced varṇa eva saḥ ।। 17 ।।
sa eveti maternāpi sādṛśyaṃ na ca tat kvacit ।
vināvayavasāmānyairvarṇeṣvavayavā na ca ।। 18 ।।
pratyakṣaviṣayatvācca nānyāpoho'pi yujyate ।
vācakaścātra liṅgaṃ vā na tadānīṃ pratīyate ।। 19 ।।
gakārādipu sāmānyaṃ śabdatvaṃ kalpyate yathā ।
pratyayaḥ, tathā bhamāpi drutādibhedena gakāravyaktibhede sati sāmānyagatvālambano' yaṃ—sa evāyaṃ gakāraḥ—iti pratyayo'pi bhaviṣyati iti gotvavad gatvaprasiddhi- viśeṣo'vadhāryatāmityarthaḥ ।।
evamavasthite siddhāntavādī gotvena saha gatvasya viśeṣamāha—vyakteriti ।
drutādibhedena gakāravyaktibhede'vasthite gatvaparikalpanaṃ jātirūpaṃ vā syāt sādṛśyarūpamapoharūpaṃ vā ? tatra śabdatvavyatirekeṇa varṇeṣu jātirūpamavāntara- sāmānyaṃ gatvaṃ tattvānyatvena vikalpya nirākartavyam, anyasyāgrahaṇāt ; ananyatve vā tatrābhāvaprasaṅgāt । nāpi sādṛśyarūpaṃ gatvam, drutādibhedeṣu—sa evāyam— iti tattvapratyayādityāha—sa eveti /?/maternāpi sādṛśyamiti । api ca gakārāvayavānāmabhāvena bhūyo'vayavasāmānyayogalakṣaṇasya sādṛśyasyāsadbhāva ityāha— na cetyādi saśeṣārdhena ।।
nāpyapoharūpam, drutādibhedeṣu—sa evāyaṃ gakāraḥ—iti śrautre vijñāne kathamavabhāsaviṣayatetyāha—pratyakṣaviṣayatvādityardhena । pratītyabhāvena ca sambandha- grahaṇābhāvād vācakaliṅgayordvayorapyabhāva ityāha—vācaka iti ।।
evamavasthite gatvavādyāha—gakārādiṣviti । tasyāyamabhiprāyaḥ-yathaiva gakāraukārādiṣu śābaleyādiṣu ca bhedapratyayād bhinnā vyaktayo'bhedapratyayāccābhinnaṃ matirnāpi. cau. mu. vināvayavasāmānyāt. cau. mu. sāmānyagatvālambano yaḥ. mā
gotvaṃ ca śābaleyādau tathaitat kiṃ na kalpyate ।। 20 ।।
śābaleyagakārādīn niṣpannān vyaktirūpataḥ ।
sāmyadhīrna hi gṛhṇātītyato jātirapīṣyate ।। 21 ।।
na tu drutādibhedena niṣpannā saṃpratīyate ।
gavyaktyantaravicchinnā gavyaktiraparā sphuṭā ।। 22 ।।
tenaikatvena varṇasya buddhirekopajāyate ।
viśeṣabuddhisadbhāvo bhaved vyañjakabhedataḥ ।। 23 ।।
yathaiva tatra gatvādi gamyamānaṃ drutādibhiḥ ।
viśeṣairapi nānekamevaṃ varṇo'pi no bhavet ।। 24 ।।
tvayāpi vyañjakavyaktibhedād bhedo'bhyupeyate ।
mamāpi vyañcakairnādairbhedabuddhirbhaviṣyati ।। 25 ।।
sāmānyaṃ śabdatvaṃ gotvaṃ ca, tathātrāpi drutādibhedena bhedapratyayādbhinnā vyaktayaḥ— sa evāyam—ityabhedapratyayāccābhinnaṃ sāmānyaṃ gatvaṃ ca bhaviṣyati ।।
tatra siddhāntavādī gotvena śabdatvena ca saha gatvasya vaiṣamyamāha— śābaleyeti । yuktaṃ śābaleyādiṣu bhedābhedapratyayāt sāmānyaviśeṣatvam ; na hi śābaleyabāhuleyayoḥ gakāraukārayośca bhedapratyayasyābhivyañjakālambanatvam, abhi- vyañjakapratipādyaikye'pi bhedapratyayena dharmibhedāt । bhinneṣu caikapratyayasya jāti- sādhakatvādityarthaḥ ।।
drutādau tu bhedapratyayasyābhivyañjakābhedādekatvapratyabhijñānādekaiva gakāra- vyaktiḥ śābaleyādiṣviva gotvamityāha—na tviti ।
upasaṃharati—tenaikatveneti ।।
atraiva dṛṣṭāntamāha—yathaiva taveti ।।
etadeva vivṛṇoti—tvayāpīti ।। sāmānyadhīrna gṛhṇāti. cau. mu. dratādibhede'pi. cau. mu. abhinnatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ gatvaṃ bhaviṣyati. mā.
tena yat prārthyate jātestadvarṇādeva labhyate ।
vyaktilabhyaṃ ca nādebhya iti gatvādidhīrvṛthā ।। 26 ।।
kalpayitvāpi tat paścād vibhutvaikatvanityatāḥ ।
pratyekavṛttitā cāsya bhaveyurmahataḥ śramāt ।। 27 ।।
dvayasiddhastu varṇātmā nityatvādi yathaiva ca ।
kalpitasyeṣyate tadvat siddhasyaivābhyupeyatām ।। 28 ।।
pratyekasamavāye ca kleśo naiva bhaviṣyati ।
vyañjaneṣu ca dhībhedo naiva kāmaṃ pravartate ।। 29 ।।
dṛśyate'janurāgeṇa bhedo yo nāma tatra naḥ ।
viveko'styeva na hyeṣa kevalānāṃ pratīyate ।। 30 ।।
gatvakāryasyābhedapratyayasya varṇasiddhatvād bhedapratyayasya vyaktikāryasya nāda- siddhatvena sāmānyaviśeṣakalpanaṃ niṣpramāṇakamityāha—tena yat prārthyata iti ।।
anekatvena varṇasya gatvādiparikalpanāyāṃ ca vibhutvādicatuṣṭayaparikalpanā- gauravamityāha—kalpayitvāpīti ।।
mīmāṃsakapakṣe'pi vibhutvādicatuṣṭayaparikalpanādāviśeṣa iti cedityā-- śaṅkyāha—dvayasiddha iti । ubhayavādisiddhe dharmiṇi nityatvādidharmamātrasyaiva parikalpanādviśeṣa ityarthaḥ ।।
pratyekasamavetakalpanā cāsmatpakṣe na bhaviṣyati, varṇasya svapratiṣṭhitatvena kvacidapyasamavāyāt ; ākāśasamavetatve vā tasyaikatvādityāha—pratyekasamavāya ityardhena । api ca, vyañjanākhyeṣu varṇeṣu—agnicit—ityevamādau drutādi- bhede'pi na takārasya bhedaḥ pratīyate । yastu kvacidajanurāgeṇa bhedapratyayaḥ, sa kevalānāmabhāvenānvayavyatirekābhyāmaupādhika iti pratipattavyamityāha—vyañja neṣviti sārdhena ।। jñāne. cau. mu. tādṛk pratīyate. cau. mu. kvacidañjanarāgeṇa. mā.
akṣvapyevaṃ paropādhirdrutādipratyayo bhavet ।
varṇāśritatvād varṇatvavyañjanapratyayo yathā ।। 31 ।।
gakāro'tyantaniṣkṛgatvādhāro na gamyate ।
gānyabudhyanirūpyatvāt parakalpitagatvavat ।। 32 ।।
avastutvena sādhyatvānniṣedhāddhetusādhyayoḥ ।
sapakṣe'nyatarāsiddhirna doṣāyātra jāyate ।। 33 ।।
varṇatvāccāpi sādhyo'yaṃ yakārādivadeva ca ।
vyatirekasya cādṛṣṭernātra dṛṣṭaṃ nivartate ।। 34 ।।
evaṃ vyañjaneṣu bhedapratyayasyaupādhikatvaṃ pratipādyedānīmanyeṣvapi bhedapratya- yasyānumānenaupādhikatvaṃ pratipādayitumāha—akṣviti । drutādipratyaya iti dharmi- nirdeśaḥ, akṣvapīti dharmiviśeṣaṇam, paropādhiriti sādhyo dharmaḥ, varṇāśritatvāditi hetuḥ, varṇatvavyañjanapratyayavaditi dṛṣṭāntadvayam ।।
evaṃ bhedapratyayasya nānālambanatvenābhedapratyayasya ca gakārasvarūpāśritatvena siddhamekatvaṃ gakārasya । atraiva prayogamāha—gakāro'tyanteti । gakāro dharmī, gatvādhāro na bhavatīti sādhyo dharmaḥ, atyantaniṣkṛṣṭa iti dharmiviśeṣaṇam, gānyastambhādibudhyanirūpyatvāditi hetuḥ, parakalpitagatvavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।।
nanu sapakṣadharmiṇaḥ gatvasya, bādyasiddhatvena abhāvāt sapakṣe hetoḥ sattva- pradarśanamaśakyam । yatra tu sādhyābhāvena hetorabhāvaḥ kathyate, tatra tadabhāve'pi na doṣaḥ yathā nityatvābhāve kṛtakatvābhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇādāvityāśaṅkyāha—avastu- tveneti । bhāvarūpayorabhāve bhāvo na syāt ; atra tu sapakṣe'bhāvarūpe'pi niṣedharūpatvena na bhavatyanirūpyatvayoḥ sadbhāvādadoṣa ityarthaḥ ।।
tasminneva sādhye hetudṛṣṭāntāntaramāha—varṇatvāccāpītyardhena । na ca gatvanirākaraṇaparasyānumānasya pratyakṣabādhaḥ, abhedapratyayasya gakārālambanatvena vyaktivyatirekeṇa gatvasyādarśanādityāha—vyatirekasya cādṛṣṭeriti ।। yathā. cau. mu. paraiḥ kalpita. cau. mu. nivartakam. cau. mu. vipakṣe. mā.
gotvādivāraṇe'pyevaṃ dṛṣṭabādhaḥ sphuṭo bhavet ।
nānyathā hi matistatra syāt sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ ।। 35 ।।
na cāpyatraikavastutve bhedo vyañjakabhedataḥ ।
na piṇḍavyatirekeṇa vyañjako'tra dhvaniryathā ।। 36 ।।
piṇḍavyaṅgyaiva gotvādirnityaṃ jātiḥ pratīyate ।
tena bhinneṣu piṇḍeṣu jātirekābhyupeyatām ।। 37 ।।
nanu yasya dvayaṃ śrautraṃ tasya buddhidvayaṃ bhavet ।
bhavato'tīndriyatvāt tu kathaṃ nādairviśeṣadhīḥ ।। 38 ।।
śābaleyaptya tu dravyatvena gotvādhāravāraṇe pratyakṣeṇa bhedābhedadarśanādbādha ityāha—gotvādivāraṇa ityardhena । yasmāttatra tatra bhedābhedapratyayau sāmānya- viśeṣamantareṇa na bhavata ityāha—netyardhena ।
nanu śābaleyāvapi śrutādipratyayavadbhedapratyayasya vyañjakālambanatvenābheda- pratyayasyāpi piṇḍālambanatvena gotvābhāvena kuto dṛṣṭabādha ityāśaṅkyāha—na cāpīti । piṇḍavyatirekeṇa drutādivyañjakābhāvādityarthaḥ ।।
śābaleyādaya eva tu bhinnābhinnatvasya gotvasya vyañcakā ityāha—piṇḍa- vyaṅgyaivetyardhena । upasaṃharati—tena bhinneṣu piṇḍeṣvityardhena ।।
tasmādyathā bhinneṣu śābaleyādiṣu pratyabhijñānād gotvamekam, evaṃ drutādi- bhede'pi pratyabhijñānāt gavyaktirekā bhaviṣyatīti siddham । abhedapratyayasya varṇā- lambanatvaṃ gṛhṇīmaḥ; drutādibhedena tu bhedapratyayasya tadbhāvabhāvitvena śrautratve sati nityānumeyatvādālambanatvaṃ kathamiti codayati—nanu yasya dvayaṃ śrautramiti ।। tvevaṃ cau. mu. jātirnityaṃ cau. mu. pratīyate. cau. mu. ttu kathaṃ Omitted mā. dratādivavyañjakaḥ mā.
nādena saṃskṛtācchrotrād yadā śabdaḥ pratīyate ।
tadupaśleṣatastasya bodhaṃ kecit pracakṣate ।। 39 ।।
naiva vā grahaṇaṃ teṣāṃ śabde buddhistu tadvaśāt ।
saṃskārānukṛteḥ so'pi mahatvādyavabudhyate ।। 40 ।।
madhuraṃ tiktarūpeṇa śvetaṃ pītatayā tathā ।
gṛhṇanti pittadoṣeṇa viṣayaṃ bhrāntacetasaḥ ।। 41 ।।
tathā vegena dhāvanto nāvyārūḍhāśca gacchataḥ ।
parvatādīn vijānanti bhrameṇa bhramataśca tān ।। 42 ।।
maṇḍūkavasayāktākṣā vaṃśānuragabuddhibhiḥ ।
vyaktyalpatvamahattvābhyāṃ sāmānyaṃ ca tadāśrayam ।। 43 ।।
gṛhṇanti yadvadetāni nimittagrahaṇād vinā ।
vyañjakatvamabudhvaivaṃ vyaṅgye bhrāntirbhaviṣyati ।। 44 ।।
tatra parihāramāha—nādeneti ।।
drutādisaṃskṛtaśrotrendriyaḥ puruṣastānapi varṇamiśrāñchrotreṇaiva gṛhṇātīti pari- hārāntaramāha—naiveti । drutādisaṃskṛtaṃ śrotrendriyamabhinne'pi gakārādau saṃskārānu- kāreṇa bhedapratyayaṃ janayati । tatraiva dṛṣṭāntamāha—so'pi mahattvādīti । yathā saṃskārānukāreṇa mahatvaṃ sūkṣmatvaṃ ca śabde gṛhṇāti ।।
atraiva dṛṣṭāntadvayamāha—madhuraṃ tiktarūpeṇeti catuṣṭayena । yathā pittadoṣa- saṃskṛtamindriyaṃ madhuraṃ tiktarūpatayā, śvetaṃ pītatayā gṛhṇāti, evaṃ dharmiṇi gatān drutādīn gṛhṇadeva tathā śabdaṃ pratipadyata ityarthaḥ । nimittagrahaṇādvineti ca yathā- saṃbhavaṃ yojyam । evaṃ hrasvadīrghaplutādiṣvapi pratyayadvayaṃ vivektavyam । kecittu dīrghā- diṣvabhedapratyayavad bhedapratyayasyāpi varṇālambanatvamicchanti ; na hi drutādipratyaya- vannādadoṣāddīrghahrasvaplutādiṣu bhedapratyayaḥ । tatra prayogaśabdena pratyayamāha, nāntarīya- rānukṛteḥ so Omitted mā. abudhvaiva. cau. mu.
varṇāntaratvamevāhuḥ keciddīrghaplutādiṣu ।
na hi drutādivattatra prayogo nāntarīyakaḥ ।। 45 ।।
tathā sati ca sāmānyaṃ triṣvatvaṃ kaiścidiṣyate ।
sāmānyakalpanā tvanyairna yuktetyabhidhīyate ।। 46 ।।
atvamityucyamānaṃ hi na dīrghaplutayorbhavet ।
ātvaṃ na hrasvaplutayostrimātraṃ na ca pūrvayoḥ ।। 47 ।।
sarvasādhāraṇatvena tadvijñātuṃ na śakyate ।
pratyekaṃ śābaleyādirūpe gotvaṃ yathā sphuṭam ।। 48 ।।
avarṇakulaśabdo'pi sthānasāmyād vanādivat ।
samudāyātmavācīti na jātivacano bhavet ।। 49 ।।
svato hasvādibhedastu nityavāde virudhyate ।
sarvadā yasya sadbhāvaḥ sa kathaṃ mātrikaḥ svayam ।। 50 ।।
śabdenāpyupādhivacanam । hnasvādibhedena ca bhinnāsvakāravyaktiṣvatvaṃ sāmānya- micchantyavarṇakulaśabdābhidheyamityāha—varṇāntaratvamityādinā sārdhena ślokena ।
tatra dūṣaṇamāha—sāmānyetyādinā sārdhena ślokadvayena । yathā hi śāvale- yādau gotvaṃ sādhāraṇam, evaṃ plutādiṣu sāmānyakalpanamayuktamiti, asya dīrghā- diṣvabhāvāt dīrghasya hrakhāplutayoḥ trimātrasyāpi pūrvayorityarthaḥ ।।
avarṇakulaśabdo'pi dīrghādyupādhibhedena bhinnatvādvanādiśabdavadekasyānā- vacchinnasya samudāyamāha, na jātimiti darśayati—avarṇeti ।।
svābhāvike tu hrasvādibhede nityatāpyākārasya bhavadabhimatā na syādityāha svato hrasvādibhedastvityardhena । tathā ca sati. cau. mu. traimātryaṃ. cau. mu. sarva Omitted. mā. samudāyārtha. cau. mu. samānamāha. mā.
tasmāduccāraṇaṃ teṣāṃ mātrākālaṃ pratīyatām ।
dvimātraṃ vā trimātraṃ vā tava no mātrikaḥ svayam ।। 51 ।।
dīrghāderna tvanaṅgatvaṃ vācakādharmato bhavet ।
itthaṃ pratīyamānāḥ syurvarṇā naḥ pratipādakāḥ ।। 52 ।।
yādṛśāt pūrvadṛṣṭo'sāvartho gamyeta tādṛśāt ।
bhrāntyā kathaṃ pratītiścennāsāvarthamitiṃ prati ।। 53 ।।
yathāśvādijavaḥ puṃsāṃ kāryānyatvaṃ prakalpayet ।
paradharmo'pi varṇānāṃ dhvanidharmastathaiva naḥ ।। 54 ।।
nanu dīrghādyanityatvādanityo vācako bhavet ।
ānupūrvīvadetasya parihāro bhaviṣyati ।। 55 ।।
utasaṃharati—tasmāduccāraṇamiti ।
nanu dhvanidharmatvena dīrghāderarthapratipattāvanaṅgatvaprasaṅgaḥ । tataśca gamanāga- manādiṣvarthabhedo na syāditi codayati—dīrghāderityardhena ।
tatra parihāramāha—itthamiti । varṇasyaiva dhvanigatadīrghādiviśiṣṭasyārtha- pratipādakatvam, tathā sambandhagrahaṇādityarthaḥ । nanu dhvanigatadīrghādiviśiṣṭatayā bhrāntasya varṇasya kathamarthapratipattāvupāyatvamiti codayati—bhrāntyā kathaṃ pratīti- ścediti । tatra parihāramāha—nāsāvarthamitiṃ pratīti । varṇasvarūpa eva hi sā bhrāntiḥ, atasmiṃstadgrahaṇāt । sambandhagrahaṇavaśena tu arthapratipattāvupāyatvena yadyathāvṛttam, tattathetyarthaḥ । taduktam—yāvanto yādṛśā—iti ।।
anyatra cānyadharmasya kāryakaratvaṃ dṛṣṭamityāha—yathāśvādīti ।।
nanu varṇātmake'pi sambandhini dīrghādiviśiṣṭasya tasya nityatvena kathamādhe- yasya nityatetyāha—nanvityardhena । tatrāha—ānupūrvīvaditi । tattvāntaraprati- tasya. cau. mu. pratīyate. cau. mu. na varṇo. cau. mu. na. cau. mu. kāryāṅgatvaṃ. cau. mu. dhvanidharmāḥ. cau. mu. evāsya. cau. mu.
tathodāttādibhedānāṃ saṃmkāgvaśagā matiḥ ।
teṣāṃ dīrghādivad bhedo na kadācit pratīyate ।। 56 ।।
tatraikavarṇarūpatve bhedo'pi syād drutādivat ।
nātra varṇāntaravyaktiśaktadhvanyantarodbhavaḥ ।। 57 ।।
ta eva mṛdutīvratvaśīghratvādisamanvitāḥ ।
abhede cāpi varṇasya dhvaninā dviprakāratā ।। 58 ।।
kecit svarūpabodhārthāḥ kecid bodhānuvartinaḥ ।
yugapat kramarūpeṇa saṃskārotpādanena vā ।। 59 ।।
tatra dīrghādibodhaḥ syāt sarveṣāṃ pracayo yadā ।
ṣedhena varṇātmakasambandhinirūpaṇaṃ sambandhasadbhāvanirūpaṇasidhyartham । atra nityatvena tu sambandhinirūpaṇaṃ saṃbandhanityatvasidhyai bhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ ।।
udāttādibhedenāpi bhedapratyayasya saṃskārānusāreṇa bhrāntatāmatidiśati— tathodāttādīti । yo hyudāttādibhedena bhedapratyayaḥ, so'pi dīrghādivadaupādhikaḥ ; na kadācit svata ityarthaḥ ।।
etadeva vivṛṇoti—tatraikavarṇarūpatva iti sārdhena । pratyabhijñānabalenai- katve pratipādite satyudāttādibhedo'pi drutādivadaupādhikaḥ ; dhvanaya eva tatra mṛdutīvraśīghratvādisambandhina udāttādibhedena pratyayaṃ janayanti ; abhivyaṅgyaga- kārasvarūpaṃ tu tadevetyarthaḥ ।
evaṃ pratyabhijñābalena gakārādervarṇasya vṛttitraye'pyekatvaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ śiṣṭāgamabalena prasaṅgād vṛttitrayasyotpattiṃ darśayitumāha—abhede cāpi varṇasye- tyādinā sārdhena ślokena ।।
dviprakārā hi dhvanayaḥ—varṇasvarūpabodhārthāḥ bodhānuvartinaśceti । te ca yugapat krameṇa vā śrotrasya saṃskārakāḥ । tatra yadā dīrghatvavaśena varṇasvarūpa- bodhārthānāṃ pracayo bhavati, tadā dīrghādibodho bhavatītyāha—tatra dīrghādibodhaḥ vyaktiriva. cau. mu. dhvanīnāṃ. cau. mu. saṃskārotpādahetavaḥ. cau. mu. pūrvetāṃ. cau. mu.
varṇātmaiva hi kālena tāvatā taiḥ pratīyate ।। 60 ।।
yugapat pracitaistaiśca syādudāttādikalpanā ।
pracaye tūttareṣāṃ syād vṛttibhedo drutādikaḥ ।। 61 ।।
varṇātmanyavabuddhe hi tadrūpāmeva te matim ।
śanairutpādayantīti nānyo varṇaḥ pratīyate ।। 62 ।।
vyaktyākṛtikṛto bhedo yadyapyekāntato bhavet ।
varṇeṣu jaimineḥ pakṣastathāpi na virotsyate ।। 63 ।।
nityatvayatnaḥ sarvo'pi gatvādiṣu bhaviṣyati ।
gakārādivacaścaitat teṣveva na virotsyate ।। 64 ।।
syādityardhena । tena ca dhvanayo varṇasvarūpaparyavasitāḥ svātmānukāreṇa bhrāntiṃ janayantīti varṇasvarūpabodhārthā iṣyanta ityāha—varṇātmaiva hītyardhena ।
yadā tvabhighātavaśena varṇasvarūpabodhārthānāṃ bodhānuvartināṃ ca yugapat pracayo bhavati, tadodāttādibodho bhavatītyāha—yugapadityardhena । bodhānuvartināṃ tu pracaye drutādibodho bhavatītyāha—pracaye tvityardhena ।।
te ca varṇasvarūpavadarthe'pi saṃskārāntareṇa bhrāntimupavarṇayantīti varṇabodhānu- vartina iṣyanta ityāha—varṇātmanīti tripādyā । tasmāt pratyabhijñānabalena vṛtti- traye'pi nānyo varṇaḥ pratīyata ityupasaṃharati—nānyo varṇaḥ pratīyata iti ।।
evaṃ tāvad vāstavamabhedaṃ pratipādyedānīmabhyupagamyāpi gakārādeḥ sāmānya- viśeṣavattvaṃ svadarśanahānirnāstītyāha—vyaktyākṛtikṛta iti ।।
yathā svadarśanahānirnāsti, tathā darśayatītyāha—nityatvayatna ityardhena । “gakāraukāravisarjanīyāḥ”—ityādi bhāṣyavacanaṃ gatvādiṣu bhaviṣyatītyavirodha evetyāha—gakārādivacaścetyardhena ।। tvitareṣāṃ. cau. mu. kālātmaiva.
vicchinnayatnavyaṅgyaiśca nityaiḥ sarvagatairapi ।
vyatiriktapadārambho varṇairnātropalabhyate ।। 65 ।।
anārabdhe ca gośabde gośabdatvaṃ kathaṃ bhavet ।
varṇasāmānyavaccāpi na tatkalpanamarhvati ।। 66 ।।
varṇātmanāmabhedācca siddhā sāmānyadhīrapi ।
samudāyo'pi tebhyo'nyo vāraṇīyo'nayā diśā ।। 67 ।।
nanu gakārādyārabdho gośabdaḥ, tasyaiva gośabdatvopalakṣitasya sambandhagraha- ṇādarthapratipādakatvam । ataḥ kathamidaṃ bhāṣyam—“gakāraukāravisarjanīyāḥ”— itītyāśaṅkyāha—vicchinnayatneti । na tāvad varṇatrayasya yugapadekagośabdā- rambhakatvam, vicchinnaprayatnābhivyaṅgyatvena saṃvittau yaugapadyābhāvāt । nāpi vāstavena yaugapadyena varṇasyaikagośabdārambhakatvam, nityatvena sarvagatatvena sarvadā sarvatrāra- mbhakatvaprasaṅgāt । nāpi krameṇa, ekaikavarṇapratipattikāle tadvyatiriktasyānu- palambhāt । uktena prakāreṇānārabdhe ca gośabdāvayavini gakārādiṣu gośabdatvaṃ kathaṃ bhavet ? na pratyekam, ekaikasya gośabdatvena gotvapratipādakatvaprasaṅgāt । nāpi vyāsajya, yugupadvarṇadvayopalabdhau tadbuddhiḥ syāt, vicchinnayatnavyaṅgyatvena ca tadabhāvāt ; apratipannasya cārthapratipādakatvābhāvādityarthaḥ ।.... .... .... gatvavacca gośabdatvaṃ nirākartavyam—sa evāyaṃ gośabdaḥ—ityabhinnavarṇālambanatvenetyāha— varṇasāmānyavaccāpīti ।
varṇatrayasamudāyo'pi tattvānyatvābhyāṃ vikalpya nirākartavya ityāha— samudāyo'pīti । varṇatrayavyatirekeṇa samudāyasyāpratibhāsāt । abhinnasya tu dharma- bhūtasya bhāve'pi doṣābhāvādityarthaḥ ।
“yadyevamarthapratyayo nopapadyate”—ityādi pūrvapakṣabhāṣyam । tasyāyamabhi- prāyaḥ—nanu varṇatrayātmake'pi sambandhini śabdasyārthena saha gamyagamakalakṣaṇaḥ sambandho'nupapanna eva । tathā hi—gotvaṃ prati varṇānāṃ saṃbhūya vā gamakatvaṃ padyate. cau. mu. na kiṃcilluptamiva bhāti. nirākartavyā/?/śyāha. mā.
abhedasamudāyastu teṣāṃ dharmo na duṣyati ।
teṣāmasti hi sāmarthyamarthapratyāyanaṃ prati ।। 68 ।।
yāvanto yādṛśā ye ca yadarthapratipādane ।
varṇāḥ prajñātasāmarthyāste tathaivāvabodhakāḥ ।। 69 ।।
syādekasya vā ? saṃbhūyāpi yugapat krameṇa vā ? na tāvadekaiṃkasya, anupalambhanāt paryāyatvaprasaṅgācca, nāpi saṃbhūya yugapat, tadabhāvāt । etaduktam—
“yaugapadyaṃ na saṃvittau sattayātiprasajyate ।”
nāpi saṃbhūya krameṇa, nityatvena sarvagatatvena ca deśataḥ kālato vā kramāyogāt, saṃbhūya krameṇa ca iti vipratiṣedhācca । āgneyādīnāṃ tu saṃbhūyakāriṇāṃ kramakartṛ- tvamapūrvadvāreṇa । varṇānāmapi saṃbhūyakartṛtvaṃ saṃskāradvāreṇa iti cenna । saṃskārāntara- parikalpanāyāṃ na pramāṇamasti । apūrvakalpanāyāṃ tu sādhyasādhanasambandhānupa- pattirgamakā ityuktam । anavagatavyākaraṇasyāpi gakārādijñānajanitasaṃskārādi- dvāreṇa aukārādismaraṇotpādakatvena kalpitasyānyaviṣayatvāyogāt ; ekaikaśaścā- śaktānāṃ samudāyo'pyaśakta eva ; vyutkrameṇa ca pratipādakatvaṃ prāpnoti । tasmāt—
‘ādhārātmani vijñāte sukhamādheyabodhanam’—ityanupapannam ।
atra siddhāntabhāṣyam—“pūrvavarṇajanitasaṃskārasahito'ntyo varṇo vācakaḥ” iti । tadvyācaṣṭe—teṣāmasti hi sāmarthyamiti । pūrvavarṇajanitasaṃskāradvayaviśi- ṣṭasya vāntyasya varṇasya, atītavarṇadvayānugṛhītasya vā, saṃskāradvāreṇa vā sarveṣāmāgne- yādivat, saṃskāradvayāntyavarṇasāmāgrīke vā jñāne sadasadvarṇagocare pratibhāsamānā- nām, samastasaṃskārite vā saṅkalanāpratyaye pratibhāsamānānām, upalabdhyanantara- sattākānāṃ vā arthapratipādanasāmarthyamastītyabhiprāyaḥ ।
yattu naikasya nāpi saṃbhūya yugapat krameṇa vā pratipādakatvamastītyuktam, tatrā- pyāha—yāvanta iti । sambandhagrahaṇavaśena varṇānāmarthapratipādakatvaṃ yeṣāṃ ca yāvatāṃ niṣedhācya. mā. na omitted. mā. nāpūrvakalpanāyāṃ. mā. saṃbandhānupapattigamaka. mā. ‘gamaka’ iti ‘ityuktam’ iti cānayorantare ‘kalpanāyāṃ na pramāṇaṃ’ ityadhikaḥ granthaḥ. vyākaraṇatvāpi. mā. vākyasya. mā. hetupratipādana. mā.
teṣāṃ tu guṇabhūtānāmarthapratyāyanaṃ prati ।
sāhityamekakartrādikramaścāpi vivakṣitaḥ ।। 70 ।।
vaktrekatvanimitte ca krame sati niyāmakam ।
prayuñjānasya yat pūrvaṃ vṛddhebhyaḥ kramadarśanam ।। 71 ।।
yaugapadyaṃ ca śakyatvānnaiva teṣāmihāśritam ।
kartṛbhedaśca tatra syānna caivaṃ dṛśyate'bhidhā ।। 72 ।।
yugapad dṛṣṭasāmarthyā naiva śaktāḥ krame yathā ।
bhāvāstathā krame śaktā yaugapadye na śaknuyuḥ ।। 73 ।।
dṛṣṭaśca pūrṇamāsādeḥ kramaḥ saṃhatyakāriṇaḥ ।
abhyāsānāṃ ca loke'pi svādhyāyagrahaṇādiṣu ।। 74 ।।
yatkramakāṇāṃ ca yattadāsti, tatteṣāṃ tāvatāmeva tatkramakāṇāmekavaktṛprayuktānāṃ ca pratipādakatvamityarthaḥ ।।
tadetadatraiva samāptamuttaram ; asyaiva prapañcaḥ—sarvameva ca sāhityādyarthaprati- pattāvupādīyamānasya varṇatrayasyopādīyamānaviśeṣaṇatvena paśugataikatvavad vivakṣita- mityāha—teṣāṃ ceti ।।
vakturekatvācca varṇānāmavaśyaṃbhāvini krame sambandhagrahaṇakālāvagatasya grahaṇamityāha—vaktrekatvanimitte ceti ।।
tasmādupalabdhiyaugapadyāsambhavāt sambhave vā vaktṛbhedaprasaṅaṅgāt vāstavena ca sarveṣāṃ sarvadā cāviśiṣṭatvena cāpratipādaketvāt saṃbhūya krameṇa pratipādakatva- mityāha—yaugapadyaṃ ceti ।।
dṛṣṭaṃ ca saṃbhūyakāriṇāṃ dvaividhyena kāryakaratvamityāha—yugapaditi ।।
nāpi vipratiṣedhaḥ, saṃbhūyakāriṇāṃ kramakartṛtvadarśanādidṛṣṭāntatrayamāha— dṛṣṭaśca pūrṇa māsāderiti । ‘darśapūrṇamāsābhyām’ ityupapadasamarpitasāhityeti- kartraukatve nimitte. cau. mu. tvaśaktatvāt. cau. mu. dṛśya. cau. mu. śaktayaḥ. mā. ‘teṣāṃ’ ityetāvadeva. mā. itaḥ pūrvaṃ ‘ekatvāt’ ityadhikaḥ granthaḥ. mā.
sādhanāditrayāṇāṃ ca vyāpārasyaikakālatā ।
sarvatrāstīti neha syādupālambhaḥ kramaṃ prati ।। 75 ।।
niṣpannā eva dṛśyante vyāpārāḥ sarva eva hi ।
sūkṣmā vyāpārabhedāstu na dṛśyante kadācana ।। 76 ।।
ekasādhanasaṃsthāśca vyāpārāvayavā yadā ।
svarūpato nirīkṣyante yaugapadyamasattadā ।। 77 ।।
kiṃ punarbahavo bhinnā bhinnasādhanasaṃśritāḥ ।
bhaveyuryaugapadyena vyāpārāḥ kramavartinaḥ ।। 78 ।।
kartavyatāviśiṣṭānāmāgneyādīnāmekapreryaviśeṣaṇotpādakatvaṃ krameṇa, karaṇānāmāgne- yādīnāṃ kṣaṇikatvena yaugapadyāsambhavāt ; abhyāse caindravāyavādīnāmekādhikāra- niṣpādakatvam ; loke'pi padādhyayanādīnāmekānuvākagrahaṇasādhakatvam ।
nanu yadi pūrṇamāsasaṃjñakasya sādhanatrayasya abhyāsādhyayanayośca kṣaṇikatve yaugapadyāsambhavāt kramakartṛtvam, akramakāriṇāṃ tarhi sāhityamanupapannamityā- śaṅkyāha—sādhanādīti । yadyapi cāgneyādīnāṃ sthūlena rūpeṇa pratyakṣadṛśyena kṣaṇikatvādekakālatvaṃ nāsti, tathāpyapūrvadvārakaikakālatvamastīti sāhityānupalambhaḥ । vyāpāraśabdenātra śaktyavasthābhidhīyate । sādhanatrayasya śaktidvāreṇaikakālatva- mastītyarthaḥ ।।
sthūlaśaktirūpasya ca vyāpārasya pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam, itareṣāṃ cārthāpattyā ityāha—niṣpannā eva dṛśyanta iti । niṣpannaśabdena dṛśyasyābhidhānam ; sūkṣma- śabdenāpi śakteḥ ।
ekaphalāvacchinnānekalakṣaṇapracayātmikā hyekā kriyābhidhīyate । tatraika- sādhanagatānāmapi svalakṣaṇānāṃ śaktimantareṇa yaugapadyaṃ nāsti ; kiṃ punarbahūnāṃ bhinna- sādhanagatānāmityāha—ekasādhanasaṃsthāśceti । vakṣyati—
“kṣaṇikāvayavatvena naikasyāpi hi śaktatā” iti ।
nanu yadi kramavadanekasthūlalakṣaṇapracayātmikaikā kriyābhidhīyate, kramavatāṃ ca gakārādīnāmekapadatvam, kathaṃ tarhi—pacati, gośabdo vartate—iti ca varta- dṛśyante na cau. mu.
yadā tvādyaparispandāt prabhṛtyā phalabhāvataḥ ।
kriyā pūrvāparībhūtā lakṣyate vartate tadā ।। 79 ।।
tenātrāpi vivakṣātaḥ prabhṛtyārthāvavodhanāt ।
sākalyenekṣyamāṇe syād vyāpāre vartamānatā ।। 80 ।।
pratyekaṃ ye punastatra vyāpārāstannirūpaṇam ।
phalāniṣpattito na syānnāstitvaṃ na ca tāvatā ।। 81 ।।
phalānumeyatāyāṃ ca vyapārasya phalaṃ prati ।
kārakāṇāṃ yathāsthānaṃ vyāpāre vartamānatā ।। 82 ।।
mānakāla nirdeśaḥ ? tatra kriyāgataṃ tāvadvartamānakālāvacchedamāha—yadā tviti । yāvantamekaphalāvacchinnāni kriyākṣaṇāni vyāpnuvanti; tāvān vartamānaḥ kāla ityucyate । tatkālāvacchinnāni ca kṣaṇāni vinaṣṭotpadyamānāni kriyā vartate— ityucyante ।।
sāmprataṃ gośabdasya vartamānatāmāha—tenātrāpi vivakṣāta iti । vivakṣāta ārabhyāntyavarṇaparyantāni varṇānyekārthapratipattāvadhikṛtāni yāvantaṃ kālaṃ vyāpnu- vanti, tāvān vartamānaḥ kāla ityucyate, tatkālāvacchinnāni varṇāni-gośabdo vartapte—ityucyante । vyāpāraśabdenātra gakārādijñānajanitasya saṃskārasyābhi- dhānam ।।
yathā cāgneyādīnāṃ payo'ntānāmekaphalotpattāvapūrvadvāreṇa sāhityam, evamekasyāpyāgneyasya kramavadanekakṣaṇātmakasya saṃskāradvāreṇaiṃva svāpūrvaniṣpattau sāhityam । phalaniṣpādakatvena tu teṣām—“codanā punarārambhaḥ”—ityatra saṃkīrtanaṃ na kṛtam । na tu tāvatā nāstitetyāha—pratyekaṃ ye punariti । vyāpāraśabdenātra kriyākṣaṇajanyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmabhidhānam ।.............adhikāra- bhāvanāyāṃ bahūnāmagneyādīnāṃ karaṇānāṃ yathāsthāne vartamānānāmāgneyasyopāṃśuyājādi- vyavahitasyopāṃśuyājasya vāgnīṣomīyādivyavahitasyāpūrvadvāreṇa sāhityamityāha— phalānumeyatāyāṃ iti । vyāpāraśabdenātrāpūrvasyābhidhānam ।। lābhataḥ. cau. mu. vartante. mā. ityucyate. mā. na kiṃcilluptamiva bhāti.
avaśyaṃbhāvinī nityaṃ pratyāsattiśca kasyacit ।
na tāvatā vyapetatvāditareṣāmanaṅgatā ।। 83 ।।
dvyantaraikāntaratve ca gakāraukārayordhruvam ।
arthapratyāyane śaktistatrasthau gamakau yataḥ ।। 84 ।।
yathā visarjanīyasya vyavadhāne na śaktatā ।
tathaivetarayoḥ śaktirānantarye na vidyate ।। 85 ।।
na ca yatraikaśo'śaktistatra sarveṣvaśaktatā ।
rathādyaṅgāni dṛśyante śālyādivahanādiṣu ।। 86 ।।
śaktistatrāsti kāciddhi vahane sā samarthyate ।
saṅghātena tu varṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ kācidiṣyate ।। 87 ।।
adhikārabhāvanāyāṃ bahūnāmāgneyādīnāṃ karaṇatve'vagate nāntyasyaiva sanni- dhānādaṅgatvamityāha—avaśyaṃbhāvinīti ।।
evam—“dṛṣṭaśca pūrvamāsādeḥ”-ityupakrāntatrayaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā dārṣṭā- ntike yojayitumāha—dvyantaraikāntaratve ceti । sambandhagrahaṇavaśena pratipāda- katve yat yathā vṛttaṃ tattathetyarthaḥ ।।
anyathā netyāha—yathā visarjanīyasyeti ।
ekaikaśaścāśaktānāṃ samudāyasya śaktatā dṛṣṭaivetyāha—na ca yatraikaśo'- śaktiriti । śālivahanākhye kārye pratyekamaśaktānāmapi raśāṅganāṃ samuditānāṃ śaktatā dṛṣṭaivetyarthaḥ ।।
nanu ca rathāṅgānāmekaikasyāpi śālivahanākhye kārye śaktirastyeva ; saṅghāte tu pracayādabhyadhikakāryārambhakatvam । gakārādīnāṃ tu gotvāvayavaśaktau naikaika- syāvayavaśaḥ sphuṭāsphuṭapratipādakatvena vā śaktirastīti ślokadvayena codayati— śaktiratrāsti kācidityādinā । dvyantaraikātvena. cau. mu. tathāhmaṅgāni. cau. mu. samṛdhyate. cau. mu. īkṣyate. cau. mu. yat omitted mā.

yasyānavayavaḥ sphoṭo vyajyate varṇabuddhibhiḥ ।
so'pi paryanuyogena naivānena vimucyate ।। 91 ।।
tatrāpi prativarṇaṃ hi padasphoṭo na gamyate ।

pratyekaṃ cāpyaśaktānāṃ samudāye'pyaśaktatā ।
tatra parihāramāha—rathasyeti । rathasya yat kāryaṃ tatraikaikasya śaktirnāsti, militānāmastītyarthaḥ ।।
athaikaikasya yat kāryaṃ tatraikaikasya śaktirucyeta ; gakārādīnāmapi tarhi ālambanavijñānotpattau sambandhagrahaṇavaśena vā kvacidarthe'pyastītyāha—atha yatkiṃciducyeteti ।
yaścāyamarthapratipattau varṇānāṃ paryanuyoga uktaḥ—naikaikasya, nāpi sambhūya yugapat krameṇa vā—ityādi, sa padasphoṭābhivyaktāvapi bhavatpakṣe dhvanīnāṃ varṇānāṃ vā tulya ityāha—yasyeti ।
tatra naikaikasya padasphoṭābhivyañjakatvam, anupalabdherityāha—tatrāpi prativarṇamiti । nāpi sarveṣāmavayavadvāreṇābhivyañjakatvam, niravayavatvādanupalabdheśce tyāha—na ceti ।।
