vinā saṃskārakalpena tadanantaravṛttitaḥ ।
kṛtānugrahasāmarthyo varṇo'ntyaḥ pratipādakaḥ ।। 97 ।।
davaśyaṃ kaścit padasphoṭābhivyaktau varṇānāṃ prakāra āstheyaḥ ; sa no'rthapratipattāveva bhaviṣyatītyāha—tatra yaḥ parihāraityardhena ।।
nanu samāne paryanuyoge tatparihāre ca sphoṭapakṣa eva kasmānna bhavatītyāha— sadbhāvavyatirekāviti । anupalabhyamānasya sadbhāvaḥ, varṇavyatiriktatvam, niravaya- vatvam, pūrvavijñānajanitasya saṃskārasya śaktikalpanaṃ ca bādhakam । taduktam “śabdakalpanāyāṃ sā ca saṃskārasya śaktikalpanā, śabdakalpanā ca”—iti । tasmādupalabhyamānānāmeva varṇānāṃ pūrvavijñānajanitasaṃskāraviśiṣṭo'ntyo varṇaḥ gotvaṃ pratipādayati ityayaṃ yatna āstheya ityarthaḥ ।।
api ca, varṇatrayavyatiriktaśabdakalpanāyāṃ cārthāpattiḥ pratyakṣaṃ vā pramāṇam ? na tāvadarthāpattiḥ, arthapratipatteranyathāpyupapadyamānatvādityāha—nānyatheti śloka- dvayena ।।
athavāntyasyaivānantaropalabdhavarṇadvayānugṛhītasya saṃskāramantareṇaiva nimittatva- mityāha—vinā saṃskārakalpeneti ।। tasmāt. cau. mu. bhavedarthamiti. cau. mu. bhavatītīdṛgevāsyā. cau. mu. tasmādupalabhyamānāmeva gotvaṃ prati varṇānāṃ. mā. varṇa ityayaṃ. mā.
eṣa eva ca saṃskāra iti kecit pracakṣate ।
adṛṣṭakalpanāhīnaṃ tāvanmātraṃ hi dṛśyate ।। 98 ।।
athavā vāsanaivāstu saṃskāraḥ sarva eva hi ।
dṛḍhajñānagṛhīte'rthe saṃskāro'stīti manvate ।। 99 ।।
tasyārthabuddhihetutve visaṃvādo'tra nirṇaye ।
tadbhāvabhāvitāheuturanyatreva pratīyate ।। 100 ।।
saṃskāre'niṣyamāṇe tu pūrvavṛttatvakalpanam ।
niṣpramāṇakamityevaṃ nānugrahaphalaṃ bhavet ।। 101 ।।
anantaravṛttatāmeva vā saṃskāraśabdenāha bhāṣyakāra ityāha—eṣa iti । smaraṇānyathānupapattikalpitasya smaraṇotpādakatvāt saṃskārāntaraparikalpanāyāṃ ca pramāṇābhāvādupalabdhavarṇadvayaviśiṣṭāntyavarṇānantaraṃ cārthapratipattidarśanādalaṃ saṃskā- rāntareṇetyarthaḥ ।।
athavā gakārādivijñānajanitavāsanāmevāha bhāṣyakāraḥ saṃskāraśabdena । tadviśiṣṭasyaivāntyāvayavasyārthapratipattau hetutvaṃ smaraṇānyathānupapattipramāṇakam । sarva- lokaprasiddhaṃ caitat । taduktam—“vastudharmo hyeṣaḥ, yadanubhavaḥ paṭīyān smṛti- bījamādhatte”—iti । tadetadāha—athavā vāsanaivāstviti ।।
arthapratipādakatve tu tasya vipratipattiḥ, tatra ca tadbhāvabhāvitvaṃ smṛti- vijñāna iva nirṇayakāraṇamityāha—tasyārthabuddhihetutva iti ।।
yukta caitat, aniṣyamāṇe ca saṃskāre pūrvayoranyaṃ pratyanugrāhakatvaṃ na syādityāha—saṃskāre'niṣyamāṇa iti । na tāvat pūrvayorantyaṃ prati vijñāna- yoranugrāhakatvam, antyavarṇajñānavelāyāṃ tirohitatvāt ; nāpi saṃskāradvāreṇa, tada- bhāvābhyupagamāt । nāpyanantaropalabdhayoḥ, saṃskārābhāvena upalambhānupalambhayoravi- śeṣādityarthaḥ ।। tu. cau. mu. adṛṣṭakalpanātītaṃ. cau. mu. visaṃvādo'sya. cau. mu. anyatraiva. cau. mu. eveti. cau. mu.
yadyapi smṛtihetutvaṃ saṃskārasya vyavasthitam ।
kāryāntare'pi sāmarthyaṃ na tasya pratiṣidhyate ।। 102 ।।
tena saṃskārasadbhāvo nānenaiva prakalpitaḥ ।
tasyārthapratyayārthatvamadṛṣṭaṃ kevalaṃ kṛtam ।। 103 ।।
śabdapakṣe'pi taccaitadadṛṣṭatvānna mucyate ।
kāryabodhanaśaktatvaṃ tulyaṃ saṃskāraśabdayoḥ ।। 104 ।।
kṣīṇārthāpattirevaṃ ca na sphoṭaṃ parikalpayet ।
gakārādismaraṇānyathānupapattiparikalpitasyānyatrāsāmarthyāditi cedityāśa- ṅkyāha—yadyapīti । arthapratipattilakṣaṇe'pi kārye tadanyathānupapatyā tatrāpi sāmarthyāvagamādityarthaḥ ।।
nanu smaraṇānyathānupapattikalpitasya saṃskārasyārthapratipatyanyathānupapatyā śaktikalpanāyāṃ sphoṭakalpanaiva varamityāśaṅkyāha—tena saṃskārasadbhāva iti ।
mama varṇasmaraṇānyathānupapatyāvagata eva saṃskārātmake dharmiṇi śaktimātra- kalpanā ; tava tvarthapratipatyanyathānupapatyā dharmiṇo'pi sphoṭasya kalpaneti viśeṣaḥ ।।
sā ca saṃskārasya śaktiḥ kalpayitvāpi sphoṭaṃ bhavatpakṣe sphoṭābhivyaktau parikalpanīyaiveti kalpanāgauravamityāśaṅkyāha—śabdapakṣe'pīti ।
tatra gakārādismaraṇānyathānupapatyā kalpite vā dharmiṇi saṃskārātmake'rtha- pratipatyanyathānupapatyā śaktimātraṃ parikalpyatām, śaktiviśiṣṭaṃ vā padasphoṭākhya- dharmyantaramiti cintāyāṃ saṃskārasyaiva śaktimātraṃ parikalpyārthapratipatterupapannatvānna sphoṭakalpanāyāmarthāpattiḥ prabhavatītyāha—kāryabodhanaśaktatvamiti ।
api ca, kalpayitvārthapratipatyā śaktiviśiṣṭaṃ padasphoṭākhyaṃ saṃskārasya śaktiḥ parikalpanīyā । ataḥ pūrvavarṇajanitasaṃskāraviśiṣṭasyaivāntyasya padasphoṭābhi- kāryāntareṣu. cau. mu. nānenaivaṃ prakalpyate. cau. mu. tasyārthabuddhihetutvam. cau. mu.
saṃskārakalpanā pūrvamavaśyaṃbhāvinī hi te ।। 105 ।।
dhvanibhyo'pyaparastāvanneṣyetārthamitiṃ prati ।
te vā yadyupalabhyeran varṇāḥ pratyakṣato na vā ।। 106 ।।
varṇānāṃ yaugapadyena yadi cāvaśyamarthitā ।
nityatvāt sarvadā tat syānna tu kāraṇatā tathā ।। 107 ।।
itthaṃ kramagṛhītānāṃ yugapad vāthavā parā ।
sthitiḥ sā kāraṇaṃ tu syānnityamarthadhiyaṃ prati ।। 108 ।।
vyañjakatvam, abhivyañjakasya cārthapratipādakatvamityāha—saṃskārakalpanā pūrva- miti ।
nanu yadi varṇebhya eva padasphoṭābhivyañjakebhyo'rthasya pratipannatvena nārthāpattirarthāntaraṃ kalpayati, dhvanibhya eva tarhi varṇābhivyañjakebhyo'rthapratipatterupa- pannatvena varṇatrayasadbhāvo'pi na syāt । tataśca—“gakāraukāravisarjanīyāḥ”— iti bhāṣyamanupapannamityāśaṅkyāha dhvanibhyo'pīti । syādetadevam, yadi sphoṭavadarthapratipatyanyathānupapattireva varṇasadbhāve pramāṇaṃ syāt ; varṇavadeva ca dhvanayaḥ pratyakṣā bhaveyuḥ; pratyakṣāvagatavarṇatrayānyathānupapattikalpitāstu dhvanayaḥ; tatra varṇatrayā- bhāve eṣāmabhāva eva syāt । tasmād varṇānāmeva saṃbhūya krameṇa vārthapratipatti- nimittatvānnārthāpattirarthāntaraṃ kalpayatītyarthaḥ ।
nanu nityatvena varṇānāṃ yaugapadyasyāpi sadbhāvāt saṃbhūya yaugapadyena nimittatvaṃ kasmānneṣṭam ? ata āha—varṇānāmiti । anabhivyaktānāṃ yaugapadyam, na tu kāraṇatvamityarthaḥ ।।
pakṣāntaramāha—itthamiti ।
viśiṣṭakramagṛhītānāṃ vānantaraṃ sattārthapratipattinimittatvam, tathā sambandha- grahaṇādityarthaḥ । ca. cau mu yugapadyāthavā. cau. mu.
yadvā pratyakṣataḥ pūrvaṃ kramajñāteṣu yat param ।
samastavarṇavijñānaṃ tadarthajñānakāraṇam ।। 109 ।।
tatra jñāne ca varṇānāṃ yaugapadyaṃ pratīyate ।
nāvaśyaṃ yaugapadyena pratyakṣatvena tadbhavet ।। 110 ।।
citrarūpāṃ ca tāṃ buddhiṃ sadasadvarṇagocarām ।
kecidāhuryayā varṇo gṛhyate'ntyaḥ pade pade ।। 111 ।।
antyavarṇe'pi vijñāte pūrvasaṃskārakāritam ।
smaraṇaṃ yaugapadyena sarveṣvanye pracakṣate ।। 112 ।।
sarveṣu caitadartheṣu mānasaṃ sarvavādinām ।
iṣṭaṃ samuccayajñānaṃ kramajñāneṣu satsvapi ।। 113 ।।
pakṣāntaramāha—yadveti ślokadvayena । na pūrvavarṇasaṃskārasya sākṣādarthaprati- pattau nimittatvam । saṃskārajanyāyāṃ tu buddhau yugapat pratibhāsamānasya varṇatrayasya nimittatvam, nāvaśyaṃ pratītigatasyaiva yaugapadyasyārthapratipādakatvam, smṛtigatasyā- pyupapatterityarthaḥ ।।
tāṃ ca buddhiṃ pūrvavarṇajanitasaṃskārānugṛhītāntyavarṇajanyāmatikrāntavarṇa- grahaṇarūpāṃ sadasadvarṇagocarāṃ kecid vicitrāmicchanti, yayā pade pade'ntyavarṇa- grahaṇamityāha—citrarūpāṃ ceti ।
apare tu saṃskāratrayajanyāṃ varṇasmaraṇarūpāṃ saṅkalanātmikāmicchantītyāha— antyavarṇe'pi vijñāna iti ।
dṛṣṭaṃ ca kramagṛhītānāṃ yugapat smaraṇamityāha—sarveṣu ceti । pratyakṣasthena. cau. mu. kecidāhuryathā. cau. mu. sarvasaṃskāra. mā. caivamartheṣu. cau. mu. kramajñāteṣu. mā. buddhiṃ. omitted mā. saṃskārāntyavarṇa. mā. gocarāṅkakacidvicitra. mā.
na cettadabhyupeyeta kramadṛṣṭeṣu naiva hi ।
śatādirūpaṃ jāyeta tatsamuccayadarśanam ।। 114 ।।
tena śrotramanobhyāṃ syāt kramād varṇeṣu yadyapi ।
pūrvajñānaṃ parastāt tu yugapat smaraṇaṃ bhavet ।। 115 ।।
tadārūḍhāstadā varṇā na dūre'rthāvabodhanāt ।
śabdādarthamatistena laukikairabhidhīyate ।। 116 ।।
citrabudhyānayā bhrāntyā varṇebhyo vyatirekataḥ ।
paścād gauriti vijñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kaiścidiṣyate ।। 117 ।।
kramagṛhītānāṃ yugapat smaraṇānabhyupagame tvekādikrameṇa gṛhītānāṃ saṅkala- nātmakaḥ śatapratyayo na syādityāha—na cediti ।
upasaṃharati—tena śrotramanobhyāmiti ।
tadārūḍhānāṃ svārthapratipādakatve sati vyavadhānābhāvena śabdārthaṃ pratipadyā- mahe—iti laukikaṃ vacanamityāha—tadārūḍhāstadeti । tasmāduktena prakāreṇārtha- pratipatteranyathāpyupapadyamānatvena nārthāntaraṃ parikalpayatīti siddham । svayaṃ caitat— ‘yāvanto yādṛśāḥ’—ityādinā vyākhyātam ।
nanu vijñānatrayottarakālaṃ—gauḥ—ityekākāraṃ vijñānamekaikajñānavilakṣaṇa- marthāntarāvabhāsamupajāyate ; tadbhāvabhāvitvenākṣajatvāt pratyakṣam । na ca tadvarṇā- lambanam, bhinnatvād varṇānām । tatra yadā śābaleyādiṣu—gaurayam—ityekā- kāraṃ vijñānaṃ śābaleyādivyatiriktaikajātiprasādhakam, yathā ca prāṇyādiṣu—deva- datto'yam—iti vijñānamekāvayaviprasādhakam, tadvad—gauḥ—ityapi varṇatraya- vyatiriktaikaprasādhakaṃ pratyakṣamiṣṭaṃ kaiścidityetad vikalpya dūṣayati—na tāvadvarṇa- trayottarakālamekākāramarthāntaragrāhakaṃ vijñānamupajāyate, varṇatrayavyatiriktasya śrotre vijñāne pratibhāsābhāvāt ? taduktam—“te ca śrotragrahaṇāḥ”—iti ।
bhrāntestu mūlamupadarśayitumāha—citrabudhyānayeti । varṇadvayapratipattya- nantaraṃ sadasadvarṇagocaraṃ grahaṇasmaraṇarūpaṃ yadvijñānamupajāyate samastasaṃskārakāritam, cettadābhyupeyeta. cau. mu. parastānna. cau. mu. tato. cau. mu. kāritaṃ tāvat kuto'yaṃ. mā.
vailakṣaṇyaṃ ca tasyeṣṭamekaikajñānataḥ sphuṭam ।
varṇarūpāvabodhāt tu na tadarthāntaraṃ bhavet ।। 118 ।।
yadi cārthāntaratvaṃ syādekaikasmāt trayasya tat ।
varṇatrayaparityāge buddhirnānyatra jāyate ।। 119 ।।
gaurityekamatitvaṃ tu naivāsmābhirnivāryate ।
tadgrāhyekārthatā bhrāntyā śabde syādekatāmatiḥ ।। 120 ।।
śaighryādalpāntaratvācca gośabde sā bhavedapi ।
devadattādiśabde tu sphuṭo bhedaḥ pratīyate ।। 121 ।।
tatkṛtoyaṃ bhramaḥ na tu tatrārthāntaraṃ pratibhāsate । varṇā eva tu parokṣāparokṣatayā pratibhāsante; nārthāntaramityarthaḥ ।
iṣṭameva ca tasya vailakṣaṇyamekaikavarṇagocarād vijñānādityāha—vailakṣaṇyamiti ।
yadi caikaikajñānagocarād gakārādervarṇatrayasyārthāntaratvaṃ tadapīṣṭamevetyāha— yadi cārthāntaratvamiti ।
yadapi kevalaṃ pratīyamānasyaiva gakārāderekārthasaṃśleṣakāritamekākāraṃ vijñāna- mupajāyate, tadapi varṇatrayātmakaikagopadālambanam । ekapadatvaṃ caiṃkārthakatvenaika- buddhigrāhyatvena cetyāha—gaurityekamatitvantviti ।
yatra tu bhinnāvaśiṣṭatā, tatraikamatitvaṃ nāstītyāha—śaidhyrāditi । gauḥ— ityatrāpi pratipattitrayamekalakṣaṇotpannatvenaikāvaśiṣṭatvenaikatvavadavabhāsate ; na tu tatraikārthakāritvena varṇatrayālambanaikāvagatiḥ, sambandhagrahaṇāgrahaṇayoraviśeṣāt iti apiśabdasyārthaḥ ।
“nanvevamapi—śabdādarthaṃ pratipadyāmahe—iti laukikaṃ vacanamanupapannam”— iti codyabhāṣyam । tasyāyamarthaḥ—saṃskārāṇāmarthapratipādakatve teṣāmaśabdatvena— śabdādarthaṃ pratipadyāmahe—iti laukikaṃ vacanamanupapannam—iti । tatra parihārabhāṣya- tu. cau. mu. tadgrāhyaikārthatābhyāṃ. ca. cau. mu. devadattādiśabdeṣu. cau. mu. trayasyārthāntaratvamapīṣṭa. mā.
na gauṇaḥ śabda ityevaṃ granthasambandhanaṃ bhavet ।
astyakṣareṣu hetutvaṃ tatparaṃ vacanaṃ ca tat ।। 122 ।।
śabdāditi ca hetutvaṃ pañcamyātrābhidhīyate ।
bhavatpakṣe'pi caikāntājjñānena vyavadhirjavet ।। 123 ।।
gauṇo'nyathā prasiddhaḥ san prayujyetānyathā yadi ।
na cānyādṛṅnimittatvaṃ kasyacit saṃpratīyate ।। 124 ।।
svavyāpāravyavāyo hi sarvasminneva kārake ।
dṛṣṭo vyāpāra īdṛk ca śabdasyetyavyavetatā ।। 125 ।।
gakārāderyadā cānyo na loke śabda ucyate ।
dvayam—“yadi nopapadyate, anupapannaṃ nāma”—ityekam, “na caitadanupa- pannārtham, akṣarebhyaḥ saṃskāraḥ, saṃskārādarthapratipattiriti bhavantyarthapratipattāvakṣarāṇi nimittam”—ityaparaṃ bhāṣyam । “gauṇa eṣa śabdaḥ”—iti codyabhāṣyam ; tasyābhiprāyaḥ—saṃskārādarthapratipattāvakṣarāṇāṃ gauṇamarthapratipādakatvam । tataśca— śabdādarthaṃ pratipadyāmahe—itīti । nāyaṃ gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ, akṣarāṇāṃ saṃskāra- dvāreṇārthapratipattau tadbhāvabhāvitvena nimittatvāt । nimittapratipādakaṃ caitadvacanam— śabdādarthaṃ pratipadyāmahe—iti ityarthaḥ ।
etadeva vivṛṇoti—śabdāditi ca hetutvamiti ।
yadi ca kasyacit sākṣātkārakatvaṃ syāt, tato'kṣarāṇāṃ saṃskāravyavadhāne- nārthapratipattau gauṇatvaṃ syāt ; na tu tadasti, kāṣṭhāderapi pāke jvalanavyavadhānā- dityāha—gauṇo'nyathā prasiddha iti ।
athavā, avāntaravyāpāraviśiṣṭasya kārakatvena tasya ca pratikārakaṃ vicitratvena na kvacid vyavadhānamityāha—svavyāpāravyavāya iti ।
gakārādivyatirikte loke śabdaśabdaprayogābhāvena 4aśabdatvena sphoṭa- pakṣe eva—śabdādarthaṃ pratipadyāmahe—iti laukikaṃ vacanamanupapannamityāha— gakārāderiti । hi. cau. mu. prasiddho vā. cau. mu. tu. cau. mu. śabdatvena. mā.
tadā tasmāt pratīte'rthe śabdāditi kathaṃ bhavet ।। 126 ।।
śabdajñānādisaṃskāravyaktasphoṭakṛte'thavā ।
pratyaye śabdajanyatvamiti gauṇaṃ prasajyate ।। 127 ।।
saṃskārajananārthaṃ ca na śabdoccāraṇaṃ matam ।
arthapratītimuddiśya prayuktasya kramastvayam ।। 128 ।।
tasmāt tādarthyataḥ śabdaḥ phalena vyapadiśyate ।
samuccayāvabodhe tu vyavadhānaṃ na kenacit ।। 129 ।।
yadi vāpūrvasaṃskāra itikartavyateṣyate ।
varṇo'ntyo gamakastasya śabdatvānmukhyatā bhavet ।। 130 ।।
atha varṇābhivyañjakasyārthapratipādakatvena laukikavacanamupapannamityucyate, tatrāsya gauṇatvaṃ prāpnotītyāha—śabdajñānādīti । bhavatpakṣe hi varṇānāmartha- pratipādakatvaṃ śabdālambanajñānasaṃskāratacchaktikalpanābhivyaktasphoṭavyavahitamiti— śabdādarthaṃ pratipadyāmahe—iti gauṇamāpadyata ityarthaḥ ।
asmatpakṣe tu yathā pākamuddiśya kāṣṭhādeḥ pravṛttau jvalanāderavāntaravyāpāra- tvenāvyavadhāyakatvam, evaṃ varṇatrayasyārthapratipattimuddiśya prayuktasya na saṃskāreṇa vyavadhānamityāha—saṃskārajananārthamiti ।
upasaṃharati—tasmāditi । indriyādāvapi saṃkalanāpratyayārūḍhānāṃ prati- pādakatvam, tadāpi vyavadhānaṃ nāstītyāha—samuccayāvabodha iti । taduktam— “tadārūḍhāḥ”—iti ।
yadāpyantyasya pūrvavarṇajanitasaṃskāraviśiṣṭasya gamakatvam, tadāpi tasya śabdatvena vyavadhānābhāvenaikatvena ca mukhyatvam । śabdāditi prakṛtipratyau ; ityāha—yadi vāpūrvasaṃskāra iti । kramādayam. cau. mu. cāpūrvasaṃskāra. cau. mu. tatrāpyagauṇatvaṃ. mā. mukhyatvaṃ śabdāditi prakṛtipratyaye.... tyāha. mā.
varṇā vā dhvanayo vāpi sphoṭaṃ na padavākyayoḥ ।
vyañjanti vyañjakatvena yathā dīpaprabhādayaḥ ।। 131 ।।
sattvād ghaṭādivacceti sādhanāni yathāruci ।
laukikavyatirekeṇa kalpite'rthe bhavanti hi ।। 132 ।।
nārthasya vācakaḥ sphoṭo varṇebhyo vyatirekataḥ ।
ghaṭādivanna dṛṣṭena virodho dharmyasiddhitaḥ ।। 133 ।।
pratiṣedhettu yo varṇāṃstajjñānānantarodbhavān ।
dṛṣṭabādho bhavet tasya śaśicandraniṣedhavat ।। 134 ।।
varṇotthā vārthadhīreṣā tajjñānānantarodbhavā ।
yedṛśī sā tadutthā hi dhūmāderiva vahnidhīḥ ।। 135 ।।
tatraiva vailakṣaṇyamāha—varṇā vā iti । varṇā vā dhvanayo vāpīti dharmi- nirdeśaḥ, sphoṭaṃ nābhivyañjantīti sādhyo dharmaḥ, vyañjakatvāditi hetuḥ, pradīpava- diti dṛṣṭāntaḥ । tasminneva pratijñārthe sattvāditi hetuḥ, ghaṭavaditi dṛṣṭānta ityāha— sattvād ghaṭādivacceti । na cātra pratyakṣādivirodhaḥ, pratyakṣādinā pratīyamānatvāt sphoṭasyetyāha—sādhanānīti ।
prayogāntaramāha—nārthasya vācaka iti । sphoṭa iti dharmī, arthasya vācako na bhavatīti sādhyo dharmaḥ, varṇavyatiriktatvāditi hetuḥ, ghaṭavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ । nāpi sphoṭānantarā dhīrbhavatītyāha pratiṣedhediti । yadi kaścideva- māha—na varṇatrayamarthasya vācakam, sphoṭavyatiriktatvāt ghaṭavat—iti, tasya varṇatrayapratipattyanantaramananyathāsiddhārthapratibhānyathānupapattyā śaśicandraniṣedhavadbādha ityarthaḥ ।
pramāṇāntaramāha—varṇotthā veti । varṇajanyeti sādhyo dharmaḥ, varṇaprati- patyanantaramutpadyamānatvāditi hetuḥ, dhūmādagnyanumānavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ । tatraiva trailakṣaṇya. mā. sphoṭānantarādho bhavatītyāha. mā.
dīpavadvā gakārādirgavādeḥ pratipādakaḥ ।
dhruvaṃ pratīyamānatvāt tatpūrvaṃ pratipādanāt ।। 136 ।।
varṇātiriktaḥ pratiṣidhyamānaḥ padeṣu mandaṃ phalamādadhāti ।
kāryāṇi vākyāvayavāśrayāṇi satyāni kartuṃ kṛta eṣa yatnaḥ ।। 137 ।।
prayogāntaramāha—dīpavadveti । gakārāditrayaṃ dharmi, pratipādakamiti sādhyo dharmaḥ, gotvapratipādanāditi hetuḥ, rūpe pradīpavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ ।
śabdārthayoḥ sambandhākṣepānantaraṃ varṇavyatiriktasambandhinirākaraṇamasambaddham, tasyaivārthena saha sambandhopapatteriti codayati—varṇeti । tatra parihāramāha— kāryāṇīti । varṇatrayātiriktasya vidhimukhena kāryamukhena vānupalabhyamānatvena sambandhagrahaṇābhāvād vākyasphoṭasyāsatyatve sambandhasyāsatyatvād varṇatrayātmanyeva sambandhini tasyopalabhyamānatvena ca sambandhasya sadbhāvaḥ satyatvaṃ ca sidhyati । tadāha—vākyāvayavāśrayāṇītyādi । satyāni kartuṃ kṛta eṣa yatnaḥ sphoṭātmaka- sambandhinaḥ pratiṣedhena varṇātmakasambandhyavadhāraṇarūpaḥ । taduktam—
“ādhārātmani vijñāte sukhamādheyabodhanam” । iti ।। iti bhaṭṭombekaviracitāyāṃ tātparyaṭīkāyāṃ sphoṭākhyaṃ vādasthānakaṃ samāptam vākyāvayavāśritāni. mā. saṃvandhasyāsatyarthādvarṇa. mā. varṇātmakasaṃbadhāvadhāraṇa. mā.
